1b1(rnying rgyud): zag mes/ rgya ga skad du/ shUnan+ta ga N+ya k+Sha rA twAH/ bod spyad du/ dpal zla gsang nag pa'i rgyud/ dpal 'jigs byed kyi
1b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra gsung thugs kyi bdag
1b3(rnying rgyud): nyid/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po chen po che ba kun gyi bdag nyid/ zab mo'i gsung brjod du med pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs su gsung ba/ dran rtog thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa
1b4(rnying rgyud): las mi g.yeng ba'i sar// rdo rje'i ngang tshul bstan pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ snang ba'i dang ma bcos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i dbyings nas/ thams cad gsal ba'i 'od kyi nyi ma lta bu'i dkyil
1b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis/ srid pa'i bag chags ma lus pa bsreg par mdzad pa'i 'od cir yang snang ba ste/ 'og min gyi gnas dbus mtha' med pa'i gzhal yas khang ye shes rin po che dur khrod kyi rgyu
2a1(rnying rgyud): las gyu sa/ 'di rkyen drug gi tshogs pa rnamams pa da das pargya pa sa / mthong dzugs pa myong nas/ nga kyi na pa'i ngas kyi nga/
2a2(rnying rgyud): dpung grong du 'khyil ba'i steng 'og rdo rje tham mig ma ris su bris pas gtams pa/ phyogs bzhi'i ngos pa ni thod pas/ masgron gyi rgyag mdu brtsegs pa/ rtse moganam lhags u mo dra ba/ 'khor log tams pa'i bdag tams pa/
2a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dang gnam lcags kyi 'od phyogs bcur 'gro ba/ 'od dang 'od zer rab tu 'khrugs pa/ mchog chen dang rkang chen dang / mchog phra mo'i thal gtams pa/ bam chen po'i ka ba la chu srin gyi ka khru can/ 'khor
2a4(rnying rgyud): lo 'bar ba'i ka gdan can// zhing chen bsnol ma ris kyi gdung / chung chen po bskal pa'i rtsibartsam btang ba// srung mo'i tshe tshe 'phro ba/ drung chen khri 'bums 'khyil ba/ zhing chen gyi bla res smin lta bur bklubs pa/
2a5(rnying rgyud): srin gyi mgos gtams pa na/ 'jigs kyi kyi rgyal po la m+b+han+tu/ hesa'i gyang byen mong ma yin pa'i mtshan dang bzad du ldan pa de/ sbyor sgrol gyi yum dang gnyis med 'brel ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so//
2b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes sprul lnga'i gshed bzhi la sogs te/ gshin de'i 'khor tshogs nyid las mi gzhan pa dang / nyid las gzhan pa'i rig pa khyad par can dang / smon lam gyi mos pa'i skal brdzun la phyogs pa/ dpag gis rmi la btil rtse gang bu bzhin du grags ra/
2b2(rnying rgyud): de nas 'jigs byed khrag 'byung gi rgyal po yamAn+ta ka des/ lha ma la dbang skur ba'i ting nge 'dron dang / chos nyid yu ma la dbang sbyar ba'i ting nge dzin dang / go 'phang chen po la sbyor ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
2b3(rnying rgyud): byams pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis 'dod chags sgrol ba
2b4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan gyis nga rgyal sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bad pa med pa'i cho 'phrul gyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thub pas bdud rnams 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de rnams pa
2b5(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// de yi 'dzin rtog dbang gi ni// 'jig rten gsum po rim gyis chags// 'gro drug sems can ma lus la// dregs pas rim par dbang bsgyur ba// bsam pa log pa'i bar chad bdud// nga rgyal khengs pa'i gshin rje dang // zhe sdang gyos
2b6(rnying rgyud): po'i srin po dang // drug gsum rgyas pa'i rgyal po dang // phrag dog 'dod chags ma mo sogs// khams gsum ma lus rim gyis bsdus// brgyal dregs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba// gzugs phung che la rdos pa dgas// nga ro rje zhing gti mug can// lag na
2b7(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// byams dang snying rdo'i lam dang thal// che btsan rtag par 'dzin pa'i mthus// log pa'i lam dang gol ba'i sar// byin ci log la yid ches pas// las su mtshan ma'i chos la spyod// srid pa'i sa bon nub mos 'phangs// dkyil
3a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong // bskal pa bcu ru myong ba'o// gal te de las thar nas kyang // yi dwags mo dang mkha' 'gro la// bskal pa drug tu gnas pa'o// gal te de las thar nas kyang // slar yang srin po'i lus blangs da
3a2(rnying rgyud): go ma bzhin du 'khor bar gyur// de yi 'khor yang srin mo dang // ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // shin tu gtum pa'i 'khor dang bcas// gsod pa dbang zhig brims pa dang // sha dang khrag dang srog la spyod// nges pa'i lung dang ma ldan pas// kun kyang
3a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam du gyur// sbrul sku la sogs sangs rgyas kyis// 'dul ba'i las su ma gyur te// slar yang khengs pas ldog par byed// de nas 'khor gyi dngos po rnams kyis/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dgyes pa
3a4(rnying rgyud): chen po rngams pa nyid la brdas bskul te/ e ma ho// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog/ ye shes phrin las rmad po che// spos la mngon par 'chel ba yis// nga rgyal dregs pa'i gdug pa can// gdul bya
3a5(rnying rgyud): sbyin par mdzod du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ bdud dang srin po gshin rje sogs// nga rgyal dregs pas bcings nas ni// shin tu gdug cing gtum byed pas// de la zhi bas phan mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs dang
3a6(rnying rgyud): ldan byas nas// khro bar de bzhin gshegs pas mdzod// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus thams cad kun// skad cig yud la brlag 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum po spos ci dgos// de nas 'jigs byed chen po des// las ngan
3a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i srin po la sogs pa kun/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spang ba dang / khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bde la la gzhag pa'i phyir/ thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rngam pa chen po ye shas kyis rgyal po de
3b1(rnying rgyud): nyid 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyal po// rol pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ chos kyi dbyings skye ba med pa'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khros pa'i rgyal mo ro langs ma mngon du phyung ste/ ha ta zhes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis/ b+ha ga gru
3b2(rnying rgyud): gsum du rgyas par mdzad/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen po la khrims nas/ gsang babyang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ trA~M hU~M hrI b+h+rUM ba~M shra bai shud d+he/ kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa lA ya mAN+Dal phaT phaT/ ha la~M hi la/ hUM hUMH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
3b3(rnying rgyud): bcu thams cad du/ dur khrod brdal ba chen po'i rang bzhen/ khrag gi rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrugs pa'i klong nas/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje me dpung chen po klong du 'khyil pa'i dbus na/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi thod pa skam rnon tu gram du brtsigs pa/
3b4(rnying rgyud): 'og rdo rje rtse gram mig mang ris su gtams pa/ ye shes kyi rdo rje d+ha gram 'od 'phro ba/ 'khrugs pa/ 'bar ba/ khams gsum thams cad khyab gdal ba/ dbus bu gsum zla ga ma gsum dang ldan pa/ mu khyud thod pa dang rdo rje cha gram bsnol mar bskor ba/ phyi rim
3b5(rnying rgyud): po rtsi bas bzhi pa/ de'i gyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i rabs bskor ba/ mu mud zlum pos bskor ba/ phyi rim mu krung zlum po thod rnon gyis bskor ba/ gru chad kyi mtsho la ro sna tshogs 'gro ba/ 'byams pa/ sngam bus mdzes pa/
3b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa/ rgyan gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba/ hrI dang nang med pa/ kun tu yang nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad rdo rje ba'i brtsig pa 'tshor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ khro bo dang / khro mo rol pa'i rgyan/
3b7(rnying rgyud): stong gi 'jig rten gyi rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur te/ des 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad 'ur 'ur dang / chem che ma/ shig shig/ gtor gtor/ gtogs shig dang / choms shig/ sod cig/ drol cig/ spongs shig pas/ 'jig
4a1(rnying rgyud): smra smra/ lta sa pa // sa sa smra sa/ na su / nadu
4a2(rnying rgyud): na/ rdong me dbyung ba grod kyi lun/ rdo ye sa coM rdzo ba ba smra/ nyi kyigs pa gyu/ 'angs ma da 'du'abral myed pa las gnas su me pa'i dbyings nas 'di du// 'dzum mnan/ d+haH
4a3(rnying rgyud): rngu / de la sa nan/ zhes pa pas/ ma po smye sa/ ga na kyi nyings su 'ardol pa'i srid de/ sems can rten pa drug drug pa thon // de da gas la byu gnyis gomam med pags ldan na/
4a4(rnying rgyud): badzin yang shes/ de nas 'ag ra rgyal po la na/ cho phrub kya myed pa/ 'gag pa med par 'char bas/ glegs rjems dum gceg d+ha 'di/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs kyad chen po dang / mang ba
4a5(rnying rgyud): 'byor dzo'i ljags kyi gsung 'thag stong gis bsgrags pas/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po thams cad dus gcig tu 'dug pa/ thugs ye shes kyi mes snang seM dpung shing gzul du dus gcig tu bsregs pas steng 'ag ma per dumu gcig kyi dung byed du/
4a6(rnying rgyud): dgu dang / phyage bcobargyad / zhabs rnam pa brgyad dru gtams pa/ phyag na mtshan ca/ chog su bsnams shing / drung 'od 'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ stan 'bar ba nyi shud+ha bdun mang 'ang / rigs byas dbu btsun pa/ rdo mabyung nagag ba sdus 'jig rten gyi
4a7(rnying rgyud): gi mi sa pa khab/ yum do langs thos pa 'tsha sa me par bzugs sa// gang phyogs kyi theg sa pa sgo brad me// zugs so// mdu the thu ga sa/ sras mchogs me nas mo// ri ma ma rgyangs pazhi la gzhad pa
4b1(rnying rgyud): shang byig kyim mang ba phyobs sugs pa du // sum dgu gron ga dgas pa'i gzugs// zhal ga cig pa lajug gnas// / g.yas dag gan zhi drug pags// g.yon namaman man 'thar mag// gsum yang sdug sacun bzhin shes// dz+ha
4b2(rnying rgyud): myos byed dbar ba ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser nag go// nub tu Ar+tha ma ru co// zhal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog dmar nag go// gyang du ral pa tshar dgu ste// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ldang nag go// dkyil 'khor kun kyang gsal bar sdang ba
4b3(rnying rgyud): las// de nas dregs pa chen po rnams/ gadrug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sgra tshogs ston pas/ mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i dngos dregs pa'i chog tu sgrub/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci byed zer zhing / khengs pa'i sems kyis rngam mo// de nas 'di
4b4(rnying rgyud): byed ci rgyal pos/ skra'i gzi brjid che ba'i gzi mdangs phyung ste/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs/ gsang sngags rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di bton to// hU~MhU~MhUM/ ha ha ha/ ya mA yak+sha khA hi khA hI/ zhes pas gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang /
4b5(rnying rgyud): dbang po kun phyung / ba su ta kur+ra drangs nas/ sna laM mgrin bcad gtubs/ mAMs zos/ rak+ta/ 'thungs/ keng rus bachos so// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos a br-i sha kA/ hUMtA b+h+yAM/ rdzi skar mdzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ 'khor 'das thams cad ye/
4b6(rnying rgyud): shes gcig gi nga du chub bo// de nas dregs pa chen po rnams kyi mngos ma/ sgyid chen no n+ti skyed ma dang / tshangs ma dang / 'thug ma dang / dbang po dang / 'jug sred mo la sogs te/ zan dang yang byan ga/ yog dang yang g.yog/ 'byor zhing gi rdul kyad
4b7(rnying rgyud): kyang 'dus so// de rnaMs 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po ya mA n+ta ka des/ gsang ba'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin mdzadang / ya ma yak+Sha/ pra bta/ oM Ar+g+haM/ badz+rA thAg+h+ra prA pa shaN+De/ oM a la la to zhes brjod pas/ ma mo thams cad kyi sems mos pas
4b8(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams sor bzhag
5a1(rnying rgyud): du'adu tugs pa phre rdzas par byug/ dus 'ag na skal/ rang ba bang pa dngas subargyad 'ad+mo/ 'thos ra / nga ba dadang 'thob ba snang // dranas ma rnams lag
5a2(rnying rgyud): dbang dang ye shes chen po dang 'brel gyi dbang bsgyung // de nas patha phaT sra bzhis dkyil khror kyi slob yang phyir 'thon nas/ 'ab ba'i t+tal 'khor zhal phyi bltas nas/ bzad bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed nyal po ma na d+ha
5a3(rnying rgyud): drugs rje chen po bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par shegs so// dri nas ye shes rjen pa'i byed par las 'di dag byung po// oM la mahA/ oM badz+ra sa mri tam d+hA a mi tam na d+ha man n+de/ ya mA rjes/ ces gsungs pas/ bregs pa can pa'i
5a4(rnying rgyud): TIg sa de dag khrag 'thung chen pa'i sngams nas 'thon te dran pa slar byed do// de nas de'i dus sa 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can thams cad dus gcig tu bcul bar mdzong ste/ shAn tu sum ni tha~Md nas/ mgrin gcig tu skyes pa/ 'bangs sum / 'bangs sanan na
5a5(rnying rgyud): myi bgyid na/ mgo rigs snying yang cog pa dang / rdul rgyag 'tsha gnas brlag pa dang / dmyal por srungs nas 'bod pa dgog/ gabyas pas blangs nas 'di skad ces grangs so// 'dus pa ring khor tshogs 'dis ste// phyogs bcu ngas gsus 'khyor rnams dang / gyu
5a6(rnying rgyud): skyo gshin de yab yumang por rnams dang // 'jig rte drug byed 'bod rnams gshed bzhi dang // stong gsum mun par gtigs pa'i bdung po bdud po dang // 'jig rten mes bsregs btson po btsun mo dang // b+hi'i bog gtong bar byed pa'i gang gi 'khor tshogs dang / rjes
5a7(rnying rgyud): ga rmugs su dang ldan gyi mdzod// rdzu khyags drwa babs pa kyi 'jug ga 'a 'a / mngon gdag pa gting kru ba dang / srog gtsang spu thigs pa gnong sbyin 'bod tshogs dang / yams da na dgatang na mo rang thar tshags dang / ga
5b1(rnying rgyud): yang dri za'i rgyal po 'thun sh+tsal sogs dri zi'i shan pa nag pa'i tshogs 'khor ze dang / shan pa nag za 'a tshags gshin rdo'i 'khor sde dang / nA ga d+ha la'i tshogs klu'i 'khor lnga dang / ya kra mgo dgu'i tshogs gnod sbyin 'khor sde la sogs dang / stong gsum thun
5b2(rnying rgyud): sred pa'i tham 'debs la sogs ma mo'i 'khor tshogs dang / ha nu bag sha la sogs bdud sde 'khor sde dang / shu po srog len la sogs partson gyi 'khor sngo dang / dkar po snying 'byin la sogs srog bdag 'khor rnams dang / gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang
5b3(rnying rgyud): rang 'khor na yang nad gtod khram 'debs bsam gyis mi khyab dang / gzhan yang 'dod pa'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams la/ rgyal mo dang yang rgyal mo dang / blon mo dang yang blon mo dang / pra da mo dang ni g.yog mo'i tshogs de dag la sogs 'khor na'ang 'dra ba rnam bzhi
5b4(rnying rgyud): nad bdag mo// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad gtong tshogs// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad bdag tshogs// bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhugs so// be tA lI dang ral gcig gnyis// g.yas nas 'khril te gnyis med bzhugs// g.yon nas mdun gyis bltas te
5b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// gzhan yang gshin rje'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste/ ya ma hA tsa 'chi bdag dmar po dang // kod rtse zag gyon a ba glang mgo dang / ya ba ti dang / mig dmar dmyigs pa tel ba lha mchog dang / chos kyi rgyal por la pa tshar dgu dang / grod dbug la
5b6(rnying rgyud): sogs 'khor dang lhan cigaH/ ekaH ti t+ta lI/ mi srid nag mo mgo 'phyungs dang / brag srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / sa bdag nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / mi bzad nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / btsun mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / phyi mo nag mo mag lu
5b7(rnying rgyud): bdud mo nag mo ma ti/ sa srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / klu srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs dang / lha mo nag mo'i mgo 'phyangs dang / de ltar yum dang thabs cig ste/ yab yum 'khor yang 'di lta ste/ ya ma dA tsa'i 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal
6a1(rnying rgyud): bojigs can gsus po che/ gshin rje dmang po'i 'khor dgun/ srog bdag margyad gsum gnas pa ni/ srog bdag snyed 'byin brtson 'gong dbang po dang / bdud kyi rgyal po stag gu spyan gcig dang / ko brgya brag san
6a2(rnying rgyud): na/ bdud kyi rgyal po sdug thabs gnas/ a baglang mgo'i 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal po/ A bir/ lhogs pa mgo gra'i 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal po gur bdud dang / bdud kyi rgyal po nag po 'dzum med dang / yab ti'i 'khor dag na/ padz+ra
6a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po be'u log nag po dang / bdud kyi rgyal po nag po spyi ring gnas/ gshin rje til pa'i 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal po gling bzhi phung byed dang / gshin de phya sangs 'khor dag na/ bdud kyi rgyal po phye bdud dkar po dang / bdud kyi rgyal po phya 'du
6a4(rnying rgyud): dmar po dang / bdud kyi rgyal po phu bdud ldang nag dang / bdud kyi rgyal po bya bdud sngon po dang / bdud kyi rgyal po phung byed thug pa'i mgo canA dang / bdud kha nI me 'bar dang / bdud mi lag spel mgo dang / bdud rngam chen dung gi rna ba can dang / ral pa
6a5(rnying rgyud): tshar dgu'i 'khor dag na// bse'i skye bu gdug pa can// stag mgo can gyi 'khor dag na// klu bdud srul gyi rgyu ma can// gri bog ging gi pho nya bcu la sogs// ma lus 'dus pa thams cad kyis// bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang // ma dang spyir mo bu mo rnam
6a6(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis ni 'dir 'od na// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis// 'brar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par sus bgyid pa// nor bu'i na chen
6a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba ltar// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyi'o// zhes dmod btsugs nas/ de'i mchis phreng thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas/ las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las// de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos gsang ba'i ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin
6b1(rnying rgyud): nas/ bran dang po nya dbang tu // dang rgyam bu stobs kyi bdag po ya ma lag na rdo rje yang / mdun gyis bltas te bka'anod pa'i bul du bzhugs so// dpal blags thug pa 'gyung las/ gleng gna'i bdun du dra chu 'dang/
6b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs rten kyi rgyal po ldag 'thung ya cuka des/ ga rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs so// de na mo yang de n+dan gsos/ khrag gi la ba migs/ rang gi thalas khrag gi bgyi te/ 'jigs
6b3(rnying rgyud): gi rgyas po de la mchod cing / 'di skad ces glengs so// e ma'o// phyogs bcu ngas gsu rdzogs pa yi// dadrigs byed chen po ral pa'i dra// ye zhes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog/ ye shes zin lus rmad pache// zhes 'arjod do// de nas 'jig
6b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po ya mAn+ta ka des bka' stsal pa/ ye nas mgyes gshin rje nag po'i tshogs// gnyis med ye shes 'dus pa'i gshin rje'i gshed// kurdo rje ye shes dam pa 'dus pa yin// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'khor pa'i nyes rtson thams cad
6b5(rnying rgyud): gcod pa// dus gsum 'dul ba'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di sems lnga ldan par gyis// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po ya ma lhag na rdo rjes 'di skad rjes gsol to// e ma'o 'jigs byed chen po la
6b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor can la gnas phyir dang // 'dul byed gnyis kyi don gyi phyir// sna tshogs brgya phrag pa byed kyi don// dman pa rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje khrag 'jud mi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bkra
6b7(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes pade chen las// klad par ye shes bzhi ru shar// chu zla'i tshul du las rnams 'char// bde ba chen po gsal bar gyis shig/ ces bka' stsal to// 'khor gyi dang pos brus pa/ e mang 'jigs byed chen po lags// ra khyang ye shes pa
7a1(rnying rgyud): d+yaH/ po// chos rnams kun cing ba// shas ca'i yul dru lta 'gyur// delas thabs sgor las rnams dri ltar byung // blad nas grub pa ji ltar 'gyur// zhes nus so// 'gas kyad ldan pas bka' bral ba// srang srid le nas mya ngan das
7a2(rnying rgyud): smro bral mi 'gyur gdod nas dag/ dag pa nyid na thams cad gsal// shes bya shes byed dang gis stong // rbA nA'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gsal// 'di ni yid bzhin rin poH// thams cad re brdzogs byed pa'o// e ma'o togs par dang dka' ba// sangs rgyas kyi
7a3(rnying rgyud): mimakhyen na// gdod nas rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// 'gro kun yongs pa sa cang ches// de nas gas bci bdag po mdzar nga grang nas/ yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// ma rig gnyis sdes bslebs par gyur// rnam
7a4(rnying rgyud): phye/ don byas par// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// ye shes byas la bar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni shin tu zab pa'o// brtag pa thal ba'o// thun mong ma yin par rig par dwa 'o// trA/ ba stan rnams
7a5(rnying rgyud): la zlas par bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'di la ste/ chos thams cad smos pa'i mtshan mthams cad dang bral ba 'di ni/ gtan tshigs gsu gsu ste/ yen sa zug du med pa'i dadam pa'i nga dang / yinas yin pa'i ding bzhin dang / gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po'o/
7a6(rnying rgyud): dawA dzin de ni rnam pacang yang gas papa'o// mtshan nyid thams nang dang brel ba'o// rang bzhin du bying ngo na na/ yid pazhin gyi rno bu ra byung ba// di ni pa brkyen po zhes byaskye/ rtog pa'i yul dang bral ba'o// 'di tu rkyen dang bral bste/
7a7(rnying rgyud): shes so// thams cadasams su mnyam de/ mnam nyid kyi lo shes so// thams cad mi song gi gzug brtan lha dgas pa du/ se mang tshu mi gas so// rlon ma can nyid kyis ma 'dres pa gas te/ sras sa pa'i se mas //
7b1(rnying rgyud): nga ga na nga med pa'o// yangs pa med pa'i don dgas pa par bya'o// nga gis gnas par bya'o// dag bu don de las thams cad 'byung ba smra// / donan bu ni rten sa po'o// sa gzhazhan po la bu'o// g+hung bAH/ 'o// drang 'brang sa zu'o//
7b2(rnying rgyud): btson chen 'khong lo lta bu'o// ral gri wA Ta'o// sman sdong dang / zlu ma pa lta bu'o// dbang phyug chen po lta bu'o// 'di ni 'byor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi byed pa por rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs so// 'di ni mchog yin to/ blta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i byes
7b3(rnying rgyud): bru'am// rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzung ba yin to/ 'di ni lus kyi rim pa brgya zag bskud// rtsa ba gnyis skya 'dus pa'i dzin// sbyor banyis brgya stong bcu drug/ dka' pa med par len par gsungs// the tshom med par sems kyis su// de las 'di la nan dzA/
7b4(rnying rgyud): bya// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor 'dus pa rnams cad the tshom dang bral nas/ yid zlos thag rtsod de chos nyid glos sems sa// de nas mdangs phyung ste/ e ma'o// 'khor banyid na mya ngan 'dras// sku med 'bras bu dag pa'i don// srid pa mya ngan /
7b5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa// bdag cag grol bar der gyur to// zhes gsol nas dad pas 'dun to// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal zla gsang nag po me lce phreng pa'i gyad las/ gleng bslang ba dang / gsal byed lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang 'jigs
7b6(rnying rgyud): byed kyi rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis phrin las sna tshogs rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na mthu stobs kyi bdag po ya ma lag na rdo rje la sogs te/ gdug pa can gyi 'khor tshogs rnams kyis mos pa'i dbang gi sa mgrin gcig tu
7b7(rnying rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o 'jigs byed chen po lags// bdag cag 'khor tshogs ma lus kun// snang srid 'jig rten khams 'di ru// stong gsum mun par gter dang 'jig rten mes
8a1(rnying rgyud): bsreg dang / 'jig rten lo tog 'joms pa dang / gan ma lhags kyi yang 'bengs par byed// sgyong pog yams nad gtong dang sog gcod gang yang byed// mdzu mas me bzad gtong ba'i nad bdag sna tshogs mang pyo dag/ dpa' bo cha
8a2(rnying rgyud): dakhor du 'dus pa kun// ye shes chen po khyod kyis bsal bar mdzad// ye shes chen po'i smon mas gsal bar mdzad par byos// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung bar dam bcas pas// bdag dga' bo rdzogs rna ma
8a3(rnying rgyud): srog tig rtsa ba'i dam pa 'di// 'jigs byed chen po bzhes su gsol// dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol// zhes zhus shing glengs so// de nas sde brgyad so sorang rang gi srog gi snying po phul te/ 'jigs byed chen pos bdag nyid kyi dkyi la 'khod chen po
8a4(rnying rgyud): rngams pa'i mdangs kyis seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bzhugs so// de la dang por las kyi gshed bzhis/ klu ma nor brtsa ba'i sngags phul te// swa~M b+hU yA yA sa ma ste/ zhes pa'o// ma ma rig mo tig shaM pra zlal mun dza/ steng 'dag ma ngag mi dag mo// sra
8a5(rnying rgyud): kram nga ba lA ma tin dz+ha b+h+yo sa ma ya/ yam d+han dz+wa lA da~M/ hU~M kro hI shA dz+wa la raM/ yat+ma tra gar Sh+TA dz+wa l-i hUM/ rwa dag mo gro d+hi bad+hidz+dza hrInA~M/ I ki sha dz+wA la~M pA ya hUM/ shA ta makro N+Di sha la br-id+d+ha/ d+hi ga po d+hal ra d+ha// rol dpa tra/
8a6(rnying rgyud): rA/ yASh+Tam rnying tsA 'i na hU~M/ sngon d+ha ru tsid+d+hi shA d+hi ldan \u0f7f/ oM krini pa ba yan+ti/ oMH mo gag pa N+Dig / oM mar+g+ha shrI drug po rngadrug po dz+ra ga ni la hU~M/ oM nag mo na / sh-i rje ma rda gyung par ba yang+ge/
8a7(rnying rgyud): dri'i'i ba / phyogs myong ga shen thams kyis phrul lo// dardzas pasu drag blang drug cid por bdun tu bcwaH/ sam ya ma 'i bu c-ig gatshal pa yan \u0f7f/ ma y-i sadrug dzin/ oM baM shi ladra na man shig lal hUM/ mdzo shagadung ga
8b1(rnying rgyud): ma ma yaM za 'gra mdza/ hi yo ge sha la nga / ma ma rnying kha dag/ snying kha rag/ ma marak+Sha/ ma mdakra/ rag mo thun thun snying lathun da d+ha/ sgying la thun dzad/ snying la dang / ru lu ru lung / rAHsa ma ya dza chu dar li pri ma ri he phaT/ phaT swA hA/ tri tri ra tsatsa
8b2(rnying rgyud): AHshug me swA hA/ ba hu yak+Sha bu ro tsa tod rA hu la ma tri ga ba dzi la ma khug yak+ka thad zang ma ya swA hA/ nA ga rA tsa ma hA kA la to ba tsas kha pa kha sha ru hUM ya hUM ngo dza/ nA ga rA tsa dza dza/ oM ma hA sa ma ya dza dza/ oM dang k+ka ma snying kha rag dza dza/ oM da ka mo dka mo rakle snying kha ra ga rdo dza/
8b3(rnying rgyud): oM ga mor k+ka dza dza/ de dag la sogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams nad dbang bsgyur sde brgyad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min nam mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang // sha za 'byung po grul bum dang // srul po dang ni lus
8b4(rnying rgyud): sul po// skem byed dang ni brjed byed dang // skyo byed dang ni grib gnon dang // gnon po dang ni nam gu dang // de dag la sogs te srag gcod bdud dang / rus 'cha' srin po dang / rmugs pa rlu dang / skyo 'bog rgyal po dang / khrag 'thung ma mo'i tshogs dang /
8b5(rnying rgyud): gzer thabs btsan gyi tshogs dang / srog gcod ging gi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bka' nyan zer zhing srog snying phul lo// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po gshed po des/ zhal 'bar ba'i tshul gyis ye shes rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de
8b6(rnying rgyud): nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to// khrag 'byung chen po 'jigs pa'i sku// dam pa rnams la phan bya'i phyir// zhing bcu sreg pa'i nyi ma'i tshul// dug gsum gcod pa'i 'khor lo 'di// 'jigs byed
8b7(rnying rgyud): chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// 'jigs byed chen ngos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dus pa'i tshogs// 'jam dpal thugs kyi snying po 'di// stong pa'i ye shes dbus nyid dngos// gsal ba'i ye shes bzhi ldan te// khams
9a1(rnying rgyud): gang zug nas s+ho// gzusan dang 'an na na nga na na 'grubabs// na na// du zhu sa gangs// dusags sanapa shA dag bad+ha na/ byu ba/
9a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'phrul meg 'di// brgyad ldangs brtuzla pa gsu cig cing // rnying po ldan pas mngon min pa// ngang gis 'jam la cu che zhing / khams gsum rmi la ma ltar shes pa// bdun pa gyi yi rje srid cad// bla med bdud d+hi rjes btub dra'i// do na chog rgyal ma
9a3(rnying rgyud): pa// deng dre'i bu lam gtogs pa// kha blo med tsam brjod pa med// ces bka' stsal to// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal ba/ nag po gshed kyi gnas rnams ni// zur brkyang mu krud chun 'khor can// ngam ri'i brag dang srin pag rdo rje 'dra// dbu 'dus byed
9a4(rnying rgyud): mdo gling// shin tu dben pa'i drar khrod dam// de sogs bde ba'i gnas btsal te// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// gnas dpa'akhor lo brtsam par bya// sa chog mchoms bcad pa sdig sbyangs la// rtag chag thig gdab 'og ma yi// dak+Shil 'khor mashing nag
9a5(rnying rgyud): la// DA ga ma gsum dang ldan par bri// thod phreng dang ni me ri 'bar// zhes bka' stsal to// yang nam mnyam thig bzhi rgya tham gdag/ leng co dgu ldan mu khud 'khor lo bskor// sre drang 'gram bzhi ldan pa la// 'khor la rlabs ni bzungag rdzun/
9a6(rnying rgyud): bar khyams sgo skar bcas// bar byams drar khrod bzhi dang than// phyi ma yi dgas gzugs brnyan dgod// gzhan gyi 'dod pas de yang bstan// zhes bkri'i skul to// gcod bsngags kyi 'khor lon// dbus na bu gsum skyibs bzhi la// 'khrul sngags sa
9a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// kyai ma bcu gnyis 'khor lol// 'bru mig drag po bcu gnyis pa// de dag rjes su dag na bye// phyi ma bcu drug 'khor lo la// srag sung thugs kyi snying po ste// dgod pa gnam thus lto srur dgod// yang logs 'khor lo rnabs bzhil// kya cing can
9b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i drag sngags dgod// 'khor lo rtsing ma chen sum cu drug/ sngags ni me dpal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo me dpal mtshon chen gyis// zhing bcu ma lus gtan nas bsreg/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas der lha dgod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jigs byed chen pos bka'
9b2(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'jigs byed rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed// sku yi gzugs brnyan bzhugs su gsol// g.yas su sgeg mor la gcig ma// g.yon du za byed be ta lI// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi zla ga ma la// sku yi gzugs bstan bzhugs su gsol// yang na snying po che
9b3(rnying rgyud): byang gi phyogs kyi blag ma steng // snying po 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa ye// skur bsgom mchog phur sor gsum gzug/ ces bka' stsal to// yang gsang ba mos pa'i dbang gis dgod pa ni/ mthar mdzod yab yum dbus su dgod// srog gi gshed po yas yum bzhi/
9b4(rnying rgyud): mu khyud dang por dgod par bya// gnyis la phyogs bcu'i yab yu ma ste// bar chod gshed kyi bdud rnams kyang // gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bya// sgo yi 'khor lhod snyam ma dgod// de ni gnas kyi 'khor lo las// brten pa'i lha yi 'khor lo bstan// ye she
9b5(rnying rgyud): byin brlab stobs ldan gyi// rjes su mthun pa'i cho gar ldan// skad cig sngags dang pob la gsal// de ni gnas gzhi'i 'khor lo'o// zhes gsungs so// de la chen gyi yan lag bzhi// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas su// rten rdzas gnyis dang mdun rdzas dang /
9b6(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas lirge'i rdza sa la sogs// brnag pa drun gyi rjes rnams bsod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'khor gyi dang pos 'di skan ces zhus so// 'khor lo mtshon chen 'bar ba yi// rgya dang rkyen gyi tshon dang ni// srad du'ang gnas gang lags pa// dpa' bo chen pos bshad
9b7(rnying rgyud): du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bkanga' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// dur khrod gnas su dpa' bo yis// ka li ka pa ma gtogs pa// gos su bcad pa'i rgyu blangs la// thod pas snying po bcud sdud bya// de la gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// dur khrod gos la mas
10a1(rnying rgyud): chen gyi// sleb sdams thar babya// ni rang su ma thul ba yis// tha mang bya nga tub cadang // mchog zan nang gis par byas la// bam can don gyi khrag rnams kyis// rjes su mthun pa'i 'asar 'a// des gsungs sa// bas chen sha ga 'o ba// thag pas srad tha legs byas te
10a2(rnying rgyud): snyoms pas tshad ldan cig gdab bya// ni rang su dang mAng sar spyad// tsho na gsum la dog byed par 'gyur// dus padu bas bsdus pa ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshen dubya// 'dres pa'i tshon nir k+ta'o// ye shes byin drabs ldan pa'i phyir// nges par dang du blang bar bya// zhes gas sa ma// de nas yang gsungs pa/
10a3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i na 'i 'byor pas// me bar sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// 'jigs byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'bang ba drug gi dum bu bsas// me 'bang nag po'i 'bral bsdu// sna tshogs drug gi khu ba yis// 'khor lo rnams la deng byud bya// myos pa'i rdzas de bzhin no// zhes gams so// 2
10a4(rnying rgyud): yul pa/ de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// khraba'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed// snying po sngags kyis yab yum bskyed// rang bzhin gnas nas/ nga d+ha nas// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// mchod cing stod pa bu ladas ni// ji ltar dad pa'i then las bcol// ti thag med/
10a5(rnying rgyud): drug tu // 'ad pa'i ba bsnyen pa bya// the ngas dgongs la gtar ma gtang // rjes gsungs sa// ga grogs pa bltas bdun druni// gya gsum nu ma ltung bstan la// thab pa dang byen phyung du bshad// thod pa bcug ste sngags kyis thab// the tshom med par las nams ba/
10a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// de ltar dkyil 'khor pa shams nas ni// sngags pas chas gos nag pagon// khro bo'i sngags kyis ma tshams bcad do// g+ha mi phyogs sa la bltas nas// tang da na rnam gsum rim gyis bdam// zhag
10a7(rnying rgyud): 'ab rib bzhid 'byed// spun drang mchod pa la sogs bya// gtong ma btang la dkyil 'khor bsdu// zhes gsungasas// rgyud kyi cul bzlugs nag po las/ gnas gzhi 'thong mo dang / drag pag da byer bar lo mdo sten pa 'di ste gi srim gi// / danas 'dag byed ci rtul ba dan
10b1(rnying rgyud): rdo ga shed po das/ 'bar ba 'od zar gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dang po la bos nas/ 'dres de ces bka' sa pa to// nyon cig zung zhig rnga rje 'dzin// 'dus pa'i 'phar chagasung la nyon// 'ad par 'gro ba'i gas sngags 'dre// 'ad mong ma yin
10b2(rnying rgyud): dmang sngags te// bkur bskyed pas nag po'o// gnyis gathub pas tshad mar ba shad// phreng ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa ni// 'di dag nyid de rim pa las// 'di dang rtse ni bka' stsal to// gnyis 'dzin thun mong mchog yin te// kha gnor phreng ba dos pakas
10b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'di dag ste/ oM mtho ti kA yam na tanas brnyan / sa / kAny+dzal ba ban / / rtenan / pan+d+ha / oMs ma yim laHte// yum
10b4(rnying rgyud): pa brnyag mi seMSh+T+ra gal sun tu da / mam klo gas// san dag ma tan 'a / ts+tsha// / ya dngas de ma ma ma med ma sa/ /
10b5(rnying rgyud): yu~M ga ka maM/ ya btsid+hA p+ta/ karba si d+ha hAM/ badz+ra me bang / oM.AHd+h+waM bar+thasaH/ oM yA s+yA ma myas mA ya dz+nyeH/ mngonatsanam mthos ka steng dag ma ma N+Da&// oM ya ma si mA ya/ man+ta Nis dkri ma/ i dmas pad ma ya
10b6(rnying rgyud): maud rlom pa ma dang / i ma yas rnangs/ oM ma la ma snarnam no// oM ya ma ngo Na yod ya/ oM mngo ta yod ya/ oMd d+haHyad yan+te/ oMd+had+ha yod ya ma / aHyod ya mdon/ oM yod ya me draH/ oMd la mdas po// yang yo nar yang / a
10b7(rnying rgyud): ni mak+She ya/ oM yo nar ya k+She yang/ i ni ya k+She yad ya~M/ yod yak+She yang yon/ oM ya k+She yad yo nir/ oM ya k+She yang yon / aMr+tha yad yo ni ya/ oM ya k+She ya dz+nyA ne dA ma ya/ oM k+Sha ya tsun rna mar ya/ oM ya r+yA dA ma ya She/ oM d+hi ma la ShA
11a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ na / / ma// nan/ ma pa dang na san/ mas yo pa dzug/
11a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa sa/
11a3(rnying rgyud): tshad ma'i ye shes mchog/ kun gyi bdag por gyud pas kha gnon to// thams cad dbang du bsdus pas thun song bsnyen pa'i mchog/ sma dbyangs 'byor pas rab rkyen na// sna rdzogs don can 'grub par ngo chos med// gtsu ba dang dgrag dang brjed pa 'is// do
11a4(rnying rgyud): brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rdzas 'di skad ces gsol to// gong du gsungs pa'i don de mchog/ mtshon chen 'khor lo lta bu'ang// yid bzhin bum pa bdud rtsi lha Ta tra// 'jigs byed chen pos bka byab hU~M// 'das
11a5(rnying rgyud): gsol// zhes zhus so// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// sngags kyi phreng ba'i 'od zer ni// thams cad gcod pa 'khor lo yin// cir yang zab pas yid bzhin mdod// 'tsho bar byed pas bdud rtsi de// swa
11a6(rnying rgyud): bshad kyis 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyan par byos// zhes dka' stsal to// dam ring srin phrag khrag gi mchi ris can// skye bo med pa'i nags tshul du// bar chad rnam gsum bral ba'i rdzas bsagasal// seng ge lta bu'i 'du shes kyis// gcig pur gnas te gnas
11a7(rnying rgyud): byung phreng ba khru'o// yam rdzas dam yang tha tho ma su ga pram ya hU Ta/ man ngas dmodo la ma sug bram la sbyin Te/ rnyings ma yam ma phrag tham sa hU~M na/ ngas dmes ma 'a tsug phram ra hU~M \u0f7f/ sadam la ma drangs mug pram pahU~M / dem
11b1(rnying rgyud): da ma la mas ca N+Dal/ yod pa dam chug nga rdzam/ pa da dzang tha
11b2(rnying rgyud): ma sa d+has/ mal sad/ maN+Dag ma pa N+Das/ yam yong ma tsug mu ma Sh+TAH/ rmad du mad yam chug zu \u0f7f ya
11b3(rnying rgyud): ni dam rtse yang yo a
11b4(rnying rgyud): da
11b5(rnying rgyud): ye Sh+Tha lanan skyes rbA k-i hU~M gas/ k+She ba rkyen ma pa mdzan ra / ts+tshe pa la
11b6(rnying rgyud): d+hU / pyA ya y-in sam+b+ha / Sh+T+rI / yang yini ma sun / k+She yang yod la mi /
11b7(rnying rgyud): pa shrI ya ma the ma hU~M / ya mi rdo sa dag za la / ma
11b8(rnying rgyud): kaid+hA rA ya hU~M / rjo la la ga na la rje \u0f7f/ nings pa las ma ga rbar madz+nyA phaT/ rAm la N+Da yeHnI a rba kA mA ra ya /
11b9(rnying rgyud): ya)yi ma dzA kaM zam po 9/ lte ba ma na rnams kyig zal pa/ ye
11b10(rnying rgyud): ma yad+h+waM hoH/ d+hA yak+Shi ya ma ma // ni seM k+She la mam rba pa d+d+ha5\u0f7f/ b+hUM yaSh+Taya ma dA ni ma / ma la Sh+Ta5
11b11(rnying rgyud): ga 9/ dayodas / dam pa sa na ra/ da pa
11b12(rnying rgyud): rak+ta tsar ya hU~M phaT/ k+She yang ni yod ya a mra kaM k+ta ya hU~M phaT/ yang ni yod yak+She ma mu ki d+ha tsa ya hU~M phaT/
11b13(rnying rgyud): ga yu
12a1(rnying rgyud): dag dungs su gsung ma rjem/ mdas nganas gnams rnaMs/ mnas d+ham la ma ju ga n+Da mdzuT/ dam rnamasams thag sa ya dzArAH/ sang dA ma ya ma ma thug sar pa d+hA hA/ nga rnam sa ma das ar+than
12a2(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaT/ rA pa ya me dos dzo rA a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ma ya me dos dzo rA a mu kaM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ phyi nang dgra yang gsum gyi don// ye shes 'od zer 'bugs pa'i mchog/ e ma'o// ya ma rarA dzes do me ya a mu ka~M pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya med ni tsA ra k+She ya a ru ka pra ma ya hU~M pha /
12a3(rnying rgyud): ya po don tri yod ya a mu kr-i mu tsal hU~M phaH/ ya ma dos dzo m+b+ha ya swA na pu tsa ya hUM phaH/ yid yon da ya d+hA la a mu kaM ya hU~M phaT/ yang oMr+Na d+ho m+bu ya a r+tha kid/ tsar la d+hA \u0f7fTa/ yar+the yA dz+yo ni rA ma ya mA mr-i ki mA da la d+b+ha baH/ yaT+Te sa ni mod ya a
12a4(rnying rgyud): mA da ya hUM phaT/ sngags kyi 'od zer phyi nang gsum/ gsang ba oM la don dang mtshungs// bstan pas pa la ma ka zhes bya// ya ma me da rA dzas do du Na yo ni da ya ts+tshe ni/ a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM phaT/ ya med k+She ma do Ta Na yo ni a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ni hU~M phaT/ yang
12a5(rnying rgyud): tshi ma me yai na ra ya ts+tshe ni rA dza sa do ru Na a mu kaM mud tsa ya hUM phaT/ yak+She ma me da ya dz+ha ne rA dza saM do ru Na yo ni ra a pu kaM mA ra la k+She phaT/ ya ma tI da mer ni dz+ha yar ni yo Na du dos do a mu ki pra ma ya hUM phaT/ ya r+thed me ma ya dA ni yo Na ru do sa dzan rdits+tsha/ a mu ki da k+Sha dza hUM phaT/
12a6(rnying rgyud): da me ma k+She yo Na ru do sa dza rA ni dz+yA ya ra ni a mu ka mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ya me mak+She da to sa dza rA ni r+g+ha ya ni yo Na ru a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ me lce phreng ba'i dal gri yis/ rgyu gcig shes pa ka si par// rgyud gnyis shes par the tshom med// pra bi sha zhes gsungs so// ya ma?
12a7(rnying rgyud): TI ya a mu kaM pra ma ya u tsa Ta ya hUM phaT/ ya me dak+She ma ya a mu kaM mur tsa ya u tsa Ta ya hUM phaT/ ya dak+She ma me ya a mu ki rak+ta tsa ra ya u tsaT ya hUM phaT/ yak+She ma me da ya a mu kaM mA ra ya u tsa Ta ya hUM phaT/ ya ma k+She ta me ya a mu kaM pra ma ya u tsa Ta yadz+dza
12b1(rnying rgyud): yan+na ta ma ma ya ma mrag sar yA sa Ta ya tAphaT/ ya tA ma maN+Da yA ya rba ra la sranaT ya dz+nyAphaH/ yAk+Sha ma mad ya a mra ka m+bAr ya sa ma ya d+hA Ta/ gshad ba 'i thugs kyi blang ba las// phyag nardorje dang sa skrag na// srog chags ga nan/
12b2(rnying rgyud): skem ci dgos// zhes bka' stsal to// ma ho// mag+ho te ka ya mAn+ta ka a mu ka~M pr-i ma ya dz+nyA phaT+Ta/ ya ma rang a mu ki tri ma ya b+he baH/ sad me ya ma ru kaM pra maM la hUM phaH/ ya med kyim mu ka~M pra ma ya phaT/ NA yod ya a mu ke grA ma ya d+h+r-i TA/ ya
12b3(rnying rgyud): yo na a mu ki pra ma ya hUM phaT/ ra yak+Shi ya a mu kaM pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya dz+dza a mu kaM pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ni rA ma ya a mu ki pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ya me do ru a ru kaM mur tse ya hU~M phaT/ Na yo da ya a mu ka~M pur tsa ya
12b4(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ yang ya ni a mr-i ki rbe tsem hr-I \u0f7f/ ra yA r+the ya ma srog tsa mdzu sa/ ya~Mk+ShA ya gyim ga mu tsa yadz+nyA phaT/ ni nam la ma rdzog tsa hU~MH/ yim du sbom mu ke sur tsa ma d+hubaT/ sadom ya ma hu~MkaM mu la sa/ mamo kA la martags
12b5(rnying rgyud): kaM rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ ya da yo ni a mu kai ra ka kro hUM phaT/ ra yak+She ya a mu kaM / tsa hUM phaT/ yak+She yar+N+Na a mu gau rak+Shatsa hU~M phaT/ ni rA ma ya a mu ki rak+ta tsA ra hUM phaT/ ya ma rA a mu kaM rak+ta tsar trUM phaT/ sa do me ya a mu kaM rata/ tsa hU~M phaT/ ya me doru a mra
12b6(rnying rgyud): tsad hU~M phaT/ NA yod ya a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka a mu ka~M mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ yad+de yadz+dza a mu ki mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ni rA ma ya a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya ma rA do a mu ka~M mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sado ma ya a mu ka~M mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya mod ru
12b7(rnying rgyud): a ru kau mA ra ya hUM phaT/ Na yod ya a mu ki mA ra ya hUM phaT/ yad yo ni a mu kaM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ra ya NA~M ya a mu ki mA ra ya hUM phaT/ a kro ta ka ya mAn+ta ka dgra bo a mu ka~M pra mA ra ya hUM phaH/ ya ma rA ni a pra ki pra ma ya hUM phaT/ tsaM yas+t+rai ya a mu ka~M
13a1(rnying rgyud): ya d+hi phaT/ yak+ShA yang a mra ka pra ma ya dz+nyAsaT/ na yod ya a muka rba ma ya d+hAH/ yad ya ma su kaM mA ma ya dz+nyA thAH/ dza ma ya ma muka thAm pa hU~MsaH/ ya ma sa ma mrag zam la ng+ge phaH/ darA ma ya sa rbaka dra ma
13a2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ yak+She ya ra a mu kaM mu ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ ni yod yA a mu ki mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ya ta yoN a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ ru do me ya a mu kaM pur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ya me do sa a mu kaM mur tsa ya hrI phaT/ dza rA ma
13a3(rnying rgyud): ya a mu kaM mur ts+tsha ya hUM phaT/ ya mar ni a mu ki mur tsa~M ya hU phaT/ dzA yak+She ya a mu kaM mu tsa ya hUM phaT/ oM a kro te kA ya mAn+ta ka a mu kirak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ yad yo Na a mu kaM rak+ta tsa hU~M phaT/ ru do me ya a mr-i kaM rak+ta tsar hUM phaT/ ya me dos a mu ni da co hUM phar
13a4(rnying rgyud): dza rA ma ya a mu ki rak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra na a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ tsa yak+She ya a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ yak+She ya ra~M a mu ki rak+ta tsid hUM phaT/ ni yo da ya a mu kai rak+ta tser hU~M phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya nA T+Ta ka a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya me da~M sa a mu )
13a5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ dza rA ma ya a mu ki mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya ma rA ni a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ts+tshe yak+She ya a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ yak+She ya ra a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ni yo da a a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya da yo Na a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ru do me ya a mu tsa~M yA pa
13a6(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ de ni sngags kyi rgyal po'i thog/ phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyang rmongs par nus// dug gsum 'khrul pa'i sems la smos ci dgos// zhes bka' stsal to// ya ma tak+She me ya to// yo ra na tsa sa ra tsa ni tsa dus ma ya a mu kaM pre ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya me k+She ma ha ra yo ya
13a7(rnying rgyud): to// ra na ni tse du tsas ma ya a mu ki mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ya ta ma me k+She to ya ra yo ni na tsa tu sa ma ya a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra hUM phaT/ yak+She me ta ma yo ra ya to ya yo ra ni tsi na na sA rA ts+tshe d+ha/ sa mA yA/ a mu ka mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma ta me k+She to ya yor nan/ tsar si dzu
13a8(rnying rgyud): 'di nas phaT pha Tab dang pyad dgo
13b1(rnying rgyud): a mu kaM pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya k+She me ba ta ya ta ya sa tsa rba ni/ naH ni sa ma ya dgra bo a mra ka mud \u0f7f ya hU~M phaT/ ya twa mak+She me ya dor yon/ sA tsan \u0f7f ni sa ra tsang / sa ma yang pra ba a mu ka rak+sha dzar hU~M phaT/ ya ma k+She ta ma yang ya tongs rba ru na sa ma ya dgra bo a mu ki TA
13b2(rnying rgyud): ra ya hUM phaT phaT/ oMSh+T+r-i Sh+T+r-iHni kr-itA na na hUM phaT/ thugs kyi snying po hrIHni sdud pa'i mchog/ d+hIHni mi ldeg mchog yin te// kun gyi nang dung yis rab tu bsngags// bsdus shing mi ldog pa ni ka li ste// 'begs shing gcod pas 'khor lo yin// zhes bka
13b3(rnying rgyud): to// ye shes rang 'bar gsal zhing las kyi mthu yis bslab// drag po rgodang rnga gyur pa'i drag sngags bdun// btu zhing sdebs pas las kun byed// bkug cing spu gri btags te bstan pa yis// gang la'ang thogs drug med pa thog dang mtshungs// rno ba'i mchod
13b4(rnying rgyud): gyur pas spu waM'o// drag po'i gtso bor gyur pas las kyi rgyal por bshad// 'di ni nga yi dus su rab tu dgyes par bshad// gso dang bsad dang 'pham dang rgyal// dgug dang gtad dang bcing dang dgrol// dbab dang gcod dang bsrung dang bsgril//
13b5(rnying rgyud): ngan chen 'byin par byed// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan ltar byed cing // d+harma yun du gnas par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags rgod 'jig rten rlag byed kyi bedz+ra ste bzhi pa'o// /
13b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed khrag 'thung gi rgyal po gshed po des/ gsal byed 'dra ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes rdo rje gsor ba'i lag na rdo rje khyod// mi 'gyur las su grub pa yin// dag
13b7(rnying rgyud): tshad dang lhag pa med pa'i don// bdag gzhan don sdig du ma byed// dam par bshad par ngas bya yis// ma lus 'dus pas mnyan par byos// tshad ma sngags kyi rim pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bste// don deji ltar gsal byan// sma ni 'jug pa'i rgyu
14a1(rnying rgyud): yan te// dbyangasadu myong bar can yin// / nye bar bstan pa 'ad te// ye shes pa bdag nyid te// yang/ rdzogs pa'i sdug gnag/ de dag byung ba dang bganas/ dngag sa ya dang shAg// rna ya na ga
14a2(rnying rgyud): pas 'og nas sbas// dbyangs kyi bcug sum pa yis skyed nas brgyan// swa li bzhi pa'i dang bo gnag/ dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa yis stong nas btsun// de rjes sgra yi dang po gzhag/ de 'og sgra yi drug po'i dang po'o// de rjes t+pa ye Sh+yas drim gzhag/
14a3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// de rjes A li bzhi pa'i wa ba la// sra yi bzhi pa'i dang pos 'og tu smras// de 'og sgra yi po ste// po ga sla pa bdun pa'i bzhi ste// de rjes pra yaM bzhi pa'i tha mA re// \u0f88\u0f90 yis pa'i tha mar// yi
14a4(rnying rgyud): 'i mig nas// ga mig pa'i na/ zhi gas
14a5(rnying rgyud): gsum po'i dang pos nye bar brtan// de ni mu yi 'khor ba'i brgyad// thang spobs kyi tshad pa'o// gzhan yang thugs kyi sbyor ba'i phreng ba ni// bdud 'joms bden par dbar gzhag// drag pa'i gsum pa klong nas de// ya?Sh+ma'i tham mdo la gzhag/
14a6(rnying rgyud): d+hA sbyar // dbyangs kyi bzhipa tshiganas bkrang// rin po tshom tha yis gcung / de gsu 'i gnyis pal// gsum pa'i dang pa sung byas te// de 'jug pa'i gnyis pa brgyad// dbyangs kyi babyed pas ster nas brgyan// rin po rmi las yis gcod//
14a7(rnying rgyud): na rog lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs ci gsum pas sted nas brgyan// de dzig sa mi dang ba'o// drug pa'i gnyes pas gnas brgyan// dbyings kyi bskyed pas steng nas brgyan// sgra yig 'an pa'i dang pe bsten// de la dbyangs lag gnas par
14b1(rnying rgyud): gapa bya gyu gan/ dran pa sa tu bya // dang thas la mang bgrangs// dub gaganag ga sa// 'di su nga da // dang dram na na nga / kunan ya ga tu gzung can/ slo pa rgya
14b2(rnying rgyud): brjod pa nyid// 'khor lo gsung mchog phreng ba ste// de ni nga yi bshad pa 'dre// 'brung sku yi bshad pa bzhin// rdo rjes sA yi dang po te// drug pa'i them nye bar brten// de rjes lngang gsus pa dang // sgra yi dang po gsum spyor// pA yi drug pa'i gsum pa
14b3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas brgyan// sgra yi lAM pa'i dang po gzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i tha ma la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de rjes bdu pa'i snying po gas ma// spyod pa'i yi ge dag po gsum// gsung gi yi ge'i zeng ba'o// snga gsu
14b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'di// bdud kyi 'khor lo'i thig le'o// de ni dngos gzhi'i gcig pa'o// yon tan sdud cing dpa' bo 'joms// b+ha baM rnams kyis sngon du 'pho ba'o// thun mong bsten pa bsnyen pa'i mchog yin no// rtags dang mtshan mde ldan kyang // zhes ga
14b5(rnying rgyud): de nas nye bar bsnyen pa bstan pa'i phyed/ 'di skad ces 'khor rnams la gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// 'dus pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa nyod// nye bar bsnyen pa'i bzlas pa'i tshul// lce yi ldan pas sdog cing 'grel// #
14b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang pos bskul zhing dbang // dmigs pa'i don kun phyag rgyar rdzogs// yon tan kun 'dus de yis baphred// ces gsungs so// de nyid brjod pa 'di yin no// yon tan lnga ldan snying po gzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po gzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i tha mas/
14b7(rnying rgyud): de rjes drug pa'i gnyis pa la// de la dbyangs gyi gnyis pa'o// de 'og gnyis pa'i gsum bganag/ de nas bdun pa'i gsal bste// de 'og bzhi pa'i gsum pa gzhag/ btsugs ma pa yis steng rnaMs brgyan// de 'og sde ba'i thamag dang // bcwag cig pa
15a1(rnying rgyud): steng nas bcad// dI ga rdzan pa' dang pag rA// de nas bsdu ba 'phag ste// 'phan pa'i yi ge rjes ma'o// de nas gnyis pa'i grang ba bstan pa na// skra ya drag pa'i dang por gzhag/ de rjes ma tha //
15a2(rnying rgyud): pa yis steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i gsum pa yin// bcu gsam pa yis snyed nas brgyad// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og nas sbas// de la gsum pa'i tha mag dang // drug pa'i dang po de yo// brgyag dum
15a3(rnying rgyud): steng nas so// de la bzhi pa'i gsum po gzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po'o// pad dang 'phen pa gong gis shes// de ni gsum pa'i phreng ba ni// rdzogs rjes grub pa'i dang po'o// de nas bzhi pa'i gsum pa gzhag/ de nas jug pa'i dang po la// bcu gsum
15a4(rnying rgyud): yis steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i tha ma la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas btsun// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ de nas drug pa'i dang po ste// de rjes sgra yi dang por gzhag/ bdun pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas bstan// 'dug
15a5(rnying rgyud): pa yis steng nas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i dang po gzhag/ bsdu ba'i phreng bgong dang mthun// 'phrum kyi phreng ba'i bzhi pa ni// sgra yi drug pa'i dang po ste// de rjes sla yi dang po gzhag/ bdun pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas brten// bcu gcig pa yi
15a6(rnying rgyud): nas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i dang por gzhag/ de rjes gnyis pa'i dang po'o// gnyis pa'i gnyis pas 'og nas brten// de 'og bzhi pa'i tha mar gzhag/ dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pa gzhag/ de rjes lnga pa'i
15a7(rnying rgyud): tha mar gzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po'o// de nas bsdus pa'i yi ge dang / ka'i smod pa'i yi ge ni// gong du bstan pa bzhin du shes// zhes gsungs so// de nas yon tan don bstan pas// sngags kyi phreng ba sum cu gnyis// sdad dang dkrug dang brjeg
15b1(rnying rgyud): 'dra nas da bar dpyad dgo
15b2(rnying rgyud): dang bstan// skabs dang ska/ gang ban pa su ba// las bstong bas myur bshad// su drug nyis can byadang// rtsub yan tanam dun// snang bar dgyur pa rnams ca dus// srang mo/ khramag pa med// ag+sa pa'o//
15b3(rnying rgyud): mu gsum gyis dgag pa yang // de bzhin po sa bzhag tu gyur// de la gtod sbyin mdza gnyis kyis daH// thog pa ba pa'i snying n+do// de lan mr-i na gsum pa s+ho// ringam lnga pa'i sa gan// rdeg pa'i dang po hUM ba te// de'o das
15b4(rnying rgyud): dngam jug pa'i dang po sbyin// deng kyang drug pa dang shrI s+t+wa~M// de 'og lnga pa rnam sbyid// de rjes gnyis pa'i dngo bra la// dbyang sa steg sum sa sbyid rnas btsun// de don bzhi pa'i dang po// de rjes pa pa'i gsum pa ste// gnyis pa'i gsum pa nyer du
15b5(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyi lbub sa 'ag nas bcan// de rjes bdun pa'i gnyis pasti// de dog gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis// de gnyis te bar bstan ni// mtshon gyig sum gyis dbugs pa'i/ hU~M dang barba dang sA rnams// skabs kyi yang dag las su bshad/
15b6(rnying rgyud): mchog gi dngas klu 'byung // dpag pa kun gyi rjems \u0f7f/ gsungs sa// de nas yang gsang pa'i bdag pa la kAn rdo rjes 'di skang rgyas gsopa ste/ ba 'dzin la lam 'tshan// rin chen mi dang 'dri nga yi// ban bdun sngags kyi thang y-i// 'tshar
15b7(rnying rgyud): wA me// swA mI'i mtshon rten pa shad dug so// zhes ngas pa// de nas yang 'jigs byed rkyen pos gsungs pa/ skyon cig dru ga rdo rje 'angan// 'jas pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa nyon// thams cad bskyed pas ba ste// thams cad sangs pas rtsabs/
15b8(rnying rgyud): na 'dus pa ma sa man// mi byedagamad pa'i blatho // lam ma // / man/ na ju// brim sa/ dreg gdun/ ra la// ma la \u0f7f/ gsungs pas/ 'jig rten drugag
16a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ 'ad rab tu 'dang / kun tu rab tu 'dar bar gyur to// 'khor rnams kyi las kyi rim pa mtha' dang bcas pa nyid dus napar gyur to// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsal to// sangs rgya
16a2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid can// 'jigs byed chen po dgongs su gsol// gdul bya smin par mdzad slad du// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// rtsa ba'i phreng ba bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhig
16a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la sems thud cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid che// rgyal ba kun gyis sbyin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur gnang ba thob pas so// oM a kro ta ka/ ya mAn+ta ka kA ya hA gA dzu pa ni hU~M hrIM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM hrISh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA naH
16a4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ sa ma ya/ sa ma ma man+ta shI/ ya man+ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka ka ti/ tsag trag rag sha sting kha rag mo b+h+yo b+h+yo// ra ka me ti kr-i tse tshe kha la ma hi b+ho// ya ma la na tsin ta ma ma b+h+yo// sa ma yo tA dza dzaM/ oM sa ma ya mi nU shrI/ ya man+ta ka ya me dA dza/ ru yo
16a5(rnying rgyud): ya ma ma ya/ e ka dza te rdo dza dze/ ma ma dag mo dag mo/ tra ga rag sha mu r+tha kha mu tra/ rag mo rag mo/ sarba rag mo te kr-i/ dza dza/ kha la ma ti ya me b+h+yo// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po ste// rtsa ba'i don du shes par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de
16a6(rnying rgyud): nas 'khor rnams dang ba'i sems kyis 'dun to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po gshed po des/ dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
16a7(rnying rgyud): nas/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// yon tan phun sum tshogs par la rdzogs// gsang ba'i ye shes don kyang ngal rdzogs// drag po 'dul byed chos kun nga la rdzogs// zhes bka' stsal to// denas
16b1(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ dbang gi don gnang bar rig nas// 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mos pa'i sems kyis/ 'di skad ces gsol te// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// ye nas thob pa'i don ma dag/ dpa
16b2(rnying rgyud): polta rjeb bshad du gsol// zhes glengs so// nyon cig zung zhig 'dus pa'i tshogs// 'di ni shes par dka' ba'o// zhes bka' stsal to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yi// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan lta bu// rang la gnas pa'i ngan pa na na/
16b3(rnying rgyud): skyon yon snod dang slob dpon dang // rnam grangs rim pa'i don bstan pa'o// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// gang zhig sngags la 'jug byed cing // nyan cing sgrub par byed pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag ni//
16b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi yon tan gang mnga' yang // 'khor lo srog shing med pa 'dra// de bas dbang rnams rim pas nos// 'jam dpal nga yi bka' la nyon// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur gnang ba thob gyur cing // rim pa yan lag
16b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa yis// las rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// zhes dpa' bos bka' stsal to// ji lta bu la zhub bstan pa ni// shes rab yangs pas chos rnams ston// blta ba yangs pas phyogs dang bral// spyod pa ma 'gags thabs su sbyor// bsgom pa
16b6(rnying rgyud): srin che 'gyur ba med// dam tshig gang yang ma nyams pa// de ni dbang nod slob dpon no// slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// rang bzhin bzang bas nam mkha' 'dra// spyod pa bzang bas sa gzhi 'dra// dam tshig 'jigs pa'i mkhar ltar bsdang // blta ba
16b7(rnying rgyud): bcos pa med par 'char// sku gsung thugs kyi sras byed pa// ser sna med pa'i yod gyis bslu// 'khu ldog mod pa'i rnal 'byor ba// de la dbang rnams rdzogs par bzur// zhes gsungs so// de la rnam grangs reb pa ni// gnas dang dkyil long
17a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang // las kyi rim pa dbang gi grangs// de la gnas kyi tshul bstan pa// zla ga ma 'khyil pa khrag gi mchi ngas can// bzhi mdo khang stong srid pa'i mchog/ de ru dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni// dang po gag
17a2(rnying rgyud): byas nas// don dang ldan pa'i maN+Dal chag chag bya// dang po chog 'di brjod par bya// hUM mchags kyi ba med pa yi// zags med yum gyi gzha lta yas nas// thabs kyi 'phro 'dus ye shes rol// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// gnyi med
17a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbyings nas// byang chub sems su dbang bsrud phyir// dbang gi maN+Dal brtsig par bya'o// zhes lan gsum dag tu brjod par bya'o// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta maN+Da la trAM/ maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// ba su ta yis thig gis ga dang // de nas dkyil 'kho dkri bar
17a4(rnying rgyud): bya// thig bzhi btub pa'i le'u tshe dgu// zla ga ma dag gis mdzes par bya// sgo ldan rgyan rnams kud gyis brgyan// gser dngul zangs lcags mtshan ma gding // rin po che yi bum pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis
17a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan// bdud rtsi lngas gang byang chub sems// spyan lnga dri lnga na man lnga// 'bru lnga ldan pa'i bum pa ni// lha yi sangs dang ldan pa dgod// byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bya'o// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed po yab yum rim gyis tshul bzhin dpod/
17a6(rnying rgyud): sku mdog dmar nag rgyan rnams rdzogs par bkod// ces gsungs so// de la las kyi rim pa ni// dkyil 'khor lha rnams ma lus bskyed// snyan gas na dbab dang spyan drang brten par bzhugs// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bstod// 'dzab dazlas bsnyen 'aslab
17a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bya// de nas bu rnams khrus byas te// phyag 'tshal gsol btab rim par rdzogs// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // rdorje dril bu ming dang ni// brtul zhugs mthar thug sbyin par bya// rnam grangs rim pa lnga yis rdzogs par bshad// de la rdon slob
17b1(rnying rgyud): dpon bang dang 'bar bgang // rgyan chas rtags dang bang chub sems// de nas 'di sad ces bka' stsal to// sngon du bya ba 'a las zin nas// rim pa rdzogs par bsgyur bar bya// nas gsungs sa// darnam na drang bang bskrang ban// byung sa gas pa
17b2(rnying rgyud): bdeg shegs ma lus mkha' la 'dzin// shes pa mnang rdzogs yon tu sbyin gyis grub// sdug bsngal slob mngod ma rig 'dun byed cing // chos nyid don sto kha lo skur byed cing // bad+ma'i gdung 'tsho brda'i slob dpor mchog/ gang zhig mngon du ma
17b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i dbang // dbang mchog ma lus khyod kyis thob par shog/ oMs rba ta thAg ta ma hU~M gu rug N+ye shwar badz+ras b+hA ba At+ma ho&ti/ de nas phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bsring ba// TI thug sa rjo thabs mkhas dang byang ta // khams gas ma dbang bskar dang byung bajam ldan
17b4(rnying rgyud): 'das// khams gsum gdug pa bsreg mdzad 'bar ba'i lha// che ba'i che mchog dbang phyug chen po'i snga// rtog pa zugs rje 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// ye shes me 'bar gsol ba'i 'od 'bad te// khri tshogs 'bang ba'i dbang mchog rab 'bang nga // ye shes me 'ang
17b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba chen po'i dbang // gdug pa zil gnon ma rig bsreg mngad cing // sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bskal pa'i mes bsreg pa// kun la ya mA me 'bar chen po'i dbang // rigs kyi bu mchog dbang mchog thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+wA la mata la ma he shwa ra badz+ra
17b6(rnying rgyud): ko&traM/ de nas 'ams gsum sgrol ba'i gang gi dbang bskur te// ye shes dregs pas thams cad sgrol ba'i ging // che ba'i rgyal po kun sde bdag/ thams cad kun tu 'bar ba'i mtshan// ye shes gshad pa'i khams gsum sgrol ba'i gang // zhing badz+ra sreg pa
17b7(rnying rgyud): nyi ma ste// dbang mchog 'di las dbang bskur bas// khams gsum ma lus thal bar rdzog/ de 'dra'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ i ya ma b+hUd+b+ha b+hA ya hUM/ a s+thi rgyas/ de nas rgyan chas rtags kyi dbang bskur te// dang bzod rjodan phreng ba rdzogs la 'di skad
18a1(rnying rgyud): da// tri dung chan khang sang dbang po lnga dang ldan// sugasum tshul 'changs ma rnon dari de tshul// 'angang ba gnas spyad thabs kyi phreng bas brgyan// khams gsum dab byug zad gyud dbang bsrung bas// su ga sung thugam
18a2(rnying rgyud): thob par shog/ oM padz+ra thAt+ma ka pA la ha ha hUM/ a b+hi Shi \u0f7fd+hI/ de nas sbal gyi chun pos dbang bslang ba 'di skad do// zod sbrul mnyen ga 'jigs byed rgyan du che// srul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i rngom brjod ni// skye mchog kyi yang pra ya
18a3(rnying rgyud): kyil// dug lnga ma spangs dbang gi rtags su bstan// mnyan lug 'khril ldem zhe sdang drag po 'joms// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis klu N+Dal dbang du sud// gti mug dbang 'jal dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir// srul dge slong gi rgyan pos de dang bskur bas//
18a4(rnying rgyud): drag po 'bar ba'i gnas dag nas// thabs mkhas rgyal ba mnyes pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM badz+ra nA ga R+Sha hUM/ ru lu ru muSh+Ti/ a b+hi Shi phyem// de nas zhing gi g.yang gzhis dbang bskur ba// hUM zhing lpags rtag tu gos la nang dur khrong bdag/ g.yang gzhi tshebadu gsung basbed la zengs// 2
18a5(rnying rgyud): ma spangs gnas su dag pa yi// dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir// zhing che nag yang gzhes khyod la dbang bskur bas// zheng chen rngon pas thabs la mkhas pa yis/ 'khor ba'i gnas las yongs su rgyal bar shod// paM swA~M ga to Sha ha~M a d+hi dzaH tI/ de nas rtag rdza
18a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba/ hUM zhe sdang drag po stag gi sham thabs can// stag lpags sham thabs dpa' dang ldan pa yi// gdug tshom mdoms su bsngal bas rmyi nang gsang bar gcig/ phrag dog gnas 'joms stag lpags dbang bskur bas// rnga sdang gnas 'joms phrag dog kun rgyal ba
18a7(rnying rgyud): dang mchog dam pag nas 'dir thob par shog/ oM badz+ra b+ha ma su ta b+h+yAm d+hi reHhUM/ de nas glang po che'i kau rlon gyis dbang bskur ba/ hUM gleng chen gi rnon brji nga che ba ni// gti mug ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rgyan// na bza' rgyud gyi sra la mnga' gsol zhing / thabs kyi
18b1(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyi dam pa yis// gang la dmigs pa'i gnas mchog 'dir bsrur bas// stobs kyi rgyal po'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ a mu ha da ra tha sha ta hUM/ a b+hi Shi \u0f7fa/ de nas bskal pa'i me ris dbang bskur ba/ byur bar ba 'phra ba 'i yang shes thugs
18b2(rnying rgyud): ldan// gdug pa'i cho ga 'joms nyon mo dug bsreg pa// ye shes gsal bas phyogs bcu'i mun nag sel// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bas debang bskur bas// bar chod bgegs kyis rtog pas mi tshugs shing // mtshan ma 'joms pa'i dbang mchog thob par sho/
18b3(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra dz+wa la raM hUM/ a b+hi Shany+tsa a/ de nas 'khor lo sogs phyag mtshan gyi dbang bskur ba ni/ hUM bdud dpung ga yul las rgyal ba'i rtags kyi phyag mtshan de// gdug pa 'dul phyir mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// 'khor lo ral gri tho ba dang // thod pa sngags
18b4(rnying rgyud): mdzub phur pa sogs// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// dpa' bo bdud las kun tu rgyal ba dang / tsham rngam rtags kyis drag shu la 'dul ba dang // nyon mongs tshar gcod gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i// khams gsum dregs pa kun las rgyal ba yi// dab
18b5(rnying rgyud): mchog dam pa nges pa thob par shog/ oM badz+ra tsAg khan/ kA pA la/ dzo ru kI la ya hUM/ oM b+hi li b+has/ zhag gi tshom bus dbang bskur ba// he ru ka yi gnas brje dang // drar khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// zhing chen gsar d+hang ti ra bcas// dmar gyi ma
18b6(rnying rgyud): rgya mtshor bsgril// zhag gi tshomadus mtshon pa yis// 'di yang sngon gyi dam tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phag rgya ste// chos nyid zhag gis brgyan pa yi// zhag gi tshom bus dbang bskur bas// chos kyi dbyings su rgyal ba dang // gdug pa thams cad 'ja
18b7(rnying rgyud): dang // che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa yi// chos nyid zhag gi dpeng ni thob par shog/ oM maN+Da ti bka ban+d+ha/ a la la to// de nas khrag gi theg pas dbang bsrung ba// he ru ga ye gnas brje dang // dra rjong chen po'i gnas bachad nas// dpal chen 'a khang bcas
19a1(rnying rgyud): drangs te// zhing chen gas rnying ti dang bcas// dmar gyi a d+h-ir+tha mtshor bsgril// khrag gi thig ste mtshan ma 'di// 'di yang sngon gyi dmachog ste// 'di yang rtags kyi yug tu ste// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa la// khrag ga ga ras
19a2(rnying rgyud): dbang bsrung bas// gtum khro drag po 'joms pa dang // nga rgyal dregs sems 'dul ba dang // dbang mchog dam pa thob par shog/ oM rak+Sha ti la ka hU~M/ de nas thal chen gyi mtshan mas dbang bskur te// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // du rjod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas/
19a3(rnying rgyud): dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// zhing che na gsar rnying ti dang bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+haM mtsho ltar bskyil// thal ba'i mtshan mas brgyan pa ni// 'di yang sngon gyi dam tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// gdug pa ma lus rab 'dul ba// snang ba nyid las
19a4(rnying rgyud): dang la 'dus// lhan rdzogs mthar phyin yon tan rgyas pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'i dbang gi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang gshin rje gshen gyi rdu
19a5(rnying rgyud): gshed pos/ gdul bya'i ched du spyan drang pa 'di gsungs so// dbus kyi khro bo chen po ni// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // ye shes sems dang sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kun gyis byin gyis rlobs// chos sku'i thugs rje chen pos su
19a6(rnying rgyud): khyab kyang // ma rtogs thugs rjes bskal ba'i phyir// mnyam pa'i ngang las sku bzhengs gshegs su gsol// oM shrI many+dzu sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hUM gti mug mun ltar gtibs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed po spyan 'dren na// 'khor
19a7(rnying rgyud): gshin rje ma lus 'dul ba dang // 'gro drug gti mug ma lus gzhom phyir gnas 'dir spyon// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// ro langs thal mdog 'khor bcas spyan 'dren na// 'khor gyi ngur khrong ma mo 'dul ba dang // 'gro ba'i
19b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags gzhom phyir gnas 'dir skyon// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro mo e ka tsa ti spyan 'dren na// 'khor kyi srid gsum ma mo 'dul ba dang // 'gro ba'i zhe sdang gzhom phyir gnas 'dir sbron// nga rgyal ri ltar bsnyil ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//
19b2(rnying rgyud): sras mchog ya ma rA dzA spyan 'dren na// 'khor gyi ging bdud mang po 'dul ba dang // 'gro ba'i nga rgyal 'dul phyir gnas 'dir spyon// phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshubs pa'i dkyil 'khod nas// khro bo mthar byed gshed chen gshin rje'i tshogs// ging bdud ma mo mkha'//
19b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro pho nya'i tshogs// gdug pa'i dgra bo ma lus 'dul ba dang // 'gro ba'i phrag dog gzhom phyir gnas 'dir skyon// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ a kro ta ya mAn+ta ka/ A gats+tsha ya dzAHhU~M bi hoH/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las yab yum spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
19b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang 'jigs byed chen pos gdul bya'i don du mchod cing bstod pa 'di ched du gsungs so// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta shrI ya mAn+ta ka de ba maN+Da la sar+b+ba mai de/ sarba pU dzo me g+ha khA hi/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta shrI ya mAn+ta ka de wa maN+Da ya sarba mo de/ badz+ra puSh+pe sarba pU da~M me g+ha ShA hi/ badz+ro du
19b5(rnying rgyud): sarba pU do me g+ha khA hi/ badz+ra ne wi byA sarba pU dza me g+ha khA hi/ badz+ra gIrti sarba pU dza me g+ha khA hi/ badz+ra gan+ta ga da sarba pU daM me g+ha khA hi/ gti mug tshul gyi sa gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug chen po gshin rje'i gshed po'i sku// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sgra rnams 'dus
19b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag/ 'gro ba'i lus kyi bag chags chud sbyangs shing // mi rtog chos dbyings ye shes skur snang ba// 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags chen mo ro langs nag
19b7(rnying rgyud): mo'i sku// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gsung rnams 'dus pa'i bdag/ yid kyi rnam shes bag chags rgyud sbyangs nas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes skur snang ba// ro longs khro mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad cing //
20a1(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang chen tho ma ka t+na Ta// bdag shegs pa'i thugs rnams 'dus pa bad// 'gro ba ga gzhung ba gachags rtan sangs shing // ma ma dus/ pra yo shes slar snang ga/ sakA pa Sha la rgya /
20a2(rnying rgyud): kyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad cing // nga rgyal chen po ya ma rA ri'i sgra// bde ga shegs rgyal ba'i yon tan kun 'dus pa dag/ nyon mongs yid kyi bag chags rgyad spangs shing // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes spar snang ba// thugs kyi sras mchog sul bya tsham pa
20a3(rnying rgyud): phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog chen po dpa can rgya mtsho'i chags// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i byin las rdzogs mdzad cing // sgo lnga'i rnam shes bag chags rgyud spangs shing // byang thub pa'i ye shes phreng snang ba// mdzar byed dra pa ga
20a4(rnying rgyud): chags rnams dang // gang 'dud ma mog shin rje'i pho nya la// phrin las btsal zhing dmachog bsgral phyed bstod// e ts+tshe haM b+hag wAn ma lal to// dpal blagasang dag po'i chud las/ mchod bstod kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'jig sa cad
20a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po khrag 'thung chen pa das/ brtan par brdags shing zug bcal ba 'di dgos cad kyi phyi gsungs so// drug ginadza ga shad pa yab yumasra pa dang 'bar du bcas// thug sa rjes ye shes gshegs bzhugs mi mda' yang // log rtog sems can sring bskor bdud
20a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bslab pa'i 'bras bu mthar dpung phyir// gzugs brnyan ba skyed pa'i dkyil 'bor dam pa 'dir// 'khor bcas mi g.yo brtan par bzugs su gsol// shrI ya mAn+taka/ ma hA maN+Da la sar+b+ba de wa maN+Da la tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ blo chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang las ma g.yos
20a7(rnying rgyud): kyang // gzug pa 'dul phyed khro rgyal sngar sprul pa// 'jigs bye dge shin rje'i gshed la phrag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed sbal mnyes mchod dbul lags na// ri lang gi tha ma thams cad paskyed pa'i yum// 'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo//
20b1(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus 'dul mdzad ma// sgeg mor la gcig gu rgya gsang ba'i yum// 'gro ba'i zhe sdang 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// yab yum gnyis med thugs las sprul pa'i sras// yam rA gang bdud kun gyigaso// 'phos ma rgyal 'a a la
20b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed po'i stan lam du// bdud 'dul bsta pa bsung bar zhal bzhes pa// ging bdud gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'grol// rnab 'byor bdag cag re ba'i sems kyis 'dud// a te Te ho ti// dpal bla gsang dag po'i d+ha
20b3(rnying rgyud): las/ brtan par bzhugs shing phyag 'tshal ba'i le'u skye dgu pa'o// / de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po khrag 'thung chen po des/ rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyi ched du/ tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di gsungasu so// na du che ba'i las byas nas//
20b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis rgyun du bsag pa dang // dngos grub blang dang las 'chol phyir// tshogs kyi mchod pa rus bzhing dbul// zhes bka' stsal to// byin rlabs hUM phaT ldan byas nas// rnal 'gror brtan pas tshogs gnyis bsag/ zhes kyang gsungs so// hUM mchod pa'i phyag
20b5(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di// sems kyis yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyam sbyar dgyes pa'i mchod pas thim// hUM nam mkha'i mthas klas 'jig rten na// gzugs su snang ba ji snyed kun// sku mchog phyag rgya chen po ste/
20b6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje'i gshed po 'khor bcas la// mtshon byed gzugs kyi mchod pa 'bul// sku mchog phyag rgyas mnyes gyur cig/ hUM nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// sma r+ya snang ba ji snyed kun// gsung mchog phyag rgya chen po ste// ro langs
20b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas la// sngags chog sgra yi mchod pa 'bul// gsung mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig/ hUM nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// sems can kun gyi rnam rtog kun// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag mtha' yas te/ sgeg mo ral gcig 'khor bcas la/
21a1(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig thugs kyi mchod pa 'bul// thugs mchog dam pa mnyes gyur cig/ hUM nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten na// phan gnod gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brdabs te// ya ma rA dza 'a lor bcas
21a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan 'phrul gyi mchod pa 'bul// yon tan mchod pas mnyes gyur cig/ rten ma mkha' mthas klas 'jig rten na// dge dang me dge'i las rnams kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod de// sprul pa'i dam can 'khor bcas la// skyon bral tshogs skye mchod pa 'phrul// tshogs kyi mchod pas
21a3(rnying rgyud): nyes kyar cig/ gzhan yang hUM phaT sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas kyang mchod par bya'o// gzhan yang gdul bya bkug bste ma la// rdzogs nas phung po dug gsum mchod par 'bul// sgrol sbyor ma chod pa kun kyang thim// dpal
21a4(rnying rgyud): zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ mchod pa tshogs bsags pa dang / gdul bya dug gsum gyi las kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po ya mAn+ta ka des/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal to// @
21a5(rnying rgyud): byed chen po kun gyi gtso// dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gsum phya ga dug sku mdog mthing // g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas pa gsum na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo ral gri tho ba bsdams// g.yon pa gsum na bsdams pa ni/
21a6(rnying rgyud): thod pa sdigs mdzub phur pa bsnams// wu la 'khril ba'i yum chen ni// g.yas na e ka dza ti ma// g.yon na nag po be tA lI// g.yas g.yon gnyis ni gtso la 'khyud// gnyis ni rak+ta stob par byed// yab yum gnyis su med pa rnams// phyag
21a7(rnying rgyud): hu gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// ya ma rA dza'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa ma tri ro dbyug 'phyar// g.yon na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// myos byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// g.yas
21b1(rnying rgyud): nam dze ro dbyug 'phyar// g.yon na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// At+ma ma ru'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pa mdze ro dbug 'phyar// g.yon na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// ral pa tshar dgu'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag
21b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis sku mdog ldang // g.yas pa ma hA ro dbyug thogs// g.yon na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// khro mo yum rnams phyag rgya ni// sku mdog so so'i gtso dang mthun// g.yas pa rnams ni gtsol 'akud// g.yon pas dak+ta stob par byed// yab yum gnyis su
21b3(rnying rgyud): med par ni// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa bzhes// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas 'jigs byed chen pos lha rnams kyi thugs dam bsrel ba 'di gsungs so// phyag rgya chen pogs pa
21b4(rnying rgyud): ba yi// nga rgyal dbang du 'dus pas brjod// hUM bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed// chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyir khro rgyal skur sprul pa// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bzhugs// rnam
21b5(rnying rgyud): thar gsum ldan zhal gyis srid gsum gsol// ye shes mche ba gtsigs pas dgra bgegs sgrol// s+phar ag tshom ser nag gyen du 'phyo// snyan nas 'brug sgrogs shangs nas 'tshu bsam ldang // bdud kyi tshogs rnams dbang sdud las la 'gyed// ye shes dgu
21b6(rnying rgyud): ldan spyan dgusas dgu gnon// hUM phaT ru lu drag po'i slang dgyes// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang sdud las la 'gyed// pha rol phyi drug rdzogs mdzad phyag mtshan drug/ chud drug gnas kyi dag bgegs log lnga sgrol// tshad med bzhi ldan zhabs kyis rdzogs pa gnon//
21b7(rnying rgyud): srin po ga shin rje dbang gi las la baspel// skrag dang glang chen zhe sdang sbrul gyis brgyan// tha~Md phreng thal chen khrag gis chom bu bris// rnam thar brgyad lda dpal gyi chas brgyad gsol// sgrol gang po mo mang po las la bskul// yon ta dpag med brgyan pa'i sa
22a1(rnying rgyud): d+yaH/ mchag gas// drags par chags 'dral bskul ba'i zhing badral// mngan myod rtags kyi kun las thur du mdzod// yashes nags rjes las pa du bsam pa srungs// rnardzag sug nan ma zhugs mnga' bdag ga// gsadun
22a2(rnying rgyud): la mtha' bdog pa// babyed dag padab te maM// chagags sa 'jigs pa'i lal gdus// ga snga lags cig yaman dza sha la logs// ga yon da dam gtsal dra pa tsho/ ga 'i \u0f7f/ na da
22a3(rnying rgyud): zhing lpags gyon zhing thod phreng brgyan// chibs su rlung nag ser bu bcibs// zas su mi sha rlon pa ze// skom du mi khrag dron mo 'thung // dam nyams rnams kyi spring 'byin ma// sha za khrag 'thung dral pa sdug cing sngon// dam rdzas dmar mi gtor ma 'di bzhes la/
22a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gi dgra bgegs khug la mur du sgrol// zhe sdang chen mo rus pa'i mnga' bdag mo// g.yas kyi yum bskyed e kar ti ma// sgeg mor la gcig gshin rje kun gyi yum// lha dang lha mi nag yul zlog mthu ma che// gsang po'i sum ga cag dren pas bzhi yang da
22a5(rnying rgyud): rjo yum chen bdad kyi lham// sku mdog mthing dag 'bar ba la// ral pa'i zar thug yas nas g.yon du 'khril// gas dang / yu mu tig rin chen pa rjeH// byed mdangs ga yA yi ra la pas rgyan dra byas// g.yas na wa krig yon na kham bam bsdams// srid par
22a6(rnying rgyud): gre stsol bzlog khyod kyis mad// sman nas me 'bar zhal nas khrag kyang 'dzag/ zhal chen khrag dang zhag gi tsham bu bris// gsang mchen dmar gyi thag las brgyan pa ste// khyod ni minang mug na kun gyi ba dag/ chibs su rde rten gsum bskyod nas ni// dur khrod pa ma su
22a7(rnying rgyud): mthongango \u0f7f// ma me gtom dpag cid brgyang khrid drug/ sngags 'chang rnapa 'byor char mo pa can ma/ bdag gi dgra bgegs ga la chung sgrol// hUM rgyal khri byang chub sems kyi bad// yab sra sa gnyis med thugs las sprul pa'i sras// ya ma d+hi 'aM
22b1(rnying rgyud): po'i sgra// mthing nag med byung dab pa'i klo na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas kyi ma grin dbang du skad// sku ma dag nag po dag chen la brel ba 'dra// d+ha dag rlabs bzhin 'od phung nag par 'gro// ma he glang rgad rlabs shang 'ad phung 'bar// las kyi gshin rje rnams kyi kha ma 'phru
22b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lor la gri ba con sdizla mdzub zhags// phyag na bsnams shing ging bdud las la gtong // mche bdakar po gtsigs shing dgra bgegs sgrol// hUM phaT sra sgrogs ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// mai shar+b+ha sha ma yin gzhan gyi sha miza// mi khrag rta khrag ma yin ga'
22b3(rnying rgyud): gyi khrag mi 'thung // thugs kyi sras mchog ya ma rA rdo khyod// 'gro ba mi yi bdud du khyod nyid ldang // rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdag gis bcol ba'i las 'di bsgrub par mdzod// hUM shur lho mtshams nas dag dang bgegs 'gugs pa// gshed
22b4(rnying rgyud): chen ya ma rA dza gshin rje khyod// sku mdog mthing nag dbu skra spyi bor bcings// gcer bu sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// dred mo lag rdebs bcibs nas bcol bar mdzad// mthing nag tshogs kyi ma mo bran du 'khol// nyi ma dang po'i gshed mdza nga / shin rje khyod//
22b5(rnying rgyud): rmad du blang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// yid la brnags pa'i dgra po las ngan 'di// tshangs pa'i mchod mgo bo 'khor du chug/ lho nub mtshams nas dgra bgegs 'gugs mdzad pa// gshed chen myos byed 'bar ba gshin rje khyod// sku mdog ser
22b6(rnying rgyud): nag ral pa mun ltar gtibs// gcer bu sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// dom bu snying dkar chibs nas bcol bar mdod// phyag gnyis be con 'khor lo 'bar ba bsnams// ser nag tshogs kyi ma mo bran du 'khol// nyi ma gnyis pa'i gshed mdzod gshin rje
22b7(rnying rgyud): khyod// srad de byung ba mchod pa 'di bzhes la// yid la brtags pa'i dag po dmanyams 'di// lte ba'i rtsa chod lus sems brgyal du chug/ hUM nu ba byung batshams nis dgra dang bgags 'grags pa// Ar+ya marba dag dang bgegs kyi gshed// sku mdog dmar /
23a1(rnying rgyud): rna ma na du chu mas tu na/
23a2(rnying rgyud): pagasas pa'i ga she ma na da// da byu ba gi/ 'ba'ad ga// yang la 'dugs pa ga 'ashegs patha 'jugs// mas ga
23a3(rnying rgyud): pa gan da / na dad pa
23a4(rnying rgyud): dzin ga pa 'a ga na dzid pa na / pa gas pa dis shegs la ba madru/ dag /
23a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyang 'ang ba ti pa la ya sa nga / ba la pa sa pa byu / des stan dang du la medan la// dang gas dgapa ga
23a6(rnying rgyud): btsu sa // sh+tha/ gi / / na kyi ra gas/ da pa ga pa de
23a7(rnying rgyud): dbyung nga sa sa rgya // / sa/ sa sa
23b1(rnying rgyud): sa \u0f7fd+halaH// dran phyag dram mnganan// ma yam mdun na// dad+ha// klag gapa da dang / yarba ka smang pa la/ rbag cig pa'i sems kyis za // rdza dz+ra dzin kya na/ 'anamang nga brtan pa da// dang stong dgang pa'o// ya na po mdan/
23b2(rnying rgyud): sngon mo// bdun nam dgu ru bzlas pa ni// oM ya mAn+ta ka kro d+hi ba ra ga pu ya taM te/ che ge mo be tA lI dun zlo// ma ma ma ti ma b+h+yo// srog rtsa la b+h+yo// rtse gcig yengs pa med pas bya'o// lkugs par dang lug gi rgyab tu bya ba ni// log 'dren mthar byed yab yum gnyis/
23b3(rnying rgyud): gzir pa ra dang lug gi steng // drag sngags 'gyur med bzlas pa ni// oM badz+ra bu hu la mngag la bi ta/ phye ma se ba ra na ha dun gyo// sa ma dak+Sha khA hi/ che ge mo la zum ri la rbad rbad/ srin mo byi la'i rgyab du bya ba ni// dmyal ba mthar byed yab yum gnyis// ling+ga bzlas pa
23b4(rnying rgyud): sngam bzhin// oM badz+ran rag ma a u ma la b+h+yo// ma ti pa ta nur spro// na rag ma te dgra bo'i snying la byo// rnga mo ma he'i thog tu bya ba ni// byol song mthar byed ga shin rje yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa gong ma bzhin// oM badz+ra mA ta na ka ra ma ta ta
23b5(rnying rgyud): ge man+ya// g.yag dang sbrang ki'i khyab du ma bA ni// gnod sbyin mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa gong bzhin bya// ma~M badz+ra ma? khwa/ brda tshig mo la d+hiH// a mra kaM zung la chad// khwa dang drug pa'i nub tu bya ba ni// srin po mthar byed yab yum gnyis/
23b6(rnying rgyud): gzungs dang bzlas pa gang ma bzhin// oM badz+ra na ga ta chog mo myags lcags blo la zad/ ri bong yan lag rgyab tu byu ni// klu rnams mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// oM badz+ran ga tu chege mo sngags myags dri ral rba/
23b7(rnying rgyud): ri mo byin lag rgyab tu bya ba ni// srin mo mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// oM 'ja ma ti pa~M tsitrA~M b+h+yo bru~M cheg mo 'acwo// sbal dang byi la'i rgyab tu byu ni// dam pri mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzungs dang bzlas pa sngam padang /
24a1(rnying rgyud): mang du da du nag sanas tan dang/ nang chu pa sa // bsku dun ga/ bad kod na/ nga gas mas// / 'dun pa mangs 'dzad
24a2(rnying rgyud): par rdzags telas rnams// bcom na pa'i ma ma sa/ mangs rtsub pa'i dung bad/ ga zhi da sags sa// dang pa rdzogs dgapa khyod kyi 'jus
