24a3(rnying rgyud): gshid de rnams kyis lums cid khri bar byed pa'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das la phrin las zhi ba'i na bathabs 'di phral lo// rab tu dkang ba'i yul dag la// prA g+sa pa'i sems dang ldan ces te// dadu bas mtha ba'i las bya zhes// gshin gsheng
24a4(rnying rgyud): la phrul// gshin rjegashed pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zung zhigro rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad ni bar m+b+hing ba// sa gzhi gnas dang thag dkar// zlum pa nyams dgang bag shis gnas// na pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// rnam pa dag pa
24a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bris// lce bar bcas pa'i thabs brgyad la// mkhas pas bsris/ zab bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zlag sa la// gtsug dang gsum nas mgo btsugs nas// khams gsum rab tu mthub gyur// nyams su yin par gyis la ba nga/
24a6(rnying rgyud): sral shes ba la// gang rngug 'oms mye ma// b+h+yong+ga la btigs // ma gapa sa// byang bad 'ams dag byu // sha m+b+ha rgya dang // zung shing pa thams su dgod padi// glang reg gang thog cang rung // sa
24a7(rnying rgyud): dag ma bden// snying ga dpang bdag ma gtis// la ga sa // rjegamigasas pa pa rdzog su l+r-ing mas / sa pa ma pa sa
24b1(rnying rgyud): byas pa// ga mag yon du brten byas la// sngags g.yog mangs pa tshogs par byas// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par byas// ske mtha byangs pa la// dza ma b+ha la yi gzugs khrang// thus pa' sbyang gar brab na// a mas la sid+d+ha 'am// gang 'dod pa pa
24b2(rnying rgyud): ge re// phaT dang swA hA mda' ltar bya// ming byung gong ltar bris byas la// gong ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badz+ra shAn ti t+tag badz+ra hA/ oM a t+te ka sh-in+te ba la~M dr-i zhes brjod nas/ steng gar brgyab na thams cad mthu nas
24b3(rnying rgyud): dad pa'i sems kyis 'dus to// des non pa'i las rgyal zi na sa phyogs brgya gdag pa'i bar rdzam te/ bdag la mi dgang ba med na las 'thab pa'i na// dpe 'i gags da yong chud lam/ thams cad 'i bar bsrub po skapas te me brgya na /
24b4(rnying rgyud): de nas phyogs skyong gi gshin rje rnams kyi phrin las rgyas pa'i srub thabs 'di/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed chen po la phrin las rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs phul ba/ rab tu ser zhing gser las grub/
24b5(rnying rgyud): ma 'dra ba'i dbyibs can la// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas la// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod// ces pa gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon ci gzung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// thams
24b6(rnying rgyud): cad byas par bya phyir ngu// sa gzhi gnas dang ding ba ser// gru bzhi khod snyoms bcom 'dra// rgyas par bya ba de sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa yi tshul// ldong ngos chag chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdab par rab tu brtsam// gser
24b7(rnying rgyud): las grub pa'i theg sud la// dpal dang gzi mdangs bsod nams tshogs// 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i sems dang chas// slob ma dam pa las grub par// bsams la theg ni gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mo ga yu// rdo rje'i brtsig pa gser las grub//
25a1(rnying rgyud): ga na nan na // ga smra sa// nas nga/ dag
25a2(rnying rgyud): 'am gas ga 'dug cig na pa rtswa nam/ zhi na
25a3(rnying rgyud): las bsas// babyed pa da ste/ sa dang blan nga dzin pa / ga nga ban dang mchung pa dang// byung pa 'thugs pa 'o// 'an ma pa// sa / myed pa
25a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par rnyed pa yod // da ba ma tha sas// rdzogs ma nanapa gzugs pa yis// da pa par ba // na pa bang da// sa pa 'ad yang ga shang pa// dkyil shA //
25a5(rnying rgyud): sa zab pa ga// gnag da ma ba/ mas rgya gang ma / b+ha ga sasam pa / mjugs ca dang pa/ mdad pa pa pad/ smra /
25a6(rnying rgyud): mam par gyur // dpal zugs dag pa'i rgyud las/ mas da kyis par ba'anapas te 'a ba rdzo pa// / dngas par / shig 'i rnarnams kyis/ phrin las dang zla bas di/ 'jigs kyid ga sa nga ga nyi pe la zapag
25a7(rnying rgyud): dbang gang rings las thab// sangs las ya phrul dgapa// rang dang med par bang brdzus pa// da ba mam rdzu sa te// rang ga kyi pa bang ba shad par mad// ma ga san gsang ba drug// gshing drugagang pos ba pa/
25b1(rnying rgyud): cig zung zhig nga ma 'dzin// thams cad dbang du ba sgra phyo dang // bangasas mdam pa'i sa dag la// dkyil lakhong sa mgong dang 'angadra // lags par ya byams zin pa dang // Thag na rab tu gdab par bya// skyab can labyibs bca pa// na zug na
25b2(rnying rgyud): mdzes// lte dbus gzhu bdungs bres byas nas// de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu dgug/ ci la bya yang thogs chags med// ces ni yang dag bla med des// bshad par byas te rab tu bstan// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya'o//
25b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa de// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lan// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// bsrub na 'grub par bshad pa'o// de dag dgug par 'gyur bas na// phal pa gzhan
25b4(rnying rgyud): dgos// sbud dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// nyung dkar rkang rjes sa'am gzhan// khrag gsum thal chen bsres byas la// ga bA'i nang du thugs byas la// gabu gnyis ni kha sbyar la// skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs// bcings nas bcwatra
25b5(rnying rgyud): te de ma dkris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu bzhag/ nyung dkar zangs ni bsres byas te// dud pas gabu de la bdug/ de la bdug par gyur pa dang / bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing // lan grangs khri tshar dum ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// 'grags pa gyur
25b6(rnying rgyud): na phal pa gzhan// spos ci dgos te nges par 'dug/ oM badz+ra a kro many+dza shrI ba shaM ma ho sarba ti la b+hUM/ lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ji ltar bsam pa thams cad 'gugs// rgya shug bkrus pa'i khu ba dang // mi yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du dbug byas nA//
25b7(rnying rgyud): 'gugs par gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag kyang rung // zhes gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par dbang du 'dus pas dper na phyogs phyogs thams cad nas/ mtsho la spang ma 'du ba ltar 'dus te bdag gi dbang du gang la bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes pa
26a1(rnying rgyud): gshin rdeg gad pos gsungasas// dpal zla gsang drug pa rlung las/ thams cad dbang dug ba'i skabs te la du brta drug pa'o// / de nas yang phyogs byung gagag gshes ma sa byin las drag par bslab pa
26a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshin rje gshed la phul lo// rab tu gnag cing gnam lpags 'dra// mon nag sog po khros pa'am// srin mo'i mdung rtse gshibs pa'adra// khro bo chen po'i tshul can gyis// gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pas te// dram pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad dang mdza
26a3(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed la phul// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon gyig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// phyogs skyong gshin rje ma lus kun// khro bo'i tshogs su 'dul mdzad de// rang bzhin mthu chen 'di brjod do// 'byung med ye shes dkyil 'alo// dkyil 'khor
26a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin byas te// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi 'od// yang lus gnyis med parda rlabs las// thams cad shes rab 'phro 'du las// thig spang rgyas pa dag las byas/ do na las kyi theg ces bgyi// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tsha dgra/
26a5(rnying rgyud): rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// kun tu gru bzhi sra chad cad// grwa chad can ldan dur khrod rkun// mdzes par bris te gzhan du mid// bstan pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bgyid par bya// so mtha tika truM a badz+rad tI lI ga sha ma
26a6(rnying rgyud): sprog b+h+yoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ smye d+h+ye b+h+yoH/ d+hu r+ts+tsa b+h+ya d+hA r+m+mam+bu rgyo b+ha b+h+yo b+h+yoH/ dzeHd+hUb \u0f7f/ b+hu d+hA b+hu b+hu b+h+yoH/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag g.yos so// rab tu kun tu g.yos so// rang du kun du ldeg go// rab tu kun du rung rjem mo// dbus 'thon mtha' mal/ mtha' tshaman su rang
26a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so// 'jig rten du mthu chen 'di lta bu la bdag zhu ba lags
26b1(rnying rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bdi thobar dzad pa dal/ bdag mngan du sems can thams cad kya na rab tu yang 'bangar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro ba chen pos 'dul bar mdzad pa ngas 'di skad ces gsungs so// a sh+mi bar la k+Sha kra b+h+yas tag 'a ba
26b2(rnying rgyud): rU ba mAr ya phaT zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang / mthu che ba la sogs pa btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu de 'jig rten gang nas kyang // gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang sams 'phra' dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsung
26b3(rnying rgyud): pa de dag yin// zhes gsungs so// dpa' zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sgrub thabs te thams cad bskul nas cho 'phrul bstan pa'i skabs te le'u ba du bdun pa'o// de nas nan tan bskyed byas te// 'jig rten gshed pos drag por cham
26b4(rnying rgyud): rnam bshad par b+hA/ 'jig rten brgyad kyi gdug pa kun// chom rngams glog ltar 'gru ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang
26b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgom ste de bzhin shes par bya// dzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod 'grub par rol// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa yis// rnam par 'dren pa zhes byas te// sngags dang phyag cardzas rnams/
26b6(rnying rgyud): dang // ga zu badz+ra dam pa dang // khams pa 'i 'jam pa ni// khrag sna gsam dang gi zing ngo // de dag phrin las mchog yon te// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon miza// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar 'gyur
26b7(rnying rgyud): chom med// dpal rnagasang nag po'i chud las/ drag po'i skabs te le'u bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig byed rten pos 'di skad ces gsungs sa// 'gal bzam la 'bebs 'dod na// dur khrod lung dang mthun pa'i gnas/
27a1(rnying rgyud): dgon pa lta bur mong nas ni// thog mar bsod nams tshogs kyang bsag/ b+hi bshags 'bum la sogs pa gdon// tshwatshwa nye 'don la sogs bya// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// bAk+Shi shwa ri 'bru drug 'don// 'jam
27a2(rnying rgyud): dpal mtshan ni yang dag pa// rtag tu gdon par dam yang bca'// grub pa'i nyi ma gang yin la// bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsag/ de nas drag po byed 'dod na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngol// maN+Dal gcong ma dris thugs la// dka' thub drag po
27a3(rnying rgyud): pa byas// ku sha'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mgo bo rma bya bzhin du dgug/ durak+ta yi phreng ba bgrang // mgon po nyid la gus byas te// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni// yi ge bcu bdun nus thang gis// drug dbus dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa dang po yin//
27a4(rnying rgyud): phyis ni ri rab rtse mo la// gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas pa bya// de ni bsnyen pa gnyis pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng // khri'u 'am dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i steng // 'jam dpal sku gzugs ri mo'am// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar nyis 'bum bzlas//
27a5(rnying rgyud): de ni bsnyen pa gsum pa ste// phye ba gcig 'bum thon pa dang // me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod// bstod pa la sogs ci rigs bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas rtags rnams 'byung // 'jam dpal sgo yi zhal 'dzum mam//
27a6(rnying rgyud): ni bzang po 'byung ba ni// dngos grub la sogs blang bar bya// de nas drag po'i sbyor la 'jug/ dur khrod ma la yar song la// mi skra ro tshil rab blangs te// khrag chen dag tu spang bar bya// khrag sna tshogs kyi khu bas bkru// btsir la thal chen sa dkar gyis//
27a7(rnying rgyud): bsgyur phung bzhes brgyang la bskam// zla ba dag po'i chas drug nas// brtsams te phyi gtor la sogs gtang // mtho gzug dbang gzug gser skyems gtang // srid pa'i lha 'dre sde brgyad la// bden pa dang chub brten ma byed bsgo// khram dmar btab la khrag nag
27b1(rnying rgyud): gzhun drag sngags dag dang bsgrag/ shan ba dkar nag bdag par bya'o// brtan pa'i snying po ThA bzlas// nub nag pa 'ams drug ni// nyi shug cig la dbu bcug nas// nye ba dag na nan snod du// rus thar drani pa zlas pa sa// pa cagag rjornas sa/
27b2(rnying rgyud): rkyeg mi sring la hrIs/ nyin byed rjen tshad pa rnas pabya// mtshad dang bstod pa la sogs s+ho// bzungs pa'i sa can blang nis// gzhan med mol bathal pa gnyis// kan ka yi napa dang // byasogs deng drag rdzogs// til dang nga dag ma 'ad//
27b3(rnying rgyud): drin pa ga zug tu// rnyedan gyis de thag dang // sechos dkang n+dan dang // chu rtsegs snang ros yang bam rdzis// mang ga shin rje'i sgo bar brtag/ dbang ni chung ma'i snyi ga bya// dI ba tsa'i dbus su bya// rgyas pa'i 'dod na grang bas sa// dpe dod rta dang ma bu'i 'thos
27b4(rnying rgyud): badrid mi dbangs su bston// zhugs pa lag gi lag par bya// gnan pa'i rab 'ogatuH// mi ma rjes dang las rnams ni// reg pa par gyis shes par bya// gan ga seng nag padzod// rdzob gsang bar sngags pa yin// byin las bya ba'i ma sa
27b5(rnying rgyud): gser ba'i las su shes par bya// 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa ni// babyangs pa'i ras la drug zugs la// mad snga ma bu zang phro ma dang // kha shog drug sna tshogs rnams pa// rang gi srin lag khrag dang sbyar// stag tsha bus ma bri bar bya// stis b+ha rog drag pa'i sgo// mi
27b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra la yang // pir la sogs pa bya bar gsungs// sgo rdza skud pa sngo dmar bcing // 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa yang // gsang 'a'i las su shis par bya// 'khor lo zas nas smon lam gdag// rang gi a mr-i tA la sogs// mchod cing bstod pa la sogs rtse// bdag
27b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ye mA d+ha kang bsgom// su ma dag sbyang zil nag pong ma// nu rlabs nag po'i sprin dang 'dra// kham nag ral pa gyen du brjes// spar khamal smin ma med// glog bcu smin ma zhal bgrad pa// ljags 'dril tshems gtsigs gsus khyim che// pus dang yan las
28a1(rnying rgyud): rtags dpes// rag nas ga sung sa// gdug par tsun tshogs 'din// de ga su madrug nyid 'asgom// sgrubs pas dag dag pas dbyung // spyod pa 'ogs khri gang dang // thas rtogs ste gzhag/ snang yang ba pa
28a2(rnying rgyud): la// sngon dmang brkyangs la yas man dag pa// nyi shu bdan bye dro la// nyi ma ri rab rtser sha nus// stag lpags pago zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// ru na yi phreng ba bgrang // dbug to thog pa sdigs mdzab bsrung // phyag kyang mi tshal lAm mi bzung// phrad na nga
28a3(rnying rgyud): yin brlag par byed// sgra brtang byas te khri'i bzlas// rnal 'byor nang lag tam zer na// lag gi brda yis gdab par bya// sko ma dang zas ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lag gi brda yis blang bar bya// spras na rnal 'byor dang don zad// de yi phyir na lag brda' bya//
28a4(rnying rgyud): na 'di yang gdon// ya ma rA dzas do me yaM che ge mo'i pra ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas dmar thag chad par du// khri khri bzlas pa bya ba yin// dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// phur bu gdab dang nyung dkar brdeg/ pho nya bcol de srul drug kyi rtsa// ma nyes dbang
28a5(rnying rgyud): badz+rag cho nges gdab// nyin gnyis pa la 'di yang gdon// ya me do ru Ne yo da ya che ge mo dak+ta cor hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gcad// las kyi dam pa gong dang 'dra// nyin gsum po la 'di yang gdon// yad yo ni rA ya k+She ya che ge mo mang
28a6(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ dmar thag chad nas sngags gzhug gtsang // las kyi rim pa gong dang 'dra// nyin bzhi pa la 'di yang gdon// yak+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya che ge mo zhig mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ dus ni 'brug dang 'tshubs mas gdab// gdab yig nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// mnan pa'i 'khor lo
28a7(rnying rgyud): gzhug par bya// mnan pa'i gzugs ni ri rab bri// thod par bla chad nag po'am// dag dig glen pa bkra mi shis// nang du bcug la re bar zil// lha khang them pa'i 'og dag gam// ro khang dur khrod dag tu gnan// gtad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// dong ni rang pa tshang
28b1(rnying rgyud): dpung // sgyum ma can pa ra dag tuganan// gnan par lhan dal bzar das sa// rgu nag 'dra ba'i gzugs can pa// maha nag pa dag la bstan// gshi rje'i dbyug pa dag pa thogs// de lta bu la dngas pa la// bdag gas la tha phyag rgya'ang/
28b2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi chen po gshegs nas ni// gshin rje yi ni lag tu gtad// de rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// don yod grub pa'i pho thang gdab// dpal zhags dag po'i rgyud las/ drag po bca' ga/ nod skabs te 'dze brdungs pa'o// / de nas
28b3(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i las dag byed 'dod pas// yid 'ong mthun pa'i gnas lam du// rnal 'byor mos dang dad pa yis// bla ma mnyes byas dbang dag mnos// lung dang man ngag thob nas kyang /
28b4(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus chen pos mA du bsrub// gnas dang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lha snod ldan pa dag gis kyang // 'khor lo'i rgyu dang snag tsho'i rgya// smyu gu'i chu dang dus phyogs dang // mkhas pas zla gsang rgyud nas bshad// drag po sa ye maN+Dal yang // bskrang
28b5(rnying rgyud): dang bzung dang bslang ba sogs// mkhas pas zla gsang chud las so// drag po'i dkyil 'khor bri ba yang // thig g.yog mtshon ldan gzungs ma la// ba su ta yi thig dang thal chen chen rgyu dang // rgyud dang man dag shes pas b+ha// shar nub lho dang phyogs dang ma
28b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs cha rig pas blta bar b+ha// ste ga bu 'dol gang gru ba'i la// chag chag gsum dang srung rdul yang // blugs rgyad las shes par bya// byed rlob gnams thig btab pa// zla gseng las las shes par bya// thig ni bcud kyi rkang bya// nyig nor bzhi dang
28b7(rnying rgyud): cing ba sum patheg gsum gdag// ma da pa pa grung/ kyig // gsang gnyis pa dag // bdun nyis kyi'is dang ba // yam ba sngun / ga yin dpas kyi // ga sa
29a1(rnying rgyud): dgod// bcu ga nyis rdzobs dang ldan pa pa// darnas pa zhi dag dgod// rAN+Da yan dag dang yang // rab tsun zhes pa'o// dam dag bang bya// gzung gsum pa dag lan// ga tub ma
29a2(rnying rgyud): 'i sngags kyi ba ge ga/ bsla bya'i ming dang spel la dgod// rdorje rje ni phyiro la // sgo dang sgo khyung ldan pa bya// dbus ni dag po tho gsum gdag/ ra kyi bzhin grogs dang shAr// /
29a3(rnying rgyud): rdo gyigs la su rbad snang // mtha' ma lcags 'i sgron phyogs dang sbyar// gshin rje b+ha ni khyo shar byeng / na m+b+hi ma rgyags su dkyus// sha khragangs dang me tog sde// s+t+wa~M moM phyogs nas dbu bar bya// drag po rdzas c-ig rjed/ 54 pa dang
29a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs su gsol// 'khor po bcu gnyis rtsel yang // phur pa bcu gnyis rim gyis so// 'khor lo bcu dra rtse po pa// ke ming brdu drug phur pa dgad// rno ba rda phra mo 'phur pa bde/ rtsa byung zad la ya
29a5(rnying rgyud): mnga' gsol bar khyams la'o// bsgrub bya'i dmapas gtor ma yang // bslab pa'i lha ste dpal la gcig/ bsnyen pa'i lha lte ya mAN+Da ka gcig/ las su gtor ze 'i lha ste ti pa 'ani pa la gcig/ sbyin pas gnyer ba'i dang zham
29a6(rnying rgyud): bdud la gcig/ ma mo'i tshogs la gcig kyang dbul// zhi khro'i lha la las gzhung bsrang // de nas 'chi bdag las ga khrang bsrang // zhes pa gshin rje gshed pas bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i chud las// dkyil 'khor gyi badz+ra bzhi
29a7(rnying rgyud): g+ho nyi shu pa'o// / de nas mthu sa bas kyi bdag pod pa la byag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces byas sa// he he dpa' bo 'jam pa'i mgon// phyogs spong 'dul ngarig shed pa te// dpa' ba'i 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// tshul bzhin bslab pa'i'adon bshang
29b1(rnying rgyud): na lasag rung bas nga ltar bzang // rkang 'angan rnam gsumang ltar bskyed// stan drang bzhugs na nad de ltar ba'o// pa ma dpal bgan las bdog mnyan 'tshal// dpa'ang can ga 'azhol cig/ sa ma ldan 'das 'jigs med chen pos man
29b2(rnying rgyud): medz+re 'di ci du 'arjod do// dam nag khragags sog po rnam pa 'dra// mi mang po yod cing nang gcig shing gi car// gcan gzan mang po 'phrul zhing 'dab chags mang po dadra // lha 'di mang po tshogs par drag po'i gnas brtul te// mchod pa bshams lu kon
29b3(rnying rgyud): mchog gsum po sun drangs la// mnyes par bya phyir mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul// sa bdags srin mang po stan drangs la// gtor ma chang phud mchod rdzas byin brlabs te// bsngos las slong tshig kyang brjod// nga rgyal rdo rje khro bo yis// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa bskor/
29b4(rnying rgyud): sa bslangs gzhi spang ba ni// bdag nyid khro bor gyur pa'i thugs ka nas// raM las ye shes me yis dngos mtshan kun bsregs te// yaM las rlung gis gta nas khaM las chu yis bkrus// dod dam stong pa ngang du bsgom// de nas kun rdob mtshams bcad
29b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgyam cad dbus su bskor bar bya// rin chen sna lnga ldan pa'i chang grangs// phung shulas blang sa mi ta'i khrag shepa sde pa// sa spangs brab nas drar khrod cag chag gdab// rdo rje dri chur ba dang // drag stsogs pa'i tshig chag rab tu gdab// de nas thig
29b6(rnying rgyud): gdang thig gi chu bstan pa// zhing gi rgyam yu po'i sra// gr-i ba lo gnon mo zla khar la skas// thig spang byas la byin brla ba jig kyang gdab// shar dang nub dang de bzhin kyang // de bzhin byang shar ma choms su ma'o// shar lho nub byang lho nub dang // de bzhin byang shar ma
29b7(rnying rgyud): sung// dbus kyi shar nub dbus kyi lho dang byang // snam bu brgyad la gnyis gnyis bcu drug dag tu bshad// mtha' thig la sogs bri ba'i las su shes// dang po dur khrod ras brdungs te// 'khor lo bri ba man ngag las su shes// mA ra ye yi gzugs ba
30a1(rnying rgyud): la// ngang du rgyag rjems// dang skabs gas kyi dmathul// nang du mang marnam pas dkrung // ming sa mag dang steng ga gzug/ zas la dag tu chab gsamasas byug/ rlud pa na dmang gra sags nas// da dang /
30a2(rnying rgyud): dog nas gnas gdab// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan dag btsal te// lum gyings la yab n+de su mthongs la yum// de bzhin gzugs de 'khor lo'i bar du gzhug/ 'khor mi zad pa'i ning drag zhug/ mi lkugasathong bas drug mya bted // de nas phrar bu'i
30a3(rnying rgyud): bral drad pas rab tu 'du// lung gang rgyal po dag sang brdeg/ thugs ma dbyings nas khrab rgyan pong bskyed// spyan drang gzugs grags la te nga rang gdan la dgod// shang rje kau thag yon rten 'das/ dag yang
30a4(rnying rgyud): na bdag rlig pa 'dul// byang ngu lha mchog gnod sbyin 'dul// shar lhor grang mgo ma lha 'dul// lho rlub mig dmar srin po 'dul// rub byang tel ba rlung lha 'dul// byang shar las grub dbang ldan 'dul// steng du nag 'joms tshangs pa ja pa
30a5(rnying rgyud): dmar pos bdag 'dul// de dag ga shi ni rje'i yum rnams kyang // phur pa rang rang grib la gnas// kum da ri bdud 'dul shar// k+Shu ma dare btsan 'dul lho// ka dkang rig za' 'dul nub// tsaM mun de ri klu 'dral byeng // phung ba bzhi yang sgo ba'i /
30a6(rnying rgyud): gshin nu'i bras su lhong dgram// thod pa khor mo bcas pa te// gagasum thub ste steng drugazhag/ g.yang gzhing phan la sogs pas brtson// gcen tshol chen keng sa dang // khrag chen la sogs ci mang snyed// skye zagag gi rdo thad lagadag/ gtor ba
30a7(rnying rgyud): sa gor bzhin gzhag/ hung dkar gi mo drug phrag rnams// g.yos g.yon dag tu gzhag par bya// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gsum// chang phud la sogs pa shams nas kyang // dkon mchog gsub 'i sman drangs la// mchod dang sdig pa bshadapa
30b1(rnying rgyud): paH// de nas chos kyi srang ma rnams// lha mgon klu mgon la sogs dang // bgags dgas stong phrag brgyad du dang // 'gro ba drug rnams la sogs par// gtor ma bsdom la bdan pa bdang // 'ad yi grogs ma pyad par bag// dkyil 'a bar ba
30b2(rnying rgyud): zhing dbang yang gzug/ mtha' ma rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor// bgegs rnams bslad la mtshams rnams gcad// de nas lho ru kha yang blta// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgya dang ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// e yi suM ko ra~M shI las// gan
30b3(rnying rgyud): sa gdan bcas gsal bar bsgom// de nang lha rnams gsal bar bsgom// dbus kyi mnye'i gdan thog tu// mthing nag 'bar ba'i hUM gcig bsgom// de las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pas// phyag mtshan rdo rje gcig tu gyur// de las 'od zer 'gros 'dus pas/
30b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mdzod nag 'od du gyur// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od las ya mAn+ta kar gyur// zhal gsum phyag drug mthing nag la// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// ral pa'i rtse las me 'bar ba'i//
30b5(rnying rgyud): ral pa'i sked nas khrag 'jog pa'i// ral pa'i rtse nas rgya mtsho 'khrugs// sdigs mdzub rgya zhags lcags kyugayas// dung dpar mdung zung gsal shing g.yon// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum ma he brdzis// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// klad pad oM bsam
30b6(rnying rgyud): mAgrin par A~MH// tsit+ta'i nang du hU~M gcig bsam// ye shes lngaru byin brlabs te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+ha dz+nyA na pany+dza swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta At+ma ko&haM/ khro bo'ing rgyal bskyed pa la/
30b7(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya mAn+ta ka ma hA kro dz+haiM b+h+rUM/ de nas hUM zhes rab brjod pas/ khro ba'i thugs kar hU~M bton te// g.yon phyogs zhing gi gdan stengs su// hU~M de 'gros shing gnas pa las// oM AHhUM betA lI drak+ka man/ brjod pa sa d+d+hi nyid yum du gyur// khram 'am g.yas
31a1(rnying rgyud): lastan g.yon// su ma dag nag ma gsal bar bskrad// yab sa gsang ba rjo ste// oM las nar thaphra ga pas// da nas yum grogasang gnas sa// pa las bcu 'dab ma brgyad// ma'ag gragasas so// 'odos
31a2(rnying rgyud): kyang gas / ma ga / bas ma 'apa mams da/ sa/ ma ma pa /
31a3(rnying rgyud): sgril bcur gyur te// mkha' las bton nas 'bar la mi// byebs kyi steng drug dan steng du// chu ba zhi la ma de re bsam// 'khor mo shang su rtsibs gdam la// hU~M hUM bsgril mdi byeng las// oM ya man badz+ra mo d+he/ oM yam na 'ji rje Sh+Ta/ brjod pa ma dza
31a4(rnying rgyud): kau TI zlag sngon kham rgyam// zhal gcig drug gnyis su ma dag gnag/ drang khrod rkun dang ldan pa sa// g.yon pa blan dmar yum la 'khrud// g.yas pa gdug pa'i mtshon na 'dod// yum yang g.yas kyis yab la khyud// g.yon pa dung dam par
31a5(rnying rgyud): sus pa sa sa/ mas
31a6(rnying rgyud): mdzu ba byed// re ka mdun muta dran s+ho/ rnams mdun te/ dz+halam dur tha~Md ma mo gsum// b+hag ma gsum pa bskyed par bya// sgo bzhing rdo rdapas so ba'i// pra man shang du bskyed// hUM le d+d+ha brjod// gang tsu byed/
31a7(rnying rgyud): byang dub byed// ke za ma dbang phyug geng dang bad // man gangs su shes par bshad// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs mi chod 'bul// dpa zlags nag po'i rgyud las/ drag pa phrin las kyi skabs te ma 'a ti gcig pa // dam
31b1(rnying rgyud): I di mi 'jigs kyad chan pas drag pa 'khor po'i skabs 'di gsungs sa// dus zung rangs rnying pa'am// kri bar shi ba'ir sun la// mo chag la sogs me skabar// sku tshe lan chu nyung nag mar// drag dang ni pa lalos dang // ka da ka la Sha ba dang // rab drag
31b2(rnying rgyud): me so la ba dang // rang dam pha la gyi mang ba mo'i khrag/ de rnams sbar la stag tso bya'o// bya rog tu pu'i sro rtsal// 'khor lo ze ba'i byung g+ha// 'char mo rtsibs can gnyis bris te// sred gsum sems can thams cad kur// ge shAn po kun yod rtags su// 'ad
31b3(rnying rgyud): dem pa gsam du'i// dbus su re'i mig dgu par bya// gyi rim byibs ni bcu gnyis the// tha ma dag la bcu drug bya// yab yum 'khor lo dag la bsnyon// 'khor lo'i nang du sngags thrig// re' rgya dgu dang bcu gnyis la// nyi ma 'di ying byed bzhi ni// bcu
31b4(rnying rgyud): do da dam tshig sngags// kyi rim ka la bzhi brda gnyis// yang rim dbyangs yig bcu drug bri// de yi phyi mar yang rim la// dza \u0f7fhUM be hoHkri bar bya// yi ge re ga re'u mig tu// de yang pha yi 'khor lo ni// yi ge'i kha rnams phyir la brtan// mo yig rnams ni nang du bas na/
31b5(rnying rgyud): ya dang ya mnyam ma dang Na// rA dang rdza ma ta mdza dang ka// sa dang Na mnyam do dang Do// me dang cha mnyam ya nga ya// ya dang ya mnyam me dang Na// do dang Do mnyam du dang tsa// Na dang na mnyam yo dang a// da dang Da matam ya dang ya// ya dang yA mata mad dang Da// yod pa
31b6(rnying rgyud): mnyam ni dang rje// ra dang ra mnyams dpa pa// k+Sha dang kro mnyam ya dang ma// ya dag yA mnyam ste dang h+ma/ ya dang ya mnyam n+ta dngad d+ha// ni dang Ni mnyamar dang ra// ma dang cha ma nya ma ya dang / 6// g.yas skor g.yon skor lo mo gnyis// mnor ma log bri bag ces
31b7(rnying rgyud): da rgyag ga dpe yang // ma dang mim nyin rje \u0f7f// hrI brgyamanya yi kyi// grodang kyi mnyam dang \u0f7f// dadang namanyam na dang // tshe dang chamanyamag dpaH// mod pa comanyam da hU~M/ hUMd ni mnyam parda ra// sku dang / mna'
32a1(rnying rgyud): bA// dmachog yi ge dgod par yang // ka kha dbyangs yig la sogs te// yi ge rnams kyi dgod phyogs so// gnyis ka rnal mar bris gyur na// yab yum charal sor gyur te// 'khor lo log nas rnal 'byong phung // de la
32a2(rnying rgyud): dgrag dang gnan dang myos// bskrad dang myos 'gros la sogs pa// zla gsang las las shes par bya// de ltar 'khor lo bri ba dang // rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa dang // 'khor lo gong ma ltar bris la// de yi bar du bcug byas la// tshon sred nag pos
32a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhir bcings// gzhan yang zhi rgyas las byed na// khamasa'i gab tser gong bzhin gzhug/ so so'i rigs kyi gzungs thag gdags// de yis gang yang gdon mi za// las rnams 'grub ces gshed pos gsungs// dpal gshen rje zla gsang dag po'i rmad
32a4(rnying rgyud): las/ 'khor lo bca' gzhi'i skabs te le'u nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang por ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// las kyi bya ba gzhan zin nas// ting nge 'dzin la rab 'jug pa/
32a5(rnying rgyud): ngas gsungs pa la sems zung cig/ hUM/ log rtog gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos nyid de// sems kyis brtags pas cir yang mi snang ste// mig yo mi bsam chos kyi dbyings nyid dang // rig pa spos bral mi rtog bsgom// oM ma hA shUr+tha tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma
32a6(rnying rgyud): ko&haM/ hUM/ dbyings nyid nam mkha' stod pa'i rang bzhin las// rang sems maM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te// 'od kyi thig le nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// ma sUr+ya maN+Dal hUM/ hUM/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil 'khor te// hUM las rdo rje rje lnga rab 'bang
32a7(rnying rgyud): pa// brtan cing mi dang po rdo rje 'bar bar bsgom// badz+ra zhes 'phros 'dus pa las// rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhi bsgom// hUM/ 'jig rten khams gsum ma lus kun// ri yaM khaM gas bsreg sbyangs nas// ye shes 'bar ba lnga ni rim gyis bsgom// e yang
32b1(rnying rgyud): du sa// gnas na ga da las gcan na// da rjo nan// pas ya nga // nga dag tu// ga nga nga/
32b2(rnying rgyud): spyod/ rnalas la shes ra pa'i gzhapa yas kyi / bzhin bzhin babs pag// dkyil bang tha la dgag la yis bags// mang+ge/ gzhal yas dbus pa'i rnyed// nga dusanas kyi kyi/
32b3(rnying rgyud): ma brjid pa// rang thungang ba dang byung rje 'gas// yi ma ba hU~M/ dngas pa'adudu gad rdul thang ba can// rmunag par ma ga zhi ba'i ma gas 'chang // zhal gcig phyags nyi gas dmi la sregayas// gzhon nga
32b4(rnying rgyud): banas te// byung na ra mi ra bskye// ma dang lta sa na// gas gzugs / / bdag dgas
32b5(rnying rgyud): dig na rdzal// gas// shi gyu 'di dzum// 'ad pa 'a ra gyu sa pas// rjem mtho // thab rgyal bag she gad/
32b6(rnying rgyud): drug jigs pa'i gathas// khyod di bebs mi dgras gan// dza sbru ga ba zed byug sa s+ho// dbyer na pag brgyan pa// lugs sna masmon na phyugan bsdums// khyod pa gag d+hAm // rdzogs dang zhugs pa ga yod pa//
32b7(rnying rgyud): g.yas gas nyisasrabs pa pa yod// nga tha ba'i tshu 'du bcwam/ tag ya mu hU~M na/ pa nga bab// rnalas sa sdug/ du
33a1(rnying rgyud): bab // blad mas bsngal ba rgyam banapa// sa / sapa la/ na/ gsus// // !// bsgrub pa 'jal cu nyis// pa ga nga
33a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i rtsa// 'khor rnams bsam pa'i dbang gis bskyed// spyan drang bzhugs mchod tshul bzhin bya// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// dpal gshin rje blags dag po'i rgyud las/ bsgom log gi skabs te le'u nyeng gsum pa'o//
33a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang mthu stobs kyi bdag pos 'di skad ces nus so// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// bdag sdud 'di yi don shod cig/ bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag bshad pa dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nyer bsnyen po// dngos grub led dang bslab pa dang /
33a4(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje'i bsnyen pa dang // gsad pa las kyi bsnyen pa gang la bgyi// gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lag na rdo rje 'dzin// 'chi bdag rnams kyi bshad byab// duso gsung
33a5(rnying rgyud): la sems bud cig/ dang por yid 'bad gnas btsal nas// tsha tsha nye'u 'don 'bum la sogs// bsod nams dag pa'i tshogs bsag pa// tshad med bzhi dang yan lag lnga// bdun gyis kun rdzob sems bskyed la// don dam byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
33a6(rnying rgyud): pa// rnam par mi rtog dang du ci rigs bsgom// de ltar ma rtogs rnams la snying rje bskyed// ting 'dzin gnyis kyis rang rgyud dag spangs nas// rig pa'i ye shes yi ge muM dugs la// spob sdus 'jam dpal sems dpa'i skur bskyed de// gong ma lta bu'i las dag bya ba
33a7(rnying rgyud): ni// bsod nams tshogs kyi las dag go// rdo rje sems dpas rab tu sems la zhog/ dpal zla gas nag po'i rgyud las/ bsod nams tshegs kyi yan lag gi skabs te le'u nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gshin rjes 'di skad brjod do// yid
33b1(rnying rgyud): 'thad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi bsod nams tshogs la gnas pa yang // phyi nang gsang ba dag gi mtshams bcad nas// zhi khro la sogs bskang bshags dag par bya// de nas ting 'don rnam gsum spob sgra yis// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshad
33b2(rnying rgyud): gyi glu ra bskyed la// g.yon du yum bskyed mdun du sras mchog bskyed// g.yas su yum bskyed la sogs rab byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa dang // ye shes chen po lnga ru dbang bskur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan dngas
33b3(rnying rgyud): dang // mchod bstod la sogs zlogs pa dang // bdag thugs phyag rgya bzhi las mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// spros te spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs pa dang // mchod pa la sogs lha mo bzhes byas te// bzlas brjod bsten pa'i 'job grangs dbul ba ni// rang rig ye
33b4(rnying rgyud): shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'jig rten lU yi 'khor// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa las// skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba las// gshed po yab dang yum du mgyur gang yang med// dper na til 'brumar gyis
33b5(rnying rgyud): gang ba bzhin// bdag nyid ci/ 'i gzhal yas khang // rin chen gur phub 'dra ba ru// bdag nyid zla ba'i maN+Dal bsam// rig pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// de yi
33b6(rnying rgyud): bum pa dag la yang // sngags kyi sa bon yi ge b+h+rUM// de mtha' bcu bdun bskor bar bsgom// lha rnams thugs kar de bzhin ci 'drar bsgom// de nas bdag nyid thugs ka nas// sngags bzlas lngag steng sngags 'phros pas// 'dom gang pha rol phyir tshad du/
33b7(rnying rgyud): sku rnams phra mor gyur nas kyang // de gzhal nas gsang sngags bzlas pa las// 'od zer mchod pa'i lha dang lha mor gyur// phar 'phros 'phags pa rnams la 'od zer phog/ sku gsung thugs nyid mnyes pa'amachod pa phul// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus
34a1(rnying rgyud): sugasung thugs kyi byin rlabs bdag la thim par bsam// de ltar bsnyen pa drug 'jam byas pan// sngon du 'gro ba'i brtson pa'o// lagan na rdzas rabarda zung // dpal thugasang rtag pa'i hud las/ wa ya bskon pa
34a2(rnying rgyud): rtse ba'i skabs te le 'a zhe lnga pa 'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yid 'chud mtshan ldan gnas dag na// miN+Da la chag chag legs bdab pa// me tog rjes sgrol sogros 'dod dang nga /
34a3(rnying rgyud): gong ma lta bu'i bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bzlas pa ni// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin zhes gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i chud las/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te me chu nyer drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad
34a4(rnying rgyud): sa gsungs so// yid 'bad mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong ma'i las rnams mthar byung ste// nye bsnyen las la gnas nas kyang // des ni rtags bzang mthong bar 'gyur// zab pa rtag pa ni byang ba dang // khyad par dngos greng rtas bsags te// dmar sa
34a5(rnying rgyud): yi 'o ma dang // mar dang sbrad rtsi sbyar ba dang // dngos grub rdzas rnams bkod nas kyang // bdag gi thugs pas 'od zer bar 'phros pas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// bres sku dngos grub rdzas la thim bsams shing // 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas
34a6(rnying rgyud): pabya'o// g.yal dang sbed pa brkyang bskum gnyid kyang spang // de bzhin spangs pas ci bas ma 'grub ces bshad// dpal thagasang nag po'i chud pas/ bslab pa chen po 'i skabs te la the zher bdun pa'o// / de nas yang gshin rje gshed pos 'di ska
34a7(rnying rgyud): ga ma// nyon cig zung zhig nga 'dzin// ngas gang ngas pa lasems zung cig/ yid 'a' mtshad ldan gnas dag rtse// 'dra ba phrag ga cagagi 'byed pa yang // bla ma'i ba'ang khyab gsungs// bdag nyid gshed po'i 'thu ldan papa// bdun kyi ba bsam
34b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bas ma byas te// bdag gzugs gang lag ya// nag pa ma 'dra 'od 'bar bas pa// de mabung bzlas pa'i mig 'bras bskor bas cal// de bzhin bdag gzugs gnas// hwags ni rab tu bzlas pa las// 'od 'bros las thig shin rdzog/
34b2(rnying rgyud): de yi 'o sa zer log bur pas// thugs dam bskal nas dang cig kyang // 'jug pa'i dbang med 'ong bar 'gyur// gshed po'i bka' na na gsung sdod bsam// las la spong ba'i bsnyen pa ste// 'chi bdag las kyi gshi na rje rnams// gnas su gtong ba gshed po sa /
34b3(rnying rgyud): dpal thagasang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'chi bdag bdud dang gshen rje'i bsnyen pa'i skabs te le'u nyer brjod pa'o// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig zung zhig rdo rje'angan// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// gsang ba las ce bsnyen
34b4(rnying rgyud): ba ni// yid 'brang mtshan ldan gnas dag tu// gong gi las la gnas byas te// de yang 'chi bdag bsnyen pa ni// sum N+Da rtsa gnyis dril la baD+ga zhes bshad// las la stong ka dis de rba// sna la chos ras btsal te// ma sa yang bgrang ba
34b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad dam// nyi shu gnyis kyi nub mo ni// dung khrong gleng nas ras blangs la// skye khrag gsum du bcug byas la// 'ji bdag gshen je de la bstim// yab yum las la stong ka yi// sngags 'di nyid kyang rab tu bzlas// yo sa ma ya bany+dza shI/ a rba tag
34b6(rnying rgyud): yAng+ga bab+h+r-i Ta/ byas bzlas la/ nye shu drug go sde rnam// rongs bkru dang brgyad spad bya// nyi skyed man cad sdug tsam n+te// dbang du bsu pa'i thagapa 'di bzlas// au du mat+ta kar hUM tre laT phaT/ ces brjod/ sdig dza ge ba'i lasazin nas// de ba nin dgo drag 'gro
34b7(rnying rgyud): dri// tho bzhin nas lgang phrag 'tshal// bka' bden pa 'grub bar byung cig ces bya// yang na dung rjod ngas med ni// thod pa dag pa 'khor ba ze// ma gtsang ngos su 'chi bdag gzugs bris le// gzugs kyi snying gar meng byang thes// dag yi ming dus rjod par gdug
35a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ 'khor lo dbus kyi la las kyang // 'chi bdug gshad po'i spa brgyad// phyogs kyi ya me med ste// ba ni las gshed bzhi'i spang bskyed pas// bdag gi mdud du rab las// gas kyor bdun banas pa bas ma// bdag nyid gshin jig she
35a2(rnying rgyud): ye// rnal 'byor cha byud ldan byas la// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong yang // chang par bzug la bo con bsam// ri rab bdag gi snying brdeg ste// ri rab tu gramags par bsam// de bzhin sngags 'di rab tu brjod// in mo ban rgya sgras b+heb+h+yaH/ barba
35a3(rnying rgyud): pro d+hi bi dzA ya a dz+wa lan dza hA pre ta shi ya hU~M hUM phaT phaT ces brjod pas/ ri rab tu gram gshag bas ma zhing // gnas cig shin rje 'gugabs bzhing // thugs ka'i yi ge ya nag po// rnga ma dbang spad sngags kyis bskor ba las// 'od zeng 'bros pas 'og phyogs
35a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gshin rje gtso bo 'khor// 'bum phrag bcas la 'od phog pas// rang dbang med par de bkug nas// de la sha khrag sna tshogs kyis// gtor ma rdzas kyis mchod par bya// b+han+da 'bub khring nang bcug la// dbang du bsdu ba'i sngags bzlas la// bdag la
35a5(rnying rgyud): 'phros pa'i gshed po dag/ grangs med 'phros pas 'chi bdag tshogs// rang dbang med par bkug byas te// thod pa'i nad du bcug pa la// zhabs g.yas rdo rje'i phur pa yis// gzir bas skad ngan 'o dod 'bod// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdus// bka' 1
35a6(rnying rgyud): cig sung brjod par bsgom// skya ring dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin re 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te gshin rje nyid// lo nyar bkyel dgra bo dgug/ lha dang dpral la sogs pa bya// nyi ma rtse la shar ba dang // b+har+tha dkyil 'khor gru gsum steng drugs
35a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin bsad pa'i sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// sngon ga gnag la 'tshor babs ma// tha ma drag sngags 'bu bdun pa// me lce 'bar ba 'jab bsam// gsang ba las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hU~MSh+ThaHpo krotAn na che ge mo shad+hA nA sha ya hU~M phaT
35b1(rnying rgyud): ya ma rA dza sa do me ya che ge mo a mu kaM pu ma ya hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul gyur nas// gshed po ya ma rA dza bskul// de yis phyogs myong gshin rje bskul// de yis ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje snying po gi mo
35b2(rnying rgyud): dang // bdud la sogs pa dbang med bskal// de bzhin gzas po dngos bkug nas// thod par bcug ste gnas pa las// gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// snar tshan ci spar mi chags bzhin// gang ra khyab brlag par bsam// dgo byed par thag chad par
35b3(rnying rgyud): gshed chen ya ma rA dza la// sha wag sna tshogs gtor ma bsham// be con phyag rgya bcas nas kyang // gnag pa'i spyi bor de brgyab pas// tshangs pa'i rtsa bcad mgo 'khor bsam// nyi shar rje nas las brtsams te// bdag nyid thugs kar yi ge ya// 'buMpa
35b4(rnying rgyud): meme 'bar bar bskor// gsad pa las kyi sngags 'di bzlas// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na che ge mo sha t+ye nA sha ya hUM phaT/ ya me do ru Na yod ya che ge mo a mu kaM mud tsa ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang /
35b5(rnying rgyud): de yis myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis phyogs skyong gshin rje bsgral// de bzhin ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // ging bdud 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul// de bzhin dmigs pa'i dngos bkug nas// 'dug pa'i dbang med thod par bcug/ gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas
35b6(rnying rgyud): pas// star tshan rtsi spad mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gshed po myos byed 'bar ba la// mnyes pa'i sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// gshed la bcol bskul drag tu bya// phyag rgya gong bzhin bcas nas kyang //
35b7(rnying rgyud): be con lte bar brgyab pas ni// lus brgyal yid 'khrugs 'chi bar bsam// bdag gi thugs ka'i ya nag po// drag lpags bdun gyis bskor ba la// gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// a dz+dza Sh+NI bi kr-itA na na sha tu nA sha ya hUM phaT/ yad yo na ra ya k+She ya che ge mo
36a1(rnying rgyud): mu karakatsa ya Sh+Ta laT/ 'od zer bdag la phog lung bas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang // gshed chen Ad+ya ma du bskul// de yis phyogs stong gshin rje bathul// de bzhin pa mo mkha' 'gro dang // gang dang gang ma bdud la srogs
36a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// de yi ga zas pa po bkug nas// dbang med tho pang bcug par bsam// gsad pa las kyi sngags bzlas pas// stang tshan gyi slar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// de bzhin dmar thag chad pa dang // gsher
36a3(rnying rgyud): kya bral// sha zag mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul// be con mgrin par brgyab pa yi// khrag cing lhag gis song bar bsam// bdag gi thugs kar yi ge ya// drag sngags 'bru bdun bskor bal// gsang pa las kyi sngags bzlas te// oM dzI tI li kr-i tA na na
36a4(rnying rgyud): sha ya hUM phaT/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni d+ha ma ya/ che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'od zer bdag la phog gyur pas// rang dbang med par bskul nas kyang // de yis ral pa tshad dgu bsngal// de yis phyogs lcong gshin rje bskul// de bzhin pa
36a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang // gir po gang mo bdud la sogs// 'dug pa'i dbang med bskul bar bsam// gzas pa bkrag nas thod par bcug/ de bzhin pa sad pa'i sngags bzlas pas// ltar tshan gyi sgrar mi chags bzhin// gang la bya ba brlag par bsam// dgongs
36a6(rnying rgyud): dmar brag chad pa dang // gshed chen ral pa tshad dgu la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma sbyin// drag po'i phrin las bcol bskul bya// de bzhin be con phyag rgya yis// snying khar brgyab pas srog bcad nas// dbugs kun gyi la phyung bar bsam// gsar
36a7(rnying rgyud): pa mar man ngag 'di// gshin rjegashed po bdag gis kyang // thugs kyi sbom gru babyin sa// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la byos// dpal grags nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba las kyi bsnyen pa'i zhabs ta le bre dbu pa ma// / de nas gas
36b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yab kyi sku la 'thil zhing khams gsum sgrol mdzad tshogs// 'jig rten dbang du sdud rtsing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// bdud po mi bzad tshogs kyi las rnams bshad du gsol// zhes brjod do// 'jigs byed chen
36b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ las kyi srin mo'i tshogs kyis su khrag kal pa// 'di ni nges par bstan gyis nyan par byos// zhes bka' stsal to// thig gdab rgya gram le'u tse brgyad cu gcig/ bdud mo'i grong khyer bcu drug dang // bdud dang dkrug dang sdebs pa'i yan lag mo
36b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni yud du las de drug pa med// mu khyud gsum gyi sngags kyi spyod ba kun gyis 'gyur// yang kyi sngags dang skra gri'i sbyor bas dus dang kun tu sbyar// 'khrugs byed sbyor ba'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ rag mo e ka dzA te du ma shi dun ma trag shaM bai tA lI ske ro sha na ra thun dza snying kha dag dri ni
36b4(rnying rgyud): pu rag rje de dza laM ud/ tsit+ta rag ta b+h+rUM/ 'di ni sbyor ba'i las chen te// brgya rtsa bzhi yis las grub pa'o// drag po spro gri'i sbyor ba ni// u lta bur don bstan pa// ma mar thun gzer b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ ya ma de mgyo ma b+h+yo ru lu zad/ kha dag de ma g+ho la b+ho rbad/ ti she de ma
36b5(rnying rgyud): rbad/ pu rbad ma g+ho ru lu rbad/ rag sha de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ de ba dar la de ma g+ho ru lu rbad/ pa tra mug b+h+yo ru lu rbad/ tsit+ta de ma b+h+yo du lu rbad/ de ni mu la'i sbyor ba ste// mdo ru bsdus nas bshad pa yin// zhes bka' stsal bas 'khor rnams mos pas 'dun par gyur to// de
36b6(rnying rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// he he/ dpa' bo chen po 'jigs byed gshed// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// lhod pa'i rta dang 'debs pa'i sngags// sdeb pa'i grogs dang rna ba'i rdzas// de bzhi'i rkyen dang ma ldan na// 'dam la btab pa'i phur pa'am// khri mun nang nas
36b7(rnying rgyud): g.yu tshol 'dra// mthu stobs bdag pos 'di skad gsol// smod pa'i rta ni gang la bgyi// 'debs pa'i sngags ni gang la bgyi// sdeb pa'i grogs ni gang lab kyi// rno ba'i ngang ni gang la bgyi// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' stsol cig/ gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad
37a1(rnying rgyud): brjod// rkan cagag gag dang // drag pogasang pa'i mnong ma la// rtsod pa rgyad ma mnan// drang nag 'a slabs ma 'thos pa'ang// 'dabs pa dgas dang maldadran// rnamAm 'a da 'gags pa dang // ma
37a2(rnying rgyud): bi ldan na// dpa' bo gting gnon med pa'adra// rno ba'i ngar dang me ldan na// mtshon ma rtse mo rtol ba 'ang // de bzhin thogs rnams ngas bshad kyi// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // bka' de dag zung bzhin ma nor ba'i// bsrung ba'i sdom pa banyams pang //
37a3(rnying rgyud): cha ldan pa dang // bsam ldan bzlas brjod sran tshugs shing // dam tshig bsrung zhing drug yul sprod// lha sprod bsgrub pa ldan pa yi// dpa' tshul can gyi rnal 'byor bas// bskrun pa gnyen po bsung don du// dgon pa chen po gnas ma la der// bu byed zang mi
37a4(rnying rgyud): spang // 'tsho ba'i yo byad dpags te bstar// bya ba thams cad zin nas ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa de// ting 'dzin gsal dang brtan pa yi// lha yirna la 'byor rtse gcig bya// thun mong dam tshig bsung zhing bsgrub// khyad par da
37a5(rnying rgyud): tshatshig spyod cing dor// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// tshang zhing rdzogs pa'i grangs bsnyen la// 'khor zhing phyin pa dus bsnyen yin// mthong dam thos sam nyams su led// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // zhi rgyas gnyis kyi 'khor los mchod//
37a6(rnying rgyud): dbang drag gnyis kyi 'khor los mnan// zhi rgyas gnyis kyi bslang phan gdags// dbang drag gnyis kyis bsgral bar bya// 'khor lo gzhan yang tse rigs par// dbye bskrad dgug sogs gzhung bzhin bya// gang 'dod las de bsgrub byas na// 'khor lo'i rgyu dang sngag
37a7(rnying rgyud): dang // gas dang bas ma slong ngem pa dang // bdags pa mthu rdzam ni// rim pa can gyid shes bya// depa 'khor lo nas grags pa// ngo bangasamachog rnam grangs sa// jib spyi mi mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur zhing dzig// mas rang gi mtshan rtsid /
37b1(rnying rgyud): gang la btab pa de ltar sdang // nges pa'i tshig kyang de bzhin te// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba dang // ming dbor 'khor zhing 'gro ba dang // lte ba 'khor zheng rtse mos gcod// de la grangs ni mtha' yas te// mdor na rnam pa gsum du shes// thugs rje stsal ba'i
37b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dang // las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo dang // 'jig rten phan gnod byed pa yi// bya ba bslab pa'i 'khor lo'o// dper na mo 'phang mgal me dang // glog dang sgra ldan 'khor lo dang // shing rta zo chu'i 'khor lo sogs// las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni//
37b3(rnying rgyud): thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor los ni// nyon mongs gcod cing sdug bsngal 'joms// bsgrub dang bslab par bya ba yi// sems bskyed pa dang rgyad dgrol zhing // ye shes sems mtshon rnam grol byed// de las rnam pa gzhan du yang // zhi dang rgyas dang srung ba
37b4(rnying rgyud): dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang // dbye bslad dgug dang skyo 'bog dang // gsad dang mnan pa la sogs pa// de yi rkyen dang rtsol ba dang // dus dang las thabs byed pa yi// 'phen zhing bskyod pa nus pa yi// 'khor zhing gcod cing 'bigs pa dang // bskur dang 'khrum
37b5(rnying rgyud): zhing sdud pa dang // gzing zhing gnan cing 'bigs pa dang // brdeg cing rnam par 'joms par byed// las dang srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// las kyi 'phen pas srid par 'khor// phyi nang rten 'brel 'jig rten bskyed// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gyi// rnam pa
37b6(rnying rgyud): gsum dang 'khor shing 'gro// 'das dad da ltar gnas pa dang // 'byung dang ma 'ongs phyis 'byung dang // skad kyi 'byung ba'i rgyan gyis na// skad cig ma yi rgyan gyis 'khor// de bzhin phyi rol don rnams kyang // dbyar dgun ston dpyid zla ba los// bskal pa du ma
37b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor shing 'gro// ngo bangs tshig rnam grangs sa// 'khor lo'i rang bzhin bstan pa yin// bde gshegs bka' la gnod pa la// 'chi bdag 'khor lo nag po bya// yi dwags grong khyer bcom byas la// sdel ze mu mu'i mgo thod blangs// ye dgas gos la kham
38a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ thos te// dbyibs ni thub ga ba ste// gnanas yongs sa nas pa te// ram pa gsus ldan la cod sa// bcug nyis bcu drug rtsibs bcas te// keT ca gra dang bcuganas la// bcwa bdu la sogs lags kyipa mangs// rardza
38a2(rnying rgyud): swA 'kho ba ni// phyin ci log gi bcings pa yi// log pa'i shes pa ldan pa des// rgyu mthun mtshan pa'i 'khod sol// man dag rtan gyi rnab 'byor pas// kha nas drag pa'i sngags bzlas te// chos kyi rgya'angal sog pa'o// 'as bang ba
38a3(rnying rgyud): ste// lugs kyi shag ti to mar// khaT+Ti pe ka la sogs pas// brdeg cing 'joms par byed pa ni// 'dab cing drug cing 'dod pa dang // 'dzin cing gsod par bsam pa yis// gang la bya ba'i rnam shes de// log pa'i skabs kyis gnas su mthong // khro bdag
38a4(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gshed po rtsa// bdag nyid pas me pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan ma'i ming dras bcas pa la// ske tshe dug dang thung nag dang // thal chen bu gul nyung dkar gyis// za ba dang gzir dang dbab pa dang // dgug cing rdo rje'i mtshon gyis gdab// sngon dmar byad du bcwa
38a5(rnying rgyud): byas la// gzub spar nang du gzug/ sbyang cad ni ji'i sngags bzlas pa'i// drag po'i sngags ces log 'gyur na// gang la dmigs pa'i bsgrub byaste// mgo 'dor ba dang khrag skyugs pa// myos par rtswar gdon mi za// drag pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang // mtsho
38a6(rnying rgyud): ma med sa pasas rnams// dzad pa nag por rgyas pa zhal// theb pa 'gras pas na cus drug/ mus pa yag lags shing gtus// la ma yin pa 'ams seb// yi dag sa grong ngas smre cig// tshad du ngogags hang // rgyamatsho'i dgras pa
38a7(rnying rgyud): srang ma cu// rdol rir ba gzugs bris la// steng dra la dang tri yu~M banan// gshin rje'i lag tu gtad thab tha// thun pa brgyad kyang brdeg par bya// thob pa drag thun lpags pa la// nyi sa dang po'i zur gyis mnan// gzing ba mang ngadran pacwal gzer// ki la gnyi /
38b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa'i tshe// dang ba thag pa'i tshe/ 'jam na 'dug
38b2(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis zab/ lpags pa khrag phun myos pazang // nyim gisum pa'i blon gyis zab// gsang bzang nags mtshon// nyam bzhi pa'i thun gyis mnan// mtshan da thod pa khrag gis b+hag/ khrag snga drug sna spar byas nas// shan mang drug srog dug thun bzlas/
38b3(rnying rgyud): skyen lpags thod pa pe bathun te// lcags mda' ljags gzhu mda' thun bzlas// gri po'i thod par mtshon brdar pa'o// mkhris nad thod paras sangar gser// gla ba gser bun sngags kyis so// sme ba'i thod pa khrag thun dang // myos pasrung ba bzlas pa bya// rang
38b4(rnying rgyud): thod pa nyung thun dang // sa mo nathun du shes par bya// chu shel skyon ma rlab po che// lpags pa mon po'i lag g.yas kyi// srid pa'i dmag dpung ra mda' bzlog/ ya ma rA dza'i g.yab kyis g.yab// gsung dang sme ba'i dud pas bdug/ gcer bu gri rdzog du 'bor bya// mi
38b5(rnying rgyud): mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag tu// gzir gnon drag po'i mngon spyod bya// drag po'i thun sngags kha nas bzlas// zhung thun ya rbad na tha na ya chung phung phun ya rbad// khrag thun ya chad/ gang po dang lo lo gyi rtse/ srog la ye yi snying la thun/ khabargyad phun yang 'jig par bya/
38b6(rnying rgyud): lha srin sde brgyad la sogs pa'i// srid pa'i dmag dpung phab nas ni// drang srong dmed pa'i sngags zong dang // sna tshogs sngags kyi sbyong ba dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pas bya// khra gang gru bzhi zagra yod par// gzu rdzas kyi stong bde// 'byung gtor mag sa
38b7(rnying rgyud): la// byin la lag tu gtad tham bya// rang gi yed ma bsgom bu zhing // byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma ni// sa sros tshon lho phyogs gtang // sgrol ba'i drag sngags brnag pa'i lung // bstan pa bsrung ba gnan pa'i gter// srin las drag po sngags kyi mtshon// @
38b8(rnying rgyud): thun rdzobs sgrol ba'i 'byod// rdo rje sems dpa' gzungs shing tshongs// dpal blagasang nag pa byud las/ 'khor lodrod sde sa kyi skabs ti le'u sum cu pa'o// / de nasagashin rjeg shed pos 'di skad brjod// bstan pasrung ba brnag pa'i phung //
39a1(rnying rgyud): // gyi man dag sngags zor mchog/ sgrol ba'i phrin las sbyor babasas// 'khor lo byad sdebs man ngag 'phyong // bka' yi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// rang sems dgra pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snying rje rtag tu srog ltar brten// byams
39a2(rnying rgyud): dga' btang snyoms de bzhin du// mdo sogs 'don zhing bsam gtan bya// rgyun gyi yi dam rtse gcig pas// bla ma dag la rtag tu bkur// des kyang dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin gzhug/ theg chen dam tshig sdom pa bshad// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang // srub zabs man
39a3(rnying rgyud): ngag legs par blang // de nas mchod pa cho ga bzhin// nyin re dag tu byas nas kyang // sku gzugs dag kyang 'bad de bya// bde ba'i stan la lus sems gzhag/ sum 'bum mi gyo'i bar du bzlas// de 'og ri rtse dganas byas la// rlung za zhing ni bzlas pa bya// 'bum bcu'i
39a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' cha phrin las brtsams// nam mkha'i sgron ma mang dus tshe// yi dwags grong bcom shi gos la// yi dwags 'khor lo gdug pa yi// 'khor lo ga jug pa'i lte ba la// re'u mig dgu yi mtshams khor te// bcu gnyis 'khor lo gdug pa'i nang // bcu bdun la sogs gsang
39a5(rnying rgyud): sngags dang // zlum pos bskor ba'i phyi rim na// hrI Sh+T+r-iHming yig dbyangs tshogs rnams// dur khrod sol ba du gsol gyis// srin mtheb kyang mdzub sbyar ba yis// khru gang gos gnyis ras mchog la// gdug pa'i yi ge g.yas g.yon bzlog/ de nang chud pa'i skyes bu gnyis//
39a6(rnying rgyud): zhal bgrang spyan bzlog 'khor lo 'dzin// phyag zhabs mi gur tshwa do zhes brgyan// mi sgra dbang po bsdams te bri// gnyis sbyar rgyab la ro nye yis// bsdams pa'i tshul du mkhas pas bri// gladug pas bzung zhing thod nang du// dril byas sngon dmar byad kyis bsdams// gdug
39a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thod nag ltos 'gro bri// mang da dang klu sman rtsi mchog gis// mchod cing sbal la mgu bar bya// gdug pas bzung zhing thod pa gzug/ sngon dmar byad thag bzhis btab la// bzung gnyin mtshan mnong banas// kha nas drag pa'i sngags bzlas pas// do drung lce
39a8(rnying rgyud): gdug pa grub gcig zod nang du/ yang 'jug
39b1(rnying rgyud): blang ba pas// thod dam gdug pa rangan tshogs// dur khrod sol bas drag yogs sbyang // sagasus ma 'ag pa sgraH yas// gsang ga'i sngags dang ming ngas za// drag canan ci ba bya'o// dug su dag pas bslabs par bas pa// 'am bdag banan na dang
39b2(rnying rgyud): gas// gtam ba dag gi 'jang can// chos kyi ma pa thogs pas// 'ang byed zhugs shing brdzu rang ni// gzhan rjegadrug pa'i 'ang ba na// dbang me kyi lag par bgacwo// t+ta ga pa'i grags kyi nga// da pa brel ldag dang /
39b3(rnying rgyud): gtes dkrug pa'i gsang grags banas// ga tsho gnyang sngags kyis byab// zla ba nag po'i mang dus mo// 'khor lo rlabs bzhi grags ma ste// lcags ji nag po'i steng dag ca// yi dwags gdug pa gang bdag/ yatshogs gdug pa'i gas migs rnams
39b4(rnying rgyud): dzag pa nas gang de// dzam 'anas ga sargya// gdug pa 'gas ga gyi/ gnyis tha dang nag tes// na gnyis sa su rtse// gaju dag pa 'phrul ba rdzol// mam thon pa gzugad// gdun pa yang dgags tso// tshad dang
39b5(rnying rgyud): sa thams// shang da'i gro zung phyogs mtshams sa// gdug pa gnas pa'i yul dag la// slobasnyas kyim nas 'di sa gang // rdo la 'jig rgyun gzugs bris la// rtse ga phyi khya ba bdag cang// mad+ha pa'i dus byi ma pa bya// gdugadud pa
39b6(rnying rgyud): de// jigs thas steng nas 'jig rten gzug/ gang la bya ba'i dus dang la// gnyen po gang shes mkhas pas dpyad// zlab dag pa'i mer dus che// drang srong rgya ba'i sa phyogs sa// byang sems 'khor long bcan drug ste// khyab 'jug sachod ci khyi mdzang/
39b7(rnying rgyud): dzad// gas bu skye zug da// mashes dpang ga cag 'ang 'dran// mi ga na pa phyogs dag rgya// bang gang rjod nga gtad bang bya// wab 'jug gadrug pa'i dmed pa thong // ye dgas gdug pa'i smon pas gdab// nag gdug pa
40a1(rnying rgyud): btsal bya// rang ted lha ying rgyal gyis// dkar ba rdo na chu bas ma la// sasgo bcad la rgya yis mnan// sdom la gnas pa'i rnal khyong bas// g.yong pa zad pa'i rkang 'dzad gyis// rngan las rdzag dang gsang sngags bzlas// bslang
40a2(rnying rgyud): 'i gzugs srung ma zhig par// gdug bsngal gyi sems 'dra bas// ma zhig par du gtang mi bya// zhig ste mngon du gyur pa dang // srar zhing g.yo ba'i tshig bya// bskyed dang sman drang mchod bskul rnams// bgom chud mdzes bun nga ngo // ba ma'i gdams dag ba pa
40a3(rnying rgyud): yid la nan tan gzhag par bya// byang chub sems nyid sems la gzhag/ dam tshig bsrung sdom mi nyams bsrang // bka' la bshad pa rjes mthun par// rdzas dang lag cha mthun bsdebs shing // rtag tu ngur khrod dgon par dge'// dus dang la tshigs dam bcas pa// ma 'ang
40a4(rnying rgyud): gzhung ltar byed pa ste// mtshan ma mthong dang bzlas pa rdzogs// rgyan gyi yi dam che ba ste// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor pa// bden pa grub pa'i nus pa yod// shes rab snying rje rabaldan pa'i// dbang thob dam tshig srog ltar bsten// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul zhug ma can//
40a5(rnying rgyud): ngag yod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang don phran tsheg ma yin pa'i// dkon mchog dbu 'phang sred pa dang // bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed pa// bka' gsang ston pas bshad pa yi// drag po'i mngon spyod zang po'i lung // gshin rje gshed po bdag gis kyang // thugs
40a6(rnying rgyud): sgom nas bton pa 'di// 'khor la byeng snyems brtag pa'i lung // man ga can gyi de shes bya// las kyi bye bdun rdzogs rnams// man gdon gyis shes par bya// cung zad me mthun mchod bstod rnams// zla gsang nag po'i nad dag las// gsang ba mdzes thar
40a7(rnying rgyud): gzhung ltar bya// de la mchod pa gsungs pa ni// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// dkyil lor chen po yangs pa yin// tshigs bcad bcu drug zam la// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'gro la phan pa'i gtso can gyis// sman par dgongs te bzhes
40b1(rnying rgyud): klags la// cig gnyis btag la dbul par bya// bsad pa las gas byed pa na// de bzhin rtsab mam brjod las// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// dgas pa sangs rgyas sa las byung // 'drad sogs kun gyis bstod byas mdzad// ma
40b2(rnying rgyud): gyi sngags brjod bstod che bya// ngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// zhes pa nas/ ma rig slong 'i skabs 'byud pa// srid pa dra ba 'joms pa po// zhes bstod pa tshig dang drug pa dang // drag rngu rtsa ba zhes bstod pa dbul// yang na 'ang dpa'i tha
40b3(rnying rgyud): ma lpags brjod ma ba spyod chung bya// yang na mangs than gzung bzhin bya// bskal pa sprul dwag khyil ces gtad// 'brang ma byed stems gsad thabs 'di// dag sa chog gdod rje stan pa 'jig/ meng de slong thugs ces bsgral na byur// mi tshig tha sring pa
40b4(rnying rgyud): brjod mibya// chu srin mthon par rin chen chung ba ltar// khong du sras te yongs su bsgrags pa ben// gshin rje gshed po'i thugs kyi yang bcud 'di// phyag rdo rdo rjes rab tu gzung zhing nyon// dpal bla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ tshon gyi gug sngon dmar byad
40b5(rnying rgyud): kyi skabs te lebu mo gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rjeg shed pos 'dzig ces gsungs so// las kyi tha ba gzhan zin nas// drag po'i 'khor lo panan pa 'di// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zing // shin tu dgon pa'i gnas nyid du/
40b6(rnying rgyud): gling nas ras blangs te// 'khor lo rim pa tshul bzhin du// mA ra ya yi ling+ga nyid// ji bzhin 'dod pa'i dbyibs su bca'// gong ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // 'khro d+hA lo b+hu ba~M s+thAk+Shi dam rdzas de// mchod rten 'og tu gnan par bya// bdag nyid gshed por bsgom gyi
40b7(rnying rgyud): na byeng ba yang / song ba'i tsas par bajus rgya chugs n+de/ la pal ma bya 'as// gsang du ga tshu ya rnaMs// dpa'i na
41a1(rnying rgyud): ri rab zung bzhir la ser bzhi// de las gling zan bcu gnyis byas ma// ra ba dog tu gzas pa po// gshin rje ral pa char dgra yis// lugs thag ldan pas bcings yang // bzang sa mnanas lags par la// dpa pa
41a2(rnying rgyud): gi com btags pa ste// skra spogs kha nas zhag sngags gan bub cing // mig rtswa rig rig 'dod 'dod// ci mdzad thong zhig zer zhing mnan par bsam// 'khor lo bri ba'i dus su yang // dmigs pa'i ming dag gzug pa 'i// 'phor lo nyid ma shor zhing // mi
41a3(rnying rgyud): rnams gud du bri// de dag bris te gdags par bya// gnas dang thabs ni 'di yin te// ya la sogs pa'i yi ge lnga// grab rdo hU~M phaT par mtshams pa'i// rtsibs kyi re'u cha bcu gnyis dang // mtha' bskor mer rjes la // dag nyi yu dgul// @
41a4(rnying rgyud): ming gi mag tu yang // m+WAr ya nas bris pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// khe mur ba y-i nang du gzhug/ 'khor lo spad pas speb la bzhag/ ngan sngags bzlas pa'i dus su yang // bzhi pa ngan sngags khri gag 'don// de dag 'artson pa ying // yi
41a5(rnying rgyud): rus tshad bzlas// de tshe mchod pa 'bul ba dang // de tshe gtor ma gtong ba dang // ye shes lha la thugs dam bskal// las kyi gshin rngam mo rnams// rab+ha gsol zhing dgug pa'i ldan las bu// 'khor ma spad pa'i dus su yang // gshin rnga dag la gta
41a6(rnying rgyud): kyi mchod pa bshams pa dang // bdag nyid gshed por bsgom pa dang // 'chi bdag dgongs su gsol ba dang // rang gi las kyi lhang brtsi dang // bsla bya'i chad pa brtse ba dang // gshin rje 'argyal po stan drangs nas// dam tshig phag tu rab bstan cing // dam tshig snying
41a7(rnying rgyud): po rab tu bzlas// de bzhin dmangs me da' dang // dam rdzas mchod pas mnyes byed dang // las kyi phyag rgya bca' ba dang // dmachog baphrul te las kyi gnyer gtad dang // mnas bsgrags rnams kyis gtad pa'i las rdzogs te// 'khor lo sba ba'i dus su yang /
41b1(rnying rgyud): gshin rje dag la gtung pa ni// drang srong dmod pa'i sgron la mgad ba par bya// da la mnan rdzas bsags ni// mi khra gang khrag drug la sogs// po dog wa padu zad s+ho// phran bya'i snying dang drag pa'i mig/ bzod de la lugs ca dang // g.yeng 'tha' sa dang nas//
41b2(rnying rgyud): sngags te gnan pa'o// spyir na gnan pa'i las byas na// gshed pa'i dgongs pas gnan pa dang // phyag rgya'i stobs kyis gnan pa dang // gtad khram bcu gnyis tshogs gnan pa dang // ya stags gdug pas gnan pa dang // de dag rdzas kyis gnan pa'o// drag po
41b3(rnying rgyud): kyis gnan pa dang // sngon lam gdab cing gnan pa dang // drang srong dmod pas gnan pa'o// 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pha rol na// thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na// yi dwags kun gyi sde dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs
41b4(rnying rgyud): mo// gson gshin gnyis kyi tha mkha ba// gson po skos la 'debs pa po// shi ba rnams kyi gshin du je// dge ba can gyi ltang 'dzin la// sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// legs nyes chos bzhin gcod pa yis// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul
41b5(rnying rgyud): mthu ldan pas// 'khor bcas khyed la gtad par bya// de dag rab tu mnan gyur na// de yi cho ga 'dir ma bshad// lag na rdo rjes rab tu zung // dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo mnan pa'i skabs te le'u so gnyis pa'o// // de nas
41b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces brjod do// bdag don ma yin gzhan don nam// dkon mchog bla ma'i don ched du// rA tra gdug pa cher bcad na// sngags kyi dngos grub thob nas 'grub// dper na dpa' bo skyes bu yis// g.yul ngo bzlog
41b7(rnying rgyud): bar 'dod pa yis// go dang mtshon la nan tan bskyed// des ni g.yul rnams bzlog par 'gyur// go mtshon mgar la rag las phyir// dpa' bos pa gang la brten par bya// mgar gyis rdol lcags su bzhu// lcags la go dang mtshon cha brdung // de nas 'thar la nan
42a1(rnying rgyud): tan bskyed// tel mar dang yang yid 'thad blud// de nas brdeg thabs shes par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byod chen pos kyang // thog mar bla ma mnyes bya'i phyir// rab tu gnas dang yid 'thad dbul// gnang bar dka' ba'i dbang yang
42a2(rnying rgyud): mnos// man ngag gnad nas sbyar la bsrub// snying po don thabs lhar shes bya// drug 'bum sum 'bub gcig 'bum dang // gzhan yang 'bum gcig shes par bya// de nas mkhas pas phrin las bya// dus dang phyogs ni mkhas pas brtag/ zhi khri b.radu
42a3(rnying rgyud): bya// phrin les ngag la rnam pa gsum// 'khor lo gyen bsreg mnan pa'o// dang po 'khor lo'i las byas nas// de nas gnan pa'i las shes bya// tha mar me yi las bya ste// me lha bsnyen pas las rnams 'grub// dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs nas kyang //
42a4(rnying rgyud): lo bskor ba'i las byas nas// gzhung las 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// gnan pa'i las thabs byas nas ni// ho za dang bsreg pa'i las bsham pa// zab khung gru gsum brtsig pa la// rdo rje rgya gram nag po bri// gzas pa'i ling+ga gzhag par bya// de nas
42a5(rnying rgyud): tsho ma can// bam po bsgreng dang gu gsum brtsig/ drag chu khrag gis byug par bya// gzhan yang rak+ta'i ar+g+haM dang // sman phud til dmar 'bru bshos dang // mtsho thun lcags phye zangs phye dang // rdo phye rug chu 'bru nag po// sha chen rus pa gtub pa dang // de dag
42a6(rnying rgyud): sogs mdun du gzhag/ gos nag kyod zheng thod nag bcing // rak+sha'i phreng ba se ral kha// dpral bar me long zhing gi stan// rus sbal 'dug stangs lho phyogs blta// lcags sam mi rkang gzar bu thogs// dri chen dri bu gos dum gyis// sa la dmigs pa'i
42a7(rnying rgyud): byas la// snying gar ming dang rus bcas gzhug/ gzhan yang ming yig mang po dang // mi bsad mtshon gyis lirna gtub// dum bu de dang ming pyad de// sha chen gtub pa re sreg la// drag po'i sngags kyis bros la brdeg/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni// ting 'a
42b1(rnying rgyud): gsum chag bshad dang // bcas pa phrin las gzhung bsrang bya// oM sa b+hA wa s+'ub+h+yaHsa rbartarmas zla bab mya ny+dzan/ chos rnams stong ba'i rang bzhin sbyang // da yi dang bsang ca lha// ya btaka gas la bsgoms te// 'am jug phyag kyang banaganyis // tan dang /
42b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bsgom// zab khung e las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas lang // drag po 'bar pa'i gang+gAs sregs la bar bsgom// lugs marngon gsheng nag ga rjob pa'i po// rlung ga yab nag pos g.yab pa'am// drag po sngags kyi rab tu sar// ma'i nang du ri dag yi
42b3(rnying rgyud): rgyad dang cha lpags nag po gsal bar bsgom// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phro 'dus gnas nas kyang // 'od nar lhams kyis ye shes me lha de// spun drangs gnyis su med par bzhugs par bsam// me yi lha nyid sngags 'dis spyan drangs te// oM ak+She ha \u0f7fdzaH/
42b4(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f su 'dog drag por skyes kham pa 'ad// dral 'di rtsod sde lnga 'khyil/ la gi yam gal sdang la// ning gi mimag la gyi thal// zhing gi pags pas na g.yogs bgyi sa// srul dag gis ni gong med bgyis// phyag nardo lathab
42b5(rnying rgyud): bsdams// dbul me mthod 'chings shing // me pang 'bar ba klong na bzhugs// shar gyom rnams nas gnyis su med par bzhugs// de nas yang / oM pra mo ha/ pra moH/ zhes pas me yi mdun ba ste zung ba'i// pra mo ta spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/
42b6(rnying rgyud): dang pon tu smin rgyal mtshan bsdams pa/ g.yas par man ye shes kyi byi mgal bskams pa/ g.yon dang pon myed bsdams pa/ da ma gnyis gnyis dril bu bsnams par bsgom// bskul zhing dzin las btsal/ bsreg rdzas dbul/ a g+ne dmang ser mo'i
42b7(rnying rgyud): 'ang byud/ dab sa dug pa gsu / das sa das dpa gshing kyi ga ngas din 'ad// / shi dag //
43a1(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i rgya// dag na mchog dbu'abang smod pa dus// bstan gnyen po 'jig pa la// sngags kyi yang steng 'khrul 'khor ba gad// snod dang ldan la bstan gyun na// 'jam glang nyim shar ba 'dra// snod mi kun lag 'thar na// dus pa
43a2(rnying rgyud): par ni srog zad skems// sngags la bye brag zang bzhugs kyang // rtsa ba'i snying po lngar 'dus te// srug sung thugs kyi snying po dang // yon tan phrin las lda 'dus// bzhi ni nye bar bsnyen pa dang // bslab dang las la sgor la 'jug// zun du grangs shing las
43a3(rnying rgyud): la spyod// las la snor kAr 'bram thag no'o// grangs te ma gnyis pa rba ba shad// tha ma phrin las spring po ni// las la sbyor ba'i sngags kyang gdab// thugs kyi yang thugs nyi ma pa'i// nang ga spang ba gsum drug spangs// de la gsu gas ma pa ba shad/
43a4(rnying rgyud): kau nyis bzhi pa la// yi ge 'bru brgyad g.yon du bskor// phyi yi dang ni bzhi snying dril la bskod// gyi legasang bar bskor ba'o// bzhi sting dril lag yas su bskor// nang pa gas ma du dbang ni// rgya yi dus su bdor ba ni// sarbo tig bzung dun po'o// nga
43a5(rnying rgyud): 'i// lam med bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bstod ta bzlas pa'o// nang gi gsung bar bskor bani// yal med lasogs// ga'athab rlu ban ga yas bzho// gsang pa gas yang bye ba sa// hUM lings du bskur / 'dra' pa'i ngag
43a6(rnying rgyud): bcu bdun pa// g.yon du bskor ta bkur ba'o// gsang ba'i nang du skor ba ni// gsang ba'i drug sngags bcu bdun pa// g.yas su bdun bskor bgrang ba'o// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// rtswa ba dam chog yang snying ni// las la spong ba'i ngas su yang // de /
43a7(rnying rgyud): dri la la nub mo bzlas// AM a kro ta ka ya man+ta/ a mraka/ ya ma rAng / a mra// sid ma ya a muka/ ya ma dan/ a mraka/ Na yo da ya/ ama? ka/ yad yo ni/ a suka/ ra ya k+Sha ya/ a mr-ika/ yak+She yats+tsha/ a mraka/ nidA pra ya/
43b1(rnying rgyud): yang 'dug
43b2(rnying rgyud): a mu ka/ oM ts+tsha Sh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA nan hU~M hUM phaT/ sa ma ya/ gIr+m+mAHsa ma ya/ rak+Sha badz+ras ma ya/ sa ma ya/ oM oM d+hi ma ma / oM wA ga~M sh+tsa mr-i/ rba ba nyi ma shar ltang grangs// me bye ga gzan la btum ltang grangs// dam thag yog bdu drug la// dz+dzadz+dzaHla sogs
43b3(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams ni// btson bu lugs su bcug ltar grangs// bsrib pa'i gzhi rtsa dam tshig sngags// gzhi snying gcig tu dril ba dang // dbyangs kyi yi ge lI lI'i tshe// skyes bu go mtshon bstar ltar grangs// nyi ma bzhi pa g.yon du nyin bdun bskor// ru 'dril sngags suM a ru ka
43b4(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi gzer bu btab ltar grangs// a mu ka yi tshe dgu pa// gser gyi thog chen brgyab ltar grangs// g.yas su bskor dang ka pa ye// spa kri so 'debs bzhin du grangs// gdags pa so so'i sgo yi sngag la// nyin gyi las su drag sngags grangs// nub mo dril sngags ka
43b5(rnying rgyud): ye// mtshon rtags sbyar la rab tu bsrub// de dag don rnams man ngag sbyar// a kro te ka rgyun gyi sngags// de dag bsgrub pa'i dus su yang // mi lus phra men mgo can rab// sun dang bran kho la pha ma dang // mchod rten chen por ston pa dang // me chen rtag tu 'bar ba
43b6(rnying rgyud): dang // rgya mtsho dag la mi nub rnams// de dag ma byung bar du grangs// bslab pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang // sbyor ka nyi ma bzhi la 'jug/ khug pa'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang // g.yas skor gsang pa'i drag sngags dang // nub dril drag sngags las la 'dug/
43b7(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i lha rnams ma grub par// phrin las sngakra kyang chud zos pas// lha grub nas ni las drag bya// khugs nas de dag g.yas bskor bya// de ltar byas nas gdon mi za// gshin rje gshed pos gsungs pa'i don// mkhrugs parare du g.yas bskor na/
43b8(rnying rgyud): lha rnams drid nas las mi 'grub// thugs nas g.yos skor byed dus su// g.yon bskor byas nas sngags log nas// rnal 'byor 'khor du gyen du 'gyur// r-I rdus drug pa'i dwag+sa sa sman// sngags pa dang nyid 'chi bar bshad// sa ma ya dag sa
43b9(rnying rgyud): las 'di gang gi sngags 'bugs na/ yang 'dun
44a1(rnying rgyud): bsrungs na// cha brag par chad dag tu 'gyur// dbang du ma 'dus byug lag // dbyangs kyi yi ge bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin zhenan slad chung garjod// chos nyid dag lan ba kyang gtad // mkham pa la lpags dragan// drud na
44a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ldog 'dra dam tshig khrugs chung na// ro lus chen po bya bar gsungs// gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad gsungs// sngags bdun 'gyur sngags dag gi tshad ma ni// bdag gi tshad ma dag ni ting nge 'dzin// yang yeng seng ser byed na ya mi 'a
44a3(rnying rgyud): myos shing gnyid che 'thibs pa ni// sgrib pas phog pas bshags pa bya// snying 'phyo mi dga' sngags nor dang // 'bru chad ma tshad pas bshad// tshig tsheg gsalan theb pa yin// dga' zhing gsal na 'grub pa yin// dgra bo'i tshad ma bka' stsal pa// mi
44a4(rnying rgyud): migs 'thing ba ni// rgyab garten yong bas srung mi grub// bdag pas lo ga zor mthon// brgyab pas ma mang bkang babrog // g.yag brang nas gsangan lo 'gror// ting 'dzin gas la zhing dngos blang na// lo phreng chun gyid 'grub par bshad// ting
44a5(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing 'tsheg byed na// zla ba tshun chod 'chi bar bshad// de ni mi 'gyur ba yi rtags// phyi ma rnams ni yid mi brtan// g.yon gyi dril sngags dam tshig yang snying las// sngags 'di dril la bya bar bshad// rtsa ba yang steng drug po dang // 'bru dgu po'i
44a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang // de dag nye bar bsnyen pa na// srog gi rtsa ba mjug sdud do// yang snying bsgrub dang las bsgrub pa'o// dbyangs dang dam tshig de kho nyid// las de gang byed mjug la gdags// spro 'bog lpags pa ldog pa dang // tshe lag blang 'thab gzer nang dang //
44a7(rnying rgyud): gangs sring nga du / ba ma thabadug sa // ga ma do ga sa kyi / gyi mi byang sadrag gas// mam zug sa thong da/ la gang byad pa brag sadru
44b1(rnying rgyud): 'brur btags pas 'thab par bshad// b+h+yonas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// nyams su lon dang gsang rgyob dang // su yang rung sro tshom med// bzlas pa las su rung ba dang // brdabs shing sngags pas 'grub par bshad// ces pa gsheng pos rab tu bshad// dpag
44b2(rnying rgyud): bla gsang nag po'i chud las/ sngags kyi yang snying ngarnal 'khor kyi skabs te le'u mo bzhi pa'o// / de nas gas pa las kyi yang snying 'di gsungs so// bslab pa'i dkyil 'kho ze ba yang // 'khor lo bzhi la ba son pa ni// 'khor po bcad
44b3(rnying rgyud): 'aral pi bcad// gong ras rdo rje ba tson dang // ral gri la sogs dgod par bya// rdornga drug gi rtse mo la// mAr ya yi ming dang rdzas// grags ma nang du yin gzhag/ zlag ma gas ma la rdzas gzhag pa// nug po dag la jug tu dag ke/ dmar po dag pa
44b4(rnying rgyud): khrag kun gzhag/ ser po dag la nyung rji gzhag/ 'khor lo de dag bdog kyang // grer shi'i khrag gis dmar por l+h+wag/ med nar dkar gnyang nag gi// khrag gis dmar por byug par b+h+ya// yang nur rog glang dog gam// khyi nag snying dkar kha
44b5(rnying rgyud): shes bya// gsad pa las kyi sngags dang bzlas// oM A~M ya ma ka/ ya ma rA dzA pAd ma ya/ ya mi do ru Na yod ya/ yad yo ni ra ya b+h+re ya/ yak+She ya d+hi n+ye d+ha mA ya/ dang bo'itsit+ta la ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oMr+g+haM pad+ma ya ma dzo / ya D+gad kA
44b6(rnying rgyud): kang ting / bang drang da/ bshad+hA gal zad dang / des na dzong / e hrI ma rnam par ba d+hAl po d+hI thA / snying lnga rag sa ma la tha ma'i lazang / yi mdu rjes ma la khrag 'do ma y-i/ drab ba'i byud pa la bar gor ba la zang / ya 'a
44b7(rnying rgyud): ya/ ya da pra ShA la/ snying gi tshod gcig m-i steng rtsa la wa ya rbad/ do du ma la ces bajog go// gas pa las kyi yang sbri ni/ ya ta me yis gsad do// gshin rdzo bya tsa la/ sid+ha ye/ sr-i ta me/ mamog/ tsat+ta la/ b+ha tsa la/ ha la la/
45a1(rnying rgyud): 'bru dgra gsang ba'i ngan sngags 'di// yang snying gsang ba nam mkha'i thog dang 'dra// dpal zla gsang rtag pa'i rgyad las/ yang snying gsang ba'i skabs rta mardzumo lnga pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das lag
45a2(rnying rgyud): chen pos 'di skad gsungs so// a A/ i sAM/ u A/ e ai/ r-i r-I/ la lAM/ o au/ aM a/ ka khag b+ha nga/ che da dz+hata/ TAHTAnA Na/ ta rba da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ yang le wa/ shangs hak+Sha/ sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor man nga/
45a3(rnying rgyud): mye nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// de la gsum gsum dgu ru bshad// phyi yi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// ti ma dang po dag la yang // ya ma rA dzas do me ya/ a mu kaM pra ma ya nr-i sha ku ru hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang // ya ma do draH yod pa/
45a4(rnying rgyud): ka rak+ta Na ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang // ya da yo ne ra ya k+She ya/ a mu ka mAd tsA ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi padag la yang / yak+She yar+d+ha ne drA ma ya/ a mu ka ma rA ya hUM phaT/ de dag las kyi mthang sdad ni// kr-i ta ka pa sAn+ta ka
45a5(rnying rgyud): nr-i sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ces bzlas te/ las kyi mtha' sdad nyi ma bzhi pa'i kha skong ngo // phye yi nang du grangs pa ni/ ya ma rA dza sa do ma ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ yad yo nI ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ni dA ma ya/ gzhi snying dril lag yon du drang /
45a6(rnying rgyud): gsang par grangs pa ni// ya ma ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dz+nyA ni yo ta ya/ ya yon ru do ma ya/ ya me dos dzaR+Sha ma ya/ gzhi snying dril la g.yas su bskor// nang gi phyi ltar grangs pa ni// rtse ba mi dgyur snying po ste// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa ni/
45a7(rnying rgyud): a mo te ka ya bAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han rdo hU~M phaT/ nang gi nang du drang ba ni// nye bar bsgrub pa zhes kyang bya// las la myong ba'i snying po khri yang bzlas// ya ma med k+She ra tsas do ru Na lo ne ra ya trUM ne/ nang gi gsang bar drang pa ni// 'phye bo'i 'gros zhes bya ba dang /
45b1(rnying rgyud): ba phrin las gsang pa la// ya ma rnyed ma N+ya ya ra ni yo Na ru das nga/ zhes g.yas skor du grangs so// gsang ba'i phyi ltar grangs pa ni// bsrub pa'i drag sngags 'bru bdun pa// g.yon du 'bru bdun grangs par bya// nyi ma dang podag la yang // ya ma rA dza dang
45b2(rnying rgyud): ma ngas do me ya// rAdzas do me ya ma// dza sa do me ya ma na// sa do mA ya mya ngo // to ma ya ma mangs// me ya ma dwangs do// nyi ma dang pol gi khri bzlas// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang // ya me do ra Na yod// med do Na yod ya// dodra Na yad ya me// rA/
45b3(rnying rgyud): ya modo// Na yo da ya me do ru// yod ya modo ru Na// dA ya mamodo ru Na yo// nye ma gnyis par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang // yad yo ni ra ya k+She// dang ni ya ya k+She ya// yo ni ra yak+She yad// ni ra yak+Sha yang yo// ra lak+She yad yoni// ya Ne yang
45b4(rnying rgyud): yo ni ra// k+She yang yo na ra ya// nye ma gsam par khri khri bzlas// nyi ma bzhi padag la yang // ya k+She ya ts+tshi nai rA ma// k+She ya ny+tsa ni dA ma ya// yar+d+ha ni ra ma ya Te// skyone rA ma ya n+te la// ni ra mA ya k+She yadz+dza// rA ma ya k+She ye d+he ne// ma ya k+She li ts+tshi ni \u0f7f// nyi ma banA
45b5(rnying rgyud): khribazlas// g.yon du mgo gcod de bzhin bskor// dang po'i nub mo grangs pa ni// ya ma med k+She hrIHhrIHa mu ke che ge mo pra ma ya rbad la// nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni// ra dzes de Sh+Tha hrIHa mu ki che ge mo k+Sha tsar ya rbad la/ nub gsum pa la grangs pa ni// drar+Na
45b6(rnying rgyud): a mra ki che ge mo mu tsa ma rbad ya/ nu bzhi pa la grangs pa ni// rA ngo yar+d+ha ni k+Shi d+hIHsa mu ga che ga mo b+ha ra ya rbad ya/ gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// gsod pa'i drag sngags bdun pa ste// g.yas su bdun skor grangs par bya// yam dA ni dzA la r+the// mar+d+ha ni dz+ha la ny+dza pa//
45b7(rnying rgyud): dz+ha ya k+She yam// ni R+Sha ya k+Sho yam hA// pa tre la ma de// ya hwe la ma ni // k+Sha ya ma rje snob// nyi ma gnyis pa man chad la// g.yas su bskor bas ster yang gcod// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// du ba ni dang por grangs par bya// ya ma k+She me ts+liSh+TiHkas yod za ba'i
46a1(rnying rgyud): ya zad ya// nub gnyis pa la grangs pa ni// d+ha ni m+b+ha ya tI b+h+yAMk+Shaka sa ye dag par k+Sha tsar ya rbad la/ nub gsum pa la grangs pa ni// rAn man k+ShoSh+ThaHka sa ya dgra ba ru tsa ya rbad ya/ rngub bzhi pa la grangs pa na// nganas
46a2(rnying rgyud): sa ya/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig yang snying las la sbyor// bzhi snying gcig tu dril ba ni// gsang ba'i gsang bar grangs pa ni// drag po ga nam thus zhes kyang bya// dusaM dang tshes dang las zad dang // bsod nams zad dang skal ba zang // yi ge za
