46a3(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba'o// de ltar byas na sun su// gan gang la byas kyang rung // ru khugs chen po zhes kyang bya// drag po stag mchongs zhes kyang bya// bya rog khu 'phrig ces kyang bya// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la 'jug/ nyi ma dang po dag la yang // tshangs pa'i mgo bcad bskor
46a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// sngags dang be con phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang // kha nas khrag skyugs gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang lus dral phyag rgya bca'// nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang // tsit+ta gzer du gzhug pa'i phyir// sngags dang snying gshag phyag rgya
46a5(rnying rgyud): 6'a// nyi ma bzhi pa dag la yang // gzugs phung brlag par bya ba'i phyir// mA ra ya nyid gdon mi za// sngags dang 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bca'// rlung rlung drag po'i sngags rgod la// dang po dag la lha bsnyen pa// sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pas bsnyen// khugs pa
46a6(rnying rgyud): tags rnams byung ba dang // gzas pa dgug pa'i las byas te// nyi ma dang po dag la yang // ya ma rA dros do ma ya/ che ge mo ni A kaR+Sha ya hUM // nyi ma gnyis pa dag la yang // ya me do ru Na yo da ya che ge mo sa pra d+han sA kar+ha ya d+dA ra/ nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang /
46a7(rnying rgyud): da yo ni ri yak+Sha ya che ge mo tri yaM nr-i ma A kaR+sha ya hUM // nyi ma bzhi bdag la yang // yak+She ya nr-i ni rA ma ya che ge mo rU pa skan+ta A kaR+Sha ya hUM ngaM/ de nas dbye ba'i las bya ste// nyi ma dang po dag la yang // srog lha dag dang dbye bar bya// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung du la// mA ra ya yi
46b1(rnying rgyud): babs dpas pa na su dang // gnan yang sa yang gnagag da na// gtam pa dgas pa nga/ gsus padaga' stsa / nga // ban pa dag 'a du// das dag /
46b2(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang // nyung dkang dag la bsngags shing brdeg/ ya mA n+ta kags la bsgoms pa// phur ba dag gis brdeg par ba// mA r+tha mAr yang ya ba sgying ya ma khrag tshal ba/ ba ma la dum bu mjug shin de dag po de bsre khrag dag po gar yang / oMn mar ni thaMd la
46b3(rnying rgyud): tsa be tA lI kro d+hI shari snyed mgo tshod/ rtsal zhen khrag la mgo chod// khrag la kI li kI la ya ba ma ri la zad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me dun b+ho/ ya me do ru me ya/ yad yo ni snying la kle ya me ba ma ri la zad/ rab tu khros te phung pa brdegs// gang la bu ba rdzogs med kyis/
46b4(rnying rgyud): stobs bdag pos rab tu zung // dpal zla gsang nag po'i rlung las/ 'khrul 'khor ban ngag gi skabs te le'u so drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// nyon cig kyang
46b5(rnying rgyud): zhegardo rje 'dzin pa khyod// thugs kyi snying po ka bzheg drung brgyad 'das// mnor bzlas na ci yang 'grub par nges// ya ma ra dza'i snying po kA ba gcig pa dri// ya ma rA nga sa do ma ya/ myos byed 'bang ba'i snying po ka ba gnyis pa la// ya mdo dra Na yo da ya/
46b6(rnying rgyud): mchu'i snying po ka ba gsum pa la// ya~M ta yo na ra ya k+She ya/ ral pa tshar dgu'i snying po ka ba bzhi pa la/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ne nA ma ya/ de ni 'degs pa'i ka ba bzhi pa ste/ tshangs pa'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang // lus dang lto ba bzhi nas 'dugs// yang na yang
46b7(rnying rgyud): lag bzhi nas 'joms// gdung brgyad rlag byed 'joms pa'i las// rtsa chen brgyad dang rnam shes brgyad// de dag rim gyis 'joms par byed// ya ma rAngs do ma ya/ ya mdor Na yod ya/ yad yo na ba ya k+Sha ya/ ya k+Sha ya ts+tshini rA ma ya/ zhes paka/
47a1(rnying rgyud): bzhi gdung brgyad do// gdung re la yang ka chen bzhi// bu rlung bzhi dang rtsa chen bzhi// ka bzhi rtswa rlung bzhi yang 'joms// gdung brgyad rtsa chen brgyad kyang 'joms// ya m+b+han+ta ka/ ya ma dA dza sa do me ya/ ya me doru Na yod ya/ yang ngo rnga
47a2(rnying rgyud): yak+She ya/ ya k+She ya d+ho ni rA mo ya/ ya la sogs pa bcu gnyis ni// ya mAn+ta ka yab yum gnyis// phyogs spyod bcu yi snying po yin// phyi ma lha gzhan snying po ste// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// 'phrul gyi yig 'bru sum cu gnyis// ya sgrogs brgya dang zhes
47a3(rnying rgyud): kyang grags// tshogs brgyad 'joms pa'i phung sri ste// ye shes lha yi snying po dang // 'jigs byed lha srin kun gyi snying po ste// shin tu gsang bar gshed pos bshad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ ka bzhi gdung brgyad kyi skabs te le'u mo bdun pa'o/
47a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ thugs gsang ba 'bru shag grong khyer 'di gsungs so// ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ !/ ni/ rA/ ma/
47a5(rnying rgyud): ya/ ma/ rA/ dzo/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ ya/ k+Sha/ ya/ ts+tsha/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ ya/ ma/ rA/ dza/ sa/ do/ me/ ya/ ya/ me/ do/ ru/ Na/ yo/ da/ ya/ ya/ da/ yo/ ni/ ra/ ya/
47a6(rnying rgyud): ya/ ya/ k+She/ ya/ b+h+yo/ ni/ rA/ ma/ ya/ yi ge gshin rje'i 'bru shag ste// yi ge gAshin rje'i 'bru shag yin// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu zung // 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'bu shag grong khyed kyi skabs te le'u mo brgyad pa'o// / de rdzas
47a7(rnying rgyud): yang 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung gi rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed po des/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces sbas so// snyigs ma lnga la brten pa'i dus// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba yin// zas dang gnas dang gos la sogs// phyin ci log la spyod pa'i
47b1(rnying rgyud): ngal bstan pa byung bas na// srang ma lta thar rtag pa byed// drag po gnang la 'bebs pa'i na// me ng+ga rtsa zad lta bu 'thar pa 'do// bsdebs pas 'thab par pocos med// yam lag nanan 'das par dmang rgyag sa ston/
47b2(rnying rgyud): dbyar med sems kyis brtan par rung // dkon mchog rgyal mtshan lta zung tshugs// zhes gsungs so// me ste phreng ba lta bung bka' stsal to// oM na mar ni ma dang / ya mA snyed/ ye ma khAg// rdul pa khod ma/
47b3(rnying rgyud): dpad+ma ma pra hU~M phaT/ yu ma d+hA dza mdo ma ya/ bzlas so shA steng babs// ya ma d+hu la 'thag/ bra ma dri la zad/ ya ma ma do mU ya/ yam da nyid dos ma/ yam rjem pa la rban
47b4(rnying rgyud): mar snying la thAg/ ro sha snying bai ri la zad/ ya ma rA dza nA thag thibs zad/ ya ma dA da tsa mrag thibs zad/ ya ma dang tses pa dal zad/ ya ma rA re tsa gling du ya zad/ ya mA rA dza tse myangs bying ma ya trab rdul skyed mgo chod/ @
47b5(rnying rgyud): la po tshol pa snyid kyi po ladzad/ yA mA rA b+h+r-ik+Sh+mI ya mA d+ha ga ta snying khrag por lazad/ ya ma dI klong la tsir ba ri la chud// ya ma rA da gro na mchin rtsadz+wa la/ mAHkha snying rtsa pra ma ya/ oM hrIn d+ha/ sti hUM phaT/ dze bin hU~M phaT/ oM ka
47b6(rnying rgyud): ta ya ha nyan po man tsa tita ma hUM badz+ra/ oMts+tshi hU~M ra ts+tsha wAnas/ nI ga ga ni Am+b+haka rbad la b+h+rUM phaT/ oM m+b+ha mAr ragA tsa ri ma maH ta rA ya nAM sha sarba dz+nyA phan+da/ ar+thakrA rba ya dz+nyA phaT/ ma tsi we te pa m+bA ran+ta yon shes dza na
47b7(rnying rgyud): karba yau hU~M Shadza/ oM kri swer tsam ta \u0f7fra tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni a mu ka rba ya hU~M phaT/ oM mr-i ta ma tsa tsa~M ma dag su ra ya ni shwa ku ru ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oM mrag+ni r+g+haM pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni ma mr-i ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ aiSh+mi Sh+TaM ma mu ka bar tse ya na
48a1(rnying rgyud): sha krarba ni a mu ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ oMg+niSh+Tha a mu ka rak+ta tsar ya ni dra sha kra ni a mu ka rbad ya phaT/ oMhrIHSh+ThaHa rba ka mA ra ya ni sha kA ru sha ku ru nI arba ka rbad ya hUM phaT/ ar+dz+dzany+dza a kra kam+ba rAH
48a2(rnying rgyud): ra tha ra ya hUM phaT/ rA dzas do ma ya/ do ru Na yo da ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ tsa ya do ma ya/ ru Na yod na/ ni ra yak+She yai tsa ne rA ma ya/ sa dau me ya/ Na yo da ya/ ra ya k+Sha ya/ ni rA ma ya/ ra ma ya da ma
48a3(rnying rgyud): ya/ ya da ya/ ya k+She ya/ dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba bran sngags kyi le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed po des/ mtshon cha 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
48a4(rnying rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / yum ro langs thal mdog mas/ thugs ka'i yi ge las re ma ti gsum bton nas spos/ gsum gyi bye brag las/ rak+ta 'i rba klong dang / ke rus kyi re rab dang / zhing gi
48a5(rnying rgyud): chu bas/ stong gsub kyi stong gang bar sprul te/ bskor ba lan du ma byas nas mchod pa phul lo// bstan pa yun du gnas pa la dmigs te/ ral ba gsegs rdo gsor nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e maho// 'jigs byed chen po lags/
48a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yun du gnas pa dang // rnal 'byor can la phan bya'i phyir// nong bye drag sngags bshad du gsol// zhes lus so// dkon mchog rgyal mtshon ltar bya'i phyir// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thugs la dri la 'a'i rgod kyis sngags// bshad
48a7(rnying rgyud): pa khyi ba'i nyen par byos// a ho// oM rna mar ni ma dang/ rtsal pra ma nan/ mar yang ngo / che ge moHla khwa// skyed pa na/ s+phoHla Ta// bloHla zad/ tha~Mr l-i pi 'i rbad/ oM ni mar ni/ rtsal can rje dag pan/ kun
48b1(rnying rgyud): man pa dam // dag pa sa dang// / k+Shag rdzad// nan/ na / smra
48b2(rnying rgyud): da bdun to/ rtsam than/ dgra po slar la dang / 'di ni zhe sdang kun gyi bcud// phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gas pa bsgom zhing // li tshul dang ldan byas la// dag song thogs kyis bebs pa gdag
48b3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ ces gsungs so// 'jigs byed rgyal pos yang gsungs pa/ dril brgod kyi sngags khrag gzer nag po ni/ mtshan mang bcas pa'i la rnags la bab la// phyag bstan pa'i sems mngon pa ga dang /
48b4(rnying rgyud): oMn mar ni mar dra/ khrag la khug/ snying ma rtogs/ snying khrag tshul pa pa la zad/ khrag tag shag shA/ snying la khug// bu ri la rbad/ khrag thig/ rag zhi ba ding zad/ khrag mgo rtogapa/ tha~M ri la dzad/ 2
48b5(rnying rgyud): shing / khrag snying la bar haM/ rmugs nad/ rje rol rgyang / oM dA mar ni/ khrag sha drol/ khrag tu ri la chud/ khrag ro tsa la po ri ya rbad/ dgra po mA ra yang / oM ni mar/ dzaM mar du/ khrag bya / wAg
48b6(rnying rgyud): khra/ khrag lang la/ skye ba badzad/ ge mgo lA~M bA/ dz+hA pazad / nag po snyid lA/ yA ga sha ba~M dI la zad/ mchin+da tsa tshogs/ partsam tsam/ bla ma'i 'dzad/ !/ nan nA/ rtsal ma pa
48b7(rnying rgyud): nad/ ba la zad/ drag zo ster ya sha ba mdzad/ drug pa de kun snying la kha bor 'dzi/ nag po sun snying ba ma kha'i/ nag po sha ba ni/ b+ha bi'i la zad/ rnag ba hi yod pa dang / na po d+ha na da/
49a1(rnying rgyud): zag rtsal radapa' das bsnong la dang / dgra pa nying la sbyar rkar bar ldabyung / hral tra la snang 'dra rang sasu du la dang/ yang na lnga dang lpags sa zhugs/ yang nam pa zhing 'dugs pag du
49a2(rnying rgyud): yang na rtsal dgu chung chod// yang na don snying thal par rlog/ yang na mdo dang 'dzum bu thong // oM hI many+dzan be swa ya ma/ dgra bo'i snying lagrar glang pa ri la zad/ her tri har the bo la rbad/ pra ha ra pa har ba de la zad rben
49a3(rnying rgyud): du ngi ri la rbad/ hu ra shu hu ru sha ba da li rbang / trag ka ri ka bi bi ri la zad/ ka rbad/ ha ra tsa ra nan/ ha ra tsir nan/ prA hur bai ri la rbad/ kra yA ha kra ya ha/ sA du lu l+le 'adz+ra ta tsur ta bi ril zad / swe sha sre shas shwa we sha ka badz+rang
49a4(rnying rgyud): rmer ti/ 'grar gu pa ri la dzad/ tsaM du ra tsa dur/ sle she bi ri la rbad/ oM ya k+She ya hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM tsa ma tsa ya hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma 'a hU~M phaT/ oM ya ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM ya ya mar hUM phaT/ oM yang ni hUM ya
49a5(rnying rgyud): yon du me dos tsa ma lAM phan/ oM ma me dA k+She tsa nI ya hUM phaT/ ya med k+She ma rba dA yo hUM phaT/ ya da k+She ma me ne r+yA ya hU~M phaT/ ya k+She ma med sa tsam do hU~M phaT/ oM ya k+She me med nir ya hU~M phaT/ oM ya k+She ya tsa ni ra tsan pA da sa do me ya hU~M gad+ha/
49a6(rnying rgyud): rba ner yak+She yA hUM baT/ oM ya ma mdzes do ru Na yod ya ng+kuwaT/ oM yid mo nA da ma tsan+ti ra ma ya hrI paT+Ta/ oM ma ta~M dz+nyA nA ta ya ka ta ba na ma r+tha t+ya ka hU~M phaT/ oM ta ma h+ya ta d+h+waM/ kro ting ka ma tsa maH/ aka tan da tra~M phaT/ oM ta ta la ba hU~M rar+tha/
49a7(rnying rgyud): ma \u0f7f/ thomag gyul ba/ srog la de ba snying rdza da/ cheg ma ma/ g+sa/ byang rgya tshal ma tho ladrang / ye ma da mang la sod par na zang mdzad/ adang shas pas// ma med dang / gas pa kA
49b1(rnying rgyud): shos/ rtsa ro la ya g.yos/ ro la rtsam pa del rbad/ khrag la rtsa snyed la shas pa ri la rbad/ dgra bo mAr ya bi ri la zang / ya ma rA dzas do ma ya/ ya mar dza snyed do ru me ye ya/ yang man snying la do ru me ya/ bai ri la zad/
49b2(rnying rgyud): yag sha ya a kaM a kaM ke a kaM/ snying la rtsa ro me bai ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dza thun tsal rod pa khrug/ thi ri la rbad / snying la rga sha me bai ri la rbad/ ya ma rA dze tsakr-i steng la tsi tse/ nan nan/ srogs srogs/ mugs mugs/
49b3(rnying rgyud): drag po khrag TuM ri la rbad/ oM g+h+rik+ShIHya ya mA r+ha ka/ shri many+dzu a pho many+dzu ye/ be ta li che ge mo ro la tsit+ta snying la rnyog pa/ rtsa la rog pa la khrag/ kro d+h+ye shwa rI be ta li khrag khug/ bai ri la rbad/ ya ma rU dza srog rtsal be/ e mahA
49b4(rnying rgyud): snying khug/ srog la rgal pa de bai ri la zang / ni mA ra ya 'dod pa mA ra ya/ 'dod pa mA ra ya tahAM dza / oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza/ be ta li kro d+hi shwa rI snying kha rag/ sa ma ya bruM ri la zad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ khrag las do me ya
49b5(rnying rgyud): khrag las do ru me ya/ klad pa wa ha ri ho ra bi ri la drad/ oM kI li kI la ya/ khrag thigs pa ri la zad/ subs thibs rbad/ subs ri la rbad/ yi du ya rbad/ ba shaM du rbad/ khrag sha du ya rbad/ khrang pra khrad kra bi ri la rbad /
49b6(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta ro la shin+ta/ snying la tsa tsa na na/ gshin rje pho nya snying rag/ glo snying la khug/ dgra bo mA ra ya baM ri la rbad/ bdud pra ma ya/ bdud pra ma ya bdud snying mgo chod/ du ru du ru/ ha rti ha rti/ dgra bo'i snying la dza dza/ nag po tsa ti ya dgra
49b7(rnying rgyud): snying rtsal ba ra la zad/ nA ga krod+b+ha shradI snying la tsa ba la/ rdzag trag ma trag shi dgra la hU~M t+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo de kun gro d+hi shwa rI snying khrag hU~M ril byo/ rba tra rag mo ru lu tsa pa ya/ srog sha kro dz+nyi shwa rI bru~M ri la rbang / oM na mo ne reg sha mo khrag long kha/

50b2(rnying rgyud): po ca g+hoH larngan/ khrag na la nan/ khrag khag/ tha~M las yang / badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ gshed rje nag pa de can kyang po mazad / oM badz+rA hrI hrI la ya/ snying la nag por gnag pa de pan snying le 'bogs 'apogs shig na
50b3(rnying rgyud): d+ham rgya la ma laM/ lAng yang nag po dag thab tu thab sha/ bu ril li li mA rA ya zad/ zag mo ma hA sha~M kun sngan/ dgra snyed la pad+ma dar tri/ nag po ri ma ti / yid de med de/ srabasrab/ swarba sa rba/ tA shA'i srid la
50b4(rnying rgyud): blon po dag steng la kha lo kha/ nag pa can snying la ba la bang / tra nags pa ta li/ e nan badz+ra kraShAM shwa ti/ snying 'dod pa rtsab ri la zad/ dang bo mA ra yang / a to// 'jigs byed chen pos 'di ska gsungs so// nyon ci gzung dzig
50b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin// ngas gsungs pa la rtseg cig tan// ma ltar dril ba rgod kye drag po'i chags// 'di ni mA ra ya yi smin ma'i mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por gsal ba las// g.yas g.yon TI za'i dkyil 'khor shes// nag po gdu/
50b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phu pa la// raHsa thugs la phra pal// gdab pa gsum du thebs par gdab// oM ni mar ni/ ya ma drA ya ma snying / ya mkhrag tshal ba bi ril/ du ma bu bum pa ri la druM phaT/ badz+ra bI li tri la ya/ nag po ti btsog shanan/ ShAn
50b7(rnying rgyud): rol ba/ dgram pa ya ngaM/ oM Tadz+ra kA li kI la ya nag po rtsepa snying laphod pa badz+ra/ sha ga shag nan/ khrag kyi'i la rbad/ oM shrI many+dzu t+kA rag shA rol khrag gri ril chad/ nag po de kun snying la khrag zu la zad/ oM trim tra dag po de bung
51a1(rnying rgyud): ba la chad/ e mad+h+ya dag po drar kA rol pa/ dab bo ma ya dang / nag pa dkun snyid rtsal tsa ba ladun no/ oM thim thu dag po bag hAng/ bAn 'dzang/ a N+Da ma tho ba// la nas nga
51a2(rnying rgyud): rol/ khrag 'thung dgra bo mA ra ya Sh+Ta re la rbad/ oM nAM ga ragra krod+d+hi shwa nI/ snying la khrag bre ril zad/ nag po kun tu sgying la thu ri la zad/ ro langs theg 'thung snying mgo mchod/ rtsa la paM/ de sa bo ma ra ya tha~M re la zad/ gang du ba ba'i las
51a3(rnying rgyud): nas// gdug pa ldan pa'i sems kyis bya'o// de ni me ldog er me'i las// zhes gsungs so// dpal zla gas nag po'i chud pas/ ngan sngags rgod kyi le'u skye bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig
51a4(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// nyin cig zung zhig rdo rje 'dzin// snying pa 'don 'di mi spang zhing // rdo rje slob dpon ye dam lha ltar bskur// sngags dang phyag rgya mi 'da' la sogs dpe brgyad shes// rnal 'byor can la mos pa'i sems// thugs la banag
51a5(rnying rgyud): pas gnod med dbyung mi bya// 'di ni rtsab lnga rnams so// khyad par rim pa bstan pa ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya bstan bzhing // lam mi gzur zhing phyag mi bya// gtam mi zla bar sdig mdzub 'phyar// chas brgyad brgyan la bgrod dkar 'gro// de la sogs te du mar bshad
51a6(rnying rgyud): 'da' bsrung babyed mtshig ste// 'di ni mchog gi don du bshad// dba' ba chenapas ba gang pa'i don// 'dras pa'i tshigs kyis 'drar mthed// thos bka' stsal to// dpel thags dag pa rgyang sa/ dmachog mdang bstan pa'i yang ste sgeg gapa'o//
51a7(rnying rgyud): de nas pango bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed rtsen pas 'di srid ces gsungs ma// nyon cig tu zhen rdza na// ngas gsungs pa la sems thang ba// lab zungs kyi mam la// bstan pa 'dzid sto sbed dang gsapa// bskyed pa bshigs pa 'ad na// dran pa
51b1(rnying rgyud): las kyi mthar brab// dus ni rang byung dgra la bya// dus dang khams dang gyur pa dang // rang byung don de bzhi ru 'dod// de la bsgral ba rnam bzhi bya// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin dang // bskal ba'i don de bzhi ru 'dod// des sngon du bsnyen bsrub bya// bzlan/
51b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub seng nas bskal ba ni// 'khor lo dang ni ling+ga dang // nyi ma dang ni gshin rje dang // gsang sngags dang ni ting 'dzin dag dang drug/ 'khor lo la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// 'khor lo de dag re re la// dri dang sgra dang las
51b3(rnying rgyud): dang ni// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin leng+ga dag la gsum// phye nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// lin de dag re de la// rgyu dang bca' dang sna dang las// rang gi ngo bo dag dang lnga'o// de bzhin sngags la d+ham gsum ste// phyi nang gsang bags pa
51b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus// de bzhin drag sngags ra re la// rgyu dang ba tu dang las sngags dang // bzlas dang daro spa dang las// nyi ma la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// nyi ma de dag re re la// rang gi ho bo rgyu dang gnas// skra dang las de rnam pa
51b5(rnying rgyud): wAn// gshin rje la yang rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gshin rje de dag re re la// rang gi po rgya dang sba// gnas dang las te lngang bstan// gshin rje de dag gnas pas na// gshin rje'i grong khyer zhes kyang bya// grong khyed de ru sems can pa
51b6(rnying rgyud): khrid dang dgug dang gnas pas na// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su yin// ting nge 'dzin la rnam gsum ste// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// gsum po de dag re re la// byin brla ba bzlas pa ting 'dzin dang // ngo brgya dang las dang sba// de dag rnam pa drug
51b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod// mdang tha yi mtshan nyid kyang // g.yas dngag yon gyi bye zag gis// 'gro ba'i chos bzhin gcod par byed// drag po'i ngan sngags phung byed 'di// gshin ji gshed pas rab tu bsngags// rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu thang // dpa' rjeg pa
52a1(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyud las/ nag po gsal byed smon ma'i skabs te le wa zhe gnyis pa'o// / gshin rjegashed kyis gsungs pa 'don// nyon cig zung zhig d+hA 'dzin// gsang bang brgyad de 'jug pa'i wang // dag sa
52a2(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// bsnyen bslab dang ni phrin las so// bsnyen pa la yang rnam gnyis te// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga ste// bsod nams bsag par bstan pa dang // bsnyen pa dngos nyid bstan pa'o// thabs dang dgos pa rnam gnyis kyis// bsod nams bsag
52a3(rnying rgyud): cho gar 'dod// jo bo dbye ba nges pa'i tshig/ dgos ched rnam pa bzhi yin no// bsnyen pa'i dbye ba bstan pa yin// bsgrub pa la yang bcu gnyis te// gnas dang brtul zhugs mtshan ma gzhag/ mchod rdzas gzhag dang dngos bu brten// dam tshig ting
52a4(rnying rgyud): dgra 'dra dang // thub pa'i rtags dang thang ba'i thabs// bang jugacad pa'i bgegs dang ni// grub pa'i dris dang sngags pa'i thabs// phyogs pa chen pa jog ste// ngag zlapa 'dzin bcu gnyis rgyas// dang thum thang ba tsho gang 'dod// zin pa sa
52a5(rnying rgyud): rnam gsuMng te// 'khor gro bskor dang mnan pa sreg pa'o// dus dang gang zag bskong ba'i gnas// ngo bo dbye ba des pa'i chog/ 'phong pa tu rkyen mthun pa'i dpe// srub byed grogs dang mthu ba rtson// grung pa 'thabs dang rdzogs pa'i thabs// dbye /
52a6(rnying rgyud): me yi dag/ ces gshin rje gshed pos rab tu brjod// dpal zlags nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi mdo byang gi skabs te le'u zhe gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// dus da
52a7(rnying rgyud): na pal// rmib pa ni srud gra migs// macom med par bsgral bas 'grub// phag sbrul ston dpyid rab la// thi brjini stod byed zeng // gron da pyid ba cung grang phrag pa 'o// rtag thes byang dben dbang shes// dbyang dbang 'bring ba ma
52b1(rnying rgyud): rje 'phrag thar dag rnam ma grug// den mog sheng thaba'i shog/ khyad par nyim 'ig shing gnyis te// dbyang chung 'drag cing dgun du blang // dri ya ngas su gsang bags// zhag ga gshed du byung ba yang // rab bzhal pa
52b2(rnying rgyud): 'brir pong ste la bco lnga la// nachung bzhi yi bcu drug go// ces bzhi bcad dang bcug cig dag/ bco bcwo bcud nyi mu gnyis// ke bu wad hi breng pa// dus ni srod dang 'dro dang // 'di dang namagung grang chung dang // nye byar su rengs shAr ba dang /
52b3(rnying rgyud): batshad dag gi go rim bzhin// de phyir zag shin 'tshal phyir rgya// btsal nas gsod pa'i dus bstan pa// dpyir ra chos bdun dag la shis// 'bring po bcu bdun dag la shis// tha chung nyi shu bdun la shis// dpu chos brgyad 'bring po ni// brjo / dbang
52b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad// ston ches dgra 'bring po ni// brgya dgrab chu nyi shwa dgu// dgun zags ma yang de bzhin te// rdzas su gsang ba'i las la 'jug/ sa yi khams sa dpyid zla gsum// shing gi dbyar bston bla me// dgun ji lcanas khams 'chi ga dus
52b5(rnying rgyud): dus zhag gshed btu bar bya// rab bzhin ta la gcod// tha chung dus su 'bring bzhi ste// tha rgang khral brdeg par bya// dgun ga rdzam ska ma gsum 'char te// skar ma'i gshed kyi dus su ni// spong ba rnams nang rab na yang // khrag kun la sogs zong rnams
52b6(rnying rgyud): lo dag gi dus bstan nas// dzas myod rnon po bstan par bya// sems can yid ni gzhan log pas// dngas su zhing 'khrims pa'i rtse// kun kyang rnam rtog las byung bas// sbyor ba'i stobs sbed pasad par shes// sha 'grod dang nam gyon de// wag dang ga
52b7(rnying rgyud): ya sh+ya// pag pa thaM dngas bu nyid ni// nyi mthir la chu bar bshad// ngaH nyi ma nu'ag ste// pra b+ha nyi mthor pa rtse// galag dang grang ba srid pa r+tha// rta khA nyi mgung lam+b+ha// de dag grag cing bamed par shes// thun mang bskal ba'i thebs sre gsungs// de ma thob
53a1(rnying rgyud): gi ba sheng dang 'u yi chog thog ma chad/
53a2(rnying rgyud): kyang 'gyur ba'o'o// 'gyur ba'i tha dang mya bya'o// khams cig shed du bstan pa de// sgrub pa po dang loT dang // dus chod kyis ni gsod par byed// keg nig shad pa grong dang srog/ lo ngag bye dang the nyid do// dgu nga byang
53a3(rnying rgyud): rlung gnyis// dus tshod nyin phyed nam byed yol// hal sman gyis gsod 'gyur na// bsrub pa'i sbyor bas spyos ci dgos// khyi 'jug ri yi gshed po ste// phag dang phye ba yod gra nyid// mi mthun pa na thung po tsam med// blug shing ston dpyi ba drang /
53a4(rnying rgyud): zhapa'i na dung rdo rjes gcod// tho rangs sdod la gsod par byed// bsam ngan tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// sbyor bas bdud drud the tshom med// grang la khyi 'phrug shing khams pa// shing dang kha dog 'dra ba ste// gsod pa'i las la the tshom mad// rtag dang
53a5(rnying rgyud): dang ba dgra// bdun zur gshed du gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i mi bzhin gsod par byed// zla gshed srog dang mi mthun pa'o// bdun zur gsod de the tshom med// dus tshod nam phyed dus la shis// shang gi khams te gshed chen po/ 'das pas yi khams la
53a6(rnying rgyud): gcod // lo dgra grang lug gnyis kyis te// me mthun bdun zung shin tu 'joms// dus tshod mtshon ma rang sar shis// de nas mthun 'phrod bshad pa ni// bzung zhing 'thab par bya ba'i las// bdud rtsal nyi ma bdun po la// drag sngags tshogs kyis cham la
53a7(rnying rgyud): bdabab// nyi ma gu sogs bre ru 'byor// ba ma brag zug glabur 'byor// mig dpar lum smad la ldan// gzu' lhag phyog dang spying drug 'jom// spang ba rgyal stong rgyal spang mthun// pasangs rgya gzug tu rung nyid// sred pas ris ga// de ltung mthun spong ba ba
53a8(rnying rgyud): ni// ngan pa'i las kyang 'byung 'gyur bas// dpyir bzang po las la 'jug/ bdud kyi nyim bshad pa ni// ki ma lagasar bya b+h+yor gsum// zla ba rnal spyad bre ru gsod// mig dmar ze dang sgrog gis te// gza' lhag dkrug banyid kyis 'jig/ phur bum/
53b1(rnying rgyud): myong bas ga/ khasangs ma dang lagaso gsupa// srin pa zla ba bdun to// bzang po'i lasu sa gapar 'gyur na// dadapa byams ca na dag pa// bdunang bdung bgad dang // ngan 'dang // sags da zag pa
53b2(rnying rgyud): dang // lag tu mi 'grod gza' lhag dang // mu sogs mi 'phrod bur ba srog/ ba wa sangs dang tho mi 'phrod// glen pa dang ni khram stod dang // de lta'i mi 'thod bdun po la// phan gdags las ni gcig ma 'grub// nyi ma dang ni sag 'jig
53b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang ni bidz+dzi ste// mig dmar sgrog tu 'jig par bstan// gza' lhag b+haH 'jig pa ste// phung bra la ni be'u ji 'jig/ pa wa sangs la byag zhug 'jig/ ldan pa la ni phyam 'jig/ mi 'phrod 'dun dang 'jig pa badz+ran// bdud sde nyi mar
53b4(rnying rgyud): gsang pa shis// 'tsho byed yul lhas slob pa ni// g.yag dkar mi dkar tshul gyis 'geg/ bud med rtug pa bsreg nas kyang // 'chi bdag rnams kyi zla rkun bzlas// zhang blon bzang po lta bu ni// pho lhas 'geg pas de dus su/
53b5(rnying rgyud): glang rog rA bsreg gong bzhin bya// khra 'am sbyang ki lta bus skyob// dgra bla yin te gsung chen btang // khyi lung bsreg pas 'bros par byed// bud med sha ba lta bu ni// ma lham sman 'gro ba ste// ra dang rta spadra til nag bsreg/ ting 'dzin
53b6(rnying rgyud): migs la byid rmugs na// pho lhas 'geg pa yin par brjod// til nag nyung nag gu gu la ni// sbyar mas bsreg na 'bros par byed // mi 'phrod dbye ba'i thabs bstan pa// bya dog 'ug pa'i gung rul// gro gar a dang shog shog 'aM// go rim
53b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du glan par bya// yugs sa mo yi rkang dreg dang // 'bog dang glang rog ra khrag sogs// sme ba'i dud pas dus gsum bdug/ 'di ni dbye ba'i mchog tu gsungs// nag po gsal byed sgron ma las// bya thabs nyams len nyid khu 'di// rang byang
54a1(rnying rgyud): dpral bya ba'i dus su gsungs// dpal blags nag po'i rgyud las/ bya thabs nyams yin nyid wa' gabs d+ha ma thun banapan// de nas 'ang ma dbyangs/ rdzabs sgrogs byung gshan rngalas laphral ba
54a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// bstan pa bsrung bar zhal ba zhes pa'i// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi zas// steng phyogs gshin rje nag 'joms ni// nag po g.yas na dgra sta bsdams// chibs su lpags pa lug pa chibs// khro mo srin mo mgo 'alung ba//
54a3(rnying rgyud): mongal pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di dbul na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis khram lnga thob/
54a4(rnying rgyud): chen bco brgyad las la sbal// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i phag tu gtong // dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// steng phyogs gshin rje phya sangs ni// dkar po lagau na bum pa thogs/
54a5(rnying rgyud): sra ba na glang dkar po chebs// khro mo lam grwa badz+ra mo che// nag mo mgo 'phyangs ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtsol 'khyud// g.yon bdung dmar gcol stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dmardzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan
54a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdod// bdud po bcu yis khram la thob// geng chen bco brgyad las la sbal// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras//
54a7(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs kang ci brag gyon ne// dkar poche srog bum pa bsdams// chibs su dri bsgeg pa bcibs// brag srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo dkar mo la pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gcol 'khyud// g.yon ba dud khrag gcol stob// yab gcig
54b1(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpa' bka' byung gis// dam thas gtor ma 'di 'bral na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzad// bdun pa bcu las khram la thob// gang chen bco bcad las la sbrul// 'tsho ba dang / 'khor ba'i lag gtad// ngas la bababs ma la// da
54b2(rnying rgyud): las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sas// shar sgyos ba grang mgo can// skrag nag dri shul rtse gsum thogs// chibs sa 'gugs byed dri la chibs// mi bzad bdud mo mag 'phyangs pa// na mo sdug dag la ba
54b3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa thabs kyi gcol 'khyud// g.yon pa drung khrag gcol stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' blang gis// dmadzes gtor ma 'di 'bral na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po bcu yis kham lathog/ gang byin bco
54b4(rnying rgyud): las la khrul// 'chi ba dgang khring ma'i lagatug tod// dzas la bab mos ma ya// dmalas ma'ad 'a phrin las mdzad// yab yul gnyis med thugs kyi sras// lho lugs gshin rje la ba te// sngon ga gsod byed dgra smra bsnams// rtsibs sug shi /
54b5(rnying rgyud): sgeg partsibs// mtshan mo nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro ma da ce ab sha ma can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gcol 'khrud// grwayon bdud dmar gcol stob// yang gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na//
54b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdud po brgya yis tham la thob// gang chen paco brgyad las la sbrul// 'chi ba dag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab pos ma ya// dmalas ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sra/
54b7(rnying rgyud): g+hon ba ga shin rje mig dmang ni// dmar thogacod byed ral ze bsnams// chi bas su spu byed sha bachibs// bye yir chen mo mgo 'phyang ma// blo mod mar mo ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtsol 'khyud// g.yon bdung khrag gcol stob// ya
55a1(rnying rgyud): gciga'ang ma dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bral na// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzod// bdung po brtsa yis khram la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la sprul// 'chi bdag mthang po'i lang
55a2(rnying rgyud): tu gtod// dus la bab pos ma ya// dmalas ma'ad 'phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med dbugs kyi sras// nub phyogs gshin rje rmig pa ni// sbag nag dbang sprad zhags pa thogs// chibs su zla brgyad sgeg pachibs// bdud mo chen
55a3(rnying rgyud): mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo skyug nag ral pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bulan// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gshed ma ma
55a4(rnying rgyud): 'dud po bcu yis khra ma la thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis med thugs kyi sras// nub byang gshin rje tal pa ni/
55a5(rnying rgyud): nag po 'byed pa'i dbyug to bsnams// chibs su rta nag ma he chebs// gza' srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo nag mo rAl pa can// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtse la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// yab gcig 'jam dpal
55a6(rnying rgyud): bka' byung gis// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di 'bul na// bstan po 'jig pa'i gshed ma mdzad// bdud po bcu yis khram 'a thob// ging chen bco brgyad las la sbrul// 'chi bdag 'khor lo'i lag tu gtod// dus la ba pos ma ya// dam las ma
55a7(rnying rgyud): 'da' phrin las mdzod// yab yum gnyis me dbugs kyi sras// byang phyogs gshin rje lha mchog ni// ser po bum pa rgya gram bsdams// thibs su rgyas pa'i rtal chibs// bya srin nag mo mgo 'phyangs ma// khro mo ser nag ral pa can// g.yang
55b1(rnying rgyud): nan lag/ ga du du// dngan na du ldan// nasu tshun na sus na

56a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ / pa can// g.yas pathabs kyi gtsol lakhyad// g.yon pa dang dam gcol thob// yab gcig 'ang mdapal ba// 'byung gis// dam rdzus ga ma 'di langs la// bstad pa 'dog pa'i gshad ma mdzad// bdu tha
56a2(rnying rgyud): bcwa yis khram la theb// ging chen bco brgyad las la skul// ka 'khong ma'i lagacu gtod// dus labab pos ma ya// dam las ma'ang 'a phrin las mdzad// skyes bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'thod rnams las lu bslas te/
56a3(rnying rgyud): seM gshed bskos so// 'jam dpal thugs nag zo'i rgyang las/ phyogs slong gigashed ba sgo ba'i thabs te le'u zhes pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ nyin bzhi'i sgra'i gang bzhi ladzin las
56a4(rnying rgyud): ba 'di gsungs so// rA dza ha la 'khor lo 'i lha// 'khor la nag po ma ra'i bdud// dug gi mtshan cha sngags kyi them// rdzas kyi spong ba thabs kyi dag/ bsnyen pa bya ba gsang ba'i thabs// hrISh+T+r-iHste ka ma yi dag/ 'khar lo bskor ba man ngag gter/
56a5(rnying rgyud): gsang nag po gces pa'i grogs// bar bar gyi rgyud dathabs kyis phul// dmed nag kham bdag man dag zlabs// gshed po bdud kyi man ngag gter// las grub gnan pa rang gi snying // dring phrang da mod pa phyogs med thogs// de bzhin gyi rlud thabs
56a6(rnying rgyud): phul// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// nyen pa wI/ yi gang bzhi bsgral// b+h+rUM/ he ma dang pa gyis byed shing // pra ma du sbyin pos// par snang khams la yid kyis rgya// gsung ba dadabang bzung ging gi bdag/ sa gzun ga ral sbal mod kyi// rgyan
56a7(rnying rgyud): sa nga / batshu pa // gdes na pa sa rgyag/ thog bying byang klung ga sa// gang des pang ga // nyis ga byu du // rnam gag ga// zhes bad
56b1(rnying rgyud): gcis la dog nag// thod sbal ga yang gzhi sra lnga gsol// ba gleng nag po rdibs mchibs// phyag na ga rnal gyis byed gling // bdag gis mnyes 'dra las nyes// shon lan gapong gyis su chag/ srog chod snying phyang spyi'i phog thongs// gtad na
56b2(rnying rgyud): btang shor ra re// nyi ma gsam pa'i rtsis byed ging // da sha kwi ba bdud kyi gang // nag po sha zan sha chu can// nag po snying dkar chibs su chibs// myi sha za zhing snying khrag 'thung // dug mda' 'phen zhing mi sha za// rta na gzhon pa 'bum khrar bcas//
56b3(rnying rgyud): phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed zhing // bdag zhes mnyes kho yis nyes// sho rdel dkar nag rtsis su drug/ srog gcod skeng phyung sgro 'phog thongs// gtad do ma btang shor ra re// nyi ma bzhi pa'i rtsis byed ging // yaSh+Ta rA dza gnod byed ging // zhon pa gza
56b4(rnying rgyud): ta nag po zhon// zab slag nag po skra la gsol// bdud zhag nag po dgra la 'debs// dbu la dom zhu nag po gsol// phyag na dkar nag rtsis byed ging // bdag gis ma nyes kho yis nyes// sho rdal nag po'i rtsis su chug/ srog tshad snying phyung skyo 'bog
56b5(rnying rgyud): rmongs// gtod do ma btang shor ra re// bdud tre rbad thu ma ri li li/ ya tri rbad bu ma ri li li/ d+ha sha k+She barbad bu ma ri le li/ yak+Sha rbad thum ra li li/ zhes ni rab tA shwa rde la bzang ngo // dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nyin bzhi lha'i gang bzhi la
56b6(rnying rgyud): phrin las bcol ba'i skabs te le'u zhe drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu dgyes pa'i yi rangs nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod do// hUM/ gtum chen rab
56b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar gshin rje 'jom mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag mtshan mang po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rabang bad ga shin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags
57a1(rnying rgyud): rnon na bzang gsol// mi mgo zong rlon phreng bas sprul brgyan// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gshin rje zhabs kyis gnon// mi bzang khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug d+hA s+tha can// phaT kyis khams gsum spangs mdzad zhal drug gdangs// sha
57a2(rnying rgyud): 'i mgo bcad dbu yi thod du bcings// spyan bzlog tsam gyis bdud kyi ser chen 'bebs// ljags 'gril tshems kyi rtse nas rdo rje'i thog chen rab 'bebs shing // 'khor gyi ma mo rnams ni 'dang zhing 'dud// de bas lha klu gnod sbyin gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rka
57a3(rnying rgyud): gtogs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang // bub 'gyel bcas pas khrag skyug nyid la 'dud// stong khams mid par byed pa'i zhal gdangs shing // khro gtum tshom rngam chen po bstan pas kyang // tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams rdul gyi rme gra 'dzag cing // dang /
57a4(rnying rgyud): gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dang zhing 'dud// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas pa'i zhags thogs nas// phyag na tri shul mi mgo rab bsnams shing // dngos grub mchog gi klad khra ga zhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing // dam las
57a5(rnying rgyud): par dag la gtod par byed// gnod sbyin mi sun phreng bas sru la brgyan// rdo rje brjid pa'i stabs stabs gar byas pas// dur khrod chen por mtshan mor rab rgya ba'i// ro langs mgo bcad so yis tshim tsham bza'// ngo mthong tsam gyis dma' 'bab zhangs
57a6(rnying rgyud): gnyug/ yon tan bye bas brgyan pa'i lha khyod la// blta bas bzod par dka' yang bdag 'dud na// gdug pa'i sems kyis bdag dang bdag gi 'khor du gtogs pa la// gnod par byed pa'i mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// zung zhig non cig sgrol mdzen
57a7(rnying rgyud): gshen rje gshed// yun gyi lhar yang khyod la gsol 'debs na// ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa// bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang // thams cad khyed kyi skur ni bdag bsgom pas// bdag gi rang bzhin bor nas khro bor gsal//
57b1(rnying rgyud): mchog khyod la yi dam sus brten pa// mi ye tha ma la rnams kyang mchog tu gyur// de bas 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// srog gi phyir yang lha khyod mi gtong na// byams pa'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan pa dang // thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag la gzig
57b2(rnying rgyud): sugasol// khye de ltar bdag gyur be phyir bstod phyag 'tshal// yun deng gong nas lha khyod bdag bsgrub na// khyod kyis dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// kA la nub che ge mo b+ha ga d+hI d+hIHna hUM phaT/ gang dag gshin rje gshed po yis// de las btson phyag chung
57b3(rnying rgyud): gsal// 'di ni phywa d+ha'i srog mchog pas// yang dag bstan pa yang dag gsal// phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa 'di// khro ba'i snying por sngags par byed// mtshon cha ma lus pa yi ga tsaM// bdud dang dgra bgegs zhi bar byed// na mo du r+thad+ham sred b+hUM b+ha
57b4(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga to ti gr-i dzA ya/ a ga ne dz+wa la ni hrIHSh+T+r-iHhUM phaT/ ces 'khor rnams kyis rab tu bstod do// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ gtum chen la bstod pa'i skabs te le'u zhe bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
57b5(rnying rgyud): byed chen po la 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi dgyes pa'i bstod pa phul nas mthe stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje dang / stong gsum men par gtong ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// he he dpa' bo yab gcig mchod
57b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed// dpa' bo'i 'khor du 'dus 'khor bdud// gshed pos bskos pa'i bka' rnams nyan// bdag cag 'khor gyi bdud po rnams// phyin ci log rnams 'dul slad du// tshul bzhin bsrub na ji ltar bsgrub// rdzas
57b7(rnying rgyud): dang yo byad gang la brten// las la gtang na ji ltar gtang // log pa'i sbyor ba ji ltar bya// 'jig byed chen pos bka' stsal 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ shin tu rnam pa'i sgra 'brug stod ldir ba tsam dus gcig la bsgrags
58a1(rnying rgyud): nas/ bdud mi tshogs thams cad dbang du bzlas zil mis mnan nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// nyon cigazung gas ngadzin// dag po bdang mtshogs rnams can// rnanam pa garnams gang sas dang // zab ba sa dang
58a2(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i thabs dang bskul ba'i thabs// mi mthun skyong bas gsod 'dod na// ngas bshad pa la sems zud cig/ ces brjod do// de nas bcom ldan gshed chen pos// phrin las myur du phye ba'i phyir// bdud kyi slang thabs 'di gsungs so// tho
58a3(rnying rgyud): pa de pa rab tu gces// bka' yi gnas sa ma dga' ba'i gnas dag tu// dbang thob bu phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing // dkyil 'khor mis nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir mnang gzob par bya// man nga gzob nal bstod pa rdzab ma
58a4(rnying rgyud): dbyung // bsnyen pa bya phyir mthun rdzas 'bad de bsag/ lung gi gnas sus yi dkyil 'khor bya// 'dom gang gu bzhi dug khrag chag chag gdab// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gru gsum bla gam gsum// grwa chad sko bzhi lcags ri lugs bzhin gyi// rgod pa ma sa
58a5(rnying rgyud): rdorje ra'agyur// bskal pa'i med skrag nag rlung 'tshubs ldang // gru gsum dbus su ga shin rje gshed po ste// bla ga ma gsum la yum gnyis sras dang gsum// sed ldeng la sogs mchog gi phung ba dgod// yab yum mnga' gsol dbangang dbyin
58a6(rnying rgyud): brlab pa'o// lcags phur la sogs mchog gi phur pa bcu// khra ma zog bdud po bcu ru mnga' gsol pa// 'khor la rtsibs brgyad dag la dgod par bya// dar nag cod pan rim gyis dbang bsngar gdags// steng du 'bar ba ya chen du// sha nga rol por la ca
58a7(rnying rgyud): no// lho ru mam pa dag srog bdud ste// zla bdud yor po zhags can nub// byang du srog bdud sbyar can// shar lho khram bdag thog po rje// lho rub bang btsan gri po rje// nub byang se 'don sngangs pa rje// byang shang ro langs nag po rje// 'og tu 'brang banas
58b1(rnying rgyud): rje// sgo bzhir bka' nyan ging chen bzhi// rtsang bzhi dag la dbang bslar dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas dang mchod zas dang // mi shar+ha sha'i gtor mchu// rus pasna tshogs brgyan byas la// gshed po yab yum sas lagazhag/ bya nag rta nag lug nag snying //
58b2(rnying rgyud): nag zag nga rog po'i snying // g.yag nag glang dang ra rgod snying // sha dang zag dang rus pa dang // mi shas brgyan la zangs bu gang // bdud po bcu la dgod par bya// shas+t+ra khrag sna'i gtor ma la// spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyad pa bzhi// sgo bzhir
58b3(rnying rgyud): ging chen bzhi la gzhag/ sman dang daltar sbyar ba yis// sdang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// mi gsur rtag sur rgyun du gtang // rgyal mtshan chen po bzhi yang gzug/ dar nag gur phug b+hi nag g.yang gzhi brdab// lug dag 'ben bca' ra rog
58b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i rten// skyed pa stag pa la sogs dag la yang // mgo mjug ma nor bzhog la khram shing bya// drag po'i sngags bzlas rim par khram la gdab// yi dwags gos la 'khor lo bris byas te// drag dang thod pa mkhas pas bri bar bya//
58b5(rnying rgyud): brjid 'phags pa'ajam dpal yab yum dang // bka' nyan nyi ma bzhi pa'i lha bslab mchod// khram thags bdud rnams las la bskul phyir zad// thod pa mtshan dan rA rog khra gzugs la// rang srog ming bris thod pa'i nang du'o// dpral bar mthongs
58b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag re bar gril byas la// zam gyis dkrug cing khram sngags bzlas par bya// oM dgra bo ni tsi du ba mug/ za mthor tha che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling swA hA/ zhes bzlas shing khram gyis skabs su dkrug/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum gsal bsgom la// dbang chen 'byung
58b7(rnying rgyud): pa rim brtsegs la// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// gru chad par khyams mu khyud ldan// shar phyogs rus pa'i gzhal yas khang // lho phyogs me yi ga zhol yas khang // nub phyogs khrag gi gzhal yas khang //
59a1(rnying rgyud): brang phyogs dbugs kyi g.yal yas 'ang // dbus sra ya mchen po ste// gshin naman bsngal ba'i gdan// sbrulas gzhung po'i slar gyu na// s+yAd zil mdag 'dra gnag la 'tshor// stag lpags snang can sbrul drug rtsu pa/
59a2(rnying rgyud): dang // thod pa la sogs drar khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// zhal drug bcu gnyis phyag dang ldan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon yu ma dang mdun du sras mchog ste// rgyan dang cha lugs phyag mtshan gsal bar bskeb// 'khor lo rlabs brgyad steng
59a3(rnying rgyud): bsam ste// nr-i las dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan du bsam// de steng ya bcu gdan stengs 'od dang zer 'phro ba// spro bzlas ya las kha ma thogs bdud po bcu// steng gi bdud po 'bar ba ya chen ni// g.yu dbug zhon pa glog gi zhags rdzogs
59a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom// shar gyi bdud po rol po ral pi can// rnga mo zhon nas ral gri thogs pa bskyod// lho phyogs khrim bdag srog bdud mchim can// bdud shazhon nas zhags pa thogs pa bskyed// nub tu zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// 'brang bu dzan nas
59a5(rnying rgyud): gnam lcags phur thogs bskyed// byang du srog bdud gser gyi sta re can// khyung chen zhon nas skar thogs pa bskyed// shar lhod khram bdag gnam pa tsan thog borje// rta la zhon nas gnam lcags 'phen pa bskyed// lho nub khram bdag par btsan ri po rje/
59a6(rnying rgyud): drung lha zhon nas rlung nag g.yab 'debs bskyed// nub byang khram bdag sde 'dzin sdong ba rje// phag partar zhon khram shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar khram bdag ro langs nag po rje// chu glang zhon nas sgrar bogs pab byed// 'og phyogs nag pa yab rje khrag
59a7(rnying rgyud): 'ar ni// stag dmar zhon nas sbrul dmar zhags thogs bskyed// re re'i 'khor na bdud kyang bsam yas te// rang bzhin gnas nas 'khor bcas spyan drangs pas// grub pa'i gnas su de 'dra byon par bas me// sgo bzhir nyin bzhir lha yi ging bzhi yang /
59b1(rnying rgyud): ngang byed pa 'brags byed las byung // de spang bskyed pa 'drang par rnams cas// bsta pa ba cag cang rtsu bcwa ba rnams// zhags pasu padangs gang sa las sal 'das// mas mas 'dasas mams su // gan ba byu na/
59b2(rnying rgyud): 'dri bco zag tu drug/ mi ga ci'i bang bad sangs 'dong // cim dang thang bong zer zhing gsod pa 'thom/ ting nga 'dzin gyis de lta gsal bskyed la// drag sags 'di bags pa dang rnams ltung bar 'phral//
59b3(rnying rgyud): khring ma 'jam na 'drid rnams mngon du par// mo dang btsun pa dang rigs mi mdzad pa// sngab sdeb gzhing lngas la mngon parjod// gtum rkyen pa stod la bdang rnams las la byasal// hA/ bzhal bgags pa pad+ma sa// t+pal ga
59b4(rnying rgyud): sngar dam bcas pa// mi bzad ldan pa srog bdag kun 'du byed// 'ang ma pal ga shin rjes dam kyi yar+d+ha dang // brjod kyi dmang kyi mangs dam pa 'di// tham thogs bzad pa b+h+rir rnas dbang bsrung bas// 'arji yongs kyi sa/
59b5(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang // lus byed pa ga yang ba// da ba gan pa// du sus dang dzin las mags da ga sa // // sa na/
59b6(rnying rgyud): gas// rjeng bar byengad po'i dag 'al// thos pa dang brjid lagag// phye zam 'i snang ba la// bdu batha thebamam 'chog// mi nga ldan ma rung/ dragazugs ma ta rjo/ gno ma mang bya 'dres na/ zhes me pa jim
59b7(rnying rgyud): du/ sa drad dum pa ladzig/ ga mi bang 'i ba ba so// na pa yi bra // / 'i sa gris spya sa// bya
60a1(rnying rgyud): la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la pa// bdud kyi khamakha mkha' lathob// oM snyid khrag so cang / drug zugs kham tod tu dang / zlag mo bar la khrag ling swA r+tha/ shar phyogs dras pa'i gzhal las nas// shar bang dngo 'byong
60a2(rnying rgyud): pa can// phung sring mo glog 'bru zhon// lag na gnam ljags ral gri bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa darang ma khring la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la ya// bdud kyi khram khra mkhram pa thob// oM skring khrag tsat+te rbad/ drag zug za tor
60a3(rnying rgyud): rbad/ che ge mo ma rA ya khug ling swA hA/ lho phyogs me ye gzhal yas nas// khram bdag srog bdud mche ba can// bdud sha nag po ru brgya chi bas// lag na 'dzin byed zhags pa bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa der ma khrid la
60a4(rnying rgyud): shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la yo// bdud kyi khram khram khram la thob// e snying khrag tsi d+ha zad/ drug mug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo b+ha ra ya khrag ling swAhA/ nub bye khrag gi gzhal pas nas// zla bdung lor po zhags pa can// 'brang 'u
60a5(rnying rgyud): po t+ta ru zho na// lag na gnam lcags phur bu 'debs// sdang bar byed pa'i dgral ya// myos pa dar ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi sgying la la// bdud kyi khams mkham la thob// oM snying khrag tsed+harbad/ rngag mug khram ter ta rba da/ che ge mo bA ra ya
60a6(rnying rgyud): ling sA hA/ byang phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal phas nas// srog bdud gser gyi star can// tshabs su gud chen da dmachi bas// lag na gser gyi sna re bsnams// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la ya// skyes pa dar mkhrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi snying la la/ bdud
60a7(rnying rgyud): kyi kha ma khrim kham 'thob// oM snying khrag co rbad/ dugasug khram tor ta rbad/ che ge mo pAr ya khrag ling swA hA/ khram bdag gnam btsan thog po rje// chibs su bdud kyi rtul chibs// sku las gnam lcags thog 'phen pa// sru las 'od zer 'phro ba
60b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs// rtsod 'ga' phrul 'jom// 'jug pa tshams sems/ klog par lcibs sa k+Sheg// spang bar byed pa'i dag la ya// skyes pa dang mkhrid la na// sras bu me yi snying la ya// bdud kha mkham kham pa tshad// ma stang ldag cod /
60b2(rnying rgyud): drub drug ldam ta ta rbad/ che ga mo lngar ya khrag leng sAm+b+ha/ khram bdag par btson gri po dzi/ tshabs su cung sha'i rta la bcibs// phyag ni rlung nag g.yab kyis 'debs// stong khams ma lus spang la bskur// ched 'ga' stsal pa'i cha// brang rngubs
60b3(rnying rgyud): skyes phyir ba na/ snang bar byed pa'i ngarna la ya// skyes pa dang ma khrid la shog/ skyes bu mi yi steng la ya// bdud gi ma N+Da mtsham 'thong // wal sngags bzlas shing da ljang // tham bdag se 'jon lding brje// tshags su dum gta
60b4(rnying rgyud): dakhong dra nga mi srung rmed gyu sa// 'gan lam nag 'am nang rdzogs// spang bar byeng pa'i dpral la// spes pa dang mdzad la shig/ rjes bum la sbyang ba y-i// bdud ga ma ma tham 'thab// ma sngags bye zlas kyang ra spyod// ra ba
60b5(rnying rgyud): sun na smra su pa sa
60b6(rnying rgyud): na ma d+hir yA ldeg 'i AH/ gshi rje rnam pa 'dus la bgyi// 'ab pa dag pa'i dus la bag// ga bdag pa sa pa bkra// nag rgyags mangs lababya// rngam pa rjegs 'dus pa bab// b+hu byed 'bar nga 'dus la bag// rgyang mig pa zhi'i dus la bar
60b7(rnying rgyud): thamapas da dang thab ga // da zhing byen mim col// klung da thang ni gajug zags// drug sngags 'di yis bdag par bya// rgyab nas thag/ bri mim pa na khrag/ m-i sha 'a rdzun zag/ ma tu nga ldan // spyod na krung da
61a1(rnying rgyud): yang sa na/ nga// su sa// su// ma rdzu nga ta// / nalas bdag/
61a2(rnying rgyud): 'i gang bzhi ste// 'phang bdug pa gan 'ga' bang // jikhrig pa tum shi thong ba ste/ tshor pa can gyi zhing brnyas pa// thog po gdug gyin pa sreg/ mnan pa 'i brje med thong // ga sa rdzapa lagatugs/ gangang ma
61a3(rnying rgyud): nga snga gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ stong gsum thun par gtong ba'i bdud rtsi ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u zhe brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ stong gsum ldan par gtong ba bzad nang rkang bslab pa 'brab
61a4(rnying rgyud): dngas dang pa'i dang b.rab tu babyed// bkal ba gnas sam dga' ba gnas dag tu// sa bdag zhugazhi bar rab byas te// dkyil 'khor 'dam gang grub zhing // mthing nag su gsum zla gam gas pa gyis 'gor// 'kho po tshobs med bcad blo bani badz+rad/
61a5(rnying rgyud): nag dbus su ya.Ar+tha ka dgo // drug ma gsum la yum gnyis sras da gsung // dbang mi brgyad la bdud kyi rgyal po brgyad// bar khyams dmar po bdud kyi stsal mo brgyad// gong zhi ba kyi yang khol ba bri// mas marnamapa su tha~Mr ni
61a6(rnying rgyud): gtsug/ rngubathung mtshangs pa sang ni ga yang gas pa drug/ kyang da bams su drargod pa yang gzhag zug/ shang ma rnams su phrag nagag yang gzhi gzug/ dbus pa we Ta ga dang nang du gas bya// rtse sa 'a rje drag po dang gis 'dzim
61a7(rnying rgyud): ding mnyam pa'i 'ur bdag ga// dngus sa ya du ma'i nyir ma gdag tung// 'as ga min thod 'khong ga zhing ba tshogs sa// mog tan btor pa bzhims// theslob ma thams su mas sa med pa'i// ma po skyed dge ba skyes pa
61b1(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ zung byung rta snying rta khrag bsres pa gang // shar du sreb gyi snying dang phag khyag bkres la gzhag/ bdag nyid mthing nag per gon te// srog gi snying po thun du rangs// oM sha ra nA shar tri/ khong na sha ru du ma/ sum bur ga rjen/ ming taN t+yA ta ra na a pa tsang
61b2(rnying rgyud): cag tu drug mur to sha/ mur to ka/ a ya ba dug pu tsun/ he he ya na dza/ yo ru mar na sha du ru/ mA ra ya d+h+waM/ ba babyi dzAM/ ya ba ya de la bar de la ba dang / bdud kyi snying po de rnams dang // lum dral 'khor bcas dril ba ni// oM nga
61b3(rnying rgyud): ma khu ri bum/ rum bu nu/ hA hra tra du ru du ru tra dza dza hU~M dza/ stong ngam bye ba sa yang bzlas// stong gsum mun par gtod byed na// mun pa'i dus su dug khrag la// nyi ma gsad pa'i drag sngags bzlas// rang sngags mjug tu mun gtibs brjod//
61b4(rnying rgyud): gsum bdud kyi lcam dral gyis// skad cig tsam la g.yo 'gul gtong // las la sbyar te gsod 'dod na// rabs chad nag po 'dzed pa ru// dug dang klang khrag sbyar ba yis// gtum khro bstod la bdud rnams rbad// b+h+rUM/ nam mkha' yangs pa'i
61b5(rnying rgyud): klong yangs nas// yang rje shan pa dbu gsum phyag drug pa// gnas 'dir mun gti bA dmal shog/ mun pa gtibs pa'i klong dkying nas// ya bzher nag po 'jug thog sku// gnas 'dir mun gtibs dam la shog/ shar phyogs rus pa'i zhing khams nas/
61b6(rnying rgyud): shar bdud rol po ral pa can// zhe sdang mun gtibs dam la shog/ lce phyogs me yi zhid khams nas// sgrog bdud sngon po mche ba can// srog la mAn gtibs dam la shog/ nub phyogs khrag gi zhing khams nas// bla bdud yor po zhags pa 6
61b7(rnying rgyud): blal mun gtibs dam la shog/ byang phyogs rlung gi zhing khams nas// srog bdud ser po sta gri can// srog la mun gtibs dam la shog/ tshe bdud sbyin gyi ral pa can// tshol bar gcod dam la shog/ srog te khyis pa sems kyi bdud// yid
61b8(rnying rgyud): smod pa sa ba pa yang
62a1(rnying rgyud): mun gtibs dam la shog/ dkar mo 'bar ma snyan gcig ma// ldan ma nyir ma mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yug tsug klu gnyan 'khol// nag mjed mag ma yams 'khol// ser mo rlung gshog dbang ldan 'khol// dkar ldang /
62a2(rnying rgyud): brag mgo dri rnga 'khol// sngo nag sreg byed yam 'khol// dmar ma blag mo srin mas khol// tra skra zhags thags rlung wa 'khol// dgra ba'i rnam shes brgyad la mun nag gtings/ han han sti ta tiH/ rba thamam/ sa ma ya tAM/ batrang / mi dz+r-i/ tsin/
62a3(rnying rgyud): zing / yag shang / ma tri / da tri dza/ sha tri / dkri pra rjid/ dbyi nang / kar mdza/ ha drang / li shang / ya b+hung / su mi / kha dngang / dza d+hA rbang/ chung la shed chung / pa nI chud/ pa~M la gnan rbad/ dra du chud / khal khu chung/ shid ci tu
62a4(rnying rgyud): nga / khal tug tig mur narbad drung swA hA/ bzan kyi tham nga lali kha la kha shag tham/ gnan tar zang rnams khrag la/ srog rnam thag ni la khrig tu byung dal/ de dag gsad cing gzir ba dang // gnan zhing 'phang dang bsreg cing gtad// 'kha
62a5(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f yi ga dag // dbye dang dgrag dang bstim pa'i las// man dag bzhin du thang ltar na// the tshom med par brlag par byed// dpal thags nag pa'i rgyud las/ bdud nang ltar bslab pa'i skabs te le lu zhe dgu pa'o// / de da
62a6(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byer chen pas brlad gsang par bsgrub pa'i tshul gsangs ma// rtag mar dang pas rab tu bskyed// bsad nams tshogs kyi yan lag bsags// nag pa zag gi rtser byin la// lhor ba ltas rtswa nas chu'abab tu// ku ni gnang dus
62a7(rnying rgyud): blangs la// stegs bu 'dam gang zla bzhi brtsi// mi khrag d+ha khrag khri khrag dang // mas la bsras la chag chag ga ba// dbus su bu gsum ma kyi gad bya// blag ma dmar ba thang zang dkar// gachad ldang nag rje bzhi sar// bdud pa tan+de bdan/
62b1(rnying rgyud): dar la gzugs thes dbus su dgad// lcags sam mchag gisar ba la// gshed par zin pa na gang pas sung gad// pal dang nag pa kyang shil// gas pa'i dang pazhi gzugs pas dpas// rkang dag ga ba dgag/ rags
62b2(rnying rgyud): bdag med dgod// rnab cus 'dar 'khrig pa dgang // nAm N+Da skem par nga dgod// dri gakhrang btsun shar dra dgang // phigs sha gang gang // dang pa pang ga dunab tha dgang // dban sa/ bathang du dang // ba blang pa na rnaM badz+ras
62b3(rnying rgyud): phyag brtan bcu gsum khrag gi dang ral can// sprul pa btsug sam stag dang gzigs chas can// man bu bcu gsum btang kyi nag can// phanya bcugs ma zhags mthong gcan// lag brtan nag mar ba'i so ga can// skal pa ban+dan sol ba'i lan
62b4(rnying rgyud): mnam bcu gsum nano len tshwar can// phanya ma rnams mgan bu'i tha skabs can// sra zad khams dang skal dgad// de la dam rdzas bzham pa ni// rabs chad man gyi zad par// zas na gsar mchag cig tu// phrag rdag sbrid kar bya ga dang /
62b5(rnying rgyud): rta nag skyong dkar gsum gyi snying // sreg pa rtsa dang ma thal nang // de grab du yod ming rus rnams// grog shing shun bris la gzhug/ bla rigags pa dang blang ka'i gsob// brgyad ste shar nub kha bstan gzhag/ chang phung nang du gser brdar la/
62b6(rnying rgyud): dngul stsogs gang yang gzhag par bya// g.yab dar nag pos g.yab tshul bya// lug nag lcags ru gser mig la// re ba'i sgo ni khal du bkal// g.yas su pho rnams ming rus gzhug/ g.yon du mo rnams ming rus gzhug/ klu dmar skad
62b7(rnying rgyud): bas gde rmed bya// ral dar lde mthing nag gang ba// mig gnyis nang du rin chan brdar// dar dkar yug gis mig gnyis dgab// dpal lakhar byang shar ga rung gad// drar thad ras la 'khar la bca'// drod pa dug khrag bsres la dgod// gas
63a1(rnying rgyud): gcan la na ga sa// 'dudu byas nga gas/ sa ba sa pa// dgazugs dang nam sadun na// rnarnams gtags pa se ba ma gas
63a2(rnying rgyud): pahUM phaT/ gsum 'bum bzlas na gang yang 'grub// de bzhin bsgrub na mngan du 'gyur// dpal 'ang ma dpal blags de nag pa'i nad las/ bdud gsang bltar brlab pa'i skabs te lal lda bcu pa la// de nas pacom spyan 'das gshed pas
63a3(rnying rgyud): rten mo mas mer bsreg pa'i btsan gyi ltar bslab pa 'di gsungs sa// brag dmar rtsa'am dur khrod du// sa bdag ni \u0f7f gtor gtang // dkyil 'khar 'jam gang gre bzhi pa// ra dmar khrag gis chag chag gangad ba// dgras kyidam pa
63a4(rnying rgyud): dmar ba brgyad kyis bskor// lcags ri nag po ma 'od 'bar// zag mang la wA ra ya// radamar bas 'gram grin na bca'// dbus srapa shas bu gra gang gzhag/ ra khrag dag gis dmar por byug/ zag dmar po mda' gang gdags//
63a5(rnying rgyud): dmar pa mda' gang la// zer mo lngas pa'i phod kyis bca// dbus kyi zla ga ma steng du gzhag/ de 'khor zla gam bcang po la// bshas cha brgyad la mda' dmar brgyad// dang dngar lpags dmar po dang // zer mo'i thod kyi brgyan pa bcud// phyir ma DAg
63a6(rnying rgyud): pa byang la dgar// gser brdar chang phung bya 'o dgu// 'bras dang til nag la sogs pas// zla gam dgu la phul dgu gzhag/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa rba tha bar bshad// oMng 'gram ni de rtse thal pa ni/ trezhi nyi sha tra~M mu hrI ri hriMH
63a7(rnying rgyud): hr-i ha~M shi b+hi sa rbakarma se be ba swA hA/ 'di ni dbang dang drag po'i sngags// dgrag dang zad pa'i sngags 'di brjod// srog la li pra ma ni ba ma ril dgra badz+rang/ srog mthal pa rbaM/ ba ma ri'i li dgra bcing / kr-i d+ha ka ya pa ma'i pi li dgra badz+ra dza/ kro dz+haiM kA la ya sha la
63b1(rnying rgyud): raM li li dag panang/ ma trag// shaM mA rA ya ba mar la la dgra ba nang / mu tri wA ra ya ba ma ri li li dgra ba dang / red+hi kA ra ya ba ma ri li li dgra ba mAr ya nA dza/ sha~M sta bu mA ra ya ba la ril la dgra za narba/ rang gsang dpon g.yog dgu'i snying pa 'arjod par bya/
63b2(rnying rgyud): srog la laM pra ma ni dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog la mA ra ya nr-i da ma nyams dgra bo'i srog la dzadzadza/ srog kro d+hI kI la ya mA ro ya dgra bo'i steng la dzang ngo // srog kro d+hi sho la ya ya mA ra sa dgra bo'i gling la 'dza / srog ko ti kaM shaM mA
63b3(rnying rgyud): ya da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog gi shaM tri mA ra ya da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ srog mu tri re'u hri dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dza dza dza/ dmigs pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis brdeg/ gshin rje bstod la btsan rnams rbad// hUM
63b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzam gling 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// me dzad 'bar ba'i zhing khams nas/ mi ring dmar po mthu rtsal can// dbu la skra med bskal pa'i me dpunga' bar// 'jig rten khams kun me yis bsreg/ smin ma lcags kyu 'khril ba 'dra// spyan rtsa dmar po
63b5(rnying rgyud): dam nyams dgra la bzlog/ sku la le brgan dmar po'i 'jol ber gsol// g.yas nas btsan gyi rgyu zhags dgra la 'debs// g.yon nas hu lu'i ltas ngan dgral 'bebs// zhabs la lcags lham yu zung gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun bskor
63b6(rnying rgyud): can// sbrul nag gzhibs pa'i sku regs bcings// skar chen dmar po'i tshar tshar can// bzhugs ni gling bzhi khyab par bzhugs// nam gyi gung la rgyu tsan// brag gi lha mo kha nag chibs// nyi ma'i zer la rgyu tsan// chibs su lhas ngan glab
63b7(rnying rgyud): chibs// nyi ma'i gung la rgya tsan// chibs su bra bo rting dkar chibs// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// yab gcig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// 'khor gyi btsan rnams las la bskul// 'jig rten khams su ma yi bskal pa thongs//
64a1(rnying rgyud): dgra pa'i rnam shes brgyad po thal bar rdzogs// skyes tha can pa dgral la// rang gsad pa cha dang gu gral la// bcan pazhags pa rdzogs pa// zlar ma dag yang thab ga/ tha gtsug gzer thabs par thos zang
64a2(rnying rgyud): chos ldan las btsal/ nam la ma dag rte na 'acang // yadang rna bar brlag par 'gyur // 'arji la dang nazung dang // lcags rnams la gang bzhin baphrul// cheng phrang gtang zhing las gtar gzhad// rtag sbyin pa dang gtad btang /
64a3(rnying rgyud): dang bshos cha pral bar bya// gshin rdo rje gsang nag pa'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten khams kan mes bsogs pa'i btsan gyi grags dpyi ltar bslab pa'i skabs te le'u gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byang
64a4(rnying rgyud): pas/ bcan nang ltar bslab pa 'di gsungs sa// gang gi su mkha' ma thag dmar \u0f7f// dur khrod nags tshal mthug pacu// dkyil 'khar 'ang mag dgra ba zhal// drag dang khrag gis dang chag gang ba// dgras su grwa gsum thung dra ba na//
64a5(rnying rgyud): da ya~M thod pa ru// rdos pa sba bar sa la sogs// til mang bsres te gzhag par bya// de la zlag ma gsum gyis bskor// phyi'i ma'angam bu'i gling bzhi bris// lcags ri la sogs me da bris// dbus sra ya ma gshed pa ste// zla gamags ma
64a6(rnying rgyud): la yum sras dgod// zla ga ma steng du btsan gyi rgyal// rdorje reg zugasar mig dgo// ru dza grags mchog dgang// nub tu rdo rje mgyogs byed rgya la// gyang du rdo rda shu bo 'bar// yab yum rdzas su bshams pa yang // pi shan sha'i gta
64a7(rnying rgyud): mdang // snying chen gcig la brten te bslab// phyogs bzhir gtor ma bzhi byas la// shu ba mdzad bzhi'i rdzas su dgod// rad mar snying dang bya sa'i snying // na 'tshal snying la ba can rnams brtan// bu rbang mda' la leb brgan dar// lag tu
64b1(rnying rgyud): gsal rtag tugayag// zla ba'i zad par thang ma bca'// rtag tu ragasar ldan gtag// gsar gams las gsags dubyung bas// rtagatha ba can lam na drub ba// skyugs pa'i gag thong 'ad// rtag nang dkar dag la/
64b2(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas grugs mthod par gsib// rnam gsum ting 'dzin btsan rnams bskyed// a pi shra sa ma ya rA dza pi ni a na Na sta tri shal rbad d+ha ra ga ting ban+d+ha d+ha ra thun tsit+ta b+ha sI ku ku dang // zi'am 'bum du bzlas gyur na// su yang dngos su ston par 'a
64b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rta med srab sra dang // mi med skyugs pa der 'ong // de bzhin las la sbyor bar bya// gshed po bsul la btsan rnams zad// 'jig rten me yis bsreg 'dod na// rnga sol rdzas sbyar ngam rdzas la// rtsa ba'i sngags la re re srung // de yi
64b4(rnying rgyud): rnams rab tu bzlas// zla gsang bu laM shes bya zhing // gsang ba'i las kyang gong dang 'dra// gtso ru rang gi dam tshig bsrung // ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod lam bya// yengs na gang yang mi 'grub ste// rtag tu mi dang nya mi bya// thar ma bcas pa
64b5(rnying rgyud): thod pa de// gong gsum btsun gyi 'du sa 'am/ brag btsan klu btsan yod sar swA// gang la b+ha ba 'joms par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gshen rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las// 'jig rten gyi khams mes bsreg pa btsan gyi zla gsang nad ltar
64b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u nga gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos btsan gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dur khrod lta bu ru// dkyil 'khor mtheng nag gru gsum brtsig/ dbus su rabs chad
64b7(rnying rgyud): thod pa ru// khrag sogs dug sogs rdo sol dang // dur khrad ras dang til gyi mar// radamar snying dang ra khrag thugs// ming dang rus bris thod par gzhug/ bse bor bangs gzhong gtor mas dgang // drung gzhag srog steng tshad du grangs// oMd badz+ra
65a1(rnying rgyud): mang gan dza mu sa mra sa mA ra nA ya mA ra na ya dgra bo che ga mo'i srog phreng phreng thum myong ngo / 'di ni rab tu mi 'grung sngags// thod pa'i nang du 'bram du bzlas// thod pa nags rjong 'brug pa'am// ril sbas na ri mes tshig/ khang par
65a2(rnying rgyud): tu mtsho lta bu'am// chu mig sbas na chu yang khol// dgra yi gdung gseb sbas gyur na// khyim dang khang pa 'jig par 'gyur// de nas sngags de nyid 'o zu'i sdong po la/ lan stong du bzlas nas byin na sgo bar 'gyur ro// d+ha du ra'i lo ma dang sha pa pa de dang /
65a3(rnying rgyud): ka ka ri la bzlas nas byin na mdzar 'gyur ro// be'u be dang ka ne la bzlas nas byin na/ sbangs 'bur nad kyis 'chi bar bshad// dza ye 'bras la bzlas nas phyogs su gtor na// sga la chen po khang pa'i nang du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// jo sol la bzlas nas b+han d+ha'i nang
65a4(rnying rgyud): du chang dang sbyar nas rtswa gseb ba ma shing gseb tu sbas na yul khams 'tshig par 'gyur ro// rdo sol la bzlas te chang gral du grogs po'i chang la btab na mer reng gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bse zho dang btsan dug sbyar la btab nas dgra'i lus sam sha la reg pa'i gos
65a5(rnying rgyud): la bsrus na lhog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mes bsreg btsan gyi zla gsang gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje
65a6(rnying rgyud): gshed pos/ chu 'khyag drag tu dbab pa khyab 'jug gza'i drag sngags 'di gsungs te/ gza' phyi ltar baM sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ thog mar dang pa rab tu bskyed// ri gsum rtse'am dur khrod du/ dbang thob bya phyir bla ma mnyes bya zhing // dkyil/
65a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bris nas dam tshig dbang dag nod// dgos pa bsgrub phyir man ngag thob par bya// man ngag thob nas bsnyen pasgrub mtha' ru dbyung // bsnyen pa bya zhing mthun rdzas 'bad de bsag/ khyab 'jug las kyi go rim ni// gzhan dang mthun par chog
65b1(rnying rgyud): dang // mchod dang gzu dbang gsol ba gdab// gtor ma la sogs chog bya// dbab gsang las kyi go rim ni// tshes grangs phyogs dang dus tshod dang // sprul pa yan lag 'dug pa'o// go rim bzhin du so sor gyur// bzhi la nub nas shar du spod//
65b2(rnying rgyud): mamor sbrul te rkang pa g.yas// brkyang la shar lho mtshams nas su// nyi ma dros te nub byang du// dgra lha'i rgyal mor mjug ma sprul/ bcu gcig 'dzir la byang nas lhor// bdud du phul te lag pa gnyis// bco ldan ma phyed lda nub nas// byang shar
65b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams su chu ba ste// srin por sbrul te mgo bo rgya// bco brgyad nam yol shar nas nub// dmu ru sbal nas dpung mgo g.yon// nyi shu gnyis la nyi ma myur// nub brang mtshams nas shar lho ru// gshin rjer sprul nas lag pa g.yan// nyi shu rdzal
65b4(rnying rgyud): nas byang // snga rengs chas te dpung mgo mig/ klu bcan gdon du sbrul te n+ya// nyi shu dgu ste myur nung na/ byang shar mtshams nas lho nub tu// gza' bdud chen por sbrul te chu// de yi dbab gsang sbyar ba ni// phyogs kyi gdan sbrul ra re la/
65b5(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i byur ba so sa bya// gdon sbal sa sor chub ste// ma mor sprul pa'i gzugs brtan ni// nig ma chen mo ral pa can// 'jigs pa'i can cha mang po dang // lag na thong khrag 'thor zhing rtswa// rlung drag zag dang rdzibargya// rgyal mo sngo mu ka dar thogs/
65b6(rnying rgyud): zhon te 'jigs pa'i gzugs// skra dang ser ba mtshan mo'o// sprul pa bdud ni mdo ga nag po// lag na gri na gzhags pa thogs// rtan gzhon te gdon dang bcas// btsan thabs drag po'i nad rnams dang // dus med mtshan ma mang du 'byung // 'jigs
65b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i srin pa ldan ga la// mig tu dmar la sdang mig bgrad// mchab gtsigs te rang 'o tshul// mda' ga zhub ga te gdan dang rmya// rlung nag 'chubs mang btsas ta'ang // sprul pad su ste thog ser 'babs// dmar ga khrig gi thig la can// baglang zhin/
66a1(rnying rgyud): sa na rdzu ca na
66a2(rnying rgyud): pa par
66a3(rnying rgyud): bca pas gtar mkhyen// thubs mtshams bcad kyi sprul pa la// sa sa las kyi thab brtam// dgrag dang brdeg dang brga' pa'i las// pagags pa'i tshum tagatid rmugs min// bsregs/ ra pa la sogs pa// phyogs marnams brgyad nas rdza te nga /
66a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams brgyad du gsang pa ste// dbus kI me la bsag par// sbal ba'i mag brgya ba'i tshe// brtag pa'i dpral ba'i dbyings su gdab// rkang pa g.yas g.yan rmA ba ni// pa ma shAN+Di g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdab// sbal pa yan lag go ril bzhan//
66a5(rnying rgyud): gdab pa'i las gang de bzhin gdab// tshor ma rgan gyi shing la bsreg/ nu ba'i dus sra mtshungs ngas na// phung bar 'gyur te gdanas za// gdon dang phye ma rnam pa gnyis// gdan gyi rdzas la nus pa maud// bya ma gdon sa za bar// zlagasang nag pa'i rgyud las gsung
66a6(rnying rgyud): gang du 'dus na// ma 'dug pa la// gas nying pa dang // gan pa gzugs pa pag sa// rnamapas dang drags dbyan// gang ma'i nga cha ba gzum// dgras te gzugs na ba na sung
66b1(rnying rgyud): nas na/ gang ma gangs pasas// gang bshel gas kya ga// sags na// 'das man ga dang/ ma ga sudang / ga rje mangs gsas// dam pa sa sa su nga //
66b2(rnying rgyud): hral bras te skrag nag gam// yang na sngan ga dmar par bya// de la brnag pa'i tshur ba byar// phur du dbab pa'i las byan// dam gri yul gyi nu sags pas ga/ lugs sa ma 'am rabs chad thod// yang na mad can thod rgya// mi zlag ti khag pa dag dang /
66b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul Thag 'i gas pa thag sags// bdaka ma mang dang ra'i// rnam lasags sbyar bar bya// prAn drug tu g+sa la gyur // gda' bebs ma migs yang par// bsregs sum brga' na rnams dang // dus med gzu yi gding thug/
66b4(rnying rgyud): 'chags khrag tu 'ong bar nges// mahA tsad+ha ra k+Sha tre ba ni mtha ya/ che ge mo la ba b+h+yo/ zhes pa ni yul ba srin parje gdan gyis dpab cid gsang pa'o// rtag rang ba ni ni a nan ste/ nAg rlang ragating pan d+har b+hu / tsai te/ bA s+dzi kraH/ klu'i gdon gyis dab cing gas pa
66b5(rnying rgyud): du bri ba lar gzum la la// bshag pa ma // spyan thamar lI'i/ dmub dud sprul pas dab ba ci gas dpang// mams ma ya ma thag sham tra 'ga' nas/ kha yA ku rbataN pA la ya ya/ hri tur d+har/ na ma mdu 'di sha d+hu da yani ri \u0f7f/
66b6(rnying rgyud): rje'i gnon gyis dang ba gsad pa'o// rdzi kar matra ngul dul gyig khrag la ril de la/ chamatsham rgyal nan shig mAr na// rgal ma tha byas dab pags pa'o// yam tshan danyi tad la gra d+ha ngan sha ya dkrir nam rA ya sad sa tsho ma chom shig shig/ gshin
66b7(rnying rgyud): gdan gyis dpab gas pa'o// ma hA bi zlab t+ta can drang ne thal dgra pa'i chetal/ bran pa nyid te/ ka sa ma na n+ya m+bar ya khrag khrag dang/ gza' bdung rtson pa sa dab bags pa'o// 'du rjen thab na t+pal/ ma lad+he/ khangs
67a1(rnying rgyud): rlung / srog tu byu catho mnam/ ces pa rnas ga dadags thogs pa med// gcam can nyid la rab btur cing // gza bdang mad par btudang// rdza brdzogs pa'i rnatshams pacad nga ra bcang bab
67a2(rnying rgyud): ran// khyab 'jug chen po sku bzhengs shig/ gtum po chen po bskyod can// gza' bdud 'jug cing gi gang 'bebs// de yis ki kang 'bebs byed na// gza' bdud chen po mi mun pa// khyab 'jub chen po kun tu D+ha ga/ 'jigs be rlog ti sprul ba'i lus//
67a3(rnying rgyud): lus po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// ro stong mi la ro smad srul// lus ni brjid pa'i dud ka la// lag na chu srin zhags pa thogs// pha ni srin la ma ni gya// klu srin tshegs pa'i mthung che// lho nub mchoms nis sku bzhengs
67a4(rnying rgyud): nas// zla ba'i rjes gcod shar du chug/ nyi ma'i rjes gcod nub tu rgyug/ nyin mo rgyu zhing mtshan mo 'joms// bar sdang khams nas chu tsan// 'jig rten khams kun sgrol bar mdzad// lo nyes 'khrug ba yams nad gtong // nyi ma zla ba lho ru za// rna ma
67a5(rnying rgyud): gting nas gnas pa'i tshe// klu rnams kun kyang 'khrug cing slong // thog sengs g.yos ki kang 'bebs// 'jigs byed chen po ma mun pa// ming brgya pa la mtshan stong po// dus tshod chos grangs kun gyi bdag/ lha 'dre kun gyi nang dbyen byed// lha srin sde nga
67a6(rnying rgyud): dmag dpon byed// 'byung ba lnga yi bdud chen po// mtshan ni rnam pa dgu ru grags// steng 'og phyogs mtshams thams cad nas// kun nas chug cing ki kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srin po rak+Sha bai tri pa// ki rkang pa ta chen po bya/
67a7(rnying rgyud): srin po'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod pa'i cha// drang srong chen po rA sA la// drang srong gi di ki kang 'bebs// ki kang bdag nyid can zhes bya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod pa'i tshe// 'jigs byed chen po sgra gcan 'dzin// byin yang
67b1(rnying rgyud): pho nyar 'gyed// ki kang 'bebs pa'i las la brtson// nub byang mtshams nas bskyod tsa na// dub mjug ring chen po bya// 'jig rten khams na mchu bo che// 'jig rten g.yo 'gul byed pa'i bdag/ lho yi phyogs nas bstod pa'i tshe// khyab 'jug chen po bya ba // dus
67b2(rnying rgyud): tshong tshes grangs kun tu rgyug/ sprul pa'i sku ni ki kang 'bebs// shar gyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// dmu bdud chen po ha li ka/ byi nu ra tsa'i zhing kang 'bebs// dmu yi ki rkang 'bebs par byed// rgyang gi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// bdud po ro ga ti 'bar
67b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzugs// bdud ci ki kang 'bar ba 'bebs// ki kang 'bar btsar ka/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskyod pa'i tshe// srid pa'i ma mo rnams dang rol// ma mo'i ki kang kun gyi bdag/ ljang sngon chen po'i king kang 'bebs// lho nub mtshams nas bskyod tsan/
67b4(rnying rgyud): rog ti bya rog mgo brtsegs te// sker chen 'bar ba'i 'od chen po// sngon du su bad khrur med za// khyod ni khro chen phul pa ste// lho nub mtshams nas sku bapyod nas// lha srin sde brgyad dmig dpon byed// nub nas shar du bkyad tsa na// srid pa'i ma mo'i
67b5(rnying rgyud): dmag dpon byed// nang ngan ki kang dbab pa'i dus la babs// shar lho mtshams nas bskyod tsan// dgra lha'i rgyal po dmag dpon byed// thog dang bu yug ki rkang ni// da ma si gdug pa'i snying la 'bebs// byang nas lho phu ba phyod can// 'du
67b6(rnying rgyud): dmag kun gyi dmag dpon byed// bdud kyi nyi kang hur thum 'bebs// bdud rtsi kI kang dgra lA ya// byang shar mtshams nas bskyod tsan// srin po 'bum gyi dmag dpon byed// srin po'i ki kang dgra la ya// gri thabs sna tshogs ki kir ya// shar nas
67b7(rnying rgyud): nub tu bskyod can// dmu bdud yongs ci dmag dpon byed// dmu ro 'bebs pa'i las byed cing // gar rbad dmu yi gi kang gtong // nub byang mtshams nas bskyod can// gshin rje yot+pa kyi dmag dpon byed// skye 'gro yongs kyi zla tshe sdud// gshin rje'i kau
68a1(rnying rgyud): dbang med 'bebs// sto nas byang du pyod pa'i tshe// klu bcan kun gyi dmag dpon byed// thog dang ser ba'i rtswa 'dren cing // thog mer mngon ki kang 'bebs// nub byang mtsham sa na k+Sha rtsod tan// gti brji ga song ba byed
68a2(rnying rgyud): gang 'bebs// mdun du gang byung zur ming byed// ki kang sna tshogs 'bebs pa'i bdag/ gi gang sna tshogs dgral ya// zhes bad cing da / phreng phrin las brtol// gsang na da bur gzugs la brdeg/ oM brda 'i rnyi ba/ shi ba 'o
68a3(rnying rgyud): che ge mo kA ra ya hUM phaT/ mu lu mu lu/ ku ru ku ru/ thum bu zlum bu/ bar ta dz+ra mA ru dzu ma ru pa ra pa byed na ta pa ra ba ta ya/ ru te ru ti sha sa yA/ shan ti ku la dzi dza/ zhas ni gsad pa'i las sbyor bya// chu 'khrugs drag tu 'bebs 'dod na// sngags kyi
68a4(rnying rgyud): yan dag zhig gcig rtse// oM mo kha bathun 'thun/ r-i yer lo/ na puta daN ba ler rdunar thun tu/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas khro tshul bstan/ mig bzlog pa bzang mig spen las/ khrag smin dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'grel bar bsar/ dzas
68a5(rnying rgyud): zhing lus sprugs pas/ ser ba drag tu 'ong bar 'gyur// gnam sa ri brag kun tu yang // 'ba' di sha yas gdon mi za// 'jam dpal gshin rje na gsang nag po'i rgyang las/ chu 'khyag ser ba dbab pa khyab 'jug gza' yi drag sngags wabs te le'u bshing /
68a6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ chu 'byahA drag tu dbab pa'i phyir// rog ti gza' yi nang bsgrub gsungs// du gzod la sogs dgon pa ru// dkyil 'khor bu gsum phrag ma bya// bu gsum skrag ma'i nang rol du// spel gri'i thod pa 'og tu
68a7(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ mnga' Sha// la sogs khrag sna tshogs// dug dang sde snga dkar gsum drug/ rab chang thod pas stong nas dag pa// gru gsum nad du gzhag par bya// brten pa bya ba'i thabs dag la// lha bsnyen sum d+har byas nas ni// tshes bani bco lnga brkyang dang
68b1(rnying rgyud): na gyin sa/ nga ga jug ga / sa / yong ga ga sa/ nas//
68b2(rnying rgyud): nam thung gis zang // ti sh+ya dgu ngam chas gcig la// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa btsang ba// rdza gcig gnas rten du bc-ig// mes ma 'jigs par gsung sngags banas/ oMng kyid 'dang thob/ rtag na rnye rab tu/
68b3(rnying rgyud): yinam// d+ha rar+tha maH/ badzan bdud khri khrul gyi/ gan lathongs kyi/ lcags rlo gsol/ mi ring mod/ cung rje chung mo na dubyu gre/ den mthor sngags mdzab bstan la// yul kyi phyogs su bzlas pa/
68b4(rnying rgyud): sang tha zang 'phang // d+hi rdzas zla ba chis bzhi nas// nyi chu dgra mthar 'gyen rdzogs nas// chub rgyas bdud byu bab// daltar las rnabs byas b+ha // rgyal ga khrag tu 'bangs sbyar // kyi 'dang rnams kyi la 'ir byed// 'ad ma dpal
68b5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i drud las/ chul tha / khrag tu dbab pa'i bla gas nang bsgrub kyi skabs te le wang ldan/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gas pan// 'gas bcom la dngab
68b6(rnying rgyud): slad du// sab 'dug gza' bo gsang bsgrub gsungs// rdug can chen po ny-i\u0f88\u0f90 ga~MN+TeH// drag po chen bA dpral// khrag tu dbab pa'i las 'di yin// dun khrod la sogs gnas dag tu// maN+Dab cad chag cig gdang kra// dbus sus
68b7(rnying rgyud): gsus brtsegs mtho// mu khrung thug batha~Mng phreng can// sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun par bri// zlal sngon dag gi phreng ba la// rdzas kyi bung thugs ming dus gzug/ khyil ba'i tshul chis pa 'a ga zhag/ grugasum dbus su bdag la ba
69a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ dkar thab dmar thab rdo thab gsum// gru gsum rgyab ma dag la gzhag/ sha rul khrag rul btsas dang rjen// ra mazin grub sman gru gul nag/ la phrag ta la zlog pa ltar mos// spel gri'i thod par thugs pa gzhag
69a2(rnying rgyud): dkar gsum klu sman mngar gsum dang // gu bul dkar po 'bras chan rnams// ma ltar mos pas 'khar gzhong blugs// mdun rdzas brdzus la thod par gzhag/ zor rog po'i rwa la ni// sngags bris steng du ming byang gdags// lA srin sde brgyad mchod
69a3(rnying rgyud): dgram// thun rdzas thod phreng steng du gzhag/ rang nyid gshing rje gshed po ste// yi dam bcas pa rdzogs pa dang // srog snying 'di ni nus zang brjod// oM bi sha la du ru ma shi kha dz+wa la at+ma swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun la mchod pa bya// suM 'dzin me byer chen po
69a4(rnying rgyud): sku mdog dud kha mig gis khengs// gshin rje gshed po'i zhabs drung ngu// rtsal ba'i bstan bsrung khas blangs pa// dus 'dir 'da' bar ma byed par// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di long sel// dam nyams srog rtsa gcad pa dang // yul du kho nad mer ba
69a5(rnying rgyud): yob// tab pa sha mi kI du ru ma shi ki dz+wa la ti a rbi ti sA d+ha/ dus chod brgyad la gtor ma byin// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma rnams// gzhung mthun nyams su lon pa dang // drag po thun gyi rdzas kyang brang // ga pu'i nang du sngags 'dis drang /
69a6(rnying rgyud): mu ka ye ka ba ye a pa ye g+h+r-i d+hIHbi kri na te yul 'di'i lo thog la/ tsa pa tri hra la ma hA kro d+ha ka ba ta/ shar shar r-i sha ya te hUM phaT/ thig nig gcig med gnyis tag/ brkyang bcad dud phrom gan ma mdzengs te/ lcags zlog khrol/ mi ring pod/ byang rje rgyang
69a7(rnying rgyud): dzu hUM phaT/ stong ngam khri thin rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sprul pa bcad// sngags kyis gang gi mchad du brab// tra gar kla thil shag zad/ ser 'dril shar cad/ de ni ma mo'i drag sngags so// oM a sa le mab+hi/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag zhwa thil
69b1(rnying rgyud): trail shar d+ho/ dgra bla'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki rA hu la hUM/ shag shar shar hril d+ho/ de ni bdud kyi drag sngags so// oM ser khrag la mu sha ga tub swA hA/ de ni srin po'i drag sngags so// oM ra ma tr-i bruM shag ri la ra ma shar sto/ de
69b2(rnying rgyud): dmu'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma rA dza ra ma hri la shar ram ram/ de ni gshin rje'i drag sngags so// oM nA ga tri la sen shagasad du na sa ma ya hri la d+ho/ de ni klu btsan gyi drag sngags so// ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ rA hu la hri la dril shag shag seMn se ya
69b3(rnying rgyud): ya b+h+yo b+h+yo ra ma ra ma hril thil/ de ni bgegs kyi drag sngags so// zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas brdeg/ ling+ga ba snang zhing thun rdzas brdeg/ gtum chen bstod la gza' mchog rbad// bla phur lin+da dag la brdeg/ tshes grangs thems nas grub
69b4(rnying rgyud): rtags 'byung // rdzas dang thun zor sngags dang ming // dbus kyi rabs chad thod par thugs// sa gzer yul dbus la sogs su// skya rengs gzer du btab la gzhag/ de nas thun gyi zor bya ste// dam rdza sa maN+Dal gong bzhin bya// dam sri yul gyi
69b5(rnying rgyud): sogs bsags// lha bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs phyed du ste// phyed ni man chad sngags 'di bzlas// oM mu ka ye ka pa ye a pa ye hrIHSh+T+rIHbi krin te yul 'di'i lo thog la dung phrom/ kar phro ma/ shu ti phro ma/ yug ti smin/ shar shar drag tu phob/ dz+wa la ti rA hra la/
69b6(rnying rgyud): a kro te ka phob/ shar shar ta pho ba hUM phaT/ tsa mu la~M/ a ga ne rag mo ko ra te swA hA/ rgyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ ho ho phro ma mu ri mu ra sha ru ru pro ma/ gang gi thig nag btags nas kyang / de la sham bu 'di yang gdags// ma mo sing ga ye/ ma mo bya tsa
