69b7(rnying rgyud): ye/ ma mo tsat+ta ye/ ma mo srog tsa ya~M/ dgra bo'i lo thog snar mo la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// mchod cing gtor ma dbul bar bya// rab sgral thabs kyis thugs dam bskang // thon nas gnam gzer ri la bya// dkar thab dmar thab sngo
70a1(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum// gcig tu dril la bzhi raH// dmar ring zor ni phyogs su 'phangs// gong gi sngags bzlas mdzub ris bya// nyi shu dgu la 'joms par 'gyur// yang rda chu gyes rdzogs pa la// khyab 'jug gtor ma rtag tu gtang //
70a2(rnying rgyud): baphur btab la gsad las bya// bar bar lha lnga dbye bar bya// de ltar byas na rab 'bring gi// gnam lcags kye dang dmu rdo dang // chu 'khyab / khrag tu dbab par bya// de la 'di'i las ni dus gang yang rung bar yang / khrag dang gu hrul dang grags zangs kyi phye ma rnams la
70a3(rnying rgyud): sngags la yul gang yang rung ba de'i lha rten nam chu mig tu sbas na/ yul de rlung gis khyer te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang rdzas de rnams la bzlas te ri lu byas nas dgra'i khang thog tu bskur na/ khang pa rdib par 'gyur ro// yang de rnams la brjod nas chu mig kha byang du
70a4(rnying rgyud): bltos par thos nas gang ltar drangs pas shwa ser 'ong ngo // srin rdo dang 'khar ba chag pa la bzlas nas/ khyab 'jug rgyu ba'i dus su brag kha zang du bltas par sbas na/ thog drag po 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'bru sna tshogs pa dang / 'brug gi rus pa dang chu srin gyi
70a5(rnying rgyud): rjer mo la bzlas nas 'og tu sbas rngal phyogs su gtor na/ ser ba drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// ka ka na so dang / khyi nag po'i mche ba la sngags nas dgra phyogs su gtor na sbrang nad du 'gyur// de la sogs te las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ser
70a6(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa dang // shwa bzlog pa yang de dang 'dra ste/ nyung dkar la sngags nas gtor na bzlog par 'gyur/ mang gA ya ti la brjod nas gtor ma thog bzlog par 'gyur ro// gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ chu bakhyag drag tu dbab pa gza'i drag sngags
70a7(rnying rgyud): gsang bsgrub kyi skabs te le'ung drug pa'o// / yang de nas 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po khrag 'thung N+yed+b+ha ts+tsha yA hAn+ta ka la ngan sngags kyi bdag mo bzhis phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod de/ bskor ba lan du mas bskor te// brkyang
70b1(rnying rgyud): btu btsal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis khas blangs pa'i// g.yal thog nag po'i las 'di dang // snying po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang // yang zhun lta 'ur dril ba'i don// dpa' bo lha rjes bshad dragasal// zhes
70b2(rnying rgyud): lus so// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mkha' 'gror zla gdong bzhi nyon// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan ltar byed cing // rnal 'byor can la phan bya'i phyir// 'phrul gyi sbyin thang 'khor
70b3(rnying rgyud): dang // drag po sngags kyi rim pa 'di// bshad nas bstan pa yun du sungs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams 'dun par gyur to// oM ma ma rab me snying shal d+ho/ ma ma rag mo dag mo// ru ru ro d+hatsa pa la/ dgra bo snying kha rag pa rtso/ ma ma rag mo dag
70b4(rnying rgyud): mo trag yo trab lo shig shig snying khar b+ho/ ma ma rag mo tsa ba mo khwa la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ rag+na snying rtsa ru ru tsa ba/ skyir kha dag 'gu mi nan ma shag mu shag ma ma dz+yo/ thig nig tsu ru tsu tra phaT/ ha phrom mu sha ru ru gro dung phroM kar gr-i shra ti pr-i/ ya ma snying ma mkhrag rag mo yag
70b5(rnying rgyud): mo ru ru tsab mo rag mo sa ma ya tirbe lA na/ ya ma snying ya mkhrang / rA phra la ba sha mu he/ ti du mA ra ya shan dza la ti a tsi ti swA hA/ hUM dza dza/ ya ma b+hing ya mkhagan+ta hru la hral hri la shAg shag sen sen sa mA ya b+h+yo/ hri la phreM phaT/ ya ma stir ya ma khrag ke ta ke ta drag po
70b6(rnying rgyud): phob phob/ rag mo rag mo ma ma a~M ka te ke ta nA ga ken tse lus hril phreM shar b+ho/ phra ba co phrab tse dan ta phab phab tse la rag hra la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma ma ri la sha ta tra ga ru tsa shu ti pri tsa mu shu dung phro sa ma ya a kar du ru gr-i phaT/ de nas sde brgyad kyis nye ba'i grogs bya ba bstan pa'i phyi
70b7(rnying rgyud): yang gzungs pa/ nAg sha sha d+hagal dum pa la/ srabadz+ra ya zhag te badz+ra badz+ra ya d+hUr+tha/ ya d+hun bru~M rA hrIk+Shats+tsha/ na ras ya br-i \u0f7f/ ma sna ba N+Di Sh+T+r-ik+Shats+tsha/ ran tro hU~M b+h+yaH/ yan ts+tsha ts+tshaH/ badz+ras rgyu ma khrimams pa dz+ra ru dzaH/ thag zla'athu
71a1(rnying rgyud): tra mr-i ru tiNi dz+yo/ su badz+ra ya k+kag tar+tha ts+tshaHb+h+yo/ 'gus dran ma a tsu s+phA sha/ ma ma rag mo kha ma khas rak+ka ma br-i rbe/ rak+sha rak+sha \u0f7fga shu cag shu dam nyams lo la thur 'ur chom chem ya yaM rbad rbad cheg mo la d+hA d+ha/ oM r+tha ga rab ma
71a2(rnying rgyud): le shag rbod/ sen hri la shar shag a sa le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag shag shad hril shar shar byo/ pa shang mi ki rA hra la trUM shag shag thil thil b+h+yo/ oM ma sen dmas na khrag la ma sha rubs rubs/ oM raM laM shag dzi la ngi shar shar b+h+yo/ oM ya ma raHyaM
71a3(rnying rgyud): rI hri la shar shar raM/ shar shar ri nA ga hril hri la sa na shA ga/ sa twa sa ma ya hri la b+h+yo/ oM ya ma s+thing ya ma rag mo yag mo// trag rak+Sha mo khrag la mu sha b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu rngubs rngubs a sa me phra me sha pa sha me ge dang mA ra ya shi dz+wa la ti ge a tsa ti ta h+ya la hU~M
71a4(rnying rgyud): oM 'grang gyi so lu ru hri la yag mas+ya pheM tse ru da ri hUM phaT/ oM ya ma trag kha do li shar mad drug krugs dril phrod sud ri hUM phaT/ bi rba ma rag 'da' ge ga ka li ur pha nu da pa ra ta swA hA/ ha baM hri la shar bru~M trai la/ nyog 'dril phreM che ge mo'i lo thog dur 'ur chem che marba da ya yaM/
71a5(rnying rgyud): phreM phob phob drag ser phob b+h+yo/ trA~M ya \u0f89\u0fa4 de ba ra tsa swA hA/ haM kra shra na ga gur swA hA/ hUM hU~M ma ra tsa hUM/ oM a kro te ka ya mA n+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM/ oM be tA li rak+Sha ya thA man swA hA/ rin chen sngags kyi phreng ba na/ rtsa ba bsgreng dang bzlas pa'i dod// bkru dang dkrug
71a6(rnying rgyud): dang brdeg pa yis// gsad gsod dbab bsrung don rnams ni// the tshom med par len par gsungs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdzas dang las rim 'phen pa yi// ting
71a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnal 'byor kun gyi don du bshad// ces gsungs so// dam ri srin grag khrag gi mchi ris can// yang na seng ge 'tshong ba sa bu'o// yang gsungs pa/ 'khor lo'i yi ge'i ga'a'am// bsnyen pa las kyi bca' gzhi nyid// yan lag rdzogs nas
71b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i dkyil du gzhag/ rdzas bstan pa'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ ting 'dzin stobs su 'gyur ba'i phyir// rten rdzas su gzugs legs par bsham// snying po sngags dang mtshan ma gzhag/ mthun pa'i rdzas bskyed 'askor te gzhag/ rtags dang ldan par
71b2(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa bya// zhes bka' stsal to// mon nam gcan gzan rabs chad thod pa ru// stag dom pa glang nya yi snying // seng ge khwa dang bya rog pha wang dang // na d+hi ma rnams kun gyi dngas ma lnga// thod pa'i nang du mthun rdzas bsog/ ces gsungs so// de nas
71b3(rnying rgyud): yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'bru sgra khrag sna tshogs pa la// gtor ma sman dang chang gis rgyangs te rgyas par bsham/ zhes gsungs so// ka ro lA baM shos zur gsum la// gro ni rgyas pa'i rim par shes// 'das dmar zla ga ma ri ma dmar bum/
71b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// stag dang glang dang seng ge dom// bag phye ru tse la sogs gzugs byas la// rang rang sha khrag rdzogs byas mchod// ces gsungs so// gzhan yang ga yal thog tshul dgra yul rdog sum rdzing / yul lha gtan gyi sa yi rten byas te/
71b5(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyings dang kha dog bsgyur// de nas thun gyi thod par gzhug/ sti phreM byol thog sbyor ba ni// me gyi lta bu'i rim pa ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rim pa ni// 'dod pa'i kha dog ji lta bar// nai ri mu yi thal bar 'gyur// rtag po'i kha dog
71b6(rnying rgyud): rjes su bya// mthun pa'i ga'ur rgya yis gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// rim pa las kyi gzhung bsgrub pa// 'jigs byed chen pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dang po
71b7(rnying rgyud): rgyun la gnyis par sbyar// gsum pas dril la bzhi pas yul du bskul// sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pa ni// rim pa bzhin du ma nor bzlas// sa so'i rtazla ldan las la sbyar bar bya// rtags gsum ldan pas yul du baphrul bya'o// de la las
72a1(rnying rgyud): !hU~M// la d+ha dus sa s+ho// rtag rgya dngas / shA ma pas ma // rgyas rtswa brgyad/ // na sa man// yang mams pa
72a2(rnying rgyud): 9// chos gcigs dro thang nas s+ho// gnyis pa te ma~M nu pa nas kyang byapangs ga to// gsum la nyin byeng rje nas shing // dani'i khyo donas n-i byeng // 'i ma hU~Md mi'i sgonas kyang / drug ladzo dngas ste ga nas nung byeng / bdud lanam
72a3(rnying rgyud): byed ga das rgyab/ brgyad la nyim dur la byang ga nas na / la d+ha rengs shing nas byung nas ny-ir/ bcu la ni ma byang na skyon pathang / badz+rag cig nyi mnungs rgyan shing du/ brda ga nyid rje rungs nas byang shang du/ @
72a4(rnying rgyud): bsum nam tsho 'dzing stonas byang nga/ bcu bzhi ne ma gyid dz+ha shar nas nu' byang du/ btsa d+ha ti b+hed shang nas nub d+hi/ mar gyi gcig nas bstan pani/ gcig la te mdzes nas byang sher nas so// gnyis lam sher dus byang rjes s+ho// gsu
72a5(rnying rgyud): la skya rengs shar nas nub byang nas shar g+ho// bzhi la nam phyed nas nub nas shar du/ lngal te ma dros nas sto nub nas byung shar du/ chag lanam byed nas lho nas byang du/ bdun n-i gyur lho shang nas chung byang du/ brkyang la rdo rangs sher nas
72a6(rnying rgyud): dbul nyi phyed byang shad nas lhon ba d+ha/ brtula'i phyed byang nas nub tu N+ya/ bcu gzig nyi nu brlab byang rnaMs shar lhor/ bcug nyis grod la nub nas shang ru rgya/ badz+ra gsum nyi byed ny-i nr-i nub nas byang shang du/ bcu bzhi sbya rengs shar na
72a7(rnying rgyud): nas kyang dza/ mtsho ldanam phyeng yal nas lho shar nas nub byung rngub/ rtag tu rgyaba'i ma bri // 'di na nga bye gza' yalas// zhes gsungs sa// dbang rnags chen pa'i rgyud las/ gnas lcags thog 'thebs kyi rna
72b1(rnying rgyud): ma na// danas gas pa dun nams na/ na la / sa sa / du klas na pa/ na tu / da
72b2(rnying rgyud): dbab bang ni cingon// 'dugs byed chen pos bshad drugasal// zhes glengasas// 'jigs kyang chen thos bka phral pa// nyon rjeg zung zhig nga 'don// des gsungs pA la sems zud cig/ du 'o gsang ti gnang
72b3(rnying rgyud): mcho gling dang bragran ga khrag gi mchi sa can// srin mo ngal pa bsigs pa'adra// mkha' 'gro khyab 'jug gnas yin te// tron du bya ba'i las zin nas// mthing nag zhu gsun dkyil 'khror la// b+ha ga ra gsum la lha gdum ste// da
72b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po'o// g.yas su grol byed g.yon du spor ba sum// mdun du yam dadzu'o// mdun du yang yum rten rdzas dgod// khag tu tshogs gtor ma la// dar+b+ha rnaM chags ban d+hang bkyil// maun rnam bas chang thod pa'o// rog
72b5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsil// sha dus ta rung nya yi snying // khrag tu rdzogs pa'i mchod pa bsham// mthing na gdam kyis lagacang // snrel klu 'thod ba ldang la can// phra gsum cing mag cil lon pa'i khrag/ ju gnag ting dang ne lce su dza rnying // badz+ran
72b6(rnying rgyud): dang dngas madran pang ga zug/ gzhan yang gzag pa tshogs sbyar// zhing rtags 'babyung mchod pa'i ngas phyagazhag/ dz+nyAn po min gyi mang ba na// rang ma gzhag dang sam la// tshigs ga zag tshong ba bgam// rgya bo dang mar po rje nadu/
72b7(rnying rgyud): ci mang gtsum dang // bdu rtsi lnga dang ldan lnga dang // phra mar 'asres la mchod pa'o// gsad pathun gyi rdzas rnams ni// lcags kyi zangs kyang gyi dang // kyang nag khris pa drag pa'i na// namo khrag tam N+Dang dkar gsod pa'i rkyen// \u0f7fdang
73a1(rnying rgyud): nang ga/ gas du na// sgru ba blang dag pa // mthun nan pa ma paH// rdzu ga sa // dgag nga da// rabya / ma partan spyaH/ 'an
73a2(rnying rgyud): ni// dri ma gsum dngas gsum la// chu gsum drings smra bar bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gzugs byas la// 'brug khung nang drag na chal gzhag/ yugs sa mo'am bam gyi sgra bkal la// sngon dmar gsung pas byin kaM bdas// ning gi smras pa'i
73a3(rnying rgyud): skud pa gsum// lci ba snying gzhi nus gdags// phur pa gsum la btod la gzhag/ dmigs pa'i rten dur rog bca'// ske ru gzas pa'i mi byung gdags// rtags byung las rnams rdzogs par bya// man nas drag tu nges par mnan// ri rab rgya
73a4(rnying rgyud): steng gnas te// don yod grub pa'i pho brang bca'// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o 'jigs byed chen po lags// bstan pa spyan du gnas bya'i phyir// drag po'i dab thog bshad du gsol// zhes gsum
73a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bka' stsal pa/ drag po'i las kyi gnad byan// mon nam rabs chad thod pa ru// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kun bsdus te// sngags rnams rdzogs par thod par bri// 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor pho brang bcang // thod pa'i nang du dpal thog gzugs// ji ltar 'dod
73a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bca'// mon mo'i phung pas pho brang bzung // skyer ba'i phur pas yul lha gzir // seng ldeng phur pas par gzer bya// bsnyen sngags thun sngags bris la gdags// zor dang me chu 'bebs pa'i dus// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'jigs byed
73a7(rnying rgyud): pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// ngas gsungs pa la sems bu cig/ drag po sngags mi phreng ba ni// me lce lta bur rab tu bstan// bi sbrum ma su ri tsi tor// rA hu la hrig tso shu tshil ma khrag gar ti thang thang hUM/ a gro ga ti/
73b1(rnying rgyud): ga mas thadag pa paT/ zad du/ yAs rgyan pa la bshA kAl shag smra bte sa// nanapa rnag nog // dang zhabs a ga du su dang / blatham sa tanyam grang gang du na na na rnam padapag
73b2(rnying rgyud): ra tsa thal ma ni/ hu rba h+ye ru/ ma ma ri ril ril phob/ gshe rag she wA nA ga pr-i/ dul nal dul nas chem tshwa ma phob/ ta ki tsa ti sa ni phob phob/ bi kI ne/ khwa li mA dra ya thad buM ripa/ yab smi ku pa shin rbad gug ri la thams rbad bu shag/ sra nyin
73b3(rnying rgyud): sru mi rbad 'ongs zhu mas ril rbad/ he ba ti sa kAng ha ra ting shed zaso nam las la thun rbad/ hri shag ru trag ra ma ni ko kri ma ma yo za 'gram ha he yo ki she la dza dza/ 'di ni ye shes rdo rje ste// rdo rje phalam lta bur drug pa med/ sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o//
73b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bka' stsal to// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po las rgod kyi skabs te le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshin rje gshed pos/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbang ba'i phyir lha dbang phyug chen
73b5(rnying rgyud): po phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// lhor bltas thag chen seng ge mchod pa 'dra// yang na a dmar lo ma 'dra ba'am// dur khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor goms pas yo byad ldan byas te// 'phags pas sogs mchod cing gtor ma gtad
73b6(rnying rgyud): dra phying gtsang ma mda' gang gru bzhi la// mtshal lam ldong ros dag gis thig btab ste// le'u tse dgu pa dag gi tshad du bya// dbus su ga pur dag gis chus bkrus la// dang dmaras sam dkar la 'jam pa la// lha chen dbang phyug dag gi gzugs bris te/
73b7(rnying rgyud): smyug ma gtsang ma dag la dgod par bya// steng nas dmar po dar gyi gdugs kyis dgab// de yi mtshams bzhing ljang bu'i 'phan bzhi gzug/ phyogs bzhi'i le'u tshe bzhi po dag la yang // lha yi blon po bzhi yi gzugs bris dgod// shar du dri tha
74a1(rnying rgyud): lu nyid dgod par bya// lho ru gshin rje nub tu klu gdon lha// byang du gnod sbyin lha ste bzhi po dgod// de yi phyi rim me tog sna tshogs bskor// mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gcig/ nang du la khrag dang ra yang bral// skying
74a2(rnying rgyud): gi srog rtsar dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// khre'u cu tse dag la dgra gzugs bya// snying gar thig le'i dkyil du ming rus gzug/ ske nas sngon dmar sud pas gdags byas te// lag pa g.yas kyi srin lag rgyal dag la// chas gos ljang nag mgo lazod
74a3(rnying rgyud): nag bcing // dur khrod ras sam bram ze'i pags pa la// ldong ros chu rtsas kha dog ser por bsgyur// dug dang khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje'i snying po bri// dbus kyi lte bar lha chen snying po dgod// phyi rim thog gi dngab
74a4(rnying rgyud): sngags dag gis bskor// 'khor lo mnga' gsol dbang bskur smon lam gdab// bram ze la sogs mdze can thod par gzhug/ de yi nang du gser dang lcags zangs dang // dngul dang snying sgra khrag snga mang blugs te// le'u tse'i dbus su man 'dzi'i khal bzhag
74a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis tshul bzhin bskyed// dbang chen rim brtsegs steng du b+h+rUM gcig bsam// b+h+rUM las 'bar ba'i lha yi gzhal med khang // phyi dang nad med kun tu gsal bar bskyed// dbus sum he bam chen pa sgrol ba la// nyi zla 'khor lo rab tu 'bad pa'i
74a6(rnying rgyud): steng rnga/ ya las 'jam dpal gshed po 'bar ba'i sku// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis gsal bar bskyed// de yi 'khor na lha yi tshogs gnas te// ma hA de ba hUM zhes brjod pa yis// dbus su lha chen ma hA de ba yang // sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba can
74a7(rnying rgyud): rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas// zhags pa be con rdo rje g.yon pa na// smin mtshams glog 'gru bskal pa'i thog 'bebs bsgom// 'khor gyi lha yang rta zhon thog 'bebs pa'o// de bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bsgom la// gshin rje gshed pos
74b1(rnying rgyud): lus bsrung dbang dru thAy+Ya// b+h+yAM/ las rnams rim gyis bzang pa'i yang can!/ dz+nyAn 'am dbang gis bstan pa 'amal nAdzad cing // ma hA da ba lta man dbang phyug gaH// bstan pa bshigs pa'i dang rnams bskal ba dang // sangs rgyas brtan brdung bya d+d+ha/
74b2(rnying rgyud): mchog pastong pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// oM bra ma na rag sha e h+ya hi dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dga' zhing gus pa'i thal sbyar pus btsugs nas// lha mchog khyed kyi yon tan rab brjod cing // tsam pa ka dang pad+mas rab gtor nas// deng
74b3(rnying rgyud): 'dir bstod de khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed kyi thugs ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'dra zhing // 'od zer cha las 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thogs med mkha' lding dang pa'i gdan stengs su// brtan par bzhugs nas bdag la dngos grub gsol// 'khor gyi
74b4(rnying rgyud): chen mi bzad thog 'bebs bzhi// shugs kyi thogs med rta mchog gdan la bzhugs// ma hA de wa pra man tsar zhi sa ma ya tiSh+Tha wAn// lha yul gtsang ma dag la rab bshams te// bram ze mtshan ldan chags pas rab tu mchod// 'bras dang ku shar bcas pa'i
74b5(rnying rgyud): chab dang // ga pur gur sum gla rtsi ce pog sogs// til mar bsung can rab gsal mar me'i mchog/ du ru ka la sogs pa dri yi chu// lag ban mar dang bcas pa'i bur ma bshos// dud dang bye ru zangs dang kre shel dang // rba ting rdza rnga mun dzo ti mi li// che lang
74b6(rnying rgyud): pi wang tam bu rgyud gcig pa// glu gar rtsed 'jo rol mo dag la sogs// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ma lus kun// mchod par 'bul lo thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// oM sarba pU dza puSh+pe d+hU pe A lo ke san+d+he ba liM pU dza hoH/ sku mdog nag po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs//
74b7(rnying rgyud): drang srong cha lugs pad+ma'i phreng bas brgyan// zhal ba'i gling ba ni yongs pa khyab par gzigs// snyan pa'i dril sra gsung gi gdangs skad can// dbang phyug chen go byed la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor gyi lha yi blon po bzhi// rta la zhon nas ral gri bskor// thog sar
75a1(rnying rgyud): gangs smras/ 'a gas ga sa// nam / nag tu bla shAn / sa / dA na nan sa /
75a2(rnying rgyud): len pa ni hrIn+da/ de gad ba stong la bsten pa brtsi// rang gis mnyes dbang yang gzug/ nyes byas bris su'i mdun ru bshags// 'dod 'bod cing g.yab 'dor bya// gshed ba bskyod la lha rnams bskul// g.yas nas paskor zhing thags dam
75a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod khams nyi shu'i yang rtse nas// gzugs khams lha yi dag 'tshal nas// pho brang bde ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dbang bskur ba'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po na// spyani dmar ser 'bang ba la// tshad med dbu ni khyor bzhi 'arjod //
75a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyis pad+ma skyon dang bral// thams bgrang phreng rig sngags spel// g.yon gyi bu rjes dgos 'dod skong // thA ma thug sdod dgra dgegs skyong // ngang pas bsam par yud kyis phyin// pad+ma ser pos brgyan byas nas// ras kyi kha tshar mgul h+yan can// thugs
75a5(rnying rgyud): dab rbab tu bskul byas nas// log pa'i dgra bgags 'joms pa'i tshe// muni sngon ga chen pa la// zhem mtshab ga dngas pa yis// dam pa bdun rgyud cang nas gcod// smin mtshams klog 'bru thob chen 'bebs// thal mo brdab pas thog chen 'bebs/
75a6(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo brtul bas gling bzhi 'khrugs// ljags brgyang srid pa g.yo bar mdzad// don na mchog gsum gyi srud gu 'di// thog chen 'bar bas lnga zung shig/ rje man chad la bdun chud tshad// 'khor gyi ldan bzhi las la bskul// byar snang thog can 'brul du drug
75a7(rnying rgyud): dbang po nam lda kha long kha// bung du 'khor g.yo gnang phyugs la// gsang thog lcags theg tsal la// 'bar la'i tha ba dudang byu // zangs thog la khar thog dmas ser ma// ma 'od klog dmar khrugs sa khrug/ 'khor rnams shugs tshon tunan cig/
75b1(rnying rgyud): ra'agri po 'od zad la bskor// ki kang gshed bzhi'i las la 'gyed// ral gra ba skor ba 'ad 'bros pas// thog can du tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs// nyams pa'i dgral thog mda' yA// skad cig tsam la phung bar gyis// zhwas rta snying blta cing raH
75b2(rnying rgyud): phreng // rtags su 'brug dang ser ba dang // glog dang thog rang shA brad 'ong // grub pa'i rtags byung thog gta' gzhug/ mkhar rmang sta rten nu mig gam// mchod rten lha khang 'gram 'og tu// lhag par da gra yi grog 'am// nyal ba'i sngapa sam tan 'og
75b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bcas pa'i thod pas// drag sngags 'di bzlas thong par gseb// aM sa mdung dra nam maH/ mahA la dam yi yul khams su/ ro'adra ba badz+ra zab pa ni/ zhes pa ni rjod pa'i nang du bzlas// gtod byen rte gang dzin 'amag dang // bri
75b4(rnying rgyud): la rten bcas la// dra phying mtha' dag 'a dril// rtag tu lha rnams mchod byung na// yid la ci bas ma 'grub par 'gyur// gshin rje blugasar nag po'i chud las/ 'jig rten du thog dbab pa d+ma'i thugs skabs te le'u da dgu pa'o// / de nas yang ba
75b5(rnying rgyud): 'das 'jigs byed chen po gshinarje gshed pos 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i slad du/ thog 'bebs lha yi nang bsrub gsungs// srid par ma srid mgar gyis ma brdungs mtshon// ye srid byang chub sems kyi dpal dar can// rlung gi sa ma thung gshegs pa
75b6(rnying rgyud): dang// ye blang chen por mtshon dpal dar can des// 'thung ba gzhan gyis mi brdzi mi tshugs shing // nyid kyis gang 'a thogs chag med par 'doms// de nyid 'aslab phyir dur khrod la sogs su// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang krung zhi la// dbus su pra gsu
75b7(rnying rgyud): oM brtsigs te// 'khor lo bzhi dang rol mtsho bdun// gser de'i dbus su ya mAn+ta ka ste// steng du lha chen dbang blag yab yum dgod par bya// 'khor lo bzhi la lha yi rnon po bzhi// khrag zhag mar khu chang dang sbrang rtsi'o ma dang // rgya mche rdul sogs pa
76a1(rnying rgyud): mam brgyan// nyaman la la byu ba lda ga dang // dngam thu pa nga rgyad gang du dag // d+hiH nya mnan par mang la yang gas la// gas zung ba ma byas pa dgang // gshin rngam mthon po mnga' yang gsol/
76a2(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi phur pa nub kyi rtsibs la dgod// klu dbang lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// lcags kyi bur ba byang gi rtsibs la dgod// gnod sbyin lha yi blon por mnga' yang gsol// 'khor ba'i phur ba dbus kyi e la dgod// dbang phyug chen po ma sbed par
76a3(rnying rgyud): mda' yang gsol// gro ga shing rgan ras sa ma dang dkar la// lha rnams rang rang rgya ba'i snying po dang // dbab pa'i sngags dang dmigs pa'i yul ming bri// ljon dmar sdud pas phur ba'i mgul du gdags// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa kha sbyong la// thod pa'i
76a4(rnying rgyud): nang med par khrag gis byug/ steng gi 'od pa yab tu mnga' yang gsol// 'og gi thod pa yum du mnga' yang gsol// thong pa steng mar yab kyi thu yang bri// thad pa 'og med yum gyi sku yang bri// thod pa'i rtsibs rim dmigs pa'i ming nus bro// dpral bar rus hA/
76a5(rnying rgyud): kha ru ming yang bri// snying gar ni pri 'doms su bla dag b+h+ri// de yi tha mar lho sbyar dza yis bskor// gro ga shing shun zhing gi pags pa la// dpe bo'i gzugs bris dbang phyug yum la glan// 'khar ba'i phur pa zod pa'i nang du gzhug/ grog shog shog shing gi/
76a6(rnying rgyud): lo ma la// lha chen tshogs pa dag dbang phyu chen po khyod// khyod kyi btsun mo mA ra ya 'dis sbyar// 'khor gyi lha rnams mur du bskul mdzod la// 'di la drag po'i thog chen phob ces bri// phur pa de yi mgul du gdags par bya'o// thod pa'i nang du nga 'i khrag
76a7(rnying rgyud): kam po dang // gseng bye zangs kyi lcags kyi la phyi dang // dngul dang thog phyogs thag phreng shib yi// snying dang rus pa sha ya mya li// tha~Md pa/ 'a sbyang mi yi rna mas bcis// skyed gsum nga la grwa gsum steng du gzhag/ chu skyes me tog tu chags
76b1(rnying rgyud): dang // rin chen sna lnga sman rnams dang // 'dod pa'i longs spyod zas rnams dang // rgun chad sbrang dang 'bras chad dang // 'bru chang dang ni a su sha/ de dag mchod pa'i rdzas su dgram// sna tshogs snying dang khrag tu sbyar// bu ram 'bras kyi gtor ma brti//
76b2(rnying rgyud): lha yi blon po bzhi la dgod// ling+ga ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs// gzugs ming byas pa mdun du gzhag/ sngags kyis thab cing gsang las bya// ting 'dzin gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa bskyed// ya mAn+ta ka gsal bar bsgom// gdan du yi dwags
76b3(rnying rgyud): gding bar bya// dbang phyug chen po gsal bsgoms te// 'khor gyi lha bzhis bskor bar bsam// oM ma hA de ba kA la hUM/ zhes brjod dbang phyug chen po yang // nag po chen po mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag mtshan rtse gsum khyung gi rgyal mtshan g.yas//
76b4(rnying rgyud): zhags pas 'dren tshul be con rdeg tshul g.yon// chibs su 'brug rta sngon po chibs// gser gyi ral gri 'bar ba klad la bskor// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i shang lang glo la btags// de 'dra rab tu gsal bsgom bya// shar phyogs lha yi byag/
76b5(rnying rgyud): na dngul gyi gzhu bdungs shing // dngul gyi mda' ltong dngul gyi 'khor lo bskor// 'brug rta zhon nas ki kang 'phral la 'jug/ dngul gyi thog 'bebs ser ba'i sbyin 'dang gtong // lho nas gser gyi thog chen gong bzhin 'bebs// nub nas thangs thog
76b6(rnying rgyud): byang nas lcags thog 'bebs// de 'dra gang la bsgoms la yengs par mi bya'o// hU~M/ rnam snang mdzad nyid mi g.yo gtsug tor brtan// byang chub chen po mchog gi phyag rgya ni// bdud 'dul chen po'i sku ru sprul pa'i rgya// byang shar mtshams nas shin tu sku
76b7(rnying rgyud): bde bstan// me lce bar snang sprin gtibs dpal 'khor nas// sku stod sngo nag mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'od phung can// shin tu khro brjid dbang phyug gtum bag che// thugs rjes sprin ltar gtibs shing nam mkha' gang bar khyab// gzir gnon sta bas
77a1(rnying rgyud): kyis dregs pa gzir zhing gnon// bdud po nag po spyan gsum mje ba can// bstan pa 'jig pa'i srog la spyan 'dren na// dbang phyug lha chen 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dbang phyug chen pa gam
77a2(rnying rgyud): nas spyod tsam na// rtse gsum 'bar ba khyung gi rgyal mtshan phyang te gshegs// zhags pas 'den cing be con snying la brdeg/ nag po spyan gsum sdang mig bzlog pa'i bdud// dbu skra 'bar ba grog gzer ngal pa can// sku lus mon pa sbyin gsum ser ba
77a3(rnying rgyud): 'grol// rdo dpal mche ba zla tshes gyen du 'khyil// kun mig bzlog pas spyi 'dang rma 'dang 'babs// shangs nas rlung ni 'thong 'bud bu yug 'khrugs// mdud dang gri rkang sku yi rten du bcas// spyan mig mi mthun las kyi zla ba 'brel ba ltang /
77a4(rnying rgyud): 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gshegs su gsol// oM hriM hi ma hA kA la tri dza ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+ri/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hUM/ lha chen dbang phyug 'khor ba'i g.yul bzlog pa// sprul pa'i rlabs chen lha yi dmag dpung sbyang // dbang phyug legs
77a5(rnying rgyud): ldan nag po'i 'khor gyis bskor// dbang phyug lha chen sku wa phyag 'tshal lo/ dbang phyug bsod nams gzi byin 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pas lung bstan 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang phyug ti zla'i 'od ltar zhal gsal zhing // ma
77a6(rnying rgyud): rig sgrib pa ma lus sel mdzad pa'i/ 'khor bcas lho yi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// me to pa phreng la sogs pa dang // rin chen dbyig dang sgog btsong dang // la phug la sogs kun dang ni// 'bras bu yid bzhin sna tshogs zas// phyogs bcwa chu skyes
77a7(rnying rgyud): dang ni langs spyod can// rig sum zad mdzad pa'i longs spyod dbul/ dkyi 'khor mdzes pa'i gyu kyis brgyan// gal zas bdud rtsi dgad sman gyis mchod// eb+he hi ma hA kAr+pa khi tim hAr klu du pa gas d+hA t+ti/ drA m+b+ha/ mahA be d+d+ha rlig ra /
77b1(rnying rgyud): dab sus can pa 'byung bcas pa// mchod ldan pa sag par chags dang // rdzas dang brgyad pag ni'ang // tha ba dad pas sa cad 'bral ba // bam pa pa'i sa blang babar baspyod// gdug pa dang ya padang par gtar // drugag
77b2(rnying rgyud): rtsadagazod mche ba gtsigs pa po// ye shes spyan gsum nyo zla'i gzhu la// ston pa'i bka' ba byung bla med lung bstan dpal// dam tshig chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang mdzad// bla re cod parda brjid pas bcings pa na// nges par ston pa bcwa mi badz+ra
77b3(rnying rgyud): pos 'phags// rtag tu ngur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas na bzhugs// dur khrod gnas nam mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// nad gtong shrI'i tshogs rnams kun mchod nas// bstan pa bshigs pa'i mdangs 'phrog thal ba'i rdul du chog/ skyo sa chen gang
77b4(rnying rgyud): pags pa gos su gyon// lha klu gnyen gyi grong khyer thams cad du// lho chen bdud dpung rje btsan gsum pa nas// log 'dren dgra bgegs gzing gdul gnon pa'o// dpa' bo chen po stag gi pags pas mtshan// 'khor du/ yi blon po bzhi yas
77b5(rnying rgyud): bkor// phyogs rnams phyogs che kun tu rnam grangs la// smon lamakhyad par mang po'i mthus sbyar sa la// rdzu ma lta bur rnam par thad byas rol// phan mdzad dmag dpon khyod la yang // sdug bsngal tshabs gdungs pa'i sems can la// drag po'i phyog
77b6(rnying rgyud): chen wa gu d+had du 'bebs// lha chen dab ltag khyod la bdag 'drung byabs su mchi// sngags 'dis lha rnams srag kyang bzung // oM mahA de bak+Sha la ka s+t+ri d+ha rje 'i in bIs pan dza rtag du ru ti pe kan pra be he se zed de bu se rnye de brten skA ra ya/ khris shi
77b7(rnying rgyud): bskul bskyed pa stod// 'od dang pra dang drizhi pa~M dang // 'brug dang glog dang thog dang shwa// de rnams 'grub pa'i rtags su ste// dbang du brgya zhing phrin las bcol// thog zlog bdag bskul zhing zad// gnam lcags thog chen 'bebs pa'i b+ha// rdzibs
78a1(rnying rgyud): sa ga ldan 'as// ral phra grang dang sang gA khrid// bams khyen dang san // shangs nas sug zlababang 'dub// sngags sa sar can stobs smra TIg/ shal gi khyang shA 'dra// gas
78a2(rnying rgyud): lcags thog chams sa chem// gnam lpags ral gri wad la bskor// gsar gyi shang lang glog can 'khrug/ 'khor kyi lha chen thag 'bebs te// shar rdzogs dri za'i zhing khams nas// dra za lha yi blon po yang // dngul rtsi gzhu brjing pa mda' stong /
78a3(rnying rgyud): lag na dus kyi tsag zhan 'babs// ngu ma dzin can 'jan// kAkang pa ma khrul la 'dzud// thag sa kyi 'ad tho bung 'babs// de bzhin phyogs kyi blun pazhi bsgral// ga ga dab bzugs pa par bgyu// shA tsas chud pa
78a4(rnying rgyud): shi shad de ba zag rgyas rgyas/ byang chu na nas shig ra la/ de nags than dbabapal// tha mamatshamagag shig/ snar yang dzug kha la za byuH/ mdzangag pa pa na ga mang la/ rlo s+hog
78a5(rnying rgyud): 'o// de zhin d+ha g+ha baN+Da ga/ dmigs pa'i yul gyi bus na// sngags tha ma ra kyi zang dum// zangs rnams pa c-i gas papa// da bzhin sa nas pa bgyur na// zas pa'i nas dngas ba // dalan kyi
78a6(rnying rgyud): dpa sa zlagasang nag pa'i rgyad las/ thig dang ba pa'i lha'i blags gi skabs nyo la 'a na pal// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rjegashad pas brtan pa gnyen pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ thag dbab d+ha'i gsang baphrub gsu ra /
78b1(rnying rgyud): rmang+ga dag gakyal mtshan pa// dmigs pa'i ming rus 'og tu gzhug/ phrug rgod rtsang sor bzhi bzhog la// 'ang+ga dag gi ka ru gdags// kye dang kar gtsang ma bu bzhi gcig/ stegs bu'i thang du bting nas kyang // nas sngon phul gang shar du srung // rnab
78b2(rnying rgyud): tu til nag phul gang srung // dkyil du rgal mtshan gzug par bya// nyon mo sngags bzlas nas kyis thab// nub mo sngags bzlas til gyis zab// sngags rdzogs ri gsum rtser song la// e brkos ming rus nang du gzhug/ rtsad dang mnyam pa'i khung
78b3(rnying rgyud): brkos la// dgra la rtse bstan res mos gzhug/ dbang phyug chen por las btsal la// 'o dod bos te gsang cing gnan// myur du thog tshon 'bebs 'dod na// rnam par smin pas shi ba'i mgor// ha la pha la ta ka da la// de bzhin sna tshogs nyung dkar nag
78b4(rnying rgyud): zhing chen pags pa mtshan ngan la// yul gyi ming dang brnag pa'i ming // de bzhin bris te der bcug la// spyan drang bzhugs mchod bsnyem par bya// drag sngags 'di dag rab tu bzlas// ma hA tsaN+Da rak+Sha be sha a na ya pho ba/ ha ra tsat+ta ma hA tsaN+Da ya zhab k+ka pho/
78b5(rnying rgyud): rAkrA ma hA ya k+Sha b+h+yo/ shar she la ha la ha la dan d+ha pra tso phob/ pra tse pra tse ha ri ha ri dze hu hi b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rA ga rak+ta tsaN+Da ma hA sha ga ti na na/ tu ra tsaN+Da Da pa tsa pa tsa ha la ha la da ra da ra phaT/ rag+ha tsa na ti ma tra ya wa hi Sh+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badz+ra tsa ra badz+ra d+he wa ha na ha da b+h+yo/ gar 'dod gnas/
78b6(rnying rgyud): kyi yul lha'i rten// bdun 'bum bzlas bya khru gang gnan// dus min thog chen 'babs par nges// dung dang a ru dang ni li gdur rnams la sngags te dgra phyogs su gtong na mdzar 'gyur ro// bag zan la sems can gyi gzugs ci 'dod pa byas la khrag /
78b7(rnying rgyud): gis byug nas khang pa'i thog tu gzhag na/ sems can da nyid mang por byas nas khang pa'am zhing gse btu ska dang na 'don cing 'ong ngo // sman 'bri ta sa 'dzin dang / g+hi wang la sngags nas rdza mar thug na gum bu dang srin bung 'gyur ro// lu bar grugs na
79a1(rnying rgyud): tshong ma tha mar 'gyur ro// tshon rtsi lnga la sngags nas byam du bzhag na byi bas khyim dang zhang wu ma ra la za mi rnas so// s+yA ti ba la sngags nas ming na bud med la bu mang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyug shang la sngags nas
79a2(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la mchod nas phyugs 'gab nyung ba'i skar btags na 'gab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan la sngags nas rtag tu lus la bcangs na mdze 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpal zla gsang nag po'i gyur las/ 'jig rten khams su thog dbab
79a3(rnying rgyud): lho thA gsang skabs te le'u re gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang // 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir// na ngan bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gsungs
79a4(rnying rgyud): bu khrod la sogs dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// sa bdag mnyes bya mnyes mkhyen pa gsol// phung ba'i thus nas sa blangs dkyil 'khor brtsigs// mang khrag rims khrag la sogs mag chag gdab// dug gis dpal bskyed sman gyis dri yang dpung // dbus
79a5(rnying rgyud): gu gsum brtsegs ma gting du bu// zla gam dmang po 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// mu khyung zlum po thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// gru chad par khyams sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar// gru gsum rtse drug dpal gyi zhal dug bri// dbus su 'jam dpal yab yum sras bcas
79a6(rnying rgyud): dger// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi dgod// zla gam gsum la nag mo phung gsum dgod// gru zang bzhi la srin mo gdong mo bzhi/ rtsibs mtshan bzhi la shan pa ma bzhi dgod// bar khyams dag las bdag mo bzhi dgor// lcags ri nag po dbang phyug nyi shu
79a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad dgod// de ltar ltar phung pa'i snying por// dbus su thod pa nag po'i nang dag tu// dam pa'i ming rus gzugs dang bcas pa gzhug/ 'jam dpal yab yum sras kyi gdan du bting // gru gdum rtse mo rabs chad thod pa gsum// gcig tu mi tang ba
79b1(rnying rgyud): yi khrag/ rims khrag la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// btsan dug la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar// thod pa gcig tu yungs kar nyung nag dang // ske tshe lan tshwa thal chen khrag skam sbyar// thod pa gcig tu zangs phye lcags phye dang // rdo phye la sogs mang du sbyar
79b2(rnying rgyud): la gzhag/ dug khrag thod pa bal tshon sna lngas bcad// gri mor shi ba'i pags pa'i steng du yang // ra khrag dug sbyar gru bzhi thig kyang gdab// gong bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i pho brang bcas// gong bzhin bkod ltar rang dang snying pa dgod// mtho ngo song
79b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i rtsang gi rtse la brgyad// dkyil 'khor dbus su gur du phub la gzhag/ gtor ma sha chen yod pa bse gab gang // ya mAn+ta ka gshin rje nyid la dbul// g.yas su spel gri mo yi thod pa dum bu lnga pa ru// sgrol pa'i bdag mo e ka tsa ti la// shes
79b4(rnying rgyud): rab mtshal dang spel gri'i snying la brten// g.yon du sbyong bdag nag mo re ti lA// yugs mo'i thod par mi dbang sha khrag dang // sman dang snying dang khrag tu sbyar la gzhag/ zla gam gsum la nag mo phud gsum la// skyes pa dang mgrir shi'i
79b5(rnying rgyud): ru// glang nag snying dang pad+ma rak+ta dang // sbrul nag snying dang 'ug pa'i mig 'bras dang // phag rog snying dang bud med klad khrag gzhag/ 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed ma bzhi la// gzhong pa gru gsum nang du yang // khrag sna gsum dang stag seng glang //
79b6(rnying rgyud): saM bdag rgyal po'i snying bzhi gzhag/ rtsibs mtshan bzhi ru shan pa ma bzhi la// mdze ma'i thod pa'i nang dag tu// snying dang khrag gi gtor ma gzhag/ gru chad gdong mo bzhi yi dam rdzas su// yugs sa mo yi ldan phor du// stag dom pan glang
79b7(rnying rgyud): gri snying dang // rang rang khrag tu sbyar la gzhag/ bar khyams pas mo bzhi la yang // tha man rwa 'am dung por du// mar khu sbrang rtsi'o ma dang // khrag sna mang po sbyar te gzhag/ de ni bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas so// de nas dkyil 'khor byang shang du/
80a1(rnying rgyud): spyan b+h+ya smras smras// mdza nam thAg tha bzlog// rungs pa nas pas bslus la klanA// na lasas can pa g+sa// dug dag sa ngas bcas pa rnams// smras par rnangs la// m+b+ha T+Ta /
80a2(rnying rgyud): dang sngags kyang bzlas// mchod rten mo mo brdeg pa gsam// mu thog tu snrubs can drug// mnyis bdugazug pardzun par gsol// gtor ma btang ba'i dus chad ni// nang par su rengs shar pa dang // dgor gi dmar zag chad pa 'o// ma mo'i gting ma
80a3(rnying rgyud): ba gtang / de bzhin nyid dang kun ba snad // stang la rang bzhin med pa yi// chud+h+rU'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskum// de bzhin ya~M ting nge 'dzin// mthing dag hU~M ga cig gsal bar bsgom// sgo bsus bde gshegs thags das gaphrul// /
80a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i don byas slar 'dus pas// gser gyi rdo rje rtsi lngar gyur/ ya mAt+ma ka badz+ra ma b+ha kr-ir+d+ha zhes brjod pas/ gtum chen ya man+ta kar gyur// dbu drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis pa// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// g.yas su kra las grol bdas
80a5(rnying rgyud): mo// e ka dza ti gsal bar bsgom// g.yon du ma las sbyor bdag mo// nag mo re ma ti ru bsgom// yab yum sbyor ba'i byang sems las// lhag par yi ge ma gsum 'phros// stor gsum mas khyab 'gro don byas// slar 'dus zla ga ma gsum la
80a6(rnying rgyud): babs// yig 'brugasum gyis dbang bsgyur te// drug po phreng gsam gsal bar bskos// 'khor lo bzhi la phung byed bzhi// rtsibs mtshan bzhil shan pa bzhi// gru zang bzhi la gdong mo bzhi// bar byams bzhil bas mo bzhi// lcags pa yang dab
80a7(rnying rgyud): thugs// skra mdog cha lugs gsal bar bsgom// de bzhin bsgoms pa'i ma rnams la// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs mchod dbul// dgyes bston bcol bskul phrin las bcol// tha ma las kyi rkyong bas gsad// oM a pra te ka ya
80a8(rnying rgyud): mgong 'grub pa drashog 'du
80b1(rnying rgyud): !/ kakAl rlu dums/ yas ma ya ma / ga gsanang ba ma ga ma nga / ga du rgal thar thasu rdzas s+ho/ rag ma nyag na mub sa sa pa hU~M/ nanan dun pa la su zug+sa dang / du da dral yadzang/ du rung pa nyan /
80b2(rnying rgyud): du mang nye de dza dzaM/ dus snying khrag pa larak+Sha rbad b+hai rI li li/ dr-i sha ku ru rak+ta khar ma ni/ ku ni ku ru ku ru kha ma raM zad b+hai re li li/ snying la raka ni sha sti sta rbad na bI ri li li/ trag ra k+Sha mu tra snying kha rag ma g+hoH/ oM du ru ro ru tsa pa la a sh+yag me b+h+yo/ mar klor glo snying du
80b3(rnying rgyud): rig sa ba skyed pa dgats+tsha/ rig mA~M nas // lcag sa suM thA man+ta/ / thA ba n+d+ha blo/ than kye+e/ kaM/ Sh+T+r-ib+h+yaH/ b+h+ya/ m+b+ha / nam khrigag tid pa// / kya da/
80b4(rnying rgyud): nag ske tshe dang // rdo phye lcags phye'i rdzas rnams kyis// stong stong bzlas shing thun la bstim// de bzhin grub pa'i rtags rnams 'od // me dang sgra dang du ba dang // rdzas dang 'od dang skad 'don dang // rmi lam rtags dang nyams su ston// gang tshe rtags kyi drod
80b5(rnying rgyud): tshad gzung // gang nyi dag la gtor ma gtang // las dang rbad sngags srog bzhin sbyar// ya mUn+ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka tsa ti r+t+r-i dza b+h+yo/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shwag me b+h+yo// du ni dun ting du la ya b+h+yo/ ma ru tra gar skam ma b+h+yo/ ma ma ru ru dag mo myo/ sbring
80b6(rnying rgyud): khar kA tistA maN+Do/ rag mo mamo khong gi snying la ya b+h+yo/ rag mo tsa ba/ khrag la mu shaM snying tsa ro ru tsi ba la ma b+h+yo/ snying shig dmar mo dun b+h+yo/ snying tsal dmar mo dun gyi/ snying khrag la dmar mo dun b+h+yo/ ts+yait+ta phyung dmar mo dun b+ho/ de ni ma mo'i chad sngags te/
80b7(rnying rgyud): rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyang// de nas gsad pa'i las bya na// rang rang grub pa'i rtags dang sbyar// ma mos gsod pa'i thun sngags dang / rang rang rims nad dbab pa'i thabs// gshin rje gshed pos dbang bsdus la// e ka tsa te sa rgyu gzer da
81a1(rnying rgyud): gang ga sa d+hAgs 'dis pa // rtag da parnyan num mas/ rag pa ta kum rnagapa la / sas dus ma \u0f7f/ ragazus/ dang / shar thun/ mangs na/ rga thu/ bas klub la g+sa / da /
81a2(rnying rgyud): phaT/ ru ru bi ma ru tso ba zam ma mo nag mo rtsa la yaM/ srog la thun snying la thibs/ gong gi drag po'i rdzas blangs la// e ka dza tis mdze nad gtong // trag dkra ba 'dar la 'dar so chu ma so chu ma/ nA ga rA dza mag mug sdom/ bai re pa li/ ba ri li li/ dgra bo pA ra ya
81a3(rnying rgyud): dza dza/ de bzhin drag po'i rdzas blangs la// re ma ti yis nad ngan dbab// myog myog shig shig tsit+ta bam shig shig/ tsit+ta ba ma/ myog mug ti ri rgyob/ tsit+ta ba ma phyung / chod cig/ thums shig/ long long thum long / yer yer/ mer mer
81a4(rnying rgyud): sod / ru ru shi tri kri ma ru sod sod/ srog thum mug sod/ mar du rbad ya sod/ kha ru ga sha shra ma sod/ srog br-id+l-i ni rbad sod/ nr-i ni ya tsa thu ma sod/ gang grub rtags dang sbyar te gsad// de nas thun dang 'khor lo de// mchod rten bum par stsal bar bya/
81a5(rnying rgyud): chu mig nang gnan dbang yang gzug/ yab yum 'og gi gzugs ming la// rang dang phur pa'i sngags kyis gsad// dkyil 'khor 'grub khung nang du gnan// snying la rten bca' gtor ma gtad// dpa' zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan
81a6(rnying rgyud): deng ba pa ma mo'i zla gsang skabs te le'u re gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cha ma la dbabaslad du// ma mo stong gi las mkhan ma// nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// dpal ldan nag mo re maH
81a7(rnying rgyud): nad kyi bdag mo'i zla gsang gsungs// dang por mchod dang sdig bshags sogs// rim pa ji bzhin stong mthar bsgom// 'byung ba rim lnga'i gzhal yas bskyed// sems kyi rang bzhin gshed po ste// snying las 'phros te lhan drangs te// sbyangs
81b1(rnying rgyud): slar rtogs pas gtor ma brlab// srog gi snying po dbul bar bya// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho de yis brlab// bar du yul tshig gang rung bskal// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zlag ma dmar po gsum gyis
81b2(rnying rgyud): bkor// gru chang bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// tsit+ta dang ni rak+ta dang // btsan dug rnams ni blug par bya// nal bu'i sha dang shes rab mtshal// nal bu'i b+han+da'i nang du blugs// nal bu'i snying la rtag tu bod// bya na gaku
81b3(rnying rgyud): nag rten du bca'// nal bu'i gastobA lA rma bya'i mdongs// dar nag 'phur lce btags te bzung // gtod ma spyan gzigs ldan pas bskang // 'bod pa zad pa gsad pa'i sngags// nyung dkar nyung nag rdzas rnams la// bdun 'bum grangs ni tshad gyur na//
81b4(rnying rgyud): rims nid sna tshogs char bzhin 'bebs// lha mo srog gi yang tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// ma ma trag ra g+ha snying kha rag tsit+ta srog dung dung dza dza hUM phaT/ ma mo zad pa'i dgu tig 'di// snying nas 'dren pa'i mchog yin no// mar ka mo hu
81b5(rnying rgyud): ri la snying rtsa 'dus/ srog phrig prig sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ snying khrag rtsa srog zeng phreng zad zad/ oM dwe la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ma srog tug tug khrug la snying zud/ ma srog blun snying la ma b+h+yo/ mA ra ya ni phaT/ kha thu ma ni dza dza/ ma mo gsang tig nag mo 'di// rims
81b6(rnying rgyud): nad khrig sgrags nad kyis gsod// ma mo rang gi snying khrag gis zlum zad/ thang mA le zad mu le che ge mo'i tsit+ta la rbod zad/ ts+tshaSh+mad+tha ts+tsha zlang che ge mo'i tsit+tA la rbad zad/ mu sno mu sni che ge mo'i tsiN+Da la zad nan nan/ rag mo ni rag mo ni kha long tsit+ta rbad/ dug s+t+rI dug sdi kha
81b7(rnying rgyud): ang b+ha rbang/ kyai kha lo kye kha lo zad rbad/ swam+mA pra s+t+ri tsi ta zad zad/ d+h+ri g+h+nAn+da sti tsit+ta mu ga mug buM buM sub sub ti lta zang rjod/ kha 'dar yid yed bu mthum rbad zad si kha lo mu la lo rbad zad swA hA/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshed par rang bsku
82a1(rnying rgyud): cu/ bdag nyid gshed po'i thugs las ma 'thos te// yi ge mthing nab ma las stong gsum gang // par 'thos pa da gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus sems dpa'i sal thim par byas// de 'thos mal du
82a2(rnying rgyud): la lhan gyis 'bab// yig 'bru gsum gyis dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// ma las rtswa mo nyid kyis sgrar gyur te// sku mdog nag mo shin tu gtum pa la// shin tu theg bzhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// ral gri b+har+tha dmar 'khyil ga yas rim bzhin/
82a3(rnying rgyud): tri shUl mgul nas dar dbya dra g.yon// ral gcig phreng ba'i lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// skra skyed sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dar nagacod pan 'phur// stan g.yas srul gyi gdengs ka yi// mgul nas sil lhan 'khrol bang // snyan mag
82a4(rnying rgyud): pa seng ge 'phyo// thod pa skam rlon do shal byas// bong bu ga pa'i che ba la zhon// gzhan yang che ba'i rgyan dang gdug pa'i rgyan// stong gis brgyan pa gsal bar bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i sku las 'od zer ni// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'od zer pha dngaphros te//
82a5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen mo'i srog nas rab bskul te// srid pa'i ma mos skyong gsum khengs par byas// gshin rje'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// srog la rngam pa kun gyis bskor bar bsam// de lta bu ni yang nas yang du ste// de ltar thib thib yod snyam cho 'phrul 'byung // de lta bu ji
82a6(rnying rgyud): bar du bsgom par bya// yengs par gyur na cis kyang mi 'grub po// gtso mo la sogs srid pa'i ma mo yis// gang la bya ba'i snying nas rab bzung ste// skra grol mig rtsa ri ga rig 'o dod co re re// gan bu brdul zhing kha nas khrag skyugs 'byung // ci mdzad 'on tad zer
82a7(rnying rgyud): zhing dbugs dang bral 'khad// thun khang nang du rab tu 'jug par bsam// de ltar bsgom la gshed pos dbang du bsdu// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa 'di skad dbul// dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum mgon// bdag don rnam thar gsum la thugs
82b1(rnying rgyud): gzhol yang // snying rje'i dbang gis rjes la thob pa yi// shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don mdzod// lha mo sku mdog nag mo char smin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i sgra// shin tu sreg cing keng rus lus 'chang ma// zhal gzhig phyag
82b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi zhabs gnyis rab tu brjid// ral pa gcig sgreng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil// sgra sked sbrul la thod pa'i phreng thod can// rna ltag me tog dang nag cod pan 'phur// khrag gi chang gi sar ro spyan gsum dmar// mi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba bzhi// rnam
82b3(rnying rgyud): par gtsigs nas shin tu khrag la dgyes// snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul nas dril gsil zhing // gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma// snyan cha g.yon pa seng ge ral pa dmar// dpa' mo seng ge sgra sgrogs ma// phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po ral gri
82b4(rnying rgyud): bsnams// 'og mthod pa b+han+d+ha dmar bskyil 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po mtshon cha shak+ti bsdams// 'og ma tri shUl mgul na dar nag 'phyangs// shwa ga ti ral gri mtshon chas bcad pa yi// lha ma yan la sogs pa'i thod pas do shal byas// glang po
82b5(rnying rgyud): che yi stong g.yogs gos su mdzes// smad ni brda glang ko bas dkris pa la// phyed ni re lde sngon po'i sham bu can// klu yi dbang po bzhi yis skad bcings can// zhabs gnyis ljags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan// khrag zhags thig le mang pos
82b6(rnying rgyud): tshom bur bris// bor gA zhon nas mtshan mo dur khrod kyu// bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs 'chang ma// khams gsum skad cig tsam gyis 'khor bar byed// skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing // ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdud// lho phyogs gshin
82b7(rnying rgyud): zang gtuganas// de pa ma ga zugs chug tig pa zegs pa/ ting dze ba tho gzugs mas gnas sa myong// tshangs pa chu po sregs kyis rgya gabyas sa// gzhin 'phrul dab byed sa pa tsun padziH// dbang thog cad po phrul
83a1(rnying rgyud): 'grel ba// sram cu rtsugasum tshar bya zhing ljon pa'atsho// lha rnams dbugs phyung brgya byin phyag byas ma// Am yan rnams phyung bar byed par na// s+thA min rdul po kun gyis phyag byas ma// su ma dag rarab rgya dang ga dang /
83a2(rnying rgyud): che// lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'char// rgyal chen phyogs skyor lha yis phyag byas na// rgya mtsho'i gting nas me 'bar mtsho skem ma// sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma// lha mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul srur bstan pas// bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar
83a3(rnying rgyud): zhing 'u da// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sngangs shing brgyal// tsiN+Da rin chen gung phub gzhal yas na// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ga bu rang bar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten drug gi bcud bsdus nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// dug gi drangs
83a4(rnying rgyud): pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad ni khor nas bslangs// de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma// bdud rtsib spangs pas dkar
83a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang ni spyad nas gcod// de phyir bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dam la 'du// gang zhig khyod la dad nam pas byams// de phyir ma gcig da 'joms sman gyi gtso// lha mo khyod la rtag tu bdag gis bstod// rgyal ba shAH thab pa
83a6(rnying rgyud): ru// dus 'dir bdag gis dam bcas ji srid du// dkar po'i phyogs kyi nad dang sdug bsngal sogs// zhi bar byed cing cho dang longs spyod sdud// nag po'i tshogs ni dgug cing dbang du sdud// skyo 'bog lkugs pa'i las 'di myur du bgyi// bsten pa bsrung phyer
83a7(rnying rgyud): spyir du grub par brtse// 'di las 'das na stsal ba'i bka' bsdus pas// dus gsum thul ba'i rdo rjes mgo dang snying 'gems shog/ de sbrid rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa'i// dam bcis bzhin du zin las phyung du byas// rdul 'byor ba dag dang bdan/
83b1(rnying rgyud): gi 'khor rnams la// khyed kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i char lob la// nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs ni zhi bar mdzod// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod 'phel bar mdzad// zang zing longs spyod 'bru yi phung po dang // rin chen rkang 'gros phyugs rnams
83b2(rnying rgyud): par mdzod// bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod// bdag ma dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i dgra// khyod kyis khong nas dug gi rlung bus la// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad ni 'du ru chug/ big bzhis la lhang nas rdebs su chug/ don steng rnan sde khong nas
83b3(rnying rgyud): lug lcags chug/ las ngan 'khor tshogs cho nges brdung du chug/ mkha' lding rgyal po'i tshogs kyis ltas ngan phob// dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du grub par mdzod// ces bstod cing phrin las bcol gyur na// gang 'dod rims nad phyogs su 'be
83b4(rnying rgyud): mamos srog bsdus te gsad par bya'o// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ yams nad kyi bdag mo ma mo'i zla gsang gi skabs te le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad gsungs so// 'gal ba cha ma la
83b5(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas// nang ngan sna tshogs dbab pa la// ma mo gsang bsgrub zla gsang gsungs// bla gsang nag po'i rgyud dag la// thabs kyi sbyor ba mad yod kyang // bstan rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// bla med pa grub mthu rang byung ste// 'jig rten bsgrub pa don gyi mthu//
83b6(rnying rgyud): rten 'brel sgyu ma'i sbyor ba bzhin// rdzas kyi nus pa dag las 'byung // gdon dang rdzas su bcas pa las// rnam grangs ma des khyad par mang // rnam pa gnyis ni gsal bya ste// rdzas dang gdon du bcas pas bsten// myur du gsad pa'i sbyor pa ni// gang /
83b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'dis sa yod ma yin// ma mo chog smyug dkar mo dang // dmar mo tshogs kyi nang dag nas// rims nad gtang ba mang yod kyang // kun gyi phyag brtan ra ma ti// 'di dag bsgrub ste las sbyar na// rims nad gang 'did stong gsus 'gengs// 'di yi
84a1(rnying rgyud): las ni 'di ltar bla// rgyu gzer dag gis shi ba'i khrag/ btsan drug zar nubasres nas kyang // bse zho dag dang mar du sbyar// sngags 'dis btab te ltar yang gtang // ru ru shi tri kri ma du sod srog thum mu ga sod/ mngag
84a2(rnying rgyud): ru zad la sod/ ni ya ni ya tsa thun song/ sha drung snying phyung / snying srung srog chod/ srog thun dbugs longs/ ma mthu ma thum sod song / ces 'bum 'bum bzlas te ltor gtang na/ rgyu gzer khrag tu bshal te 'chi/ de nas yang bso zho dang btsan dug la
84a3(rnying rgyud): 'di bzlas/ ru N+ya ti rbad ya/ ba ya du du rbad ya/ chu mchu ma nim tsa rbang ya/ shag pa du du ya chems chems cad ya/ rbad su shag rbad ya/ rag zlum mugs rbad ya/ du rur pa ni du mam ti trad ya/ zhes 'bum bzlas te lus la reg pa'i gos la nga
84a4(rnying rgyud): na rnyog pa dkar pos 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bas zho dang bcu drug dpung ba cha tshang dang mdze khrag dang mang po'i thub kun b+ha la mar dang dri ma bsres/ dbum gakhrug/ du sha ma ma ba mgol d+ha/ drA drimam rnyed phyung / sa ma ya mam srog tshod/
84a5(rnying rgyud): du ya ma mat+ti drA ma ti ya/ shra sham madrangs ya ya/ d+h+r-i g+ho b+ho song song / mang+ga ya madra ya tshal barbad yeng yeng shash+tsam sha thu ma drang / tsa dur mam du zad/ sha b+h+ra ma ya ya b+ho/ sha sha tsa shrI ma ya b+h+yo/ zhes khri'am 'bram du bzlas/ sha pa reg pa'i gos la
84a6(rnying rgyud): bslus na mdze dang po la dbus kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// mang khrig chang dang sbyar nas lhor btang na snying la babs te rus mdzo dang mdzo nad 'thor ngas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dug rdzas dang rims khrag sna tshogs sbyar nas gong gi sngags rnams drug tu bzlas
84a7(rnying rgyud): te/ yul khams kyi lha rten nam/ chu mig klu btsan yod nges pa'i sa 'am/ thag krub tsan yod pa'i sar gtor na rims nad sna tshogs na bun bzhin gtibs nas 'ong ba dang / thog mer 'ong ba dang / sor ba drag tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ dpang
84b1(rnying rgyud): zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ nad ngan sna tshogs gtang ba'i skabs te le'u re bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos 'gal ba cham la dbab pa'i phyir/ skyo 'bog gang gi zla gsang gsungs// dbang dang /
84b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ldan pa yis// bla ma mnyes pa'i rim gro bya// lta ba yangs shing spyod lam goms// slob dpon mnyes pa'i thugs gzung nas// man ngag thugs la phur te bsgrub// ri gsum rtse'am brag dkar ram// lha khang dur khrod spre'u dang /
84b3(rnying rgyud): yang na phyag phrag shang bltas su// rtsanA zag yod kyi shing skyes// shar dru la bltas zung gsum 'dra// rgyu ba'i mchad pa seng ge srungs// de r+tha gnas btsa las chog bya// sa bdag lha klu zhi ba'i phyir// gser sdems gtad la bden pa bdar// 'di
84b4(rnying rgyud): skad brjod pa bsgo bar bya// bdag ming 'di zhes rnal 'byor pas// phyogs 'dir sgrol ba'i ging chen po// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin zhes// rnal 'byor rnams kyi dgrag+sa che// rig 'dzin srog shing 'di bsgrub pas// deng 'diras bdag
84b5(rnying rgyud): klu rnams// gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho bar gyis// sa gzhi 'di yang bkra shes mdzod// mnyes dpang gzug pa yus ka gsol// de nas stegs bur ldog pa yang // dra phying ras sam dang bting la// nas 'bras 'bru yi gcal yang
84b6(rnying rgyud): dgram// gra sung d+ha ti pa la dang // rba spyos la sogs dri spos dgra ma// yol ba thA re 'phan gdugs bres// srog bdag dkar po snying 'byin ni// ras la bris sam lugs sku gcig/ shwar nas nub tu gzigs pa gzhag/ 'brang
84b7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i bshos chal// lha bshos ri rab tshul 'dra bya// de yi phyogs bzhir mar khrus byug/ dbus su stug mchig gsum la// bya rgod lde ma phong za 'og dang // bse dang gser dang byi ru dang // pags grung dkar pos
85a1(rnying rgyud): sa ga ga sa /
85a2(rnying rgyud): smra
85a3(rnying rgyud): na sus
85b1(rnying rgyud): gas dpa'i las thabs ca/ byu sa na d+hAs byung nga/ dag sugasas ngas pags// bdug sa sus nA// su na nga sa pa// gsang pang ladang ba brgyar ba gsas/
85b2(rnying rgyud): rung po nyim zhi pa'i sngags/ de'i phyi rgyal po'i drag sngags kyi// yang ris sus drig sngags // gong pa dril lacugs ba cing // nyin bkrim+b+ha yi gang bzhi bstsal// skabs su gang can bco brgyang brtul// nyis pan pa'i pa thang /
85b3(rnying rgyud): oM mahA na thun dz+yo s+t+wa~M/ dgra po'i srog la thibs/ srug mar mthun/ dgra bo'i snying shig/ tshal pa dram/ dag po'i bkrag pasan/ rlag dza ru thibs rgyug/ dgra po khrag la 'jib/ b+hi ba thaib dran dza/ mAM sa la dz+ra/ steng ta snying ta la dran/
85b4(rnying rgyud): khrag ta theg la bun hU~M thun b+h+yo mug/ nyung dkar nyung nag zhi tshal// drag tu sngags la brdeg par bya// dkar po gcig gis thugs dam bkang // rtags kyang 'di bzhin ston par nges// tiSh+Tha 'char dang lder sa dang // 'bag tu rmis na tha mar bshad// bca
85b5(rnying rgyud): po zhang blon dge bshes sa ma// dam grang pon gyis na 'bring du bshad// rgyal po nyid mthong nyams su ston// de ltar byung na rab tu bshad// bskang bshags bya zhing dngos sra bablang // dam tshig bsre zhing phrin las bcol// de nas 'khor lathong par brdu/
85b6(rnying rgyud): sha dra u ban+d+has rgya mig dang // rgya la rigs myong ba gyis gyur na// blo bog mdzo dang sgrog pas 'adz+ra// bdu du 'brangs ma rigs dang // mkha rmang mnan dug nas lcags 'bub// dpal glags rnam pa rgyang las/ rgyal po rgya ljang
85b7(rnying rgyud): sgrub po sgo 'bog gi skabs te le'u wa pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gsheng pos rgyal po nang du bsgrubs te sgro 'bog gtong ba 'di gsungs so// thog mar bla ma mnyes byas shing // sgrib pa skyong zhing dam thig
86a1(rnying rgyud): bsrung // mtshan ldan dgon pa'i gnas nyid du// bas+t+ra brgya bskyed 'angs dpal bsten// bla mamanyes pa'i ris zog// dkyil 'khor brtsig dang rngag zag gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bani// thig bzhi pa tang
86a2(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi le'u tshe dkar po la// shar ser lho sngo nub dmar byang ni ldang // mtshams bzhi skyug nag sgo dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum re re bri// de nas tsan+dan dkar po 'am// rgya shug dkar po'i phur ba dgu// srog bdag dgu ru mngang gsol la/
86a3(rnying rgyud): dang dkar srog snying bris te gdags// 'di skad brjod pa dgod par bya'o// hUM/ dbus phyogs shel ri shel gyi khang pa nas// khams gsum srog la mde'i mdzad pa// srog bdag nag po ral pa can// bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol
86a4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa bsgrub phyir gshegs nas kyang // pho brang dbus kyi le'u tshe la// dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// gi nga kar sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// zhes dbus su dgod do// rgyal rigs srog la
86a5(rnying rgyud): mda' mdzad pa// srog bdag rgyal po khu le shod// dkyil 'khor shar gyi le'u tshe la// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bram ze'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ag gi yang // lho phyogs dkyil 'khor le'u tshe la// dkris
86a6(rnying rgyud): shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// rjes rigs srog la mda' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen po ug ge yang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs su dgod// dmangs rigs srog la mda' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po bram ze yang // de bzhin byang gi
86a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs su dgod// bud med srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po shar ze yang // dkyil 'khor shar lho'i lib cor dgod// byis pa'i srog la mnga' mdzad pa'i// rgyal po chen pod khod kyang // dkyil 'khor lho rngub ling tsher dgod// mi nag
86b1(rnying rgyud): srog pa mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen po ni khod kyang // rngub bya dkyil 'khor le'u tsher dgod// byol song srog la mnga' mdzad pa// rgyal po chen pa nyi zla yang // byang shar dkyil 'khor ling tshor dgod// de nas mchog gi phud pa bani//
86b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i ging bzhir mnga' gsol la// ris mthun dar gyi cod pan gdags// phrin las bcol phyir sgo bzhir gdab// dar skud gsum dril mtha' ma bskor// zla rgyan logs rgyan ci mang dgram// dar dkar gur phubaza 'og gdan yang bting /
86b3(rnying rgyud): de nas dbus kyi srog bdag la// gsang bye gro gang lha bshos la// ri rab tshul 'dra zhig byas la// dbus su lhag mtshig dgu la// mtshal gyi mkhar thabs nya mig bri// rtsol gyi rgo dmyal mtshan dang // dang dkar gdugs gcig steng nas
86b4(rnying rgyud): dgab// dngul gyi g.yer kha g.yag rnga phon// lpags bu dkar po'i byung bu gdags// tha ma'i tshigs la ming dus gdags// gzhan yang phyug ma tshig gsum brgyad// mtshal dang ldong ros sgo sprad la// mkhar thabs bris la rtse kha sprad// kye
86b5(rnying rgyud): dang lce re yang gdags// par bar ra dkar byung bu dang // dung dang zangs dang rin po che// byu ru mgron bus gser gdags// tha ma'i tshiglal ming rus gdags// lhang ma mthong ba bzhi la// mtshal la ma rams kyis g.yung drung bris// thod ro
86b6(rnying rgyud): ral lpag snga ming rus bri// de bzhin btags la sgo bzhir gzhag/ gzhan yang thud dang nya sha dang // gur ma gtor ma 'bras chan dang // za 'og dar dang bags dkar dang // rin chen rtsal la phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gcig ni dbus su gzhag par bya//
86b7(rnying rgyud): khong du// gci nga cang drung rgyang bsgo// byugs babring bumi nga dzun nas/ ma kyi cung dang rjong // chang byung gangs cu su mri rgya// dgas bci tu bakhris la gas// drug sngags kyu du bzlas pa'i gyur/
87a1(rnying rgyud): nyed shar bltan sngon du ga dag/ gzhan yang sras dang me tog dang // mar ma dra rbab theng dang // mchod pa yo byad rgyags panar dgram// dalug dkar po gang yod pa// radang za pa dmar por byug/ ske da nga da
87a2(rnying rgyud): rudu/ mtshe nyung klu sman sna tshogs dang // dgra yi ming byang bcug la gdags// nub tu dar 'phan dkar po la// 'phan lce ser po btags pa gcig/ rgyal po'i gzugs pris mdung la gdags// rtsel snying gcig bkal la gzug/ gshin rje gshed
87a3(rnying rgyud): pod mnga' gsol la// sngags pa zas bstod pa mang du zla// ber gyon mod bcing rnga yang brdung // stan gas na dbab dang spyan drang dang // phyag 'tshal bzhugs dang mchod pa dbul// bstod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab// thugs dam bskang zhing brid las
87a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis du smra sa /
87a5(rnying rgyud): oM rbang zi rta ba swA hA/ oM shang ze shang ka ra swA hA/ oM da khong bi pi ya ra swA hA/ oM ni khong par hi te swA hA/ oM sUR+Ya tsan+d+ha ma ta khu le swA hA/ de rnams srog gi snying po'o// mi tshig g.yal dang sbring pa spang // skya rengs shar nas 'khor rnams bskul// grub
87a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags rnams ston par nges// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du 'ong // rab la swa ni dngos su ston// 'brang la 'od dang sgra ru ston// de la dbang bsgyur dam bsre bya// rbad sngags grangs shing phrin las bcol// oM ma hA pra man rak+ka rak+ta tsar mun tra ma hA shi de tsoka
87a7(rnying rgyud): tsal bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya ha ba ha ba/ de ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams las la zad pa'o// de nas rta dkar po'i thod pa'i nang po rdeg pa'i ming dus bcug la// rta thod za 'og dag gis gril// dam sri s+pho ru gzhug pa'i phyir// khrag skamagu gu la s+yar nga
87b1(rnying rgyud): thang gar can la// su 'bog gtang ba'i sngags 'ad bcas// oM mAm ma nga gzan zla/ mthun can d+haH/ ma thu ba brnam pad pa ma du / aHta yaHta ya/ rbata yarbat+tas/ b+ham+b+ha lha gang kar gang dang / ga lag
87b2(rnying rgyud): yam+b+ha thai ba/ yaH/ thib/ d+hu sha gI a rtag gI wa/ pra tra dkar ba d+ha s+thA/ de ni srog bdag 'khor gyi sgo 'bog tu bsngags so// de nas bajug pa'i mir rdzas la// rang rang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod cing // phur pa rnams kyis rim pas gdal/
87b3(rnying rgyud): phrad pa snying lag dab// khu le shod kyi gsang bar gdab// rgyal po agag lag g.yas// rgyal po ug gi dpung par gdag// rgyal po drang tse'i lag pagayon// shang ze rkang pa g.yas su gdab// de long dpung mgo g.yas su gdus
87b4(rnying rgyud): ni 'od dpung mgo ga yon la gdab// nyi zlas rkang pa g.yon la gdab// gsang pa nyi ma bzhi pa ste// nyin bzhi lha yi gang bzhi bya// de nas rta yi thod pa ru// lina'i thed shul mthun rdzas stsal// lA khang rnams la btags gyur na// sogs
87b5(rnying rgyud): sngags mA rarA ya// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ skyong pog gi zla gsang las rgyal po nang ltar bslab pa'i skabs te lewa drug po'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos rgyal po gsang bar bsrub pa'i thabs
87b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor yon tan ldan pa des// bla ma mnyes pa ba byas te// mgo ni rmA bya bzhin du dgug/ dmachog chen po srog bzhin bsrung // gzhan don ma yin rang don du// drung khrod ma phrug dgon par 'dra/
87b7(rnying rgyud): gyi bshags sdig sbyangs bsod nams bsag/ mnyes dbang gzug krung gtor gtang // dkyil 'khor brtsig la chag cag gdab// thig gdab dkyil 'khor chog bya// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gra gsum bri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi zod phreng bcas/
88a1(rnying rgyud): gru chad sgo bzhi ldan pa la// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa la// gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bri// sgo bzhir gru gsum re re bri// de nas mchog gi phur pa dag// srog bdag dgu yi sngags zas la// dbus su dkar po stod 'gyur dgad
88a2(rnying rgyud): rgyad dang cha lugs gsal bar bskyed// shar phyogs rtsibs la khru le dgod// lho yi rtsibs la a ga she dgod// nub kyi rtsibs la ug ge dgod// byang gi rtsibs la drang ze dgod// shang ze shar lad khod lho// ni khod rbab la nyin kyang // de ltar
88a3(rnying rgyud): bzhir dgod par bya// 'khar gzhong dung phor bse gab tu// snying sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bsham// lug dkar snying srog ma bral ba// srog rtsa'i nang du ming rus gzhug/ snying rtse gyen du bstan la gzhag/ dar dkar tshil gyis kha bcad la/
88a4(rnying rgyud): dbus su srog bdag nyid la gzhag/ shar du khrag sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ lho ru sha sna'i gtor ma gzhag/ nub tu rus pa'i gtor ma gzhag/ byang du mkhal ma'i gtor ma gzhag/ de nas sgo bzhi'i gtor ma yang // shar skor mchin pa sna tshog
88a5(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ lho sgor sha chen 'bru sna gzhag/ nub sgor ma cher pa sna tshogs gzhag/ byang skor tshil bu sna tshogs gzhag/ gter ma de dag nang du yang // bshos bu mkhyed re btsugs la gzhag/ de la smyug rgod re la yang // phod dkar pags bu dkar
88a6(rnying rgyud): po dang // ming byang re yang btags la gzhag/ phyogs ma nor bar gzhag pa yang // man 'jil steng du gzhag par bya// shar du lug dkar lho ru ra// rub tu byA dkar byang du khyi// bag zan gzugs byas dkar por bsgyur// sems can dngos su yod na rab/
88a7(rnying rgyud): med na gang dung gcig gi sker// med dus bris te gdags par bya// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// dam sri'i gzugs dang ming rus gzhug/ sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma la// tshil chen zhal khebra yod pa la// rak+ta'i gsang nan chas pa cig/ dkyil
88b1(rnying rgyud): 'bar byung shar ma tshams sug dag/ tar 'din rnam gsam gsal bar banam// gzhal yas gdan bcas spyan drang baspyad// bdag nyid gshad par gsal bsku la// rgyal ba 'a'ad bcas gsal bar bzlal/ smyan brlags
88b2(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin bya// rtag tu snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM 'bar sha ma hA rA dza swA hA/ oM khu le ma hA be ra ma swA hA/ oM ag gi rur+d+ha swA hA/ oM ug ge ma le swA hA/ oM drang ze pap+pa swA hA/ oM shad ze shang ka ra ma hA / tshod khod pi ma pa pA hA/
88b3(rnying rgyud): long ba da hi he swA hA/ oM s+tha ru tsan+da ma hA lu le swA hA/ de ni bya ba'i drag sngags te// grub rtags sgra yang dngos su ston// me dang 'od dang sra yang ston// spre ba dang bye ba seng ge 'bag/ dge ba shes btsod po lta bu dang // dmag dpon lta bur stod pa re ngas/
88b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po drag tu sngags 'dis zad// oM ma hA dra ma dak+ka dak+ta tsar mu tra ma hA ne+e ti tsa ka tsa la bing bar dgra bo mA ra ya ha ba ha ba/ 'khor bcas las la gtang ba'o// lha dang dbye ba drag po'i sngags 'dis dpral// ma hA sa ma~M ya rak+Sha ma hA rA dza thun thun phral gro la/ de nas bslab
88b5(rnying rgyud): pathon nas kyang // gsad pa'i phur pas gdab pa ni// dbus nas phyung la 'di skad do// hUM/ khro bdag chen po sgying 'byin gyis// dpa' bo chen por dbang bslar bas// dgra snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab// btab nas myur du brlag gyur cig/ kI li kI
88b6(rnying rgyud): la ya tsit+ta mugs/ dkar po snying 'byin lhan lhan// hUM/ khro bdag chen po khu le shog/ gsod pa'i phur par byin brlabs te// phrag khyim ga yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas khrag skam myur du gsod// badz+ra mu ti tse sha rak+ta rngubs lhan/ hUM/ khro
88b7(rnying rgyud): bdag srog bdag ag ge yang // 'gugs pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol nas// nu ma g.yas dang g.yon du gdab// btab pas mkhris pa k+Sha yas sod// tsi li tsi li mas ma thibs thibs/ hUM/ khro bdag sgrol ging ug ge yang // rno ba'i dpal du
89a1(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs nas// skye bo'i gtsug tu btab pas kyang // klad gnar mag dang 'dar thus sad// mas bA tshal pa tsal ba ka ra dzAd+ha/ hUM/ khro bdag zhan pa drang ba yang // 'dabs pa'i dpal du byed brlabs na
89a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' khur gnyis su gdab par bya// btab pas cha 'gag skend sod// bi ma la bi khu ya bi ma nad shad paT dza/ hU~Mkhro bdag srog gcod shar za yang // zur gsum rtse mor byin brlabs te// mchin pa pho gdung rtsa la gdab// btab pas
89a3(rnying rgyud): mchin nang khrag gis sod// ma sa la khum tA ra la tshad pur ra dag bo mA ra ya dza/ hUM/ khro bdag gsod dga'ang khod kyang // thogs med 'debs par dbang bskur nas// sha mtshan rmen du'i dkyil du gdab// btab pas spos nad rgyam bus yod/
89a4(rnying rgyud): kha la mra tsa kha ma la sha lu baTang/ hUM/ dgra bla'i rgyal po ni khod kyang // rtsigasum dar can rab 'byin bskyed// mtshor ba'i dbus su btab nas kyang // mchi nad rmugs nad glo 'phogazong // ma~M kha kha ru tse bag sharu tra rag me mudrA mu ru phaT ro/ d+h+waM/ gsang
89a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i srog bdag nyi na yang // phur pa'i lha dbang bsrur nas// rkang pa'i mthil du gdab par bya// zha gum sbar nad 'theng gram gtor // 'ba' lu ba ga te rag sha kha khrag rngubs rngubs/ phur sngags btab nas thun sngags zab// oM mA ma pA ra ya thun b+h+yo/ ma ra
89a6(rnying rgyud): ra tsa thun b+h+yo b+h+yo ma hA ba ba ma hA de ba ma hA rA tra b+h+yo b+h+yo/ blun gyis brgyab ste brlag par 'gyur// lding gtubs la gtor mar rtsal// ri gsum rtse la yas lhagra bstsal// rgyal po bsrung ba'i sngags ni/ oM kha du she sha sha pral ma ma hA tra/ khra kha khwa kha/ srog bdag
89a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar dang bcas las nar skyeb pa'i sngags pa/ oM dam pa le she ba la goms chu buM d+hu d+hiswatra/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas byes su gar 'gro yang dgra bgegs mi 'byung ba ni/ oM nas nanas ne ha shi kar kar mar mar du las sa Tas khyu b+h+yo/ rgyal pos
89b1(rnying rgyud): gal te bdag ga ma ga zhad la 'tsha' skad na/ de bzlog pa'i sngags la/ su ma ta d+ha dza ba sham ni la zhil shAn d+he swA tA/ many+dzuR+Sha dza shAn teng swA hA/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas dgra brgyad 'phrog pa dang / rabs bcad pa'i sngags la/ oM ma hA ka la ga
89b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rnams rngab dam hA tra/ rgyal bas la 'jog sum brtsag rgyad thob shi gtod pa'i lags pa/ ma ya ma/ yi bar mig rtsa la kham pas med me n+ta swAH/ rgya las sa pa'i 'byu ba sngags la/ oM thAHb+hag / nal khyim chim blo/ hru tsam
89b3(rnying rgyud): khwa shar trang shang shAr/ nal cham ches gyi/ rgyal bas ltas ngan 'beg pa'i sngags la/ oM shar ging ram shag/ rgyag rgyag/ ram rgyag/ srog la rgyug/ sha sha dgra ba'i snying la sha/ 'bru til ma khyer sod srog/ rgyal pos ya cha sle ba bsnol
89b4(rnying rgyud): gtong ba'i sngags la/ oM ma hA pra gshing kha me ru kha la a tsem sha dgra bo phrol phrol shig b+h+yo/ zhes sngags kyi don bstan las rnams 'grub// gang la bya yang thogs pa med// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ rgyal po gsang bar bslab pa'i
89b5(rnying rgyud): 'bog gi spangs te le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba tsham la dbabaslad du// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i zla gsang gsungs pa// dad pa gsum ldan rnal 'byor pas// dmachog rang
89b6(rnying rgyud): srog bzhin bzung // b+h+ra ma mnyas pa'i rim groH// dra khrod nagra tshal dgon par 'gro// phyi gshags 'bum la sogs pa 'dron// bsod nams chog ts+tsha gyi yan lag pas ga/ mnyes dbang gzug ga ta gad+hang // gnod sbyin 'di 'a bsgrub
89b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// lung lo can gyi bzang na/ las klub rigs kyi zhing khams nas// gnod sbyin byeb sa ye gnas// de dag nang na dregs pa'i sgra// mthu ska bas ldan pa'i gang babang bslab// dkyil gakhor dbus kyi khri brdegs la// steng du gnod sbyin sku
90a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs gzhag/ na dgas las 'thung da bags// chu gang gapa dag lagul ba// sgyumadan ldan pags ldan pa// dbus kyang ba na rten gtan// mamaldan bu klung tham mangs// gos sadu na na/
90a2(rnying rgyud): dmar po bsdams// g.yon na mi lags rgyal mtshan bsnams// gzas pa'i gzugs byas snying gang gzug/ de yi dbus su dong thugs ma// rtse mo bying ngu ba ltas pa la// nang du thag dang sa la bas byug/ ti gyi gyi la dag yi gzugs// me lags
90a3(rnying rgyud): dgas thas la gzhug/ zhabs mas latshan gangad bcing // gragasum thus pa'i nang dag // mtha' ba kyang dgas bskod teg dang // gzugs ci'i nas snod ma ga dag s+ho// gcig sa yi dbas la gdags// sngags pa'i mdun du dam thas dpas/
90a4(rnying rgyud): la sug rdzas kyi skye tshol// de bzhin gtor ma byas te gzhag/ thang nag lan nr-i drug tu sbyar// gzugs la zab cing ngan sngags bzlas// mnyes dbang gzug 'od de 'bod// de bzhin rim pas las rnams bya// dur khrod ngas la 'khor lo ni// drug khrag spar bas
90a5(rnying rgyud): ze bar bya// rim pa bzhin du drag sngags dgod// sran drung bzugs mchod bstong pa bya// phrin las bcol zhing gnad nas bskul// lha dang phral zhing rdzas kyis bajug/ drag sngags bzlas shing 'khor lo gzhug/ gsad pa las kyi spo pa 'jug/ gnan
90a6(rnying rgyud): bsreg 'phang pa gsum la gtad// dpal zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod spu gri gnod sbyin gyi zla gsang las/ gang ba bzang po phyi ltar bslab pa'i skabs te le'u re brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pas
90a7(rnying rgyud): gang ba bzang po nang du bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor mthing nag grags ma la// zugs gsum gyis bsgor bzhi// dmar sdug pa ri rabs bsod// dbus su gshed po yab yum ste// mdun du gang ba bzang po dgod// mtshan ldan rjod/
90b1(rnying rgyud): dang / gas/ sa mas/ nag na // dag
90b2(rnying rgyud): sa // ma /
90b3(rnying rgyud): pos pas rnams / gsang bdugs kyi kyil lal 'dir// grub pa'i gnod sbyi chen pa sngan 'ad// khyab ma ma'i 'bor dang rab ma te// skyengs rgyas paskyed pa bsung byeng gshegs gsal// d+ya blta mas ma yi
90b4(rnying rgyud): gsed ldang dub tu brtan pa'i ringos la// ugyu ba gnas gser du snang ba ltar// bdag gis kyang bsgrib rjid kyis rang bzhin 'grub// grub pa'i dam ma pyad la sdug 'argyal lo// btun par bzhugs shig gnod sbyin 'azlog/ don n+ya gcal ba mas
90b5(rnying rgyud): rgya kyi gas dang / da pang sa rtan par 'i gag+sa te/ gab dang cas kyi khyims na ma rnam / na gyu rgyas bcad par 'phrul chub ba ldagar rlo ma rnas/
90b6(rnying rgyud): smras pa nas mdzad pa dazlam// rnaMl stan m+b+has d+hA hUM// snar me sa dang ga // mos pa phrul po zhes na pa'o// rnam pa ba / de nas gas nags pa nasal// ba rgyud / m+b+ha
90b7(rnying rgyud): bzhanas/ ra ma / skyong pag ga sun/ rmeg phreng phreng rdu / gnod kyi nga pa dang bya// phagaso da yi ngo// gang gas kyim dag/ drugs dam kyi seMn la pa rtsas// dus drug thugs dag gags pa /
91a1(rnying rgyud): oMng lam sdang lam/ ra T+TasaH/ ste bu sud nges pa bag sha swA hA// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal ba ste// thams cad grub pa'i sngags zham brjod// mtshar lo bcas kyi dmangs te// byung brag mjug gnonas sa sad// rdza gzugs
91a2(rnying rgyud): tshom med// dpal rna gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ srog gcod snga rmi ga nod sbyin gyi blugs gang ba bzang pond ltar bslab pa'i skabs te le'u de dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gang ba bzang po gsang bar bslab
91a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// dam tshig dbyung sgo thub pa'i bus// bla ma mnyes kyir yid 'thad dbul// mi don pa yin rang don du// bslab pa gong bzhin tshul bshams te// de rting man ngag 'di bzhin bya// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ lug mig kaR+sha pa na le// sngags
91a4(rnying rgyud): ni 'di dag rab tu brjod// oM dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ yag sha bag sha so su sdud de ba lam/ bag shas+t+ra hA/ 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// sngon du bsnyen pa sum 'bram bya// lus bsrung sbyor ba 'di bzhin bya// dpung pa dag la btags kyar na// nang
91a5(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad kyang bar 'gyur// de nas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// kar nau ka dang ba wa dang // lusu rje zug shwa kA ra// dang pa'i sgo la bslus nas kyang // gzugs la dus drug mchod zlas te// phyag byas bzlas pa byas gyur na// 'jas spyod
91a6(rnying rgyud): dpag med thob par 'gyur// khrag dang nyung rgod rta mtshon dang // ba lang dag la bzlas byin na// rta bong la sogs rmig zlum rnams// 'ching ma yang na skyo bar 'gyur// tsit+ta rus pa gyo mog gsum// sngags 'di bzlas nas byin gyur na/
91a7(rnying rgyud): oM b+ha h+ma ri re re/ ma g+ha la bag sha / ra ta ma rung ngo / snying la shar shar rung / sog la phreng phreng bum dza/ glang chen pa lang byin gyur na// grang chen ba lang 'tsho bar 'gyur// bsad da ka ka ru la yang // sngags de bzlas te byin gyur na// lug la
91b1(rnying rgyud): byin na 'chi bar 'gyur// b+he le ka dang a mar dang // rung ma spyir te ril bu bya// zla ba gzas zin dus su bya// ling+ga byas te ga rtsams byas nas// chu mig nang du rgod par gnan// mdze dang shra bas 'dzin par 'gyur// bse tho btsan dug sbyar nas kyang // gas
91b2(rnying rgyud): sngags gor ma bzlas byas nas// sha la reg pa'i ges la bsdu// ldog pa dkar pos 'chi bar nges// yang na spangs nas 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na 'thum 'gro ma nas// dang por khas blangs basbed du bya// lag pa spang ki'i mche ba dang // wa yi'i lam
91b3(rnying rgyud): sgang rtug par// nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// sum 'bum bzlas te don po yi// mkhar la rgyab na 'jig cing 'gas// de nas thog chen 'bebs 'dod na// srin rdo gsud chen sha ring ma// de rnams thod pa dum gsum du// yugs sa'i khrag la
91b4(rnying rgyud): spyir la sul// gong gi sngags bzlas lha rten sgra// gdon mi za bar thog 'bebs 'gyur// dpal zla gsang nag ro'i rgyud las/ srog garkyod sgragri gnod sbyin gyi phragasang las gang ba bzang po gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u bdun cu pa'o//
91b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos/ 'gal ba cham la dbab slad du/ gdug pa klu yi zla gsang gsungs// nub phyogs pho brang rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// rab tu mi sbran klu yi gnas// de nyid dregs pa 'dul ba'i
91b6(rnying rgyud): phyir// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po yis// lag na rdo rjer spu sprul te// lag na rdo rje thugs khros te// gser mig 'bar ba'i rgyal gyis// gdug pa'i klu rnams zed 'gyur te// rab tu mi sran klu rnams kyis// rab tu 'dor te 'di skad smras// kye ma'o
91b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gzugs mdzes pa// rab tu rngams pa'i rdo rje'i so// lcags mchu'i'abar ba rab tu brjid// gser mig 'bar ba rab tu bgrad// mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// shes rab thabs ldan gshog pa bgyid // thabs ldan sder mo rnam par gdings// kye ma'o//
92a1(rnying rgyud): rtswa snad ma ga gag/ yang gzhes can// skud skal ma rgyan thos bcad// thad pa char gsums rul ba// rgyal 'phags khyad par ni bzhan mthong // bdug cag rnamasas 'am cag ste// drag pa' ma byang rgalas rgyal//
92a2(rnying rgyud): drag po chen po bka' bzhin bgyid// ces 'dzer zhing 'thon nas dam tshig spras te sku la 'khril lo// nA du trA san d+hi pa la du sa ni kar si ti swA hA/ de nas gser mig 'bar ba yis/ nga rgyal chen po bstan te/ dbang du bsdu phyir dam tshig phrag rgya bstan// dang po
92a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni nang du bsnol// zla rnams rab tu brkyangs pa ste// khros pa'i nga rgyal 'di brjod do// ta ki dza de byi tsa de trA ya hA ya/ hu lu hu lu pu ru te pu ru swA hA/ zhes brjod nas che ba rgyan gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rigs bzhi'i klu rnams la// rab
92a4(rnying rgyud): tu che ba bstan pa'i phyir// nyid kyi gzhal yas khang chen po// rab tu brjid pa 'di nyid du// byol song rigs bzhi dang thabs cig tu 'dug pa'i gnas 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus gnas 'bar// ri rab mchod rten gzugs 'dra la// bum pa yid
92a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin ljang mos brgyan// sbrul gnyis dar 'phyang lta bus mdzes// rigs bzhi'i rgyan gyis rab tu bklu bas// sgo bzhi ka brgyad rab tu ldan// de 'og sum gnyis rab tu mdzes// byol song longs spyod rab tu ldan// de nyid bum pa'i khong seng na/
92a6(rnying rgyud): gser mag 'bar ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid mtha' yas dung srong dang // gang po nor ldan la sogs dang // dga' bo 'jog po ma dros dang // rigs bzhi'i gtso bo zla brgyad de// sbal 'khril te rab tu gnas//
92a7(rnying rgyud): gyad nor med la sogs pa'i rgyan// der dpyad ma dang pad+ma'i rgyan// gzi brjid ma dang dung can ma// klu mo rigs bzhi la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gnyen po sgrub pa 'di gsungs
92b1(rnying rgyud): so// dgon pa dur khrod mtsho gleng ngam// bu mig nags na gnas par bar// dkyil 'khor cha mnyam yid 'ong la// dri spos sman kyas mag thag gdab// 'khor la rtibs bzhi ma khyud ldan// sgo ngagi rigs dang ldan pa za// dgas sra 'ganan rje ste// 'jar
