92b2(rnying rgyud): bya byung bzhi// bla chad mchod pa'i bum pa bdi// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bu lnga me tog lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid byin gyis brdab// sgrol mchad pa'i gtor ma bzhi// d+ha ma ha su~M bcas pa yi// sor mo lnga yi tshangs pa'i rjes// ma
92b3(rnying rgyud): lding mchod pa'i rdzas su gzhag/ de nas ting 'dzin rim pa ni// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa snying rje 'byung ba dang // gsum pa rgyu yi rnam pa las// baM kyi sa bon las byung bti// rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su ni// laM las ri rab rin chen bskyed//
92b4(rnying rgyud): da steng khrom las ka ru Ta// rdo rje gshog pa'i byin rlabs las// bu thung rgyal po bzhi byung bas// dkar dang dmar dang sar dang ldang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i steng du bsgom// shar phyogs 'khar lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding stobs po che// sra mdas
92b5(rnying rgyud): dkar mngos 'od 'bar la// dbu gsum rdo rje'i mchu khral// ring la dmar zhing spun yang dmag// zhal ga dngas ral pa sprugs pa'i tshul// ye shes gshog gdengs skra yang shin tu g.yo// sru dang yan lag rin chen bai DUr brgyan// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po 'khor
92b6(rnying rgyud): lo phyir// bar pa byugs kyu tha ma thal mo sbyar// g.yon gyi dang pos rin chen zur brgyad bsnams// bar pa zhags pa tha ma thal mo sbyar// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po gzi brjid 'od po che// dbu gsum mdog dmar
92b7(rnying rgyud): ral pa lcang lor 'khyil// zhal gdangs ye shes gshog pa chen po gdengs// sru dang ye shes yan lag me chen 'bar// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse lnga pa// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma rin po che// g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje pad+ma phyar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma
93a1(rnying rgyud): dbug to bsdams// g+ha phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rgyal po me mgo can// dbu gsum mdog sa ral pa gyen du 'gyel// yan lag rin chen sku las me chen 'bar// ye shes gshog pa cu chen brkyang bskum mdzad// ga
93a2(rnying rgyud): drug g.yas kyi dang po rin chen 'bar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma dpag bsam shing // g.yon gyi dang po ye shes ral gri 'phyar// bar ma zhags pa tha ma ga shog tshul brkyang // byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// ye shes mkha' lding rlung gi shugs// dbu gsum
93a3(rnying rgyud): mdog ljang ra la pa 'khyil// sgra skad sna tshogs bzhad cing smin ma bskyod// yan lag rin chen brgyan pas sku 'bar ba// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang por la gri phyar// bar ma lcags kyu tha ma shing thog bI dza pU // g.yon gyi dang po 'khor lo 'bar ba bsnams// bar ma zhags pa tha ma
93a4(rnying rgyud): gshog tshul brkyang // de rnams rtsa ba'i snying po drilas bskyed// de bzhin stan drang bzhugs gsol phyag bya dang // mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// ba liM la sogs byed pa dang // b+ha ma ha sti bcings pa yis// sor mo lnga yis bcangs pa'i rjes// zan chang dkar gsum 'a
93a5(rnying rgyud): dang sman gyis mchod// oM rA dza ma hA ga ru Ta/ hUM ba liM pU tso ba liM ta khA hi/ zhes dbul bar bya'o// de nas sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas/ oMd kaM od kaM khyung kar khyud kar/ sha ma ra dbyig du/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ sngags de rtsa brdzun du grangs// mkha' lding gso ba'i las byed na// bdag
93a6(rnying rgyud): gam gzhan la gdug pas 'jigs// ga ru rgyal po mchod 'dod pas// gnas sam khang pa'i sgo ngos te// snum pa'i sa 'am bag zan la// ga ru Da yi gzugs bcas te// ba liM la sogs pU tsa dang // b+ha ma ha sti bcings pa yi// sor mo lnga yi pU tsi des// ga ru Da nyid la ni dbul// snying
93a7(rnying rgyud): po lnga po gang yang ru // gcig gis snga drangs brjod rnying la// ga ru Na gnyis brjod nas kyang // de rting pa dza rab tu brjod// thog mar oM dang swA hAs dbul// 'di ltar gzhung bzhin byas nas ni// ka la sha tas zin pa la// grol bar 'gyur ba the tshom med// de nas gnyen po rigs bzhi la//
93b1(rnying rgyud): mnyas pa'i bstod pa 'di yang gsungs// NA/ rig sngags bdag pa mthu skabs bdag pa'i sra// e ma'o phyag gi mamal na rdo rje 'bar 'drabs// zhal nas gsung skad bton pas khams gsum dbang du spang // stong gsum drag tu g.yos pas k+ka chan pa ma ngal/
93b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' lding dbul po 'jig byed garba Ta// lcags kyu 'dab gshog chen po brkyang bas ni// gser gyi 'od 'gro drung sde drag po yis// rgya mtsho chen po kun tu brdabs pa yis// ku rgyal 'bor dang bcas pa zil gyis gnon// 'jigs bye dgas mi phra rjon chen pos ni// tshangs
93b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i yul sa rje nas gnon// gal te pra rnams dam las 'das gyur na// rgya mtsho'i snying po rgya mche lu ba la// gshog pa chen po rgya mtshor byas nas ni// klu rnams thams cad dbang du bsdus nas ni// me yi snying po dab bas bsreg byas te// lus ni sras phyag drin
93b4(rnying rgyud): nga bar 'byung // nad kyi rnam grangs mang pos 'dabs pa dang // lus la da dang na shu bkra 'byung bar 'gyur// ga rbaHtsal tse'i sbrengaT/ thAM/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po tshangs pa'i bya// gser 'dab bri ljang ga ru Da// drang srong 'khor gyi stobs po che// rigs gsum ma ston po rje
93b5(rnying rgyud): sbrul// mda' dis 'khor du klu yis bskor// rdo rje rnon po rtswa gri'i so gnyis gtsigs// gser gyi spyan gnyis khro ga ter can// thebs ldan rdo rje'i ri gnyis brjid// yid bzhin nor bu gtsug na 'bar// lcags kyi mchu chen rno dpal gyis// rab tu gdug pa'i chu rnam
93b6(rnying rgyud): spri nas 'dren// rdo rje'i sdeng gshog bzangs pa'i drang mo ches// klu rgyal gdung / pa dbang du sud par mdzad// ces bstod de dbang du bsku'o// dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i chud las/ gdug bkru bslab kyi zla gsang gi skabs te le'u don gcig pa'o// // de nas
93b7(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pos gdug pa klu sgrub 'di yang gsungs/ mtsho 'gram chu mig shing gcig rkang // nags rdzong na mthug po dur khrod du// maN+Dal cha mnyam yid 'ong la// ba las byung ba'i rnam pa lnga// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la byug
94a1(rnying rgyud): da'i byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// hUM sa ma ya oM gyi sngags// bya ba byed pas byin gyis bcag/ bdag nyid chen por rab brtags te// thams cad grub par byang 'gyir// bdag nyid skye boras dmigs te// bdag po bzhi yis dbang brtsa
94a2(rnying rgyud): ra// blo ri'i grar pa 'am // 9 na mos dbang bsrung ngo // t+yai dang yabs brdzogs pas dbang bslar bya'o// snying gar tI bskyed bdag dbang bsgyur// lte ba ma yig gtan pa ra// de dang thog dang mtho// badz+ra 'dab brgyad ma byu ldan//
94a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhi bri// rje ba mazhing ka pad+ma dkar// rdza bud dmar po kra chad ldang // sgo rnams mer por sgo 'bur rigs// de bzhin tshon rnams dgye bar bya// dbus su gnyen po dgod par bya// pad+ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad// rang dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyang bre// rtsibs mtshan de ming bri
94a4(rnying rgyud): bar bya// gru zad bzhi la klu mo bani// nas phun bu chad la// sgo 'brer nyas te garna pas// shar nas bskor te rim par dgod// ces rman du bzlas pa'i yi ge dgu po 'di gsungs so// hUM nA ga rA dza sa ma la che ge mo zhig tsit+ta dz+wa la zhes bslab par bya'o// zhag dgu ra
94a5(rnying rgyud): byas te// zas rnams lnga ni spang bar bya// de nas grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// dngos su longs spyod tshogs rnams 'byung // bar ni pal ldag thor pa 'byung // de nyid mngon du gyur tshe'o// rig pa'i sham bu gdags par bya// l+li ti gi ti las la gzud// ces don thams cad grub par bya ba'i
94a6(rnying rgyud): phyir// dbang bskur bar bya ba 'di gsungs mo// dar dkar gzhi ma btings nas ni// pad+ma 'dab bzhi bri bar bya// dkar po la sogs mu khyud ldan// dbus su dam tshigs ha dgod// de nas yid 'ong bum pa la// bdun pa dgu pi'i ri mo bri// dge bsnyen gnyis por rab tu dmigs/
94a7(rnying rgyud): kha dog tshang ba'i ras kyis bcings// rma bya'om bu tha ma dang // drag po'i rdzas la bdug par bya// ras la sogs pa'i gzungs thag gdags// skyer ga shog d+hag rgyu snying gar bstan// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga me tog lnga la sogs// bcu gnyis lnga nyid dbyed/
94a8(rnying rgyud): swa bron sra na 'ja mchi
94b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag/ sam+b+ha / sa// gas sa / gas pa lan sa g+sa na/ sa shA/
94b2(rnying rgyud): bang ci zlum// tsheg dmigs pa gnas yang // bdu kyi rnam pa brtan pa \u0f7f// 'khar snying rgyam par ti bsam// de nyidag mdzangs kyi // pa ma stan ma thus pasem bgo// de bzhin pa sri pas dmas babyung // pa
94b3(rnying rgyud): gsum sa// rgyamang ma ba'i bdag// bdu gdam tshig mdun dgra' bam// dmatshig dkyil bar 'dir 'dugan// da kyi dang chog gtsolags kyi// mongs spyod kyi mi btugs// reg pa'i ma ma dpa bsla rtsog shems te//
94b4(rnying rgyud): skal ldan gas kyiH// mings srid bu mi rigs kyis 'grub// mthang med pang med dga' nas// rab tugadrug pa rnams la// yi par ba gnas pas// deng cu kyis bcang pa shes// nam dbang 'asung byeng // de nas yang brjod
94b5(rnying rgyud): ts+tshe/ byas brdeg cing thabral ba // ces gsungs so// snang ba bzhid pa can dang // dang kyi cad pan ma rton // mdzes spyang rdzogs kyi la zas dang // rten kyi ma pas dbang bslar byas// den pa mtshi rkyen gyi steng pa 'ad sbyi par cad
94b6(rnying rgyud): rlogs ldan rdzogs med nag pa yi// lags ldan sngags kyi bdun brgyad// da da mchog 'di drung la// yid bzhin na rten gtong bzhin rdzongs// rnamamapa 'a dngas po mi gnas // tshogs da cigan kyang zhing // nga mo sbrepa sa
94b7(rnying rgyud): ga da 'i / da // zhumagyu na na rgyan sa sug zhun pa
95a1(rnying rgyud): pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang // klum sbyor bzang bar bsag par bya// 'di ni dang par sngon du rab tu gnas// de nas klu la myong ba 'dagasungs so// rlag gnas gang gang na gnas pa'is// nayang nas 'jam pa'i sa blangs
95a2(rnying rgyud): mnyen skyin po dag dang mnyam bsres la// klu yi rA dza de yi gzugs byas la// lus bcu mgo gcig sbal mgo bdun gyis brgyan// g.yas na rin chen 'bad ba'i bum pa thogs// kha dag bzhing galus kyis chu srin gnan// oM yi yi ge 'di ni 'di yi rgyu yin
95a3(rnying rgyud): nagar dza su ki re s+t+waM zhes de bzhin bskyed la/ nA ga rA dza ba mu gi ni rdo dza/ zhes bkug la/ de ltar gsal nas nyi shu pa nyid rtag pad bzlas/ ji ltar nus bzhin du mang bzlas te/ de ltar bzlas tshe gzugs de ga bur gzhug/ gzhan gyis mi mthong rang gi spyod yul nyid// rtags deng mtshan pa
95a4(rnying rgyud): rang dang gzugs su 'byung // bzlas pas skyon mchod pa dbul bar bya// nA ga rA 'i gzugs la thim par bsam// de nas gtad pa'i las dag byed 'dod na/ bdag nyid mdu stobs bdag por bsam byas la// thugs kar mkha' lding rAng gsal byas te// rgya gtor mngar dang ldan pa sbyin byas la/
95a5(rnying rgyud): seng ldeng phur ba bdag dang 'dra bar bsam// de yi gsang sngags nyid kyi byin gyis brlab// bdag gis de nyid dril zhing nA gar bsdig// kA la rA pa ga tshig do med ma// brgyang ma stong du bzlas pa byas nas ni// gas sngags 'di yis gtad par bya bar gsungs// oM d+ha ga rA rdo rje hU~M ba~M hoH/ tshig mo
95a6(rnying rgyud): kaD+ga ya A kan ya hUM/ tsinA yang cin yang / len yang len yang / nAg chings rtag chings/ nAg sdom nAg sdom/ de skad ces ni lani gnyis brjod// mi 'di bdun chud rba ba tshod// ces pas+ho/ 'di skad ces ni gnad la bor// gdug pa klu yis dgra 'di ma bsad na// phyag rdo rdo rje rang gi mgo/
95a7(rnying rgyud): 'gems so// khong nas snying khrag 'dzag par byed// de skad ces brjod gnad la bor// de nas gnan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs// mdze thod dam pa mes kyi thod pa ru/ ming dang rus bcug sded mar srud pas bcings// bud med zhabs mas gtums la khrim gyi gting du wa/ rlung ra/
95b1(rnying rgyud): kha bltas byes gyi bdag po la// bdamang kyang dmang ngapral tsong nang // mang dras byin gang 'ad dris pa de// lto rtse sgra 'bur lto ru bcug nas ni// hU~M gis mtha' rgo nga ni cog mi // ngan la gang 'dod pa ni rje bris te sa// yol du lin ta ldanan/ tI ta d+ha
95b2(rnying rgyud): chege mo 'i nan/ star ba nan/ mA ra na na/ oM non ti khas bye' char khas/ nan ti khas/ bran na/ rba khas/ rta ga pra ka/ nAg dra ka/ nA ga la~M nA ga la~M swA hA/ bdag la mi chug bya phyir gang mi spros// gnon pa'i rkang pardo rje cha gram pas ma// ma rko rang gi grib na rab tu
95b3(rnying rgyud): mnyes dbang gzug lha srin dbang du bsdu// de ltar byas na las rnams nges par 'grub// dpal gshin rje rlag par nag po'i rgyud las/ gdug pa klu nang ltar bsgrub pa'i skabs te le'u don gnyis pa'o// // de nas klu'i drug sngags dgod pa'i sngags 'di gsungs
95b4(rnying rgyud): n+ta ga d+ha pa su kain-i snyom/ nA ga R+Sha nga ba su ki ni dza dza/ nAk+sha ni nAg na dza dza / yu yu yU dam pa ni/ dum pa ni yA/ nA ga rA dza ba kr-i ki a mr-i ta sarba sa ma ya/ nA ga rA dza~M ba tsa ka li nA ga rA dza dad+ha nA ga y+ra/ nA ga pu ka hU~M dzats+tshe / oM cheg mo dzo rdo// che ge mo sa ma la dza
95b5(rnying rgyud): d+h+r-in+ta ka d+haM/ oM rta ga rA dzo ba su klo dza/ a a dang nan/ oM d+ha ga d+ha hU~M ba~M d+d+hoHche ge mo A kar+ha ya A kaR+sha ya hU~M tsanA yang ts+tshin yang / len yang len yang / nA ga chings nA gachings/ nA gA sboms// d+hAg sdoms/ nA ga pra ka nA ga Ta ka/ d+h+r-i dza d+hu / che ge mo
95b6(rnying rgyud): dza hU~M phaT/ nA gan+d+ha dza ba su ki/ dza dza dgra bo mA ra ya dzo hU~M phaT/ oM la pra le wa ti s+thAnan/ sa s+thi ta/ oM chege mo la nan/ sta ma g+ha nan/ mA ra ya nAn/ i nan nan/ ri khas/ byi'u cher khas/ nan ti khas/ pran na praM khas/ rAg pu ka/
95b7(rnying rgyud): nA ga ru ka/ nA ga la~M/ nA ga le swA hA/ nA ga rAng nan/ thA ga ku mar b+h+yo nan/ nA ga ku mA ra b+h+yo/ de bzhin sngags rnams rdzogs gyur na/ mngond rdol mar ya'o// 'jam dpa' zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las/ mdze nad dz+wa la klu'i bla ga sang
96a1(rnying rgyud): skabs te le'u don gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed pas 'di skad ces gsungs so// khyad kyi rgyal po zla gsang rtag pa 'di// zas ngan gas ngan dus ngan gsum
96a2(rnying rgyud): gyi dus su nges 'byung gis// 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha srin sde brgyad rnams// rang rang dam tshig mnos shing zhal ba zhes pa// nga yi dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar gyis// kun kyang mna' dang dam las 'da' ma byed// gang gis bstan pa'i
96a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa rtsa mchod de// kur kyang nga yi bka' las gzhan ma byed// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasdug shin rje'i gshed dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyud kyi rgyal po zla gsang nag po'i rgyud dag/ bstan pa thams
96a4(rnying rgyud): cad bsrung ba'i me long yin par rig nas// phyogs skyod gshin rje yab yum la sogs te// sde brgyad kun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa'i// mtshon chen 'khor lo 'bar ba
96a5(rnying rgyud): 'di// bstan pa yun gnas rin chen srog/ rnal 'byor skal ldan gter gyi mchog/ gang zhig ldan dang me ldan pa// yid bzhin mdzod dang bzen dang slebs// legs nyes so mtshams mkhar bzhin no// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
96a6(rnying rgyud): kyis// skye bor len cing snying la dgod// ces glengs te dam bcas so// dpal zlags te nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed chen pos gdams pa dang // 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang nas// dam bcas pa'i skabs te le'u don bzhi pa'o// // zla gsang
96a7(rnying rgyud): nag po rtsa ba'i rgyad chen po rdzogs so// / lo rje ba chen po gsum gyis lan grangs gsum du bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// zla la gsang bas zla gsang nag po'o// srog chad bam gyi kha bzhin te// rtsis byugs chu brag gnyis la bzhag/ rgyud kyi rgyal
96b1(rnying rgyud): po zla gsang nag po 'di/ dus phyi ma'i rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na yang dam tshig las mi 'da' la 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang / gang dang bdud ma mo la sogs pas kyang nga'i dam tshig 'di rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas dus tha ma la gsang sngags
96b2(rnying rgyud): chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsngo ba rnams la/ dam tshig gi dbang gis grogs bya bar zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyud kyi rgyal po zla gsang nag po dang bcas pa 'di bstan
96b3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad bsrung ba'i me long yin par rig nas/ phyogs skyong gshin rje yab yum dang / bdud dang / btsan dang / ging dang / lha dang / klu dang / sman dang / gza' dang / gnod sbyin dang / ma mo la sogs pa 'dus pa phal mo che rnams kyis
96b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu dam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa/ e mdze nyes bcom legs ldan mcher bzhe mtha' las 'das// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs kun stigashed// d+ha tra gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rjes sgrol mdzad khyod la phyag
96b5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal bstod// shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char// dpe' brtul gyur pa'i shugs kyis rdegs pa stsol// bdud 'dul dpa' bo khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen gnyer ltar 'dod pa
96b6(rnying rgyud): kun slong zhing // bde gshegs lung dang gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod// 'jigs byed rgyal po zla gsang nag po'i rgyud// rdzogs pa tsher gcod rgyud las bdag cag 'dud// ces bstod nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dang la bsdus so// de bzhin
96b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud 'jam dpa' zla gsang nag po'i rgyud las 'dod kyis bstod pa'i skabs te le'u don lnga pa'o// / 'jam dang la grags nag po'i chud ngogs so// slob ni pa su d+ha dang gnubs can sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
97a1(rnying rgyud): chug sma du/ shwetsan ga r+b+ha nad+hA mAr+thAk+ShA la ak+Sh+ma rba kak+SharAt+nan+ta/ bod ska hA/ dpal drug sngags rmugs nag po bshan pa pra \u0f89\u0fa4 kyad/ dpal kho mchog su ma nA ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas
97a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus gcig na/ phyogs pa shi ni rje'i yul ma gre chen po'i rje lem ljid rdzogs kyi khri smom 'bir ba/ rmang gser gyi gdan la/ logs ljags su snang ba/ thod pa'i 'brang sa/ rad+ha'i rdo rje rung ba/ rtse mo 'khong pos
97a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzag pa/ khrag gi rgya mtsho khrol zhing 'khrugs pa gnam lcags thog gi tsha tshwa 'phro ba/ rus sbal gyi mthum la/ chu srin 'bar ba'i khrigs gtang ba/ ro nye nag pos skyes bu byas pa/ bya khyud 'bar bas ya them byas pa/ zhing chen po'i bla re dang /
97a4(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyal mtshan gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / stag gi rgyal mtshan dang / lcang ki'i rgyal mtshan dang / bya rgod kyi rgyal mtshan dang / dom dang dred kyi rgyal mtshan dang / spre'u'i rgyal mtshan dang / sbal nag gi rgyal mtshan te/ ded
97a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa myur ba/ tsit+ta smin lhor gtibs pa b+han+d+ha lcang po mun nag par 'thibs par/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar mA dang / gza' dang / grangs sngabs dang / ser bu dang / rlung nag po'i dral grab tu btang ba/ bse dang mi ri'i ka gdung 'khrom
97a6(rnying rgyud): drung khrod kyi mo ri 'bar ba/ de'i gtid drugati mug gi mAn pa gtibs pa/ shar na zhe sdang gi me 'bar ba/ spron nga rgyal gyi zag ri gtams pa/ nub na 'dod tshigs khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa/ byang na phrag dog drug gi rlung nag 'khrigs pa/ drung rjod/
97a7(rnying rgyud): kyi ngul ba dang / sngos pa dang / bam pa dang / tshigs pa dang rus pa 'phrul ba dang / chad pa dang / lU du ma dang / 'phal ka dang / bsta dang / gan dang / bu ba dang / 'gyel ba dang / rengs pa dang / 'khrims bdud / rlom 'dra ba nyi lhags
97a8(rnying rgyud): rlurgyud 'di ma phyi gcig sor bzhag las dpe bsdu pa
97b1(rnying rgyud): khar t+na ga tag dang / ser ser po dang / de lta bu'i dbus bskyal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i klong yangs na/ dpal khro mchog ya mAn+taka/ zhi ba kun bzang mnyam pa nyid kyi sku las/ las kyi srin po khros pa'i cha byad/ rdo stad zil nag po bcag pa'am/
97b2(rnying rgyud): kyi sprin lta bu'i gdug bcan 'dul ba'i cha lugs su bzhugs so// de'i tshe mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje yang gnod sbyin dregs pa'i gtso bo mdzad de mdun du bzhugs so// ye shes rnam pa bzhi las/ rigs bzhi'i khro bo ni ya ma rA dza dang /
97b3(rnying rgyud): 'bad ba dang / me ru co phags pa dang / ral pa tshar dgu'o// gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas khro bo chen po bcu dang / pho nya nyi khri bcas pa dang / gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten brlag par byed pa gshin rje nag po dang / srid pa khram la 'debs pa'i bdud
97b4(rnying rgyud): pho mo dang / gzer nad khrag tu skyug pa'i bcon pho mo dang / skyo 'bog brgyal nad gtong ba'i ging pho mo dang / srog gcod spu gri thogs pa'i gnod sbyin pho mo dang / gnam lcags thog ser 'bebs pa'i gza' gdong pho mo dang / mdze shu lkog rgod
97b5(rnying rgyud): 'phebs pa'i klu bdud pho mo dang / rims nad drag tu 'bebs pa'i ma mo'i 'khor tshogs dang / dri za kha dun rak+Sha la sogs dang / gshin rje bshon pa nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po nA ga rA dzA dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po yak+ka nag po dang / badra
97b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po ha nu rak+ka dang / btson gyi rgyal po shu po srog len dang / srog bdag rgyal po dkar po snying 'byin dang / 'jig rten dregs pa gza' rgod mig dmar dang / gnod sbyin nag po mig gcig dang / bshan pa pra ma rA dza dang / srin po
97b7(rnying rgyud): nag mo khrag 'thung dang / srog bdag gnod sbyin gyu rang dang / srin po d+ha sha grI ba dang / shel ging ru ka dkar po dang / bdud ni rtag dgu spyan gcig dang / klu mo ta ba sha bse gdong ma la sogs te/ sha za khrag 'thung dang / rus pa 'cha' ba dang
98a1(rnying rgyud): ska dugan sasu chu rgyu / ga/ na su du dag ga
98a2(rnying rgyud): sa mos su lakhod du btsu/ N+Da la sa pa d+ma // gad ba nga ces pa dang // ba // 'o// dmyamanan myeng ga shes pazhin pa gru'i sbyi las/ gzhi khod rten pa'i ma pa/
