98a7(rnying rgyud): sa sa su sa chu du sa ma mas
98b1(rnying rgyud): san kun pa 'angag pan sa spyom/ sgru sgru sta la pas/ sa spyad du/ nas tu la ba// ma da/ / tugs na/
98b2(rnying rgyud): mam ya ta tirbi dang/ sam mA ma ti ma mar ni thul dzo / ba shrI ka~M tra tre shig/ kau ta n+ta/ dzig mo rtag dag sa mni lum / tsog sha rim gag d+ha ga d+hag/ rA d+ha hrI ti nga za / su mthi reg dag
98b3(rnying rgyud): na ldang badzad/ sa dgu ni rgyag dum dzad rje sa rna mo// de la gasngags nas pa nan pa rna sa/ gas pa sam me gnyis pa'o//
98b4(rnying rgyud): na nyid mas yang nas/ 'dis kyis gsungs so// skye myed pa la ba blo bdag 'o// gdug byed dgam pa di n+d+he// sems can yongs la stong drun tshobs/ dbang ma de dang rnas pa gas/
98b5(rnying rgyud): ba tshigs ma ba / / dzi / yangs/ ma / na payong dun 'o sa/
98b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i zung bye dag sbyi pa bas thanapa ma dan 'drim mi das/ sa nga la/ brtson pa ga byega'adun khyod dgas so// zhes ga
98b7(rnying rgyud): so// dang jig rje ga su khri sa/ na/ sa na sus/ seme pa bu ba rje// man rdzogs pa /
99a1(rnying rgyud): ni gang du bya ba lags// 'jug pa'i dus rgyag nyi ga bya// gnyen pa'i ldan ga gas na// nas nus pas bka' stsal pa/ logs par nyin cig/ gnas rlo dang nga rten dgas rgyal bam/ du na
99a2(rnying rgyud): la ya'am/ drang srong gi dgon pa'am/ zag khrung gting ring lta bu'am/ ri 'dus ni dang byed mos tshal// yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga'i gnas// de dag spyi yi gnas chen yin// khyad par gnas ni 'di ltar ro// shing gcig rdzi gnas kyang
99a3(rnying rgyud): zag nag go shin rje dag gi gnas// chu mig klu li gnas su ba shud// lha lang dbu rtse rgyal po la// ngur khrod dag ni ma mo'i gnas// brag chu 'thab pa klu srin gnas// sog po khros 'dra gnod sbyin gnas// ral pa ga yongs 'dra gza' bdud gnas/
99a4(rnying rgyud): brag dang chu 'thub gu si nA gnas// seng ges tshangs 'dra srin po'i gnas/ gnas ni zhi bor byas la 'jug/ ces gsungs so// dpal drag sngags zlogs du nag po pashan bcu gri'i rgyud las/ gnas btsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas
99a5(rnying rgyud): dus nir ba bzhi la lha'i bsnyen pa bya ba'i dus/ 'bring po la bsgrub pa bya ba'i dus/ tha chung bzhi la drag po'i dus/ gdab pa'i dus ni nyin gung ngo // mnan pa ni tshes gcig go// ho ma gtong ba'i dus ni nya'o// zor 'phang ba'i dus ni nyi shung gu'o//
99a6(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa'i rdzas ni nyi shu gnyis dag go// thog ser 'bebs pa'i dus ni nyi shu gu'o// dngos rgyab bla ba'i dris nI ba'i chos gsum mo// dpal drag stsag zugs nag po ba shan pa gri'i rgyud las/ dus bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
99a7(rnying rgyud): de'i dus na/ dpal 'bar gshin rje khro bdag rjes/ gnyen po'i lha 'di thon to// rnam par mi rtog dkyil 'khor ni// thig le gdal khyab mkha' klong ngo // stong gsal 'gag med sgra gsung thugs// sdang tshad lha yi phyag rgyal// sgra rnams
99b1(rnying rgyud): gsung sngags te// dran rtog thugs kyi rje du shar// de ni lnga ba grub kyi lha// gnyis snang med pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// lus ni snang stong spu ru gsal// ngag ni grag stong mtshon char 'phro// sems nyid gsal stong nam mkhar 'phang // bde ba chen po'i
99b2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid yul// mkha' klong rnam par dag pasnod// rang rig rang la shar ba bcud// snod bcud lha yi dkyil 'khor ni// chos nyid mnyam las ma g.yos par// srid gsum skad cig dbang du 'dus// zhes gsungs so// dpal drag sngags
99b3(rnying rgyud): gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ rtogs pa ye shes kyi lha bsnun pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal 'jigs byed des// zhi ba mnyam nyid sngon 'gro bshad// rnal 'byor sdig pa byang ba'i phyir// tsha tshi ga dab cing 'bum
99b4(rnying rgyud): yang 'don// nye'u 'don zhing lam 'phang bstar// tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// bdun po rnam par dag par bya// yang na cho ga dgu pas bya// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la// thams cad stong pa nyid du bya// stong pa ni ngang las hUM
99b5(rnying rgyud): las ni// gzhal yas khang du bsam par bya// de dbus pi las chu skyes dbus// ma las nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// muM las 'jam pa'i ngang tshul can// chos kyi pu sti ral gri 'dzin// sku mdog dmar ser gur gum 'dra// oM a ra pa tsan d+hiH/ gzhon
99b6(rnying rgyud): nu'i skul pa ut+pa la te// snying gar nyi ma'i da la nyid las// yi ge d+hIHlas 'od 'phros pas// bud+d+ha mchod nas ma nu'i sgrib pa sbyang // de la bstod dang mchod byas la// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dag brjod// lA gI shwa ri 'bru drug 'don// zhes gsungs
99b7(rnying rgyud): so// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ zhi bsnyen le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas dpal 'a bar khro bdag rjes// 'jig byed 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad// dur khrod rab tu 'jigs bcu// dur khrodas la maN+Dal bya//
100a1(rnying rgyud): ga / dmas / na / sa // // gas da sa
100a2(rnying rgyud): rgyad pa lan brgyad// de bzhin lhag zugs so ga zhug/ mkhyod da spyod pa dgas // dpal nga gasngags gas dag sa sha 'i chu na ma nga zeba'i ga brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'a'abar mo nga/
100a3(rnying rgyud): rjes// nang gi dkyil 'khor ba shad par bya// dang po de bzhin sems nyid stong par bsam// mad+h+ya shUn+d+haHdz+nyAn+tas+'u b+hA wa At+ma \u0f85// stong po'i ngang las skyeng rje byang chub sems// nyi ma'i 'od ltar kun du khyab par bsam// oM d+harma d+ha tsutsan+ta rma sku
100a4(rnying rgyud): rang ga se mas nyid bdus pa rdzus pa// sa dang// 'dzi du hU~M bye ni mig / na d+ha// bzhi pa'i ba 'dzi byo ga 'phrulas
100a5(rnying rgyud): lam thub ma// yi dgas mi skye // yin rkyenags pa zhing tshod// de smra po byams// yi ge phyin gyi ma gyi 'a// zhal gsum rgyug ni gapa // ye dwags na ma
100a6(rnying rgyud): la ma// de 'dug dgas smras nig du btsunapa napas 'dzi / denas dpal kye+e das / bzhin dkyil 'i
100a7(rnying rgyud): mis btag spyag yas ma hU~M/ / ga na la drug du / yi ya // mi nga / gas su
100b1(rnying rgyud): smosas pas rdzugs dun sasum pa/ wAn/ lcug banas pa/ / rgyu/ mad pa phrul ba/ em ma byas// // mdan/ phyag/ b+h+ya// / mad / ga
100b2(rnying rgyud): hA rAH/ ma hU~M ka ni ri ti/ ma hA ar+d+he pra d+hIts+tsha/ kha la Sh+NI d+he khA ti/ dpal dzag sngags blu gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i li'u ste badru pa'o// / de nas bstod dang phrin khris bcol// hU~M ga tumachen dbring nga
100b3(rnying rgyud): gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma'i bum las lhag pa'i 'od stong 'gyed// gdug byed mtshon cha bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza'i sgral phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags
100b4(rnying rgyud): rnonan bzer gsol// shi za thug pa'i tshogs dbus thod du bcings// shaza lta bu'i khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa// jo rgyal zhal gsum phyug drug d+hA sgra can// hrIsgra bsgrags pas khams gsum dbang du sdod// phaT gyi sla bsgrags ma mo dbang du spyad// dung chen
100b5(rnying rgyud): raltas bkang ba 'od gsol la// bdag gi bcol ba'i las rnams bsgrub par mdzod// dpal drag stag+ha zla gas nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ gtso bo la bstod de phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje
100b6(rnying rgyud): 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba'i drag po des// bde chen yang la 'di skad zhus// he he dpa' bo chen po 'jig byed lags// lha rnams rtsa ba mi 'gyur ba'i// srog gi snying po gang gang lags// bsnyen dang bsgrub par bya ba gang // drag po'i las ni ji ltar bya// zhes
100b7(rnying rgyud): zhus pas/ legs par nyon la yid la zung // sngags kyi yi ge bcu bdun po// nga yi snying po yid la phyung // oM a kr-i te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+haSh+TahUM phaT/ ye shes lnga ldan byang chub sems// skye ba med las khro tshul 'chang // ri rab bsnyil
101a1(rnying rgyud): mas// 'byod bdo na sag // ma san gas ba ng+tha// sngon bye ba ga 'dusams/ rtag par rnan du blangs pas// rdzu ma dus thabs pags du// dranas 'ang ba dang la gzhon du /
101a2(rnying rgyud): dpal drag sngag blugasang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ snying po sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bde chen dpa' bo des// drag po bsnyen bsgrub sngags bstan pa'i// bsnyen pa'i bsnyen pa 'di nyid do// oM shrI ya mA n+ta ka tI/
101a3(rnying rgyud): ya ma rA dzas do mu ya/ ya me do ru Na yod ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha/ ni rA ma ya/ bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa de nyid yin// lha srin rang so dbang du 'dus// khros na b+ha yang brlag par byed// 'di nyid rgyu nang bzlas gyur na// mthu dang rtswa
101a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul phun sum tshogs// zhes gsungs so// dpal drag sngag zlags nag po bshin pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ sgrub sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas las kyi sbyor ba bshad// drar khrod do ras khu gang la// dra ka dang
101a5(rnying rgyud): khrag tu rab spags te// mi smra drag po'i sngags bzlas shing // las kyi lam de la bstim// no lu dag gis dag par bkru// de nas phur bzhir rab tu brkyang // sa dkar brag chus rab tu gdul// de nas 'khor lo bri bdag/ 'khor lo rim pa
101a6(rnying rgyud): gsum du bya// dbus su thig gsum bzhi pas dgu// phyi rim dag la thig bzhi mnan// des ni le'u tshe bcu gnyis so// de yi phyi rim thig bzhi mnan// de ni le'u tshe bcu drug go// de yi phyi rim thig bzhi mnan// de yang dgod pa 'di lta ste//
101a7(rnying rgyud): ya ma me ta kle// dbus dang phyogs bzhir bri bar bya// ra tsa sa do/ ru ni yo ni/ ra ya tsan/ le'u bcu gnyis dag la bri// de yi phyi rim bcu drug la// thugs kyi snying po bcu pa dang // gzas pa'i ming rus spel la bri// gcig dang 'dra ba phyen ka
101b1(rnying rgyud): lcog+sa/ steng na mo yi 'khor lo bri// brtson pazhi las brgyad la bzhag/ rjes gsungs so// dpal drag kyu b+h+yagasang nag pa bshan pa sdug rgyad las/ 'khar lo za ba'i le'u sde bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag ngas gsungs pa// 'khar
101b2(rnying rgyud): lo bri ba zin pa dang // bdag gi mdun du 'khor lo dgram// ya zhes pas ni gshin rjer bskyed// de la spyan dbye'i cho ga bya// se bsgo dral la spyan drang ngo // de nas bstim ste dbang du bsdu// ya mAn+ta ka kr-i ta dz+rak+Shu prA be sha/ ya ma rA dza hrI hang pra be sha ya
101b3(rnying rgyud): rA dza ha ha pra be shag/ ya ma rA dza tI yau pra be shag/ ya ma dA ba sri yang srungs srungs ya ma rA dza badz+ra gu yaM lang lang / ya ma rA dza mu ya bsil bsil/ de nas 'di skad brjod par bya/ yA ma me da k+She/ rA tsi sA do/ ru Na yo ni/ r+yA ya tsa nI/ dzaHhU~MHhoH
101b4(rnying rgyud): skye ga ts+tshal/ dz+haiM dza/ de nas bstim la dbang du bsdu ba'i d+hir/ ya myAt+ma ka gsal bsgoms la/ a kro yi ge bcu bdun dang / sngags snying gcig tu dril la drangs// de nas mchod pa 'di ltar dbul/ oMhU~MSh+T+r-iSh+T+r-iHkA la bar+Na ha~M na oM hrI d+hI hU~M khung khadz+dza/
101b5(rnying rgyud): oM hUM ka~M ra lang ban+d+ha ta/ oM hUM dr-i bi sha kar/ oM hU~M badz+ra dze swA hA/ oM hUM kha ka khA ka/ dpal drag sngag zlags nag po ba shAn pa swa gri'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rab tu gnas pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas khro bdag 'dzegs byed des/
101b6(rnying rgyud): drag po'i 'khor lo bskor bar bshad// nyi shu bdun gyi na mi langs nas// nyi ma rI la babyas pa'i tshe/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ che ge mo zhig/ a mu kaM/ pra ma ya hUM phaT/ rtse nas dmar thag bar du khri// chung dkar brab cing drag sngags brdeg
101b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs pas mgo yang 'khor bar bsam// nyi ma gnyis pa dag la ni/ ya me do ru Na yod ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu ki rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ dmigs pa khrag tu skyug par bsam// nyi ma gsum pa 'di nyid do// yad yo ni ra ya k+She ya/
102a1(rnying rgyud): che ge mo zhig a mu kaM mur tsa ya hUM phaT// dmigs pa lus kyang brgyal bar bsam// nyi ma bzhi pa 'di nyid do// ya kle d+hA na rA ma ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu ka mA ra ya hUM Ta// dmigs bsrog dang bral ba dang shwad/
102a2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma nub nas sngags mjug bcad// dus ni dbrub sgra 'tshubs mas gdab// bdag yid mnan pa'i 'khor lor gzhug/ dur khrod dag tu mnan cing gtad/ dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshin pa spu gri ngi rgyud las/ drag po'i 'khor lo bskor
102a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas 'chi bdag gshed po bskul// hU~M 'di nas lho yi phyogs dag nas// ri rab dag gi rmang dag nas// dpag tshad brgyad khri mar 'das na// lcags kyi khang sgro man mdan// yid kyis byung
102a4(rnying rgyud): can na// phyogs phyogs mi ros gtams pa'i gnas// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa'i gnas// gnam lpags khro chu khol ma'i gnas// ro myag chen po'i gnas shed nas// yi dgas bdag po gshin rje gshed// nag po kra klog zeng
102a5(rnying rgyud): can// srid pa lton 'phyo zhing 'gal byed zhags pas 'debs// yum ni bdud kyi rgyal mo rug hrul can// las kyi rlung dmar zhon nas stong khams nad kyis 'gengs// be con 'khor lo bskong zhing 'gal byed rtsad nas gcod// thugs dam rjes
102a6(rnying rgyud): srungangs shing dmar chen khrag la gshegs// bdud po nag po bye ba dgu ring dun ting khA lA ya/ dgra bo srog la d+ho b+h+yo/ dpal drag tre ba zlags nag po shan pa shA gri'i rgyud las/ bdud bye ba dgu rer yab yum bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
102a7(rnying rgyud): de nas gshed po bzhi dag bsngal// hU~M de yi phyir mi lcags de bzhi pa ni// gshed kyi blon po gshin rje yab yum bzhi// yi ma rAdzasran mo sha zam// myos byed 'ab nga srin mo stobs chen ma// A d+yam du srin mo seng ge ma// dalang
102b1(rnying rgyud): dgra srin mo 'bar pa rnams// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// dam tshig rjes su dran zhing dmar chen khrag la gshegs// dpal drag stang thags dag po pashan pa lA bI'i rgyung las/ gshed po lhan drangs pa'i phe'u b+ha bco rgya
102b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas phyogs skyor bcu dag bskul// hUM de yaM phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis na// las kyi gnyen rje rdo rje bran gyi tshogs// bdud 'joms dmar po kor co brag 'joms dang // mig dmar mgo dgu lha mchog dud kha~M ka/ a ba
102b3(rnying rgyud): glang mgo trel pa ya ba ti// stag mgo nag po phya sangs chos kyi rgyal po rnams// gshin rje'i gzugs ston dbyug to zhags pa 'bebs// skye 'gro dbang sdud srid gsum khram la 'debs// las kyi srin mo gshin rje'i chung ma rnams//
102b4(rnying rgyud): mo nag mo srin mo 'phyangs ma dang // srin mo lag brgya srin mo ser mo dang // srin mo zhags pa srin mo mig brgya ma// srin mo dmar mo srin mo 'brug sgrogs ma// srin mo dbugs 'phrog srin mo nad gtod ma// srin mo khrag 'thung srin mo
102b5(rnying rgyud): sreg ma// 'jig rten 'gro la nad kyi tshogs gtong zhing // skye 'gro'i srog len sha khrag ma dang sa za ma// sna tshogs gzugs kyis gnod pa sna tshogs byed// dus kyi zhags pas dam nyams snying nas 'dren// dam tshig rjes su dran zhing dmar chen khrag la
102b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs/ dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshan pa swA gli'i rgyud las/ phyogs sbyor ba spyan drangs shing bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas phyag rgya bcas la yang // snying po 'di dag brjod par bya/ ya ma med k+She/ rA dza sa do/ ru Na yo ni/
102b7(rnying rgyud): rA ya ts+tsha ni/ dza ma ti hUM dzaH/ A ra li ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas bzhugs su gsol ba 'di'o// ya ma med k+Sha/ rA dzas do/ ru Na yo ne/ rA ya r+d+ha ne/ sa ma ya ma nu smar a b+hi tiSh+Tha sa ma ya/ de nas sngags 'dis dbang du bas+thA/ oM g+ni dz+dza mi kr-it+pa nan dz+dza dzaT/ ma hA NA !/
103a1(rnying rgyud): t-ib+hita/ AR+tha kar/ sarba duT+Tan+da s+yAd+haya thA ban/ de nas dmachog sngags 'das sre/ beHskyur la mA ya/ sa ma ya na/ dpal drag sngags byugs nag po pashan pa smra bang rgyung las/ lI wa ta zla pa'o//
103a2(rnying rgyud): de na mdzod pa ga shing rje dus tshogs// thugs ci pags na'isangs te// dpyad cid 'ag la ma pa/ bya nga pa byed do// rnye de/
103a3(rnying rgyud): mahA rak+ta pra trits+tsha hoH/ phyug chen khrag la zhabs bsil te// dmar chen khrag las ma ya// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di la rol// ya ma me de k+She/ rA dzas rdo ru Na yo ni/ rA yats+tsha ni/ bai b+ha sA ta dza ma ti/ sarba bud+d+ha sa pA ri wA ra/ ma hA dak+ta pa tIn+tauto// phrag chen
103a4(rnying rgyud): dang rkang dang khrag/ lha ba dris pa bdud rtsi 'bar// dbang po che mu byed 'dod yon lnga// mchod yon bdud rtsi ting 'dzin gyis// grub pa gshin rje'i tshogs rnams rol// ha ha hi hi khA hi khA ti/ ma hA mAM sa kha raM khA he/ ma hA rak+Sha rI khA hi/ ma~M hA ke ni ra tI bAr
103a5(rnying rgyud): man+ta sa hU~M pa Sh+T+rIH/ dang lanag rgyugs na pa chud las/ mdzad pa'i la ste nyir gcig pa / rnaMs yang dag pa / la srog len gshin dang/ 'denas kyabya rgyags
103a6(rnying rgyud): nga // dpag tshad brgyad khri mar 'das nas// thod pa lcags kyi mabar nang na// mi ros gtams pa'i gnas chan na// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje po// yi dwags kun gyi sde dpon po// lcags mkhar bcu bdun mnga' bdag po// bdud pho mi zan skyong go'i bdud//
103a7(rnying rgyud): bye ba dbu ris sus mi bzlog/ me lce glog gi phreng bas brgyan// gcer bu sbrul dang thod pas brgyan// yed nga brnags pa'i dgra po 'di// zhags pas thob la khrid la shog/ khram la thob sa stong la khrus// btson rgyob la 'khor lo bskor// khyod kyi bas
103b1(rnying rgyud): skal 'di yin gyi// sha rus khrag la longs spyod gyis// de yi thugs dam rgyud skul ma// gtum mo drug hrul gos gyon la// bdud mo nag mo skye 'gro'i bdud// sna tshogs nad kyi mnga' bdag mo// sha khrag srog dbubs bdag mo khyod// grub pa'i gnas
103b2(rnying rgyud): nas 'dir gshegs la// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar che na sa ma ya// dam rdzas mchod pa bzhis nas kyang // gshin rje gdug pa pho mo khyed// bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'gal byed dgra bo 'di// khug nas skyong bog rnam shes dargyal ba dang // dus kyi zhag
103b3(rnying rgyud): pas drangs shing bsrel du gsol// nag po rak+ka dgra bo'i snying la d+ho b+h+yo// de nas yang gshed chen po rnams bskul pa// hUM grub pa'i gnas nas dgra bo'i gshid ma bzhi// ya marA rdo myos byed dbang ba dang // Ar+ya mjung yang tshang dgus zhe// srin mo shA zla srin mo
103b4(rnying rgyud): stobs can dang // srin mo se ge srin mo 'bar ma bzhi// phyogs bzhi'i thod mkhang bzhinas 'dir gshegs te// bdud ni byang chub sems dang dmar byenas ma la// dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod par zhes nas kyang // bstan du 'jig par 'gal byed da so di// ma
103b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug pa dang // rnam shes gzir te myur du bsgral pa dang // yan lag 'brum bu drag pos gzing ba dang // lhog rgal pho lkog glang thabs myur du thong // dus kyi zhags pas srog dbugs thos// gshe chen ya sum srog las
103b6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i tshogs// 'jig rten phung byed gshin rje pho mo rnams// dus kyi zhags pa nad rnams sna tshogs bdag/ gshin rje bdud 'joms gshin rje dmar po dang // kor tse brag 'joms ya ma rA dza'i sras// grub pa'i klong nas 'dir gshegs sa ma ya/
103b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar chen blangs dang // dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'gal byed dgra bo 'di// gzer nad tsha ba'i nad dang khrag skyug gis// myur du gzir te dus kyi zhags pas drangs// gshin rje mig
104a1(rnying rgyud): dmar ldog pa mgo dbu dang // lhamachog rung ka myos byed 'bar ba'i sras// grub pa'i klong nas 'dir gshegs samA ya// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar chen nangs // kyi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // bstan pa
104a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa'i 'gal byed dgra bo 'di// cho 'phrul 'brum nag mkhris pa gsha ya yis// chur du gzir te dus kyi zhags pas drongs// gshin rje a pa glang mgo yu ba ti// gshin rje ngal pa me chu co yi sras// grub pa'i slong nas 'dir gshegs sa ma ma// bdud
104a3(rnying rgyud): rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar chen mAM sa dang // dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'gal byed dgra bo 'di// mdze nad glo gzer skya rbab dang // shu pa 'gyel nad dag gis ni// rgyur du gzing te dus kyi zhags pas drangs//
104a4(rnying rgyud): gshin rje stag mgo nag po bya sangs dang // las kyi rgyal po ral pa tshar dgu'i sras// grub pa'i klong nas 'dir gshegs sa ma ya// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar chen mAM sa dang // dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // bstan pa 'jig
104a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'gal byed dgra bo 'di// skrangs 'bur rims nad gzhog skam gyis// myur du gzir te dus kyi zhags pas drongs// 'jig rten las kyi gshin rje khyed rnams kyis// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po'i zhabs drung du// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma nas
104a6(rnying rgyud): bor la// khas blangs 'grub par ma bsgrubs nas// dpal gyi dam las 'gal ba na// mgo dang lus snying rul bar 'gyur// dam las ma 'da' phrin las mdzod// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams sa ma ya// srin mo nag mo srin mo lag brgya ma//
104a7(rnying rgyud): srin mo mgo 'byang srin mo ser mo dang // srin mo zhags pa ma dang srin mo mig brgya ma// srin mo dmar mo srin mo 'brug sgrogs ma// srin mo dbugs 'phrog srin mo nad gtong ma// srin mo khrag 'thung srin mo sred byed ma// grub pa'i klong nas 'dir gshegs
104b1(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dang dmar chen mAMs dang // dam tshig rdzas kyi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang // bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'gal byed dgra po 'di// dus kyi zhags pas drangs la myung du sgrol// dpal drag snga ba zlagasang dag po sha
104b2(rnying rgyud): paspu gra'i rgyud las/ gdug byed gshin rjel phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag po des// bde chen yab la 'di skad zhus// he nye dpal 'bar khro bo rje/
104b3(rnying rgyud): nang srog gshed 'di dag la// nyi ma bzhi pas las gang 'grub// phyi nang gshin rje'i gtso bo grang // zhes zhus pas// legs par nyon la yid la zung // nyi ma bzhi pa'i las byas pas// phrin las sarba rdzogs pa yin// hU~M nang srog gshed bzhi po
104b4(rnying rgyud): las// las kyi gshin rje bcu gnyis yin// sprul pa'i gshin rje las byed ni// pho gshed sum brgya drug cu dang // mo gshed sum brgya drug cu la// gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu yod// nyi ma bzhi yi las byas la// phrin las ngargya dang rtswa gcig
104b5(rnying rgyud): 'grub// nad ni bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi gtang // zhes gsungs so// dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ gshin rje'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshud kyab// phyi yi srog gshed 'di
104b6(rnying rgyud): yin// gshin rje ya ma rA dza na// srid pa gsum gyi rtson gnas// gson gshin gnyis kyi za ma ldan// gshed po myos byed 'bar ba gnas// brag nag spungs pa'i ri bor ni// gshed po Ar+ya ma ru gnas// rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i dbus gnas na/
104b7(rnying rgyud): gshed po la pa tshad dgu gnas// dpal drag snga ba blag sa nas po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ gyi'i gshed bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sde po tshangs pa'i bu ga na// me yi dbang po'i drong 'phrog
105a1(rnying rgyud): gnas// med pa gle ba'i rgyal man// khrag ga ga pa khyag 'ang gnas// lum cig ni rte lte ban// rlung gi skyom nag dbugs 'azlog gnas// / sog gre gzun// byug 'a phrog gcod pa na // de
105a2(rnying rgyud): rang rgyud gshed chen te// nang gi gshed chan bzhi yin te// khams gsum sems can srog len yin// dpal drag lnga bla nA gsang nag po bshan pa spu gro'i rgyud las/ nang gi gshed bzhi bstan pa'i blo ste nyeng lnga pa'o// de nas dpal
105a3(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba'i bdag po des// bde mchog yab la 'di skad zhus// he he khro bdag gshin rje'i gshed// de ltar byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las rnams myur du bsgrub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dregs pa ji ltar bsgrub//
105a4(rnying rgyud): ces zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po yid la zung // rnol ngar du 'dogs pa yi// dregs pa'i srub thabs zhus pa legs// 'jig rten dregs paM lde mang la// bde gshegs bka' la btags pa yi//
105a5(rnying rgyud): bstan srung chos skyong sde brgyad yin// de dag myur du bsgrub pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa brtsam dang srog rten bca'// dmod pa gdab pa'i las bshad kyi// gsang ba'i bdag pos yid la zud// zhes gsungs so// dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshan pa
105a6(rnying rgyud): spu gri'i rgyud las/ dregs pa lha ru bsgrub par mgo sbas pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal khro bo yis// khram bdag bdud kyi bsrub pa 'di gsungs so// yid 'ong gnas su bsgrub pa brtsam// maN+Dal 'dom gang bu
105a7(rnying rgyud): bzhal// drug dang khrag gis chag tshig gdab// dbus su bu gsum zla ga ma gsum// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bru chad zho// thod pa'i phreng ba rdo rje 'gur// me rlung mun n+te/ 'dra bas brgyan// lcags dang seng ldeng phur pa la// dbus
105b1(rnying rgyud): dang zla gam gsum po la// yab yum sras gsum dgod par bya// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag la ni// lcags kyi phur pa bcu dag la// dang na gcod pa na re btags la// yang so dag dang rol po dang // khram bdag gza' ba dud srog bdud dang /
105b2(rnying rgyud): theg pa rje dang ri bo rje// se 'dzin ro langs nag po dang // 'bar ba nag po la sogs dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas su 'di dag dgod// mi ta sha yi gtor ma la// sna tshogs sha rus brgyan pa dag/ gtso bo yab yum gsum la dpung // bya nag rtan gA lug
105b3(rnying rgyud): nag dang // khyi nag phag pa rog po dang // g.yag dang glang dang ra rog gi// snying dang sha brag rus pa dang // mi shas brgyan nas zangs gzhong dag pa// bdud po bcu la gtang zhing ngarba'// sha sA khrag sdang skor cha dang // spyan gajigs gtong ma gang
105b4(rnying rgyud): chen bzhi la dgod// sman khrag sbrengs shing mi gsur gtang // rgyal mtshan 'phyar zhing drang nag gur chen phung // khyi'am dom gyi ba yang gzhi dag // lug nag gtar gzhug raladamig rten bcas// gdug pa'i shing la khram shong bca'// drug sngags
105b5(rnying rgyud): bri dang bzlas pa bya// yi dwags gos la ling+ga bris pa la// khram la gdab cing bsad pa'i las la 'jug/ khram dang 'khor lo thod pa dag tu brub// mu mig dag tu gtad de smon lam btab// bun ni dgra yi khang pa dag la brde// tsher ma can gyi shing la sbyin
105b6(rnying rgyud): bsreg b+ha// dpal drag sngar zlags nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ bdud po rnams bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// / de nas yang ni bshad byeng // ting 'dzin dam gsum 'gro 'du las// dbang chen 'byung bar ma brtsegs te// hUM
105b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i thod pa gzhal yas khang // mun nag gtibs pa'i dbus dag tu// blo rgyal yab yum gsal bar bsgom// shar du rus pa'i gzhal yas su// shar du rus kon la gri thogs pa bskyed// lhor me yi gzhal yas su// khram bdag zhis
106a1(rnying rgyud): thogs sha na gzhon pa bskyed// nub tu khrag gi gzhal yas su// gza' bdud 'grong la zhon te lcags kyu thogs pa bskyed// byung phyogs dbugs kyi gzhal yas su// srog dud khyung ba zhon pa ltar thog pa da/
106a2(rnying rgyud): shar lhong khram bdag rtan gzhon nas thog chen 'bebs pa bskyed// lho nung po rlung gzhon nas g.yab mo 'dong po bskyed// nub byang si 'dzin phag zhon khrim shing thogs pa bskyed// byang shar ro langs chu ga zhon na sa stor thogs pa // ste
106a3(rnying rgyud): 'brug la zhon te glo gzhags thogs pa bskyed// 'og tu khrag 'thung stag dmar zhon te sbrul zhag 'debs pa bskyed/ re re'i 'khor la bdud tshogs bsam 'das te/ skad cig grub pa'i gnas nas rkyen te bzhugs par bsam/ dgra bo nyid yang mdun du gsapa 'ang
106a4(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang rgyud sngags kyi le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// / de nas drag po'i thun nyid ni// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag pa// drag po'i sngags 'di bstim la brdeg/ hU~M ru tra tsa pa thun khrag/ shri krin ma dngol thun khro / kha la la
106a5(rnying rgyud): sa
106a6(rnying rgyud): snying khrig tsat+ta rbad / dun rmug khrag gtor zad/ che ge mo mA ra ya gug ling zad swA hA// bram la gdab pa'i rim pa bya// ge shin rje 'dud po bcu yang bskul// dpal drag sngab drags nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ drag sngags kyi le 'u ste nyer dbu pa'o//
106b1(rnying rgyud): khro rgyal yang yum gas pa ba dang sgom// zlags dbyugs patshar gcod nang yod 'dug
106b2(rnying rgyud): dri nas bdud rnams bskul ba 'da'o// hUM mun nag gtabs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sau la nag 'tshubs pa'i gzhal yas nas// stong gsum blun par gting ba ni// mun pa'i bdung po chen po bcu// mun pa'i thun nag par mya bar// mun pa'i thobs
106b3(rnying rgyud): khengs khang// mun pa'i mon drug rlobs sa chub// mud pa'i drung nag phyogs brgyar 'thod// mun pa'i bdud nag chen po badz+ra// mdzod mang po rgyal mdzad byer// mi lpags dmang po'i bden kyar// mi mgo dmang ba drang du 'bung /
106b4(rnying rgyud): phrengag namal// mi dang ta ma na ga mi Ta// med smin blag mi 'thung // spang ba'i da la mun pa'i 'khong mo 'ad+mor// de rgyas bskal pa stegs pa 'i lnga brgyal zhes bya gtong / dpal drags bla nags ga ngo bzha dang ba rdung /
106b5(rnying rgyud): nu'o// / denas ma nga sgru pa 'di gsung so// yi nga gnasams nga la// dkyil 'byor 'di la gang bab / nig zugs mamag bsum// ma
106b6(rnying rgyud): rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya// gru gsum nyid la gshed po dgod// zla gam yum sras gsum po dgod// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bdud po brgyad// bar khyams dmar po bdud kyi lham// sgo bzhir bdud kyi ya ga pal bzhi// lho nub mtshams su gr-i
106b7(rnying rgyud): po'i g.yang gzhi gzug/ nub byang sbyang gi'i rgyal mtshan gzug/ bya rgod dag dang lug nag dang // g.yang gzhi byang shar shar lhong gzug/ dad nag dag gis gung chen dbub// bong rgya nag pos mtha' ma bskor// dbus su gshin rje
106b8(rnying rgyud): gtor ma bzhag/ bseg ba mon thod la khar phor du// mi sha ta sha'i gtor ma bya// shar du spre'u'i snying khrag bsres la bzhag/ lho rlung mtshams su rje rigs mgor// mi snying khrag gi gtong ma bzhag/ nub turta khrag rta snying sngar// dam dri'i
107a1(rnying rgyud): leng+ga thod nang bzhag/ drag tu de la brdeg par bya// dpal drag sngag blags nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ phung po'i bdud lham dral bsgrub pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag sha
107a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba// srog gi snying po 'di dag bzlas// oM shar na shar te/ kha ran kha ru ra/ ma she na du bu shar dzin/ mer rngan/ tran nI/ A ba tsag tsa ru ru sha/ mu ru ti/ sha mA ra ti sha/ a ya ba lug/ pra dra na/ ha he ye/ na ngal du mar
107a3(rnying rgyud): ang ya te/ ba la dang / zhes drangs so// de nas bdud 'khor dang bcas pa bslab pa 'dis bya // oM dz+dzanam ta b+hI lim/ khwa bri/ dr-i braT/ traHdu ru draru/ rba tra du tra dzo d+ha/ stong dam 'bum du zlas par bya// rlabs chad rjod pa zag tu
107a4(rnying rgyud): la// bdud rnams rbad cing ling+ga dag la brdeg/ dpal drag sngagla zlagasar nag po bshan pa spre gri'i rgyud las/ srog snying drang ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas bdud rnams drag tu bskul// hUM bskal pa mun rtag 'khyil pa'i mkha' klong na// yo
107a5(rnying rgyud): dzabashan pa dbu gsum phyag zug pa// gnas 'dir mun par gnyebs la shog/ mun pa gtibs pa'i klor dkyil nas// ya gsher nag po 'brug tog mun par gtibs la shog/ shar phyogs mun nags yi dkyil 'khor nas// shar bdud ni sdang
107a6(rnying rgyud): mun nag gnyibs la shog/ lho phyogs mun nag me yi dkyil 'khor nas// srog bdag srog la mun nag gtibs la shog/ nub phyogs mun nag khrag gi dkyil 'khor nas// gzang bdud bral mun gtibs dam la shog/ byang phyogs mun rbag
107a7(rnying rgyud): rlung gi gzhal yas nas// srog bdud srog pa mun gtibs dam la shog/ tshe bdud sbyin dkar ral pa can// tshol bar gcod byed cing dam la shog/ srog bdag ma khrim pas yid la phun gtibs dam la shog/ dkar mo 'bar ma spyan gcig ma// sngon
107b1(rnying rgyud): mo te ras srin mo 'khol// dmar mo g.yugatsug kA gtan lakhal// nag mo dred mag ma yam 'khol// sor mo rlung gshog klu gtan 'khol// dkar ljang zug mgo dra za khol// sngo nag sreg byed la bdud 'khol// dmar mo sgeg mo srin mo 'khol//
107b2(rnying rgyud): sgra zhags thogs rlung lha la khol// dgra bo'i rnam shes brgyad la mun nag gtings// zhes bskul lo// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bzhan pa sru ga'i rgyud las/ bdud lham dral bskul ba'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// / de nas phrin las
107b3(rnying rgyud): rje bdag la/ drag sngags 'dis myos pa dang / gzing ba dag / gas dpa gnan pa'o// bdud bram ya/ ha na ta na/ tit+ta tiH/ ru rngam mas ma ya hUM/ kha dz+re dza/ mi ni / shon tre / ya k+Sha / mi ShIH/ datri dza/ sha tr-i dza/ da tri pra ti raM/ ha na dra dza/ mi sha dza/ ya k+Sha dza/ pra mi dza/
107b4(rnying rgyud): dar ro/ dza hU~M nung drud / khar ne chud/ so la kun na chud/ du du rbud/ kha la khu chud/ shin tsir gang tshad/ kha la mu ti mug swA hA/ za zand kun thun/ re li li/ kha le kha shag zun/ ma than kha nan ha ra zad chums khrag/ ril gu gu baM khrag/ ri rtsa zad ril/
107b5(rnying rgyud): zhes ling+ga la brdeg cing zod khrag dang nyung dkar brabs te/ ri maun nag 'dra bar mnan/ dpal drag sngag zla ga pad nag po ba shan ba spu gri'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi drag sngags kyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis// bdud
107b6(rnying rgyud): ha nu bak+Sha ru tra sus mi bzlog gi bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// zag nag po bdud shing skyes sa ru phyin la/ 'bab cu'i 'gram nas sa blang la/ stegs bu 'domagang gru bzhi b+h+yas la/ mi rta khA'i khrag dang rtswa sol gyis chag chag gdab pa'o// dbus su chu
107b7(rnying rgyud): khang bu'o// bla ga ma dmar po'i khrul bu gtang ngo // gru chad ljang gur bya'o// bdud ha nu bak+ka'i 'dra 'a bag nag po lag na khram shing nag po thogs pa dgram mo// shog bu la bdud bzhi'i gzugs bris te/ dar nag gi sham thabs la phyogs pazhi
108a1(rnying rgyud): dgram mo// shar du he le khyab pa/ lhor nag po bkrug med/ nub tu so 'dar 'khrig pa/ byang du ral ba spyi ching / shar g+ho dri za khrung btsun/ lho nub phag skar ny+dza rings/ nub byang rang gzang 'phan skad/ byang shar dun bun spug sa
108a2(rnying rgyud): dpal drag sngag zlagasang nag po bzhan pa s+ya gri'i rgyud las// bdud ta nu pak+ka'i rtsa ba'i lha dgu bstan pa'i le'u sngoso lnga pa'o// / de nas sprul pa'i bdud ni// bka' 'khor skyong ba gnod sbyin bdud// phyag brtan 'dugs mjug gi dang la ca /
108a3(rnying rgyud): pa bcu gsum stag chas gzig chas da // mon bu bcu gsum bdud kyi rta nag can// pho nya bcu gsum stag seng mthong ka can// phyag brnyan nag mo re ba'i go lcog can// sprul pa ma bdud sol ba'i lan tshar can dang / mon mo dacu gsum zha nye'i rgya long
108a4(rnying rgyud): can dang / pheM nya mo rnams mgron bu'i thong skabs can dang / nang gi'o// phyi ma sog po nag po khrag mig can dang / gnod sbyin nag po bse'i ral pa can dang / klu bdud nag po sbrul gyi rgya can dang / gshin rje nag po lcags kyi ral pa can dang / ma
108a5(rnying rgyud): neg pa dung gi rna cha can dang / bshan pa dmar seng sde'u'i mgo can dang / ldang nag rngam pa me'i kha rlangs can dang / de dag ni sprul pa'o// dpal drag sngag/ blugs nag po bshan pa spu blo'i chung las/ sprul pa'i bdud bstan pa'i le'u stes drug pa'o//
108a6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bdud de rnams la rabs chad dam mon thod du/ bra sran gyi gtor mar/ lug nag spyi dkar bya rog/ rta nag po rting dkar dang gsum gyi snying srog pa rtsa dang ma bral ba ru/ de grab de yod pa'i mi'i rus grog le dris la gzug/ shar dang nub tu bya'o/
108a7(rnying rgyud): dang / sbyang ka'i rgyal mtshan re phyar la bzhag/ phreng dang gser brdar ba'i gser skyems dngul sgyogs su stegs la bzhag go// gzhan yang dar nag po 'gyur phub/ g.yang mos g.yeng po/ dpal drag lnga gzugs na po bzhin pa spu gri rjud las/
108b1(rnying rgyud): tan+da la dam rdzas bstan pa'i la'u stes bdun pa'o// / de nas dmigs rten bca' ste// lug nag pon gnag pa ma gser ba gcig la// re ba'i sgye'u khal du dag la// g.yas su pho rnams kyi byang bu gdags/ g.yon du mo rnams kyi bung du
108b2(rnying rgyud): gdags/ skud pa sngo dmar gyis gong rmed bya/ rwa la dar mthing nag gdags/ mig la rin chen brdang / ras yug gcig gis mig dgab/ dkyil 'khor byang shar du gdags/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bca'/ bdag nyid gos nag so gyon la/ dar
108b3(rnying rgyud): mthing nag gis g.yab cing sngags 'di drang ngo // hUM phaT pa hUM e ma pa sha sta phe ba pe rangs mar sha zar ya hUM/ ma he mas rag la ya hUM phaT/ ces sum 'bum bzlas pas bdud grub ste lug gram mo// gum pa dang / rlu tra nag po mA ra ya byas la/ lug gi mgor
108b4(rnying rgyud): byang chubra la gnan par bya'o// dpal drag sngags zla gas dge po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ dgra bo bsad pa bdud ha nu bkru sus mi bzlog pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can btsan gdug pa bslab pa
108b5(rnying rgyud): drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod thag dmar po seng ge 'dra ba 'am/ brag dmar ram me bar/ 'jig rten dregs pa btsan bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa gcig la/ radamar po'i khrag gis chag chag gdab bo// dbus lte ba de mar po
108b6(rnying rgyud): blag ma brgyad kyis bskor ro// lcags ri dmar po la med mar bze'o// dbus su shog gu bu gsum pa gcig khrag gis zug la bzhag go// dbus su pa 'og mad 'a dar dang / ra lpags dmar po mda' gang gdags/ zo mo'i phyod kyis brgyan la dbus su
108b7(rnying rgyud): gzug go// zlag ma la yang sa lpags dmar po dang / da dang na mo 'phod gzug go// tshang lung la gser ba ral bya bo dgu gzhag go// dbu sa nas 'bras gro til phul re ba dgu gzhag go// radamar po gse 'gram war gzhag go// dpal dag sngags pa
109a1(rnying rgyud): !gsang nag po ba shun pa sgra ga chung las/ srog bdag pa can sduga' ban ra bsgrub pa'i 'dras sa bung // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson dag pa'i sngags 'di dag gsungasas// brnyan pakun du ngang
109a2(rnying rgyud): oM la li pra ma ni/ ri tse thal paTi/ ti ge twe shaM ki/ shai tri mu ti re dzi re triM haM/ shan rnams rba kar+m+ma bi babe bswaH// de dag rdzogs par gyur pa dang // dgug dang rbang snga grwa 'di dag go// srog la li pra mo ni bi dgra na / srog thul dz+ra/ bi
109a3(rnying rgyud): po nr-i dzaH/ kro ti ke la ya daM'i li li dgra bo rA dzaH/ kro d+hi kI la ya sha la baM ri li li dgra bo nr-i dzaH/ au tri kaM shaM mA ra ya baM ri le li dgra dza dzA dzaH/ mu tri mA ra ya bi ri le li damra ni dzaH/ re tri mA ra ya bai ri li le dgra bo mA da at+l-i dzaH/ ! sha g+ha pu mA ra ya pi de'i ling
109a4(rnying rgyud): bo mA ra ya nr-i dzaH/ bsad pa srog las drangs pa 'di'o// srog la la pra ma ni dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ srog ri tse thal ba ni dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ srog kro ti da kA la mA ra ya dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ srog wa ting k+She la sha mA ra ya
109a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying la doHdzaH/ srog kr-i shi kaM mA ra ya dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ srog gi shi tri mA ra ya da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying la daHdzaHsrog mu tri ri kri ri tri dam ta mas dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ srog ti re ni mA ra ya da ma nyams dgra bo'i steng la dzaHdzaH/ srog
109a6(rnying rgyud): dam shaM sta mA ra ya da ma nyams dgra bo'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ dgra bo'i gzugs byas la de la brdeg go// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa lnga gri'i rgyud las/ btsan khrag lcags pa'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas gshin
109a7(rnying rgyud): drag tu bskul pa'i rjes la/ pa tsan 'di dag rbad do// hUM dzam gling 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// le 'od 'bar ba'i zhing khams nas// stong gsum me yi gzhal yas nas// mi ring dmar po mdung tsam gcig/ dbu sba me dpal me dpung 'ab//
109b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams kun me yis bsreg/ sman ma lpags kyu 'khyil ba'ang// spyan kya dmar pad ma nyams dgral bzlog/ sbal la banan dmar pa'i 'jal bar gsol// g.yas na btsun gyi rmu zhags dgral 'dabs// g.yon pa phrag bya 'ag pa gang
109b2(rnying rgyud): ngan 'bebs// zhabs la lcags l+h+wam yu bud gsol// sbrul nag stong gi chun 'khor can// sbrul nag stong gshibs sku regs bcings// skar chen mang po'i tshar tshar can// bzhugs ni gling bzhi khyab par bzhugs// nam gyi gur la chug tsam na//
109b3(rnying rgyud): wa mo kha nag bcibs// nyi ma'i zer la rgyug tsam na// chibs su ltas ngan gla ba bcibs// nyi ma dgung la rgyug tsam na// chibs su bra bo rting dkar bcibs// dam rdzas gtor ma 'di longs la// yab gcig 'jam dpal bkang gung gis// btsan gyi 'jo
109b4(rnying rgyud): rnams las la bskul// 'jig rten khams su me yi bskal pa thong // dgra bo'i rnam shes thal bar sregs// skyes bu chen po dgra la ya// rang gsang mched dgu dgra la ya// btsan zhags dmar po dgra la thob// thar ma dgra la de thob cig/ khrag lpags
109b5(rnying rgyud): gzer thabs dgra la ya// byas la phud gtor rgod gtor bya'o// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ btsan bsgral ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'byung ba'i btsan srog lan khrag sdug bsgrub pa
109b6(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// gong gsum kha ma brag dmar rtsar// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// du ga dang khrag gis chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum thur du brko// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis bskor// phyi'i ma 'dzam bu gling bzhi bri// lcags ni
109b7(rnying rgyud): dag la me 'od bri// dbus su gshed po nyid dgod do// zla ga ma gsum la yum sras dgod// shar dus btsan rdo rje reg bya gser mig dgod// lho ru maM btsan rdo rje grags mchog dgod// nub tu chu ba can rdo rje mgyogs phyed rtul dgod// byang du rlung btsan
110a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje shu bo dgod// mi shwa rta sha'i gtor ma yang yum la dgad de/ btsan pazhi la gtor ma bzhi dgod do// ra dmar po'i steng dang / byas po dang / rta mtshal lu'i steng rnams dgod do// mdang bya rgod ma la dang dmar po btags la/ rtag tu
110a2(rnying rgyud): g.yab po// pu su ra'i thod par rdo sol sba ba mu zi dang / til mar dag ni gzhag par bya'o// gri po'i thod par btsan gyi tha ma bcas/ rtag tu ra gsur rgyun mi gcad/ gser skyemra la sogs gzhag par bya'o// rtag tu btsan la mchod pa na/ btsan phug 'phan dang nang las pa
110a3(rnying rgyud): skyug pa'i glu glang gling bu 'bud/ dpal drag swap+pa zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ 'byung ba'i btsan drag po bsrub pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas drag sngags 'di dag bzlas// nyung dkar la sogs rdzas rnams laM/ thod par mi ceng 'a
110a4(rnying rgyud): dag drangs/ a be shu sa ma ya/ da tsa tse ni/ a nan ta tri shi rbad/ dza ra sha ti pa na/ b+ha ra kro tsa ta ma rma ku ru dza ngo // khri'am 'bum du bzlas gyur na/ sku yang mngon du ston par 'gyur/ rta med pa'i sra ba sma dang / mi med pa'i skrag s+kha di re 'ong // 'jig rten me yis bsreg
110a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod na/ rdo so la mu rbo ti la sbyar la/ thod pa'i nang du rlung chen po byung tsam na/ rlung la gtor na/ 'jig rten mes bsreg par 'gyur ro// raM raM raM ri zhes pa'i lcam dral sngags la gdags so/ dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ srog steng
110a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// / de nas btsan rnams bskul pa ni/ gru bskal pa'i me 'bar stong dmyal nas// bas yi mo ring dmar po la// dbul me 'bar yal la// me ye zhags pa dmar po thogs// merta dmar po zhon cing rtag/ dgra /
110a7(rnying rgyud): lus la me thongs shig/ khrag gi rba klong 'khyil pa nas// khrag btsan dmar po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lag na khrag gi zhags pa thogs// lus la khrag gi char pa phob// bskal pa'i rlung nag 'khyil pa nas// brag btsan dmar po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lag
110b1(rnying rgyud): na khrag gzhags pa thogs// lus la khrag gi zang pa phog// bskal ba'i rlung nag 'gyel ba nas/ rlung btsan thung sdug lan po// nyams pa'i blang nga srog sa s+ho// gnam bcan dgang gathog 'bebs dgrapa s+ho// ma bcan dang 'jog dpa' d+ha// rngub tsam khrag 'brang dang da/
110b2(rnying rgyud): sa btsan phrag len dgra la tAM// rlung btsan dbugs len dgral b+hu/ rbod gtong drag pa byang// gang gi zar ma bcas pa de/ gong gsupa btsan rgyas dgananan// dpal drag sngags zlags nag po bshan pa A tha~M chung las/ btsan las la rbad pa'i leng rnye nabazhi pa'o//
110b3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis/ btsan gsang thun shu bo rak+Sha srog la chad pa 'bebs pa'i sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// dgon pa dag gam dur khrod dben pa ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsig/ dbus su rabs chad thod pa ru// khrag dang dug dang rdo sol dang /
110b4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod sa dang til gyi mar// ra dmar snying khrag ra khrag blug/ ming rus bris la thod par byung // bse phor zangs gzhong gtor mas dgang // srog gi snying po 'di dag ni// oM de ba tri man gan dza/ mus mu sa mA ra ya na/ dgra bo che ge'i srog dreng breng s+yo dza dzaH/ 'di dag rang tu
110b5(rnying rgyud): zab pa'o// shin tu gsang zhing ling+ga phu rabs brdung // dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu the'i rgyud las/ drag po shu bo srog gcod kyi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis drag po'i las kha 'di gsungs so// btson gyi drag sngags bzlas pa
110b6(rnying rgyud): de// ri la sbas na ri myes tshig par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho 'am chu mig tu sbas na chu sam/ dgra bo'i khang pa la sras na khyim 'tshig go/ sngags de nyid 'u zu la bzlas pa stong byas te byin na skyo 'bog go/ dza'i 'bras la bzlas te gtor na sbal mi zan khyim du 'ong ngo / dpal
110b7(rnying rgyud): drag snga bablugs nan po ba shan pa spu gling rgyud las/ btsan gyi las kha bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu 'byugra drag tu dbab pa dang / srog 'chad pa dbab pa'i phyir/ khyab 'jug gzi' srub thabs dag gsungs so//
111a1(rnying rgyud): yid dang mthun pa'i gnas bzung la// sachog la sogs gtor ma gtang // chos grangs dus tshod 'di lta ste// rgyu dang 'jug dang gnas pa dang // slar la bzlog pa'i dus shes bya// ma mo dgra lha'i rgyal mo dang // bdud dang srin mo chu dag dang /
111a2(rnying rgyud): gshin rje dag dang klu btsan dang // bgegs kyi bsdod zla shes par bya// dus chen brgyad la rtags chen brgyad dag gzung // de nas drag po'i las la 'jug/ maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// 'khor lo rtsibs brkyad dbus su e// phyogs mtshams brgyad la e bachad do//
111a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su gshed po yab yum mo// sha khrag gtor ma bcas shing gtong // 'khor lo ga la sprul paste// sa sa'i sgrub rdzas bsag par bya// gza' bdud chuba'i dus bzung la// bsad pa dag gi las byas te// dbus su el bsreg pa // sprul ba'i mgo rgya ba
111a4(rnying rgyud): tshe// brnag pa'i dpral bar gdab par bya// rkang pa rgyan po la la gdab// lag pa rgyan lag pa ste// de bzhin btab la nyam la bsreg/ tsher ma can gyi shing bu la// rgyu ba'i dus su bsreg par bya// gza' bdud rtsu ba'i dus nges na// rjes dang dri ma 'dag pa dang // gos du ma
111a5(rnying rgyud): rnying pa la// gdug pa'i gzugs brtan bzhi byas te// ho ma la bsreg na brlag par 'gyur// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ gza'i srog bsgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// dgra bo myun du bsad pa la/
111a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi wa yis lirga bca'// de la tsha ba gsum du sbyar// dug gi ho ma la bsreg pa ni// lcags phye khrag dang ti la nag dang // khrag sta bu gul zir dang // dur khrod rus pa bsreg pas phung // dpal drag sngags zla gsang ba shan pa spa gri'i rgyud las/ hom gyi bsad pa'i le'u ste
111a7(rnying rgyud): brkyad pa'o// / de nas myur du ser ba 'bab na// yugs sa mo 'am rabs chad dam// mdo bo'i thod pa dag tu yang // dam gra yul gyi chu rdos dang // ra khrag kyi khrag mi khrag dang // ba dkar 'o ma mdze dang ra'i// ngo ma la sogs sbyad byas la// sngo dang ram bu hu
111b1(rnying rgyud): phyar// gar 'bebs gzhan sar zab blug ste// dus chod gza' yi gdong gzugs nas// chu 'khyags drag tu dbab par byed// dpal drag sngags zlags nag po bshan pa spu gre'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyag myur du dbab pa'i le'u ste zha dgu pa'o// / de nas drag sngags bshad
111b2(rnying rgyud): oM ban k+ta'i sbrul ya/ dza~M sha d+da kI li kI la la/ che gno d+ha d+g+ha phaH/ su la pra la/ ku lags/ thum bu tham/ par dam/ thum bur thum thuH/ par ta sha tan/ dAr lar ya/ rad+ha ranga?/ shos ra ya/ shan kya tadzang / zhes ni bsad pa'i sngags so/
111b3(rnying rgyud): kha thun kha thun/ raM yaM raM yaM/ na pu ta na/ na ge yi/ re thun ra thun/ des ni ser ba 'bebs pa yin/ dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ drag sngags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chu 'khyags drag ser
111b4(rnying rgyud): las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gru gsum bsgag mar bya'o// de'i nang du skal gri mo'i thod pa gzhag sa/ mngal khrag la sogs pa'i khrag dang / dug dang / sngo khu dang / dkar gsum la sogs pazugs pa/ ra
111b5(rnying rgyud): zad nag po'i thod pas dgab po// srog gi snying po 'di bsgrub bo// oM bai sha me ka du du ma shi gai dza la te a ta swA hA/ stong rdzogs thun khrag la bstim/ oM pa sa ti rA hu la ma hA kro ta phob ta/ shar shwa la ta sha ra hU~M phaT/ de ni sgrub pa'i drag sngags so// dpal drag spag
111b6(rnying rgyud): zlagasang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ chu 'khrugs sgrub pa'i le'u steng gcig pa'o// / de nas nyi shu dgu dag la// bsnyen rdzogs gzir rbad byas la/ drag po'i sngags 'di dag go/ oM ke tre tra lo// glo bur sbyin thang phob/ trag dag snyig pa dag
111b7(rnying rgyud): ma/ khrag pa phrin skye kyi/ sbyar d+mo/ btsan bdu khrom tho d+ha/ gnam mthong kye/ sngags zlag khrib/ mi nga mod/ rgyang rgyang mdzu tsu chubaH/ das la thog 'dams par byed/ dpa' drag thu sa na nan pa da rnams
112a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal zhugs dadab pa la kyang gnyis 'o/ dadas bcom ldan 'das shes gnas rtags dang thal khrags dang zla byu'i rnye / khyab 'drug ga ga zugs 'ad gsung // drang zod dngab thang jigs nga/ ma cha
112a2(rnying rgyud): chag btab la/ dbus su gru gsum brtsigs la/ mu khyud zlum po la zod phreng gis bskor ro// sbrul sngon po'i shun par rdzas blugs la/ gzhur gzhug go// de gru gsum gyi dbus su gzhag la/ blag ma gcig la dkar zhab dang / sngo thab dang dmar za
112a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gzhag go// bla ga ma gcig la sha dul khrag rdul rngon pa/ btsos pa/ ra bA tsi na/ a mr-it+ta/ gu gul nag po/ laM phug til/ sgrog s+ya gzhag go// zla ga ma gcig la/ 'bras chan dkar gsum mngar gsum gu gul dkar po gzhag go// dngog po
112a4(rnying rgyud): rten du gzug go// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ rog ti gsang ba sgrub kyi le'u lteng gsum pa'o// // de nas yang sngags drang bar bstan te/ oM bi sha la du ru/ ma shi kha dza la/ at+ma swA hA/ zhes rgyun du drang ngo // de nas
112a5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i drag sngags ni/ oM mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa ye/ hrIhrI bi krin te/ yul 'di'i lo thog la tsa pa ti dA hra la/ ma hA kro d+ha shar ral sta hUM phaT/ thig nig/ gcig med/ gnyis drag/ nubargyad bcad/ dung pro/ gnam mtho ris phye/ lcags sgrog
112a6(rnying rgyud): khrol+la// mi ring song/ kyang rje chung mo d+ho ru tsu ru hU~M phaT/ stong bzlas la thun laM brab/ seng ldeng phur pA la bzlas la gtar gzhug/ de nas gong gi rdzas de dag la/ dbab sngags 'dis dbab po// oM mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa ye/ hrik+ti ye hri/ yu
112a7(rnying rgyud): ga mo'i lo thog la drug phreM/ kar thom/ br-i ti grom/ mug ti smin/ shar shang drag cu phong / rtse ba tid hrul/ a tika pob ta/ sha sha ta hU~M phaT/ tsar+tha/ ag ne/ reg mo thong te swA hA/ cang kyeng mo tsu tsa dz+ra tra dzaH/ ho ho pr-i/ mur mur/ sha~M ru dzo/ thig nig
112b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med cig brag/ brgyad bcad/ dur grom/ gnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng songad/ rgyang rje rgyang mo tsu ru tsu ru phaT/ ma mo bya rtsa ye/ ma mo'i srog rtsa ye/ dgra bo'i lo thog skar mo la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ zhes 'phang thabs zud do// dpal drag snga
112b2(rnying rgyud): blagasang nag po bzhan pa lnga khri rgyud las/ gza' nod gsang ba'i lewa steng bzhi pa'o// / de nas byab 'jug 'dis bskul lo// hUM khyab 'jug chen po kun tu drug/ 'jigs byed chen po rU hru la// srin gyi bu la ku ye tsha// rjegs tshogs pa'i phru
112b3(rnying rgyud): bu// sku mdog du ka mig gis khengs// rdo stod mi la ro skad sprul// dus tshod tshes grangs kun gyi bdag/ nam mkha' rlung nag dgel na bzhugs// 'jig rten lha srin dbang du phud// 'jig rten 'khrug cing thog ser 'bebs// nyi ma zla ba khyer med byed// lo
112b4(rnying rgyud): nad 'khrug pa gtong // sa 'og rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// klu rnams ma lus yul yang 'byin// 'jig rtenas yang drug tu g.yo// sad dang mu ge btsa' yang 'bebs// gshin rje gsheshad po'i zhabs drung du// khas blangs dam bcas ma 'da' bar// bdag
112b5(rnying rgyud): phrin las bsgrub par mdzod// ces bskul lo// dpal drag pa ga zlag sa nag po bshan pa sgra zla'i rgyud las/ hUM thu la sgrub pa'i lewa zhe lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dbang phyug chen po bsgrub la thog dbab pa 'di gsungs /
112b6(rnying rgyud): grag nag seng gi mtshangs pa 'dra ba'i rtsar phyin la/ gra phying gtsang ma gcig la ldong ros kyis thig bzhi btab la ling tsa dgur bya'o// dbus su dbang phyug chen po'i tsaka li gzug/ dar dmar pos dgab po// phyogs bzhi'i shar du dri za thog 'bebs/ lho
112b7(rnying rgyud): gzhin thog 'babs/ rme zug 'babs/ byang ga na rgyan cig babs dag // man ba cas la srung pa btags la ga dgas/ thig dbas pa'i mdu thongs pawa~M/ tshan pa la yod parnam pa // ma nga marjod par brgya pa/
113a1(rnying rgyud): gsar blamangs rgyalags pag dang bkres lathod pa thugs lag dgag/ dpal drag sngags thags nag pa bkun pa ng+gA 'i drung sa/ zhwa zaga' babs sgrub pa'i 'du byung drug pa// / danas pa du
113a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsum las/ ma hA de wat+taM/ skyes pas/ ma hA de ba mdog nag pa/ yun gsum pa/ g.yas kha T+wA~Md+hi gsum pa dang / khyung gi rgyal mtshan phyur baM/ g.yon zhags pa dang btson bsdams pa bgyid la/ phyogs bzhi rgya chen po bzhi la rdo thog
113a3(rnying rgyud): gi bu yug 'bebs par bsam mo// oM bra h+ma Na rak+Sha e h+ye hi dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes spyan drangs so// ma hA de wa pra mo ha ra tsa bzhi ri sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ zhes bzhugs su gsol/ mchod pa 'bul lo// de nas sngags 'di dag drang ngo // oM ma hA de wa ti dza She dza tra
113a4(rnying rgyud): prah+ma N+Da rak+Sha kAr kar ma yang hUM/ daM ba ra tsa tsa la ma ti ni / dgra bo tsog mo 'di thum thum/ rbad zad sen sen dza hrI/ khro stong du drang ngo // de nas 'khor lo de dgra'i khang 'gram du sbas te/ oM tsa dur mu kha shag sha bar man/ ma hA de wa dgra bo'i yul khams su mo dus
113a5(rnying rgyud): kha ba hUM pra ba hUM phaT/ zhes bzlas na 'bab par nges so// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ thog dbab pa'i le'u steng bdun pa'o// / de nas yang lha rgod kyi thog dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod rab tu 'jigs par N+Dal
113a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi byas te/ ro spungs pa dang khrag mtsho bri'o// de'i lha dgod pa gong ma dang 'dra bar byas la/ thod pa kha sbyor dug khrag byug la/ steng ma yang 'og ma yum du mda' gsol la/ gro ga la ming rus bris la/ srud pas btags la bar du
113a7(rnying rgyud): gzhug go// de nas bskyod/ spyan da / bstim/ pUng 'dul lo// de nas 'dis lha chen po nyid gnang 'a khor zhing bsgrub bo// oM ma hAd waka la kata/ nga ti pa ni/ i na bri so na/ tsan ga ru ru nyes kan/ su ben hrI/ be hu ka na/ sarji de/
113b1(rnying rgyud): yang ba du byung la/ zhes btud pa// dnga' dug zugs rmugs sgrub ba na du 'i byud lag/ stan zlog dbab pa'i 'ja gang bcu pag// sa nga ba ba / !/ gnam grags ga tam du dkyil nas// gnang dud
113b2(rnying rgyud): lol ba'i gzhal yas nas// gnam lcags zlog chen 'bebs pa'i lha// chibs su 'brug nag 'bar bachibs// rol du khyung dang seng ge khring// kha rlang sa na dun sprin du gtibs// shangs nas bu yug khring phang 'dri la// gnam lcags par
113b3(rnying rgyud): tshim// shel gyi skying dang si le le// gser thog lpags zlog ches sa chem// gnam lcags ral gri glang la bskor// zangs kyi klog dmar lcibs sa ldeg/ khrag bu lcag langs se langs// hUM drar choms rbad nal re shang shar ShA /
113b4(rnying rgyud): yang byung/ ga/ ga chapa la / drug tsa/ sa zud pa/ dag ga thog pa rnams cas/ ba bangang/ zhus dpal ga gas
113b5(rnying rgyud): chud las/ thog dbub pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ngan sngags thog dbab pa 'di gsungs so// ma hA tsan d+ha rakra be sha sa na ya thob/ hA ra tsan+ta ma hA tsan d+ha yak+sha bak+ka phob/ rak+ta ma hA yaka / shang shal
113b6(rnying rgyud): hi la ha la/ dAn ta pra tsi phob/ pratsa praH/ ga ri hi ri/ bdum+b+ha ts+tsha/ raD+ga rak+Sha/ can d+ham hA sha ga tinan/ dar can d+ha btsa paH/ ha la ha la/ dar dang phaT/ raka tsan te/ ma hA shan+ti b+h+yo b+ha/ badz+ra tsi ta d+ya b+ha R+sha pa/ badz+ra da wa ta na tinad+ha/ dpal dran
113b7(rnying rgyud): sa bgad pa gyi chung bas/ zag da ba pa'i yus dru tu rje/ des ma da du cung drug dang / pal ga du/ dag su/ ngas / gas rgyal dgas pas ka
114a1(rnying rgyud): yul de'i mang yang bris la/ sngags 'di bzlas nas sa snun thog 'bab par 'gyur ro// bgazan la/ skams can gyi gzugs zlas m+b+ha/ sngags 'dri btu bzlas/ khang bya la sbas nas dang na 'don no// sngags 'ang
114a2(rnying rgyud): spyag shad la btab nas phyugs ma'i 'og tu bting na skab 'phel lo// tshon rtse lnga la btab nas bzhag na byi ba dang / ri bong kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro// mu tig la btab nas bud med kyis ming na bu mang po 'ang ngo // mthu'i bro la btab nas bcangs na ma thar ro//
114a3(rnying rgyud): dpal drag sngag bla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ le'u skye re gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ ma mo rak+Sha 'di bsgrub la yams nad gtong ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod 'jigs par phyin
114a4(rnying rgyud): mi phung shul nams blangs la maN+Da la byas la/ mngar khrag dang rims khrag gis chag chag btab la/ dug dang srin mo byug go// dbus zla gsum brtseg ma blag ma gsum/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu lhung sbrul po thod phreng bya/ gru za pa / khru ldan
114a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dbus su 'jam dpal yab yum/ 'khor lo la phung byed ma bzhi/ gru chad la sridang bzhi/ DI bas mtshan la bshan pa ma bzhi/ bar khyams las bdag mo bzhi dgod do// phur pa dgad do// dbus bu zod ngan lad bris
114a6(rnying rgyud): dag/ de mardzan na/ gshed po la dpal kA hor/ a ka ti la shes rab ma ma tshal dang/ snrel gri mo'i steng / ma la mi dpa dang / rdzung gsums la thang na pa skyed dang / ba / sbrul nag snying / ga ga
114a7(rnying rgyud): ldan no// zung byed bzhi la khrug sngags ma nga/ smag sangs padag kyi snying gzhig// btsun pa bsgril gastong mgang// thaMd ma na pa sarba/ smra kyi'am thag gzhag/ gdang sa/ don/ theg pa dang ga/
114b1(rnying rgyud): la// maN+Dal gyi bung shar du/ maN+Dal mchod rten nag po la ro so la bslus pa'i bum par ming dus gzhug/ mjug tu mchod rten gnyan sar sra'o// dpal drag tu sa blags nag po bshan pa spu gri'i chud las/ srid pa dmag tu dbab pa'i labru skang gnyis pa'o//
114b2(rnying rgyud): de nas bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgom/ ma mo rnams bskyed kyang mi lag la/ ma bskyed kyang rung ba yin/ srid pa dmag tu 'dis nan dbab po// trag rak+ka kha mun dra mu tra ma ma ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ku mdza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ rak+sha thun
114b3(rnying rgyud): shing rdzun/ ma mthun/ bi maru co dgra la ts+tshe b+h+yo b+h+yo phaT phaT/ ru ru byi ma ru tse/ kha tham ma mo nag mo tsa ma ying / srog la thun/ snying la thibs/ myog phyogs/ shog shig/ tsid+b+ha ba ma shig/ tsiN+Da bam myog/ mug tig ri myong / tset+ta ba ma nga /
114b4(rnying rgyud): shig/ thum shig/ long long thum long / yor yong mer mer song / ru ru shig tri/ kra ma du sod sod/ srog zum mug sod/ ma yag ru zad ya sod/ kha ru ga sha sha sa ma ya sod/ srog thum nr-i rbad sod/ ni ne rtsa khun la sod/ ces bzlas te/ 'khor
114b5(rnying rgyud): lo mchod rten du thub la gnan pa bya'o// dpal drag sngags zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ srin mo'i tshogs kyi nad yams dbab pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o// / de nas ma mo las la gtang ba ni/ hUM/ sdang srid rak+ta'i
114b6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas nas// khrag gi bud med nag mo 'bum// kha nas nad ngan sna tshogs 'gyed// sna nas dug gi rlangs pa 'thul// mgo la dug gi me 'bar ma// la la gnod sbyin sgeg mo'i gzugs// la la ma mo sgeg mo'i gzugs// la la drang srong
114b7(rnying rgyud): khros pa 'dra// la la dur khrod mi ro'i gzugs// la la mkha' 'gro bya yi gzugs// dgra la nad dang roms ya mas phob// ces bskul lo// dpal drag sngag zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ ma mo bskul ba'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//
115a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ma ma yangs kyi na nas nad kyi bdag myor ma ti'i nad dbab pa 'di gsungs so// 'di dag drag sngags socha// d+hA mra tha~M dza~M ga mduso / ma lag du la sod/ kha drag sham sud/ srog thun no nang sad/ nal na
115a2(rnying rgyud): tsadran sod/ gcung snying phyung / snying rgyud srog chod/ thun dbugs long / mam thu blun song sod / dpal drag sa kyi rnags nag po bshan pa su grI'i rgyud las/ rem tis nad ngan 'breb pa'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste laba'o// / na
115a3(rnying rgyud): ngan sngags 'di dag gsungs so// rgyu gzor gyis shi bya'i khrag gi gzhi la/ btsan dug bzhi na ma gcig/ thar nu de dang mnyam/ bse zho/ mar rting pa la sngags bzlas nas btang na chu gzer du 'gyur ro// bas zhe sdang dang / zo sha/ bca
115a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam par byas nas lus la bskus na lhog par 'gyur ro// bse zho/ btsan dug/ byang ba/ mdze khrag tu sbyar nas/ zar ma'i mar khu dang lo ma gos la bskus na mdzes zin par 'gyur ro// byang ba dang mdze khrag skam po sbyar te chang la btab na snying la ba
115a5(rnying rgyud): dug sna tshogs dang khrag tu sbyar te/ rims khrag dang / khyi lung dkar pos sbya rab klu yod pa'i chu mig tu blugs na rims 'bebs so// khyi lud lo lon pa brtsigs pa'i kha ra/ rdo ti tshe dang / d+ha du ra bzhag ste me bus nas/ rlung phyogs su 'gul tshang rim
115a6(rnying rgyud): btab nas/ 'gum mo// mdze khrag skam po dang / rta khro btang na mdzes 'dzin no// phag sha dang nya sha thang phyo ma nag pos btsos pa bta ba na lus s+tha te 'gum mo// sngags stong stong ngo / dpal drag lngag zlags nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ nad bdag mo le'u sa
115a7(rnying rgyud): dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ skyo 'bog gi las bya ba'i phyir/ srog bdag gi las 'di gsungs so// gnas ni ri bdun rtsi'am lha khang ngam brag dkar por bsgrubs te/ dar ras gtsang ma'am/ grwa phying gtsang ma btang la 'dru
115b1(rnying rgyud): lnga'i brtul yang dgram/ ga pur dang / sras rnams bkram la/ dang dkar gur dbus po// lha bshos ri bo 'dra ba la mar byug/ lcug mtshig gsum po la bya rgod zer mo'i phod dang / dar/ za 'og/ gser/ bas/ g+ha tIka lpags bu dkar po gzug go// de nas
115b2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma ni/ chan bug khur ba/ bud phrom/ dkar gsum/ mngar gsum/ spyan gzigs rnams la/ srog bdag nyid tsa ka li re btsugs la/ bdag nyid gshin je gshed du bsgo zla la/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po bzlas/ de nas srog bdag gi drag
115b3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag go// gshin rjes mgo mnan te/ oM shrI many+dza ya ma rA tsa ma ma e ka tsa te ni dza dza/ tri tsa pa la a shug me swA hA/ bod pa'o// ha li hu lu mar ril ni dza/ la li pra mardi/ r-i tse thal ba ni/ gre ti kro la ya/ tI kaM/ shi d+hirA tri/ re tri hri dang trang / ha bA
115b4(rnying rgyud): shang / che ge'i tsit+ta la dza/ zhes zad do// dpalali drag sdig zla gsang nag po bshan pa spa gri'i rgyud las/ gsang pa shar ging gi le'u ste re bdun pa'o// / de nas ling+ga bcas la/ mi g+ho gring shi ba'i thod pa 'amarta thod du/ dug sna dgu/ ra khyi'i
115b5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas te gzhug/ nyin bzhin lnga'i gang bzhi dang / skabs su ging chen bco brgyad bskul/ oM ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la thibs/ mug ma ra Na thun/ par tang dgra bo'i snying shag/ tshal pa~M dum/ dgra bo'i bkrag la rbad/ b+ha ga
115b6(rnying rgyud): gribs chum/ dgra bo'i khrag la 'ji bas/ si pa si ba dun po/ ma ma sha la dza/ rak+ta khrag la thun b+h+yo/ g+hug rmug rbad rbad/ ces bsad do// dpal drag sngagA zla gsang nag po bshan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ shar ging gi bsad las te le'u re brgyad pa'o//

116a2(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis srog bdag chen po dgu'i sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor ni dbus thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgur bya'o// gru gsum re re bri'o// shar du ser/ dbus su dkar/ lho sngo/ nub dmar/ byang ldang / mtshams smug por bya'o//
116a3(rnying rgyud): shug pa'i phur pa dgu la ging ka ras ma yaM dgra bo'i srog chod cig/ tiSh+Tha lhan/ byas la dgod do// phur pa la dar dkar gyi cod pan gdags so// gsang phye la bshos bu byas la mar byug la// dbus su smyug ma tshigs dgu pa la mtshal gyi nya mig bri//
116a4(rnying rgyud): rtse la bya rgod rgyal mtshan dang / dar dkar gyi gdugs dbub/ rnga mo dkar po gzug go// le co brgyad la smyug ma tshig gsum pa brgyad la/ mtshal dang ldong ngos kyis g.yung drung ris su bris la/ dar lce dkar po dang / shel dkar phreng ba
116a5(rnying rgyud): dang / rin po che lnga dang / byi ru/ mgron bu/ dgra bo'i ming rus re re gdags so// lcang ma mnor ba re la/ phod dang dar gdags/ mtshal gyi g.yung drung ris bris la sgo bzhir dgod do// gzhan yang thung dang dkar gsum/ mngar gsum

117a5(rnying rgyud): so// dkyil 'khor gyi lho nub tu 'bru khung du ngam sri'i gzugs ming dus gzhug/ byang shang du sha khrag gi ga N+Do ma la tshil chen gyi zhal khe Ta b+ha'o// dpal drag sug/ zugs nag pa bshan pa sdu g+hi'i rgyud las/ srog zan chen po'i thug pa'i le da pa'i /

118a1(rnying rgyud): hUM / skeng kha dag s+ho/ du na N+ya dza/ rbad tinan tre shig/ badz+ra su tri ra ka sha tshag tsa pA ya/ rbad kyi zad thaM ni la nr-i drug phreng bu re las ma ya dung / ling zung du b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra sr-i tri rak+sha tsa mA ra ya rbad tre gnan shig shig sen dum bur rngubs/
118a2(rnying rgyud): ragam ga zad/ kr-i trI rak+Shatsa drar su phun kyo// badz+ra suM tre rakadag la lhag phreng thum/ sa ma ya du ling rba ts+tsha kyo// zhes drangs te gsol ka yang bya/ rtsa ba las kyi sngags khungs sngags pa // dpa' dreg sngags bla gas nag pa bshan pas kri'i rgyad las/ gtong rdza

120b2(rnying rgyud): srog dang blo rdo'i le'u ste gya bdun pa'o// / btsan ni nags tshal me'i dgon par gnas// bla rngom rdo mchin kha yin// srog ni dza shu ya zhes bris te/ ra dmar snying du bcug la/ dar le brgan gyis brel lo// 'khrun kong ltar bya/ mo ne drag
120b3(rnying rgyud): mer pa'i nang na gnas/ bla rdo ni g.yu jo yin/ srog ni ma ma ru lu zhes bris te/ bya nAg gser mig gi snying du brub la/ dar sngon nang du zil bya'o// dpal drag sngag blags nag po banyan pa spu gri'i rgyud las/ btsan dang ma mo srog bzung ba'i le'u ste gya brgyar
120b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gza'i gnas ni ri rab kyi zom na gnas/ gla rngon dkar phra mon yin/ srog ner gte swA hUM/ zhes par rog gi sbyong khrag tu bcug la/ dar nag tu zil te 'khrun gong ltar bya'o// lha dbang phyug che pon dong khams kyi ya ba na ga
120b5(rnying rgyud): pra rdo la bong long bu yin/ srog ni a dwe wa zhes bris nas/ dar stug pos gtum mo// dpal drag drug ga seng nag po ba tan pa wA mra'i rgyud las lha rgod gze 'god srog bzung ba'i leT ste bya dgra pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin ni nags tshal dra ba can
120b6(rnying rgyud): na gnas/ b+ha rnaM ni pabong po bu/ srog ni k+She yak+Sha bris te/ dar sus dkar byas pa'i nang dug tum la bca po// rgyal po nyi zla brtsegs pa na gnas/ srog ni d+haHdza yin te/ khyi dkar tset+ta ra dar dkar krol la bcang / klan rtse mtsho'i gta na gnas/
120b7(rnying rgyud): thad ni gang sum yin/ sa hAg zhas bris pa/ sbrul gyi pags pa gsum mo// dpal grang thug+sags dpa pa bzhan pa spu mi rgyud las/ gnang sbyin rgyal ba kru sreg brdung ba'i ba skyed bu brjod // / denas pam ldan das ta byas/ ngag
121a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ papa bdun ma dang brgyad kyi drag sngags 'di dgag sungs so// brasad pa dag gi bsgrub pa la// dril te bsrung la gtor ta gtan// maN+Dal la bar lo d+ha bas brgyad ze// srog gi snying pa na dgas// drag la 'ang drun/
121a2(rnying rgyud): ling shang ka 'dun ra b+hU ya/ nA ga ra nIr k+ta chums/ tsan+da raH/ bdun ya ma morak+Sha tsit+ta kha/ rak+Sha ya g+ha bdun ya/ e sa a ka shu la de la raM/ kha dun raH/ tra~M du na sa ma ya/ zhes zhag ni bdun du ngal du ba sbeng // de nas gtad pa las bya'o// dpa
