126a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang dga'ashad kyang // ngas kyi drag sngags brjob pa yis// bstan pa bsrung ba yang dag yin// bsad pa'i las kha 'di 'jug/ dab po grul gnod pa na// mu ming gzi la bya srog dbrog/ blo spyod rgyal po khram la badz+ra// dregs
126b1(rnying rgyud): sa bcug/ 'as du nga pa sa sa / gas sangs sa / sa ba na// mapa dzu na la dungan bang dastong ba bral bas 'dag/ nga slo bsam dzug sa
126b2(rnying rgyud): 'jal// rdzogs dang rdzas dang te 'di dag sam// stong bags mdub ldang bas gcod// ye shes lha dang las kyi da// de mdun 'gang rjed kun kyang grol// mtshangs lha la tang 'dzin cang // 'dus byas yid pas shig lathing // ngas nathug pa
126b3(rnying rgyud): mnachad// blo li yul chos pa brtags par// srog dang / 'drinas su tegs// de nam yang dag shad kyab// rtags rnams rab rtsa rdzogs rgya man// byang chub sems dang ldan pa las// kyangs la mnyam pa nyid pa'i// zhes gsungs // dpal
126b4(rnying rgyud): rlab sngags thugasang dag po skad las/ la ste brgya gsum // denas dbang po 'jigs kyang bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas job nyid// yas r+b+bag chen 'angs// gsang bdag pag rjong pa// byin gyis brlab pa'i tshul gyis ga /
126b5(rnying rgyud): nga dmyags chen bcwa// dregs pa btsa bkyang snrel gtad// de dag mkha' 'gro ga 'dzin pas// nga khrod can por ring byas btab// rin chen gsar gyi grabs pas la// ban+dan ni kun par bris// rang nan hU~M med lus btab nas// de rnams ci yang
126b6(rnying rgyud): dwa'agyur/ dpal drag zugs bla gsang nub pa'i rgyud las/ bud gtang pa'i lewa sti brda bzhi pa rdzogs so// / dpal drag sngags bla gsang dag po'i rgyud dpal po'i rdul po ba su d+ha ra dang / ban+da chung ga rba ba n+de yang dbang gter gyis/
126b7(rnying rgyud): sing brag zug tu mkha' 'grom dang bka' ba kros te bsgyur ba la// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+than b+hU shrIb pa la gra thA/ dzad skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal drim med pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshen
127a1(rnying rgyud): gnad pa la phyag 'tshal pa// 'di skad pa dag gis thos pa'i dus gcigang/ ston 'dras pa'i dus la byung ba rjod ral/ rdzas kyi thig gegag gcig thos pa thams cad dang bral zhing dang bzhi kyis nam par dag pa
127a2(rnying rgyud): mag yos bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal longs spyong rdzogs pa'i spar bzhengs nas/ nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs las byung ba'i yon tan smos pa ni/ 'jam dpal rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las dang / de 'azhin gsheg
127a3(rnying rgyud): dang // ye shes lngar ldan pa'i chos bu nyi shu lnga la sogs te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor mang po spos shing thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor gyis bskor ba la/ 'jam dpal spos bral gyi rgyas btab nas/ yid pa mi byed pa
127a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas/ moM rtog chos kyi dbyings su mnal lo// 'phags pa'ajam dpal dri ma med pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'das pa sngon byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de'i tshe de'i dus na re rab kyi ngog/ gser gyi seg gi smras
127a5(rnying rgyud): yas rim gyis chags pa'i 'og rngu'i dkyil 'khor gyi yang 'og/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btegs pa'i steng du/ gnam lcags kyi khang pa shin tu che ba bcu bdud gnas te/ phyogs phyogs kyi nad ni mi rog sar rting gis brtsigs pa/ 'og khrag gi rgya mtshor 'gyel
127a6(rnying rgyud): baHkha zur kun rdob/ sgo med yid kyi so can de lta bu'i nang nu khams gsum gyi sems can zas su bzhing gsod pa las kyi rnam par smin pa zhe sdang drag po'i mthu las grub pa'i/ gshin rje nag po mthar byed bdud bye ba gur ring zhes bya ba dang / de'i chung ma rus mtshan nag
127a7(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba yi dwags thams cad kyi gtso mo byang cing / skye 'gro thams cad khram la 'debs shing / zas su sha khrag rjod pa bzhid/ srid pa gsum sgron yod pa gcig dbus kyi khang pa na gnas so// de gnyis kyi sprul pa las kyi gzhi rje'i gshed chen po bzhi byung ste/
127b1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po ma he nag po la zhon nas skye 'gro thams cad mgo 'khor bar byed cing / srid pa'i rgyu las 'dzin pa dang / gsal shing nag po gshin rje ya ba ti/ chu glang nag po la zhon nas skye 'gro thams cad khrag tu skyugs par byed cing srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa dang / gyos byed
127b2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba a ba glang mgo can dung kha nag po rdo rje ro langs ni dri'un nang gsum la zhon nas/ skye bgro myos shing brgyal bar byed cing srid pa'i log dbub pa dang / gsod byed sdug nag ra la pa tshar dgu ni/ sbrul nig po la khron nas skye 'gro thams cad gsod cing srid pa'i bya
127b3(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang bzhir byung ngo // de bzhi la mthar byed ra tse ha la yag sha med pa la gshed po bzhi zhes bya'o// de bzhi la bka' nyan bzhir yod do// gshin rje phya sangs ni/ chos kyi rgyal po'i 'khor na lam rgyad lnga la dbang byed pas ded dpon chen po tshangs pa kun dril zhes bya
127b4(rnying rgyud): ste// nyi zla'i 'khor lo zhon nas srid pa'i bskos 'debs shing gcod spong byed// gshin rje trel pa ni ya ba ti'i 'khor na dbugs len cing dbang po the'u shan zhes bya ste/ rlung gi rnga mo la zhon nas srid pa'i dbugs len to// dam sri nag po lcags kyi sang mgo can gyi
127b5(rnying rgyud): na/ bla tshe 'phrog pa'i dbang po 'char byed ces bya ste/ skyo 'phog sha ba la don nas srid pa'i zla bcu'o// gshin rje yig dmar rang pa tshar dgu'i 'khor na/ srog gcod pa'i bdag po mar co zhes bya ste/ lcags pA lug la zhon nas/ srid pa'i srog gcod pa dang
127b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi'o// gzhan yang de la sogs te/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi 'khor dang thabs cig pas 'jig rten gyi khams phung bar byed pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings las man la sad de/ dregs pa can
127b7(rnying rgyud): tshar bcad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu gtum chen gnyis po ji ltar gyur te/ bcom gser gyi kha dog la// steng zil 'dra ba'i mdog tu bstan// ut+pal sngon po'i phyag mtshan ni// gshin rje'i dbyug pa nag por bstan// 'ja
128a1(rnying rgyud): dpal zhi ba'i sprul pan// gshin rnams pa'i sar bstan// zhwal drug thug sung bcu gnyis sa// dbujug su yang byen du 'thol// 'brus kyang ba ga sa yo gas pa na// dam sa pa rnam par bcan/
128a2(rnying rgyud): dpal khro snga pas gshin rjer gyur// ro sangs gtum mos g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas na bka' rjod dzi tri ma// de ltar yab yum gnyis su med pa'i 'khor yang 'di lta ste/ gshin zhe chen po bzhi dang / de'i yum bzhi dang / phyogs spyod gshin rje
128a3(rnying rgyud): dang / de'i yum bcu dang / sgom bzhi dang / de ltar 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de kun kyang 'bar zhing khro la rngam pa'i tshe byad can lanas kyang hUM hU~M dang / phaT phaT dang / ha la ha la'i sa sgog
128a4(rnying rgyud): khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / nam mkha'i chu dang mnyam pa la/ bar khyams dang sgo bzhi dang / rta babs su bcas pa la/ thod sbrul dang g.yang gzhis brgyan cing yang ba'i rtsa ba'i/ dan lam he la sogs pa dang nyi zlas mtshan pa/ yi dwags pa ma
128a5(rnying rgyud): kru kr-i thul du brdzis pa gcig tu gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na khro bog shIn rje'i gshed pos/ khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// oM a kro te ka ya mA na na/ ha na mtha bran mo hUM phaT/ ces pas nyi ma 'bum las lhag pa
128a6(rnying rgyud): zer phyogs bcur brdal nas/ bskal pa'i 'brug stong dus gcig na ldir ba'i sgra brjod pas/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu// yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'grel lo//
128a7(rnying rgyud): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// rur rab tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur ro// che ma rag tu chem/ kun tu rab tu tshim mo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// de ltar khams gsum dbang du bskus shing srid g.yum
128b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gsang byu gnas tsug yadu/ gno ma la 'ang gardzogag sung ba / rdzu man pa'i thang lagan rgyags kyirig pa la brgya papa pa ba dgran te/ ma ga gdungs pa/
128b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ chog pasmralasacig ga thabs dag rab la gas pas bayangam/ thobaco dud med 'a / kyilar dran ting nang 'a nga ga sapa du'angog ni pa mi bye na la
128b3(rnying rgyud): 'bring sa la nan tan mchung zhig/ zhes zer te rang rang gi srog gi snying po mdo gra ga sol bu phul ba ni/ ya ma me te Te rA dza sa // dran yo ni/ ra ya d+hini/ zhes phul lo// 'jig rten sgra ma sbyin sde brgyad kyis kyang rang gi dpog nga g.yog tu bcas
128b4(rnying rgyud): ga gcig rgyal nas phul bas/ yal mdza mam ldan nal/ zhes pa nas bsgo ba'i bka' nyan par khas thangs so// denas bcom ldan 'das 'angam dpal 'dzin pa da can pa des/ 'du kyi gshin la dang 'dus pa'i'ang
128b5(rnying rgyud): du gnapa mi bad sa su rung bsta // dang ga gsum da byung / ni phya gsu lus kya byung // nga ni ltar mngon pa'o// dam gsas 'dri dngapa 'i dbang // nga'i braka la sar// ngas gsum brten pa'i spangs kyis// des brjod pas/
128b6(rnying rgyud): tu ga rtang rtsigs bte// dmacho stong pa rnam par thogs// daji ni gaskyong la bzhig/ des pand mchul // dmachog 'di la myong 'das na// dam rjes maso/ ma shing // khris kyang bral ba bzhinas nas/ snying pa'i bye
128b7(rnying rgyud): sas \u0f7f/ zheb mabardzun mngon pa cig nimi dang/ da 'dul ba pa// la// brta pa thams byas// 'am
129a1(rnying rgyud): med byed pa dang // zas ngan gyib za ba drung // gos ngang drug hrul gon pa dang // dam chog nyams pa mang pa dang // 'dul ba'i sgo la babs pa'i tshe// ma mo'i bstan pa blang ba'i 'o// bstan pa nub la nye ba tsho// phra shegs bdun
129a2(rnying rgyud): pa dar ba'i tshe// de tshe bstan pa'i srung ma gyis// zhes lung bstan te tha tshig bcas so// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal pos 'khor chog bya bar dam bcas so// ya ba tis gdan mchog bya bar dam bcas so// a ba blang mgo can gyis/ bran mchog bya bar dam bcas
129a3(rnying rgyud): ral pa tshor dbus cho ga bye bar dam bcas so// bya sangs kyis brkos mkhan bya bar dam bcas so// rmig pas rtses mkhan bya bar dam bcas so// tel bas khram pa bya bar dam bcas so// mig dmar gyis srog gcod pa bya bar dam bcas so// gling chen po ba
129a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis sgrol ging bya bar dam bcas so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gdul bya drag po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed po la/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen
129a5(rnying rgyud): pos bstan pa'i rgyud kyi don rgyas par zhus so// e ma'o 'jigs byid chen po lags// thugs rdo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// ston pa bstan pa dus gsum du// mi nub 'dzin cing bsrung ba la// lha spyod dbang dang dam tshig dang // srung dang bris las khyad par dang /
129a6(rnying rgyud): ngo bo des tshig dbye ba rnams// 'jigs byed chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ khro bo 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las kya
129a7(rnying rgyud): dri ma med pa'i gsang rgyud las// blta ba'i khyad par bstan pa ni// yo ga rnam pa gsum du bstan// gzugs snang sgra grags sems rtog kun// gshed po gtso 'khor sku gsung thugs// kun rdzob dkyil 'khor thabs su blta// don dam rang bzhin med par
129b1(rnying rgyud): bsta// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med du// rnal 'byor ma d+ha yo ga bsdu// gshed po gtso 'khor kun rdob de// don dam smos bral chos kyi dbyings// rang rig ye shes gnyis med du// shin du rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste// gshin rje gshed po gtso 'khor de//
129b2(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes rol pa'i sku// longs spyod rang la rdzogs pa'i rgyan// yon ta thams cad 'byung ba'i gter// rang bzhin ldan kyis rdzogs pa'i sgra// rdzogs pa chen po rnal 'byor bste// phungad rdob d+ha yi dkyil 'khor ba'i// dmigs pa rted gyi kyil
129b3(rnying rgyud): 'phong dang // dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang // rang bzhin grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // las las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi// darigs brten gyi dkyil 'khor ni// 'bur rapo ris su bris pa'o// dam chog sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni//
129b4(rnying rgyud): ti 'dzin brtan pa dang // rdo rje las su rung ba'o// rang bzhin grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos nyid khru las ma g.yos bzhin// longs spyod rdzogs sur gnas pa'o// las las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rang rgyud sa bon rtsub mo yis// chos
129b5(rnying rgyud): da sgyu mar ma rtogs te// las las grub pa'i dregs pa can// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpa' dri ma med pa'i gsang chud las/ lba ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // rna
129b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa yi spyod pa ni// kun rdzob lha yi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga// khyad par thabs kyi sbyor sgrol rnams// don dam rang bzhin med pas na// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med spyod// shin tu rnal 'byor spyod pa ni// kun rdzob lA yi
129b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor te// don dam na ma dag chos kyi dbyings// rig pa ye nas gnyis med pas// dbyings pa len pha rol par spyod// shin carnal 'byor spyod pa ni// ku rdob lha yi dkyil 'khor te// don dam rnam dag rgyas kyi dbyings// rang rig ye ga pa gnyis
130a1(rnying rgyud): me pas// dbyings las ye shes rol pa jog su// rdzogs brdzud pa tu hU~M// bu rdzob sa du bye la dbar na// rang byung ba sa sa 'od pas// pabatsam sa nyas pa nyid dugadus// blachags dag gsung dra
130a2(rnying rgyud): par spyod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyung las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u sde bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dri med dbang la rnam pa gsum// thun mong thugs de'i dbang dang ni// khyad par ye shes
130a3(rnying rgyud): dbang dang gnyis// nang gi dbang chen bsrung ba gsum// thun mong dbang la rnam pa gsum// phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa'i dbang // rim pa chung ma zos par ni// mos shing dad pa'i stobs dang sbyar// phan pa'i dbang la rnam pa bzhi// dgra bgegs zhi ba la
130a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur na// sa phyogs zla ba nya lta bur// naN+Da la byi dor byas pa la// glang chen klad pas chag chag gdab// tA la'i shing la dgra bgegs gzugs// martul la gnas ting 'dzin bstim// byamos dang snying rje ma lta bus// thugs rjes gzung bar gsol ba
130a5(rnying rgyud): btab// gsang sngags 'di bzlas zhi bar bya// oM hrI hrIHwi kr-i tA nan/ che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA// bsod nams rgyas pa'i dbang bsdu na// rin chen 'bar ba'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal byi ngor byas pa la// gu gul dag gis chag chag gar ba
130a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tshe dang bum pa la// tA la'i byang bur 'dod gsol gad ba// maN+Dal la gnas dmigs pa'i dzin// yid bzhin gter gyi dgongs pa yis// oM d+hId+hIHlI wi Sh+Than na pu tra A lu stan tshe a pan ya b+h+rU~M swA hA/ khams gsum rang gis dbang 'dod na// sa phyog
130a7(rnying rgyud): zla zos pad+ma rma// baN+Dal gyi dor byas pa la// pad+ma rA ga'i chag chag gdab// theg pa snyed pa'i long tshad la// byang chub sems kyis 'dod pa bri// maN+Dal de 'i dmigs pa brten// brtan pa thob nas gsang sngags bzlas// khams gsum dbang sdang dgongs pa
130b1(rnying rgyud): gang 'dod rang dbang 'gyur bar bya// odza \u0f7f bi kr-itA nan pa shad kra rbasa?d+ha// drag pas tshar gcod dbang bskur na// sa phyogs thugasum te zhal du// maN+Dal byi dar byas pa la// khrag cen dag gis chag chag gdab// zhing ras gshed po'i gzugs
130b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// maN+Dal steng gad 'i dmigs pa bstim// gdug bskul gre bas ma lta bus// gsang sngags bzlas shing 'byung bar bya// a a d+hi ma ma e b+hi// gsang sngags tshad du phyin pa dang // gshed pos dgra bgegs tshang gcod 'gyur// gang mos dang par
130b3(rnying rgyud): rung bag// thun mong ting rjes slob par nges// nus pa'i dab ni rnam pa pazhi// nyan bshed bsgos bsgrub 'gro don rnams// rim pa'i nges pa rnyed pa ni// gang la mes pa de la bskur// nyan par nus pa'i dbang 'dod na// khring+ga dang po te ldan pa rnams/
130b4(rnying rgyud): rig sgo nga'i 'bas bye la// srid pa'i dra ba bcad pa dang // nyon mongs ma lus ni byas pa// 'khor ba'i pha rol phyin par bslar// 'chad par nus pa'i dbang 'dod na// seng ge'i blo dang po de dang // phyag shing rdo rje brtsernams kyi// pa tha
130b5(rnying rgyud): bdan pa dang // lam dza'i ma gyis bgrod pa dang // sa rnams mnyam par sbyar ba dang // 'khor 'das la gan 'byed par bsam/ bsgom bsgrub nus pa'i dbang 'dod ma// shes rab tang pa rda yo byad kyis// mnyam gzhag rjes zo banan pa dang sbar// dz+ra
130b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i dbang 'dod pas// rdon dril bu phrad byas la// byams dang snying rjes bzung nas kyang // thams cad shes rab gnyis med bskur// byud par ye shes dbang la gsum// byi nang gsang ba rnamo gsum sa// drim par thabs kyis rdzogs par ni// shA
130b7(rnying rgyud): rib blo dang gyur te bzung // de la phyi dbang bsrung ba ni// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// gshin rje'i lta ro bstan byas te// thun mor rdzas kyis dbang bskur la// phyir mi ldog par bstan par bya// nang gi dbang chen bsrurang ba ni// skal ldan rigs kyi
131a1(rnying rgyud): sams dang // 'jam dpal ga shA 'i sragasang thugs// sun/ bran pas rnam pas// rang dbang thab par ba slar byur bya// yon mam bag// rnams/ sna / tha zam ga // su dang tha
131a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// oM na maHsarba taSh+TA gtA Sh+NI ma nA n+tha/ lAg badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ gsung dang dbyer med pa'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA gta d+hIHla yAn ta ka/ tsit+ta badz+ramASh+TA wa sAt+ma ko&haM/ thugs dang dbyer med pa'o// oMn naHsarba ta thA ga ta k+Shi pa mun ta ka
131a3(rnying rgyud): ga dz+yA badza pA b+hA wa At+ma kiM&haM/ yo d+ha tan dang dbyer med pa'o// na maHsarbata thA ga ta ShIHya man+ta ta ka/ kAm+ba ba dza swad+g+ha a la ng+ga na tAn/ phrin las dang dbyed med pa'o// ye shes lnga ru dbang bskur ba/ oM ma hA bAn d+hang+ka ni badz+ras wAg \u0f85na/
131a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang dbyer med pa'o// oM mab+ha A daM sha shAH tA dz+nyAn badz+ra swa g+ha wa A t+ma ko&haM/ me long lta bu'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa'o// oM sa ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang dbyer med pa'o// oM praha
131a5(rnying rgyud): swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa'o// oM ma hA krih+Na nuSh+Tan dz+nyA na swa b+hawa At+ma ko&haM/ byab nan tan gyi ye shes dang dbyer med pa'o// sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga// rigra lnga ye shes lnga dang dbyer med par// lhun
131a6(rnying rgyud): gyis grub par dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i dbang chen bskur ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi skye gsung thugs// rang sems snying por shes byas te// sems nyid ma bcos klong gyur pa// sems la rang dbang thob par bskur// mtshon pa'i dpe dang go byed brda'/
131a7(rnying rgyud): te zla babs dang shes rab brda'// me long chu shel chu long gis// sems la dbang ba'i dbang rtags sbyin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal drim med pa gsang ba'i rgyud pas/ dbang gi khyad par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas dpal wang
131b1(rnying rgyud): tha pa sa la// pa// la ma nan// na/ ga / ga na
131b2(rnying rgyud): bzer// dag gi las grag sang sngags brjod// gsang chog gzhan du mi sgra zhing // mnyam pa'i ngani las sa yengs pa// skye gsung thugs kyi 'jig go// yan lag dam chog pa rjod// / me rung ba dang dang dang // spyad par bya dang shes par bya// bsrung
131b3(rnying rgyud): bar bye ba mchog sa nyi bu wa// g.yel ba med par bsung ba // den chog bka' la gang gnas pa// yon tan meng bzhin ga tes d+hAr nga byung // dadag sun mo da ma rig de// khyad pa dang jog 'di dag do// 'dag nyid kyi chog
131b4(rnying rgyud): btsu med pa ga / rdzug zugs gnal bzhid // da ma kyi ga// jib 'du byu ti na
131b5(rnying rgyud): gyis dang zhom du bdud rtsing sha'// me ning mchog phrar mtshon du thogs// phyag mi brdal zhing la ma mi bzar// ral pa sunang tsod pa d+higs// ma yengs mchon ched la'i 'gyur// 'di dag byung bar da mchog ste// gA shi rje'i gshen po'i ga
131b6(rnying rgyud): dgas pa ring mdapa 'dri med pa'i gang ba zud pas/ dbardzog bstan pa'i 'i ba the drug par// tsug sbrul ldad dong 'chang // srub thab kyi spyad par na/ shes pa pa stobs 'ching bas// da
131b7(rnying rgyud): ma tan brjid// rang las byung ba den rangs spyod// phrin mong sa/ yi dkyil 'khor bang // kyang par thabs kyi rim pa yis// dngos grub rnas pa gsum du bshad// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs che gsum// bskyed pa thabs kyi basbyang ba de//
132a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor dmigs pa'i rten// rdul tshan dkyil 'khor la brten nus// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim pas bskyed// bdag med lha yi skur gsal nas// dmigs bya rdo rjer gyur pas te// phan las gdul byang
132a2(rnying rgyud): don dang myur// ma ba skyed rdzogs pa'i sgrub thabs ni// las dang ye shes dmigs pa'i rten/ ris dang 'bur du byung ba yang // snying po tshig tsam dran rig gis// rgya las rje bur rdol ba 'am// chu na'i tshul du rdzogs par bskyed// rtab tu der gnas
132a3(rnying rgyud): 'byor de// phrin las gdul bya'i don dang sbyar// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa ni// yo byad nor bu'i gter 'chang bas// sems nyid lha yi sku gsung thugs// rang las byung ba btsal du med// thig le nyid la gnas pa la// bsam gyis mi khyab gcig gi
132a4(rnying rgyud): dang // mi gtong 'dzin pa dngos grub cing // rang las byung ba shes rab rab// mchog dang thun mong gnyis ka rdzogs// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub thabs kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
132a5(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gsang sngags rim pa 'di lta ste// nor bus dgos 'dod bskar ba yang // bsod nams can gyi gang zag gis// bkur sti rim gro cher bya ste ni// nor bu yon tan rgyas par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i skyes bus
132a6(rnying rgyud): kAng // dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas la// gsang sngags bsnyen cing bsgrub byas na// dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur// gang dmigs de 'grub gdon mi za// oM a kro te ka/ ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT// skra'i snying po bcu bdun pa'o//
132a7(rnying rgyud): oM kA la ru ShA ya AHhUM phaT/ gsung gi snying po 'bru dgu ba'o// oM hrI Sh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA nan hU~MhUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thugs kyi snying po 'bru bco lnga pa'o// oM sa ma pa ma~Mny+dzu bI/ ya mA nat+tak+Sha pAn+d+ha d+ha tA do ni dzA dzaH/ lte bar bsnyen pa dang yon tan gyi snying po 'bru nyi Ta rtsa
132a8(rnying rgyud): ye ga 'bra bdun
132b1(rnying rgyud): par// ya ma med ste rA dzas do r+ra/ ya ni ra ya r+k+ka ni/ phrin las g.yod skor gyi sgyeng po yi ge bcu bdun pa ste bya'i phyi'o// yad mad k+She dngang me rang ma da rang ni rgya yang rang ni/ yo dam rur ngo/ sa/ dza phyi'i gsang ba'o// ya ya d+hadzas dom pa la mdo rba Na yod la yang yo ni ra ya
132b2(rnying rgyud): pa ya tsu nI ra ma ya/ phrin las g.yon skor gyi snying po sum cu rtsa gnyis nad gi phyi'o// ya ma rA ni ts+tshe ya kle ya ya kle yang ni yo da ya/ ya da yo Na ru do me ya/ ya me do sa dza rA ma ya/ phrin las g.yas skor gyi snying po las nang gi gsang ba'o// ya ma rA ngos do me/ ya ma
132b3(rnying rgyud): ngas dam pa/ ma pa lam/ ngos da ma lam dang / me sa sa // phrin las gcin/ ba drug zugs 'gra bdun pa/ gsang ba'i gyi skar bsko ba'o// yam ts+tsharak+She/ mA d+ha ni ts+tsha ky-i la/ khre la bak+Sha
132b4(rnying rgyud): k+She ya ma rA ni r+b+ha/ k+She ya ma rA ne dz+nyA ya/ phrin las g.yas skor gyi snying po drag sngags 'bru bdun las/ gsang ba'i gsang bar bskor ba'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste dargyad pa'o//
132b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gsang sngags mtha' sbyar 'di lta ste// shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba'i las kyi mtha' sbyar ro// puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'i las kyi mtha' sbyar ro// bshad ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi lus kyi mtha' sbyar ro// a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM
132b6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma dang po'i mtha' sbyar ro// mgo 'khor byed pa'o// a mu ki mu ra dzA ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'i mtha' sbyar ro// myos shing brgyal bar byed pa'o// a mu ki ra ka ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'i mtha' sbyar te/ khrag tu s+ya grA par byed pa'o//
132b7(rnying rgyud): mu ki mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i mtha' sbyar te/ gsod par gdon mi za'o// A kaR+Sha ya d+hu phaT/ gnas nas 'gug pa'i mtha' sbyar ro// bi de shA ya hU~M phaT/ rten dang bral ba'i mtha' sbyar ro// udz+wa ra ya hUM phaT/ gnas nas smod pa'i mtha' gyur ro//
133a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ su/ smras/ / / sgyug/ na mas pa/
133a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i bang snar ro// slar pa la / da theg zu pa'is tha gyur / am/ grol ni dgas pa du'o// phags pa'angam nas / 'i
133a3(rnying rgyud): nga cang // min masarim pa brtan pa'i// sa garna pa pa bang par// zag pa dgra pa tshigs bstsags la// lus mas kyang dag par ga// gleb pa stod cing mtshan yang brjod// ba ba snyedan pa 'o yong ngo //
133a4(rnying rgyud): badra par// 'dam gang bya ba'i maN+Dal la// chag cha dzor byas nas sbeng // gzungs tshan ldan dang rdzogs la// theg zungab tsa kyis ma thungs// thegasor ba ji dang ldan pa sa// ga stong gsum sa theg pa de bungang// mcho ga nga
133a5(rnying rgyud): rnam thig nor rdo rje gnyis// thig nor gnyis bdaka lan// bcu gnyis dri bas dang ldan par bya// yam med kyi zhes pa// phyogs bzhi nas kyi mtshal// ra tsas de zhes pa dang // ru zhem pa dang // ram tsan zhes pa re// bcug nyis la
133a6(rnying rgyud): rtsi bas la dgod// thig sor gsum la bcu gartsibs// hrI 'i sngags la zhing yig sbrel// da rjen pa'i phyi rol du// sgo nga s+ho lung ldad par bya// dbus kyig dag pa yaM// phyogs pa'i letshe ri la dang sbyor// thug sum cha/ gang btson bang dang /
133a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis drag thos bcu drug rgyas// rdo rje lugs la su ltung ldang // mtha' sngags sgo bzhi rigs dang byur// rtsal chen pazhi ba'i la mi be// grwarnangs dgong ba'i rim pa ni// rin po pa 'am mchog shing la// 'od du bye ba thung ba de// rnams
133b1(rnying rgyud): kyis dgod// ya mAn ta ka dbus su dgod// le tshe bzhi la gshed po bzhi// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis phyogs skyong bcu// bcu drug rtsibs la ke sing dgod// bar khyams sgo bzhir bse mo bzhi// lcags ri sgo bzhir sgom bzhi// sgo khyams dbang phyug nyi shwa
133b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad// rdzas rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gshin rje'i shar ni lho yin pas// bu don lho yi phyogs su dgram// nying khu yang zhun pad dmar gdub// ut+pal be tsen ka ta ri// gang 'dod gsol byang rdo rje tshe// dngos grub thun mong rdzas su bsham// bsnyen bslab
133b3(rnying rgyud): zhi thog shin rje'i gshed// mgashin ging bdud gtor ma re// sman dang 'dod yon longs spyod tshogs// phyi nang mchod pa rgyas par bshams// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen gyi// sgrub pa rnam gsum lam dang sbyar// gdeng dang stobs su gyung ba dang // dngos
133b4(rnying rgyud): grub gang 'dod rang dbang bya// snying rje las su rung ba dang // phrin las gdul bya'i don dang sbyar// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ye shes dang phrin las su byung bar bstan pa'i le'u lce bcu pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan
133b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang // las kyi phrin las bstan pa ni// 'chi bdag lcags khang dmigs pa'i rten// drag po rogasar 'khor lo ste// yi dwags grong khyer bcom nas kyang // ci re rung gos phrad shun pa blangs// mi khrag spangs la dug gis bkru// gcer te 'ur bzhir ba
133b6(rnying rgyud): la skem// bag rdzas dkur thal bas drug/ tsat+ka t+pa lA'i seMs gciganas// hi na drug tu bzlas pa b+ha// gshin rdo dam tshig gling po ste// b+h+r-ik+ti'i sngags sma m+b+ha sgyo/ tshiga'o/ mA ra ya dzA paT ces sbyar// nin byed tshun chad drug tu bzlas// 'khor 'bri
133b7(rnying rgyud): sdug cha'i// gzhan med so la bathal ba gnyis// gni ka yi khu ba dang // sra myi srog dang drug sna tshogs// tis nag zung dkar mar khu dang // ring gi srin lag khri ga \u0f7f// snying lnga bye sar khrag dang // tshe tsan+dan sa dkar dang // n+ya skyeg rdzong ras lung ba dang /
134a1(rnying rgyud): ma da lum bu zang zom dang // kha shog dug sna tshogs pa yis// brdag pa las kyi dmigs dang sbyar// sdug ga bya rog zug pa'i sgo// g+hir she'i sgra la pir byas la// skyon dmar zhing gi rgyas pas bsdams// rgya ma phyag
134a2(rnying rgyud): srul bstan te// ya yAn ta kas bri bar bya// 'khor lo rim pa gsum ldan la// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe dku// ya ma med k+She zhes pa// phyogs dang dbus kyi le tsho la'o// mchoms kyi gru gsum ba tson khang bzhir// phyi gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i
134a3(rnying rgyud): rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni// khang pa bcu gnyis cha bskams la// rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra ya ts+ya ni bcu gnyis pa/ g.yon nas bskor te bri bar bya// rim gsum bcu drug khang pa ru// hrIHb+h+r-iHming dang spel la bri// de dang cha mnyam ma krub par// ga
134a4(rnying rgyud): bskor ba'i cha 'khor gcig/ yang dang ya mnya ma mA dang ma// me dang me mnyam da dang da// k+She dang k+She mnyam dbus su'o// rA dang rA mnyam dza dang jo// sa dang sa mnyam do dang do// ru dang ru mnyam Na dang Na// yo dang yo mnyam ni dang ni// ra dang ra
134a5(rnying rgyud): ya dang ya// ts+tsha dang b+h+yo mnyam ni dang ni// gang bra yig las kyi dmigs dang sbyar// 'khor lo bris pa zin pa dang // smon lam dmigs la sbyang la gdab// mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya// spun dbye dbang bskur rab gnas bya// lus kyis zhin rje dgug ci
134a6(rnying rgyud): bstim// ma ra lding ldog ga'ur gzhug/ rabs chad po mo'i thod par gzhug/ dras la mthong lcags khri'am// thod pa gsum gyi steng khar gzhag/ steng nas pho thod rtsod bzhi la// sngon dmar brkyangs la yas mar dag pa// tha chung bzhi ye mar de ni//
134a7(rnying rgyud): nyi shu bdud nam stong gi per// nyin bzhi 'khor lo khri bzhir bskyod// mtshan mo khri bzhi dril la bzlas// mgo 'khor khrag spug lus brgyal cing // mar gdon mi za bar byas// ga'u nag po'i lha tshogs la// rim pa'i tshul gyis las la gzung // g.yon
134b1(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas mgrub na// g.yas su bskyor bas myur du 'grub// gdags yig mnan pa'i 'khor lo bcas// gdug bsgre brtsegs sar phyin la// gshin+da rba bo pa'i dmigs pas gtad/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal drim med pa gsang ba'i rgyad las
134b2(rnying rgyud): do dzin las kyi ste pa ga nyig+sa pa s+ho// / den myal ldan de nang// srid papa bar btsun pa'o// dang dag pas la 'ar mni// ri sngagasas nga par gyi// dkyib na bzhes za// dgang pa mam
134b3(rnying rgyud): parabya// gzu'i dbyings kyang de bzhin no// gsang sngags rim pas bkod nas kya // dasatshogs sas dpal na pa'i rtsa// lus dang me shes dpag bstis nas// gang pe bzhi pa'i mam mo mdam// da 'dor sa sa // ga sa na nga// @
134b4(rnying rgyud): yo 'i par swA/ 'phags pa'ang mad pa lnga dris med pa gresang pa'i rgyud las/ phrin las zhi ba'i khye'u ste bajug rnaMs pa // de nas dpa 'dzin rdo rje 'chang// rgyas pa'i las su thu ba yang // stobs ldan snang po'i pags pa la/
134b5(rnying rgyud): bum gser gyi glang po che// chubacug ser gyi 'khor lo bre// gsang sngags rim par g.yon du bskor// gdagra yig yon tan stobs dang spyang // srin pas yi rin po che// rngon te shing las byas pa yi// gzu ran chen 'bar pang gzhug/
134b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas rgyas pa'i rtsa// bcom gser gyi mdog 'dra las// gu dmigs rgyas pa'i 'phor la bskar// g.yon du bskor bas mgub na// g.yas su bskor bas gdon mi za// gang dus phyogs smras par sa// 'phags pa 'ang mdapal drim med
134b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i chud las/ phrin pas rgyas pa'i le'u ste badrugasum pa'o// / de nas dpal dran rdo rje 'chang // dbang gi las sre bya ba yang // bud med dag gi zhing lpags pa// ro langs gtum mo'i gzugs bris te// de le gas bar tsa //
135a1(rnying rgyud): rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni// khang pa bcu gnyis cha bsnyams bri// rim pa gsum pa dag la ni// bcu drug khang pa sa dang mnyam// gsang sngags 'bru
135a2(rnying rgyud): yang rim pas dgod// gdags yig gang dmigs don dang gyur// rin po che las byas pa yi// ga'u pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra bar// 'khor lor bcug la gzungs thag gdags// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed po ni// las dang ye shes gnyis med pas// 'khor
135a3(rnying rgyud): lo bskor la dbang du bsku// g.yon du bskor bas ma grub na// g.yas su bskor bas gdon mi za// ga'u gnam sa zla ga ma mam// btsun mo'i b+ha ga lta bur sba// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las dbang gi le'u lte bcang
135a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas dpal lda na rdo rje 'chang // dgug par bya ba'i las dag ni// dre'u seng ge'i pags pa la// dre'u seng ge'i gzugs bris te// de yi thugs kar 'khor 'o ni// rim pa gsum ldan lho sbyar gnyis// gsang sngags rim pas lto mnyam bya//
135a5(rnying rgyud): gdags yig gang la dmigs pa bri// 'khor lo ga'u'i nang du stsal// dre'u seng spu'i gzung thag gdags// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed po ni// las dang ye shes gnyis med pas// gakhor lo nyi ma bzhir no bskor// mtshan mo bzhir ni dril pa'am/
135a6(rnying rgyud): hrIHSh+T+rIHbzlas shing dgug par bya// g.yon du bskor bas ma grub na// g.yas bskor dang dbang med par 'gugs// 'khor lo ga'ur bcas pa de// rang gi 'og tu sra bar bya/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa'i gsang ba'i rgyad las/ gang la dmigs
135a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // mdza' ba dbye ba'i las dag ni// rta dang ma he'i pags pa la// rta dang ma he 'thab pa yi// bar du 'khor lo bri bar bya// rim pa tshul gyis ma 'chol bar// mkhas
135b1(rnying rgyud): pas rig pas dpyad par bya// gang dmigs dbu ba'i gang ga leg zung // ngas par 'khar ba'i bar dug tsug/ yangan kya ga jug pa ste// pags pa gnyis la la bar mgro// gasbyang bar drug na sogags pa// 'khar la gang sngal nas kyag// gangadun
135b2(rnying rgyud): k+kode// rlung lha phyogs nas dbug par bya// bdag nyid gzhin rje'i gshed po ni// las dang ye shes dgug bstim gang // tsas bskor zhing dbye byar bya// g.yon du bskor bas mgrub na// g.yas su bkor bas dbang med 'gug/ gang rung
135b3(rnying rgyud): gage su swa// yang na bya rog drug pa'am// kang ka 'du ba'i phyogs su swa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mdza' bo dang dbye ba'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // brla
135b4(rnying rgyud): cing dgar ba'i las bya na// rnga mo ga pa'i gzugs byas te// de yi 'phongs su gakhor lo ni// rim pa gsum ldan sgo sbyar gnyis// gsang sngags rim pa mnor bar// g.yon du bskor la bri bar bya// gdags yig gang la dmigs pa dang // nyi shu rtsa lba
135b5(rnying rgyud): sar gzhag/ bdag nyid dam tshig rnal 'byor pas// las dang ye shes gnyis med de// spod pa'i 'khor lo nya mo bzhir// mtshan mo dri la la hrI hrIHbzlas// g.yon du bskar bas ma grub na// ru lug g.yas su bskor bar bya// des ni rang dbang mad
135b6(rnying rgyud): par spyod// tsag mo thod pa'am// sbrang thong bcug la sa mtshams lnga// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yul nas spod pa'i le'u ste ba sung dun pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // ud mAdz+dza yi
135b7(rnying rgyud): dgan// smyo 'bog sha pa'i pags pa la// gno dmar dag gi gzugs byas te// de yi rgyab tu 'khor lo ni// sum brtsegs brtseg ma sgo sbyar gnyis// gsang sngags gdags yig ma nor dgod// lho bog shi ba'i gzhung bsar// gshin rje'i gshen po
136a1(rnying rgyud): ya yus yang // las dang ye shes gnyis med pal// nyid bzhi sngags kyi 'khor la thA// mi rdzogs su'abag sbyar bar bya// grwa yan du bskor bsam thub na// g.yas bskor tshur la bzlog par bya// des ni u 'gyur/
136a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo gzhu bcas pa de// mgon khang rnying par mnan par bya// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ skyo 'bog gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // kha mnan lhags pa'i las byan
136a3(rnying rgyud): lug nug dag gi pags pa lnga// lpags pa lug gi gzugs shig bri// de yi khog par 'khor lo ni// rim pa gsum wanA lto bar bri// ri mya gsum thig bzhi le tshe dgu// rim pa gnyis brtsibs bcu gnyis// rim gsum bcu drug tso
136a4(rnying rgyud): can bri// bcu bdun rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// hrIHSh+T+r-iHbsgrub bya spel la dgod// gdags yig rim pa ma nor dgod// mi gtong 'dzin pa'i stobs can gyis// las dang ye shes gnyis med pa// lugs pa'i 'khor lo nyen bzhin bskor//
136a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan mo dril lam hrIHSh+T+r-iHbzla'// des kyang mtshan ma mthon ni// ru yug g.yon sgor las byas na// rgyal khams spyi chan gcig pa yang // thang gcig yud la lcags byed pa'i// 'khor lo dag ni glen lcags kyi// rtsod par bcug la klul gtad
136a6(rnying rgyud): dus ni lhags pa'i lasi swA 'gyur// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ lcags su gzhug pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas dpa'al ldan rdo rje 'chang // gzir zhing mnan pa'i las dag ni// yi dwags gos la
136a7(rnying rgyud): yi dwags gzugs// rim bdun lcags ri mtha' bskor te// gling dang gling phran 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje rgya gram lam gyis mtshan// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rim pa gsum ldan 'khor lo la// gsang sngags rim pa bzhin du dgod/
136b1(rnying rgyud): gang dmigs mnan pa'i gdags yig kyang // nyi shu rtsa lnga tshang bar bya// bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// las dang ye shes gnyis su med// de yis dbang dang ldan byas la// gang dmigs mnan pa'i 'khor lo bskor// nyi ma bzhi pa'i gas
136b2(rnying rgyud): sngags la// mnan pa'i so 'thab rim gyis sbyar// g.yon nas bskor bsam non na// g.yas skor nu lug ar la gtang // des ni rang dbang med par 'grub// 'khor lo mu su thod par gzhug/ lhun stug ri bo'i 'og tu gtang // thar sa med pa'i brtag pa
136b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las gzir zhing mnan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // drag po'i las 'di bya ba yang // nyes pa chen nye bar dkru // nyes pa rdung na
136b4(rnying rgyud): ring ste// rang gis nyes na rang la ldog/ rigs dang lo grangs yang dag mthun// de la byas kyang skyon 'byung ngo // 'dod pa'i sems kyis gsod par 'dod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dag/ rmi lam du yang mi 'byung ngo // rtsa ba'i sdom pa mi gnas shing /
136b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa tshang du ma bskyal bar// tshig tsam lung la brten pa yis// don mi 'grub par ngas bshad do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mi 'grub pa'i skyon bstan pa'i leng ste nyi su rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dko
136b6(rnying rgyud): mchog bla ma'i don ched du// drag po'i las 'di bya ba yang // lus kyi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyang bklag/ nyin mtshan byed pa'i dge ba bya// mchod sbyin bya zhing nyes pa bshags// ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// yi ge brgya ba'i bshag
136b7(rnying rgyud): chen 'don// yi ge ro la brgya yis bshags// yid kyi nyem pa bsal bya'i phyir// rang gi skyon dag pasam byas la// snga ma bshags la phyi ma bsdam// mi rtog me yis bsreg bya'i phyir// chos nyid blol ma yengs gzhag/ ri dgas khri snyan lta bu'i sems
137a1(rnying rgyud): snying rje'i sems dang ma bral zhing // byams pa la sogs ma bral na// rang sems rnam par dag 'gyur te// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// dngos grub ster bar rang sems shes// ji ltar nor bu rin po che// ga'u'i nang du bcu
137a2(rnying rgyud): byas nas// shin tu gces par ma byas na// dgos pa'i don mchog mi ster te// nor bu dag la 'tshe ba mang // de bzhin rang sems rin po che// ga'u lta bu'i phung po la// nyon mongs lnga por gyur pa'i dgra// rlung mkhris pad kan 'dus pa'i nang // phan za
137a3(rnying rgyud): gog dpab zas kyis// ga'u lta bu'i phung po mchod// ji ltar pha rol skyel ba'i gru// gas chag can gyis phyin mi 'gyur// gru de bcos legs byas gyur na// ji ltar pha rol phyin pa ltar// de bzhin phung po gu lta bu// bcos legs bya phyir mkhas kyang mnyam//
137a4(rnying rgyud): nyal dang ldang dang 'chag pa dang // phan pa'i zas bsten gnod pa spangs// gnyid dang rtsol mkhas sbyar te bsnyen// ji ltar ga ba tshonang stsal ba'i// rin chen lta buM phyag gi gnas// de bzhin nad med phung po dang // rang sems dag pa'i rin po che// dus gsung
137a5(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs phyag 'tshal gnas// ji ltar nor bu rin po che// de ma yod pa'i rang bzhin can// dgos pa'i don rnams mi 'byung ste// ras la sogs pas phyis gyur cing // dri ma dag par byas gyur na// dgos pa'i don rnams ster ba ltar// de bzhin
137a6(rnying rgyud): rang sems rin po che// lus ngag yid kyi dri ma can// rang skyon brtag la bor bar bya// lus kyi nyon mongs dag la 'bad// de ltar rang sems dgra pa la// dus gsum bde gshegs mngon phyogs shing // de bzhin chos skyong mgon po dang // rnal

137b2(rnying rgyud): yis// rnal 'byor chen po de yis meng // bla med 'bras bu 'thob 'dod na// rang gi nyon mongs gzhom pa'i phyir// bzlas pa'i phyag rgya che chung gis// bsnyen bsrub mthar dbyung bstang pa bsrung // nyon mongs gi nas byang chub thob// de 'i phyi drug brda

137b4(rnying rgyud): pa// 'bum gyi char yang mi 'gro'o// zin las drag po'i dus su ni// phyag brda chung ba thal mo'i sgra// thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo ste// drag tu bskor zhing lan bdun gdab// 'jig rten mi ma yin pa'i brda// gang dmigs lus sems

138a3(rnying rgyud): g.yon dbus dag kyang // dkar dmar nag po'i rdzas kyis bstan// drag po g+ha ying rgyal gyis// mi skyo'i bar du gsang sngags bzla// de nas rdzas mchog dam pa de// gru gsum pags pa'i steng du gzhag/ mgo zhig shin rje'i phyogs su ste// rkang

138b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhinang // ya gnyis la rwa bsnol nas bzung // smad pas la ru shes par bya// yA ge gzhan yang de bzhin du// log na sngags kyi 'khor lo ldog/ de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// nyi bu drug la legs zin nas// dril te rdzas mchog sto ru swa// byad thag bzhi/

142b7(rnying rgyud): dadrang pami mi sa padu so// rgya'agrang sa dang ni kyi mnag// nga bu'i yang das pa gnyis// ga pa ya dag go// bdag nga thabs kyi badzin ni// rgyab bskyed dang spang du // bzhugs gas sa rgyag dang byi tud de//

143a2(rnying rgyud): bdag ni// gsang sngags bka' go log pa ni// chu rkyen 'jom pa'i drag tshul spyod// rjes gsungs pas 'khor rnams rab tu rtogs shing ngo mtshor bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dapal 'khor gyi gso po 'joms pa'i dngas gsol pa/ 'acol
143a3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das yon tan thams cad rgyas par mdzod/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ yon tan kun 'byung mnga' dang bcas// do da dang ris gnyis grangs dang tshad// yan lag tus 'bur byas pa'i ga ti/
143a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'phor thams cad kyin pa po dmas pa'i rnarjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 'khor ma zhes pa cing ltar legs// rgyud ces bgyi pa 'i lta legs// su mog 'dag pa dri ltar legs// mgo gras
143a5(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan// phyag zhabs brgya dang brgyad rnams kyis// yon tan las rnams gang slar sod// 'khor lo zhes bra ma tshonA pa gang // sbyor ba'i rim padra dang ldan// gzer za na 'khor lo sA la sna ci gag/ las kyi mdza' dra gang gi
143a6(rnying rgyud): spang // ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan thams cad rgyas par bshad do// rgyud ces bya ba gas ma yin te// skra dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnyed// ngo bo 'grel pa kun gyi gzhi// yon tan phrin las rim pa na/
143a7(rnying rgyud): nang gsang ba kun dang ldan// de mtshon 'brel bas rgyud ces bya// tshe bdag nag po zhes gsungs pa// snang srid bde 'gro snying po las// srog gi dbang po che bkrag kun// 'bru gnyis dag la sdud cing 'char// gang brtsams las kun
143b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs pad 'gag/ de srog padag por gas ste// bgo gu yon tan 'di ste// mgod gatheg pa das ma tshan nas// gab pa dgra na dang ldan// brda ba cad drug ga yan tan las// zhing bad+hA mag dang dang sa sa brgyad// ba /
143b2(rnying rgyud): sa dbang pothog sa // rnams sna kyisapa parnas zod// ba'i rnams brgyad pa zlam brjod ni// gnangs pacad nga tshigs parjing 'gregs// 'dug rten brgya pa na//
143b3(rnying rgyud): bya pa sa smye pa'o// ma med pa migs rna ba/ gas byug pa dang kyi shes skyes / dar ba du ldan pas pa dpa ga gan// spyod na sa shes ba ni// kun bya jugs 'dus
143b4(rnying rgyud): na ga na// sa mas / nga / da/
143b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i d+hA tha~Mng // nga tha~Mng can dang ldan pa nA~M// sbrul pa byung chu ba tshogs sprul // drug pa sngags kyis rlud pa cadun sa// dpe mo pa skyes bzod pa'o// las dang sgyur ba kun sna nas// mug tu chen bdun zhing rjod/

143b7(rnying rgyud): dang // gcod pa gas kying mi mau ga/ mnan pa thaMd pa'i mthar midang // gcod pa'abapa rnamagasas te// tshad can cad med 'amaban// de gzhi las rgyas par bshad// bzang dag cir dang gas pa dag /
144a1(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa stobs dpag med// dril ga tor kha skyod rgyan gyis mtshungs// g.yas skor steng nas gcod pa ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo me dang 'dra// g.yon skor 'og nas gcod pa ni// chu yi 'khor lo rnyad dang 'dra/
144a2(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyi stobs kyis lte bar 'gyur// lte ba'i stobs kyis thams cad gcod// gcod pas 'khor lo zhes gsungs pa'o// gzir gsum mtha' ru zor gsum brdeg/ rang bzhin btsan thabs drag pos gzir// las dang sbyor ba'i rtag zir/
144a3(rnying rgyud): rten gsum gzugs dang 'kho lo ming // 'khor ni rnam par babrog dang bkra// skya rengs srod dang grang la zor// dgra thog rnam lnga'i lbab chen thun// las kyi rim pa skabs dang sbyar// drag po kun gri gzhi ru gsungs// bcom lda
144a4(rnying rgyud): 'das chos thams cad ldan gyis rdzogs pa'i snying po can rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin ni 'og men chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dbyings dag pa'i klong // sems nyid kyi gnas rang byung ma bsgribs pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor rang po de nyid
144a5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa dang / dus gsu mu gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyid kyi ngo bo sprul pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin rnams nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun du ma rnams
144a6(rnying rgyud): dang / khrag phyugs ma mo'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa bdud kyi tshogs dang / phung byed mngag pa'i tshogs dang / 'byed pa mi mnga' thogs ni chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'khor rnams la yongs su 'angan
144a7(rnying rgyud): par gyur nas/ gsol ba btab pa/ lun grub brdal ba'i pho brang nas// bde chen mnyam pa'i nga nyid las// rdo rje 'chang ba rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pas 'gro ba 'don mdzod cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bayo

144b7(rnying rgyud): ba/ kun rang bzhin yid las byung // sems nyid rdo mdzin pa rgyad// me rtog rang bzhin ting 'dzin las// lhun gyis grub pa 'ad kyil 'khor dang // phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par mdzod// ces gsol pa btab po// de nas bcom ldan
145a1(rnying rgyud): kyis bde bar mnyam pa'i nga las bzhengs te/ spangs rgyas thams cad bskal bar dgongs nas/ b+hag su'i rang bzhin spyan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dig grangs so// rang bzhin thos bu mnyam nyid las/
145a2(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i pho brang brtag/ ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas khang // kun 'byung mi 'gyur brtan par gnas// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rin po che// rtababs twa raM rgyan rnams dang // klu brgyad lhab rgyad tshangs pa bzhi// rus bral gleng chen lhag gcig 'jug/
145a3(rnying rgyud): zhing dang zhing chung phod pa sbal// gnam lcags khro rgya chu srin thogs// rgyam gling bu keng rus brgyan// e yi pho brang thod mkhar bzhi// lcags mkhar bcu gnyis bcu dag ldan// khyams dang grwa chad rko bzhir bcas// rang ba zhin ldan gyis grub par
145a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// de la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgra// rgya chi bu la pho zang dra// gru 'gram gtan khrim bdag stong // sgro 'iphye phyogs skyong bzhi dang babyung // ma he brgyad dang nyi Ta'i gdan// nag po drug chen 'akyil ba'i sgra/ dbug sum phya ga jug zhams
145a5(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrang // g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rma gnyenas bdag zhing drang sbal// 'khor lo ral phra rdo rje g.yas// be tson gtun shing sdigs mdzab g.yon// glang chen zhing lpags stag lpags sleb// dkyil rin chen gzhal
145a6(rnying rgyud): yas nas// rigs lnga lnga brgyad thod pas mdzes// bdud srin mu stegs rgyal po btsan// mgo dang tsit+ta sa do shal brgyan// rin po che dang nor bus mdzes// sman cha mgur chu phyag zhabs sbrul// bdud mo mthing nag zod yul brgyan// tsit+ta

145b6(rnying rgyud): gdan la gyi nang bskyang // ye shes 'khor monya ma 'dzod// thams cad dang byol gyi spring bya// phyag tu chen po brtan par brjod// dbus na brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// thugs kyi skal pa mngon sbyar ba// min pa drug rten dregs pa'i lus//

146a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pa zod mkhar bzhir// lhun grub dang sa ma ye shes bzhi// phung po la sogs bdud bzhi 'joms// gnyis 'bras lhun gyi grub par gnas// lcags mkhar phyags bzhi'i gzhal yas na// srog gshed kyi yi

148b5(rnying rgyud): bye shog/ mu byung brdu la zhugs dag / med smra// gcan gtsun rgyal po gas mi bya// zla ma tog tung ga mi thug/ rin chen na thunu pa theg sa pa// gang po gnan brgyang pa med// bduduni spyod nga na ni 'i b+h+yo/ the shipa spyod da
148b6(rnying rgyud): grod ban na d+h+r-ig/ yi pa 'a pa na// bya klung gsheg pa btsa ma r+tha// kunas lhag sa myu nang sa jug/ sngags cig ril pa'i gag+sa/ rdorjes gtums pa'i zug mi zh-i
148b7(rnying rgyud): mang mi 'dral// mun pa sel zeng sbyin mi gsad// rdo rje chu bo'i na mi gtsang // rgyal po phyag rgya'i rtags mi gyi// rdo rje'i rdzing gi mabar mi bsheg/ rin chen rgyal mtshan po srid zlog/ lhag pa'i dmatshig bsrung bar bshin/
149a1(rnying rgyud): n+tu/ dka' thub sngags kyis y-in// gsang ba'i lam min gzhan mi brtad// drag sngags than mtshams gtam sa b+ha// 'jig rten dman la phyag mi btsal// rnga za 'chos dgra nal dgra dang // bdog
149a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mchod byug gnon gdeng // skye ma gdung thA gar ro mi khri// gshe bzhad gdong gtso blang ma 'dril 'dzam// gar dgra stabs dgu btags te bzlas// mtshan ldan gzungs ma rab tu bsten// ro dogs som ti med par gzhom// cho ga
149a3(rnying rgyud): rul gsum myed par spyad// 'khor lo gzir bsreg gnan dang zor// lus kyi dbang po gzhan mi bstan// shes rab mA yi zur mi bcag/ khyad par dka' thub bslang bar bshad// 'das na nad mang tshe thung 'gro// drag lcag sa don la ma
149a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung // dus min mo pad dmyal bar lhung // bsrungs ni yan tan rin me gter// byin nubs sun 'byung bden pa gnyis// dag btsan bkra gnas dge bcu 'phel// skye med pade rkyen mnyam par gnas// sngags kyis mtsho sa/
149a5(rnying rgyud): bde/ bskad na bzod pa gsum bskur la// lte spyod mu noro yengs med 'azlas// sbyor ba'i rgyal po lam lus bzod// yang dag byede ba'i don gas lnga 'gyur// 'bras bu bgrong thob ldan gyis 'thab// gnyis med bad chen man

149b3(rnying rgyud): rang gzhad mnyam par don// lbu ba'i rgyal por dgas la yin// stong po rjes kyi 'khor lo sa mtshan// lngabargyad rnal bas sum N+Da bskyed// de dag rang byung gnas pa yin// gnas pa'i 'dor mi thod par bca'// nod par bzung su rgyad/

149b6(rnying rgyud): longs spyod ldan// bre ba med pa'i dbyings su grol// spyi dang khyad par yan lag gsum// bsrung dang ma bsrungs pa de dang sdug/ bde chen nar gdong spug gi// las kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// rtsab kun 'byung lajing po ni// gsang chen mchog

150a1(rnying rgyud): med kun 'byung drag dang ldan// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i las gzhi yin// rgya zil zor 'phang dubs gA zi // mu nod ga nams thog chen po 'bebs// dam len sngags kyi mthu bsdus nas// las kyi khrul 'khor
150a2(rnying rgyud): mtshon char 'bebs// snying po kun gyi mthudril nas// 'bru brgyad dmod pa'i las dang sbyar// rnaMms sogs las dbang gnod pa'i gdon// sngags kyi brdeg pa drug dang ldan// ltar 'jug phyir 'byung zhe sdang gi zhi// kun shu rtags me nga
150a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // gang drung mtshon rtsa bskur bya// brjod pa skabs dang sbur la spyad// mgo la rjes gcod bsreg pa bai rdeg/ sman 'joms sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin// gru bzhi cha mnyam rus sbal stong// ye shes lnga yi thig grangs la// mdo
150a4(rnying rgyud): rkang gdab// de bzhin lho gnyis thig rkang drangs// thig bzhi rtse gram legs par gdab// lte bar 'khor la bcu gnyis bza'// thege skor rim pa gsum gsum bskor// dbugs bu gsum chu bam ldan// byang log snod kyi 'khod loganyis/
150a5(rnying rgyud): brdung zla chen sprul pa'i sngags// g.yas pa'i rtsibs mtshan bcu bzhi la// yang sprul 'joms pa'i spu gre gnas// g.yon pa'i rtsibs mtshan bcu bzhi la// chags sdang 'joms pa'i spa grig nas// de bzhin bskyed pa'i 'khrul mig bzhir/

150b7(rnying rgyud): khe shig ri Ti tsiN+Da rbad raM/ nges pa'i don dang ldan pa'i gdeng // nyams rtags phyi ste spyod yul min// de yis las thig rdzogs par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa thugs kyi las 'di bshad do// dmar len sngags

154a6(rnying rgyud): khrag dang mon thod du// sngags bsgrim 'brum rdzogs dbab pa brtsam// drag khrag bya phag gsung chen byin// drabs gzugs gzir lcags phur gdab// rang nyid phyag rgya zil gnon bsgom// drug sngags skor ba zil la brdeg/
154a7(rnying rgyud): yadzubs shag mug dun myags/ sbom grom shar shar tri la nA ga snying gzeng zad/ ya~M thun ya/ shag rdzong b+h+yo// khyad par gdug pa'i rten la gzing // lha btsan bsnyen la the zang gzir// 'jig rten lo tog 'joms par bshad// me nung kyi
154b1(rnying rgyud): 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brlag pa mngon du snang ba'i myong ba 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i gsung 'acu dgab pas gsang // rang la rang gi gsang gi nagag
154b2(rnying rgyud): ga ba sbas thugs kyi brdeg pa 'di// sbyor ba'i rim pa lnga dang ldan// tsha ba'i rgyal po rdza ba gsum// bsre bya'i sha dang bse bya'i khrag/ ma bsrungs zhe sdang lus las sdud// bdun khri'i mtha' ru yul la bskrad// nam mkha' par spangs la
154b3(rnying rgyud): gsum// mal lam ya them ma them la// brgya zhing sras pas sbyor ba srud// sbyor ba lo mdus la smin// 'greng dang rkang bzhi'i lus la bsku// sbyor ba'i zla ba dras na smin// b+ha h+ya tsit+ta brnag pa'i mchod// de bzhin gnyen po stobs
154b4(rnying rgyud): med// ga pur skyer chu kha ru tsha// zil pa shugs drangs rdo rje'i chu// nyung rgod khaN+Da drug 'dres la// sngags kyi rgyal po khri gsam pa stim// lus la bslus te 'thungs pas 'joms// sbyong ba de bzhin drag po'i don// 'di yang gas
154b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las/ sngags 'di bton to// bur ya tsa ma ri ha la thu ma tsi t+ta kha sa mA ra ya rbad e raM baM raM li hA la tsa ma ri pUng zhur buM dz+wa la raM/ brnag pa'i rgyal po bka' bor bden/
154b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// lus kyi rim pa gsum yin te// rnal ma bzlog dang stobs dkrug gsum// dang pos gsum gyi snga gas ma// tsha bA gsum dang ha la yis// gzugs
154b7(rnying rgyud): brtan sor tshad bzhi sngags kyis// mon thod nang du thun gsum bstim// khri tsho brgyad du dril la dbab// dmigs pa'i yul dang bsrung ba brnag/ des ma phebs na sbyor ba bzlog/ dmigs pa'i yul nas gzugs blangs la// tsha ba'i
155a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po de bzhin gsum// bsdus la gzugs brtan bdu dru gzhug/ thun gsum 'bru gsum mon thod bstim// dug shing rdzas brgyad du bas bdug/ dmigs pa'i yul dang rten la bstim// des
155a2(rnying rgyud): khengs na rkyong ba gzhan// drug dang mnol khragasal pa gnyis// bgazhan bsres pa'i sor bzhi'i tshad// gnyis ster 'ang drugason ma gzhug/ lcags grwar khri bzhi dril zhing gzing // mtha' du yul dbus chu meg // rdzas na
155a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi rung bas bdug/ gsal ba khyad par zil gnon rtags// chu rgod 'khrugs pa ri ltar gtibs// dam pa'i sbyor ba rngag sngags brdeg/ chom shar nA gzhang/ yaM hri la b+ho n+yo hri la yaM/ nyung nan shar spyod po badz+ra
155a4(rnying rgyud): zir hri la yaM/ phu hur zums dzaH/ shar b+h+yo pho ba drag tu phob/ lo tog gzhos pa'i sbyor ba bshad// de nas yang lha srog kun gyis mthu dril drag por bshad/ de nas snod dang ldan pa dkon pas// rgyal cig dang phrad na spyong ba bgyur
155a5(rnying rgyud): brtu ma// le lo the tshom byed na rang yang phung // 'khor dang longs spyod brlag/ drag po me rlung drag dang mtshon cha yin// skyon dang las kyi brnag pa gsang rgyas gdab// mi rlung spyi 'drang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ man ngag drag po
155a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po nye bar dril ba'i lus 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten dregs pa'i mthu bsdus nas// nug po bde pa'i 'bru la dril// rnod bal mtshon cha'i rgyal por
155a7(rnying rgyud): bcang // sngags kyi lus la spu gri gdags// rang gnad phyag tu 'jig cing 'pho// sngags pa bon po rigs ngan la// rang bdud phyag rgya rang bdud 'be bas// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// chos sku bde ba'i ngang nyid las// bde ba'i
155b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang shur ba// bde ba'i thig le mnyam par rdzogs// gnas pa 'khor lo 'debs 'degs// bde ba chen pos 'khrul pa 'joms// dge bcu ma yengs mtshan brjod pa// bdud dang gshed ma da las sdang // gzugs
155b2(rnying rgyud): rten 'khor lo ma yin te// gang yin snying gi 'khor lo la// dang sa ma bzhi la gsang gshed bzhi// phran pakyad la gyi nang gshed// mang du pa bzhi la mtshon tshwa'i dbul// rdza phran yang logs 'chi ba dag bad // rna mo ga sa
155b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs sto zad nan// 'dus pa bsama'aM ya yul la// dkar nag chagasna brten gni du/ bskul bas rang rgyu dgra shing dra ThA raM// ma yi khong nas rnam shes 'bog/ 'brug sum lpags sder 'dzangs pa'i tshul//
155b4(rnying rgyud): srog bcad lus srog dbye// Ni d+ha'i dkyil nas 'bru gcig smad// de yis dang gshed rang la 'bebs// de bzhin lus kyi 'khor po la// phreng po lnga la srog bdud gshed// gsang ba'i bdud bzhi rang las ldar//
155b5(rnying rgyud): shes cho gas brgyad phyi nang sdud// yul brgyad de bzhin gshed mi brgyad// bzlas pa'i rkyen gyis rgyud las ldang // skye mched bcu gnyis 'chi bdag bdud// khams bco brgyad la sgrol gling bdud// yan lag pani la bla kun
155b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi// so dang sbya da skal tshogs sha zla'i tshogs// bzlas shing bskul bas rang bdud dbub// gshed rgyud phyi li bdud du dbab// b+ho bzhi ga nad kyi so gang bsgrub pa'i// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs gzan la 'bebs/
155b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud drag po'i 'khor lo bshad// de bzhin gzugs brtan 'khor lo yang // zhe sdang sdig pa'i lto ba dang // phrig dog bse yi spel ba la// lte bar sngags pa'i gzugs bris la// snying gar mu'u bzhi ru bskor// rgya gram bzhi
156a1(rnying rgyud): rtsibs bcu drug/ mtshon cha gyi nang rje skad la// med zas snying po dz+nyAn la 'ardeg/ gshin rje'i la sogs gang 'grub pa'o// rnam shes 'bru dbus su ngob// mchod rten nag pa'i 'og tu mnan// las 'dra
156a2(rnying rgyud): h+ya a ti n+ya// de nas macom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi gru gsung thugs rdo rje las// rang gshed dbab pa'i drag sngags 'di bton no// srog la TI ri la rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung / nr-i srog la hur bru~M dzaH/ bod pa dang po armA ka/ rnam shes 'bu dab
156a3(rnying rgyud): su dgod/ bdud dang gshed po rang las ldang // tong phan srog 'dzin las su bshad// me rlung sbyi dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le lu ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das pa sen mo lpags
156a4(rnying rgyud): thag mgo dgu ma'i las 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das pa dang // mtshams med lnga la spyod pa dang // dgon pa'i gnas su phra ma dang // dam chos dge bcu smod pa dang // bden pa'i don por log lha myod// de tshe sngags
156a5(rnying rgyud): dmod pazor// rten gsum sngags kyi 'khor lo bcang // lus sropra gna' bog 'bras bu 'joms// rgya shog dur khrod ro ras la// phag mo'i sdig pa lho b.ru// thig bzhi brtag pa'i snying gar bskor// sa gsum gyi gram rje mo gu// deran
156a6(rnying rgyud): nang du rtse bstan dgu// rgya gram mes grangs rtsa ba brgyad// mtshon cha'i rtse la spu gri'i so// phyi nang mtshon cha bsngal sar dgod// dbus dang mtshams su brnag pa'i ming// le skyor tshon skung dong rtsar brnag/ rang nyid che ba'i nga rgyal bsred/
156a7(rnying rgyud): mdun du lcags thag mgo dbu ma// dbu dbu steng ma bya yi dbu// dur bya khra dang bzhad kyi dbu// nang khrol glo snying ze zhing rngam// bar gyi dbu gsum dud 'gro'i dbu// dom dang dred dang chu srin dbu// rtsa gcad khrag dang nang ljol za// rtsa ba'i dbu
156b1(rnying rgyud): gsum jam sta// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing la// mche bzang yag mi ro za// spyan nas khrag 'dzag drug rna shungs// mu stod zhing lpags thod pa sbrul// wA slad re lde'i dril bu khrag/ g.yas dgra mngon bskal snying skam 'dzid//
156b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa dgu 'khrod zor bskyod// stag dang sbrang ki ba glang mon// dreng mo snrel mkhyi nag phag/ 'thom nag g.yas pa dug khrag zod// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i snying gar brdzis// 'gro ba bskal phyir gar stabs 'gying // skaM dang paM spra me ru bar
156b3(rnying rgyud): de la bka' bsgo bskul zhing mdagra/ dgu bskor thun gyis brnag pa ya// lus grub mthang ru gzir la mnan// brag dmar sbyin mo'i sgrol du gtang // dus bzhir las kyi kha gso bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
156b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las// rje khyod kyi spu gri'i drug sngags 'di bton no/ e bai raM khri shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dag po'i srog la thun rmugs/ ling shag rbad/ stobs chen thams cad nye bar 'joms// no myur las kyi brnag par bshad// gzhan yar
156b5(rnying rgyud): trog gzhom pa'i las// dme thod nang du me long bsar// gser dngul zangs lcags rdo nag bzhag/ ras ba la nA la bu khyi nag snying // steng du gling bzhi rtsibs brgyad dag pa// de steng srin mo mgo dgu'i sku// mthing nug dang
156b6(rnying rgyud): gyis bkab la bzlas// khrag sna gsum dang dus bsres la// ling+ga ming byang g.yag rur gzhung// smyug ma tshigs gsum smin pa la// lhas dan sgo yis basmon la gzhag/ zhag lnga'i bar du drug sngags bzlas// gser mde
156b7(rnying rgyud): zhing 'phen chang na// mda' bcis blugs la dgra la brdeg/ srin mo drag tu bskul la 'phang // drag sngags sbyor ba bskud la bstim// i bai raM khri shig tsid+ha rngubs// hur tog khrom shar dzaHl-i re s+pha sha hri la hung laM/ sho yengs phra ma shang
157a1(rnying rgyud): seng khrol b+ha/ gnam thog chen po dbab pa'i las// nye bar gyur pa'i las su bshad// bu lang nang dud dmod pa bar// gzhan yang srin mo g.yel ba na// srog mkhar bu tsho las dmar la// bong bu'i 'du
157a2(rnying rgyud): rtsis legs spras la// srin mo mgo dgu'i gzugs byas la// snying gar gru gsum snying po gzhug/ drag sngags bzlog la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo bos la khrag gis bran// phur pas bsdig pa la dpal badz+ra// srin mo bkar
157a3(rnying rgyud): zhabs 'og gzhug/ gzer ba'i sngags 'di khri ru brag/ phur pa dril la be con brdungs// oM ka y+ya ma ma bai raM khrom shig tsi d+ha rngubs/ ya ma rag sha ra hUM dzaHdun dun tig nan/ de yis ma mo dbang du 'dus// rang dbar med par las la
157a4(rnying rgyud): mdag/ sngags dang bdud rtsis srin mog so// ling+ga ming rus brnag pa gzhug/ zhag gsum thun thab ro khang mnan// 'byung ba dkrugs la las rnams bsgo// drag sngags brgya bar thun du brag/ lus srog tsit+ta'i sgo phye nas// lha dang rang
157a5(rnying rgyud): bdud du 'bebs// sha lpags mgo sha phral nas bshig/ rtse dang srog zungs bcad nas skems// tshe dang dngas skyigs kyi nas sdud// brnag pa las kyi mtha' du phyan// drag sngags sbyor ba bskur la brdeg/ e khram bai rngubs raM ta tsI ta khA
157a6(rnying rgyud): dkri bo 'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ ra b+hUMdz+dzaH/ kun gyi mthar du 'di sbyar na// brtag pa lus srog 'byed pa yin// ma~M drung spyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i hud las/ sgren mo zhal gyi dmod pa drag po'i lidra skya dgra pa'o// / de nas yang brtsam
157a7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis sru ba thams cad kyim cig thal ba dag sungs so// thabs na nga pom/ bas bran 'dus drug pa brjod// yun gyis grub pa'i dang bye pas// khrol gan phyag pa'i sngags kya pa// nga
157b1(rnying rgyud): dang bar mi spyad// tsid+ha dbyel nas 'brug cig 'phrog/ dug drangs nan pa skabs dang 'byung // las dang sgyur bzlas pa brdud// su dang sgos srog rang gnad 'jog/ rten ma mngon ta gnas su dbub// phag ma theg pa'i ltab du// ma chung /
157b2(rnying rgyud): bskor n+ya kram e// nyi shu gnyis rtsibs gdug par ldan// gru gsum gang gnod gzugs dang ming // rgya gram de bzhin rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshams la gsang mdzod re'u mig/ nyi shu gnyis la spu kri'i so// lto sgor dug khrag lag zod bdang /
157b3(rnying rgyud): zhag gsum sngags bzlas bsregs la mnan// gang gnod ming dang snying po brdeg/ gzir dang dug dbyung srog 'phrog gcad// spyi srog sgos srog 'bru gsum 'phrog/ 'bru gsum mtha' du sbyor ba gcod/ 'di min las sogs yug pa brkyad//
157b4(rnying rgyud): 'di de bde dang smin pa'i las// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las srung ba'i mchog gi drag sngags 'di bton to// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka du na snying gzir sbyar na na ha la ho la tsam ri phyang // e hu buM dzaH/ khaM shag zad//
157b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro ta AM/ ya ma ya/ badz+re k+Shi la ya/ ma ma du ru lu ma/ tir ti ka du/ dun ting me/ de ba a/ rak+ka ra/ ra ma/ ru tra nr-i/ ya ka k+Sha k+Sha/ yag mo k+Sha/ rA tsa tsa/ mun sran pa/ badz+ra sA d+ha ti/ haM shai tri/ sa N+Da ga phu/ sngags kyi sbyar
157b6(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis su brdeg/ rtsa ba spu gri rno dpal mtshan// bsod pa'i phyag rgya stobs med na// rang gcod 'ching ba'i las su 'gyur// stobs ldan bgrod pa'i gdeng ldan na// rno myur sbyar ba kun 'joms yin// rtsu ba bcu gnyis dmar len mtshon//
157b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi mchod chen rang ldan shes// mtha' ru bdug phran bum pas sbyang // phyi nang nad bkrus ye shes chus// phyag rgyan cig pas nus pa bskyed// drag po'i rang bzhin btsan thabs gzir// 'chi mod dus kyi sbyor ba 'joms// 'di ni srung ba
