158b2(rnying rgyud): sum+b+ha ya nan 'drid 'drid zad/ ya ma sa ma ya/ srog dun dran 'dring nan/ A~M ya ma he sang sa rbad b+ha~M sha trA~M sha dr-i sta~M b+ha ya dz+rad/ ya ma hi dwe rdo rje be sha bas sa ma ya dz+nyA zhes gsungs so// me d+hang ste'i dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ na
158b3(rnying rgyud): bskum pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des tshe bdag gsang ba ltar bslab pa 'di gsungs so// e ka ya dran ri sa da gra nI madran dza ma ra tsam tri e radang tsau ra ya ma tI las na du mAn min tshi ma mang po
158b4(rnying rgyud): cadam ma ma ldan mo zhes gsungs so// me rlung spyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ tshe bdag gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i lernga ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po dus/ spyir srog 'phrog cing gni nga
158b5(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// AM e ka ya ma he ka ya ma/ g+hi ma ya ma/ he dun sad kA ra ya dza/ raM sarba sha dz+nyA nan gzir thun hU~M phaT/ sne nas d+ha ga sha d+h+r-i dz+wa la ri sad ka ra ya/ che ge mo mA ra ya d+hi thun gzer thun b+h+yo/ che ga mo la thun b+h+yo/ sarba shA r+thi ya
158b6(rnying rgyud): dza gdun/ gzud mA dwe ya rbad/ nA ga rba hU~M/ i n+danas dkar la ma sarba shar+pa thu ga sar/ dz+ha la ngaM ra~M/ has d+h-i nag tha ga cing zad yaM/ hU~M ga d+hag dab pa tsA/ mag drA pa ni/ ga sres pas r+b+ba rdo rje tra/ gzang zad la/ sa ka
158b7(rnying rgyud): ra te/ sarba sha d+hu dz+wa la raM/ thun gzir mdo ya/ oM ka ya na la ma me ta sarba sha trai dz+wa la re thun gzir zad ya/ e ka he dra nas dkar ya ma ngag rba tri sarba shadz+re thun kazir zad las pa/ he du na ra tsa ra tsa tre sha sarba sha dz+ri dz+wa la thun gdir zad ya sang /
159a1(rnying rgyud): ma ka yas/ ka yas/ ma la ma/ ArnaMs kar pa/ nga dang la/ sarba shas/ thun nor na la/ brtog byung/ 'di rnams gabasas gsang btus gdabapa // mgal ma dus/
159a2(rnying rgyud): ha drA tre+e/ ra tAM/ ya ma tshaMn/ sarba shad+ha swAstA ya/ nan 'dzid byung / srog zeng phreng / nan/ d+h+r-ig nan/ nr-i sha ku sus+sa kaR+Sha ya dz+r-i \u0f7f/ srog mA ra ya d+he dzad/ srog mya ya nan/ tha tsad+ha yA/ ya mdun dran/ srog ga byed nan/ @
159a3(rnying rgyud): hA ny-ing gzer zin nan/ nAk+Sha s+t+rai ga m-i gra~M yan/ byengan rje shin thog lag se nan/ the tsom thos na 'i 'grub bo// sngags pa rnams mas thos na nas mthu'/ sngags rnams ma yis bskal bar bya zhes gsangs so//
159a4(rnying rgyud): brdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ snying khrig na phrog cing gzer ba'i le'u ste brdo lnga pa'o/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las thams cad rjes gtso dang sbyin bsreg 'di gsungs so// maN+Dal grangs drug rgya mam/
159a5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa bzlog par bya// dug dang tsha ba khag gis byug/ phrengs gog mkhar ro bsregs sa// sle ba dang bcas zab khrung bcad// nus pa'i steng du zhi ba'i thob// de ste bang ste kha khyer ro// dang po mda' gang mdzub kyis
159a6(rnying rgyud): de su e li pho brang la// gug pa kha khyer gsum du bya// bod pa me myang dang bcas// zlag ma rgya ga ma thibs brgya drug/ mtshon tsha sngon po de khad par// bam me 'od thod pa 'acwa// thur pa bcu dang ldan par bya// ling+ka'i snying gar lpags shing /
159a7(rnying rgyud): yam shing lcad ma me bskyer// ro bsregs shing dang gdug chu ba drag/ 'o ma sbrang dang bu ram 'bras// gur gum gla rtsi gi wang mtshal// sha chen rta sbal nya sbal sha/ nyung dkar til nas gri bo'i khrag/ bu thAg snang tshil lnga sna tsha// dug gi ril
159b1(rnying rgyud): thab ca med sbyar// bdag lus ho mkhung bum pa la// ldan gyis grub pa'i spar gsal bya// thag khung mdun du me lha sesar// me dar kun phreng g.yas dang g.yon// bka' non mngag na las byed pa'o// bla kun rgyud blang thun gzir gdab// mtshon
159b2(rnying rgyud): bdeg stabs la me lhar 'bul// lan grangs brgyu'am nyi bu gcig/ nyin dang mtshan du gang la brtsam// rdzas rgod bdug la phying pas dgapa// khrus dang lha ru nye bar sbar// rtsang phur bskor la chags pa dpral// kun gyi mtha' nga thal 'jim
159b3(rnying rgyud): gang brtsams la 'di mtha' ru gdugs// rnam bzhi'i las de lhun gyis grub// lta spyod dman pa 'ching bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las/ sngags 'di bton no// swasti shA n+ti/ wa shang tri ya/ puk+ka
159b4(rnying rgyud): ra/ mA ra ya phaT/ las 'debu ba kun dang ldan// bsreg pa'i las te snying po'i mchog/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyung las/ brnag pa rjes gcod kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas rdo rje snying po stan las
159b5(rnying rgyud): langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/ gsang sngags ngo bo de nyid lags// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa mthu rdzal ldan pa kun// srog sdang dbul zhing las la gnyer// bkang ba'i
159b6(rnying rgyud): 1'di ltar lags// lhan grub zil gnon phyag rgya yis// gnyen po gang zhig 'dul ba lags// rngag pos 'dul ba gang lags pa// 'khor la byas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba rnam pa gsum kyi
159b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bshad do// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// lha ye srid mcho bu du na// bzod pa mtho ba sngags pa gcig/ dge bcu ma sprad che bar bsnyems// lha spyod 'brel med su phyir 'breng // 'khor ba'i spyod pa rab tu spyad// 'ji rten dregs pa
160a1(rnying rgyud): zhag // rtag pa ma pa yod par mnos// sdugs chog nam stobs dang shAn// sumam sa yan lagadags la ngam// bdud du spyan pa gdug par rdzogs// 'bar nga bzung dam srog gas zad// ma
160a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor la gsod cing gtub// mchos bye rlung lag char thogs// klur drug ming cing sha dzag pa// bdud po na po gdod nyid so// 'bor du bskus nas chags pa spyod// tshigs snang brdang rang kyad bsreg/ de yis bstan pa bshig tso
160a3(rnying rgyud): 'khrug/ gsang sngags bkra' bsgo log pa des// dus mA yin par tshe zad nas// na ga rdo rje dpral bar ltung // sdug bsngal rab kyod rje gung spod// tshad las brgal te bde bzul// dmyal ba phal las sdug bsngal ba// ra
160a4(rnying rgyud): tu tshe zhing tshe chod ring // mi yi lo gcig lha yi zhig/ wA yi lo gcig dmyal ba'i zhag/ de 'dra'i lo tshigs te laM kha la brtse// lo de dkan til re 'byin// brgya zad mthar ru mnar med 'tsho// tsha thang gnas su bcu drug ginas/
160a5(rnying rgyud): shugacig tu rdzogs// gyi nang yi dwags gnas su sdug/ lte bar gnas na dur khrod gnas// thon nas rdzu 'phrul lus su blangs// bra ma ri lcags mkhar nang na gnas// lus che yan lag ston pas rags// rngam tshig rang 'khor rnams la
160a6(rnying rgyud): mngag/ de 'drang rnam smin mang bsags pa'i// d+ha dza nag po'i lus su skye// de yis 'jigs byed phung byed ni// sngags kyi spyod pas gol bar bshad// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs brgyad de// byin rlabs mthu rtsal stobs 'gran nas// nag po gol
160a7(rnying rgyud): ba 'dul ba'i byed// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bskyed// stong pa'i rang bzhin de steng bkye// spyod pas nag po'i sdem stongs// sangs rgyas rdul snyed slar 'khor nas// nag po ma thul mthu rtsal ldan// des ma thal te stegs chen gsus//
160b1(rnying rgyud): ya mra badz+ra nya ma'i sgra// rang rang lag cha 'khor sprul nas// sngags tshig drag po rngam bzlas nas// nag po 'jal phyir me rlung sbrul// nang dang mtshon rgya 'char baphab// d+hu rdza ma thal rngams pas ral// sdegasum sprul ba slar bsrung bas/
160b2(rnying rgyud): nag po rnams pa'i ngo bsgag/ pra tha sa tra mar tri// sangs rgyas stong phrag thugs brgyad nas// tshwa bo sgrib brtsegs pa mngags// rdo rje srin po'i 'khor rnams sprul// sngags spa drag pos d+ha tra bsdigs// che ba'i grags pa stobs
160b3(rnying rgyud): sa// rdo rje gzhon nu brlag la khang// sangs rgyas sku yi skal ba bskyed// sgra che bdud mo mkha' lding bcas// e ka ya ma he kA yA ma b+hi ma ya ma/ mar ka mo dak+ka k+She ma d+ho// dra rba ka ling 'drid phyung zad/ brjod pa rngag po'i sdem
160b4(rnying rgyud): choms// phrar 'dus ye shes thugs las skal// rngam pa'i dngos nog po brtul// e ka ya ma 'gas ma 'ang ni ra ya ru tra sarba sha tr-i staM b+ha yai nan/ 'drid rbad/ badz+rod gis nig po'i sde ma bul// chos sgo phyi med rdor bdag med//
160b5(rnying rgyud): gnon dugs las mgo dgra sbal// dbungs rtsig zhabs bcu gnyis ldan// rngam pa'i drag lcags dmod pa bstsal// si ka he nu/ yaya tha~Mng / waM dri rtsa hru tri rbatra sa dang seM su nad/ 'dri ltang / r-I shAg zang / ba de pang dag mthapa/
160b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas spyi yi sra ru sbrul// nag po cha mthun brjid la rngams// zil gnon phyag rgya chen po yis// sngags sgrarngams pas lnga bkod nas// dru rnga dag po bsrel te gzir// e myags yaM rngubs bor khaM shig rngu rnga snying gzer bu tru~M ngiH/
160b7(rnying rgyud): po nal dug sol// po la gnon ltar sgrib pasbyangs// ye shes rig pa'i la sa sbyangs// rdzu phrul stobs kyis sgram nas byung // rA tra dag po brgyal sa nas// sangs rgyam cu 'phrul ngo mtshar ze// bdag cag sangs rgyas 'khor bgyid pas
161a1(rnying rgyud): phrag dang mabral 'khor du zhog/ 'khor gyi las skal gang la bsgo// sangs rgyas bka' 'khor bsrung la spongs// bstan pa bshigs na dregs pas gsol// d+hA tra 'dul byar chud 'di bsha//
161a2(rnying rgyud): 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las// hA tra btul ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung rgyal pos klu gnyanas bdag gsum 'joms pa des/ mdo mas drag po gdug pa'i na
161a3(rnying rgyud): snying ga zir nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// phrin las kun gyi rtsa ba ni// drag po'i las kyi mtha' sdud du// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// gab pa thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// bsnyen pa sa 'di
161a4(rnying rgyud): cha gnyis dur khrod sle bas byug/ rus sAl lto bar thig skor bzhi// bskor la dbus su gru gsum la// zlag ma sbrul gyi ro bsag tams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul big bzhi// thod 'khor rdo rje ka ba me// spyo za 'dzul ma
161a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad// rlung ri rgya tha ma de bus na mdzes// yang logs rtsa sbubs nyi shu gcig/ gdug pa sreg byed ye shes mo// 'od kyi gung bur gnas pa 'phro// de la gnas nyid dgod pa ni// gragasum dbus na sa n+ta ga/ gang gnang dang
161a6(rnying rgyud): sbrul dngos// blug mu gsum la gnod sbyin ming // lugs mkhar brgyad dang thong mkhur bzhi// rdza be dI yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtse sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig la// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig dgod// drag sngags 'khrul 'khor med pa
161a7(rnying rgyud): dgod// 'khor lo mtshon chen med pa la sngags// drag po'i sngags rgod gdug pa'i mtshon// thog chen dril phreng drag po'i stobs// nam mkhang rin chen rgya mtsho yis// mtshon cha kha sbyar dug chu ngar// sngon dmar dang bcas phag mo'i
161b1(rnying rgyud): sbyor// drag khrag bsras mthod par gzhug/ mi nang srid bu lcags khris brdeg/ gsal gsam dang ldan sum stong bskyal// nya stong mar gyo ngo ma sbyar// bzung bzhi par rab tu gtad// zhagags ma shin tu gnod par bca // Tha
161b2(rnying rgyud): zod par mnan// ma ldog kyad dang dregs pa bsgom// thod 'khor steng du ga drug pa'i rtsang // nyi shu gcig dbus mchog zung bstan// gang gnod gzugs grangs snying ga bdag/ rjedang drugasngags pa rgyas 'arjed/ #
161b3(rnying rgyud): tshul can// snying po dang dang thugs kyi sa drangs// drag lajam chags rtsub gcod// ha la nAg po 'i rkyen chags za'o// phyagan rdo rje madz+ra dang bral/ ga ga pa gzhan lta smos rje dgos// sdigs su rgyal po ngan 'joms 'ad// ngag
161b4(rnying rgyud): spangs la// ni gnam zhing lci bar bzlas// drug pog tum chen dregs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skragasung thugs pas// gzug pa thams cad gi zhom pa'i phyir snyi gzer nyi shwa rtsa gcig gi su bri baH//
161b5(rnying rgyud): gzing / sa nA ga snying gzar byud/ sar+d+haka snying gaper min cid/ sa n+tag snying gzer ldan nad/ san+de ga snying gzer du na zad// sar+b+bA ka sti gzi ldan zad/ sa drug steng ga der phreng laza/ sa rta ga snying gi der phyogs cang /
161b6(rnying rgyud): gti gzer thun ri ladzang / san+na ge snying gzer de rje zad/ sa nAg snying gabor byung shug cang/ sa nAg snying gzer khas pade/ sa nag b+h+ring gzeng thibs rbad/ sa d+mag stong gzer rtsa la zad/ sar+b+ba ga snying gzer ldanan pad/
161b7(rnying rgyud): gang mnan da / sa d+mag steng ga'ir thog ladran dran ga gzang / sa ga slong gzing bamacad/ rigs pa'i rgyud la non pa dang // ris 'a pa ga dug pakren// y-i mtshogs dbang ga ge 'byin mas// gdug pa sems cad
162a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// yang gsang 'phrul gyi snying po bshad// drag pa'i ngan sngags 'khrul 'khor 'di// dpal gyi phyag rgyas gdab pa dang // rang gi nyams kyu stobs dang na// brtul zhugs drag po btsun thabs dang /
162a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rkyen dang du ma dang // drag sngags kyi 'od zer spongab dang / rang gnas kyi srog 'grog pa dang / gdug pa'i dpal bsad pa dang / thabs kyi rol pas ye shes 'od slob dang // de dag snying gzer mor bar bshad/ me rung sgring dang 'khrugs pa
162a3(rnying rgyud): chud las/ snying gzer nyi shu tha ga cig ge le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ snying gzer dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// snying po 'phrul gyi man ngag bzud// gsang chen gyi 'dril
162a4(rnying rgyud): pas// drag po mngon gyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ snying gzer gdug pa thams cad 'joms// shing phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan bslang gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gnyan sa bdag ze'u blangs// ma ma
162a5(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed sgos kyi sngags// b+hi li'i grong 'dus khong dregs can// 'bar ba nag po ya ma'i klong // yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba bshad// do yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ngur khrod zhing ras rong sa la// mu mud lnga lnga gdus spel ltor// du
162a6(rnying rgyud): snag tshe sbar byas bri// dbus su zhugs ma zla gam ldan// phyi rol 'khrul mig thod mkhar bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar 'khrul mig bachad// yang logs gnas pa'i rtsa skabs dgu// gyi rim rtsibs chen cu drug 'obs// srid pa'i rus sral
162a7(rnying rgyud): dri// drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor bcang// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po meng // zlag ma ma mo rgyal po btsan// the'u rang gshin 'gong gnod pa'i ming // 'khrul meg bzhil gnas pa ni// dregs pa
162b1(rnying rgyud): 'thaban dkod// phyo ma lpags mkhar brgyad pa la// rdegs pa skabs kyi 'gru ba rgyad dgod// yang log drug po rtsa skabs dpung // snying gzer dgul sngon na re// snying pa gsum bsdus rtogs par dkod// rdzi rim mtshon na spang ba' 'obs//
162b2(rnying rgyud): na rtsa'i khang pa bcu drug la// shri 'phra dgu baN+Dal snying po bri// gnyis bcas drug khrag tsha ba bsku// kha sbyar sngon dmar thig nag 'dril// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dpal sngags// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gsod cing 'bi
162b3(rnying rgyud): ma su kri'i mtshon// bsreg rdzing g.yeng bas me chu drung // skud cing 'chang bas skye ba'i mkhar// gzir cing mnan pas zod gzer po// rdza bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag stong // bdag slob gzhan srung go mtshon
162b4(rnying rgyud): mchog/ las dang sbyor ba gcod pa'i mtshon// 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug lngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// bdud gang yak+ka ya ma'i rmong // de yi pho brang thod pa'i gnas// ngur pa'i phyi drang sa
162b5(rnying rgyud): sbal gzugs// mchod rten rin chen mtshon cha'i sbubs// tshangs pa'i bu ga t+ya gram e// 'khrul 'khor bcas te re bas srel// hom khung bcug la stong stong bzlas// gsal bar khyad par stobs kyi lha// rdzas gsum gdan gsum pa lnga
162b6(rnying rgyud): ba bzhi// 'dus pa gsum dang yin pa bzhi// dbang bcas bgrod pa'i go cha mchog/ rigs la rgyan du stong stong bzlas// nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam// thu ni mong srung ba sbyor ba brgya// drag po thog chen snying gzer mchog/ gser gyi dbu thag
162b7(rnying rgyud): gnam lpags ro// ri rgyal drab chen spu kri'i dpal// yang gas mchog gi sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las snying gzer dgu pa 'di bton to// sa nA ga trardzag snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga tse tri snying gzer rbad/ sanA ga
163a1(rnying rgyud): du ma snang gzer chud/ s+ya nA ga d+hA snying gzer zad/ sa r+thag dag phywang skyeng gdud zad/ sa nag khab shag steng gzer nad/ sa n+tag srog tug ga tu gnad/ sa na ga steng gzar rdzam dul zad/ sa nam
163a2(rnying rgyud): gze sla nan zang/ saN+Dag san pa shig gcer tham po// gleng shig steng gaper gyur nan/ drag po sa dpal gcod pa'i matsu/ gan po ta hA// rabaskyed stor ba'i rgyal bang ba shi // thad kyi snying pos chog gi song ba
163a3(rnying rgyud): khas bsdus pa 'di/ sa gang yang slobs med na/ srid pa skabs kyi 'brula'ibar ba dang / sngags spong tsho dang sa panas spang ba 'byung ba'o// sal gra sa non gapal bar byal// dang
163a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las/ snying gaper dgra pa myong pa'i larjes pacu dbu pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'angs kyis sbyi las tha dge bkrig pa chen khrel ba 'dig sungams/ dge po ma na byung bslab pa'i byung //
163a5(rnying rgyud): bdag gdug pa yis// mdo rims drag po'i yams dang na// snying gzer bdun gyi 'khor lo bca'// sbyor ba sna tshogs rdzas kyis thug/ sred pa'i rus sbal lto bar bri// drag po'i rdzas su snying po bsdu// mthing nag dar dang thod par bcug/
163a6(rnying rgyud): bsngal drang gzhug kyang bcas sngags// dmod pa'i than pa cwarkom shing bsreg/ zod than mtha' dras nan gzing bya// rang gi phrag tu thos sru bru ma/ de las byi ni rlabs nas mtha' byung // rang yang phyag tshogs la bar bsgom// gnas pa 'tshar ma
163a7(rnying rgyud): sbubs na// dngas ma bca gnyis snying gzer ni// phye nang rtsa yi skabs na gnas// steng gzer dbus na snying po gsum// lte bgrag su ma rnal mo'i ming // zla ga ma gsum la gdug pa'i ming // de yis klu gtanas bdag 'joms// zhes 'byung bas/ phrug tan
163a8(rnying rgyud): 'di man log gcig nas mtshan dbus su song ba lta ba zhig gi phig rgyun byams pa yin 'dug/
163b1(rnying rgyud): sa bdag gis cher zin na/ dregs pa stobs kyi 'khor loganus pa las/ gzhi drag po zla bstar ba 'phrul pa ni/ sh+log pu mdzu ba gang gru bzhi pa gnyis la/ thig skor gsum dubya ba nI/ 'bras bu gra gsum bya ba ni/ 'bras bu dag pa gnas bya/ phyi
163b2(rnying rgyud): 'bral mig bcu gnyis sa bya/ mtha' mar rtsa ba'i dbyings kyi 'dab ma bdur byas la/ srid pa'i rus sbal gyi lto bar pri/ yi ge bkod pa ni/ dbus su gra gsum nang ma gnod pa'i ming bris/ blag ma gsum la ma mo rgyal po mdo 'dre bre/ 'khrul mig
163b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis la rtsa ba'i drag sngags yig 'bu bcu gnyis pa dgod/ de'i phyi rim rtsa sbubs lta bu'i 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la/ sa nA ga'i mtha' mar snying gzer gyi sngags tshan re bskor la dgod/ dug rgya dang che ba gsum dang / mardol khrag bskus la/ 'khrul
163b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor sbyar la sngon dmar kI kha btsem/ 'khrul 'khor thod par gzug/ zod padar mthing nag gis gril la/ dong grugasu me rtsang dang bcas pa'i nang du skyed tsher gyi stan la gzhag/ de'i steng du sbyor ba'i sbal pa la/ go ro gi rdzas byugs la/ gan
163b5(rnying rgyud): du gzhag/ sbal ba'i snying gar drag po'i hom shing gzug/ nya dang stong la me sbar rdzas bsreg/ thod pa dang gdan bdug byed pas dgab/ drag sngags bzlas/ tshe bdag bsgom/ bsgral babya/ bstab pa byas la// bus nas dang / lA
163b6(rnying rgyud): bdun du sbyor ba brtsam/ nyan dang mtshan du zer re bsreg/ sa n+ta ga snying gzer slar nan byung / sanA ga snying gzer 'dzid phyung zad/ ma nA ga snying gzir sgrog pa myog su rung / sa n+ta ga snying gzir dur zad/ sa nA gA snying gzer ye ma 'brog zid/ sin
163b7(rnying rgyud): ga snying gzir ta la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba sunan gzer srung zad/ thal 'jim gnod par zor du brdeg/ thod pa gnod pa'i sa ru gnan par bya/ cher gnod na nya dang stong dag tu sbyor ba'o// lus bsrung ba la ni sdigs bzlas shing lhags la ba
164a1(rnying rgyud): chog go// gzhan baspang bar 'dod na bdug zing rtag tu khrus nas gdon no// thod pa gnon na rgya yis gzir lag nan par bya'o// gzing bstod dang sbyor bar bya'o// rten 'pho bar 'dod na/ du bas bsdigs pa tha
164a2(rnying rgyud): po// bshad pa'i rgyud las 'jam dpal blo yis byas/ nyes can gso ba'i phyir na snying gzer bdun pa bca'/ me d+hang skyi 'dar 'khrugs pa'i hud las/ snying gzer 'dun pa'i long ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas drags pa mngo
164a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po las/ gru gsum gyi sbyor ba dang / byad dgrol bsreg cing snying gzer gdug pa'i las// rgyud kyi snying po rtogs pa med pa 'di// rang sems dben pa'i gdug pa'i sna phyogs su// bkra mi shes pa'i sa la @// ldag dang
164a4(rnying rgyud): chag zag gdab// dbus su grogasum khwa gang nag por bya// zla ga ma gsum gyi mtha' ma rnam por bskong // de yi phyi ma 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// ljags mkhar bar na rdo rkyong pas gtums// de yi gyi rim rtsibs mtshan nyi ra bya/
164a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshon gyi rtse mo phye ru bstan// de yi phyi mthod pa'i phreng bas bskor/ mtha' ma me de dang ldan// de bzhin zhing ras rgya la'ang // bar snang gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// bu gsum kha ster mo dza~M gang ma thod ches bskor// dbus su gdus pa'i gardza
164a6(rnying rgyud): brnyan sna tshogs gzhag/ gang gnod ming dang snying po dug chus sbyor// zla ga ma gsum la ma mo rgyal po btsan// 'khrul mig drag po dmod pa'i sngags kyis gdab// rtsibs la bsreg cing gzir ba'i spa gri dgong // gzugs brtan snyeng gar hom shing drung
164a7(rnying rgyud): gsum gzug/ zhag lnga thun brab drag sngags rngam par bzlas// de nas zhag gsum bsreg cing gzugs ming bstar/ me dbang bsad nas sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams bsreg/ gad dmigs bdug cing gying pa gtsang ma dga'// nyin dang mtshan mo lan
164b1(rnying rgyud): grangs bdun bdun bajug/ dam pa dkrig la lha yi s+ya rba basbed// khrag sa za rdzasarngas nod rnams// thod pa der thugs la baN+Dal gra ba ning dbu ma// drug sngags srod la myis mthos par baH// drag sngags myur ba'i rgyal po ni// brtag brtson nas nam ma
164b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo da// thal pa ming gzugs mchod rten gnod sar brnyan// stug pa rnaMs shul ga gnon mor zan badze// gdug pa gas pa srung mo yi 'khor yin pas// drag po'i las 'di gzhan la bstan pa med// sa nA ga tra ra~M/ yun na gzir phrang dang /
164b3(rnying rgyud): s+phar drad raM/ snying gzer srog sngags ra/ gdug pa'i nang dang sbyor ba'i gdug rtsub kun// las kyi rgyal pos bsreg cing 'joms par byed// b+ha ma ha bzhi ya ra~M ye swA ha/ ha la nag po bsreg pa'i mchog tu bshad// mdo yams nag po
164b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin mtsho na brnam/ 8/ sdang snang mi spyad thugs kyid kyilan bzhag/ yab yum gsu ma dang bcas pa drug tu 'phrul// 'gro ba rgya zhing bur s+thi zas rnams zab// me drung sti 'dang la phyogs pa'i chud las/ khrag mo las kyi bsreg pa'i
164b5(rnying rgyud): skye nye shu gcig pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba thams cad 'joms pa 'di gsungs so// drag pa mngon gyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ gsang chen mapar dril ba'i las// brdeg pa stobs kyi las bshig pa// rdegs
164b6(rnying rgyud): sa kyi bzhis// dpral 'khor drag po d+hA hU~M/ gle po pal skabs kyis 'dams// dmed pa'i martson na 'di lta ste// dza~M yad 'du sa shegs la// maskyed rnam pa bzhi du ldan// rgyang ngos ma kyi chu ma la// danas su grags
164b7(rnying rgyud): rgyag sagasas// phyir sa grags mkhar 'jal lan// mtshangs pazhini rjeg par ldan// phyi ba rtsegs pa par balngam mog brgyad// ni dgaka pa mthabs brgyad 'dogs// yang migs mtshon martsibs bcug nyes// las kyi mo 'bang
165a1(rnying rgyud): sh+yaH/ dzal// mtshon cha'i khang pa dkul// gnas shing dgad pa'i migron// dbus na bcug pa'i snying po med// b+hag ma dre bzhin rdzogs par bye// ljags mkhar bzhi yi khang par // thog dang las ldad kyang
165a2(rnying rgyud): 'bru bzhi'i sbyor bkun gyi mchog/ khang 'khyud lcags mkhar bskung po la// gshin the ma mo'i snying po gnyis// mkha' lding dregs pa'i snying po gnyis// sreg byed ma dang spad byed gnyis// rngam ska la ya ma'i rnyeng po gnyis// thugs mkhar
165a3(rnying rgyud): rel dragod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis la// dug lnga'i sbyor ba bshig pa yi// drag po'i mtshon ma su gri dgod// me lha'i snying po spor ba dgod// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha med pal sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal to khung 'jom 'di// re'u la
165a4(rnying rgyud): sde mtshon zas gcod// rdzas rnams kun la kha sprang brel// du ma bajug pa de bas gad+hA ma// rdzubanas thugs ma ster pa'i stan// zhing lkugs snyed na hom shing gzug/ lha bsgom sngags dang thun gyis zab// ngu ba'i rdzas la bcug zang //
165a5(rnying rgyud): zhing yul la rbad// bdun nam la ru ha stong brtsam// sbyor brtson nas 'khrul 'khor dril// tshes grangs gcig dang brgya drag la// sogs pa bde ba'i gnan pa bya// 'i khro bur pa ga shin rje rnams// 'khor lo rus sru la dzod chagag khrag dkyil

171b4(rnying rgyud): po la dkyil 'khor gru gsum chag gang pa zhig bya/ nang du rabs chad rgod pa ru/ rdzas kyis byugs la/ phur pa nag po khu gang ba la/ stang du mi khrag/ slad du khyi khrag byungag/ lha rnams rdzogs par byin gyis rno bas/ linang nang du gzhug
171b5(rnying rgyud): drag sngags bdun 'bum tshad du gdab// rab kyis phur pa mnga' ru 'gen// 'bring gis bla rtags nyams su myong // thams dgra bgegs thal bar zlog/ AM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ta s+yA da dza ki hUM phaT/ sarba tra ya ma ta dzaHe hri hung ki li/ de sharba
171b6(rnying rgyud): bdun 'bum bye ba bzlas te 'phang zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngan dang cho 'phrul dbab pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sa ma dang gyi ba'i thod pa ru// byi la zer mo srine bya'i khrag/ spu dang sha sbyar zhabs ma sagril/
171b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gar 'bebs ming dang sngags// khrag gis bris la thod par gzhug/ khri bdun bzlas la zhing ras zil// sa sris dmigs pa'i 'gram la gzhug/ zla ba bdun nas lhas ngan 'bab// sems kyi dkyil du gzhag/ sbrul dang
172a1(rnying rgyud): skal pajigs pa bzlas la// dag yis sug ga pa'i sgra// da d+hAs smras sna / d+h+r-ig d+hAgs// gangad dmigs byas la sngags kyis ni ga// gas nga brgya ng+yas la tshabs bsku// d+hag sngags tshad
172a2(rnying rgyud): lam la gzhug/ gdug pa gzugs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung // thod par dur ma gnyis btsal la// dam mnol gri khrag kha mig btod// dug dang slob lung ngan bsla// gang dmigs ming dang gob la gzhug/ me khar gyi bres dang 'gral dzi
172a3(rnying rgyud): snga// thod pa 'thab dang drug pa 'byung // khwa dang 'ug pa srin bya'i snying // sha khrag dang bcas bag zan drug/ dgra bo'i khang par tsha bar sbyar// mnol khrag bskus la gyi gzugs bya// gang dmigs ming nas sngags kyi 'grel// khri brgyad 'a
172a4(rnying rgyud): la zhabs mas gtums// mkhar gyi rtse dang skad la bca'// bya de skad 'byin sder mchus 'dzings// ltas ngan sdig pa'i than skad 'byin// ltas ngan srod kyi skrag la 'bab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mas drag
172a5(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di bton to// e ka he dun myags/ rngubs shag/ mug tri ling rbad/ sU raM laM sUr / nA ga rA dza ta la/ ka pa ta h+ya ha la hA la/ ka ling ha sa pho ba/ me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rlung las/ lhas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste so bzhi
172a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ drag sngags kyi de kho na nyid rang gshed rang la dbab pa 'di la/ spyi don rnam pa bzhi ste/ de nyid rnam pa gsum gyi don dang / sku gsum gyi don dang ldan par bya ba dang / yi ge gnas
172a7(rnying rgyud): lugs shes par bya ba dang / bad+ma lugs shes par bya ba dang bzhi'o// dang po sku gsum gyi don ni/ chos nyid rang bzhin med pa'i bsgom pa dang gcig/ de'i byin rlabs las ya mAn+ta kar bsgom pa dang gnyis/ de'i thugs kyi sprul pa phyag na
172b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bsgom pa dang gsum mo// de rnam pa gsum na/ dwags pa myi gan ra ba dang / gang gnod pa dang rtags ston pag sde// gang gnod pa myir gzi rabs/ gang gnad byed cig go yis de nas rtags su 'ong ba'o// yi ge gnas lugs gsum/ bad
172b2(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa dang / don gang la gnas pa'o// bdag gi tsai d+ha'i dkyilan e dang badz+rag nas dang / rtsa bzhi la/ chos nyid kyi rtsa/ yon tan la rtsa/ ye shes la du/ rang rgyud la stan/ de ltar granas dngas bdag gi stobs dang go cha 'byed pa dang /
172b3(rnying rgyud): sngags gzha'aphan par byed pa'o// dgra dang dgegs rgyud la gnas pa nI/ yan lag bzhi la TIka gnas/ mgo ldan na gnas/ skel cur gnas/ snying gan rang gi 'bru re gnas/ de 'dzin cing 'brog par byed pa ra tha~Mng yis bskor nam gnas/
172b4(rnying rgyud): rtsa bzhi'i sbubs na/ sA ra ya rbag bya bgo rim du gnas/ rang gi rtse mdung la 'di yi yi ge gnas so// dgra'i rtsa mdud bzhi la/ zad bzhiganas pa la/ srog ces pos la bcad pa'o// pad+ma lugs ni dag bgegs gnyis la bzhi bzhi
172b5(rnying rgyud): bAr bA ste/ dngal dregs pa can skyer dril la gzer ba dang gcig/ spos gzer ba yang bzhi'o// de yang dang pa gung gnod pa'i yi ge gcud kyis gzir te/ gcig gis 'ge s+ye/ ti tig cig na/ zhes dang la gzer ba dang / du bur thaM dza
172b6(rnying rgyud): snying gi dkyi lan du gnas pa 'phrog/ e bsdus nas ling+ga la bstim pa dang / mA ra ya cer gyis las sbyor ba gcod pa'o// des gdon mchoms na/ spu gri gsum dang bsdeb pa ni/ ma ma ru lu tri gnan/ maphur bring / mA ra ya rbad/
172b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// des kyang mchoms na/ spobs dang chos te gtor la bzlas pa ni/ badz+ra sarba du ran po rdo rjeg nan des gzir/ badz+ra sa rba duSh+TA natsa s+phar bruM dza yes rnam par shes pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig 'phrog la/ e'i 'od la 'dus te/ ping+ga la bsna
173a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra marba duSh+Tan tsa kr-im+bA ra ya dzadu/ ces pa'o// da dang nges par mchoms na/ badz+ra duSh+TAn ti ti ka tri ga nan/ tsit+ta nyung dzu dza mAr ya rbad/ ces zil la brdeg pa'o// de yis gnod byed kun la \u0f88\u0f90
173a2(rnying rgyud): bzlas na/ gang yang gsungs pa'o// mthar khyi spyang gi thod pa'am/ glang g.yug gi ra ru bcug la ka rten dang la me rgya gram la gnan pa bya/ dam du gnod la zor du bcug la gtad/ gdug pa gsum gnad pa so ga la mong ru
173a3(rnying rgyud): nga// dgra la byed na bdus lugs bzhi ni/ badz+ra sa rbA duSh+Tan che ge mo trig nan/ zhes lha dang bcas pa gzir la/ myogs shing zlum par bya/ badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na nr-i hur b+h+r-i dza/ zhes snying dkarare nag gi mtshams nas ni 'phrog pa/ e
173a4(rnying rgyud): bslus te bdag la thim pa'o// gong dang 'dren shul la ling+ga bsdus la thod par bcug la gzir ba ni/ badz+ra sarba dudz+nyAn/ dgra bo srog tig ces brjod pa'o// mnan pa'i man ngag gsungs te/ ling+ga mnan pa dang / 'khor lo bris
173a5(rnying rgyud): ya mAn+ta ka dang phyag na rdo rje'i lto bar bcas la/ yid rus dang khams dang / snying po bris la/ dug khu dang / khrig smra dang / tsha ba gsum bskus la/ sngon dmar dang / chu dar dang / rgya skyegs dang / re bas mtshams byas la gnas
173a6(rnying rgyud): pa bya'o// de yang thong pa byed pa na/ sngags pa phyi ba'i thod par man na/ rigs ngan khyi yi thod par mnan/ bud med sra mong thod par mnan/ de dag ma rnyed na mon pa'i thod par mnan pa yis/ de yang rgyud las/ bsreg na khru gang
173a7(rnying rgyud): hom la bsreg/ 'phen na thong khrag zor bu 'phang // gnod nayon thod dbye bas mnan// zhes pa'o// me rlung sgo'i dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ spyi don thun mong gi li'u ste so lnga pache// / de nas yang bcom ldan
173b1(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis dran gyi man dag drag po'i sngags nod 'di gsungs so// gdug pa gsum gyi mngod dar ba la// dmar len skyeng pa gab pa gsang ba'i las// yun mar snying po brdung lhag so pa'i mchog/ dbye ba'i gnas su rang mtshan mtshams
173b2(rnying rgyud): la// bdeng gsum ldan lags la lnga gsum ba rnams la// dasod pa drug pa sngags kyi su kri bzlas// rang bzhin pacan thabs drag pa gsum dub can// rang bzhin rgyags la snying srong thab rab cas// btsun papas rdza nod dubs bdug pa dang /
173b3(rnying rgyud): drag po gnon pa'i sa chu drug khrag pasre// bag zan dang sbar gdag pa'i gzugs brgyanaH// ts+yai shog gzugs la nags bris la// sngags dang ming spel gzugs kyi mtha' ma bskod// ngag sngags dmod pa rnga mtshig par bzlas/
173b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs parngubs mug shig ka dun sa t+t+wa ga pur hur zu dzaH/ sanA gci zad/ sa n+ta ga stong gzer chud nan zang / myanal khrag thun pa rdeg mtha' drug rten gnan// phag thod lugs sa mo yi dor d+har+ya grol// 'di med bsrung ba thams cad rang
173b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rgyung rgyal bshad pa'i snying po bla ma ngas pas ston// mdza spyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi man ngag drug po sngags nod kyi le'u skye so drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin mo lcags
173b6(rnying rgyud): gi sbyong ba 'di gsungs so// lnga brgyangs kyi zlum lnga// rgyal po'i bka' las 'das pa dang // mtshams med lnga la spyod pa dang // dgon pa'i gnas su phra mra dang // dam thos phrag 'dun stod pa dang // bder pa'i din por log
173b7(rnying rgyud): sa su ma
174a1(rnying rgyud): bsdang ba das s+ho// rnam rjod dus pa// ga pa ba byu bya// ra su la sam dag ga na kA// thog sa ngas la na da// dbus sags smra/ sgrugs//
174a2(rnying rgyud): ming dang snying po bri// thAgs dbang sdud srung ba'i lha// byi rim rgya gram 'phen pa'i sngags// tsa ba dri la ba'i 'bru brgyad bkod// yang stsogs bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bla ded srog 'grogs drag po dgod// tha ma rtse byas
174a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan brgyad gnyis la// lus srog 'byed dang nad pasreg dgod// mtshon cha'i rtse mor sngags mgo nang // bar du 'khor yug lho sbyor ming / bkod la phag mo'i lto bar bca'// gri khrag na khrag dug chus bsku// 'askor

174a5(rnying rgyud): ga// dam khragrin pa khrag ri rig theg// phrugs pho mgri ba'i khrag/ zod rkyen li de bzhin gnog/ lcags bye zangs kyid b+ha dang // lung dkar thal chen dag ngar bcas// bongad tshal nang du mtshonas ba sham// sngags pas gas
174a6(rnying rgyud): gsum ni la gnon bsgom// mdud na ning bsnol nyi pA la// sprul pa'i ma ma sgrog gtsang ma// mgo dgra phyag kyang bco brgyar lA// sa dang rag mo thugs kar bstan// dadu dgu steng ma b+ha yi dbu// dung bya ya dang bzhad d+hi dgra/
174a7(rnying rgyud): khrilo klo snying bzhing ngam// bar gyi bu gsung drung 'gro'i dran// nga mdang dreng dang susrin dadu// rtsang pa khrag dang nang krol za// rtsa ba'i dbu gsum khri moste// g.yas dkar g.yon dam dbus mthing la// mthe bzang yag mi'i baM// sngun
174b1(rnying rgyud): nas khrag 'dzag drug rlangs shangs// skyong zhing lpags thod pasgral// sgra skad re lde dril bu khrug/ phyag+sa g.yas dgun gnas pa ni// mngon du bskal ba'i snying sgram 'dzin// g.yon pa dgu na drod zor bskyod// stag dang seng ge ban gang yon//
174b2(rnying rgyud): mo mnol dang khyi nag phrag/ 'tho ma nag g.yas la dug wag zor// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i snying gar brdzis// 'gro ba 'dul phyir gar stabs bgyings// skra dang baspu me ru 'bar// de lnga bka' bsgo bskul zhing mngag/ 'khor lo thod par
174b3(rnying rgyud): thun pa pa la// dang pos thun de rab gnas brlab// brgya tsho gnyis kyis dbang du sdud// gsum pas thun gyi rdzas la bstim// bzhi pas mtshan gyi tshur brlab pa// lnga pas rlangs 'gro ldeg cing 'chol// dug pas bya dang tshe srog sdud// bdun
174b4(rnying rgyud): pas dkar nag mtshams su bstim// brgyad pas srog gi me mar bsad// dgu pas dngas snyigs rgyud las dbye// dgu bskor thun gyis brnag pa yi// las srub mtha' ru gnan gzir bya// prag dmar srin mo'i sbom du man na/
174b5(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i steng du dmigs bya la// bsad pa'i thun por yang yang brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ thAg sngags gab pa 'di bton to// e bai ri khaM/ shig tsita rngubs/ snrel phreng dzaH/
174b6(rnying rgyud): paM raM khaM shig/ tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs ling shagra nung / e bai raM khaM shig tset+ta rngubs// dgra bo'i srog la phreng breng / yaM yi thun ri li laM ts+tsha/ tsit+ta gzer bruM g+h+nAM b+ha ya nan/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo las pa
174b7(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba de gsungs so// che bdag thugs kyi phang sprul ma// srin mo gsod par byed ma b+h+yo// chos sku gnyis su med pa las// 'jam dpal che bdag nag po'i sku// thugs kyi sprul pa mgod kra ma// yang sbrul bdud dang sha ze'i tshogs/
175a1(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'joms pa'i mthun cha// khrag dang dug gi mchod kyil nas// dug rlangs mun nag gti bus pa na// srin mo kha'ang mgo dgu ma// bdud dang mu skegs bran dA 'khol// srid pa'i ma mo las la bad+ya /
175a2(rnying rgyud): dom dang khyi mo bla la 'gyed// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// stong gsum sha la rol cing gsol// nga yi sha skal gdan yod// skyong gsum zos kyang ngam 'grangs// stong gsum khrag la mos shing 'dzud// nga yi khrag skal kang
175a3(rnying rgyud): na yod// stong gsum khrag gis ngam 'grangs// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// ri rabartse nas snyil gyi na 'ong // rgya mtsho'i gting nas rlab kyi na 'ong // dgra bo'i sha la rol la shog/ dgra'ong theg gis
175a4(rnying rgyud): rlos la shog/ drag tu bskul pa ma mchis na/ rang sha rang gi za zhing 'ong // dang khrag rang gis 'thung gi na 'ong // rang sha zos kyang ngam 'grangs// rang khrag 'thungs kyang ngam ngoms// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba

175a6(rnying rgyud): khong nas tsit+ta phyung // drag tu bskul ba mchis comAn// snang srid b+h+yo bzlog me yis bsreg/ dgra bo'i lus srog bag chags bsreg/ drag tu bskul ba mchis tsam na// lus can bla lnga rgyug cing 'ong // sprul pa'i khyi mo nag mo dgu//

175b2(rnying rgyud): thogs nas dgra bo'i tsit+te 'byin// g.yon padasu dbod pa dgu// da za la khrag mda' dug zor 'phen/ dgra pa'i khong du drug mda' rgyob// klang pa gshegs la klad khrag chom// lus sr-ig grol lo ho/ gtum// khrag mda' ngag

176b7(rnying rgyud): pho nyas 'akug la rten la bstim// 'khor lo lan thod par bca'// rdzas kyi ying+ga phag par grol// dar dang re bas thod pa bsdam// gzhan sar 'dug pa'i klu la gtad// dbang gzug 'o dod chongs gdab// 'byung po pho brang don yod bsam//
177a1(rnying rgyud): sngags pa brgyan gyis pa / las kyi 'gas pan nga // drag sngags pa skad la skye bur dgas// thang gas zung dngagazugs bdug/ tha'in bzhi 'dul ma brjo// bu nga par bas na spyo//
177a2(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis mtha' nas zlog/ chags sdang lnga la 'byung ba dkrug// gzir dang mnan la kha gso zor// drug sngags su gri bdun du sbyar// de lis ma lus 'joms shing 'pho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las
177a3(rnying rgyud): 'di kon to// e ka ya mdung la thibs// dgra ba srog lathar thung dz+haH/ yaM grags ma la na da rje/ dran ril po la srog la zhugs myur ya rbad/ mA ya gas/ ri la bajog ladza/ gas/
177a4(rnying rgyud): srog la skAr na na/ snying gzer zad/ srog stam+b+ha yan na/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ breng shag rbad/ sbyor ba 'di yis ma lus kun// 'joms shing dngas sdigs dbyed par shes// de na sa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las sna tshogs la bskul pa 'di gsu
177a5(rnying rgyud): so// l-I/ bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i pha rol na// 'byung ba rten gzhi rngam pa'i 'og shed na// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du man// mun khar lcags mkhar zho mngan// rba tra dregs pa'i gdan sted na// gAshin rje byed dgu khri hra
177a6(rnying rgyud): skye mdog pa'ang nag rnam pa la// dbugs sa thag drug 'das bani bzang // phubs dkar g.yon dasar dbus mdzang kAl// phyag drug phyag mdzad 'byar bas/ g.yas kyi dang por ga ze 'bar// dgra bar mag ca gcong bang dang // gab
177a7(rnying rgyud): zhing dbyug bsdams// khams gsum ma lus rdul du rlog/ tha ma lugs kyi ri rab bsnams// dgra bgegs las ngan gtsad cing gzer// g.yon gyi dang po be con gyis// dgra bo las ngan mgo lus 'joms// bar pa lcags kyus dgra snying
177b1(rnying rgyud): gshags pas dag pa 'gyugs// ngas pa las ngatsug can rnams// byams 'a gnas su med la gag/ sku lu grags kyi myo tsaman pa la// 'a nga smod pa sprul gyis du// srung phyug ga 'ang bcan// spyod nas byam pa
177b2(rnying rgyud): 'byar// slad nas 'dod chags khrag chan 'grub// sred nas zhe sdang sAl gyis brgyan// zhal nas dug gi rnangs pa 'don// shangs nas phrag dog badrubs mar gyib// sbyin nas slong gsum 'jug ma rigs// thams pas sngal pa
177b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu ra bgying// phog the bas dag dkrugs// yang sbal dag khris srog cugatsa // lus kyi mthar srung byed phrin sdes// dgra bo ma nyas sa sreg can rnams// lag tu gat+sad da shir ra ro// 'dzi bzhi gcig dam 'dus med//
177b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas myi gnas so// 'di la dam chog mi gnas kyis// 'di la snying rje gnas med kyis// rgyam che chen po'i gteng du sgos// lcags rtse ri ba'og tunan// bye ba dag khri dbul b+h+yo// sngags pa khar brtson rar dgrang thug/
177b5(rnying rgyud): rlud mchung chod// bcol pa'i lus rnams 'grub par mdzod// bye ba dgu khri sbyor ba bA shang // me nAng skye 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ las kyi mtha' skad kyi ladzA seMs band pa // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
177b6(rnying rgyud): snying gzor nag po bsdad pa'i las kyi rim pa bzhin gsungs pa/ kun gyi bcud byung ba ni/ gnas rang po'i na gyis dben la nyams dga' ba'i sa rba/ sems dang gis dben pa'i mtshams bcad la/ maN+Dal lha gang ba'i dbus su/ dong
177b7(rnying rgyud): rtsom sgor bstan pa gcig bcig de'i nang du thod pa gling mangs sam/ ling+ga rten dug dang sa dmar pa byas pa gnyis kyi snying gar ming dus gro ga la bris pa gdags/ steng du dang nag pos dag pa// ka pA la gling mang ba'i dang du/ lug nag po
178a1(rnying rgyud): b+ha dag pa'i snying dam rdzas su bzhag/ zhag bdud sde bar dragasal bar byas pa/ bdud kyi lnga pa yab wam dang / bdud mi zanas brdzun ma dang nye ma'i gung la bskal/ bo nya bdun phrag badran stong tho rangs bsgral/
178a2(rnying rgyud): chun bdun dang rgyas pa sde bzhi phun bzhir zang / kung dkar dang nyung nag rdo bye dang khrag skam gyi thun brdeg/ lcags phur bcu bzhi la ljags bcu bzlas la ling+ga la thun brdeg/ rtsang bdun tshan bdun la yang sngags bcu bcu bzlas la brde// le rna la ni
178a3(rnying rgyud): bar gyi sngags brgyab pas/ bdud kyi pho nya dang / sprul par bcas pas dgra bo lnga srung dang bral nas/ shes rgyud kyi sgo phye ste/ snying dkar nag gi mchems su mtshon cha'i char phab/ nad kyi sprin gti bas/ las kyi me sbar nas/ rang rgyud kyi rtsa
178a4(rnying rgyud): nga phung po las/ rtsa dang srog zungs bcad// khrag dang bag chags bskam/ sha khrag dang rkang rus la rol cing gtor nas/ bla dang yi ge nr-i rang dbang med par phrogs nas/ ling+ga la sdud pa'o// drag sngags 'di nyin mtshan pho mo mnor por drag
178a5(rnying rgyud): 'dril zhing rngam par bzlas so// go ro shan dgra bo snying gzir yi thun rbad/ rtsa ro pa na dgra bo skyid ri thun rbad/ mu kha du na/ dgra po snying gzer myogs rbad/ dza la po tran/ dgra bo snying gzer thi ri la nad/ du na b+hU tI nan/ dgra bo snying la gzer
178a6(rnying rgyud): khas rbad/ rAk+Sha su kha na/ thun rbad / dgra po snying gzer tsit+ta rbad/ wa ga sha ling na dgra bo skying gzer nr-i hur puM dza/ ma ma dgra bo tsit+ta ga ber yaM thun rbad/ ma ma rtsa thang dgra bo tsit+ta gzer ro thun rbad/ ma ma srog rtsa dgra bo tsit+ta gzer myog sarbad/ ma mdza
178a7(rnying rgyud): la tsi d+ha gzer bruM ril rbad/ ma ma srog la dgra bobi tsit+ta gzer khas rbad/ ma ma rtsa thang dgra bo'i tso b+ho gzer phyogs rbad ma ma dgra bo'i tsit+ta swa ra thai dzaH/ drag sngags 'od zer rdo la myur ba yis/ shes rgyungad rtsa las dngas snyigs 'byed par 'gyur ro//
178b1(rnying rgyud): las na pa dang yi las thar ba dang byung du bton pa/ thod pa dang led pag pa'i gro bar me la/ re ba dang mkhur nag gis bcings te/ drug sngags po mos zil la/ zang byung la du btags te/ dang sa khri banas pa/ danas bya' nga
178b2(rnying rgyud): bcag dbang chen gyis bstan/ bdud kyi pho brang gdab/ mnyes pa'i dbang gzug/ snying gzer bsad pa'i kha gso'o// de yang dmar len su gre'i nAd las/ bdud dang po nya stsal pa'i tshogs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i las byas nas/ rtag pa
178b3(rnying rgyud): med brnag pa mkhugs ni// sbyor ba'i rgyal po dmar len bsngags// sems dben gnas su rang ma chems bcad// maN+Dal phur pa ho ma khung rdzang // ling+ga med byas sngon dmir gnag/ phug gizod par sbubasam gzhug/
178b4(rnying rgyud): g.yo chos sku dang // phyag rgya chen po zil gnon g.yas// bdud dang pho nya sprul pa mngag/ drag sngags pho mos nyin mtshan brdeg/ brnag pa lha dang dbang gzug pA la// tsad+ha'i gsang skor mtshon chand// pheb na rang las bdud gshed da
178b5(rnying rgyud): dngas snyigs drag sngags phye dang bla srog spyad// sha khrag phung po rol cang za// yi ge gnad kyi skabs dang sbyar// 'pho ba gsum ni zad ston na// drag sngags me rlung las kyi mtshan// rang dbang med par srog gcong 'phrog/ yul li ng+ge \u0f7fnga bcas
178b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa gzing gling thod ces gzhug/ phag pa sngon dam regs zil// mnan pa kyai dang brtson la gtad// la sogs sapos kyis gong dang sbyor/ khaM gso byung pa b+h+yo les 'phang // gsang ba snying gzer sbyor bar bya// nyin ma tshon bung dang /
178b7(rnying rgyud): tho rangs srong // dus bzhir rtag tu drag dri bskul// mtshon cha sbyor ba'i rgyal por gsungs// zhes bya'o// me rlung spyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi steng gzer nag po'i lelu na so dgu pa // de nas bco
179a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis don gyi man dag drag po sngags rgod la/ gus gso ba' gcad las ngan thog ser las// kun 'dus rnam rtag chen po rang la 'byung zhing 'char// de yi sbyor ba drag po lnga dang ldan// lnga yi mchod
179a2(rnying rgyud): chu snying po don gyi las// de las 'bru bzhi 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// 'bru bzhigs de gso las 'di srung ba'i mchog/ dngas ma bzhi yi rtsa las ye shes bzhi shar ba// dug lnga las dang sbyor ba gdug pa kuni 'joms yin// de'i tshu
179a3(rnying rgyud): lha ste// dur khrod ras sam shog gu gru bzhi la// sbyor ba lnga dang tsha ba dug chus sbyang // las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su klu gsum zla gam gsum dang ldan// de yi phyi re margya gram ra bzhir bya// yang logs su rbud zlum po
179a4(rnying rgyud): ris// tha mar rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse mo nang du bstan/ srid pa'i khyams khang phag mo'i lto bar bca'// de la gnas shing dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum gnod byed snying po ming rnams bri// zlag ma gsum la stong pa'i ming rnams hri/
179a5(rnying rgyud): gram rwa bzhir rtsa ba'i 'bru bzhi dgod// chu ri mu khyud nod gtod gdug pa'i ming // bcu gnyis rtsibs la gcod cing gzir ba'i sngags// bkod la kha sbyor dang dang sngon dmar bltal// bod pa dur mar bcug la gru gsum rtsang bcas rnams// phyag rgya
179a6(rnying rgyud): zil gnon gsal byas zhag lnga drug tu gzir// lang+ga'i snying gar mchog gi phur pa gdab// drag tu bskul gyi na nad pa ru bas bdug/ phying pas bkab la nyung dkar bra ba la bskul// las de thon nas bka' rten 'og tu gan na// klu dang sa bdang
179a7(rnying rgyud): lha yi gdon// gshin rjem mo zho khro bur pa khyang // dregs pa nyid dang bon po'i rigs gnyis la// bdud dang mu stegs pa tsan dang rgyal po dmu// ze'u brang phung bdag rig 'dzin gshin rdog sri can kun// rang rang ming dang snying po
179b1(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba gcad// drag sngags sbyor ba la sogs brgyad dang gsungs/ e dud ka yaM/ sarba tsit+ta ro myags/ kha za 'dring phyung sha ga rba da?/ srog la phreng breng shag dun dun e dam hur TI dzaHdzaHsa nA ga snying gzer rdud nan khaM shag dza la rbang /
179b2(rnying rgyud): ts+tshidza/ san+na ga bru~M/ sa nA ga rbod/ sar+b+ba ga tsit+ta ro rdza zad/ khedz+wa la rAM/ sarba shA dz+nyA nan 'drid la bzlog/ mur nan/ oM ka pa pa shig 'drid byung khai shag kyig nan/ sngar nar/ si pa sha tron sha skaMmA ya bzurbud/ 'di bzlas pa
179b3(rnying rgyud): da gtong nang 'gran pa dang / shi ka bye ba dang dmod pa drug pa dang / mdo rims drag po mi bzhin mched pa dang // rims nad 'khrugs pa dang / ser ba dbab pa dang / keg bzlog pa'i dus su bzla'o// 'di gar song song bzlas na gdon
179b4(rnying rgyud): gong dang smyo bar 'ong ngo // me rlung spyi dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po lcags rgod nI le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar gyen gyi sbyor bkun 'byung rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do//
179b5(rnying rgyud): chen mchog tu dril ba yI// drag pa mngon du srung ba'i brjed// yang gsang sbyong ba lha gnyis gcig/ bde ba smin par byed pa'i sngags// tA la nag pa'i tsa ma ri// ngag skal dag po'i dzin pa ltar// sbyor ba badz+ra gcig dge dang ldan/
179b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis mngon du sbyor ba'i sgra// bla chen bzhi sprul pa brgyad// yang sbrul bcu ga nyis chags sdang 'brel// gang byung bsdud pa'i sngags bzhi bsdeb// rtags med ku 'byung don gnyis sbyar// da mAr lesasngags kyi snying du de nas/
179b7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo mtshon cha bskor// snying po kun gyi mothu dril nas// mod la sngags kyi lus dang ming // gsang chen gsang ba'i rgyal por bshad// rigs dang rtsol ba las kyi don// lte 'jug gnod zhen gyir 'byung lde// gang dring drag sngags
180a1(rnying rgyud): mngon d+h+weg/ rna ba'i da m+b+ha// ga bak+Sha // bcaska pas thag sa man gyi la sngags// gan sa pa mthal par bgang// rna la thal la 'a/
180a2(rnying rgyud): bzhir cha mnyam rus sbal lhor// ye shes lnga yi thig dngas la// de bzhin ste gnyis thigadrangs la// thig bzhin ga ma legs btab ste// mu khyad rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su su gsum po brang der/ byang log dbus kyi dayul mig gnyis/
180a3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa mtshon tshwa rtsibs brtul// gcig pa'i ral gri bcu dang ldan// g.yon pa rgya bras bcu dang ldan// drug sngags thu da gzir 'bru bcu'i gnas// rgya gra ma de bzhin yaM ya rdzabs// 'bru ba cu'i sdong pog bsngol pas gcod// gapas su rtsibs ched
180a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi la// gzer dang tse d+ha yul gnas pa// g.yon gyi rtsibs chen badrug cig la// ye theng dun dranang gyi sreg 'phrog dgang // sred pa'i byams khang stong na gnas// de bzhin sred pa'i 'khrul mig pa'i// 'khrul lig ral sa ga gsum//
180a5(rnying rgyud): na ba gnyis bzhi bad+ma// bdus chubs mas na ma/ phrul pa ya sngal dang // rdugs sbyang ba mas pa'i galags te// bayin na N+Dal pa'i lagan ste// mas pa dag sa ba nga// de kyis 'jal ga
180a6(rnying rgyud): bzhid// rtsibs bdun rtsibal dgang bzhin brgya// gnod 'khor 'jug dang gikrug pa la// sgrib pa'i jug sngags mtshan de gnas// kun gyi lceb bcu gnyis la// \u0f7f ba'i yige 'brur gnas// nu gyi mtha'ad bsreg dang ldan// zhangs
180a7(rnying rgyud): ngas phyi/ ma na kyi ma na pa mig / ga bya phrul pa'i gyul pa'o// ba rnas sa kyig ga ni nga bya gas
180b1(rnying rgyud): me la bdug/ bla bgegs gang byung sngags re gdags// kun 'byung rtags med bsnol mar brdeg/ dmar len sbyor ba'i rgyal por bshad// me rlungs chu bla chen rtags// rta g.yag pa glang rwa lug gshin// nya sram sprul pa yin par 'dod// sha
180b2(rnying rgyud): bgacod dang gna' ba bong // wa stang ri bong byi la dang // phu nu pa chen zhang drung dang // pha khu la sogs yang sbrul rtags// khyi phag bya sbrul zhe sdang rtags// me rlung skyi 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang tshon mcho ba sbyor ba'i la
180b3(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang chen sbyor ba dril ba'i las// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ snying gzer gajug pa thams cad 'joms// shi 'phrang sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// da
180b4(rnying rgyud): slob gzhan srung gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud po rgyal po btsan// gru gzhan sa bdag the brang gri// ma lus 'joms pa skos kyi sngags// b+hi li'i khong 'dus khong dregs can// 'bar ba nag po ya mgrang // yang gsang mchog gi sgor
180b5(rnying rgyud): pa bshad// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing lpags ro ras la// mu khyud lnga ldan rus s+thal lhor// dug khrag snag tsha sbar la bri// dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan// phyi rim 'khul mig zod mkhar bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar bar
180b6(rnying rgyud): rim brgyad// yang logs drag po rtsa sgrubs dgu// phyi rim mtshon cha bcu drug 'obs// srid pa'i rus sbal lto ba ru// drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po ming // zla gam
180b7(rnying rgyud): ma mo rgyal po btsan// the brang gshin rdog snying po ming // 'khrul mig bzhi la gnas pa ni// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim lags mkhar brgyad po la// dregs pa stobs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// yang logs drag po rtsa sbubs
181a1(rnying rgyud): dgur// srog ma dngas 'chang ba'i gsang mdzod la// snying gzer dgu pa sde tshan re// snying po gsum bsdus rdzogs par dgod// gyi drim mtshon cha srung ba'i 'obs// sred pa'i khang pa bcu drug la// shi zang
181a2(rnying rgyud): dgu btul snying po dgod// gnyis bcas dug khrag cho ba bslus// kha sbyor sngon dmar mthing nug dril// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha med pa la sngags// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'bigs pa'i sbru zla mtshon//
181a3(rnying rgyud): cing g.yengs pas me chu rlung // sdud cing 'chang bas sbyor ba'i mkhal// gzir cing gnon pa'i thog ser sa// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag stong // bdag skyob gzhan bsung go mtshon stoms// las da
181a4(rnying rgyud): ra ba gcod pa'i mtshon// 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal por dug ngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum pur bsdus// gdug nag ya ma rag sha'i klong // de yi pho thang thod pa'i gnas// dur ma'i phu ru rus sbal ga
181a5(rnying rgyud): mtshad rten rin po che yi srubs// tshangs pa'i bu ga r+b+ha gram e// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas zil// hom shing bcug nas stong stong bzlas// gsal bar khyab pa stobs kyis blta// rnam gsum brdab gsum lta ba bzhi// 'dus pa
181a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dang yi pa bzhi// dbang bgrong ba yi go mtshan mchog/ rigs la rgyun du stong stong bzlas// ka stong sbyor ba babyed kyin brtsam// drag po thog ched gzor mchog bstan// gser gyi dgacig gnam ljags gzer// ri rgyal rbang
181a7(rnying rgyud): che spu gri'i dpal// yang gsang mchog gi gsang sngags 'di// e ka ya mo/ du nang reg sha rngubs dun/ sa nA ga ma tra ga zhig gzer buM rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer ra thun rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer dug byung zad/ sar+b+ba ga sI
181b1(rnying rgyud): gnang / snas sun na las zhigag ga po khyong gA ting nga / b+hang+yas subya blang bamyung ba mang ga subs bsdus pa nga rang dang bralas ska la bstan s+ho// lus gang yang ngan srongang/ thod
181b2(rnying rgyud): dakhor po bcas la/ snying gzer dgu dang ni pad kyi sngags sto tshar dang sbyar la sto rdzas la rten bajug tu byas ni gang yang 'grub bo// rdegasngags pan+d+ha r+b+ha snru da dra zlas so// rkyen+ya gang gis kyang mi tshugs so// semu kyi dang
181b3(rnying rgyud): chung las/ shing phang bsrung ba'i la'i sten gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags spyang pa gdag pa mig pa'i las sogs pa med par smin pa 'di gaste/ draben pa chen po gtanas rba// gang gi
181b4(rnying rgyud): da bya// dbus sa gu gsum mthing ngag la// 'khyer gsum dang spun pa brdeg/ phyi nang chag gad dbus mdzub glang // rtsibs la/ gakhyer mo gcig bya// rba khrung nang du thig ma gas ma// kyi ris 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// ba
181b5(rnying rgyud): khyed zlus po la// nan+tisgra mtshon bdug nyi dgod// lnga pa ma de'i phreng bas bskor// de la dgong pa'i'i ma pA nI// dbus su g+sas sam mtheng nug lnga// sadz+dza ma nAng sbyar ba'i skal pa la// grom snying khwa gang grwa gsum brtsig
181b6(rnying rgyud): gis me dang gas la// gdug pa gsul gyi gzugs blan nA gzhag/ rtibs la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgong // phyi sna mdza n+da ma tso mo la// bsreg cing gnon pa'i mu gri dgod// swa ltang bzhi pa'i 'khor lo la// skal basbrul dang shas mi
181b7(rnying rgyud): shaM// gnyis pa gcan che bgesam// ba'i bdug gi ri grub rtsa// lnga pa bya phag spyang tshol gsum// drug pa min gyi yi chol// bdun pa mam thu drug chubargyad// dgra pa khrags tshang sna badz+ra// bcug cig drug rdzas sna tshigs pa
182a1(rnying rgyud): dur khrod ras sa ma zhing ngas la// grong bzhin bris la rdzas kyis bsdus// 'dun nam dgu ru snyed nus dgab// dmod pa bzlas shing bskor ba zla// rnab tu bams zhing ma sbyar la// gzugs la mtshan 'jag
182a2(rnying rgyud): gdab la bsreg/ gdug pa'i sha sogs rim gyis dbul// them nas rjes shUl ba rnag pa'i zor// nyin mtshan thun drug sbyin bsreg bya// drag po sbyor ba mchog gi las// ho pan ta yi bde skad du// snying po gsum la dpa
182a3(rnying rgyud): sdud// man ngag gnang mda'i sbyor bas ba sreg/ las sbyor nus pa dam du 'brel// phyag rgya chen po'i lus dbang srun// bde ba'i don du rang las 'chang // gdug pa rjes gcod sngags kyi dpal// bag med spong ba kun 'jams
182a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor can las gzhan du min// mdze rims dag po'i yams dang na// sbyar ba'i rgyal po bskud la brtsam// sa nA ka drA ra~M/ sa rA ga unan gzer gyung / srog dun re tsi ta prer shag nang hur bum gyogs rbad/ drag po mngon du byung ba'i
182a5(rnying rgyud): ba 'di nI/ las gang gi rtags ma phyin na/ khyad par dang rdzas dang bcu'athabs 'phrul par byas laM/ sngags pa go mtshon gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ khro bo'i dka' thub dang dam tshig bsrung la las brtsams na 'bras bur ngogs med pa'o/
182a6(rnying rgyud): me rlung sti 'dang 'khrugs pa'i rgyud las/ drag po mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste zhegs ma pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khag so'i'adus su ha dang stong dang chos brgyad dang nyi shu bzhi la mon tha~Md dum/ 'phra
182a7(rnying rgyud): gi rug yas pa rtsa mam bcad po'i nang du khrag sna dang drag sgra dang lo na dang ming rus badrug la phur bus gdang / gre yis gtubs zo nga bstim// drag spangs la thor du 'phang ba ni/ a mr-igs yarngubs mu ga shag kadran dgra za'i srog la hUM la
182b1(rnying rgyud): sa dag 'dags med na/ rnagacags pa nad / 'du pa dganan banan/ 'das snas smra pa dang byags gathog 'dad / mnan 'das pa nas du// sas gas pa du ga stongs pa na padang

188a7(rnying rgyud): da tshing mi bstan pa'i byung // sa ni lci gyi// de tshong la bsten pa 'byung // gos ngan drug tul non pa'i tshe// de la par byu / ba pa na/ ma nas byung// ris bzhin grang kyang // ni ba thams dad
188b1(rnying rgyud): ye gru// rdeg bu mi khros gyur kyang // khro ba thams ca dang yin// thams cadang yi rang bzhin yin// 'gro ba rigs drug la sogs rnam par rgyal bar mdzad pa dang / bdud dang srin pa mu lcags 'dul ba gyur// mtshan dang dab byang gzugs su spa
188b2(rnying rgyud): nas ni// ma lus tshad gcod phyir ni 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud zlum por bcas// sbrul gyi rgya gam dag gis mtha' bskor te// lte bar rdo rje rgya bram bri bar bya// 'khor lo brgyad la rdo rgya bram ze/ de yi sbeng du
188b3(rnying rgyud): gzu gnyis la/ gcig lnga gshin rje dbu drug pa'i gzugs bri/ gcig la yum khro gnyer gdong drug ma'i gzugs bre/ de'i nang du dmigs pa'i rkang rjes kyis dang / dris dang khrag ste gsum dang / thal chen sa dang / shug pa
188b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i khu ba dang / de rnams brdzis pa la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ ga zu'i nang du bcug la kha sbyar laM/ dog pa dmar pos bcings te/ dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu bzhag/ de nas lha'i suM phyag rgya chen por bskyed pa ni/ A~M a kro ta ka 5
188b5(rnying rgyud): mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+tsa hU~M phaT ces brjod pas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed/ zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis pa sku mdog srung zil ba cag 'gro 'dra ba/ shin tu rngam pa'i dbu drug la/ dbus mjam zhing gdangs pa/ g.yas ljags
188b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba/ g.yo nA~M gang rgyang chen po// g.yon pa gcig tshoms gtsi gr-I pa/ g.yas pa gcig 'dzum pa'i tshul can/ zhal gcig 'dzum gnyer khro zhing bzhugs pa/ zhabs drug brkyang bskum gzir gnon du bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas
188b7(rnying rgyud): dang po dri shUl/ gnyis pas ral gri/ gsum pas mi mgo dbyug zo// bzhi pas dgra sta/ lnga pas mchog sbyin/ drug pas lcags kyi/ g.yon dang po thod pa chen po// gnyis pas sngags mdza'/ gsum pas zhags pa/ ban
189a1(rnying rgyud): pas rin po che'i dbyug zo// lnga pas mda' bo che/ drug pas mdung / skya'i yan lag thams cad rdo rje'i bskur 'bar ba/ klu rigs bzhis su la brgyan pa/ yi dwags kyi phreng ba chen pos se ral khar brgyan pa/
189a2(rnying rgyud): thod pa skam rlon gyi dbu rgyan/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gcig bsgom mo// de'i g.yon du yum be tA lI zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas tri shul rtse gsum/ gAyod g+han dmar kyis 'akang ba bsdams pa
189a3(rnying rgyud): gcig bskyed la/ de gsal ba dang 'di skad ces brjod do// dzAM/ rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed// khams gsum dbang du spad pa'i zhal drug pa// dbyings las sbrul paM'i khrag 'thung ldan gyis khyab// las ngan 'khrul pa'i
189a4(rnying rgyud): sems can gdul dka' rnams// gdug pa 'dul phyir ma lus gshegs su gsol// A~M na mo b+had+d+ha d+harma sang g+he b+h+yaH/ kro ta sa pA ri bA ra~M sa ma ya/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya/ A~M AHhUM i daM pre taM A sa nAnAM/ a mr-i tong kan ra ka rak+Sha
189a5(rnying rgyud): hA/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ ya mAn+ta ka pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes lan gsum brjod de/ brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ de nas khrag chen dang / rgod khrig dang / sha chen dang / tshil chen la sogs pa
189a6(rnying rgyud): gr-itor ma chag cig bshams la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin bsngar la/ sngags 'di 'bumacho ga cig bzlas so// A~M badz+ra ha tang 'ba' ba ten 'da' na/ hrIHSh+T+rIHche ge mo mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ha stab pa bri
189a7(rnying rgyud): tes hUM s+pha ra ya hU~M phaT/ zhes zhag gsum du bgrangs la/ 'aro ba grangs tshang ba dang / gtor ma'i las brtsam par bya ste/ bskyed dang bskal dang rdzogs pa dang // phyogs bcu'i khro ba sun drangs la// ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las b+ha/ da
189b1(rnying rgyud): gtor ba na nga smra pa gzugs pacug la gang ma'i sngags kyis brjod nams/ gci nying mnan pa dang byin te// las rnams ma grub byar // gtod ma lal bar blan nga // brtson kyagata bcus nas na// dmigs pa dag la bdag pa
189b2(rnying rgyud): bya// rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang // rdo rje khu tshur nang du ni// mthe bor bcug pa be con chu// sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya// na mo b+hud+hA d+ha rmA sa g+ha g+heHA/ sarba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya/ a ga ni ra hA li ta dza/ pra ha li
189b3(rnying rgyud): yang nr-i phaT/ des ni gang la dmigs pa 'grung // gshin rje nag po'i tan tra las// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ldan gyis grub pa'i phrin las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po gshin rdo gshed
189b4(rnying rgyud): sa/ skra 'phrul tshe skad kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// ye shes 'khyil pa'i 'khor lo brgyad sted+ha la// ye shes te 'od gsal ba'i thig bran gdab// mu khyud zam po sbal gyi zhags pa bri// stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur zu zhes
189b5(rnying rgyud): de yi dbus su snying po 'di god do// dbus kyi lte ba la A~M/ shar du tri/ sgor waM/ nub tu baM/ byang dudza/ byang shar dza/ shar lhong hri/ nub tu mo/ thab byang du ya~M/ de rnams bkod nas/ a mr-i ta sra mdog spag nag dgrags pa
189b6(rnying rgyud): phyag drug/ suM la khrod tshul gyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas mAthi ng+ge nag/ g.yon ljang nag/ dbus sgra dang mthun te lpathA nag/ zhabs bzhi brgyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ yum yang yab kyi snang bzhin du bzhugs te/ g.yo
189b7(rnying rgyud): bskyed par bya/ A ma mr-i tata k+Sha gtas su dzo ng+ge Ta/ badz+ras rbu hA~M phaT/ dester bskyed nas/ dmigs pa'i gzugs rjes dang / rkang rjes pa bcas la/ khams rig bu dag laH// yo gzugs dri bar bya// rang
190a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs bcug la// nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// de nas khro ba chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba le zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// oM ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// bde gshegs thugs kyi sras yin pas// bdud dang
190a2(rnying rgyud): 'og 'dren rnams// ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs te// mgon po ga shin rje'i gshed kyi sras// don rnams thams cad ma lus par// deng 'di nyid du grub par bya// dgra rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dug dang gi wang
190a3(rnying rgyud): dgra bo'i gzugs la zab rnying bsngags// phur pa'i phyag cha baHsa nas ni// sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya// A~M badz+ra sarba a mr-i te sta ba ste dza~M hrIHphaT ya/ me togs rgyag ta/ nam gi bra ma data/ d+hi laN+Da la/
190a4(rnying rgyud): mdzin tan drug bcad nas ni// stod ni rtsa gcig dag tu bzlas// de// rten 'gugasum par \u0f7f// 'dab bzlas dgra yi gzugs la / smin las mchog tu thub ni// zlab tag sum dag pa// de nas bdag pa'i las 'di
190a5(rnying rgyud): dzad+hIN+De gcig rgya brtas lA// nyi ma dang po la sngags 'dri bzlas// oM ma~M ban d+ha dzI yub ta na pa/ oM N+Di kan ta pa na katrUM stA ra ya phaT/ de nas gnyis pa la/ badz+rI \u0f88\u0f90ba skA \u0f7f8/ dr-i A pa~M sha a a dz+dza Sh+Ta phardza ba na/ de nas gam pa
190a6(rnying rgyud): ni di bye bo tanan/ la dus/ drinas nyi ma bzhi pa la// babarjo di po'i he ta te/ tshigamong bangar dungs / rje ba rnal ga / rtse grapa thag tu bcos la 'dzi/ nganas
190a7(rnying rgyud): bag / ga 'du pa ma~M/ 'i phyag tu brtsam la 'jog/ de nas nyi ma drug pa / 'dzum bu gzeng bar byung ba thu gdangs pa'i bya kya // dam nyin dag bdu pal/ 'dus
190b1(rnying rgyud): rang rang ma yar d+hi rnying dran b+h+yo hrIlaT/ kha T+wA~M ga 'i phrug nas brdeg/ de ltar gzing mnan drug d+ha ni// b+h+yas na dgra pa dbang du gyur// ga m+b+hin rjenag po t+tan+da las/ dgra pa smad kyi 'jug drug pa'o// / rdo rdza
190b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpalnga ga shin rdzog myed kyis/ phyogs brdungs gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mchog gi mchod pa'i le'u bskrun te/ 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs steng la/ mu khyud thum po
