190b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin shin rjel sogs pa rnams cang / rim pa bzhin dums dag par na// dbus kyi skye bar dkang+gA lA mtshan dang ldan pa zhig gnang ma thugs dag / sha tshil chen po dang / hr-id kri ga tshal la sogs pa rnams kyi dam kyig
190b5(rnying rgyud): cha gcig pa shams la gzhag/ shar gyi b+han+ta dag kyang khrag sna dgra dang / sha tshil chen po stag dang zer mang gi sgying khrag dang skar la gzhag/ lho'i d+han+ta dA ma he sha dang rdzas gong mar sbyar te gzhag/ nub kyi b+hanar sbal gyi sha dang rdzas gor mar skar la
190b6(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ byang du rgod kyi shwa khrag dang rdzas gong mar sbyar te gzhag/ mtshams bzhir thod dron ra gzhag/ gtor ma dag gi mdun dag tu// rin chen mdzes pa'i snod pa shams te// dmar gyi rak+ta ar+d+ha smang la gzhag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu'ang dgod
190b7(rnying rgyud): pa rtse// dbus kyigacapa myong ba ni// badz+ra ba d+hU hU~M/ rten na rlung dzang/ ma ngan pam nas/ hU~M AH/ zhes brjod par byu// dbus kyi gtong mnad kyis brjong ba'i gtor mog/ phyogs bzhi dag dra'ang de bzhin te/ bskyed pa
191a1(rnying rgyud): ni baphrul pa dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dag/ sems kyis rim pa bzhin du bya'o// bsnyen bslab pa sogs gzhung bzhin tu'o// bcu brji na rdo lnga dang // khyad par du'ang thos brgyad la'o// nan tan duni bsang
191a2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// rigs dang mthar phyin gcer bzung zhing // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa ste// dper na rdo rje rnon po yis// nyon mongs rnga ba gcod pa'i tshul// ye shes ral gri rnon po yis// ma rig mun nag sel ba ltar// bdud dang mu thogs
191a3(rnying rgyud): cang can// byin rnabs chen thos papral nas ni// bdud dang srin po gdan du ba tid // gaM shin rje'i bo ta la sogs rnams// 'ol ba'i shing du byin gyis rlobs// sring po'i bu mo chung ma rnams// dbang du bsdus te bka' tan rdzogs// thams kyangs
191a4(rnying rgyud): lus dbang du bsdus// 'jig rtenalha/ tshogs thams cad kyang // brkyang bsum gdun du bkod nas ni// thams cad ma lus zil gyis mnan// skyes bu rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// nyams su grangs la bsgre par bya// ji bzhin pa yi sems
191a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang lag cha tshogs pa dang // nam zhig bsgrub par 'dod na ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu der bskal lo// phrin las rnam pa bzhi ru bsrub// don rnams thams cad shes par bya// gshin rje nag po'i tang+tha las ye shes mchog gi mchod pa'i le'u ste
191a6(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'o// / de nas khro bo chen po ga shIn rje gshed kyis ye shes dgyes pa chen po'i phrin las 'di gsungs so// a ma ho// phyogs bcu kun nas bsdus pa yi// ye shes rgyal po zag chen 'di// gsang chen rnyed du byung ba rgya/
191a7(rnying rgyud): d+hu drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ye nas spun gyis grub pa yi// ma skyes gdod nas rnam par dag/ ye nas spyan gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ chos kyi sla'am chos kyi dbyings// don dang chog dang mngon/
191b1(rnying rgyud): sum pa// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad la// khyad par mi mnga' thugs rje cha// phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin te// gti mug mun bsel ba yis// nyon mongs dri ma kun bral ba// shin tu sdud pas mya ngan 'das// sad pa'i bdag nyid gshin rje gshes
191b2(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs pas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad/ shin tu rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ye nas dben/ bde gshegs rgyal ba thams cad ye nas lhun gyis
191b3(rnying rgyud): grub// mtha' gnyis spangadra pa'i ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs// phyogs bcu stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas// thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang bskur bas// bdud dang srin po log 'dren thams cad kyang // dbang mchog snang ba des kyang phyin bsgye
191b4(rnying rgyud): do// sha phyogs dri za'i log 'dren zhi gyu raM cig/ oM badz+ra ku la e shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hU~M hU~M zhes/ rdo rje rigs kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyis/ myugon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal dbang bskur to// e ma ho rin chen 'byung ba kun gyi bdag/ pa/
191b5(rnying rgyud): mchog khyad par byed par dbang bskur te/ mi 'gyur yon tan rigs kyi dbang thob nas// lho phyogs gshin rje'i bgegs rnams zhi gyur cig/ oM rat+na ku la he he ho ho hU~M hUM/ rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur bas// rin chen dgyes pa'i dpung thob nas/
191b6(rnying rgyud): par byin brlabs thab gyur cing // e ma ho khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang phyug che// snang ba med las lhun gyis grube// rdo rje 'chang ba'i dbang bskur bas// nub phyogs klu rnams 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ oM bad+ma ku la te
191b7(rnying rgyud): he ho ho hU~M hUM/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang bskur bas// pad+ma dgyes pa'i dbang thob nas// thogs pa med pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ma ho rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i phrin las gtso// gnyis su med pa las kyi rigs//
192a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ las rnams thams cad dbang bsrung bas// byang phyogs gnang sbyin 'dul ba'i dpung thob shog/ rdzog mthal te ho ho&b+h+yaH/ mang med bzhi la thugs rjes kyang // nyon mang sna ba rnams ni byang chug+sa/ d+ha rdzogs
192a2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mgon po gshin rje gshed la dpung bskur ngo ro// de nas mgon po gshin tu gshed// ngo mtshong chen po rmad byung nas// dgyes pa'i phrin las 'di pa~M thames so// dkyil 'khor mthing na ga rje
192a3(rnying rgyud): la// mtha' mA mA khrang zlum pos bskyod// rdo rje zlum pa k+kor bar bya// 'dog ga lnga'i rkyen rnams dbye// dbus kyi lte ba rnam po la// gru gsum mthing nag ba ru // shar sgo mtshams kyi brag myal// yi ga smon bri bar du/
192a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams la hU~M bri'o// nub byang mtshams la dza bri ste// byang shar mtshams la hi bri'o// dbus kyi e l-i hri bu'o// gru gsum mu khyud kun la ni// dzaHhUM gnyis ni spel bar bya'o// de nas mgon po gshin rje gshed// gzi
192a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom nus na// sngags 'di 'bru ma tsho gcig bzlas// s+t+wa~M rA ta bid+d+hah+NahrIthA we/ hU~M badz+ra dz+ra hrI hU~M tra~M d+hI Sh+T+r-iSh+T+rIHswAthAHsa bzlas so// de nas dgra bgegs gang la bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ khrag sa dgra dang / gro tshil chen po dang /
192a6(rnying rgyud): khrag sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma cha gcig bshams la/ b+han+ta gcig tu blugs te/ e'i tshogs su gzhag go// gat+to ma'i nang du gzugs dang ming byang gzhug go// de nas mgon po gshin rje gshed kyis/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma
192a7(rnying rgyud): yang dag shes rab chen po yis// chos rnams thams cad ljin gyis grub// gnod sbyin srin mo tir ba// phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal rngam zhal du// ti ba kyi mchod pa 'bul// hU~M lA hi raM yaM khe trag kho ma'i/ 'da' dral 'ba' hi du la hUM hUM phaT phaT/
192b1(rnying rgyud): gas tul du nga du nas nyi shus gcig nas she/ nga bar gshegs pas pams pa sal du gra nga gzugs pa ngagadang ldan 'ag rnams du na nan chu
192b2(rnying rgyud): lus la si pa te khA hi/ oM badz+ra kar ne de la khA hi/ oM badz+ra shra ti ti la khA hi/ oM badz+ra ma lu te la khA hi/ oM badz+ra ma ti tse tI lang khA hi/ oM ku ma ri ha he lI khA hi/ oM sri la mu Sha te laM khA hi/ oM ba mu khA n+de laM naM ShA hi/ oM badz+ra mAdz+ra te l-i na ma Sha d+hi/
192b3(rnying rgyud): ma la b+ha/ cho ga mo kha ra~M khA te zhes brjod cing bstab bo// de ltar nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bsku ngo // de nas yang drod phreng gi rgya bcas la/ sngags 'di nyin zhag dus tshad kyis bzlas so// ra u rba te srir ser ba tse le rje mi che ge oM sA rA ya
192b4(rnying rgyud): zab gru gsum gyi nang du rdze'u 'jug la/ kha bud med kyi dor tas bcad la sngags 'di bzlas/ oM badz+ra ra seng pu tra na na sad tra na na e tra ka rdzA laM ba ru pa ta tra~M mA ra ya phaT/ de nas ku bul nag po dang rdo sol gyi me btang nas bsko la ni dgra bo'i skyed tshad
192b5(rnying rgyud): btAb nas dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas phrin las brnyan pa ni/ ra ru gtsang ma'i nang du dgra'i gzugs dang ming rus bcu ga la/ sngags 'di ci mang du gdab bo// oM badz+ra ka la pre wing te l-i taM hri dun d+ho/ sa maN+Da traM hi che ge mo lA ra yA phaT/ de nas yang man
192b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i las bstan pa ni/ bud med kyi dor rtar dgra bo'i gzugs bcug la sdo mar gyis thil ti la mram spang bzhi mdor mnan no// oM badz+ra kA la d+hU pa che ge mo s+t+waM b+ha ya ha hU~M phaT nan zhes bzlas pas las 'grub par 'gyur ngo ro// gshin rje dag po'i chung la
192b7(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po zin las kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed pos gsang ba'i las kyi man ngag 'di bstan to// gsang chen 'dus pa'i phrin las rmang po che// ye shes mchog gi theg pa 'dus po'i ma
193a1(rnying rgyud): rgyab de las sngags phyag tu sbyin las 'di// rdzas dang lca rdza dang kutarnams// rnal babyod rgyal ldan dang bas bsgrub par bya// dang po nyid kunas dung gnas min brtag par bya// dag tu da dzin ga
193a2(rnying rgyud): nas// sngags kyi yi ge 'bru gcig 'di bsgrub bo// oM aM kA la rU ba hU~M phaT ma/ oM nI ye shes lce dang ldan// AM ni rlung gi cho ga ste// kA ni dz+nyAn las grub pa'o// lAn-i ljongs spyod pa yin te// d+huni chags pa'i rang bzhin no//
193a3(rnying rgyud): mi gtang ba'o// hUM ni sems kyi rang bzhin no// pha ni don dam 'dren pa bstan// Ta ni dmigs pa sgrol ba ste// a ni dgra bo nan tan sdud// AM zhes bya ba kun gyi mchog/ kA zhes bya ba phrin las mchog/ la zhes bya ba las rnams mchog/
193a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba zhe sdang mchog/ pa ni chags shing zhen pa'o// pha ni thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// Ta ni dgra rnams snying nas 'dren par byed// a ni las rnams bye brag 'byed// ces bsten pas ni las kyi kho ga don no// de nas las rnams
193a5(rnying rgyud): brtsam par bya// las rnams mchog sems bskyed par bya// de nas sdang bar sems pa'i dgra bo la// ming dang rus dang dri ma rkang rjes rnams// hom mchog nang du yam gyis byug par bya// rak+ta 'gu ya 'bras bu gsum// ni ma pa'i
193a6(rnying rgyud): khu ba dang // tsan+da ka yi 'bus bu yis// de la dgra yi gzugs byas la// las rnams brtson 'grus bskyed la bsgrub// bsad cing gnan par bya ba'i thabs// gro gA ras sam shog shog lA// dmigs pa'i gzugs ni bcas nas su/
193a7(rnying rgyud): de yi snying gar snying po ni// oM hriM phaT ces bya bar bri// khar ni b+har+N+Na tshal pa gcig/ nang du nyung dkar blug nas ni// sngags ni 'di 'bum rtsa brgyad bzlas so// A~M b+hi kri ta ti stong ka che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ grangs tshang ba dang / ba yu ta'i khu bas
193b1(rnying rgyud): gzugs ladran zhing gtor ro// de nas nod rnon gyi phyag rgya bca sa la/ sngags ni stong rtsa gcig bzlas so// / oM badz+ra kA la rU pa mkhan ka ta ra s+t+rai b+ha ya d+ha phaT/ da nas tri zhu la phyag rgya bcas lnga/ ka na tri ka'i khu bas bran zhing sngags
193b2(rnying rgyud): 'di bzlas so// A~M kA la rA pA te/ byi krita ta dar na mar ni na hU~M phaT/ zhes bzlas so// de nas thor phreng gi phyag rgya bcas la/ 'bri ta'i khu ba dang / pra mar ta'i khu bas gzugs la bran zhing sngags 'di bzlas so// oM tsA
193b3(rnying rgyud): par sI ni hU~M phaT/ dri nus mo dza An dza na'i zhags pas dgra bo'i gzugs bcings la/ sngags 'dri stong rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM kA la rU pa b+hi kri ta ta sa ma 'da' re hU~M phaT/ de nas yang b+ha d+he kha skar gyi nang du sa po'i gzugs baju
193b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis laM yi ge 'di bri'o// A~M kA la rU pa ta bi ra si kha de Sha na laM phaT phaT/ de la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas te/ spyi bo la la ni gsum bskor te gzugs la brdeg go// oM kA la dru ba badz+ra kA li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT
193b5(rnying rgyud): nas ru mig klu yod nges par song la rdzas thams cad dang sngas te gnyer gtang ba'o// A~M badz+ra hi \u0f7fhrIHbadz+ra kA la rU pa sarba swa ta mu ki bud tu gang dza dang la ba te ku ru phaT/ de ltar byas te chu meg la g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan dgu bya'o// rang nyid de
193b6(rnying rgyud): 'dug na/ skyon rnam pa gsum zhig yod da gu h+ya/ gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ las gsang ba'i man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / da ni kA la rU pa gsang ba'i las gnyis pa ste/ ka pA la'i ga bur gong du spros
193b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas rnams bcug la/ kha sbyar te dog pa nag pos bcings la phyag rgya rnam pa gsum bcings te/ sngags 'di khri bzlas so// oMs pa nad nan ta ardza na ha ha le le kA la rU pa hriM paM hU~M phaT/ de bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / dog srud nag po
194a1(rnying rgyud): bkrol la/ gzub n+d+ha la/ maman dang ldan pa garjeg la/ gshin de drug po'i gzugs zeng// gcig la dgra pa'i gzugs / dam par snying gar phur bu 'greng pa'i garngugs pa/ gshen na thugs kad
194a2(rnying rgyud): d+hu 'i yang snying bri/ de nas ga bu kha sbyar la dog pa dmar pos bcings/ sngags 'di lan gsum du bzlas so// dbang po sdus shig phaT phaT/ kA la rU pa hU~M phaT/ de nas thabs la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ phyag rgya rnam pa la bcas pa'i
194a3(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di brjod do// auH ti t+ye na pa ru pa d+hing dung kAl chub b+h+yo phaT/ dbang du bsdu bA'i TI brgya rtsa gcig tu brjod do// de nas khre phul nag po'i khre ba dang / d+hAta re gnyis bkrus pa'i khu bas byi ba'i sngags 'di stong rdza khrig tu zad //
194a4(rnying rgyud): drub brgya du pa ta d+hi hrI na ma hU~M phaT la bAn ta dzaH/ de nas ga bu gnyis kyi phyag gi rgya pa la kA la rlub rtsa ba'i sngags bris la/ phyag rje lag pra ga yas g.yon mthe ba mdzub N+ye smad la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams sma nga/ 'angos gang gi snga
194a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas la/ ring gi drug+sa do garta gnas pa'i sar sba'o// de'i steng du grog tshang gis sa mnan lA/ rgya grum gyi swa munan no// kA la ng+ga pa'i le'u gnyis 'byung ba gras ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / da ni gsang ba'i man ngag ye'u ste/ dang po
194a6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dngazhin nyid kyi ti nga don bsgoms te/ stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ kun d+ha d+hA gi ting nge 'dun snying nge di khon nyid gsal bar bsgom/ de nis r+b+ba'i ting nge 'dzin bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi du gyur pa las/ dpral gshin rje gshes
194a7(rnying rgyud): d+hu gsal bar bskyed de/ spya mdog mthing na gzhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba dbus spu dang mthun te mthing nag/ rdzag g.yas dang badz+ra dbyug// bar ma dag ste/ tha ma ye shes kyi rang wi/ g.yon da
194b1(rnying rgyud): sdigs mjug/ bar ma mdung byung / tha mdung chen dmar gyis bkang ba/ sbrul bur khrod kyi rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gcig bskyed pa dang / de nas s+pha ra d+ha dzaHzhes brjod pa dang / 'dag tan gyi khams can gshin rje gshed
194b2(rnying rgyud): phra mos gang bar bsam/ nr-i zhes brjod pas/ thams cad srul slar 'dus pas/ sgra 'jig rten gyi gtas dang mnyam pa shin tu 'arji che bar bsgom zhing / brten pa 'di rgyan du bgrad do// sho sa ma ya ma N+Da shrI mA dza ya ma na N+Da ka ha
194b3(rnying rgyud): !\u0f7fhUM phaT/ de nas dur/ skye k+She ras wa/ uT+Ta na'i khu ba dang / shing nem pA'i khu ba dang / khrag sna gsum gyis dgra bo'i gzugs bris la/ d+hA b+h+ra ma tshun dan nang du badz+ra pA la/ bud med zhabasams la bcad de/ shing ster brtsub
194b4(rnying rgyud): dA pa skya'o// rtse mo ser ba'i shing gcig 'gred du skyes pa/ than kor na shAng gzhan med pa la/ phur bu song nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa gcig byas la/ A~M badz+ra tA la chul si kyi steng hU~M pha ru d+ha a/ zhes bya ba bris la rtsad gzug so/
194b5(rnying rgyud): bdag gong ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ bdag las 'od 'phros pas/ dmigs pa'i gzugs la phog pas thul gyis chog par byasam/ slar 'dus pas bdag gi dbang du 'bras par bsam zhing / snying po 'di lan grangs khri rtsa gcig bzlas
194b6(rnying rgyud): so// oM kA la rU pa ta ha sta b+hU d+hA prA ting phaT phaT ya yan na naH/ bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par du gzhan gyi gtamA mi smra'o// gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba'i las gnyis dang ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas
194b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshe sa'i gshed kyis/ thugs kyi man dag gsang ba'i man ngag las dgu po 'di gsungs so// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i las dang / rgyas pa'i las dang / dbang gi las dang / dbug pa'i las dang /
195a1(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i las dang / myos par bru ba'i las dang / bsang pa'i las dang / dbyu ba'i las dang / bskrad par bya ba'i las sa// del shrI bar bya ba'i las na/ bud med zhi bar bsrung bar thAH/ dang dkar ram/ grogang
195a2(rnying rgyud): rwas dkar po gtsang ma la/ gi l+r-ing gis dkor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa zhig zis la/ bsal yi ge brgyag nyis bris/ rtsibs kyi par du bsrang bar bya ba'i ming gis nas/ 'khor lo kham pa'i gang co kha gyur gyi nang drubatug nas
195a3(rnying rgyud): sa /
195a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i cha lugs bsgoms la/ me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod cing / phyag na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ bum pa dkar po bdud rtsi'i chus bkang ba bsnams pas/ bsrung bar bya ba la dbang bsrur zhing 'dzab bya // snying
195a5(rnying rgyud): hrIhrISh+T+r-iHha~M kritA nan hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ nA mche ge mo zhig shIt+ti kuT nA ma swA hA/ bud med zhi bas bsrung bar bya ba'i las so// gyes pa bsrung na/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i 'khor lo gAnyi sa ka 'dra bar gur bum gyis bris le/ gang la bya ba'i ming rus swAH/
195a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i bar du bri'o// gab co kha sbyar ba'i nang du mar dang sbrang rtse bsres pa yang blugs la/ 'khor lo ming dang bcas pa yang der btsug ste/ gzungs thag ser pos dkris te/ stegs bu'i steng du bzhag la/ ras ser pos g.yogs so//
195a7(rnying rgyud): togasar ngos dus gsum du mchod do// bdag nyid kha byang phyogs su bltas la/ g+ha ya g+ha ta ka spu mdog ser po rgyas pa'i cha lugs su bsgom zhing / bdag dang bsrung bar bya ba'i rgyu gnyis ka/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gser zhun ma lta bu'i steng na
195b1(rnying rgyud): nas shing / lhagan gsar kyi bas pa bdang rtsinA mAn sang pos gang ba bsam pas dbang bsung zhing bzlas brjod byar// ban/ tsAHba kun hU~M rUpa thal nasaH/ phyag yo gag zu / zhib gas /
195b2(rnying rgyud): na hU~M rnal Tapatha gyi ga sa nag g-i s+'uhA/ zhes brgyas pa'i lus so// de la dbang g.yon na/ phog ma sa sa/ phyogs khrib dang/ na du ma 'ardzun gas zag rnams
195b3(rnying rgyud): kha lo gnyis bris te/ sngag rje dkar pos dbyangs kyi yog bcu drug mtha' bskor du bris la// ka khA la sogs pa'i yi ge sun sna ga tsha dmar pos dri/ haM gnyis kyi bar du gang la bye ba'i ming rdzogs par phre/ ya ga
195b4(rnying rgyud): du 'jug la/ ming nga sgri ci gas nas/ gzungs drug dam posu cings shing / stegs nu'i snang du bzhags/ ros dri ma bas g.yogs nas/ matog dmang pos dug gsung / 'ad
195b5(rnying rgyud): nas/ lha ya mA d+ha ga su mdog dmar po dbang gi tshul du 'gos zhing // rna ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dmar po bsgom zhing / dbang dubya bya'i gzugs kyang dmar por bsgoms/ zla ba'i steng du mngon du 'jug rtse/ dpeng du zhugs par dmigasan
195b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid kyi thug gnas 'od zer dam po 'gos te/ gang la bya ba'i chus sems spyod zer dmar pos bkang nas/ de nyams nid myos par gyur te/ 'od ltar 'dus pas drangs nas/ bdag gi dang po'i drung du 'dzin sa/ dbang du 'du
195b7(rnying rgyud): bsam mo// ji tsam na dbang du ma gyur zhing mkhrugs na/ mang rjod dang bcas pa de dud pa med pa'i me 'dag gzang po la bsregs shing 'ang 'dzin na/ ngi tsam thos par gyur pa na khugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas pa'i snying po ni/ Ak+Shi
196a1(rnying rgyud): bi kr-id+h+wa nanahU~M hU~M phaT san+dan che ge mo bang d+ha k+Sha tsi gA sAH/ oMn+maSh+T+r-iHbi kr-it+ta nAn hU~M hU~M phaT phaTab cheg mo khrug par gyur cig pa swAH/ zhus pa ni dbang gi las so// de la dgug par bya ba'i las ni/ drung khrod kyi rab pa ma/
196a2(rnying rgyud): zad bye kyi ga dung ces byas pa'i sal/ gas ste zhabs 'khong po thos te/ gcig sa yig gnyis kyi bar dru gang la bu ba'i mang bri/ gcig la te gnyis kyi par dumang thos nas/ bud med kyi byan pasgrang byenang du brtag pa/ srungs
196a3(rnying rgyud): ming po sa dkris nas stegs pa'i steng du gzhag go// me tog dmar po sa ng+yas gsum du mchod do// bdag nyid yA mAr+d+haka su ma dge nu ba ka'i dmar zhag 'dra bang bsgoms la/ phyag g.yas na lcags bya/ g.yon ni zhags pa dam ri thogs pa/
196a4(rnying rgyud): dkrug par bya ba'i skyed nas bzung ste drangs par bskol zhing 'ang ba bzlas so// ji tsam mi khrugs par gyur na/ shing ka nye ba zhar ba'i phye ma la me bus pa/ de la rdzas bsro zhing 'ang ba byas na/ de tsha bar pur tsam nu zhugs par 'gyur ro// snying po na/

196a6(rnying rgyud): de la lus gnan par bya ba'i las ni 'dri ste/ dur khrod kyi ras blangs lA/ ldong ros drang yung bas sdug tshwa byas nas/ 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ de la yi ge gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming bris te/ kham sa'i gab tsho chen ser pos bsdus pa la
196a7(rnying rgyud): sbyor du bcug la/ gab rgya sted ma'i rgyab la/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dge bdun rim gyis bskor babris la/ de'i dkyil du ngo rab gcig yin pa la/ ri rab kyi steng nas rab rgya byung bani/ rigru bzhi pa brgyad bris la/ ri rab dang
196b1(rnying rgyud): kyi nang du d+hi bi brgyad bris la/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rdong rgya grum gyis bskor ba'i dbus sa// la sar po gcig bris la/ don yod grub pa bzhugs par bsgoms la/ tshan krud ser pos dkris mnan no// bdag nyid la m+b+ha n+yag+sa
196b2(rnying rgyud): su bltas la/ wA ya mAn+ta ka sku mdog ser po dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po'i nang na bzhugs par bsgoms la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang laM ser po las/ 'od zer na bu na sprin phung stug por byung bas/ ga la bya ba'i dngos po de
196b3(rnying rgyud): g.yogs shing / des ci yang mi shes pa dang mi mthong ba dang / ri rab rdo rje rgya gram dang bcas pas kyang / yang dang yang du lan brgyad kyi bar du gnan par bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// snying po 'di'o// A~M hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi rbad+ha na ni hUM hU~M phaT
196b4(rnying rgyud): phaT laM che ge mo'i lus s+t+waM b+ha ya nan laM/ zhes bya ba ni lus mnan pa'i las so// de la ngag gnan pa'i las bya dgos na/ gong du bstan pa bzhin du/ 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ gang la bya ba'i ming dang / smra ba'i don kun laM gyi bar du
196b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bris la/ bzlas brjod bya zhing gnan pa ni/ ngag mnan pa'i las so// de la myos par bya ba'i las ni/ dur khrod kyi ras la 'og nas 'byung ba'i sdug tshas 'khor lo bris te/ 'khor lo'i sa stong par yod par/ baM gtu
196b6(rnying rgyud): k+Shi bar du/ bzlas brjod bya zhing gang la ming dang / mu kha ban da na ba nad mu ka kang ku ru baM zhes ming rus dang sngags bsres pa bri'o// bdag nyi da ya sAn+ta ka'i rnal 'byor du bsgoms la/ 'khor lo lug gi log par bcug ste/ dgra bo
196b7(rnying rgyud): snying sems de la dbab bo// 'khor lo'i reg bzhi rim du bskor ba la/ tshon sgra lngas bskor/ 'khor lo gnyis la gcig phyin phyogs su bris nas sgyur ba dang / yi ge dang sngags kun mnyam por 'gyur ro// phra yogs mnan par
197a1(rnying rgyud): the ba dang / bsgom pa dang / 'dabs zlas na/ sgra nas lus dang sems bcings par 'gyur te/ glen pa myur robyas myos pa bzhin du ci yang mi shes par 'gyur// ma'o/ nan tu thul na ru na
197a2(rnying rgyud): mo baM/ zhes sngags gong ma bzhin du bzlas par bya ba ni myos par bya ba'i las so// de la gsang bar bya ba'i las ni/ 'di brtsam pa'i tshe/ mi smra bar dur khrod kyi ras blangs nas/ tshe dang lanu tshwa dang/ nyung nag gA mur dang / drag dang /
197a3(rnying rgyud): shing ni m+ba'i la'i lo ma dang / ka na ka'i khu ba dang / mi ro bsregs pa'i sol ba dang / mdzub mo'i khrag rnams bsres la stag tsha byas te/ bya rog gi sgo rtsal smyu gu bya ste/ 'khor lo gnyis ka la hU~M gnyis kyi bar du ming bri'o// bdag nyid
197a4(rnying rgyud): kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ ya mAn+ta ka'i skur bsgoms la/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs de ni shin tu ngan pa ring ba rdul ba cig mngon du 'dug par dmigs/ de'i lus dang spyi bo dang sgra mtshams dang / gnas rnams su rig sngags gzhan gyis
197a5(rnying rgyud): bsrungs pa bshigs la/ bdag gi drung na 'dug par dmigs la/ khro bo de yi 'khor yang sprul pa khro bo dang phra men gyi tshogs mang pos de'i rnam par shes pa dang / dbugs dang / dngas ma dang / srog med par byas shing phral ba ni/ dper
197a6(rnying rgyud): na khang pa stong pa dang 'dra bar lus dang shes pa phyal te/ sprul pa'i khro bo mtshon cha sna tshogs pa bstims pas/ lus dum bu brgyar gtubs te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / ljags shun dang / tshil dang / zhag dang /
197a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / glo snying dang nang khrol rnams rdul du brlag/ nyon mongs pa dug gsum zhal du bstab pa dang / khong du gsol te med par bsam mo// de nas yang brnan na/ gshin rje gshed po sprin nag po'i mdog dang 'dra ba/
197b1(rnying rgyud): nag po'i rgyabs bzhin du 'od nag po 'bar zhing 'khrugs pa/ ma he la zhan pa/ lAg na gshin rdo'i dbyug pa dang / zhugs pa thogs pa/ gsus pa rgyal mche ba gtsigs pa/ lus sprul nug pos btsun pa dang 'dra ba gcig 'ong rgyas/ yang dmu
197b2(rnying rgyud): pa de la be con gyis brgyab nas bsad de/ snying la sogs pa kun zos par bsam zhing bzlas pa 'di bya'o// A~M hrIHSh+T+r-iHbiwa d+ha nAn d+ho hU~M phaT phuT/ d+h+r-i che ge mo mA ra yA hU~M phaT/ hrIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ zhes pa
197b3(rnying rgyud): bsdad pa'i las so// yang gsad pa'i lus la/ gong nas 'thung ba bzhin du yo byad bsags la 'khor lo rtsi bi sa margyan gnyi sa l-i/ hU~M gnyis kyi bar du ming bri/ bdag nyid kyang gong nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsgoms la/ del bo gang la
197b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs de kha dog dang dbyibs kyang mi ro 'dra ba zhig/ mi nag po 'bar ba'i dkyil na 'dug par dmigs la/ de nas khro bo mang po phyag na ral gri dang / ber ga dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang ste'u ka dang / gzhu dang mda' dang / 'a
197b5(rnying rgyud): lo dang / tri shUl dang / dbyug pa dang / mdung dang rgyu glam phyed ma la sogs pa'i phyag cha mang po bsnams byas/ de la brku ba ste dumabur gtubs pa la/ bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / wa dang / sha za srin po dang / ma myo
197b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro med po stod cing bzhid 'thogs par bsam mo// de lta bur bsgom la bzlas brjod 'di bya'o// A~M hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ che ge mo mA rA ya hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i ShA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ zhes pa ni
197b7(rnying rgyud): bsad pa'i las so// de la dbye ba'i las ni/ gong nas drag po'i las 'byung ba bzhin du/ 'am mo gnyis la~M/ phaT gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming bris te/ b+har+m+ma ba spyir gyi nang du badz+ra ga nas/ tshon thig sngon pos dkris te/
198a1(rnying rgyud): byed tsam na du gathod du song la/ sa 'anas pa 'og tu n+d+ha bcug ste/ bdag nyid yas n+ta ka'i rdul 'byor dubyas nas 'dug ste/ mdun du rgyu dang ma he gnyis la gdu lan pa'i ming can gnyis nyan par byasams la/ dganyis su lag na
198a2(rnying rgyud): sa pogs pas/ gcizhi gtig ma ga bas gcigags gas pa / ban sa da de ma ma no// 'dus 'ad
198a3(rnying rgyud): myo 'thab par gyur cig/ ba ces parna pa ni bya ba'ims so// del bskang pa'i bas ni/ gong nas spos bzhin 'khor mo gnyis bris la/ tshig mo mar ya phan rjes bris la/ zlab kyong du brtag la/ spyad pan sa sa dkris te/
198a4(rnying rgyud): yod du song la/ sa brkos par bcug la/ bdag nyid laman+ta ka'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor zug mgron pa phyogs kun nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btags pa'i dbus su ma skyon pa gcig bsgom ste/ de las
198a5(rnying rgyud): po gcig tu gyur pa las/ gang la bya ba'i ming btsun nas/ kha phyogs su bstan te/ 'og nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis btegs/ chub nas rdo rje khro bos sbrul/ mdun nus rdo rma tho bos khrid nas/ myur bar mtshams
198a6(rnying rgyud): 'das te song bar bsgoms la/ bzlas brjid 'di bye// po ga ldan na d+h+ri d+ha pan phun/ tshig mo spyod par gyur cig/ phaT ces thu ba ni bskrad pa'i las so// de nas tsha bo ya mA n+taka zhom pa'i mas dang ga zhag dang / thal
198a7(rnying rgyud): glen sa drug / yun dru dag / nyung dag gi me dang / kau na ka ri la ma dang / rdo rdo rje churnams smar te/ drar khrod kyi ngas la 'thor lo gnyis/ mthus pa seM dral bus legs pa dun shin rje'i lus
198b1(rnying rgyud): nas/ gzugs kyi mang bar rdzas nag rnam ba par 'jog// bsad pa'i las ni/ gzhan ga // dbya ba'i las na/ saha ga na na byu// bsla pa'i bdan/ rnam pa cwab turgyan nab ngas na/ blang nga
198b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la'o// dbang gi las ni/ bud med kyi snying gar ro// rgyas pa'i las ni/ glang po che'i rgyab tu bya'o// yid mnan pa ni/ lug gi khong pa'am snying gar ro// mnan pa'i las ni/ ri rab kyi nang du'o// 'gugs pa'i la
198b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ ri drags sha ba dang seng ge'i rgyab tu bya'o// de la sogs pa las gang byed kyang / ma nor bar so so re re bri'o// de nas gi wang dam gur gum gyis gro ga'am ras dkar la bris la/ kham sa'i gab tsher/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa byas da de ga
198b4(rnying rgyud): go// bye rog gi sgo rtsal las gang la bya ba'i smyug gu bya'o// de bzhin du drag po la sogs pa ni nyi ma phyed na bri zhing las bya'o// snod kyang b+ham+b+ha kha sbyor du bya'o// de bzhin du las kun la so sor sbyar ro// de nas bdag gi sems rnam par dag par byas la/
198b5(rnying rgyud): rje sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor du bya ba ni/ bdag dang mi gnyis par byas la/ gnas dben sar 'dug ste// rang gi paSh+Ta a mr-i ta sa mchod do// zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las ni nga'i bar du ming bri'o// dbye ba dang drag po'i las ya'i ming du bri'o//
198b6(rnying rgyud): gang byed pa'i kha dog ma nor bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi bsnyen pa rdzogs shing grangs tshong bar byas na/ mi 'grub mi srid do// bzlas pa grangs ma tshang zhing las nor na slar ldog cing mi 'grub bo// drag po dang dbye ba dang bskrad pa la sogs
198b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ri mo bris pa dang / sdod kha sbyar la sogs pa'i las de mi byed na/ sa gzhan du sba/ bar der rang gi khyim du bzhag na/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'thab pa dang gnod pa 'byung bas bzhag tu mi rung ngo // snga la bsnyen pa byas nas/
199a1(rnying rgyud): nas gdod las bya'o// bsnyen pa'i tshe me tshig gis bar gcad du mi rung ngo // bsnyen pa'i grangs ni 'bum phrag gcig yan chud do// dkyil 'khor brin/ thig sbyor dam pa gsum pa la/ dbus su theg bzhabatu
199a2(rnying rgyud): pas re'u cha dgu bya'o// bar pa'i rim pa la rezhwa cha che ba bcu gnyis su bya/ tha ma'i rim pa la re'u cha bcu drug tu bya'o// re'u cha kun la sngags bri ba ni 'di'o// ya ma rU dzas do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yod ya/ ya yo nI rA ya? k+She ya/ yats+tsha
199a3(rnying rgyud): nI rA ma ya/ dbus su ya bris la/ 'khor lo'i dbus su ya dang ya'i bar du'am/ dza dang dza'i bar du ming bri/ phyi rim du hU~M dang byang gri bar du snying po sngags 'bru re re bri'o// bar du snying po d+he rI bri ba ni/ yi ge'i rgyal po yin pas rab tu dri'o//
199a4(rnying rgyud): yi gri kun reg lnga reg tu mi rung ngo // ka kha dang yi ge bri ba kun g.yas su bskor zhing bri'o// thig skor gyis bar chod par bya'o// rim pa bar pa la yang tha ma bzhin snying po kun bri'o// IM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'jam pa
199a5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje nag po'i tAn+tu las/ man ngag gsang ba las dgu pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas las bya dgos na/ bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dbang dang dbye ba dang / zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / gang byed pa'i las ming dang
199a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs ldan par bri zhing / ri mo zin pa dang / sA la lha phrug lan bdun tsam mgos gtugs te btsal la de la mchod pa dang / gtor ma la sogs pa phul nas/ gshin rje las bden pa 'di grub par gyur cig swA hA/ byas la/ de nas ma bris pa'i
199a7(rnying rgyud): sa stong yod sar/ hUM phaT hU~M phaT ces bya ba phyis bri'o// hU~M dang paT ni thugs kyi sngags yin pas kun labri'o// lha ya mAn+ta ka sngal bsten pa bya ba'i bsgom pa ni/ ma he la sogs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na brgyad bskum du bzhugs pa/
199b1(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ gsus pa che la sla bam pa gyen du 'bar ba/ yan lag kun sbal 'bar bas brkun pa/ g.yas gsum ni 'khor lo dang ral gri dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon gsum ni las gang phyed pa 'dzin pas ci yang mi bsdams so//
199b2(rnying rgyud): yum lha mo be tA lI dang / lha mo ro langs ma gnyis g.yas g.yon na bzhugs pa/ g.yas na bzhugs pa'i phyag g.yas na dgra sta bsdams pa/ phyag g.yon yab kyi sgra la 'khyud pa/ g.yon na 'azhugs pa'i phyag g.yon na zhags pa bsnams
199b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ phyag g.yas kyis yab kyi sku la 'khyud pa/ yum gnyis ni sku mdog dang phyug mtshan rgyan dang cha lugs gtso bo dang mthun par gnas pa/ yab las dbu 'phang dma' bar mtshungs shing spyan rtsa dmar ba gtso bo la 'dud pa/ yab yum gnyi
199b4(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i gsang ba'i rol pa las/ khro chung mang pos phyogs mtshams zil gyis mnan nas/ zhal nas rang rang gi sngags sgra sgrogs pa/ phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa bsdams pa/ gang la bya ba rdul du rlog pa/ de lta bur
199b5(rnying rgyud): rang nyams su lon nas/ gzod bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya ba ste/ gzugs brtan gyi mdun du gsol ba btab la/ gdod las bya'o// de yang las thams cad grub par 'dod na/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin bsreg byas na
199b6(rnying rgyud): lta ba bzhin du las grub pa'o// mchog tu yang nye ba dbye ba'i thabs la/ bya rog dang 'ug pa'i dong rul bya ste/ bzlas brjod bya ba ni/ oM kA lings sangs/ ku nan sha ra kri ti dza/ zhes bskul bar bya'o// de nas dong cho ga gang po cig
199b7(rnying rgyud): 'og tu byas la/ nang kyi sol gyis bkang ste/ grog la khrag snga gsum gyis che ge mo'i gzugs byas la/ dong du gzhug/ 'job stong du phyin nas/ nyi ma phyed pa dang / nub pa dang / nam phyed dang / gung yol la/ bu ras ker gyi rgya

200a2(rnying rgyud): bsad ci dbye ba'i lham // las grub pa'i rna 'dodan/ dpas da kyi kyim bas smra la/ de ltar 'a dge bzhin / mchog byed na gamo zhig bsrogs la spyad pa stsasas nga kyi
200a3(rnying rgyud): na mig samacan song ste/ yAm n+ya/ dpal mchogs tid de 'dzin du zhugs la/ brjod par bya'o// hrI br-id+hi gyi zhes byazlas pa dang / srang te sra ka hU~M zhes kyang bzlas so// de nas rigs kyi tha 'dod kyi thob sa shi kyi
200a4(rnying rgyud): gcol ba'o// skyabs sgra gsol na las ni 'grub bo// rdeg gi stong pa srid pas spyan gyis gso'o// gnod pa 'grol na/ klu rigs byezhi las nag po dkrol bar bya'o// de'i sngags la/ oM badz+re kr-in gu lamakhor hU~M zhes
200a5(rnying rgyud): byad ste ma khrul/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas yang bdag la gnod par byed pazhi gA 'dis nas/ de la mgu par byasmra la/ gtam 'jam por lta zhing 'ang ba bzlas so// lkoka ta kat+ta g+ha sa ra ya bi shom dA nas ra pa lod+hi zhes na
200a6(rnying rgyud): sdong po'i sems yod pa zhi bar 'gyur te/ dri rang gi gnas su phyin nas snang / yid migs la te myos par 'gyur ngo ro// yang las rnams gcig la/ ras chen po dang / zlab ma'i ma ma dung / rus rnying pa dang / grogs ma bar bye
200a7(rnying rgyud): ma ci'ibrim sa spongs/ drirgyas kyi / dmas pa'i gzugs brgyags/ maungs byas nas par byedag kyi/ lus brgyam zhing 'dra' 'du shes so// na ma mi/ 'bye du
200b1(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyis/ thugs pa dang / khyi nAg po'i thod par brtag la/ zla ba nya' ma shi kha la/ lam rgya gram chen po 'am mkhar chan pa'i sgo ltar mnan no// oM hrIHdz+dzaHbi kr-i tA nan che ga mo mA ra ya dza / ta ki ta sod tanAn+d+han+tu
200b2(rnying rgyud): b+ha che ge mo nan/ zhes drag po las kyi ting nge 'dzin bya'o// AM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha kA la rU pa hU~M phaT/ gang bsgrub kyang sku rgyan gcig pa/ bsgom zhing mi brjed pa'i gzungs dran par bya'o// 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po'i tan+ta las
200b3(rnying rgyud): spyir gtang ba'i man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas mgon po gshin rje'i gshed// shin tu dregs par khros nas kyang // yang dag gsang ba'i nges don las// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de
200b4(rnying rgyud): dag chad pas gcad pa'i phyir// drag po'i sngags zor las 'di gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i dgra bo la// thun dang zor gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// dben pa'i dur khrod gnas song la// lus ngag yid gsum gus pa yis// gshin rje'i
200b5(rnying rgyud): gshed la phyag btsal nas// gshin rje'i dgra ni spyan drangs te// ya maN+DaHgdul bar bya'o// ya ma rA tse spyan drangs te// gang la bya ba gdul bar bya// de yi las su bstan pa yang // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dam rdzas lnga/
200b6(rnying rgyud): yis chag chag gdab// dkyil 'khor mthing nag grwa gsum bri// mgo bo rang gi phyogs smra bstan// ya man+ta ka ya ba um dang // ya maN+Da tsasta d+ma dmyal dang // lcags kyi srung mo mang po dgod// bdag nyid drag po yab yum bsgom// gtsud
200b7(rnying rgyud): ma ya ma hA tsar bsgom// pho nya 'joms pa'i las byed ma// lcags kyi skyang mor la gcig bsgom// dmardzas yo byad tshong bar bsag/ rnam shes dbang po dgug pa'i phyir// dgra bo 'grug pa'i pho nya gtang // dpal gyi phyag ba
201a1(rnying rgyud): ni// tang nga 'dzin ni gastsal bskum la// sprul pa po nya 'dag tung // / dpal kyi ga brnyan thug ga rdo sgomam// zug mdog dmar logs ru gro len bya can// spyan mig tama'i ba dang ldan dad
201a2(rnying rgyud): ma mo sngags bu'i rtsel bskal pa'i mtshon 'bar// dag po nyams pani snying 'byin chag par bcangs nas gsol// khros pa'i khrag mdag dmar po khrag gi mchi ma 'jig/ lhag pa'i stabs ni lcags kyi spyang ba 'dra // skad ni nam /
201a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'brug pas che// bang ni bar snang glog pas shin tu mgyogs// zangs sder dmar po dbang gi lag pa na// dmigs pa bye'u phug sha rjen brnam pa ltar// 'gal byed 'byung po'i doni snying skar gyis 'debs// phung po rdul phran bzhin du
201a4(rnying rgyud): 'dul// gzugs kyi phung po ma yin par// rnam par shes pa khyer la shog/ de ltar yang dang yang bkug nas// gzugs la phab ste gla gul gyis bdug/ drag po thun gyi sngags kyis gdab// khru gcig po ta mi bzad ma// phyug
201a5(rnying rgyud): gyi sprang mo ral gcig ma// mig nas khrag gi tsha tshe 'phro// kha nas skad 'don cor re// ral pa sbags pa'i sgra gseb nas// khro chu khol ma'i sbyin 'dang 'bebs// rkang lag lcags kyi sder mo la// gnams med par skar gyis 'dabs/
201a6(rnying rgyud): ri lung med par rjes kyis 'gengs// zas su sems can gson por za// mngag pa'i gnas su yud kyis phyin// gang la bya ba'i dgra bo de// mthogs myur du khrid la shog/ dang por zhe sdang pa yi snyed// bar du 'dod chags ma yi mngal//
201a7(rnying rgyud): de nas dri za nye bar 'khor// tha ma nyon mongs lnga yi gzugs// lnga phung rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// gshin rje ma mo pho nya rnams// thogs med 'jigs pa'i sku sprul la// mgo bo'i dkyil du khrag zor la// nyan pa'i rnal khrag zor
201b1(rnying rgyud): ya// sdom pa'i sna la khrag zor ya// sla ba'i lcel khrag zor la// dran pa'i snying la khrag zor la// 'gro ba'i rlung la khrag rdor ya// yul 'khor khyi ma la khrug zod pa// nor gyi dbyig la khrag zong la// dog gi rtal khrag zor la// murbad+had+d+hA/
201b2(rnying rgyud): gso pa// rab sa mas// zhag da nga shA 'aM rtags so/ khyod thas ma gas / sa nan// snyi rgyag smos shag pa bya// rnam shes thos shig shug shag sa// dug rnam gan
201b3(rnying rgyud): hrIShA hi raM// gzugs phung choms shig sunr-i dzI/ yan lag chings shig dza tridza dza// zhes brjod pa/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa zor dang bcas la 'phang ngo // de nas dam nyams dgra bo de// 'tshor ba med par bya ba'i phyir/
201b4(rnying rgyud): mo mi zan nyid la gtad// ma bdud dpon g.yog gsum la gtad// ya ma rA tsa nyid la gtad// gtad pa'i sngags la/ i u a sa ma ya/ thibs thibs/ la sher ya de sod/ oM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ShaM/ ma mA mu ru things
201b5(rnying rgyud): thibs/ thabs pra phur ka shra baM/ rbad thu ri li li/ thig nig gcig med gnyis drag brgyad bcad/ nam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ badron ne phaT/ badz+ra ra ra te phaT/ badz+ra dza ta te phaT/ badz+rod te phaT/
201b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra i ting nA ga le/ nA ga le/ sum pa le/ tsi na yang tsin yang / len yang len yang / dgra po che ge mo mA ra ya dzaH/ drag tu kun 'joms dan sngags 'di// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// dgra dgegs gzhan lta ci smos
201b7(rnying rgyud): dgos// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags zor 'phang pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gshin rje gshed po yis// 'chi mod le'u 'di bka' stsal to// skyes pa'i chos rnams 'jig par rab tu
202a1(rnying rgyud): bstan// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha' mnyam par bstan// gnod cing gdug pa'i phyogs rnams malus grol mdzod pa// mgon po gshin rje chags la phyag 'tshal la// 'angam dpal gyi
202a2(rnying rgyud): drun stong gi nang nas// 'jam dpal rigs par bstan te/ rigs pa'ang ma dpal dang drug go// ye shes sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi dang brgya'o// las rnam par 'byed pa'i lce'u seM do// 'phags sa kyi 'di gas
202a3(rnying rgyud): gyis// thams cad kun la khyab par gnas bya'o// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dpal byang ma lus kun// reg pa khyad par kun las 'phags pa yis// las rnams dkyil 'khor chen po 'di brtsam mo// dkyil 'khor rtsibs stong bcu

202a5(rnying rgyud): brdeg rdzing gsad par bya'o// rdo rje rtsi gcig phyag rgya bcas nas brdeg/ A~M badz+ra ya ma rAHhU~M hU~M phaT phaT a zhes gags so// de nas gnan pa'i las bya ste// ya mar tsa'i phrin las brtsam// de nas las rnams bcol ba ni//
202a6(rnying rgyud): las 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa ni// thams cad dbang du spad pa'i gshin rje gshed// dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pani// zhabs gnyis gyur
202a7(rnying rgyud): 'dor thabs klu rgyal zil gyis gnon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi brkyang bskum bgegs rnams rdul du rlog/ sbrul sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa ni// bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag kyang ching bar mdzad// phyag dgu kyi dang pon// rdorje
202b1(rnying rgyud): dbyug pa be con dang // sbrul dang thong rlon dgra sta bsdams pa dang // gser gyi zor ba zlum pam rnams// lcags kyi phur ba zu ru gsum 'phro// phyag dgu g.yon gyi dang po na// b+han+d+ha tshal pa rak+tas gtams// ba swa ta ye zhags pa dang // bus pa'i
202b2(rnying rgyud): zheng chung zhal du rngubs// thod phreng 'khor lo dril bu dang // tri shU la ral gri phur pa yis// che ge mo zhig mA ra ya/ oM badz+ra kA la rU pa ya ma rA tsa hU~M phaT ta a/ ma hA na ma ya~M nan/ zhes brdeg go// de nas phyag brnyan sprul pa mo bzhi mngag ting
202b3(rnying rgyud): las bcol pa 'di skad do// hU~M/ dpal gyi bka' nyan khrag gi dri sgom ma// dbang byed chen mo kun gyi gtso mo ste// khrag gi dri tshor dpag tshad brgya de khri bzhi stong rgyag/ bud med lus la 'jigs byed sbyang mo'i gdong // khaM nas me 'bar rgya ma

202b5(rnying rgyud): gdod chen mo'i dus la bab// che ge mo hrIHSh+T+r-iHma ra tsa rA nan/ da ni lcags kyi srung mo dbu dgu ma bskul zhing las bcol te 'di skad do// b+h+rU~M/ lcags kyi spyad mo dbu dgu ma// lag brgyad rkang brgyad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// chibs su

202b7(rnying rgyud): rA tsi kA la rU pa hrIHSh+T+r-iH/ gung gung traM tra~M d+hi la che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT zhes brdeg go// de nas dpal ldan ma bskul ba 'di skad do// hU~M/ ye shes mkha' lding ma mo'i dpal// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i byin rlabs can// bar snang khams la gnas
203a1(rnying rgyud): bcas shing // khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// lcags kyi bya khwa chen mo ni// ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin// kha 'bar rnams kyi gtso mo ste// 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang byed ma// 'jig rten
203a2(rnying rgyud): dbang du sdud pa mo// gzigs pa'i go 'phang nam mkhyu' 'dra// gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog ltar mgyogs// g.yas kyi gshog pa brdab pa yis// bdud dang srin po rdul du rlob// g.yon gyi gshog pa brngub bA yis// che ge mo zhing
203a3(rnying rgyud): dbang du bsdu// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// oM badz+ra kA la rU pa ya ma rA tsa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ dun dran tsit+ta ma la b+h+yo b+h+yo khyA hrI/ de nas dbang byed gshin rje kha 'bar ma bskul zhing las bcol ba 'di skad do// gshin rje'i sring gcig khA'ang ra ma/

203a5(rnying rgyud): zhags 'dzin// la la'i lag na thong phreng 'dzin// la la zhing bcu gnas su 'dren// la la mo khyer rgya mtsho skems// la la 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin// la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin// la la pho nya 'grogs shing 'dzin// sngags pa

204a1(rnying rgyud): btsal nas// dmigs pa'i tan du du gzugs smras nasas// mchod pa'i dmadzas tshogs par bkram pa ni// rtswa yen la 'thor chen pa bsgoms nas ni// sngon dathaba'i bsnyen pardzogasu pa rdzu / s+ya hrI ya myaHka k+Sha
204a2(rnying rgyud): pa hUM phaT/ de nas dgra bo'i rang bzhin gyi gnas su sra bar bya ste/ dgra bo'i ling+ka bcas la/ pad+ma rak+ta dang / shing aM byi sha'i me tog kha 'bus pa bkus la/ pad+ma rak+ta dang gnyis bsres la/ yi ge 'di dri'o// oM pa rig mo ya ma ra
204a3(rnying rgyud): tsal+r-iT/ de nas ba con gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ sdug 'di rnaMs so// I badz+ra rA pa ta bI tri hi he ha nya a a/ de nas gsang ba'i yang rnying 'dzi/ te mu gcig tu bzlas so// oM badz+ra pA la rlu / ka ti kha ta ma nA d+har/ mi tad ni dI sa pa
204a4(rnying rgyud): che ge mo zhig d+hid d+hid mA ra na dza zhes brdeg go// de nas nam gyi gung la/ phyag rgya lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung dang / g.yon pa'i mthe po gnyis sbyar la/ sor mo gzhan bsgrengs te/ sngags 'dis bdeg go// oM badz+ra ni ra ti na
204a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kA la nub hUM/ mA ra ya phaT/ rjes dgug la bcings shing mnan no// de nas yang ti nge 'dzin bsar la/ phyag rgya 'og nas 'byung ba bcas te/ rtsa ba'i snying po 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra kA la d+ha pa ya ma rA tsi hrI hUM hUM phaT marba dzaT/ lag
204a6(rnying rgyud): pu gnyis gung ma~M ce spang la/ sor mo gzhan phyir dgye bar byas la brdeg go// de nas lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo gnyis nang du myur la/ oM badz+ra kA la rUpa ba lid+d+ha b+ha ma ru hUM hUM phaT ces kyang brdeg go// de nas yang sngags 'di snyid rtsa gcig bzlas so//
204a7(rnying rgyud): btu hU~Mg d+ha ba thal pan/ kha la ga N+DI ti te/ 'dzin ti/ yangs ho// ra ti/ zhes dza nyi ma'i phyag rgya bcas la 'dag cing bsgyur ro// de bden gshegs pa de sang gi bu mthar byin par byung to// gas ga
204b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ta rnams/ thugs rdo phrin las lcags ba gter 'byung kyi les skye bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dgyes pa chen po'i longs spyod las/ longs spyod las kyi dngos grub che// phrin las mngon du 'di bstan na// ma she
204b2(rnying rgyud): ci po dag/ rdo rje gsang pa'i gshin rje'i gshed// rgyal po grub pa'i phrin las la// yang dag nges pa 'di bstan no// dgra dang bgegs dang bdud dang ni/ srin po zag dang rgya ser da // gzugs dang rnam par shes pa rnams// dra na pa
204b3(rnying rgyud): po dag la gtud// las kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// mgron pogashin je'i gra shed kyis gsungs// rngo na bsnyen pa dogs par bya'o// dang por NA yi sog pa gcig la/ bru grul nag po dang / yang ba dang / gro anA ngan 'thag dang / gi 8/
204b4(rnying rgyud): stobs kyi danas byed pa/ srog pa ladas sa skyes pa/ 'i nyi du shog shigagang / srog 'amangs sa ma nga ldan pa/ mgon pog shi ti dag po'am/ thabadu nan pa'i gzugs thos pa/ dngar
204b5(rnying rgyud): skyenas 'di bram pa rnas // sbyin mod rten b+hi thA yaT+Ta/ tshig mo bang du sgyus shig paT a yang sa zhes nas s+ho// de nas basmras pa dang / tsA ba tsug cagasum pacas la bgrub par gyi'o// bdag gis zangs
204b6(rnying rgyud): sa pad+mad/ rgyami gun yod dus pa'i bcug la/ 'grus 'di rnas so// hU~M ba / na b+h+ya/ ya na zhag// chen mo thos dus zhes banas na// dag 'i sanon rgyabatu ba cas s+ho// 'a ba bas mnor bar
204b7(rnying rgyud): me lam com lo// de nas yang rig+sa l-I sgo'i phyag rgya bcas pa/ A~M la ma rgyadz+dza/ oM tha~Mng rdzi sa ma ma brjeg pa \u0f7f/ de nas nyis gsum pa la/ rdo rje rgyan te'i phyag rgya bcas la brdeg go// oM ma ma ngan dran la
205a1(rnying rgyud): ta rA wan tar ro ha hU~M phaT/ de nas nyin zhag bzhi ba dang lnga ba la sngags 'di bzlas s+ho// A yA mu d+haH swA tI gung gung dzo dza phaT sa dri dIn hU~M phaT/ skyes thal mo sbar la stong rtsa gcig bzlas shing bskor bar bya'o// del
205a2(rnying rgyud): ni 'di bskyed do// gnyen po stobs kyis bsgom par bya// zhes bya ste/ A~M AHhU~M zhes brjod pas ni// A~M ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs// AHni lce yi snying du'o// hU~M ni thugs ka nyid du bsgom// 'od zer dag ni rnam 'phros rje// bdas
205a3(rnying rgyud): lus nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur// phaT ces de bzhin brjod pa ni// 'jig rten khams ni 'od kyis khengs// 'jig rten bsreg pa ma yin te// 'od kyi ye shes me ltar 'bar// gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa// kun gyi stong nyid de yin no//
205a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba yang // nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig mnyam// chu zla'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// sgyu ma ji bzhin sems nyid de dang 'dra// dngos dang dngos po mtshan ma mi dmigs pa// chos nyid dang du dbyer med mnyam//
205a5(rnying rgyud): yod de yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang kha dog yul las 'das// med de med pa ma yin te// stong pa nyid las cho 'phrul 'byung // rtog med dpyod dang bral bas stong nyid dbyings// dmigs med mkha' dang mnyam pas byang chub sems// de
205a6(rnying rgyud): ltar sems nyid gtan lA phab// chos kyi dbyings dang gnyis med bsgom// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu nyid hU~M du gyur pa las// spro bsdu tshul bzhin byas nas ni// oM a mr-i ta ha ka zhes brjod pas/ nyon mongs mthar byed gshin rje
205a7(rnying rgyud): gshed// sku ni lhag gis bskyed la bsgom// dbu gsum phyag zug mdog dmar nag/ rin po che yi dra bas brgyan// dbu skra kham nag gye ni du 'khyil// zhal g.yas mthing nag g.yon ljang nag/ dbus ni sgra dang mthun te dmar nag po
205b1(rnying rgyud): de la phyag g.yas kyi dang pon/ prod at+ma na yi zhags pa bsdams pa/ bar man 'khor lo// tham na zhing gi dbyug pa/ g.yon tarta lcang po can raHsa bkang ba/ par mAn zhing gi snying zab/ tha ma rdo rje kha N+Dig bsnams pa/ zhabs dkyang bsrum/
205b2(rnying rgyud): du bzhugs pa// yum yang g.yon du bskyed do// de ltar bsgom pa'i rim pa bstan nas/ dkyil 'khor yang rin po che'i dra ba lta bur b+ha'o// dra ba'i mig bdun nas/ rin po che'i mig bdun du bskag pa hriM/ mtha' ma la sbrul gyi zhags pa
205b3(rnying rgyud): briskor/ dkyil 'khod kyi dbus su mr-i khA zlum po bri/ de'i steng du rdzas dang ga bu bzhag la/ phrin lasu gzhung bzhin du bad+ma bAH/ dmigs bzhag nyi shu rtsa ldan dbang du 'gyur ro// de dag kyil dra ba'i le'u brtan pa'o// de nas
205b4(rnying rgyud): phrinA las bstan ti/ dkyil 'khor zlum po gcig byas te/ sgo nub tu bstan pa de'i steng du/ mu lU he he yi ge bcwa bdun bI'o// de de dbus su dz+wa la kha ka da pa 'khrug par hU~M/ sum gyi khar dA ma'i gzugs bris la/ bdag nyid bu dan po
205b5(rnying rgyud): klu'i phyag rgyab cas la/ sngags 'di bzlas so// oM b+hadz+nyA nA ga ta dz+re trUM/ oM badz+ra nA~M ga ta ya yaM/ nA ga gi ta pra mar stan che ge mo kle kha hU~M phaT/ zhes phyag rgya gzugastsa la brdeg go// den+tas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa lA d+ya srubs te/ phyag rgya mthun/ sngag
205b6(rnying rgyud): l-I/ oM badz+ra d+ha ba t+tA rje / oM badz+ra nA ga ta yaM ye/ oM bdun gto rang ring / A~M badz+rA na ga dz+dzaH/ bdun tshe bar pal 'di bzlas so// oM badz+ra dz+ra gta ma na/ oM badz+ran ga ta kr-i \u0f89\u0fa4/ ga ta Ta phaT+Ta/ yo d+haT+Ta ba tA swAhA/ dbus bdu
205b7(rnying rgyud): 'di bzlas so// oM badz+ra sa ma yang du d+h+r-ig// khablang pra mngan gag sa 'o/ kham mo/ sI ri la phaT/ de ltar 'dzang grangs kyang nas/ de'i chos rgya gtugs kyi la gtad de/ skyeng che ba 'bar ba'i rna kyi / bdag gi byang
206a1(rnying rgyud): man thun lan rgyas na nasu na dugs sgyums du sa ba ma nas na sus sa sa nga gags pa na
206a2(rnying rgyud): smon pa can tu bzang po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dpal kyi beb nas dgongs te/ phrin las tI pa tha 'di gsungs so// theg pa gsum gyi ngas 'byud la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnang // ji skye sangs rgyas thams cad
206a3(rnying rgyud): b+h+rUM// sbyin las rmad chen ci spangs pa// gcig tu gsungs pa 'dun 'dir 'dus// yang dag phrin las don chen 'di// rdzogs pa chen po'i don du bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor badra 'dab brgyad la// mu byung rgan po gcig byas la//
206a4(rnying rgyud): phreng ba dgod par bya// de yi gyi rim ma khyud la// rin rjen phreng ba dgod par bya// de yi tshe rim sa thud la// phur pa lnga brgya rtsa brgyad kyis// dkyil 'khor na la bskor bar bya// dar gyi cod pan re res bstan// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi
206a5(rnying rgyud): e ne phragasum brdeg par bya// zhes gsungs te/ de'i steng du dgra po'i rkang rjes kyis dang / khrag chen dang / gu gul nag po bkrus pa'i khubs brdzis pa la/ dgra pa'i gzugs byas la/ b+han+ta gcigs phyirolaH/ gi gling gis 'jo
206a6(rnying rgyud): rtsi byas brgyad phragacigazis// wAn+ta gcig gi phyi rol du pad+ma'i rIkas pad+ma 'dab ma bskrad pa zlas la/ der bcug la basbyar nas/ dog pa dam pos rgyagra mdu brjid do// tsi tshul gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgya la phyogs brji rgyud dmarang po bzhi dgon/
206a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma mang pa ni ga blo bzhid zur pa dmar po bzhid gon// de nas ting 'dzin rim gyis ni// gnod sbyinam par byed pa rnam nas ni// bskyed pa'i sngags ni 'di 'a // mA~M badza la na ya ma nA nga yin / de nas dkyil 'dzang byin gyis ba
206b1(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di lan nyi shu gcig tu bzlas so// mA~M dz+wA ya yo khaM me tA ha mu kha d+hIHr+m+mA ya mA rAH phaT/ de nas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgyas// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dkyi lnga 'khor bskor zhing / phyag rgyas b+hin gyis brlab po// de nas nub phyogs su
206b2(rnying rgyud): khang ltas te/ gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi skur bsgom nas/ hom thab e gri gsum gyi nang du/ shug dud kyi me sbar zhing / gu gul nag pos bdug/ de'i steng du ka pA la 'khor lo bris pa bzhag la/ sngags 'di nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing phyag rgyas
206b3(rnying rgyud): brdeg go// oM badz+ra ma~M drA hrIhrISh+T+rIHbadz+ra nan/ de nas bsreg pa'i tha la brgyad la 'phyar/ dmigs pa khrag nad kyis btab nas mtha' ma brlag par 'gyur ro// gshin rje nag po'i tan+da las/ gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi thugs ye shes phrin las sra bstan pa'i
206b4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// / de nas srin po mthar byed kyi phrin las bstan te/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi glo 'bur can du bris la/ dbus su hU~M/ shar du ya/ lho sbyor te/ nub sgor ti/ byad sgon me/ glo 'bur bzhi la skul bzhi bri/ mtha'
206b5(rnying rgyud): ma mu lhad zlum po la/ sbrul gyi rgya bdun gyis bskor bar bri/ dkyil 'khor dbus su dmigs pa'i ping+ga bzhag la/ khrag chen gyis byug/ rkang lag bzhir tsan+dan dmar po'i phur pa btab la/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ snying po 'di nyin zhug
206b6(rnying rgyud): g+ha sum du bzlas shing brdeg go// AM badz+ra tsakr-i hrIHSh+NIHmU tA mu tru kha ta kha ta kyi ma ru ta/ thug pa phra ba kha ta ya ma rA tsa che ge mo mA ra ya khan bta/ nyin+da zhag gsum rdzogs pa dang / bya khyung gi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ sngags 'di yang brjod do//
206b7(rnying rgyud): AM ga ru Ta badz+ra ya ma rA tsa/ pa ra pa ta ki ra ngo na dz+wal raM khA hi hUM khA hi hU~M phaT/ de nas dgra'i gzugs rdul tshon gyis dang bcas nas/ klu yod nges pa'i chu mig gam/ lam srang bzhi mdo 'am/ dmangs rigs kyi dur khrod dam/ lha 'jig tan
207a1(rnying rgyud): po yod nges pa'i gnas khang gang rung pa gcig tu mnan no// bden pa brdar nas las bcol na dab bo rabs chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ srin po mthar byed kyi phrin las bstan pa'i la
207a2(rnying rgyud): dgu pa'o// / 'di nas mar srin mo bdun gyi phrin las bstan te/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bdun pa gcig bris la/ de'i steng du b+han+da lcang lo can gcig dgod/ b+haT+Ti'i nang du srin mo bdun gyi gzugs khrag sga gsum gyis bris la/
207a3(rnying rgyud): du dgra bo'i gzugs bris pa gzhug/ de nas bdag nyid ya ma rA dza/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub/ sku mdog stang zil ltar gnag pa ma he la zhon par bsgo sbal/ srin mo bdun rje mdog dmar la yan lag dgas pa/
207a4(rnying rgyud): ba/ mche ba dmar ba/ ral pa kham nag sked sor sleb pa/ g.yas thams cad na rgya zhugs rak+tas bkang ba bsnams pa/ g.yon b+han+ta ra~Mk+ta dmar gyis bkar nas 'thung ba/ rkang lag bzhi la rus chen gyi ster bas brgyan pa/ lus la klar
207a5(rnying rgyud): rlon gon pa/ shin tu rnga mardu ma 'dra bar bsams la/ de nas khrag chen dang / thal chen dang / gu gulha bkrus pa'i khu ba sbyar ba bskam btags pa'i phye ma la bsngags shing zhag bdun dra bsgrub bo// oM badz+ra ra wa si di nan che ge mo kha hi/ oM dz+ha
207a6(rnying rgyud): tra sau rI nan che ge mo khA hI/ oM badz+ra ma tang si ri nan tshe gI mo Sh+Ta hi/ oM badz+ra kha zang si ri nAn che ge mo khyA ti/ oM badra ya~M kar si rinan che ge mo ShA tI/ oM badz+ra mra te si ri na na che ge mo ShA ti/ oM badz+re mu tang si ri na na che ge ma khA hi zhes nyin zhag bdun gyi rang
207a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas shing phrin las bya'o// de nas bdag gi mgo bo la/ b+han+da lcang lo can gyis brgyan te/ spa dang // baspu dang / rkang lag gi mkhrig mi thams cad khrag chen gyis bslus la/ shar nas nub tu bltas la/ sngags 'di zhag gsum
207b1(rnying rgyud): pa dra ma yangs pa gdab bya// oM/ kha zab/ mun bza tho ba// e bri mra ga sa ma mAn+ta/ e khe s+'ut+ma/ da nas dag po'i gzugs byan nus phyung la/ sdod mar gcig gis brel ta/ dam du gtor ma byas la/ spyan mo bdun bskul ta la
207b2(rnying rgyud): bcol ba 'di skad do// A~M badz+ra sa mu ra/ bAr thag sa pra b+ha te/ traM khi tra ma e sa ra I I ba d+ha ma hU~M che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces brgya rtsa gcig tu bzlas nA dgra dbang du 'du nges so// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ srin mo bdun gyi phrin las bstan pa'i
207b3(rnying rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi rtsa ba'i phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor bskus nas bstan te/ dkyil 'khor gyi go rim rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mthun/ thub pa drug gi sgo gcod pa dang / bgegs mthar byed kyi
207b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / log 'dren mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / dmyal ba mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / yi dwags mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / byo
207b5(rnying rgyud): mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / klu mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / srin po mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang / dam
207b6(rnying rgyud): mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bstan pa dang dgra'o// gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las/ mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phrin las bsdus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / 'di nas mar byol sod mthar byed kyi thabs
207b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi phrin las bstan te/ glang po dag gi rgyab tu ni// dgra bo dag gi gzugs bkal nas// gan kyal gyi rgan bzhag par bya// de'i steng du gshin rje dgod// zhag bdun bar du bzlas pa 'di'o// oM badz+ra na ma b+han+d+ha sa he dang pra ba der hUM hUM phaT Ta
208a1(rnying rgyud): yan n+tu/ rgyamapa sa/ sdug ma sa sa/ mag na la s+ho/ masu m+b+ha la // / zhes pa na/ na la sgrub ban sh+tha// donas pa/ ga //
208a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin te/ de'i steng du dgod pa ni// yam na kro ta mgrin sngon no// zhag bdun par du bzlas pa 'da'o// A~M yA saN+Dag kro ti bar ga sa ya ha~MH/ TIg mo ba na 'dun to// trai b+hai rad+ha/ ma ma mad+hi me tho/ khyis ngas pa 'i bar bya'o//
208a3(rnying rgyud): par lug chub tu bya ni// log 'dzin mthar byed yab sum gnyis// zhag bdun par dbya ba man+tan// sngags 'di yongs pa med par bzlas// oM badz+ra d+ha n+ya ti mngag la 'bra\u0f89\u0fa4 ces par na ta drad po/ srin mo bre la'i rgyab tu khyab te// da
208a4(rnying rgyud): mthar byed yab yum gnyis// gzugs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// sngo badzin dag ya yAm mAd+ho/ mad+his can to/ rnga mo mahe'i thog tu bya ba ni// byol song mthar byed ga shin na yang yun sa// gzugs dang bzlas pa sngar bzhin//
208a5(rnying rgyud): ta swa trA na kan ta thab che ga mo byo// pra dang drug pa'i rgyab tu bya ba ni// klu rnams mthar byed gshin de yab yum gnyis// gzugs dang bzlas pa gong ma bzhin// oM badz+ra d+ha ga ta N+Di ya~M tha ra ra drug blo che ge mo la ts+tsha/ g.yag dang sbrang ku'i khyab tu bya ba 'aM// da
208a6(rnying rgyud): mthar byed gu shin de yab sum gnyis// gzugs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin// s+pho badz+ra lA tha man+ta sa rba na btse go mo pa hU~M/ ri bong ldan lag rgyab tu bya ba ni// srin po mthar byed gshin rje yab yum gnyis// gzugs dang bzlas pa snga ma bzhin//
208a7(rnying rgyud): gyur ba dru hU~M nga mdzes de blo cheg mol phyo/ sprul dang bye ba'i chu' thatha ba ni// dem grim par byed gshin de yab mam gnyis// gzugs dang bzlas bsdam bzhin// zhag bdun par du bsgrub par bya'o// I badz+ras rnaM pa gyi mi rdzu cheg
208b1(rnying rgyud): nan tan du ning bzhin bya'o// 'ang ma dang lug shin rje drug po'i rgyud las/ rgyab dkyil ba khyor zag cang bya ba'i 'ang ste hrI thAn gnyis pa'o// // de nas mugan pa gshin rjeg shin gyis/ phrin las yum kya du na na rjo na
208b2(rnying rgyud): so// dang por lpags pa bdag nyid khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kr-i cha lugs su zhugs la/ oM ya mAn+ta ka da~M/ ya me rA tsi hU~M zhes brjod pas/ khro bog shin rje'i gshed kyi skud gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/ 'jigs byed ya ma n+da mdzod kyis byung /
208b3(rnying rgyud): na'u che ba la yan lag rags pa/ sku mdog spug nag bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phros pas/ thams cad ya ma rA tsas gang bar bsgom mo// des gang la bya ba dbang du 'dus nas/ s+phar ya mAn+ta ka'i mdud na/ 'jom
208b4(rnying rgyud): byed chen po bka' ci stsal/ gang bsgo ba bslab par bgyi'o zhes 'khod pa la/ las su bya ba'i gnyer bsgo'o// de nas rmad du blud pa'i gtor ma chu gcig gi nang du/ bye la'i gcin/ byi la'i tshad/ lhag chen/ stag chung / ming ru
208b5(rnying rgyud): mar bcug la/ dug dang mar bsres la li ng+ka'i thog tu sgreng zhing las kyi gnyer gtad do// de yang zla ba mar ngo gza' skar ngan pa la bya'o// dang por sku rgyan gcig par gsal bar bskyed pa 'di skad ces bskul lo// rdzog tu ma chen dregs pa
208b6(rnying rgyud): po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang chen bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khro rngam gdug pas srid gsumathal par rlog// sgrol byed spu mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// srid bu gsum na khyod 'dra gzhan na med// khams gsum
208b7(rnying rgyud): byed zin las dus la bab// rang brjid gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// d+hu ma mA n+ta ka da hU~M dzaH/ gtum chen rab brjid gshin rje 'doms mdzod lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od stong phyogs bcu 'gyed// gtum chen mtshon cha mang
209a1(rnying rgyud): smra/ gan smra/ ma su / s+ho//
209a2(rnying rgyud): meng bang bachung podrod bgyis/ mapa'i ma ga nga rta bamagatu rdzun can// sathos pa sbya gsam pang sbed dpas chugs pa ring gamyon/ byin mam ma da pan/ bcang banam dadapas pa dulu ba ti da dag pa dang/ sngabs
209a3(rnying rgyud): so gra cig sebs dang thog pabangs// 'khor kyim ma rnams cing gtung ba byung da sas pa 'don// rab tu 'dir ning thed nas pa dang 'thong// cems ngam tho ba'i bad bdag brtags byas// 'khor gyi 'angornam pa ldang dadang dag da
209a4(rnying rgyud): 'ge bdun nan/ tshangs pa 'khor bcas rdul gyi theg 'dzag byeng // grwa chen byab 'jug papa de ba gnon// phyag dru b+ha rnon parab bsnams shing // spyir khrag dbugs shing grang khrag zhal du gsol// ljang dang drag pal bu'i thab sams shing // da
209a5(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa rnams la gtong bar mdzad// AMm ma bdun ratsa ts+tshanan/ rnal 'byor bdag la gdug rdzing 'gal byed pa'i// dgra rnams rab tu 'ching zhing phung bar mdzad du gsol// gshin rje nag po yam dAHgA shin je kun gyi'o// gtar gyi lha yang rtsod la po
209a6(rnying rgyud): dadebs na// dmigs pa'i mgonas rnams sems 'debs su gsol// khyog kyi sku dang na byad ce 'dra mthong bam// nadag ny-id srin po'i thogs rnams 'ad zhir 'bras/ wang chen sngon pom bad+mal ldid pa bags/ ce'abu thogs pa mdas byen
209a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ bdag la gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// yud tsam gyis ni thal bar brlag tu gsol// 'jigs byed de yi thugs dmar gyes bskul ma// e ka tsa ti gu h+ya ral gcig ma// mi pham khro gnyer g.yu ya~M ral gcig ma// ral ba s+kha
209b1(rnying rgyud): da gas pa nas// n+ya numug byug drug ltung 'ams byu gangs / na byang skye 'dags thugs kyang / b+h+yas pa ga rnams pas dmigs pa mag pa // gang 'bru thogs byang ba / pos tu
209b2(rnying rgyud): panyas ba zhes/ oM shrI sa kyid / gting brag hU~M ar+tha/ A~M ya mi nAnas nyim na ma tshig ma Ta/ ba'i la nad nan/ mdudadu cung dub chung tshig nanan/ tshal panan/ oM mying go sa la lasu ban nan/
209b3(rnying rgyud): dra grong baban canan/ ga mo mAr yan na/ zhes bskul zhing badreg go// de nas sbyin drung ban+de/ dbus phyogs mthong nag gru gsum 'bar ba'id kyil 'khor nas// mthing nag khaman gangal pa lakhyil pa'i na// rul pa'i me nag gyen du
209b4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// sum cu rtsa gsum kun kyang 'dar drug drug/ spyan mig sdang dgu gyen du bzlog pa yis// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun kyang gan bu pa bsre// sprin ma glog stong 'od du 'bar ba yis// sprul pa 'pho nya mang pos srid gsum 'gengs// sha
209b5(rnying rgyud): nas rlung byung rdo rje'i 'gribs nAg drug po yi ste// sa gzig mi rnyed bya skad thugs par byed// mche ba sa dkar pogatsigs pa yis// dgra bgegs srog rgya dmar po gcod par mdzad// zhal nas khro bo'i brda/ dbyung ba yis// 'ams
209b6(rnying rgyud): gsum mr-ing gisam 'phrul zhi sdig par byed// sku si ba bajigs pa'i mirtag s+ho// stong thams rjod kyis 'gengs shi das pa sreg/ phyug drug mtshan rgyagadug du ma b+h+yo // gdod pa'i dgra shegs sa byas pal ga/
209b7(rnying rgyud): dam bsgral log nas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam myod bsgral ma// e kaN ti rigs byed dpal gyi yum// rnal 'byor bdag gi/ dad pa dang ni mchog gis// tshwar gshegs tshur gshegs ma gcig lha mdzo dza na/
210a1(rnying rgyud): pa// / ma // / sdug dag na pa gas sa sa// su sa skabs du byu sa kun ga/ gas phyugs du gyu gzugs pags//
210a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtsa bdud nas dbyung du gsol// bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas gshegs su gros la// thugs dam bskul lo sems can don la bskul// dmigs pa bcol gyi yud tsam phrin las mngod// la sra rtag pa pa mA rnalaH/
210a3(rnying rgyud): k+Sho t+ya a mr-i ngaM/ de nas phyag btsal ba/ gdug pa 'dul mdzad gshin rje'i gshed kyi lha// sbrul dang rjod rnon mang pos sgra yi rgyun du sbas// rngam pa'i ros thams cad zil gyis gnon// dbrim ze gshin rje 'doms sdug 'a
210a4(rnying rgyud): gas du 'dus skyed pa gsum gyiste// drag thal mthu banyis gnad pa 'idam rnams 'jom // ba dag pa gtum thogs // sprul pa sa nana'i ska phyag 'acwapa 'o// 'gas byed sul la nyis shA bral
210a5(rnying rgyud): mo ral gcig gshin rje'i gshed kyi yum// su la ras kyi drukul na bza' gsol// ma gcig a ka Na ti'i skul phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mchod pa rim gyis phul nas ni// snying po mnor rtag tu bsnyen pa bya// de nas e buM gsum gyi
210a6(rnying rgyud): khong gi mag ma dang/ mkhar gang sem kyad tugs da de// su 'jams pa dmigs pad+ma na byas la/ yer babyug/ gdags kyi skyed pa das srung ba sngon das shes btsugs lagaNar par bya'i rdzog zigs pa ga ba / btsu
210a7(rnying rgyud): sngags pa'i lag par bsdu/ ma kyang zus/ ga gsu gal du 'bru/ gcig ti par gyur/ gcig tu nga bye 'dri ba ma 'du ga myed par / yin byung bar dag pa'as 'a kres pa
210b1(rnying rgyud): nab pathugs cing gdab/ gshin nag par byung las/ gsal zugs kyi 'thun nag po'i le na thas gas sa pa // nas pang mgan pagag byan cis/ dran pas la pra pa'i ma na dag sangs sa/
210b2(rnying rgyud): dang bar dben pa'i gnas sa ni// rdzas dang yo byang tshogs par bsham// dmigs pa'i bris gzugs palamanas // bden bsgrub mchod pa gzung bzhin bya// de nas lkug satshogs dpral// khwa dang bya rog drug pas bsngon//
210b3(rnying rgyud): ba ga/ sum btsug nasaH// sgo sdug par du meng nus bre// muda' nyid nag por byugs nas su// thun gyi bsnyen pa nag bdun gzugs// dmigs pa'i yid+ga la yang brdeg// sbed pa dgra me phyogs su 'phang // de la dang por
210b4(rnying rgyud): yirnal 'byor du bya ba ni// dang por bdag nyid sgra gtsug tu// yi ge hUM gcig gsal ba lngas// b+h+yo a kr-i man+ta shrI pa~M d+ha ya d+hI/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jas dpal gshin rje'i gsheng sgra mdog mazeng dag/ zhal gsum phyag drug dag
210b5(rnying rgyud): dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag/ zhal bgrang ma che ba gtsigs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po zheng gi dbyug pa/ par ma dgra sta/ tha ma ral gri/ g.yon dang po sdigs mdzub/ bar ma mdung thung / za mthong rnon dmar gyis bkang ba
210b6(rnying rgyud): zhabs gnyis sha za sen po gnon pa/ zhabs gnyis ma mo khrag 'thung gnon pa/ bzhi ka yang gyad kyi 'dor thabs su bzugs pa/ bdud dang srin po ma mo khrag 'thung bran bzhin du 'khol bar bsgom mo// de'i thugs gnas ye gco las 'phag
210b7(rnying rgyud): pasas na kyang 'thumam sgra mdag sdug nagazhalagacig phyagaganyis pas bsngo'i brag yan chad gtam pa ba sgom/ thugs kyi se mad nyid kyang / dpag ca kyi 'di dag lag la babyeb pa ltar/ yam rgya thugs pad nga su tha byung
211a1(rnying rgyud): brgyab pas/ slar mi ldob par bsgom mo// thugs mnga' 'di nyid skar mnga' lam du zhugs pa'am/ me stag pus btab pa bzhin/ las dang nyon mongs pa ni sbyangs bsreg nas/ dgra za'i snying gi dkyil dra
211a2(rnying rgyud): gzer chen btab pa bzhin bsgom mo// gzhu lag pa g.yon gyis thogs pa ni/ gzhu mchog yar gtad pa ni ya mAn+ta ka/ mar gtad pa ni yum e ka DA te zhes kyang bya/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes kyang bya ste/ mig phyed skad du 'tsher ba/ ral pa
211a3(rnying rgyud): dmar po'i rtse la bskal pa'i me 'bar ba bsgom/ lag pa g.yas na thugs mda' thogs pa ni/ 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa nyid du gsal bar bsgom/ de ltar yab yum gnyis su med pa byang chub sems kyi gzer 'debs de dgra bgegs su la bkyab kyang slar mi
211a4(rnying rgyud): ldog par bsgom/ A ya pa rA tsa sa dra du dadod me/ e ka dza ti mu ka ya ka sho me/ oM be tA lI rAk+ka man che ge mo mA ra ya dza dza hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ dgra bo'i tsiD+ha'i dkyil du thugs mda' ser chen babs pa bzhin du bsgom mo// de nas 'di skad ces
211a5(rnying rgyud): bskul lo// da ni skyes mchog gshin rje'i rgyal po ste// lag na gsod pa'i mda' gzhu thogs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma lus gzhom pa las// gti mug zhe sdang rdzas su 'chang ba med// gzhu mchog yar gtad gshin rje gshed po yin// zhu
211a6(rnying rgyud): mchog mar gtad yum chen be tA nag mo yin// rgya ma dung byang chub sems kyi ngo bor bstan// chang gzung byang chub sems kyi ngo bo lung bdud rtsi'i snod gzhu rgyud ru tra nag po'i rgyu ma gzengs pa yin/ bsham ni skyes mchog don la zhugs pa'i mkhas pas bsha
211a7(rnying rgyud): rten ni dgra dang bgegs chen rnams kyi bsnyen// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// sprul pa ya ma rA tsa'i mda' zor 'phen// mda' ni mtshon gyi rgyal po ste// dag bgegs bskal ba'i lag cha yin// ltor ni thabs dpa ba
211b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yin// mde'u ni ba chung gting zang ste// tsot+ta'i dkyil du 'dreg pa yin// ya ma dA tsa'i skyer mda' la// ma mo'i tshogs kyi sgo cig brtson// srin po'i tshogs kyi rgyus kyis dgras// byang chub sems kyi mde'u na pa
211b2(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi sbyin rgyas byugs// 'phan no gzas pa'i dgra la 'phen// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i thugs mda' ya// be NA nag mo'i thun mda' ya// banyis med sku las sprul pa ni// ya ma rA tsa'i thun mda' ya// rgyo ba cig dgra bo'i skad
211b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil du rgyob// oM badz+ra dun ting hed/ ma yaM ting nan/ ting baM nAn/ rA tsas du ma l+ya bo ti ni nAn/ nag mo mIg rnon bltas bton ma// khyim phyir 'khor zheng shwal dga'// nag mo chen mo mig 'bru ma// tshe gsum dran byed rgya ma
211b4(rnying rgyud): cing 'dren// dgra po'i mig 'bru bya rog mchu// 'bras bu phyungs shig kha ba ni// au Sha kham gi ma nga ya hU~M phaT/ ri bong dmigs la brdeg go// tr-i/ phra men khwa yi mag+ho can ma// thogs med mdza ldan 'joms pa mo// gsod byed rkye
211b5(rnying rgyud): hong ba mo// hor mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma// lhums shig dam nyams dgra la chus// dus la bab po hor mo gsod byed ma// nyams pa'i srog la mda' tho ma// AM hor pad+hi t+ta tsit+ta rbad// hUM/ phra men 'ug pa'i mdo can ma/
211b6(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal mo'i dus la bab// nub mthong thug pa'i dus la bab// rno byed spyan gyis sri ga skyem gzigs// 'jigs byed thugs kyis spyod khams khyab// 'jigs byed rten grwa phyogs brkyang rjeg// 'jigs pa'i drug pa de //
211b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gshog spa shar dang// 'angang kyi rgyob cig du sumarba// nyams pa'i srog la mAr la// sau mu wamra kha ta ba ha ba/ tha bza phaH/ b+h+rUMbade ga zhigs thugs las sprul pa'i mda' mchog dam pa'ang// dgra po 'brong ltar 'byung
212a1(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil rgyob// rAHsa dunan/ gcig ste bde bzugs kyi mdang // snying la rtsub cig dus la bab// zla ga ma gdengs pa'i mdang mchog 'di// dam nyams gsang ba'i mtshan la rkyong // sog ku gdangs pa
212a2(rnying rgyud): mda' mchog dam pa 'di// dam nyams sog grib g.yas la gyong // spu yi phyag rgya rgya mdud pa// g.yu yi mda' sba sha rar// lcags kyi gzhu spa du ru ru// sku ni du da ka chen po las// 'byung po kun gyi gsher ma 'byung // gshed bdag ya
212a3(rnying rgyud): tsa'i thugs dam dus la bab// dbang po lnga la thun mda' ya// mig gis bltas pas zhe sdang skyes// zhe sdang rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// mig gi dkyil du mda' thun ya// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed 'bar
212a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku snang bas// snom par byed pa sna yin pas// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sna yi dkyil du mda' thun ya// ye shes 'bar ba'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// nyan par byed pa rna ba yin// rna ba'i dkyil du mdang thun pa// gru
212a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi rngam brjid chen po nas// thugs kyi sbrul mchog dam pa 'di// smra bar byed pa kha yin te// kha yis sbas pas gti mug byung // gti mug rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// kha yi dkyil du ma dang thu na ya/
212a6(rnying rgyud): lus kyi byugs pas phrag dog skyes// phrag dag r+b+ha nas gcad pa'i phyir// skye bo'i gcig rgya mnga' thun ya// dz+haiM/ mda' ni phrin las dang nyid dbyings su 'bigs// smyen ni byang chub sems kyis 'dzin pa'i don// sgroni su gsung thugs kyi dang /
212a7(rnying rgyud): mde'u gnyis med dbyings su 'bigs// gzhu ni shes rab thabs su ldan// rgyud ni ye shes 'ong du bsgrims// gsang bzugs kyi mda' mchog dam pa 'di// rgyong cig dgra bo'i steng gi dkyil du kyob// 'phongs shig ya dung brtson 'god gnyis
212b1(rnying rgyud): la'aphongs// rgyud cig dam nyams dgra la rgyob// dang po srid pa skye bar chags// srid pa chags pa bshig pa'i phyir// lte ba'i dkyil du mda' thun pa// tshe yi phung po gzhom pa'i phyir// dpral ba'i dkyil du mda' bun ya// 'dod chags
212b2(rnying rgyud): drung nas dbyung ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil du mda' thun ya// au ba la mu la dan ti dun rbad// A~M s+thA na kha sha kha l-i mu lo ldibs/ AM ma bai ru na ma bai ru na mur tsi ya rbad/ AM pa tsa ru ru tshal pa kha rbad/ oM sa du dang ha ru pa na na/ prad de ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): rgyag don khram/ rapA ra tsa ra phaT/ de ltar bya ba'i thabs ma nor na/ rtags myur du 'ong ba la the tshom med do// gshin rje nag po'i tan+da las/ ya ma rA tsags dab thugs kyi mda' thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtswa bzhi pa'o// / de nas
212b4(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ man ngag gsang ba'i phur thun 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dben pa'i gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum brtsig/ dmigs pa'i ling+ga btsas nas ni// dam rdzas yo byad tshang bar dgram/
212b5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa// byin gyis brlabs te tshul bzhin dgod// phrin las cho ga 'di bskul lo// dbus phyogs kham nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa gshegs su gsol// yum mchog
212b6(rnying rgyud): srin mo mgo 'phyangs dbyings nas bzhengs// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dbyings nas// thugs kyi sprul pa khro bo mi g.yo mgon// dbyug to 'bar ba'i lha mchog srid pa gsum gyi bdag/ gshin rje 'chi bdag mang po kun 'dul ba/
212b7(rnying rgyud): kha dog nag po bdud 'dul ral gri can// srin mo ma mo stag gzig zhon nas su// ral gris srid pa gsum po thal bar rlog// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M/ sku mdog sngo nag gshin rje gshed kyi lha// ce bgyi'i
213a1(rnying rgyud): dka sa bya ma nod/ ma dngas tu ltung ba dmyam pa dang / thugs mnga'a'abar bas ngam bya sto padang/ rdzu ma ga ga dung nadun da zhags nasasu // ba
213a2(rnying rgyud): ngod+ha du kho'o// srer gnas pas khrag kyi ma khyong du gastso// sdug bla blang bas ma d+mo dgyel d+ho// drag gsum zhal du ma zlab 'tshal po// zhabs 'ag gshes rje skye po ma can// drang tu brang zen snang ba'i gi bya
213a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni ni 'os te shin tu dam pa yis// par me don cings kyis 'debs// srin de thos te shin pa stug pa skyes// mi mi stong ge don skyeng skad kyis 'debs// ma mo khos te sher du 'azhubyas pa pas// sdeng bde sa spyong don
213a4(rnying rgyud): srir gyis 'drengs// dmigs pa'i chege mo 'di la byung rdzum pa// A~M mra mA n+ta ka sham/ u d+ya ma tsal na mo/ oMm+ba ma dug ca tshal pa tshal bzang / ma drug shAng / ya mye thA/ tshig ma chog ca drug ting / d+hating rtsodang/
213a5(rnying rgyud): cig 'dun nyid drug ste/ sring por dru bsgo mtho sa/ sh-i nges khyim pa skad myo// rgyage mo kham pa po zad pan/ phyung nga nas phyi gcig tu spyod ma g.yomanan por mdo la/ sdigasung bdag nyid ni sangs par
213a6(rnying rgyud): dang / sa ga rgyan ched 'drad kyi thu ba kham bye bdag sor bsgom/ de nas ngadril ldog 'dri brjod pa yus kyis gdun/ hU~M/ sgra mdog dam po bdas kyi dri'irdegasacan// 'angs kyiral pa sngags pa'i srag byeganas// 'o na rje
213a7(rnying rgyud): byedru bzhi bral btog phyogs kyi rkyen ma 'bang 'ang ba sa// gshin rjeg po dud da bangs su 'tho// 'i rdzogs mdzang byar te sus su sa// mgron pa bdun dudri ngangs sudzad/ dru
213b1(rnying rgyud): zlab dar rlog/ dbyes te gang modrug tu bzud pa yis// dras pa dam nyams gtan du bdag par blang // go changs mdzang / sa nga mngon 'du dun lhags/ rlung skyol spyad rdza pa ba/ thun nan la'i/
213b2(rnying rgyud): sI ya NI ge kAr ya Ta/ phrin las 'di bslab pa'i dus su/ rmi ltas su mon pa nag po'am/ bud med nag mo dang 'phrad nas bdag la bkur sti byed na las grub pa yin no// gshin d+he nag po'i tat+ta las/ ye ma btsa gsang ba
213b3(rnying rgyud): gas kyi phur rdzun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas yang mgon po gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ gshin rje'i las mkhan bcu mngag pa'i phrin las zor thun 'di gsungs so// dang por gnas dben par bsnyen pa/
213b4(rnying rgyud): gzhung badzugs te/ dmigs pa'i li zla bcas nas/ mda' 'ug pa ma gcig sgo rtswar phug la/ ming byeng dang rnal gri mo'i mngal khrag dang / ra dug sbyang dug bong nga nag po blugs la/ dmigs pa bkug ste ling+ga la brdeg go// da
213b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs kham nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya mA rI tsA gshegs su gsol// yum mchog be tA dag mo dbyings nas bzhengaso// 'jigs byed sku las sprul pa'i bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// bka'
213b6(rnying rgyud): las mkhan m+ba 'i dres la bab// steng gi phyogs nas las mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms pa'i rje// sku mdog mthong nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// chi bas su nyi zla gza' chen bcibs// rgyas nyi shu rtsa brgyad
213b7(rnying rgyud): sprul par 'gyed// ral ga kha ma nag byin du 'bang// phya gan gcod pa'i snang bsnams// skyeng nas dgra bo khrag la shog/ oM shag tshal barbad dunan/ shar po rdzogs nas 'grags mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'tsho bdag /
214a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ gyi bas// swa ma dog dmang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyagan gyis kyi byung ba bsdams// ral pa dmar po gyen du'abang // srog chags thams ca grangs su bzangs// dbyabyas thag thams cad
214a2(rnying rgyud): subartsi// shar nas dgra go khrag la shog/ oM tsa dran chad punan/ shar lho mtshams nas 'grags mdzad pa// gshin rje rgyal po tshigs pa mgo// su mdog du dka 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba bsdams
214a3(rnying rgyud): shar lho'i dgra bya gegs khrug la shog// oM khram skr-i tshal pa nad bra nan/ lhol phrogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po rgong je thag mon mo// lus la brag nag zur mang mnabs// phyag na brag ston 'dul ma 'ang ste nang
214a4(rnying rgyud): 'phyar// sgo nas dgra bgegs khrag la shog/ tshal bstan ya nAn/ mu ru khrag gi sta n+yan/ zad punan/ lho nub mtshams nas 'bugs mdzad pa// gshin rdzas wagang mgo can// sgra mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs
214a5(rnying rgyud): phyag na tri shU la tsu gsum bstams// skyo nub mtshams nas dag go drug la shog/ no ma shag tan na zad par nA~M/ rba mi tshogs nas dgrags mdzad pa// gshin rdo'i rgyal po garjod byed ya ba ti// su mchog dmar nab 'jigs pa 'a gnas
214a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas na zhing ging drug to gyir// g.yon na 'don pa'i sngags kyu bsnams// nub rgyas dgra bgegs khrag la shog/ A~M wam khram so barbad punan/ nub byung mtshams nas 'byugs mdzad bya// gshin rje'i rgyal po sbags pa mgo dbu
214a7(rnying rgyud): sgra mdog dmang nag 'odags pa'i gzugs// g.yas na ni ga drug to byar// g.yonan 'dzin pa'i sngags kyi brdzums// phyag nagasang byed / bsnams// rlung zang dag gi drug la shog/ mi thu bo la kha nam tha dbenan// nga
214b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gsod byed rngam pa ste// sku mdog ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na ga shog pa'i sgra re bsdams// byang gi dgra bo khug la shog/ A~M khro ste tshul barbad pa nAn/ byang shar mtshams
214b2(rnying rgyud): nas 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po chos kyi gcod spyod rje// sku mdog ljang ser 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na nyes legs khram shing bsnams// byang shar dgra po khu ga la shong // A~M k+to ma tsal khro sti zad pu nan/ 'og gi rdzogs
214b3(rnying rgyud): rus dang po 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin d+ha'i rgyal po bdud mkhar 'joms pa ste// sku mdog srug nAg 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na rdung byed tho ba bsnams// 'og nas dgra blo khrag la shog/ oM ba 'dang du 'phrul phran rbad pu nun/ zhes
214b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams kun nas bkug la brdeg go// tha mar dgra'i yul phyogs su 'phang ngo // gshin rje nag po'i tan+t+ra las/ ya ma rA tsa gsang ba'i thugs kyi zor thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas yang khro bo chen po
214b5(rnying rgyud): 'doms pa yis// phrin las khrag blun 'di gsungs so// sngon du bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni// gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin bshamasA la// 'grong chen dang mya'i g.yag ru ru// rak+ta phud dang mtshe nyung thugs// dmigs pa'i 'i drag tor mar
214b6(rnying rgyud): b+hag/ g.yag ru lhag tu thogs nas ni// b+han sngags gdab cing bskul tshig brjod// trA~M/ dmar nag hUM gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsod byed yam rA tse gshegs su gsol// dmar dgra brjid pa ma mo grin gyi rje/
