264a7(rnying rgyud): nga bang gzhug/ 'jug 'ag pa'i tshul cigs/ gdang mi ngan ci nyi ra bya/ mdzub tso nga kyi gangs brjid/ na rgyag drug gi 'jigs/ dge dag skyed par 'dun no// kyang ra du pa
264b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa mtho bar bya// dpa' dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad// zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur// phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas// rkang pa g.yas pas tsham ngam byed// sngags tsha lagan
264b2(rnying rgyud): pas bsgrims na ni// rgyas par 'dod nas thob par 'gyur// slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba// bzlog ste bya ba gzhan du med// grub pa bdag nyid chen po yi// tsham dam rim pa drug gsungs pa// dang po'i ming ni logs par phyogs// de yi 'og
264b3(rnying rgyud): ma rgyad kyi phyogs// de bzhin tshamang ma gsum po ni// khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin// bzhi pa mdzub mo bsgred pa yis// lnga pa la ni stobs zhes bya// drug pa stobs po che zhes bya// 'di rnams tsham dam drug tu bslags// mo ma dam gdangs pa bya
264b4(rnying rgyud): yis// dgra yi 'khor rnams g.yen skyob// 'khor lo'i mchog la goms byed pas// grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen pos gsungs pa yi// rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon// the bo rnam par rgyal ba 'di// de bas yang ni shin tu
264b5(rnying rgyud): dkon// gsang ba'i rtog pa bzang po do// kun tu dngos grub kun sbyin par// gsang ba'i rtog pade bas kyang // 'khor lo 'di ni shin tu dkon// ho ma dang bzlas pa yongs mi dgos// sngon du bsnyen pa bya mi dgos// khro bo'i rgyal po'i brtsal zhugs dang /
264b6(rnying rgyud): dka' thung drag po'ang bya mi dgos// bsam gtan skor ba'ang mi dgos te// gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod// gang gsungs pa yi dngos grub nas// de ma thag tu dngos grub thob// de bas 'di ni gsad pyas nas// thams cad bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa po// bad
264b7(rnying rgyud): gis don mchog gang 'dod pa// shin tu legs par bsgrub par bya// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'ang ma dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste gnyis pa'o// // khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni// sna tshogs thogs mod tha dad pa/
265a1(rnying rgyud): sngags pa 'dod na cho ga mchog/ dang por byed na dngos grub 'thob// rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni// re zhig 'di yi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan dag 'dir ni bshad par bya// de yi las ni gang gsungs pa// gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur ba/
265a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gi// thams cad nyid de gang gsungs pa// thams cad de ni bshad par bya'o// sngags de las rnams kun byas pa// rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa// dpa' bo gcig pu'i mthus kyang 'grub// oM ni de yi thog ma ste// bde
265a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i dam tshig yin// thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang // drag po'i rtseg gis phul ba'i lugs// klad kyi 'khor gyis mnan pa'i rigs// sngags kyi yi ge phreng bkod pa// sngags rnams thams cad gsal byed pa// khro bo'i rgyal po'i stong po ni// gsum pod
265a4(rnying rgyud): nas sbyar bar bya// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi// sku ni de yi 'og tu bstan// sngags pas sngags rnams kun gyis mtshan// de dag rtag tu rig par bya// thogs pa med pa'i sngags rnams ni// bdag nyid chen po'i thams cad kyis// bsung la sogs pa'i
265a5(rnying rgyud): las rnams kun// go rims bshad pa bzhin du bya// thams cad bdag nyid chen po 'dis// srung ba dag gi byas nas su// sngon gyi tshul bzhin rab dben pa// sgra gzugs don mchog gzhan nas ni// cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa// cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya//
265a6(rnying rgyud): nyin re me tog phreng ba la// lan bdun bzlas pa rnams kyis mchod// mchod nas kar bI ra yi// me tog dmar po kha 'bras pa'i// brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis// bu don la ni phog par dbul// cho ga 'di ni dus gsum du// zla ba gcig tu byas r+b+ba /
265a7(rnying rgyud): 'o mngon du ma nye gyur nas// rmi lam du ni dngos grub ster// cho ga 'di ltar sngar byas na// gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag/ de tshe gdon mi za bar 'grub// / de yi cho ga mchog bshad pa// de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas ni// mi yi las rnams gang bra ba// de
265b1(rnying rgyud): mdor brdzus nas// da ni legs par bshad par bya// de nas dang 'gro dang sbyar ba'i// dug ni rnam pa gsum dag dang // gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang // lho 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig/ bdag gis byas pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags// sbyor ba lan cig
265b2(rnying rgyud): bdag gis bsrung // yid la bsams pa tsam gyis kyang // gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed// bzhi pa'i rims la sogs de yang // thos pas myur du med par byed// mdang byis pa'i gdon rnams la// thal ba'am yang na las kyang zang // bdag nyid dag pa
265b3(rnying rgyud): bsams nas ni// bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don// gang dang gang dge 'dod par ni// bsgoms pas de dang de dag byed// yid la bsams pas de dag thar// rdo la lan gsum bzlas pa yi// chu srin kum bin la sogs// ma che ba can dag phyogs med pang // chungs
265b4(rnying rgyud): payi mchog tu 'byung // 'gro tshe yad la bzlas na ni// lam na phun po 'jigs pa med// seng ge stag dang dgra rnams dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// rgyal po'i drung du 'gro na yang // sngags kyis spyi gtsug bcings nas ni// rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu// @
265b5(rnying rgyud): nas thal mos sbyor bar byed// shags 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang // mtshon dang me yis 'jigs pa la// yid la dran zhing bzlas byas na// mi bde kun las thar bar 'gyur// 'tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'i phyir// mi bde nyam thag khur pa la// sngags 'di myur dran pa rjod pa
265b6(rnying rgyud): na// sprin dag mnan par bya ba dang // 'dod bzhin myur du slar yang bzlog/ gnam lcags ser pa 'bab pa yang // dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed// phyag rgya bcings pa de nyid kyi// yid kyis sprin rnams dbab par bya// de ltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas ni// sprin ma
265b7(rnying rgyud): dgapa ba sgyur bar bya// rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni// gnam lpags ser ba gcad par \u0f7f// sbyor ba mkhas pas ci 'dod pa// cha rab dag kyang gcad par bya// gos ni sngon po bgos ni ni// Sha ra khor yug bsrung byas nas// med pa nub par chur thug/
266a1(rnying rgyud): gsum lags par bzlas byas na// btu byin gyis ni srin bsdus nas// 'dod pa bzhin du char pa 'bebs// de nas smin chen las byung ba// cha rabs sa steng khyab par 'gyur// nyi ma la ni mdzan phyogs nas// nyi re rtag tu bzlas byas na
266a2(rnying rgyud): bdag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyi// nad rnams de nas med par 'gyur// rgyal po dbang du ba gang rung // yungs kar dkar po bzang po las// gzugs brnyan legs par byas nas su// de yi gzugs kyi steng 'dug la// gang gi ming spos nyin bdun du/
266a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni// de ni myur du cho ga 'dis// bran bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur// zhag gcig sbyang ba byas pa yis// dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du 'gyur// zhag gnyis sbyang ba de bzhin du// bzlas na rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin// zhag gsung
266a4(rnying rgyud): byas pas rgyal dregs te// zhag bzhi dag gis bram ze dag/ bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin byas na// 'dod pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur// 'bru dang phub ma thams cad las// bu dang bu mo gang yang rung // de bzhin gzugs brnyan byas na ni// dmangs rigs la
266a5(rnying rgyud): ni mtshan gcig gis// rab tu sdang ba bya bar 'gyur// rje'u rigs la ni zhag gnyis kyis// de steng cog pur 'dug nas ni// de bzhin mdza' dang bral bar byed// nyin zhag gsum dang bzhi dag gis// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o// ji ltar ji skad gsungs
266a6(rnying rgyud): yi// las kyis bya yi gzhan gyis men// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// dur khrod sol bas logs pa ru// snga ma bzhin du legs par bre// de nas seng ldeng phur bu la// sngags kyis stong du bzlas byas na// de yi 'og tu lus la gdab// dgra bo de yi ming rdza
266a7(rnying rgyud): nas// de la khros par byas nas su// de nas de yi snying gar 'dug/ phur bu btab ste bzlas bya ba// de nyid lag pas bzung nas su// dus gsum nye ma gsum byas na// dag po gang du btab pa der// gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su// 'gul mi phod par
266b1(rnying rgyud): sa la ltung // zhag bdun lon nas 'chi bar 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas su song nas su// lag pas be con phyag rgyab cing // lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis// bsdigs shing nyim nun nas su// khros shing dgra yi ming spos bzlas// de nas dgra bo mo gdon gyis// zin nas
266b2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa sna tshogs pas// 'chi bar gyur pa dag ni byed// de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi// rtogs de las zhi bar bya// ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas// zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis// dbang po bsdams shing yid bde bas// sbyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas// de na
266b3(rnying rgyud): de la las de yi// zhi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs nas// lag gas dgra po'i mgo zug cing // dgra ye ming spos mnan nas su// nyi ma nub tu bzlas byas na// de yi klad ban 'gyur ba// tshabs chen shi la thug par 'gyur// de nas zang mo
266b4(rnying rgyud): nas su// nyin par zlos shing zhi bar bya// sa steng rkang pa gcig gis 'dug/ nyin par lag paskyen du brkyang // mi dga' khros shing bzlas byas pa// dgra yi ming spos ci 'dod par// nyi ma nu ba kar de nas dgra// mi dga' ba dang myos 'gyur te// gnyen dang mngang
266b5(rnying rgyud): rnams bor te// de nas gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro// de la 'dir ni zhi ba'am// 'on te rgyas padagra 'dod na// gtsang sbra b+hAs te gos dkar bgos// bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos par// mchod pa bzang po byas nas su// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas// 'om
266b6(rnying rgyud): bcang zhing bzlab byas pa// zhi bar 'gyur gyis par du'o// de ltar 'di ni sna tshogs pa// sbyor bces rgyas par bshad pa yin// rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du ni// ma gsungs pa yang legs par bsgrub// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'ja ma dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rtog
266b7(rnying rgyud): par gtogs pa ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bzang po 'di// he la'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni// de las bzang po gzhan med pa// ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya// dang por he zhes gang gsungs pa// bskul ba'i sa bon thams cad pa'o// de ni len dang /
267a1(rnying rgyud): // 'dzin pa ste// las la myur du bskul ba'o// de bas thog mar bskul ba dang // don bzhin du ni bzung ba la// khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi// he la'i 'khor lo rim bzhin bstan// he he ha ha he hi hi// hi ha ha he he gnyis slar ba// na ga gis
267a2(rnying rgyud): thog mar sbyar// zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis pa'o// zung drug 'khor lo'i tha mar dgod// mu ra na rtsibs kyi mig rnams su// sngags las 'byung ba'i re re'o// don rnams thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur// bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags// gnas
267a3(rnying rgyud): ltar bkod pa dang // ji ltar lbos shing gang gnas pa// so so'i las la sbyar bar bya// de nas 'di dag bkod pa de// sngags rnams bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad// de'i nang mur na gsum po dang // dbus kyi mu ra na bzang por ldan// mtha' yi myang ngan drug po dang /
267a4(rnying rgyud): rtsis kyi phrer drug rab bzang ba// rab dben 'du 'jo med pa'i sar// cho ga bzhin du legs bris nas// de yi gnas su sbar ba dang // de yi go rim bzhin du sbar// de yi cham dam gsal ba yi// sngags rnams 'di ni bsdu par bya// dbus su de bzhin
267a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa yi// snying po mtshan ni brjod pa'i mchog/ bzhag nas de yi gnas dag la// sngags ni grub par byed pa gzhag/ grwa ran gnyis la gnas nas su// zla ba'i snying po gzhag par bya// de ni kho bo'i zhabs kyis munan// dril bung dasel ba'i sgra yang
267a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrags// khro bo zhabs kyis bcags byas pa// rtsibs rnams khro bo mthu dang ldan// dbus su snying po dag par ldan// rab tu 'bar zhing nges byas la// buran gsum gyi bar du ste// thams cad dod rnams kun grub pa'o// he he hag ni sa nyi hahA he he/ gci
267a7(rnying rgyud): pabyar// zlas chen po'ichog dbus nas// sabon bzung ba'i phyi rol gagag/ thog mir bskul pa'i tshig rnams dgod// khro bo dums bsla ba ste// thams cad yu du don rnams byin// grub pa'i phyir ni de la gnas// de ltar 'khor lo byang pa'i// rkyen
267b1(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi 'khyil pa bzhag/ bskul ba chog rnams dgod pa'i mthar// tho ba gzhan rnams bkod par bya// de nas gzhan yang rim bzhin du// khro ba chen po dgod pa'i phyir// sbal bar byed pa bcu gnyis po// 'di dag tshal bzhin bshad par bya// dang po ga rgya
267b2(rnying rgyud): zas gsungs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba che zhes bya// rdo me ye rgyal bar bzhag// rab tu drag pa'i thugs gzhag go// rab tu drug su pa stobs paH// rgya chen khro bat+ta pa yin// drug pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// 'jigs par byed pa des byar// tshang brjon
267b3(rnying rgyud): par byed pa yin// thar du khro bo brgyang po grags// phongs bsgrol ba de bzhin dgra// rab tu 'joms pa bcu pa yin// de bzhin kA li kI li bzhag/ kI li kI li chen po dang // bcu gnyis su ni gsungs pa yin// khro ba rab tu snang byed pa// bcu
267b4(rnying rgyud): bgrangs pa 'di dag ni// blo ba'i rgyal pos kun tu mnan// thams cad rim pa bzhin du gsungs// 'khar mo'i phyi rol gnas pa 'bod// dbar zhing drag pa'i mthu dang ldan// thams cad bstan nas 'khod pa ni// khro ba rjen po snang byed pa// mthu rtsal med
267b5(rnying rgyud): slebs pa'an// den gying bdud pe 'byong ngo meb surnam pa sasnarnams// ga nga drug dang man par bya// srid du kyim par byas mdzin// papa byad te 'byung ba'o// de nga lca khor na gdus gcig ga dbasas ba'i don
267b6(rnying rgyud): kun dgrub// rab tu 'bar ba'i sngags kyi mthar// 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gyis bsngags// sa~M bo ni gnyis pa gang yin pa// cho ga dang bcas par de bzhin gnas// rdo rje me rgyal zhes byas pa// khro bo don kun 'grub byed pa'o// dang po'i sa bo na gsungs
267b7(rnying rgyud): 'o// phram bzhin du tshig dang cos// rab tu thugs drug rgya grags pa// zla ba'i rgyal pa khri 'ong srung // byed zlab das pa'as/ tshig drug bzhin grub ma// de ni slongs po rgya shes gsungs// gnyis par 'amam mochog mtha na//
268a1(rnying rgyud): // gsungs khro bo d+ha chen ni// de ni snying por grags pa yang // mi thub gzo ba'i tshig dang bcas// de yi gsum po chog bcas pa// de yang de bzhin bsgrags pa yin// 'jigs pa zhes bya rab tu che// khro 'ad khro bo sdang byed pa// rgya chen gyi ni rim bzhin /
268a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin// cho ga bcas rab tu drag po nyid// su ru khro bo de bzhin gzhag/ de yi sa bon lnga pa yin// 'bar ba'i phreng chen zhes bya ba// chog dang bcas pa de bzhin du// khro bo phongs pa grol zhes bya'o// lnga po rje chen nyid yin te/
268a3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas par bsgrags pa'o// rab tu 'joms pa zhes bsgrags pa// khro bo'i khro bo snang byed pa'o// sa bon snga ma mtha' med las// snga ma tsheg bcas de bzhin gzhag/ kI li kI li bya ba yi// dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster// de bzhin de yi sa bon nyid// cho ga
268a4(rnying rgyud): tsas de bzhin 'dir bshad do// kI li kI li chen po de// khro bo'i khro bo snar byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni// sa bon 'di dag rnams kyis bsgrags// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyor ba yi// rab tu snang bar byed ces bsgrags// khro bo'i rgyal ba'i 'khor los gnas//
268a5(rnying rgyud): shin rje'i gshed po yin par gsungs// dang por de ni 'khor lo bstan// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // khro bo'i rgyal po de las gzhan// khro bo'i bdag po snang byed pa'o// de ltar khro bo gsum po de// gang dang gang du rab sbyar ba// de dang de ru sngags rnams
268a6(rnying rgyud): sbal bar byed pas de bzhin bskul// cho ga shes pas nan tan du// gang dang gang 'dod bsgrub par bya// khro bo sgom dang ldan pa yis// he la'i 'khor lo yongs bsgoms nas// dka' zhing bsgrub tu'ang mi rung ba// brtul zhugs ho rdza dang bcas la sogs//
268a7(rnying rgyud): ses dgod pa ma byas kyang // sngags dgod shes na bslab pa'o// he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pa// de yis dka' ba ma byas kyang // gdon mi zabar myur du 'grub// bairtul zhugs hom dang bsam gtan dang // ji ltar gsungs pa'i dka' thub dang // mngon
268b1(rnying rgyud): par brtson zhing dad pa'i bdag/ lan grangs bcu gnyis gang bsnyen pa// rtog las gsungs pa'i las rnams byed// rab tu ya mtshan ston pa'o// he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pas// ring por mi thogs bde ba ni// khro bor bsgom pa dang ldan zhing // he la'i 'tsho
268b2(rnying rgyud): loganas 'dug na// khams gsum dag kyang lan cig gis// thogs med myur du g.yos par byed// de bas rab tu bsgrims nas su// khro bo bsgom pa goms byas te// he la'i 'khor lo las 'byung sngags// sbyor ba dag gis goms ngar bya/ khro
268b3(rnying rgyud): par rgyal pa yi// rtog pa dang por gang bsgrags pa// de yi rtog pa gsang bshad pa// cho ga 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog/ khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di// cho ga de bas shin du gsang // khro bo'i 'khor lo gsad bshad pa// ra 'dra snang byed de bas kyang /
268b4(rnying rgyud): la'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di// rab tu gsang ba'i mchog yin te// rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyis// rab tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// rtog par brtsa gsang ba ni// 'di dag rnam pa kun la yang // he la'i 'khor lo 'dra ba yi// 'khor lo ma byed phyis mi 'byung // gang
268b5(rnying rgyud): zhig 'di yi do zlos nas// khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na// de yis 'bad pa ma byas kyang // 'jig rten na ni bslab dka' med// he la'i 'khor lo'i gnas la ni// ji ltar 'dod par gnas nas su// khro po bsgom dang rab ldan pas// khro bo'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/
268b6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog/ bsgrub pa mchog ni sbyin par byed// thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong // ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste bzhi pa'o// // tho
268b7(rnying rgyud): 'i tshig gi mthar// bskul ci gtses pa'i tshig gnyis gzhang // bskul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar// khro bo 'dud rtsi 'khyil ba'o// khro bo chen po phreng ba dang // bdud rtsi 'khril ba 'di yi mthar// kun tu dang po g.yo ba dang // sngags shes
269a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa las// zhapa 'ang po ba 'dun te// dang sa gas shA / ma ga na// dran ba // ga byang ga // nang ba ga dan na
269a2(rnying rgyud): sems ni rab tu zhen byas nas// sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa'am// ri dag g.yo ba'i bar du'o// de nas 'khor lo bslab pa yis// gnyis pa'i gnas la song nas su// khro bo chen po'i tshig mthar gnas// skoms shig ces par dbang bskur ro// de'i tshig thob
269a3(rnying rgyud): mar bkod nas ni// de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar// rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags// rab tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang // tsham dam gsal ba dag la gnas// be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni// khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas
269a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu myong ba'i thabs 'di ni// mtsho dang rdzing chen klung chen rnams// khros pas myar du skems pa dbyed// 'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'bebs// khro bo ma bu chen gnon ldan gyi// sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya// rtsibs rnams rim pas kun mnan pa// gnyis
269a5(rnying rgyud): po de las 'phos nas ni// de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug/ mthu rtsal ldan pas rim par gnon// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// bskrad par byos zhes tshig gnyis bskul// de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas// de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil// jo bo bdud
269a6(rnying rgyud): 'khyil pa'i mthar// rab tu drag pa'i shugs bzhag go// rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yi// khro bo tshwa ma dam bsnyen par gnas// glang po myos pa'i shugs can dag/ mngon du 'ong bar gyud na yang // de ma thag tu skrag par byed// myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu
269a7(rnying rgyud): dod// slad du log par phan tshun du// bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro// glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing // bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur// sgrub pa khro bo bsgom pa yi// cho ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no// he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i// bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug
269b1(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // rdzan chen pa chog ga mthar// non cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bzlal// de nas chog sar bshad papa// brdad tu lakhrul pa gzhag par bya// brdad po lakhrul pa de la mthar // khro ba rtson po stobs chen bzhag/ kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa la//
269b2(rnying rgyud): dam kyis ni me g.yor gnod// dpung ngam yang na glang po'am// gu'am yang na shid d+hA'am// rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs// khro bo bsgobs pa'i tshul bzhin gyis// sgor bde la gnas nas ni// rab tu mnan pa byas par 'gyur// de nas haM pa zhes bya ba'i//
269b3(rnying rgyud): bsrapa la gnasadus/ rgya pa'i tshig sa pan// dbug ga gags shig// tho bdu kyi mgyi pa dang / mthum drug gi gan pa na// zhib ma chen zhes theg/ btu'ab bar gyur ba // thib da kyi 'grol ba yang /
269b4(rnying rgyud): rab ci jugs ba// tsha ba ma mchog gi gyur na// deni mi pa rnam na ts+tsha d+he// rab tu pa par dbugs par // de nas kyi pa ma mos// bcwa pa dag paganasun da // mi zad pa'i sngagag bzar // rmongs par gyur
269b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis byasgral// khro bo bdud rtsi la thib pa yang // tshig gi tha zar kun du gzhag/ khro bo zazhin gyis me badra ba// dzug sna ma bzhin du bskal// rmongs par byed pa'i rtsa ma ngam gyis// tshig bzhin du dab 'askal nas// ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin// 'grob
269b6(rnying rgyud): sgrar du rmongs par 'gyur// de nas trai la'i 'khor lo 'dir// rim bdun pa la gnas nas sa// khrob chen po'i rtag gi mthar// glags shig sgrogs gig chag gnyis bklag/ rnam 'a napar byung ba yis// bdud kyi 'brel pa sprul bar byed// 'jigs par d+hA
269b7(rnying rgyud): sgrogs pa// tshom par byung ba ni// du min par sbyin gyis pa sa// denas 'dzis ni rdzas ngas/ la ra ba po'i// pa brgya pa po// gnas sa 'di tham pazhin// che chag zhem thar// seM pa gnas pa gnas// de
270a1(rnying rgyud): ma// bad kyi khyil// khyo ba thung du de bzhin du// bad rtsi 'greb pa'i mtha' bar banag/ tha badz+ram dam kha ga ngas pa// mchog ces bya ba myur ba na// rkang pa ya gcig gdangs pa'i stabs/ sad dang ser brlung bsags// dus sa ma yang rlungs min par// rdza
270a2(rnying rgyud): zla po bsgoms pa yis// khro bo'i sngags kyis tshul bzhin du// sa yi steng du 'bebs par byed// he la'i 'khor lo gnas brgyad po// bsgrub pa yi ni sar bor nas// khro ba'i sa bon tshig gsal ba// dgu pa bzang po la gnas te// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mtha
270a3(rnying rgyud): spong shig pa yi tshig gnyis bsgral// khri bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// tha mar phongs pa sgrol ba bzhag/ khro bo bsgom pas mdzes pa yi// tsham dam gsal ba byas nas ni// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bzlas// khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal// hU~M zhes bya ba bzang po yis/
270a4(rnying rgyud): kho bo dngos por bsgoms nas ni// shing gi rtse dang yal ga dgug/ yang na shing chen rtsa nas 'byin// me tog 'bras bu glog pa'am// yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed// ljon shing chen po rnams kyang ni// ji ltar 'dod par mig yor 'gyur// he la zhes bya'i 'khor
270a5(rnying rgyud): lo yi// rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar// chom shig ces pa'i tshi ga gnyis bskul// khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khril pa'i mthar// snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya// 'jigs par byed pa'i tshwa ma ngam byed/
270a6(rnying rgyud): ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang // sgo dang lcags zlog rnams ston// khro bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du// bsgobs na rab mchog grub byed pa// he la yi ni 'khor lo yi// rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te// khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthur// brnyil cig ces
270a7(rnying rgyud): thig gis sgyub// dz+ra pra b+hA bi kI la yes// bdud kyi 'khril pa bsgral bya// chog gi mtha' mar gnas pa ste// tshig bzhin du bshad pa bzhin// kI le kIl zhes byab// chom ngam mjug la de bzhin gnas// be rkyen gyi ni phyag rgyab cing // gshen
270b1(rnying rgyud): rje'i gshed po bsgom pa ni// rin chen rtsu ba brtan pa yang // rtse mo nas kyang brnyil bar byed// yang na ri khar sle ba yi// brtan pa'i shing rnams 'gyel bar byed// de nas nye la'i 'khor lo sa// bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas// jo bo chen po'i chad
270b2(rnying rgyud): gi mthar// thugs shig ces pa'i lkog gis skul// bskul nas de ye tha ma ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par \u0f7f// khri chen bI li kA lA ya// de yi tha mar gzhag par bya// bI'i kI la chen po zhes// zla ba'i tshamangs de bzhin bya// btsun phyag
270b3(rnying rgyud): rgya bcings nas su// thob chen po gshin rje'i gshed// yid la rab tu goms byas na// rtseg pashing skam rdo la sogs// 'babs na phying ste nam mkhar gnas// nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang // 'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar byed// 'di ni rang 'gyung
270b4(rnying rgyud): ngar tshang // din dus gsas byu // spyod pa gzhan yang sngam bzhin// rdo ba ma pa babyed pa regasang sa// she la 'i 'khor mi gang pa ni// yar+sa gsung pa yin par bgang // gas dang bcas shing stong btsas pa// shes na dang sa tha /
270b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang ci rigs pa// tshe mang ma bcu gnyis sbyor bdag/ mad dang rgyas pa'i tshul dag gis// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin// de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad// skrag par byed pa gsum pa/
270b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pA kAn tu sdom par byed// rab tu 'khrug ces byab la// rjongs par byed pas de bzhin drug/ myung ba tsham ngam de la gnas// kha ga dngas pa ni brgyad par bshad// mdzes zhes bya ba dgra pa ste// 'jigs par byed pa brngupa yin/
270b7(rnying rgyud): kI li kI la zhes bye dang // kI li kI la chen po yi// khre bo tsamangam bcu gnyis so// 'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin// thog mar bsngags pa'i rim pa yis// mitson phyag rgya ldan par bya// kyai nas rang gzugs nga bzhin du// sngags

272a1(rnying rgyud): rgyag sad du/ shrI A yAHba ti kA la karmA sha ya sarba bAr+d+ha sa hA tan+ta/ bod skad du/ dpal che bdag nag po'i phrin las mi dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud chen ma/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rje ba dag nag po ldan pa
272a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje yongs su bkod pa'i snying po 'og min gyi gnas mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i slong / rang bzhin gyus
272a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i gzha pa yas bad na/ 'khor rdo rje snying po nyid kyi rang bzhin dang dus gas ma gcig pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / ma skyes pa'i lam la 'dun pa'i rig pa can rnams dang / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / khro ba 'tshogs bregs pa can napa
272a4(rnying rgyud): dang / 'joms pa bdud kyi tshogs dang // khrag skyeg mtsho'i tshogs dang / phrang byed mngag pa'i tshogs dang / gdug pa gsum po'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams kyis yongs su 'dun par gyur to// bcom
272a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'ardzang chen ma des 'khor rnams yongs su 'dun pa gzigs nas/ chos thams cad kun tu ma g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i snang bas khyab par mdzad do// de nas 'khor thams cad sems 'grogs par gyur to// de nas bcob ldan 'a ga kyis
272a6(rnying rgyud): sems 'grogs par gzigs nam 'khor rnams la nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di bstan to// chos rnams ma skyes ya nas gnyis su med// rgyu dang rkyen med rang byung gnas// de las kun 'byung rang byang thabs bsam yas// 'gro ba ma lus nga yi rang bzhin las//
272a7(rnying rgyud): mga' mig mo g.yo med cing yang gsal// skyeng ba nyid pas ga kyi yang med// ces gsungs mo// de nas 'thor rnams kyis 'jig ga ma mo ma yin pa rtogs par gyur te// de nas deng snying po des/ bcom ldan 'das rdo 'bya chen pos dzin
272b1(rnying rgyud): gso to// ngad kyi sa nyid pags drung // gsung thugs pas // dus gsam sangs rgyas nyid las med// srid pas rje brgyas par mad // ces gas pate// de nas bcom ldan 'das de kyang man pa dang / martog par byung gi dgong du cu
272b2(rnying rgyud): las 'od zer rtse ba zags ya phyogs brgyar bkye'o// 'od zer des zhing khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa brgyad de slar bsdus so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ chos thams cad kyirtsa ba/ rdo rje 'a#
272b3(rnying rgyud): chen pa nyid du ba danas ster ba da dag das par gyur te// kun gyi bapa'i gnase la gnas pa// la med pa sems sul 'an chags thog// de nag gi da las kyi thug gas // na bag cig las panyis rgyang // bco brgyad bzhi
272b4(rnying rgyud): tshe srog kun dbang gtso dang 'khor// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du// ston pas 'bras bu ldan grub bshad// 'dab brgyad dang sa ma bzhi dbus na// smyon pa rang bzhin de 'khor rdzogs// lhag pa'i sku lnga ye shes lnga// rtsa lam 'khor lo rim
272b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnas// lhun grub mchod pa rang gnas thim// rig pa'i ye shes rang las 'char// ston pas 'bras bu gnyis 'grub bshad// yum gyi b+ha ga gsang ba'i gnas// rnam bzhi'i pho brang lhun gyis grub// sgo khyams b+ha ga sna rtse la// yon tan
272b6(rnying rgyud): lhan grung rin po che// rdo rje gsang ba'i lam sbyangs nas// ston pa'i gtso 'khor bstan pa'i dus// mnyam rdzogs gcig tu lhan cig skyes// bde ba'i ye shes rgyan lam bcad// ston pas gsang ba'i sgo nas bcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje snying
272b7(rnying rgyud): pos gsol pa// kye ho// rdo rje 'chang bakhro bo'i rgyal// rnam dag chos spu'i rang bzhin las// 'gro ba 'dul gyir sprul slar bstan// 'khor gyi dregs pa lo mor bstan// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mdzod// ces gus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
273a1(rnying rgyud): kyis khro bo 'byung ba'i dgongs pa la bzhugs pas/ 'jig rten gsum po rab tu g.yos te/ ldeg rab tu ldeg cing gu tu ldeg/ thar gra rab tu bur bur kun tu 'ar ro// che mche ma rab tu ches ku tu rab tu chem mo// mtha' mthon dbus dpa'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar
273a2(rnying rgyud): gyu to// 'jig rten ga grub po'i ga la khang dus/ la thams cad brgyab te lums pa bdan par gyur te// de nas pam ldan 'das kyis las thams cad yongs sa rdzogs par grang ba phying ro byin pos bsngags pa// rkyo ga sa du snre la ma nas bsgrags pa sa/ 'jig rnyed ga
273a3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa'i srog 'phrog par gyur to// de baphyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyang / ji ga dang skadacig ma gcig la lpags nas srog gi snying po thams cad mnongs gsol du phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis rngam pa'i sba ba ton pas srog dang lus thams cad 'ja
273a4(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// smram sa klan 'a da/ na pa mdzad da nga chen pas/ bzod rnams lagatsigs te/ sra kyis sram pa'i dkyil 'amang 'ad gsungs so// rang bzhin pa gnas mnyam nyid las// spun tha yo shes gsal yas khang // rin chen dung srong rgyan
273a5(rnying rgyud): par gnas// phyi nang gnyis med 'da' khrib gsal// klu badzi ga pazhi rta babs tshangs// ci mogan ba lags 'bang mags mag// skabargya daklu brkyang zhing dang // dra 'dra byed keng dang sbrul// gAng chen 'brag dang seng gi stag/ rdzas phral du srid gnam lpags thog/ zhing dang zha
273a6(rnying rgyud): ngor zung // gakhye sa/ mos khyod sog pa mengs// oM ge mo thong yod pa'ar ba te// sngags dbang bcudrug rabs bca gtas// thams dang gra cad b+ha ldan// rgal chen pa mau thang // zla bram ga tan khris bdag stong // thugs kya ti ba

276b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyu blangs la// thugs kyi sgrub pa mkha' khyab sgo// grags rgyal dri yis khrus byas la// maN+Dal dbus su brtan par bzhag/ bsam gtan bum pas rten sbyangs la// lus la gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ tsit+ta dzod kyi pho brang du// tshe srog bdag po'i dkyil 'khor brtan// brta pa
276b2(rnying rgyud): rnyed kyir tshogs gtor la// bya ba'i rim pa bsgrub pa bcal// brtul zhugs rim pa'i rten du bzhag/ mtshan ldan pakra shis gzungs ma 'dam// rgyal rigs rje rigs sngags skyes ma// mkha' khyab rdo rje mdas ma reg/ lus dang yan lag dbang po'angam// ske ring ba 'ja
276b3(rnying rgyud): cho ga mig zum// dpal pa'id gyes me srin dkyus ring // meg phra dkyil nag ut+pal mdog/ shes rab spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// lus la lha yi dkyil 'khor brtag/ bait+tar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ b+hag gsang ba'i pho brang du// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/
276b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rten du gzung // rdo rje gsang ba'i chu rgyun gyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang slob ma bkru// gsang ba lhun gyis grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// byin pa rlab brtul zhugs 'jug pa brtsam// yol bas par bcad me tog ldan// sdig pa bshags dang
276b5(rnying rgyud): sdom pa dpog/ dam tshig bsgrags la me tog dod// dkyil 'khor lha yi rnam pa bstan// lcel bdud ci lung bstan bzhag/ bde brgyan zhing phyag rgya bsgom// tshogs la rol la lho bstan// rdzas dang dkyil 'kho byin gyis brlab// slob ma gzug phyir gsol ba gdab//
276b6(rnying rgyud): ldan bu pa rang bzhin gnas pa'i pho zang nas// ye shes rgya tsho ldan gyis grub pa'i lha// ma lus mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// sleb ma mtshon ldan yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// 'dul thugs drag po'i stobs kyis gzhug tu gsol// bde chen mnyam pa'i ngo brang
276b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba dra// rig pa brtul zhugs stobs kyis gzhug du gsol// slob mas me tog pogs la brda 'phyag btsal la gsol ba gdab po// ston pa'i sgron ma bcom ldan 'das// lha dang spong dpon dgongs su gsol// dregs pa stobs kyi tshul bstan pa// 'gyur
277a1(rnying rgyud): med bde chen po brang nas// dregs pa'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// thA gA gsang ba'i pha brang nas// mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// dam tshig dka' thub sdob pa'i mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la rtsol// gsang ba'i ye shes
277a2(rnying rgyud): bdag la grol// ye shes rol pa bdag la srol// be tog rin chen dmig smra ba smras la// bde chen phyi yi 'dug pa brtsam// phung po lha yi dkyil 'khor bstan// pa ma chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bston// 'dug pa nang gi lha ro bstan// gzungs ma lus kyi dkyil 'khor
277a3(rnying rgyud): du// gsang ba phyi yi lha ngo bstan// tsit+ta nang gi lha ngo bstan// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// gdong g.yog dang ldan slob bskyed// bkra shis mtshan ldan gsang ba'i pho brang du// gnyis med sangs rgyas nyid dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// byang chub sems nyid mi 'gyur bde ba'i mcho
277a4(rnying rgyud): pho bang yun gyis grub par bzhugs pa dang // skye ba lnga dang bdud rtsir sbyor ba'i sems// bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba'i brtul zhugs sbyin// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i sgra dang ye shes bgrod// de nas gsang ba'i gzungs ma slob bskyed par bya'o// / bde chen gsang ba'i pho brang du//
277a5(rnying rgyud): thabs chen gsang ba'i bde phab nas// dgra ma'i rtsa brgyad sa bon bsreg/ b+ha ga'i gnas su chos skur bkyil// cal ma 'od 'phros lod spod sgra// mnyam par gnas pa byang chub su// spos bral kur khyab sprul pa'i sgra// brtan pa thob pa rdo rje sku// yab yum mnyes pas
277a6(rnying rgyud): mnyes par bya'o// de nas gsang ba sbyor ba'i brdas// ye shes nyi D+ha'i thig le yi// bde bas gang par byas pa la// myong ba dag pa'i byin rlabs las// rtswa rgyud bde phab thig le bsgril// byang chub sems dang sle ba bsre// bkra shis mtshan ldan bum par
277a7(rnying rgyud): la// gartul thigs rang byam sa dbang bsku// kA 'i skabs gyung ba gnas// 'tha pa'i bgacigs sbyi zla// gsangs pa sbyinamagasas// mags pa'i thag kyis zhugs pa// mig su // mam
277b1(rnying rgyud): pa mgo la gdags// mtshan ldan bkra shis pho brang dang // drag po stobs kyis lta ngo bstan// bkra shis bum pas dbang bskur bya// ha/ ye shes lhun gru 'bum pa yis// brtul zhugs dag pa'i dbang bzung bas// 'gro ba rnam dag chos skur gsal// rang
277b2(rnying rgyud): byung ye shes dbang thob shog/ e ka ya mgu h+ya b+ha ga bo d+hi tsi& ho// 'bras bu khrag 'thung ye shes lngar// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgyar lhun grub pa'o// de nas dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang sbyin pa ni/ glang chen stag sham zhing lpags sbrul// thod pa snying phred keng rus brtsan// me
277b3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod dbang bskur bas// dregs pa'i stobs dang ldan par shog/ e ka ya ma ha sti/ ma hA nA ga ka pA le/ tsit+ta dz+wa la ni ri ho// de nas phyag mtshan sbyin pa ni// ho// 'khor ba 'dral byed 'khor lo dang // nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri dang // chos nyid mtshon pa'i rdo rje yis/
277b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu gsum mnyam pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsakra khaD+ga badz+ra ho// be con dug lnga ye shes lnga ru sgrol// gtun shing gdug pa gnas su 'joms// sdigs mdu bdug gsum su gsum dang du rdzogs// rig pa stobs kyi sgo gsum dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma b+hi ha

277b6(rnying rgyud): sa k+Shak+ShiShi& ho// pU dza ka ni ri ti ho// dba' brtul sngags kyis byin bskyed pa'i// bam chen ro la mnyam par rol// rdo rje brjid pa'i dbang thob nas// bde chen mnyam nyid thob par shog/ e ka ya ma ad+hi pa ta sit+ti ho// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dbang ba shar bya/
277b7(rnying rgyud): 'chi med dang byung ra sA yan// bkra shis mtshan ldan lhag pa'i rdzas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbang bsgyur bas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma sarbab rgya ma mr-i ta/ dz+nyA na mud+ha ho// bkra shis dngos grub ga'u rtsa// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i cho bakhyil
278a1(rnying rgyud): nas// rang rtags tshe yi dbang bsgyur bas// 'chi med rtag pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka la ma A yAdz+nyA na sid+hi ho// snod kyi 'jig rten gtor gzhong du// brgyad kyi sems can gtor mar gsal// bzung ba rnam lnga gtor ma'i rgya// ldan
278a2(rnying rgyud): ba kun 'byung gtor ma'i rgyan// 'dzin chags med pa'i stobs kyis rol// e ka ya ma ma hA ba lin+ta pU ho/ dam tshig bsgrags pa mna' chu blud par bya'o// snod med brtul zhugs zhan pa la// spel zhing bslaglan rdo rje khro bo dang // gtum po gnod sbyin rdo rje dbang chen gyis/
278a3(rnying rgyud): sa bral mgro gshag tsot+ta khrag tu 'thung // e ka ya ma kA ya wA ki Da k+ta lA ni ho/ khyod kyi rdo rje 'chang chenang yi na pas// bka' yi zung yang bcag par bya ba min// bsgo ba byos la dam tshig srog ltar spangs// gal te 'das na rdo rje dmyal bar ltung // e ka ya mthun raka N+Di
278a4(rnying rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje dmyal ba'i cha// tshul 'di bsrangan dngos grub thog/ nyam sa ni rtagashag ste 'pho// rdo ji'i chu 'di khyod kyis longs// badz+ra krota e dam to// 'dod pa lnga yi tshogs la rol// rgyu da gsum lhag pa'i bdang ga bstan// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gral thob
278a5(rnying rgyud): yin// brtul zhugs gsang ba'i bgrod pa gsum// thob na mi thogs la gnas// brtul zhugs gsang ba'i dbang du bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs chu de nag po las/ brtul zhugs dbang gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
278a6(rnying rgyud): kyis dam tshig gzungs kyi don 'di gsungs so// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dka' bub dam tshig sdom pa'i mdo// chos rnams ma lus byang chub sems// 'khor 'das lhun grub dang du 'dus// de mtshon dam tshig srog ltar bsrung // dam tshig rnam pa gnyis yin te/
278a7(rnying rgyud): thun mong khyad par rim par gsungs// thun mong rtsa ba yan lag gnyis// sku gsung thugs dang bco lnga yis// bsdus te bsrung mtshams shes pa'o// khyad par kho na dka' thub dang // bsrung ba bcu gnyis gcig tu gsungs// gsang ba'i lam ni rtogs

278b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs lam las cig ca mazod// 'bras bu bgrod po ba ldan gyis thub// las dang spong bkran dang ldan// paT stobs byin drabs shugs kyis 'byung // dam can rgya mtsho de dag nas 'grub// de ma yin na mdzod dang g.yan// rdzas men tshe zad mnar med los/

283a1(rnying rgyud): mtshams su gzug/ ston zlag sum la gzugs blangs la// rdzas kyis sbal ba'i bar du gzhug/ gong gi thun thab phur pas brdeg/ brgyad dang bcu gcig na bcu dgu// nyi shu dgu la dbab par brtsam// a ka ha ka ya ma
283a2(rnying rgyud): sangs mas gr-i/ dril drag tu phreM pri hril/ hU~M phreM shar shar hril kyo// de ba dza ya ma nA ga sgang gzer ro myags/ phreM gr-i shar shar drag tu tho pa/ ya mAr kA nA gdun nad nA ga snying gzengs tri nan zad/ las gnyis yan lag rdzogs par bshad/ dpal tshe bdag gi
283a3(rnying rgyud): byad dag po las/ drag sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// bsrung dang gzir dang bshig dang bsad// mnan dang bsreg dang zor bun mthar// dril ba'i
283a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'di lta ste// rgya shog gru bzhi cha gnyis la// sme ba lnga dang ni rang byug/ thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum zlag ma gsum// ming rus srung bskabs kyis bri// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu// rtsa ba drag sngags gang rung dgod//

283a6(rnying rgyud): pa de bzhin shes par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la sa drag po'i sngags 'di bton no// e ka ya ma sbyi ma dza nI ra ma ya/ sarba sha trUM stam b+ha ya nan/ 'dring dug phyung zad/ sa nA ga snying gzer skur nan rbad/ kham shag rbad/ sarba u
283a7(rnying rgyud): na 'drid phyung / ro myagA bru~M rbad/ gro pro shar shar/ thil hri la phob/ gr-i shar nA ga de ba dza yaMs tri snying gzer lhur nan/ phreM shar thil b+h+yo// de thun bro shar hril phob/ e ka ya ma gr-i gr-i r-i tsit+ta nan/ 'drid phyung zad/ drag po las kyi rim bsdus pa// lhun gyis
283b1(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i tshe bdag gis// sbyor ba dag pa'i tshe dag bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs chud nag pa las// gabapa mngon du phung ba'o lab ska bcu ba'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mgo dgu pa'i sgor badril ba'i 'khor lo 'di gsung nga/
283b2(rnying rgyud): ba gcig la yan lag lnga// snying po nyid las ye shes kyi// 'od dang zer gyi tshul can gyis// gdug pa'i gnas su mtshams dang sbyar// dur khrod ngas dang shog pu la// thig skor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla ga ma gsum// ming rus par
283b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs bsrung ba dri// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi'am byams khang bzhig/ byas la spu gri rdzogs par dgod// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags de bzhin dgod// tha ma sbal gdug chen pos bsdam// kha sbyar dug chu tshang khrag/ bslus 'dor
283b4(rnying rgyud): 'i nar thar// zhag dgugs la gsum gnad dgung dog/ nyin dgug poro'i mtshan dgra dril// gsang ba'i las dmatha' du mnan// zhag dgu gzir bshig mnan pa zer// chu dril gte' gzhug zor thabs gzing // yan lag las de skabs kyis blangs/

283b7(rnying rgyud): sngags 'disazhin no// e ka he dA na ye ma ra na dza/ mun tri shi tsi ri ga nyid/ dgra bo'i srog la sha r+thaM/ mA ra ya rbang / srog sta ma thA yanan/ srog la ni shag tur lam thun bye/ pro dra shar sha dril thil drag tu phob/ phreM dr-i shar shar hri la trai ra buM d+hi/ nA ga dza yi snying gzer /
284a1(rnying rgyud): shar yanan/ phreM phreM shar shar hri la Sh+Ta/ debar gr-igro shar nA ga pa raM/ bum tril shar n+ya/ sarba sha d+hi s+thAm d+ha ya nan/ 'drid zad/ sarba un na yang bzlog tur yaM/ kha 'dring phyung zad/ sanA ga snying gzeng spar dang / dr-i ril shag dang / sadza 'i 'un srog
284a2(rnying rgyud): la tsog/ thun nang / bair dz+wa la raM/ las rnams rtsab bcas pa yi// smras pa'i sgor bca par bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyad nag po las/ mgo dgu pa'i le'u ste pa cugacig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po mngon du grang ba las na
284a3(rnying rgyud): gyi bya ba sbyin sreg gi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dang po yid mthun bde ba yi// gnas dang yo byad rdzogs par bsham// maN+Da las dkar khros dang ldan// dbus su me thabs thum por brtseg/ khru gas kha khyer mdzub gang ba// sor ba'i zhing du rnam par brtag/ nang du

284b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi zla gang ser// kha khyer mtho gang chag gang thur// sor gnyis zheng ldan 'khor los mdzes// nang du gser dang ldong ros bkru// sa la 'khor lo ser rtsibs bcu// sgo shing ser po dri chen bri// gsar gye ga'akru ba la// rgyas par 'dod pa'i ming bcas gzhag/ bdu /

288a7(rnying rgyud): 'a mas kyis grang shing theg/ sogs yang gsus la mas 'phrus// thig dang ba sa na 'thug sa// byang namam nags med dang gzugs// bla dang shes pa 'chag cing brtan// de la phyi ba rgya tham pa// rtsa ba'i dwags pa cas drug zag cang/
288b1(rnying rgyud): 'o ma dang 'acas me dpa la 'angams// yang ngogs rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// sreg pa'i sa gri de bzhin rdzas// drag ga ri lu bcu rtsa brgyad// ming byang bag phye til mngab rtsa// min khye sha mdzad pa'i rdzas// de bzhin ga sbrul sbal ba'i sha// ra drug re lda
288b2(rnying rgyud): bya phag sha tshil 'gyur bag bcang // til dang nyung nag tsha ba gsum// mar khu 'o ma mos pa'i khrag/ bsreg rdzas mchod pa drag por dbul// yungs kar ske tshom nol khrag thun// gzugs dang ming bcas sngon du btab// mtha' ru rdzas rgod bsreg pa 'dug
288b3(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi rgyal chen pho brang du// brgyad chad pa dang go ma bdun pa// gcin dang sha shu dzi ma skra// rton pa bsres la ling+ga bca'// rgod pa zla ga rka dbus nyid du// ming rus dang bcas sngon dmar bsdam// bzhi bcas re re gan rgyal mnan// rgyal chen pa yi snying ga ru/
288b4(rnying rgyud): hom shing khru gang zur gsum pa// gdug pa'i shing la dug khrag bsu// mid byang dang bcas btsug la brnag/ dbus kyi rgyal chen po brang dang // bum pa'i gzhal yas sngags pa rnams// ye shes rang gsal stong bdag med// chos su'i ngang las phyag rgya'i sku//
288b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes sman grang zil gnon gyi// yum dang gsod byed dregs pa dang // dus sbal bya khyung phag mo sbrul// b+hag dang seng ge kho chung bcas// dbul khrag 'thung te braka/ dur khrod chas dgu rgyun dang ldan// drug bzhi drug stong 'khor dang bcas// gsal ngar
288b6(rnying rgyud): brtag la jug sngags bzlas// nam mkha'i 'khor lo ngas la bri// sngags dang rus khams med btub la// sbyor ba dang ldan par sbyang bca'// bla rkun zad cing zang sngags sbyin// bla dang tshe dgrag nus pa 'grags// bran thab gzer sngags rgya yis btang //
288b7(rnying rgyud): rten gyi gzugs dag bstab pa bya// bskul ba dang bcas drag sngags nus// rdzas kyi mchod pa me sbar bsreg/ rkyen gyi 'du 'ardzi sbyor ba min// rtsol bral de bzhin ldan gyis grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las bsreg pa dras
289a1(rnying rgyud): 'a gyur pa'i sngags btanan// ga 'dus sug ga tu/ dam pa'i ga lan gnas/ 'am ga na/ nas sa nas kyi ma sa pa rnams la mangs/ 'dug das// bsgral pa cung bang
289a2(rnying rgyud): 'khong pa'i gzhal yas nas// yug+sa mkhar sgo med bcwa drug 'bar ba'i nang shed nas// 'obs chen bcu gnyis 'dang pa'i dmyal 'bar nas// thod ma khar 'bar ba bzhi yi dbus phyogs nas// lo thang lugs mkhar grwa kris gtams pa'i chang // gla 'dra gan
289a3(rnying rgyud): khris bdag stong gi gdan// sgo 'phye phyogs skyong ma he brdzis pa'i khri// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan steng nas// srog 'dud 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po bzhengs// rngam pa'i tshul gyis bla kun dgra la rtse// tshe bdag las kyi sprul pa mngon phyur
289a4(rnying rgyud): shar gyi phyogs nas bla 'gugs pa// dung gi mon pa seng ge'i mgo// dbu dgu spyan dang zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgra tsit+ta dgu// zhabs dgus stong khams bla la rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra bo bas zhing 'dzin// snying dgus dgra bo yid la gnon
289a5(rnying rgyud): phyag dgus tsi d+ha khong nas 'byin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol/ ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'brang // dag po zla dang grol la shog/ ka la drA tid tsid+ha ro myags srog la dzA ma ri li li b+ho/ lho yi tshogs nas zla 'gug pa// lcags kyi ma
289a6(rnying rgyud): stag gi mgo// dbu dgu spyan dgu zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta dgu// zhabs dgras stong khams bla la rgyag/ spyan dgus dgra bo blta zhing 'dzin// snying dgus dgra bo yid la gnon// phyag dgus cit+ta khang nas 'byin// zhal dgus la
289a7(rnying rgyud): mngang med pa ragasal// ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung // dgra po bla dang grol la shog/ ha la ha ladun ting tsi to lcags srog la bram ri li li byo/ thub kyi phyogs nas bla grags pa// bse yi man batha~Md kyi mgo// dbu dgu sman dku zhal dgu gdangs/
289b1(rnying rgyud): gang gu 'bas das / ngas// 'bras dgras snang khams tha' rgya/ na dbras dang ba stu na pa dzin// nyid dasus dam pa sadug gan/ cag sus nga nas bya// zhal dgras 'am med par gsal// lags dbus zag la rgyas shing 'thang /
289b2(rnying rgyud): dbu bo'i zla dang grol la shog/ rag nyo dun ting do lcags thog la dri ma ri li l-i hU~M/ byang gi phyogs nas tha 'grags pa// gser gyi mon pa khyung chen mgo/ dbu dgra sman dgu zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsi d+ha dgu// zhabs dbus stong khams za ba
289b3(rnying rgyud): rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra bo blta zhing 'dzin// snying dgus dgra bo yid la gnon// phyag dgu ma ts+li khong nas 'byin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung // dgra bo'i bla dang grol la shog/ karma b+ha tang dun ting ro myags
289b4(rnying rgyud): gr-ig sa thum ri le li b+ho/ dgra bskor thun dbab ba bar bya// srog bdud che bdag nag poni// sku yang chel dregs shing rnams// lu ni dam mkha'i khams dang mnyam// gsung gling ro zug ltar sgrogs// thugs ni stong gsum khyab par ba lta/
289b5(rnying rgyud): zhes ni rtog khung gdangs pa badra// sngags nA tam gzur brdungs pa 'dra// tshems ni nyom shing btsugs pa'ang / mche ba ca par gtams pa 'dra// khyor ni srog 'grags padag pa yin// su gsum bzad pa'i zhal gdangs shig/ srung dag gnad ban na
289b6(rnying rgyud): kha raM khA tI// yum chen gsod byed rgyal mon// mthing nagu 'jigs tshul rngam skabs 'gyings// nad gtong rgyal mo zhal gdangs shig/ dgra bgegs pastabs po kha ra khA he/ gsod byed ya man+da dza ni// smug nag 'jigs pa zhal gdangs shig/ sdang dgra

290b5(rnying rgyud): wu ma dog mabang nag brjing pa la// dpral sbal nag ral bas gtibs// ral ba zang bu ngal// gser dadu sa tig sa ni 'byung ma// gdol pa'i glang thod pa yis// dpya dang phyag zhabs su rdzogs brgyad// zhal nas ma ro dar 'bral// sbyin nas khrag 'dag tus

290b7(rnying rgyud): shes kyi// dmigs pa kang yin myur du skal// rtswa byu krung khrag rdza klong gams// lum srog dbang bzhin dang grol// 'byung ba rnam shes bsreg me dngas spras// zhe sang drag po'i sgor bcom// bsreg rdzas mchad pe 'di bzhes la// bla mtshe bkrag sadangs
291a1(rnying rgyud): bag chags goms// lugs mkhar sgo meng nang du drug/ 'byung ba gtan gzhi'i rnams kyis rnan// gdug thu ma lta'i nam du sta na// spang ba'i dbang ngaganang pa' bgags// mdzad par 'bral ma /

291a5(rnying rgyud): rnon// gdug rngub me lha'i zhal du stob// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// mchod par 'bul lo kha ra~M khA hi/ ya ma'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon phyung ba// dregs pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba ni/
291a6(rnying rgyud): phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i nags// su yi 'gying bag brjid pa ni// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa ni// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// mche ba dgu khri gtams pa ni// dgra po'i srog rtsa
291b1(rnying rgyud): gcod pa'i chags// gru brgyang gdan du bting ba ni// klu gzhanas bdag gzir ba'i nags// gnyen khri klu 'bum gsal ba na// klu nang mdza shu ka ru gcad pa'i nags// rigs bzha' yul gyis su la brgyan pa no// klun mdza shu dag la gtang ba'i rtags// nga byang
291b2(rnying rgyud): sbrul brgyan pa ni// 'dod dgu re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse dgu bsdams pa ni// dam nyams mgo lus gshog pa'i rtags// g.yon pa tsi tA'i phreng ba bsnams pa ni// dgra bo'i don snying khong nas 'byin pa'i rtags// gang la byab khyod
291b3(rnying rgyud): shes kyi// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// rtsa drung klung khrag na klo skoms// lus srog dbang po rten dang phrol// 'byung ba rnam shes bkrag mdangs rdzas// zhe sdang drag po'i sbyor ba chom// bsreg rdzas mchod pa 'di zhes la// bla mtsho bkrag mdangs bag chags
291b4(rnying rgyud): snyoms// lcags mkhar rdo med nang du chug/ 'byung ba gtan gzhi'i rnams kyis non// gdug rtsub me lha'i zhal du rtog// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// mchod par 'bul lo kha ra~M ShA hi/ dregs pa chen po'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul
291b5(rnying rgyud): pa mngon phyung ba// rus sbal rngams pa mi zan ni// nyon mongs lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// 'byung ba lnga yi rtsa bskems// lus srog gnyis kyi rtsa mdangs 'brel// skye ba med pa'i khams la sprad// dadra ma khrag gi snying po 'chang // thugs kyi gsang mdzod 'bar ba ru//
291b6(rnying rgyud): bkrag mdangs bcud kyi snying po 'chang // dkon mchog dbu 'phang slod pa dang // rgyal ba'i bka' la gcog pa dang // sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// sku dgrar 'os pa ma lus kun// gshed kyi gsang mdzod 'bar bar chug/ rtag tu 'khyams
291b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas su khrid// rtsa bzhi dngas ma stobs kyis non// dmod pa drag po'i mtshon chas chod// yan lag lnga dang gsang ba ru// mchod rten drug gi dgra bgegs gnon// dgra bgegs las ngan gdug pa rnams// spu gri'i dpal las shor ra re// gang la bya ba
292a1(rnying rgyud): khyod shes kyi// dmigs pa gang yin myang du sgrol// na byung klang khrag na smra ba skams// lus srog dbang porten dang la// 'byung ba nas shas bkras mdangs sus// de sdang drag par snang bad+has// ga
292a2(rnying rgyud): bzhes la// bram tsho ba khrag mdangs bag chags snyoms// lcags mkhar sgo med nang du chug/ 'byung ba gtan gzhi'i rnams kyis rngon// 'jug grub me lha'i zhal du ltar// snang ba'i dgrang gnod pa'i bgegs// mchod par 'bul lo
292a3(rnying rgyud): bdag dran po dasuganags// gang du thug shA // tha Sh+Ta N+Dal ba das ga can// kyai bye 'a mdza pa 'bar ba'i gnag mas// rnams pa'i mas rje la pang gshid// ral kri bang ba ga shegapa sa/
292a4(rnying rgyud): rnas / ba ga gags// dag tams pa gro lus zlas/ shes ba bangag she gzar gyis// nyon mangs gdug rnam cangan sa 'drug/ sub nas sa dpal zer gyis// nyams pa kun gyi srog tu gcod// sre gnyis nyi thal byel pa
292a5(rnying rgyud): yis// zhe sdang klu mcho gting nas skem// gnam ljags 'bar ba'i sder mo yis// klu gnyen ma bdag drangs kyi na gsol// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i mchus// sa bdag spu srin klung bdud gsol// khyang gi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// gdug pa'i
292a6(rnying rgyud): granas khang blangs nas bshig/ khyud chen rngams pa'i nga ro yis// klu gnyan sa bdag zil gyis gnon// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyi// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// rtsa myed klad khrag zla klod snyoms// lus srog dbang po rten dang grol// 'byung ba rnam
292a7(rnying rgyud): shes bakhrag mdangs sus// khe sdang drag po'i sbyor bcom// bsreg rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bla mtsha ba zag mdangs bag chags soms// lcags mkhar sgo mod nang du drug/ 'byung ba gtan gzhi'i rnams kyis nod// gtug chub me lha'i zhal du stog// sngang

292b2(rnying rgyud): dang seng ge rnams pa mas// nyams pa'i sha khrag rol rol// de srang drag sbal nag po gnyis// kha nas 'i 'bar drug lu bsreg/ dgra bo'i khong du dag mad 'tshob// dgra po'i khang khyim blangs nas shig/ gang la bya ba khyod shes kyi// dmigs pa gang yin pa
292b3(rnying rgyud): sgrol// lus srog dbang po rten dang grol// 'byung ba rnam shes bkrag mad sasas// zhe sdang drag po'i stor bcom// bsreg rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bra mcho klag mdangs bag chags snyoms// lcags mkhar sgo med nang du chag/ 'byung ba gtan ga de'i
292b4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi non// gdug chub mi sbyo zhal du stog// snang ba'i da thang garjod pa'i bgags// mchod par 'phral lal de ni/ shan kyi phyogs ras thab ba sgrub// drang gi mod pa seng ge'i mgo// mon pa brnyan ngam pa'i gdod// ljang dgrag nod bgegs mcho

293a7(rnying rgyud): gyi spong ba nga gshad dang la dbab pa'i spong ba 'di gsu mo// dus gsum patshig gsum bde gnas su// rang mas brtan pa'i mtshams bcad pa// ye shes rig pa'ingade slong nas// mtha' lnga khyab pa'i 'khor bsdus pa// gzung 'don chos nyid dbyings su bslam/
293b1(rnying rgyud): stobs chen gzhan sogs gzan la dbab// rang rbud yi ga gshed ma blangs// bdud dang ldan byed dang rtsal bar // bde ba'i thig le dang las sh+yang // shugs kyi rin chen 'phal 'thab mad// gru gsum rkyen gnyis cha bsnyams la// mu gyad rim pa ni 'dod//
293b2(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi pho brang rgya chen por// spyi gtsug cog pu sgril krung dngangu // dmigs pa nag po'i snying po bri// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs mu khyud g.yeng dang skem// rang gzhan gang 'grub bsad pa'i sngags// gyi nang mgo bstan ming rus sad/
293b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar rang gshed gzan la dbab// mtha' ma mtshon cha'i rtsibs bcu pazhi// rtse mo nang bstan bsad pa'i sngags// spu gri rang bcas gsum gnyis 'pho// skabs dang sbyor la rtsa ba brtsam// mtshon cha kha sbyor dug chu khrag/ tsha ba gsum du ldan byas la// ling+ga
293b4(rnying rgyud): phag po'i lto bar bca'// gru gsum sum brtsegs rtsad bcas su// thod pa rus sbal nang bcas mnan// zhag gsum drag sngags rngam tshig bzlas// drag tu bskul la bla mas mdag/ dmod tshig dang bcas mtshan yang brjod// dbang gzug dam pa dar gdung
293b5(rnying rgyud): ba bklang // thon nas mchog phur khri yis gdab// 'khor lo thod pa chos kyis gril// nam mkha' bar snangs la mnan// gsum gsum jug dang gsum du dbye// rang yang che ba'ang rgyal bskyed// gu rus seng ge'i log bshig na// sgyu ma sku yaM phung po la//
293b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi myu gu bde ba'i mchog/ rin po che yi rgyal sar gdon// thod pa seng ge'i log par mnan// slob ma de la 'ub sdigasog na// cog pu'i snying gar sdig pa gzhug/ dam pa rdar man chu phung pas bsdig/ thod pa stag gi 'dzum la mnan// dam 'dros yi ma sngags
293b7(rnying rgyud): gsha// seng gi ba che skang gcing bu zhing // klang bar khrag gi phral pa gzhug/ dam thag da cig rkye thangs bsdu// srid pa gcig ga thig par mnan// chags pa nag po sri'i drud// byig tsug steng ga ba nga bri// 'thag la paganod pa 'di zag/ thod pa /
294a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gling du mnan// zan po rigs gnyis 'don pa la// ske ldeg bklad par sbal// snying la phag nad gsang bar sbal// bcug la lus la nad khrag bsgra// zad pa srin mo 'gro ma du mnan/ drug po gnam grags nang dmas na
294a2(rnying rgyud): rtog med mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i sku// bde chen khyab gsal rtog med las// phyag rgya gzi brjid stobs dpag med// lus la ye shes 'khor lo bcang // kun gyi thugs kar sUr+ya yi// tsa ka ye shes stong 'phros gas la// gzhan gyi rgyan gcig bris la gcir// rang //
294a3(rnying rgyud): bad/ nga pag la mang brdeg/ thod pa tshig pa ba blanan// de las thams cad mas pa gsungs/ de nas yang ma ldan 'das rgyas kyi gsang na na sngags 'du 'o//
294a4(rnying rgyud): rngubs mug shag ka dun gu ru nr-i dza hu thums rdo/ srog la yaM shag rdzi myag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya nr-i ya/ breng shag hur yaM rbad/ dgra bo tsit+ka nr-i hu ra thums jo/ srog la mA na ya rbad/ dgra bo'i tsat+ta yaM shag nr-i hr-ir thums dzaM/ ba srog thun rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la du no nr-i tsit+ta dza srog
294a5(rnying rgyud): mar ya rbad/ dgra pa'i tsit+ta ya~M hur thams rdo/ srog zed shag mA ra ya rbad/ spu gri nyid so so'i sgo nas brdeg pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ spyi dril la brdeg pa'i sbyor ba dam pa 'di gsungs so// khyad par dmar len drag po yi// rang gshed zil la dbang
294a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i las// brda don thabs kyis dril ba'i mchog/ ba dang ngo ma zho dang mar// phun mar snum gyi snying po bcud// snying po'i sbyor ba bsad pa mchog/ g.yeng min brtan par grol dbang bcas// stobs ldan sbyor ba'i snying phyung 'di// gang mthun rgya la gzugs brtan
294a7(rnying rgyud): bya// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid po'i khyams khang drod srud bca'// khyams khang ston pa rnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snying gar mtshon cha bca'// mu khyud bzhi dag ming dus bri// phyi ri mi rgya tha ma rtsa ba'i sngags//
294b1(rnying rgyud): yang log bcug tus smras martson// rtsab s+ho/ bar na khams// chu srin kha pa su khyud rnam// klur dang laphas kyabya// mu khyud pang du ming dus 'ams// bskul 'ang stsas lag pa dpag// rnas sal ba'i phyogs mtshams las// tshig med brgya rte du
294b2(rnying rgyud): nang // gsad pa po mo'i lugs gang // 'khru la mag par khyams ming rus gang // do na gnyis bsdus la spor ba brtsam// kha gyod drug khrag tsho ba nad// sle ba dang bcas thod pa dong // rgyu ten li ng+ga'i gzhi bca' ming // rus khams nag pa rten du bkag/ zhal gyi bran dba'
294b3(rnying rgyud): rten la bstim// zhag gsum khri bzhi sgra spang bya// drag sngags 'od zer rang shugs 'phro// shA za gsod byed pho nya bsgral// kun gyi ye shes 'od 'phro las// rang rgyud rtsa ba'i 'khor lo las// snying gi rdza bzhi dang sa ma na// rtsa ba'i 'bru brgyad rnal ma'i gnas/
294b4(rnying rgyud): rtswa bran brgyad dang su la bzhin// drag po rtsa ba'i 'bru bcu gnyis// rtsa mdud rang gshed 'bru bcu bzhi// lte bar bcas pa'i snying po gsum// de las dang bdud gshed la bslad// gnas pa'i yi ge 'di lta ste// tsit+ta dbus kyi sing la// dmar nag ya gnyis dbus na ni//
294b5(rnying rgyud): me chu las kyi 'khrul mig skyon// dngas ma bzhi yi sing la// chos nyid rtsal e dang lcags// me long ye shes gsal ba'i 'od// gnas pa'i srog rten gso zhing 'joms// bskul na dang srog tu srub gcod// rten dang bag chags drangs snyigs 'byed// de bzhin
294b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan me khams la// ya rngubs gnas pa srog rten 'joms// mnyam pa nyid kyi brkam chags 'joms// gnyis las bde khrid nad rlangs bskyed// ye shes sir dwang sa ma chu// mug dang shag gnas sdud cing sgom// stong pa'i ye shes dang gnas 'dam sa/
294b7(rnying rgyud): khrag dang chab dmu chu bskyed// rang rgyud mid dang ma rlung // bag chags 'phel 'grib 'phen dang phul// ka dang du na gnas rlung nad bskyed// bya ba'i ye shes bskyod bdud 'joms// las ni rnam shes dngas ma'i dgas// de bskul de 'od de mtshon chas// de gcod
295a1(rnying rgyud): do da pa gcang rnams// dang ma byung mdud bsgras// ra da/ tha'adas// 'ag gas gnyis pacwa gnas/ da da /

295a3(rnying rgyud): bad kyi 'thod pa sebs// ye shes dang du theg pa dang // bab chags lug kho ba'i ma gsod// ban 'angs dkang nag pa rnams parjeb// yis gro/ das// gzugs pa tan thogs pa 'bang pongo // da pa'i ses bzhin mthung// dem

295b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud nag po las/ rang gshed rang la dbapa pa'i ladu sgra brgyan thur sa// dadus yang bcwom ldan 'das kyis srog len gsang ba'i drug ma da khong du bskyal ba rab du gsungs so// las rnams na ma mchog bdu sag ga

295b3(rnying rgyud): lugs kyi zangs phye dang // thal chen mnol zag nyung dkar thun// gsal gsumathun sngags dgra slong bdag/ d+han brlab sha za mtshon changags pa// 'od kyis lus bsdus thun la nim// khwag kho la drug zungs khengs shing 'tshal// zor brtsod bsreng ba'i go cha rdal/
295b4(rnying rgyud): lus dang sha rus de bzhin dpral// tsi t+ta'i sgo rtse sgo dgur 'jug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// las kyi rim pa gsum yin te// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrug gsum// dang po che gsum sngo sna gsum// tsha ba gsum dang ha la
295b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan ma ba'i sngags kyis zil// ma dzad dadang ban gsum pa skyes// tshob cad rdul la dang sa// dmigs pa ma la dang bsrang bab // del mal bayin myong ba yo / dmigs pa sa la dag ga yongs la/ ra rgya pa pa'
295b6(rnying rgyud): gsum// bslus la gzugs brtan par du gzhug/ grun gsum dbu gsum mon thod pa TIm// dug shing rdzas rgod brgyad kyis 'dug/ dmigs pa'i rten la gzir bar bya// des ma phebs na sbyor ba gzhan// dug dang mnol khrag sbal pa gnyis// bgazan bsres la
295b7(rnying rgyud): sor bzhi'i ched// gnyis byas par drug son ma gzhug/ lugs phur khri bzhi dzi la zhing gzir// mthang du yul dbus chu mig dkrug/ rdzas rgod brgyad kyi dud pas bajug/ gsal bar khyad par zil gnon brtag/ chu rgod 'khrugs pa ri ltar gtebs// dam pa'i sbyor ba
296a1(rnying rgyud): drag sngags pa dag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di brtad na// a myags la rngubs mug shag kadun/ gro shar drug h+ya ya mthi pa b+h+yo/ myodzi la lam hur ngo shang shar tha~M b+han/ dgra
296a2(rnying rgyud): gzer dri la yaM phu hud/ blams rdo/ shar blo brag tu phob/ gsang ba snying gi dkyil du gzung // las kyi mchog chen nag por gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brnag pa mngon du 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i sbyor ba gsang bcu dag ba sbas mchog
296a3(rnying rgyud): rang la rang chas gab bzhin gsang // sbyor ba rim pa lnga dang ldan// rtsa ba'i rgyal po rtsa ba gsum// bse bya'i sha dang pase zho mkhris// ma bsurma zhe sdang lus las bkra// bdun khri'i mthang du yul dang spad// nam mkha' bar sngangs la gsum// mkhal mapa bram ma zes
296a4(rnying rgyud): la// bslu zhing rbad pas sbyor ba 'dra// sbyor pa lo'am dus na smin// 'greng dang nang bzhi'i lus la bsku// sbyor bas zla ba dus na smin// gar bsgyur gsar pa'i sha la sbyar// gu h+ya tsit+ta so ma ha// de bzhin gnyen po stobs dpag med// ga pur skyed chu khar to// zil ba
296a5(rnying rgyud): shugs drangs rdo rje'i chu// yungs kar khacwa drug bsras la// sngags kyi rgyal po khri gsum bstim// lus la bsdus te 'thungs pas 'joms// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sgra gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton no// hu ra yaM tsa ma di bruM/ tset+ta
296a6(rnying rgyud): khas mAr zad/ e bai raM ta la tsam ri sbyang / phur buM rdo la raM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba smin pa'i don 'di gsungs so// bsrung dang bas dang lo tog gzhom// bstan pa che la gnyen gyir sngags// bslu ba'i bag chags gnas s+thadra nas// sku gsung thubra

296b1(rnying rgyud): mamakha' byangs pade la ma bzod// sru lnga lags rdzas srid// ban ca bcang par 'a can gnas// phung ba skum gnas sbyangs nas// mtshan dang ngang zad langs spang krung // lhan grub la gas su dzags// bgazugs pas dang yong du// 'azus pa
296b2(rnying rgyud): spangs can de 'bru// tsed+ha dkar nag sdig sbal gyen// thun phral lcags ltar nga khol zhing zla// 'brugasu ma gnad gyis 'phrog byung cing // seng ge'i sder bzhin bzung nas 'jog/ rang dbang med par rten la bsku// thod pa'i yid khyams khang gleng // gsang
296b3(rnying rgyud): gnas su zang zhing bsreg/ spogs pa medangar las rnams 'joms// drag sngags dmod pazor la bsgon// dgu dkor dmod la yang sngags sdebs// de yis 'pho thob bkod pa smin// phog med gsang dang gas dang med// srog med skyes
296b4(rnying rgyud): bu'i log rtog tsam// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zheng zab pa yod ma yin// srog tu 'dzin pa 'khrul pa ste// bde ba'i gnas las ring nger 'gyur// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rjes kyang // byang chub sems la dpyang du med// sems
296b5(rnying rgyud): dem skyes stong bdag med// stong pa nyid ni 'byung gnas pa// rten dang rten med dang grol ba// 'dod pa chen po sa ye sangs rgyas// rderjed rnam dag mngon sangs rgyas// thag dog dbang rdzogs der sangs rgyas// gti mag thig po spos med kyis// dmyal
296b6(rnying rgyud): mngon pa'i bod chen rgyas// sku lnga lam lnga spang bya lnga// mgo d+ham dang rgyal sa sku dpa' dang // bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor grags// sku lnga bde pa'i ye shes lnga// bskyed dang rdog dang chen po'i dang // bde chen sangs rgyas phug pa byung // rang sngags dang bcas

297a1(rnying rgyud): kyang mdzur ba'i hU~M/ drug pa sngags kyis stong ba mchog/ dag pad 'a mang du bskal ba bshad// dpal tshe bdag ga dgangasargyad drug pa las/ sngags na 'jugs par 'jun ta thabs
297a2(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan rang rgyud kyi 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// nyams dga' dben pa'i bde gnas su// bde ba'i gnas la bde ba'i mchog/ bde ba chen po'i don nyid las// bde ba'i ye shes rang gsal brtag/ yi ge sa bcas srid par gdu
297a3(rnying rgyud): sgra nyid don dam snyan par grags// yi ge'i 'khor lo bdag nyid rdzogs// brda 'don spad pa'i gdams ngag yin// sku nyid phyag rgya brtan gsal la// spyi bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mdzes// bde ba chen po ha nyid dbus// oM dang gab pa'i rtsa ba bcu// ma
297a4(rnying rgyud): lnga dang ya yis gang // chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus// a dang rtsa ba bcu gnyis pa// 'dab brgyad stsal ba'i gang bar mdzes// dngas ma bzhi yi rtsa srabs na// dmar len bu brgyad bcu gnyis gang // ste badrug rngurtsa gnyis la// mgod pa

299a1(rnying rgyud): 'amakhrug cing 'chol// drug pas tha dang cho srog bsdu// bdun pas dkar dag mtshams su bstim// brgyad pas srog gi me mang bsdad// datha pas dngas snyigs kyud las dbye// dang rkor zhwa gyis bdag pa yi// las grab pa
299a2(rnying rgyud): ru mnan gzir bya// zag dmar srin mo'i sbom du mnan// mnan pa'i steng du dmigs bya la// bsad pa'i thun zor yang yang brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las thag sngags grub pa 'di bton to// e bai raM khaM shig tso/ rngubs
299a3(rnying rgyud): rtsal bred rdo/ e paM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs ling shag rbad/ e bi raM khaM shig tsir+t+ta rngu bas/ dgra bo'i srog la zer breng yaM yaM br-i ri li li b+h+yo/ tsirta gzir dzuM staM b+ha ya nan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo las la skul ba 'di gsungs mo// tshe
299a4(rnying rgyud): bdag zugs kyi yang sbrul mo// srin mo gcod par byed pa blo// chos sku gnyis su med pa las// 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i sku// thugs kyi sprul pa mgo dgu ma// yang sprul bdud dang sha ba'i tshogs// me lus 'joms pa'i mthu mo che// drag dang khrag gi mtsho kyil
299a5(rnying rgyud): nas// dug rlangs mun nag gtibs pa na// srin mkha' dang mgo dgu ma// bdud dang mu stegs bran du 'khol// srid pa'i ma mo las la bstsal// dom dang khyi mo zla la 'gyed// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsan// stong gsum sha 'a re la cing gsol// nga yi sha ska la ga na yod//
299a6(rnying rgyud): skyong gsum zos kya ngang ma 'grangs// spyong gsum khrag la byos shing 'thung // nga yi khrag skal gang na yod// stong gsum khrag gis ngam 'grangs// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis can// ri rab rtse nas snyil srin 'ong // gya mche gting nas rlangs
299a7(rnying rgyud): cing 'ong // dgra bo'i khrag la myos shod ngo // drag tu bsngal ba mchis con// rang sha rang gis bzhing 'ong // dang khrag rang gis 'thung zhing 'ong // rang sha zos kyang ngam 'grangs// rang khrag 'thungs kyang ngalas ngoms// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba
299b1(rnying rgyud): mchis can// gnam par blang brtag rgyang 'ang // ngar basmang no 'do 'ang nga // dang nyams dgra' thor dran tog// ngag tu bslal ba la rjes so// lus rnam lus zang du 'khol// dpalas 'das pa ga byed// dgra zar khang rnam sa byung // drug tu
299b2(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba mar mtshan// sdang srid b+h+yo bzlog me yim bsreg/ dgra po'i lus srog bag chags bsreg/ rngag tu bskal ba mchis tsan// lus can zla lazad cing brgyag/ sbal pa'i khyi mo dag mo dgu// dgral khrod la zla dang grol// drag tu bskul ba mchis cid/
299b3(rnying rgyud): stong gsum nad kyi dmar 'chang // dam nyams dgra la rims nad phob// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsan// snad srid lus srog dngas snyigs 'byed// dragra bo'i lus srog dngas snyigs kye// tshe bkrag bsdum la rtsa rgyud chod// srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma// spyan nas
299b4(rnying rgyud): zag 'dzag za lu wa// shangs nas drug khrag bun ne bran// snyan nas 'brug sla ri re// zhal gyi ram smis stong gsum phung // g.yas pa dgun skying sbram dgu// thogs nas dgra ba'i tshed+ha 'byin// g.yon pa dgun thod pa dgra// dgral khrag mda' dug bor
299b5(rnying rgyud): 'bed// dam po'i khong du drag mda' tshob// klad pa 'thon la klad khrag chom// lus srog grol la tsi t+ta gtubs// khrag mnga' dug thun phu zer tshog// sngags pa'i sgra dgra sgrol la shog/ b+h+yas la po da kyi sngags brnam la dgral dzad do// 'khor lo thud bdes
299b6(rnying rgyud): las kyi mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srin mo gzir te nye bar las la mngag pa 'di gsungs so// grog mkhar gyi tshi las dmar lo// bong bu'i bdud rtsis legs smras la// srin mo'i ldor so gong bzhin bca'// kha khyer gsum ldan gong du ba rko// snying
299b7(rnying rgyud): po 'bru gnyis 'bru dgu gzhug/ drag sngags bzlas la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo pos la khrag gis bran// phrar bas bsdigs la dbang du bsdu// srin mo bka' nod zhabs 'og gzhug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/

300a1(rnying rgyud): gzer dang sgrogs pa'i drag sngags 'ad brtan te// e ka ya mthor rag ma lathung byeng / dran dun rdzog nan// ja thor te shag tsiH/ dam po'i sgrog lathur thams / mUr ya zad/ snying ga'i lhung po sngags bton la// lan meng cung

300a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs rgyad nag po las/ lo thog mtha' spang kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das ces las kun mi mtha' sdang dragashin na rje bang klu ldir sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dru khrod gdug pa'i dbyen gnas sa// rang sems dben

300b1(rnying rgyud): khrag rtsa bdag chung sgra// nga sha dang ni thog la// da yi mang dang dras zas la// snying gar klan la sda mar bsdam// thod par 'jug la dang dragazhug zhing ngas rangs zhabs mal// sleb sna mazad path+ya// gta pa dang par mdzag ma// dgras nas thog na

300b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po gzugs// blug ma gsum la bsrung ba'i wa// chu ba maH ba'i thag sngags las// yang logs rtsibs la lnga gri rbad// gdug pa'i gseb tu rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshams dang mya ngan ming dus khams// bkod la tshab drag nus bkru// thod pa'i steng du la

300b6(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi ri rab bsnams// g.yon pa gsum na lcags kyu dang // zhags po rdo rje rgya kram bsnams// zhal gdangs lhal dang mi ro 'brul// stong nas me 'bar 'dab chags lding // smad nas khrag 'dzag gcan gzan rol// thugs kar nyi mar ya dang sngags//
