304a4(rnying rgyud): rngubs shag mug tri ling sarba s+phu ri ling sbur/ nA ga rA dza ha ya ka pa ha h+ya ha la ha la ki li ha sa pho ba/ sngags kyi rgyal po gang dmigs la// lus dang yan lag sbyor shes na// ltas ngan cho 'phrul dbab par bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs gyud
304a5(rnying rgyud): nag po las/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po sngags kyi yon tan 'di gsungs so// e yi ye shes las byung ba// drag po 'joms shing srog snying sdud// lhun grub tshe bdag
304a6(rnying rgyud): snying por rdzogs// ka ye ye shes las byung ba// sbyor ba las kyi rgyal por 'dus// sprul pa mgo dgu'i snying po rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// ya ma thugs kyi snying po ste// rlung gi stobs kyis 'phen zhing 'bul// ma yi ye shes
304a7(rnying rgyud): las byung ba// bdud mo srog gi snying po yin// bskyed dang sdud pa'i dbang po rdzogs// he li ye shes las byung ba// dgyes pa'i gar dgus gdug pa 'joms// bya khyud rgyal po'i snying por rdzogs// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// sro ka dang dbang
304a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'di rnam pa ri ge 'i mang
304b1(rnying rgyud): po las bsdus nas// las kyi tshe bdag srog bdud 'joms// snying dri ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa gnas su 'dams dang 'bo// khyung sa srug drug snying bar rdzogs// zhags ye shes las byung ba/ dregs pa gnod byin gdug pa 'joms
304b2(rnying rgyud): gsang bdag rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg cing skem la gnas mya spong // zhe sdang gdug pa'i snying por rdzogs// mA yi ye shes las blang ba// yo ha las la mngag pa ste// srid pa'i dbang mo 'dun mor rdzogs/
304b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes las byung ba// snang srid mdangs b+hA bsdus nas 'ching // srid pa'i dus sbal snying por rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// las ni rlung gis 'phu zhing rlom// pha mA rA rtswa'i snying po rdzogs// phyugs kyi ye shes pas byung ba// da pas gsum
304b4(rnying rgyud): dbang la las bsgyur ba// rngubs kyi ye shes las byung ba// tsha grang nad srin 'bras bu rgyas/ yug gi ye shes las byung ba// pho nya sha za rang dbang bsgyur// dza lis sreg byed dong dbang bsgyur// gyis spong byed drug drug bsrong // sha ni srin pos ngadi
304b5(rnying rgyud): ba sgrol// grobs chos nyid gsal bar byed// zlum gyis chags sdang gnas su 'joms// dpa' tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi garnga ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar po
304b6(rnying rgyud): kyi 'bru bzhir bslus pa'i spri ngang 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas bya// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// dbang brtu pa mod pa'i drag sngags brjes// ngur khrod rgyal tsakra bcang // bu khyung bzhi dang ldan par 'askor/ ste/
304b7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gsum ma dzaT// gnyis brgya la ma yang dag pa dgod// gsum pas pa rkyen tshang rtsibs brgyad la// srog la phreng phreng srog la gsum// dun dun pa'i la srog la zad deng wa// kha shag drug bci cad bdun// srog yo zhes pa babyed du dgod// ya
305a1(rnying rgyud): logs chu yi mu khyud la// gang grub bsad sngags s+ho sde pas dgod// ba ma'i mtshon cha'i rtsibs bcu la// myog dang rmad dang khyer dang phyung // mug dang ting dang ladu dang shag/ long dang zad rnams rdzogs par dpod/
305a2(rnying rgyud): srid ka'i rus sbal ston gnas// kha spar rjen gyi la par gzhugs/ tshon klung lnga dang phag mo'i stor// gzi la mchog pur snying gar gdab// thod pa bcas la kle pa gzer// gzhan dang mchod rten nag pa la// gtad pa'i las tshogs kyang
305a3(rnying rgyud): na mtshan gsum rjes gangs ma 'grug// kho mo nyid lag blag gcig sbyar// phyeb rgyabasam gtan zil gnon bsgos// rang yang rang lag pa par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sra gsung thags rdo rje las sngags 'ang brtan to//
305a4(rnying rgyud): ka ya dgra bo'i srog zeng ni srog la dun dun/ srog la zad khe shag tsa rbad/ srog la myog nad khyer phyung mug ling shig sheng zad/ sbyor ba kun gyi mchog bsdus pa'i// las kyi tsa bedral bar gsungs// sems kyi drod brtag zi la ma min// sku yi phung
305a5(rnying rgyud): gnas spangs nas// rin chen rgyal bar thugs 'phang ste// gnyis su med pa'i rang rig gsal// rang byung ye shes rang 'bar ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyang ba 'di gsungs so// rig pa gnyis med do na gsal ba'i// rang rig ngo
305a6(rnying rgyud): rje'i phyag rgyar gsal// sku gsum bde ba'i rig pa rdzogs// sgyu ma'i ye shes rang shar ba'i// don gyi man ngag drag po'i sngags rgod la// bsad gso bab bcad ltas brda thog ser las// kun 'dus rnam rtog chen po rang las 'byung zhing 'char// de yi sbyor
305a7(rnying rgyud): badrag po lnga dang ldan// wa yi mchog tu steng po nyon gyi las// de las 'bru bzhi 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// 'bru bzhi gsang gso las 'di srung ba'i mchog/ dgram bzhi pi rtsa las ye shes bzhi shar pa// dug lnga'i las dang gdug pa'i sbyor ba kun 'joms
305b1(rnying rgyud): par// da kyor ba rgyas pa 'das ste// du thod ras sam shog zu gru bzhi la// sbyar ba wa dang tshab drug cu'i bkyangs// las kyi 'khang lo mra ldang bzhin ba nor// dbus su gra gsum rtag sa gsum shA na// dam kyi ma rgyag ma hA rAk+kiH// yang pags
305b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ma yongs// pa mang rdzoms can brgyag nyi kyi mon rdzu tur// srid pa'i khams khang pag mi gyi bar bca'// de la gnas shing dag pa'i nges pa'i// gragasum gang gdod meng dang snying po mo// blag ma gsum ma rnams kyi/ @
305b3(rnying rgyud): tse ba'i 'bru bzhi dgang // gArje sa chung bdag gdug pa'i ming // bcu gnyis rtsibs pa gcad cing gzing ba'i 'gas// bkod pa m+ba dang dang stong mar ba sdams// bod pa ma bcug sa lugs sa ca babs pa dag/ spyo tshun lag @
305b4(rnying rgyud): lnga drag tu gzir// li na'i snying gang mchog gi phur pa gad ba// drag tu bsrung zhing dmigs bdud pas padug/ bying pas bkab la yungs kar grub pa bkru// las de sngon nus bka' te 'og tu mnan// gladangs bdag gtan dang lha gdon dang // gsung rjem
305b5(rnying rgyud): phur pa khyung // dregs bcan dang pon po'i rigs gnyis 'dzin// bdud dang su ste zla brtson dang bral por bya// ji brang ga shin rdog lung bdag ga 'dzin ste// rang rang ming dang snying po skur bas bcad// dge sngags myor ba la sogs bcud du gsungs so// de nas
305b6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs dz+ra rje las drag sngags 'di ba ton ta// h+ye d+han ka yaM/ sarba tso/ myags kha tho 'drid phying sha gzang/ srog la bring zeng shag dran dran su madz+rar kro dza/ sa n+ta ga snying gzar sbyar nan/ khaM sha kar pa zang / sad+ha ga dza/ sa twa ga rbaM/ 5
305b7(rnying rgyud): rbang/ sarbA ga / rim thun chadang / kha dz+wa la rams thag sbyin 'dzid la bzag sder rden/ rjeg nan/ ye ka ya ma shig 'drid phyung / khai shag rjeg nan/ spang nan/ sab shadz+ra g+h+ra ng+ge ye rjod/ 'ang / 'di ga sbyor bdapas so// gis rnams kun gyi rtsa rab shed// da
306a1(rnying rgyud): ma su dag pa'ang/ dbang na dra nga bra rgya shA tu za// / dadams chu nags nga 'dug su dag/ mam gas pa yongs na // grangs gyu da ya /
306a2(rnying rgyud): gtan la 'bebs// ya ga sa dang las 'chad// 'di ma gnas shing bsrung ba no// dz+haiM rgyal po yin pa dang // 'cha ni rab tu rtags pa la// bka' mi byin rdzags thugs pas byung // dod dmas pa 'dzin te// gnyen 'dug pa ga sa/
306a3(rnying rgyud): bahral grags kyi 'khor po bca// drar khrod gnas nas dpa'i bo yis// gos su bca' ba'i rta blangs pa// gos la slebs stong la bya// de la bod pa'i 'khor lo ba/ thig gor rnam pa bzhi bskor// dbus su bzang rnam stsol// gdag par gzugs da
306a4(rnying rgyud): se// par bdag tu pa ma'i// thugs gsum pas du da // sa skye'i gyur ba sa padz+ra/ gams na/ pa'i drug chags 'bru rji da// yang logs sdepas rgya bcu gnyis la// ma la dzung gyi bab par gyur// khams
306a5(rnying rgyud): rdal khrag drug snga'o// zhabs mar sngags bstim thal ci rdzas// ljags phung seng lde rdzas rgod nams// drag gis ngar brung drag sngags dkrug/ grogs padrug ngos gzung ba'i rdzas// dgun zla gsum la nyan zhag gcig/ rngu rjel khri tsho nang tu bstis// dpyid rnags
306a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor dril ba ga/ zhag dang pyod par bskyeb// dbyang blagasu skye stong la// zhag gsum/ la gta ma gzug/ yul dbus ka dang lta rten la// thod chen srung zod sbal gzug dang // ston nu stong rnams bzlog brdeg/ brgyapa bcu par khrag la bstis
306b1(rnying rgyud): ba ngas rnams sgrug/ lesu sa pa thag su shig// drug sngags ga byung ba // ngang pa byang nga gzang pa tus// dpa sa thangs dadapa pas dngas// ngas nang gan // drag pas gags pa
306b2(rnying rgyud): kyangs sras bkri yi 'dzir// rtsA'i grod 'khor brtag cig sol// nyi shu dgu yi mdung gang po// dbab pa gsug pa'i sbyor ba brtsal// bubarda ga ta' ma gzugs TIg so// de nas yang bcom ldan padas byeg nyid kyi gragasung rje las drag sags 'di na
306b3(rnying rgyud): ub sa pa/ shang shang kyi 'jug tu lag yag na te/ s+ho rji \u0f7f/ rdo y-i/ ma brdzun drug ti gzod dz+wal shA/ rba mig tanan pa dmigs shing // thor nang stor zang bzang // mi legi pags pa
306b4(rnying rgyud): sa
306b5(rnying rgyud): 'phang ba'i sbyor ba di gsungs so// de bzhin gnas dang mdza swA bcad pa// thog srod mo thog nyams cad du/ khro bong gsar dang jog sngag zangs// je nag sangs kar rgyal po spangs// rta nag rba mi dag zhang // thag lnga dang babs jog// yung dang
306b6(rnying rgyud): mas// gas dngam/ lo ma drug // thapa thab ni sngags kyi las/ 'o shi lde'i mo pa dgang // nas ga gnangadang thaMng dang pa 'bad pa sa dang thaMd pa ba //
306b7(rnying rgyud): byal ga/ sa ga sa / sas nga shAgs da / dgab ba 'dzis
307a1(rnying rgyud): lus pa sa shes gal la bcad// 'bar pa bstad pa'idug sngags na/ madrug pa pabral// gas sgyu nga ra// dug d+hA thug nangag nga du byag// gan ga du drang
307a2(rnying rgyud): dbab// sbyor ba'i rgyal po khong du gzhug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag ljags 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM/ raM thun do myag dz+wa la kho ra/ de thun mA ra ya rnaM rdo kha khyer lang / rag tu sgeg khas zang/ oM ya khi'i jug
307a3(rnying rgyud): la thun gyo/ sa rba tsit+ka s+phar nam kham shig zang b+h+yo// dgra po'i srog la hur sbyinan 'drid zad/ sarba sha d+hi tri myags zad/ kha pri b+hi ga nan/ las 'di sdang snang bye ba min// thog ser sbyin thang skyong bar bshad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stas ngan gyi gyur ba 'di gas
307a4(rnying rgyud): so// spel dang phyi la wa thod dang // sbrul dang srin bya phag sha dang // gzugs dang ming rus bcas la bca'// drag sngags khri bdun drug chu brtse// chos brgyad srod la mkhang pa gzug/ gzugs rnams 'thab cing zhwa 'byin du// gyur ba smin nas rten rnams gdan
307a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drug sngags 'di bton to// e dun ka yai ru sti nan du tid has phob/ las kyi rgyal po 'bru bzhi yis// 'byung ba bzhi dkrug dngas ma snad// ye shes bzhi yi thig le rdzogs// sngags kyi 'od zer 'pho zhing
307a6(rnying rgyud): 'jil// kun gyi rtsa bajil bar bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ thog ser sbyong ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi don 'khor la gdams pa 'di gsungs so// gyur ni 'grel ba gsum
307a7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// chos dang chos can nyid gcig pa// yul sems gnyis 'dzin dang snang shugs// blta spyod man dag thabs cig dang // gzhi la ma 'bras bu ro gcig gnas// 'khor 'das sdang srid don la gcig/ bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun 'das//
307b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin bdag nyid dang du rdzogs// bde ba nyams dang 'ad gsalar// so ma lhag brdzogs te gnas// thabs dang thabs nyid thabs bsam yas// bya ba med par rang shar 'di// a dang yang dag sgyu mar sbyar// e dang skye ba'i cho 'phrub rdzogs// ma
307b2(rnying rgyud): skye ba gnas las 'das// skye 'jig 'gag pa stong bdag med// bde ba'i ye shes ro nyid mnyam// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dzin pa dang // mnyam pa'i don la drod len pa// sangs rgyas nyid dang skal ba mnyam// 'di la yun gyi don ldan pas// che bas
307b3(rnying rgyud): yon tan rdzogs// rang lus rdo rje sems dpa' med// yan lag rdo rje stong bdag med// stong pa nyid las gzhan med pas// snying po don gyi sbyin pa yin// sbyor dang sbyor ba rang bzhin pas// rang nyams bde ba'i sbyor par bshad// 'di de ba de dang smin pa'i mchog
307b4(rnying rgyud): po mchog dang don zab pas// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dril ba yin// nga yi sbyor ba me lce 'di// khro tshogs gang gi stobs bsdus yin// nga yi stobs kyi drag sngags 'di// bgrod pa thob pa'i go mtshon mchog/ nga yi gsang ba'i sgron ma 'di// ma rig
307b5(rnying rgyud): 'khar ba'i bde lam yin// 'di la gnas shing bsgrub pa dang // 'dod pa'i dngos grub len pa dang // phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor ba/ 'bras bur nges pa'i thabs su bshad// mnyam pa'i rgyal por rgyas par bsngags// gseng ba'i bdag por
307b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs nga'i// nye bar gyur pa'i rgyud 'di la// bgrod pa'i stobs kyis gang len pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'don// rnal 'byor bde ba'i lam can la// nga yang dam las mi g.yel bslang // sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin//

308a3(rnying rgyud): da da lung shAn/ nyid dag paradang byung dngal// she ldan par dgas pag/ nga 'das kyang ba dang ga she gas pa// bral sems gnyis 'du 'phrul pa gal// da rdzogs kyi rjes pan/

308a5(rnying rgyud): gis da migangs/ ma ma tun nga // theb dbang slod pa'i rnam byod rnam// bzod par bang ga myig rgya ba ba// rig pa'i bang yis med cing bskyed// nga rje stong bdag rje ba dganas// sems can mangs rdzas ma lus smran// tu dang
308a6(rnying rgyud): bzung zhing bstan par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag s+ho las/ gyud gtad pa'i le'u ste sum thu ba'o// / klud kyi snying po drim pa zhes bya
308a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams pa dbyed gongs pa gcig tu bsdus pa spyi'i yul du chags pa rdzogs so// // / phya gang ga du/ mar+tha ya ma maN+Da hU~M la rjod la ts+yai \u0f7f/ bdas dang / 'jam dpal ga shi 'phrul la khor dag po sdig pa pa
308b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpa' 'jigs byed mun pa yak+ShAt+ma ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ chus kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong / mtha' dbus med pa'i pho bra saM/ su yongs su ma chad pa'i ye shes ldan gyis grab /
308b2(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang na/ bcom ldan 'das su gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ sangs rgyas kun gying po rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chos nyid ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba mnyam pa chen po'i ngang la sgoms par zhugs so// de nyings bsgribs
308b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes dang / sa dang lam la gnas pa rnams dang / lha dang mkha' 'gro rig pa 'dzin pa rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes pa dang / 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso bo rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de
308b4(rnying rgyud): dgra gi nang nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang // chos spu thugs rje chen pos kun zab kyang // ma rtogs sems can zags rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// mi tog dbyings las rdzogs
308b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i grwar bzhengs la// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid mi rtog pa'i dbyings las rol pa chen po'i thugs rje'i chags pas srung bzhengs te/ dregs pa can dbang du bsdu zhing 'dul ba'i phyir/ phyag
308b6(rnying rgyud): na po zil gyis gnon pa'i skur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang sngags 'di dag ched du gsungs so// s+ye e s+ye/ a kro te ka/ ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma ye/ kA la rU pa/ ka pa ye/ hri sti/ a pa ye/ a a ne/ a ne/ u u ne/ u ne/ phu du ne dAne
308b7(rnying rgyud): a sI/ u e/ oM e/ re d+hi/ lag+ni/ du du yaM/ bya tsam/ sat+ta ye/ tri da ye/ d+ha da ye/ tsad+hA ye/ ha la ya/ prA kha ye/ U An/ U yU ne/ byi krita/ A A/ d+hA nA/ ya mar mo/ ya mad k+tha/ ya ma ga a/ ya marak+Sha/ bet+tA li r+rad+d+hi shatI/ ma ma aM kang te/ dma?
309a1(rnying rgyud): lab la/ // na gan// dag gang // arba// sags kyad pajug na/ spa yan/ ng+gA / shAg bya nag ta za pa/ gsu gsungs pas rnamasapa ste grags pa
309a2(rnying rgyud): tu phyung to// bachung de kya gras phyogs bcur 'thor ro// reti'i rgya mtsho 'khrug go// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'ar thung dang chem ze me dang rab tu 'gul ldegs// de'i tsha da'i dus na 'khor thams cad bskul te/ lus sa lce rdzogs shing zad pa'i dbang po
309a3(rnying rgyud): so// de nas yad rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye sa to// 'jigs byed chen po lags/ mnyam pa'i drang las 'jigs pa'i skyer khos te// gsang sags gsung gi ngo bo cheng dri gsung // 'jig rten khams rnams rab tu cheras/ 'khor tshogs 'dus pa
309a4(rnying rgyud): srog dang bral bu nye// thugs rje nyi ma lta bur dbugs dbyung byung // dkyil 'khor chen po bskrun par phrin pas bgro// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs te/
309a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lnga 'dun pa skyes te/ skad cig mas lhag ste rang rang gi snying po mthu rtsal dran nas phul te sku la 'khril bar gyur to// dpal sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom
309a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das la rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// lnga bcu'i tha ma snyigs ma'i dus kyi cho// 'chi bdag bdud kyi gshin rje longs nas 'khrug/ mtshams med lnga yi las rnams 'dun spyod pa// dag par ba dbang phyug bdud kyi sprul pa
309a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyed// rang dang 'dra ba'i tshul 'dzin pa rdang dra yis// rtso pa la sogs sngags dang dug drangs 'tshal// de dus gzer thun nag po dgod pa'i mchog/ sdig pa nag po snying la du 'dzings pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas
309b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo thams cad 'byung zhing las kyi gzer thun drag po byas par bya ba'i phyir/ btsun mo chos kyi dbyings kyi b+hag la snyoms par zhugs te ye shes bzhi dang sgra gsung thugs las/ ya ma rA dza dang / myos byed 'bar ba dang / Ar+ya dmang po dang /
309b2(rnying rgyud): cher dgu dang bzhi mngon du phyung ste/ de nyid dregs pa 'dul zhing zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir/ ya ma rA tsa dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / rus skal mi zan dang / ye shes bya byung dang bzhir gyur to// 'byung ba'i bor 'dzin pa nyid dag nas// dang sa ma ye shes chen po brdar
309b3(rnying rgyud): gol te/ phyag rgya'i sku lajigs par gyur to// sprul ba rnam pa gsum te/ sku'i sprul ba 'chi bdag/ gsung gi sprul pa thog padag/ thugs kyi sbrul batsho bdag ste/ gtsug pa ca 'dral bar gyur to// gshed chen po bzhi pas/ las gyi snyan pa bzhi sprul ta/
309b4(rnying rgyud): gshed sum pargya drug cus phung po la dbang bsgyur ro// mogasheng bdud mal zhes mo gshedasam bcu drug rngus 'byung ba la dbang bsgyur ro// de ltang gi shi rje bdun 'phrul sogs pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can thams cad kyis dpa' lcag tu chen po zil gyis gnan
309b5(rnying rgyud): ya.An+ta ka la yongs su bskor te/ rol ba chen po las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khod par gyur te bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsung so// snang stong gnyis med ye shes su// thig le nyag gcig spos dang bral/
309b6(rnying rgyud): med rnam dag pade chen sku// 'gag med bde chen klong gdal ba'i// brda dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// chags dang bral gyis grub pa'o// zhen chags gzung 'dzin tog dpyod 'das// gnyis mang don dam chos kyi sku// rgyu dang rkyen las sgrub pa med// kun gyi rang bzhin
309b7(rnying rgyud): dngos med pa// yon tan ma lus sun 'byung ba'i// de nyid tog med brjod deng thal// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi sku// phyag rgya chen po ye shes nyid// stong pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// rang sdang rol pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// las dang sbyor ba du ma kun// sgyu ma ldan
310a1(rnying rgyud): grub la bar bshad// 'di dag pa dang byi byung ba'i// dal pa chen pa' 'khor la yan// sdig pa snyid 'ang das dakhrul 'khor nag po'i gsang k+Sha/ las/ lus kyi 'khrul 'khar bshad pa'i 'du/ gnyis par/
310a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i phyir/ sdig pa nag po snying la ru 'dzings pa'i/ 'khrul 'khor dkyil 'khor chen po'i bca' thabs 'di gsungs so// stobs chen nag po'i rdzas 'azlog dang // phung shul mi bsang ga
310a3(rnying rgyud): brtses so// dur khrod ro yis dag la// ro bsreg rdo dang sol ba dang // gri lcags dpa' bo g.yul bsad khrag/ dngug re'u lhag a sho nag/ glog mkhangs sbyin khro shug nag/ shog 'das mtsho chu sbyar te brdzog nag po bu gang bar rim bzhi/
310a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs stobs chen mi 'gyur gnad// gdan la rus sbal glang chen 'degs// par la rigs bzhi sbrul gyis 'dregs// bang rim bzhi la stag dang gzig/ gsum pa seng ge chu srin no// 'khor lo 'brug gis 'degs pa la// char khe tha mkha' lding
310a5(rnying rgyud): na/ rang dang kha dog sngon pa ste// mkhas pas bkod pas stobs chen gnang // bang rim phyogs kun drag po'i// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sto bca'// gri mda' skrag rgod khrag chen ldan// srog shing zil gnon su ru shar// ba rim dang po zung bzhi
310a6(rnying rgyud): srin po ya mA hA tsa dang // gshin nu myos byed 'bar ba dang // bdud po Ar+ya ma ru tsho// gnod sbyinur lnga ba tshang dgu dgod// bang rim gnyis par srog gi gshed// dung lcags bse dang gser gyi mon// gsum pa kyi yi gshed bzhi'o// tha mar 'chi bdag bcwa
310a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis dgod// dkar po snying 'byin ma gon po nag/ yang je nag po sku mdog dmar// drag po sgo bzhi dag la dgod// lhar gsal stong gsum zil gnon slob/ sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs dpag med// bkang rten byin rlabs yun du gnas// bar dam /
310b1(rnying rgyud): gi bar bar du// phas kyi sgra dang gnod byed mnan// gang bsrub las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// stobs dang ldan pa'i sngags pa'am// rdo rje nang dme drag po yi// gnam lcags ur mo nang 'gras na// rgya mtsho'i gting du nAg bdud// mun pa'i dpag
310b2(rnying rgyud): spyad 'khor lo bcang// ri rab rtsel gan ma lcags dag/ yur mo so brdar 'khor lo bca'// ri zung mtshams su zhe sdang can// khros pa gzhu bcag 'khor lo bcang // nam mkha' mthing gi byar la// spong ba bshig pa'i mtshoni cha dbab// ya bag sha yi lus

310b4(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed dang la dbab pa'i las/ lus kyi dbul 'khor rting lnga bskor ba 'di gsungs so// sku rten yongs su rdzogs pa'i sto ba ru// maN+Dal mthing nag gru gsum dag/ grangs gsum dang dug khrag smra// bang rim gsum la 'a gyur
310b5(rnying rgyud): rtsang // dug dang sol bas nag po dbyug/ dpa' brtul can gyi sngags pa yis// zhing lpags dag gaN+Da ro ngas la// rno myur gdug byed phag mo'i ltor// srid pa'i khyams khang srog snying sdud// khyams khang lho ru mnan pa gzhung // snying gar mtshon cha'i
310b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bca'// rgya gra ma dag la rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu bzhi spu gris so// rtsa ba spu gri'i bar na khyams// bston pa bdud du 'bebs pa'i 'bru// ming dus khams bcas za kha dbab// rus sbal lto ba'i phyogs mtshams la// bcwa

311a2(rnying rgyud): 'bru yis 'doms// dngas ma bzhi yis la// chos nyid rtsal e dang myigs// sa yi dngas ma sbrel byud// yon tan rnal yadang drabus// ma~M ya~M dang sa maN+Da la smad// maM shes rdul srog dang shag/ rmA yi dngas ma drung la skyed// rang hUM rdza
311a3(rnying rgyud): dun// dbus ma sdud cing nad gzhi rgyus// rlung gi rnam shes dngas ma 'degs// de baphral ngo 'od de mtshon las// de bcad de nyid bsregs shing 'joms// mdung pa bzhi la mtshon ma'i 'bru// bdun gnyis drug gnyis bsnol mar gnas// las kyi se rgya
311a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrug cing gyom// rang bdud rang gi rgyud la ldang / mtshon chas rang srog rang gis gcod// snying la gnas pa'i tshe bdag gis// rtsa rnams gcod cing srog rten 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i yang steng 'a

315a3(rnying rgyud): sbreng 'og ling+ga sgo sbyar bya// bar ma'i mu khyud dregs pa can// 'dus pa'i yang snying 'khor bar bri// phyi ris 'byung ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi// sbom 'ang sdud pa'i yang snying bri// e bi ra yaM khaM shig/ tseb+hag tu bas/ sas gtabs/ mos rme// chus dgrag/ d+hAng
315a4(rnying rgyud): gis g.yeng / kha re ba ldag/ sA'i khas yen/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ e ka ya ma srog la tur bruM gzir nan/ dgra bo'i skyeng la shag rbang / rA tir khrag dgra bo'i sreg la yaM yaM tri ling dgra bo'i snying la sha gA rbad/ nag po nA ga b+he ta srog la dza 'dzal/ nr-i Sh+pe shag/ dgrwa po'i
315a5(rnying rgyud): larbad/ tsau tu breng sha ga nI mA ra ya/ 'khor lo kha myar ga'ur gzhug/ nam mkha' bar snang sa 'og gi/ dbang chen stobs chen 'dus pa ye na// 'og gi 'khrul 'khor gsang bar bshad// bar cha'i 'khor lo 'di lta ste// gshed po las chas sto barba// mA khyad rim pa la/
315a6(rnying rgyud): ru bskor// dbus su 'dod pa'i ming rus bri// g.yas g.yon 'doms su dam pri ru// klu sri nas srin snying po bri// snying la sdig pa bzhi bgrad pa// dmar len drag sngags 'bru brgyad bri// phyi rim yang snying 'khrul mig dag/ brgyad bzhi dregs pa'i yang snying de// tha
315a7(rnying rgyud): ma 'khor lo bsu gnyis rtsi bas// byas pa 'jig pa'i 'khrul 'khor bri// bar cha dag gi 'khrul 'khor yin// sarba sha d+h+r-i stam+b+ha ya nan/ 'grir rbad/ pad+ma sUr srog nan snying gzer zeng shag yi rbad/ ri rab bar rim gsum pa'i khang // gru gsum dpa po dug khrag
315a8(rnying rgyud): byug/ rabs chad thod par 'khrul 'khor bca'// sgra bzhi rdzogs pa'i mchod rgan dag/ rus sbal gdan la glang chen 'dags// sgo bzhi gri lcags sdug ma ru// drag po'i sngags thun mtshon chas brdar// bsad pa las kyi mtshan du bshad// da
315b1(rnying rgyud): mgyung byags gsal ba yi// stobs chen snang brdzogs pa dang // rdzas rab kun gyi mchog tu bshad// jigapa snying 'dzings 'phrul 'apor nas pa gsang chung las/ rdzas bathog gsang ba gajal labar rgyal bcwa gnyis pa'o// / de ngas pa
315b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzegs byed chen po des/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di gsungs so// gdod nas rnamadag ye shes sku// lhun gyis grub pa yin pa la// rtsol bsgrub dogs 'dzin pa thal// rnam teg bag chags smin lha thA// rnam ma kha' la bar 'dzin med
315b3(rnying rgyud): pa// lung btud kyi mchog tu bshad// stong ba'i dbyings las rdzogs pa yi// phyag tu'i ngog pa yongs rdzogs pa// bsam gtan sems kyi 'khang longs shAd// rna dang 'bras bu mag dang bas// rdegs pa'ang nyer shes dran// rigs pa rang gshe
315b4(rnying rgyud): gis byed// bsam gtan 'khor 'byed par// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// ming bsrog pa dbyings su bskal// sngags kyi grong khyer rab 'asgrib zhing // ming rnas pas shing rab tu gzing // rnam shesu thug cing gcad rtsa la// sngag
315b5(rnying rgyud): bas bdug ba / dregs pas dbugs shing dbang bsgyus la// mi sa pas labog cang gcing // dab shes pa sa gang // bzung shi zlog pa'i la dag sted bye / byeng pa'i khams pangan/ @#
315b6(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i bge gnas// ngag sngags dazugs kyi rgyub 'on// dag nga sa dod zer rang thugs 'o// shicig da kya bsgral// rang gdang gangag pa'i mig tangs// deng gsheng thogs kyi 'jor 'gro// ku 'dub rtswa da pa sa// thar pa
315b7(rnying rgyud): gas das/ med pa rgyams 'a na sa gang// 'di dag pasad pa'i yu// da pa ba phyir// 'i ma da kyi so// ma du ba so thab gyur/ phyogasas marna pa'i / pags
316a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ las su shes// 'phang na bdag las rab mchog/ rlung ba klag sa pas kyis snabs// srir ni gzul 'khor gsang pa'i bzung // yang gas pyugs kyi 'khor lo bshad// las kyi rtul po'i/ zhang // mas na
316a2(rnying rgyud): par byed// dam med slo ba bu'i sems pa nyid// sngags kyi sdig pasaHbtsud za// das 'dres pas yi sbal pa la// nad khrag 'jas shing ldang bar 'gyur// sngags pa nag pa ste yi sun// rang gshed pas yi sbal ba yis// nam shas drug zag me chur brgol/
316a3(rnying rgyud): pa rigs gnyis kyi rol pa// ngaganod na dang mtshon gyis bsgral// gnam lcags 'thab na rtog med las// phyag rgya rdzogs pas rol pa'i rtsa// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsgom// gzhan gyi stobs rnams rab tu gzir// las dru ste'i dgongs par bshad/
316a4(rnying rgyud): spobs dang dpral ba dang // rgya gram rdzogs pa'i sngags zis te// kye steng ri rab dag gi sa ma na// zhi khro rur pa gshin rjengs// sa bdag bu srin yan chad kyi// sngags kyi bzlas brjod ci byas pa// ri rab rgya gram chen po yis// ngag gi nus pa gdon par byed// dus ma
316a5(rnying rgyud): ces kyang brjod// dag po de dag mnan 'khor lo bshad// 'byung ba 'i khram bsrog ca spyi// gsang sngags 'a kho lo bskor ba yis// 'jig rten lha 'dre khams 'khrugs shing // mtshon cha'i 'khor lo log pa ltar// khong nyid la thog pa ni// gro zlog pa
316a6(rnying rgyud): bshang // 'chi bdag shan pa slob ru// gsang ba'i sngags rje stod thug pas// lce srin co d+ha 'khrug pa yis// gzas pa'i srog 'bral bas ni// con dkrug pa'i las su bshad// srid pade u sbal stob ra// klu dang sa bdag sde bzhi la// stobs kyi sra
316a7(rnying rgyud): zer gyis// gdug pa'i klu gnyad dug grangs te// gzas pa'i snying la 'dus par bsam// gtad pog nag pa'i las su bshad// phyag rgya mtshon cha dmigs pa'i yul/ gsal ba gsum gyis las kun grub// ces gsungs so// sdig pa snying la
316b1(rnying rgyud): ngas 'gru pa ra dag pags pa byung pas/ 'a ga snang bags du tsug pa sas/ da 'du ngas rgyas sa sa na 'as byu dpas pa dgung sags pas/ sa sus sa da papa thang ba/
316b2(rnying rgyud): bad kren pa'i bka'// gsang tshig dpod pa'i lam mchog 'di// rig byed rdo rje snying pos zang // blo med na ma dag kyis dbyis yo zang nas// thugs rje'i rim pas bye blagaci bstan kyang // gnyis med 'gas tha phyag pos ngogs// dang snang gnyis myed
316b3(rnying rgyud): m+bu'i Ta// gcad dbung pas grol bu'i se shes // yon nyid dog cig sa rjo ste// zag ma da pas rnas kyi sa gdon pa gnas// prA lem+b+ha la'i phyag 'i yang gdas// gsung mdo bangs su za dzan// ga shi tshe yul
316b4(rnying rgyud): de// las skabs kyis rtse ba sa bri'i// ba nyid ni sa pra gyur po med// skye ba thal lnga sa nga bzhi med// man rten mi shes mthor dang po rtsong nga// snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i dang las 'ar// thabs ces su bad ba chen po dang // bzang
316b5(rnying rgyud): brtsas gyi yang // sa no pa mngon pa'i ga/ rdzog pa@sa pa'o// bangapa'i/ gangs shes pa'i tisnying ba'o// dpa la dag pa dab kyi // rjeb byung ba nams dag/ thabs
316b6(rnying rgyud): brjeb// ma du brtsegs pa'i ga pa' ba// dam mkhang par dang pag pa / pang mardzogs panas kyi gdang / na par dag / gangs kyi par bsod par gabya// phyag tugs pa pas ma chog pa// rdzogs par na
316b7(rnying rgyud): gzer// me gzhong pa la ri la kyis thab// tha gad sa gzugs la gdeng yig dgang // mas bshAr na dpa' byar/ ny-i rjeg nga bayang // gdug pa su me gtad rdzas rdzog/ sa pa'i las sa thangs gyur// babang pa
316b8(rnying rgyud): 'alegs kyang
317a1(rnying rgyud): shes par spyad// kun dug/ srin stobs gzhos zhing // ngag mdun 'khor lo bcas la mnan// stobs chen nus pa 'joms par bshad// // dkrug pa'i rang gshed dbab// sdig pa'i lus tshang brtags la gtan
317a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs na shis par bshad// e ma yang gsang nal 'byor rgyud// thabs dang shes rab snying po'i don// rtsa ba bshad pa 'phrul gyi bka'// yang snying nag po gsang ba'i mtshan// sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'di// gsang bdag rdo rje snying po dang /
317a3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod 'phrul ni sprul par bshad// lha dang mkha' 'gro rig pa 'dzin// rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dregs pa'i 'khor// byang sems bka' dang lung por min// slob dpon mi spang spyan me brnyas// sangs rgyas bka' la nges par bkur// tha mad
317a4(rnying rgyud): mchog yi dam mchod// bdag gzhan byang chub sems mi gas dri// don gyi lam sgor log pa la// gsang sngags brda'adang dam mi sa// yongs sum sbyangs tshod mi sbyar// theg pa de mAn la chos mi bshad// bka' la tshad me bras mi gzhang // dang
317a5(rnying rgyud): mi rgyag phyag rgyabs na// rin po ma ma chil mi swA// la 'byor mi ga tang gisang sngags ba// / dzad pas dbang bar gams bad// sems rjel yang dag du byaH// sam la ldar du 'das pa'i tshogs// ma dzudags pa rgya 'tha'acang // nga yi gas byung kyi
317a6(rnying rgyud): ma'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// de yi das las mi 'dabasrungs// 'khor gyi dregs pa sdom pas// rnal 'apyor ba sgrub pa'i thogs kyis shig/ ces gsungs so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la dga'

318a1(rnying rgyud): bad// thums/ na pa na // ga// sa na gas// gas ma smras pa ste// sh+lo ston pas pa // ngan
318a2(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i mgo bcad phreng bas bsras// skya rigs du mas yul sbas// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// mthing nag cin ldan dmar stob// thugs kar srug nag yam gnas// me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// 'khor lo tsang+ga phyag dbaskams// pha ma
318a3(rnying rgyud): kAr dregs pa che// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// ldang na gra rdo rje snyid phreng 'dzin// dregs pa'i thugs kar kham sa khang steng // tha ba nan tan ye shes nyid// 'jigs byed chen po mthur du blta// spyi gtsug mkha' lding kru nag 'dul// sor rtag/ ye shes nga po
318a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// dkar po zil gnon po nye za// phrag gong skrag rdag 'jigs pa'i khyud// dpung khar stag chen rol rngam// nu khar seng ge ral pa spug/ spu zur dug sbrul nag po 'khrug/ sangs rgyas kun gying po nyid// rdo rje 'chang chen gyi gzugs pan// ma bskyed pa
318a5(rnying rgyud): gis rang bzhin 'char// phyag rgya kun gyi zil gnon yin// de 'dra'i sku ru gsal bsgoms la// song srog 'khor lo 'di dag bzlas// u e uM/ a kle taM ka/ ya mA d+ha ka/ ya ma ye/ kA la ru pa/ ka ba ye/ wi staM/ a pa ye/ A A ne A nau/ u u
318a6(rnying rgyud): du du ne du ne/ a I/ u e/ a i/ ra rI/ la laM/ ru ru ye/ b+h+yaHyau/ si d+ha ye/ hrid ye/ bi da ye/ tsit+ta ye/ ha la ye/ mu kha ye/ u u ne/ u u ne/ b+hi krita/ a a nan/ ya ma ra tsa/ ya ma rak+Sha/ ya ma ra ga a/ ya mar k+Sha/ be tA li/ kro tI shwa rI/ ma ma e ka
318a7(rnying rgyud): dza taM/ de ma kha la bi ri la/ ru lu ru lu/ shri badz+ra kro ta/ ya ma kam/ ro naN/ ya ma rak+Sha/ krita tsan ta/ rak+Sha mon ta/ a muka phyags thu ma ri la/ tri gnan/ srur nan/ e hur zhums de/ khaM sha ga/ ro lcags/ mugs ti rbad ya/ gsang sngags phreng pa 'di nyid la// s+yAd mo drug
318b1(rnying rgyud): song de gsungs// bar du ming dang brda' ru sbyar// skyes gsungs so// drag po sngags tshad sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi klud las/ stong srog lha'i 'khor po las/ 'chi med dus kyi sbyor bas srung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas 'jigs byed chen po ngas/
318b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i za kha dgral rdzo ba yi/ sbrang mo drug gi so 'di gsungs so// che ge mo a mu ka tri ga nan/ e dur zhums dza/ kha ma sha ga ro myags mugs ti rbad/ ge mo a mu ka \u0f7f srur srog nan/ snying gzer zeng sha ga yaM zad / e gur thams dza/ ngam
318b3(rnying rgyud): shag ro phyogs lugs ti rbang ya/ chu go mo a su ka maN+Da tra la/ seM sbyor dri mi/ thu ma'i la n+tang / e kur dzam dA/ khas shig ro myags/ lugs ti rbad ya/ weg mo a mA ka du ram tri yaM 'dred phyung / srog gzir nan phyung / e bur bums ro// ngam sheg ngo
318b4(rnying rgyud): lugs ky-i zad pa/ tshi ga ma A mra ga zon stAm+b+ha yanan/ in na y-i bahU~Mg// 'di dzin to// e dur byams // bAs shA gar lcags lpags te bang ya/ chege mo a mu kA be ti s+t+rai mA la nan/ e hU~M thams dza/ khama? shag phyogs sugs ti zang la/ de dgag
318b5(rnying rgyud): sngags ring la// skabs kyis bsgyur ba shes par bya// bgying gzir byang bzlog gsang lam dgang // byas pa bshig cing drug pa dbyung // spobs dang nus pa mnan pa'o// ting 'dzin spang mo 'phro 'dra ni// g.yu li srang mo drug tu 'gyur// stang sbyor rab zin la
318b6(rnying rgyud): sbyar du byed pas gsal bar bsgom// zhes gsungs so// drug pa sngags song sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyung las/ spyang mo drug gi mkha' 'gro'i gabang dbul wa ba'i la'u sde gsam pa// de nas yang sngags kyi dag mda'i khang du skal par she
318b7(rnying rgyud): dbapa pa 'di gsungs sa// dpa' bo greng shi ba'am/ khyi nag po'am/ ra dag po'i snying nang du/ gdug byang rang gshod dbab pa'i 'khor lo gnyis/ zhe sdang lcags kyi sdig pa nag pa dang / phrag dag bse'i sbal pa dmar po gnyis spo bar bcas pa/ so d+ha'i nang
319a1(rnying rgyud): tsakra gzug/ de nas ragra chad zad pa gshag/ thod pa'i drung ngutsit+ta gzhug/ a gtso ba yang bstan la/ de nas mnan rdzas dang thun gyis brdeg go/ bdag nyid phyag kyi zil gdon du bsgoms la/ ngan sngag sa 'ang bzlas so/
319a2(rnying rgyud): gas la rngubs mugs shug ka run/ a mu ka srog la rbang / bum ril rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung / rje srog phur zhums jo/ zhes bzlas so// ngan sngags 'di skye ba rgyun gcong yin no// nag po rag sha snying la srur/ narda rbad/ nag po ga sha srog la zung khums rbad/
319a3(rnying rgyud): nag po dag sha snying khrag la phred shag rbad/ nag po rag sha rtsal phreng shag rbad/ nag po rag sha snying khrag tshal pa sham long rbad/ nag por ga sha/ gar b+ha nr-i dza/ g+han tra b+hi ta ma stam+b+ha ya na na/ zhes bzlas so// nyin mtshan phye la bzlas te/ mtshan mo nag po'i yas bya'o// nyi
319a4(rnying rgyud): par dmang po'i las bya'o// des tsit+ta ya dgas par 'gyur ro// dus thams cad du thun gyi las nye tshe bya ba gces so// gsang ba tsit+ta rang gshed dbab pa/ zhe sdang sdig pa nag po dang / phrag dog bse'i sbal pa dmar po gnyis/ rang gshed phab la gnan par bya/ zhes gsungs
319a5(rnying rgyud): so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi dug mda' khong du bskyal ba rang gshed dbab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas drag po thun la brten te bsad pa'i las 'di gsungs so// bri rgod kyi thod pa'i nang du/ gri rgod kyi
319a6(rnying rgyud): snying dmar rog po'i snying du/ dgra bo'i ying+ga bcug pas/ de yang yin rod gu dang / gar b+hanr-i dzas brgyan pa ni/ sngon dmar srad bus brgyan la bzhag/ bdag nyid phyag rgya zil gnon bsgom/ thun rdzas dug dang ske/ tshe dang // hung nag dang ni zir til// shang
319a7(rnying rgyud): ma khrag kyi khrag dang // raM khrag dang ni phag pa'i khrag/ sngags kyi zangs kye thun du sbyar// ngan sngags 'di dag dreg tu bzlas// kye s+ye l+ye/ a kro ta ka/ ya mAng+kaka/ kA la rlu / hrI b+hi gyi kr-i ta/ ka le krota/ an un/ na byi tsa ye/ du rba le/ ta9//
319b1(rnying rgyud): na 'aShashra r+m+ma
319b2(rnying rgyud): hal be/ pas kr-ita/ pa ma kro ta/ yam mon ta/ ya mngaH/ yas kyiH/ tse rbaN+Da/ mon ta kri ta ya/ a mug Na/ nga shag/ sngags shag mug zun bya/ tham la srog la lcag \u0f7f/ ngung ging rdzi shAg ta mA ma dz+ha/ dgra po'i snying khrag chal pa myog rbad/ srog la nAng /
319b3(rnying rgyud): lazad/ nr-i sha ku run rbad / nr-i phur long zeng dun dun/ rgyar thams dza// tsirta rbang / ces bzlas la yum par du brdeg go// bsgom pa ni phyag rgya zil gnon du bsgom mo// skabs su bskul pa yang gtang ngo // li ng+ga thun gyis zhugs par/ lam rgyag ma du/ gzang chub dang /

319b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi so mtshams su/ dong khru gang pa brus la/ kho rang gi ming rus/ der dug sna tshogs dang / khrag dang / nyung nag dang / tsha ba gsum dang / gu gu la dang / gre rgod khrag dang thal chen sbar ba'i zhan la dan sngags bzlas te/ gzugs kyi khar mnan/ rbod gtong mkhan
319b7(rnying rgyud): gyi sung ma rnams nus pa'i mtha nyams par 'gyur ro// sngags 'do'o// e skyugs pa rngubs mug shag ka dun srog la thum ri la rbad b+h+r-i/ rtsa la thun mug dzad to/ khrag la mugs ti thun rbad d+he/ steng thang nag pa khas khas phan yan/ gar b+han rlung dza ba te sA
319b8(rnying rgyud): yanan/ zhes bzlas na/ pho nya rkang mgyogs kha rang la/ gnod cing bzlog par 'gyur ro// de nas yang sngags pa nus pa can gyi stobs dang nus pa mnan pa 'di gsungs so// kho'i zag pa'i rdzas blangs la/ kho rang gi 'dra 'bag byas la ming dang rus dgod
320a1(rnying rgyud): dang ga stsa la/ gas dag nga/ nga du ba sa pa rgyapa kyang ga byu ba // de sug dgas pa du gapa/ nab pa / dun nga ga
320a2(rnying rgyud): ga pa bang ba'am/ ga ma lags ba kyang// dem rje'i rdzogs bstas papa'i nga/ gser gyi gang la rtsibs drug pa gnyis smra gyur nas/ skye'i chags ci ga se bye shAn pa nga gosong bachud de/ byung ba med pa 'i
320a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs ni/ lce thugs pa dbyas grags shag/ ng+yas us snyid dun / tha~M / no/ snying gang sbyar nan/ s+ya thA ga suM pa sa~M/ sa trA~M sa padun/ sags so// rtag dang 'i pa la dang bang pa 'gyur/
320a4(rnying rgyud): de khri breg gcig gam gsum rdzogs nas gnan par bya'o// skabs su spyi ring dang ting 'dzin bsgribs 'gyi'o// drag mo sngags god sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi chu de las/ sngags pa spobs can ga mthun pa'i lang ste drug pa'o// / de nas gtang
320a5(rnying rgyud): mkhan nang 'gras na/ gtad bzlog nag po rdus wal mjing bya stsol gyi 'khor la 'di gsungs so// tra la'i lo ma'am rgya shog la/ klu mgo dgu pa'i lto bar 'khor lo bcas la/ bdag 'chi bdag drug por bsams te/ ngan sngags 'di zhag gsum pa dmal/
320a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rus sbal gyi lto bar bcug la/ rang gi gnas su mchod rten nag po'i 'og tu mnan te/ skabs su sngags brgya brgya tsam bzlas na/ gtad mkhan de myur du brlag par 'gyur ro// ngan sngags ni/ e dun ka yaM/ dam po'i tsho ta zeng shaka dza/ srog 'azang
320a7(rnying rgyud): shag zur bum ma zad/ kye lcags pa rngubs/ mugs shag gdun/ nag po bo tsad+ha 'i khyob/ thag nur snying sprul/ lcags myags/ rtsa ba'i skums/ shan shin dgra ba'i srog la shan/ phur bur dag por snying la bung drang sa nag zhal tsam dam po'i ting la bun d+ha/
320b1(rnying rgyud): zhes mtshon cha bsnol mar bzlas te/ rus sbal gyi khog par bcug lam nana'o// zhes gsungs so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snyeng 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po gtad bzlog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / 'jam dpal gshin
320b2(rnying rgyud): rjegashed zlogs nag po'i snying po las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po/ drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzangs kyi rgyud/ phreng bden gyi rgyud ces b+ha ba/ bsam gtan lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so// lal phul gyi thal po ba su d+ha rangang/ so kyi rtsub
320b3(rnying rgyud): gyis ye shes rin po ches bskur po // sa ma ya/ n+ya rbaH// rgya gar skad du/ rung man+te pra ha rA Na kA la taH/ bod skad du/ drag sngags mtshon cha nag po'i rgyud/ dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsum ldan bde ba yi// rtsa ma
320b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma thun grangs shing // yan tan ma lus kun ldan pa// bde ba chen po kyad ma 'jung // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang ye shes ldan gyis thub pa'i gzhal las khang na/
320b5(rnying rgyud): rten pa'i rdzogs pa tsan dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par zhugs so// de'i tshe'i khor rdo rje snying po la sogs pa ma bsgribs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa rnams dang / sa la ma la gnas pa rnams dang / bzong ba gyin ci ma log pa rnams dang / gas
320b6(rnying rgyud): 'jal ba'i khro tshogs dang / 'jig rte tham 'debs 'boms pa'i tshig sa dang / b+hag stag ba shan pa thog pa jam pa'i tshogs dang / gdug pa gas pa dang bcas pa'i sde dpon dgas pa can dang / thams cad 'dus pa'i dbum ra/ 'ang pa'i snang bas
320b7(rnying rgyud): 'ang la 'di skad gas pa/ rang dag cis bu'i nga bzhinalas// 'gro ba 'dul phyir mi tshan ma'i su// thabs kyi rgyal ba bad che// so nam rol pa'i las rnams can// rdzogs pa'i chul du rgyas mdzad pa// gdug pa 'jam pa'i dang pabar ci/
321a1(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa nyid mi g.yo ba las ngam tshig dag pa/ shing nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ badz+ras rbad dz+nyA zhes gsungs pas 'jig tan thams cad 'a 'ur rab tu 'ur/ chem che ma rab tu chem/ g.ya nang
321a2(rnying rgyud): ldeg go// de'i tshe 'khor thams cad brgyal zhing srog dang bral du cha'o// lus sa la bdebs shing smre sngags 'don no// rigs pa rgyal po bded gyi// 'khor du 'dum 'phrog dang bral du te// srog gi snying po 'di 'azhes la// dkyil 'khor chen po stsal pa mdzod
321a3(rnying rgyud): ces gsol ba gdab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs te/ rngam pa'i ma 'di bsgrags so// kun gyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// rtog dpyod snang med kun khyab gdal// ye shes chen po kun 'byung ba// sna tshogs sbyor brgyas pa'i zheng
321a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis thos nas/ 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jam pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yang dag bde ba'i lam mchog las// gsang ba rin chen grub pa'i don// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab lam// dmod pa drag po rmas par mdzod/
321a5(rnying rgyud): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po nyid dregs pa can 'dul zhing dmod pa'i las rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// drag po e yi gzhal yas na/
321a6(rnying rgyud): chen dregs pa 'dul ba ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ga rlon dang // stag gi sham thab sa
321a7(rnying rgyud): tu mdzes// sbrul dang rin po che yis mdzes// stan cha mabur chu tshangs spud dang // phyag zhabs ro nyes rab tu mangs// dbul he ru lnga yis brgyan// bdud rgyal srin po thod pas sbas// thugs mchog spug nag 'khor lo steng // dregs 'dul ldang dag de

321b3(rnying rgyud): spang bsnga rang las brgyad// ngam dang lam kyis ma ba'i tshe// dang sems pan dang 'phags cad pa// las kyi tshang me nyi du nong // byung ban+de ba'i lung bugag/ rkyen sangs lags pa rang gi shed dngag// bti ba 'dang nga du
321b4(rnying rgyud): smyung ba'i dkrugs shing rkyen pa dpag// las kyi mapar bsgyum khas pas btag/ gas lagasum me pa gnam gyigadang / dza rnaMn 'ims ba shad/ tshan cha dag dri'i rgyad pas meng ga'is papa'i dzin/ dang pal/
321b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzogs pa'i dag gad dang yang bab pa'i srid pas 'drugasangs te// nga gang she pa 'a ba dag nam sa/ cho sa sus rang ba marnams ba dpa// maN+Dam mi nga dag gragasum la// grang mi gsum la nga ga zugs/
321b6(rnying rgyud): bsta da dpa bsno/ gachen cing rgyas gtong ma brtan// nas don da dpa pa'i/ srid kyi then la gdung / sa cad dag ma chags pakra/ nas bra mkhong bsngal// 'bras kya kyis dun la// rdzogs pa da mjas brjo ya rje/
321b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pas nyid pas ma gdong // dbang rdzogs rgyas shes gdang // po shes sbe grub rgyagachags la// spyod ba gyid pa ga / gdod byed dashing ba ba'i pon/ chos sre ga mardzogs gzang sa dgas// lo bdag pa nas chags 'phrul bgyi/
322a1(rnying rgyud): dug lnga'i nad kyis zin pa la// bde ba'i stobs med zhen chags can// log pa'i stobs gzhom drag pos gzir// gshin rje la sogs dregs pa yi// rang rang srog dang spyi srog dril// yi ge'i gnad kyis 'joms par byed/
322a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dbang byed dregs pa can// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa rang gshed rang gis byed// kun gyi srog snying e la bsdu// 'bru gsum snying rtsa mgrin par gnas// 'bru gnyis mgo dang yan lag gnas// gnod byed 'bru drug shes byed
322a3(rnying rgyud): dbang // de la sngags kyi stobs kyis gzir// rang gshed phyag cha rang la bskor// lha bsnyen brtan thob sgra la dbyung // A~M a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+ha nA dza hUM phaT/ bdag nyid sku gsum rdzogs par bsgom// stobs kyi drag sngags babu mtsho ba tu// skying
322a4(rnying rgyud): sna dam rdzas gang grub dbye// spyi dril las dang rang rang dbye// myur ngar stobs dpag med pa 'byung // sgrub bya las kyi shes rgyud la// rno dpal mtshon cha'i yi ge gnas// snying la nr-i gnas mgrin par hu ra// lte bar thams dang gsang bar dza// klad par thig
322a5(rnying rgyud): nan mgo steng nan/ rtsa bzhi'i mdud pa 'bru bzhis gcod// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rno dpal ldan// rtsa srog shes rgyud dran pa gcod// de bskul mtshon cha rgyud la ldang // stobs kyi sngags kyis 'phen par byed// e badz+ra sarba dus tan/ e hri ba nan/ e hur thums
322a6(rnying rgyud): dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ de yis sbyor ba stobs zhan na// ming dang snying po 'bru re sbar/ 'bru bzhi mtshon cha'i stobs kyi ba gcad// las dang sbyor ba rtse dang srog/ thams cad gang 'dod mi 'jig gcod// gang brtsam las la don med na// stobs dang bcas pa dril la brdeg

322b3(rnying rgyud): yaM khaM dr-i s+phar ya rbad/ srog la khyer phyung be sha ga mA ra ya rbad/ nri dur thums dza wI b+ha ya nan/ arbu sha / a k+She dz+wa la raM/ srog la kI pi kI la ya/ thig nan big+h+nAM snying la gzir nan/ hur thams dzaM/ lcags thu mas rel pad ya/ mtshan cha nag po srung chung las
322b4(rnying rgyud): drag sngags bstan pa'i le bu ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa cha ma la dbab pa'i phrin las 'di gsungs so// ngo bo mi bcos bde ba chen po'i dang // chos nyid ye nas lhun gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba dang
322b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin med// sprul pa sna tshogs log rtog 'dul la mkhas// tha snyad tshig rnams don la yang dag stong // de rtogs sangs rgyas yin pas gsang gnan med// bden don ma rtogs sdug bsngal phung por smin// lus ngag sems kyi 'du byed kyis// gzhan
322b6(rnying rgyud): las lhag pa'i stobs rnyed pas// dregs pa'i lus ngag sems su snang // gdug pa'i sems kyis gcod cing rngam// de la sngags kyi sbyor ba brdeg/ rang bdud phyag cha rang la bskor// khams gsum dbang byed dregs pa yin// dre kra ba'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs
322b7(rnying rgyud): 'i rang gshed rang gis byed// yi ge spyi yis gzir byas la// dregs pa'i rnam shes yig 'bru gcig/ 'grog byed yi ge bcu gsum gyis// snying gi dkyil nas 'phrog cing 'dzin// gcod byed mtshon cha 'bru bzhi yis// rang srog rang gis gcod pa byed//

323a1(rnying rgyud): pad// kun sbyin kyis ba da dang // stan dag nga ga pa gas// gdug nga gas // rnam mas// danas ma 'a nas byal gas sgrug sa 'a ga

323a3(rnying rgyud): de sngags kyi grong khyer te/ sngags pa nad 'gas pa/ dregs pa'i lha 'dre kyad la gnod pa dang / rtags dang spa shing sngags kyi phyag tu rang la bskor/ tegs rnams 'khrugs na song gsum gcig zil gzir/ bdun nam badz+ra bam tA+e drug ceg// ga @

323b3(rnying rgyud): rgyub srul gyi snying // gri bo ragra chang nag po'i snying // dmardzas rten la sde brgyad bsten// thod pa dong bur yugs sre// gri dang mnol gyi khrag thugs la// drag sngags dbu mtsho bcu ru bstim// rta tshe gsum po me thab tshul// yul gyi kyong 'dun dpung su gzung

325a7(rnying rgyud): ga tu zhe sdang chen po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rngam par bzhugs so// de nas 'jig rten gsul gyi phyogs bcu g.yos par gyur te/ 'khor rnams tshal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ 'jigs shing skrag nam brgyal la khang ngo // 'khor de'i nang nas rig pa'i stobs can
325b1(rnying rgyud): yongs te gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa'i tshigs rnams 'khor du 'chi/ 'kho la thugs rjem chung mdzod// mgo lus spyod yang 'gas bsnyam// gdung ba shugs kyis te brgya mdzod// ces gsal te// da nas bcom ldan 'das rnying sa man da las bkra /
325b2(rnying rgyud): tedagyes pa'i ngar 'di ston to// a e ha ta yAg sha de ba ti sem nga ri mi zhes bsgrags so// 'khor thams cad rang rang gi yid rang bzhin gyi men 'bar nam chog cing brlag la 'deg// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi rang ring gi rang ba den mthong ngo /
325b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po tshe bdag nag pos/ nyid kyi srog gi snying po de kho na nyid yang nas yang du rnam par bsgrags so// e e e e zhes brjod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa ma gyes pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ nam mkha' ska bu du rang grol
325b4(rnying rgyud): 'o// de la chos thams cad 'byung zhing ye shes rang la gnas so// de la chos thams cad drug po'i gtum rngam 'bar bas ye shes thig le'i ngang du rang bcom mo// de la chos thams cad zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rtag 'dzin thams cad bsdigs te dang skam
325b5(rnying rgyud): nas ye shes rang gsal lo// de las 'khor thams cad ye shes skyes te rang rang gi srog gi snying po thams cad mdongs gsol du phul la// de la thugs kyi sprul pa tsha bdag nag po mag dgu pa yis/ kA zhes zhes rngam par bsngags pas dzin las thams
325b6(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub cing yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// de nus yum gsod byed kyi rgyal mas rgyags shis phul bas/ lag pa'i mag dbang du 'dus nas pa shes kyi thi ga le gsal ba'o// phyug da rdo rje su rngubs shes phul bas ye shes chen po'i mes khrag dbang
325b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs bskams nas phyag chu brtan par dang gsal ba'o// rus sbal ci rgyal pos mugs shes bsgrags pas/ 'gro ba tshangs pa'i srog bsdus te/ bla dang tshe srog bcangs te chos nyid du rang grol ba'o// ya ma tsam la zhes pas/ rang gi las
326a1(rnying rgyud): rlung gis lha dang lus srog thogs nas/ ye shes tha ma'i sar bgrod pa'o// bya khyung gi rgyal pos shag ces pas/ gdug pa'i drug rlungs thams cad btsam nas/ nye bar bgrod pa thob pa'o// las kyi tshe bdag nag pos dran
326a2(rnying rgyud): des phul bas/ sred pa'i srog rten zhi nas 'od dmar nag 'thibs pa grogs nas/ kun tu bzang po bde ba chen por rang grol ba'o// de nas mon pa seng ge'i mgo can gyis/ sog la bar kha b+ha ma yaM ye rbad/ ces phal bas/ srog gi rten gzhis
326a3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas mon pa stag gi mgo can gyis/ srog la dril myags thum sha ga rbad/ ces phul bas/ dngas ma bzhi yis rang rang gcod par gyur to// mon pa dred kyi mgo can gyis/ srog la gzir thums ri thunarda rbad/ cis phul bas/ srog gi
326a4(rnying rgyud): dngas snyigs byed par gyur to/ mon pa khyung gi mgo can gyis/ srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/ ces phul bas/ srog gi bla mtsho bskams par gyur to// bdud kyi srog gshed chen po bzhis/ srog la tri shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag rdo/ srog la thun rmugs tsit+ta pre /
326a5(rnying rgyud): shag rdo/ gyer hur thums rdo/ srog la thun gzer shag rbad/ tsit+ta phreng shag dza/ zhes phul bas/ tshogs drug rten las 'phom par gyur to// de nas srid pa'i lha ga don drag po rnams kyis/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ tse d+da phreng shag thums rdo/ zhes phul bas/
326a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyad sgo 'gags par 'gyur ro// de nas chu'i rgyal pos/ srog la hu rdum rbad/ tsit+ta beng shag dza/ zhes phul bas/ bsod nams che ba'i lus srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas btsan gyi rgyal po rnams kyis/ srog la thums shag rbad/ oMt+ta
326a7(rnying rgyud): phred do/ zhes phul bas/ lus kyi 'byung ba dkrugs te 'pho bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sde bzhis srog la breng bred rgad/ ni srog tu ma tum rbad/ kho shag rtsal rbad/ srog la phyogs zad/ khyer byung mugs/ ti ling shag ling dza/ zhes phral bas/ rgyu bdun
326b1(rnying rgyud): gas su byas par gyu // danas bdu rtsi rgyad mga'abram rjes/ sogs thug zhing byung thams ma ga gtung/ nithog nang tham sang / zhas thal bas na sal spyad na gtubs par gyu / denas med pa gsas/ ma bar wa shig tu ngas/ sa

326b3(rnying rgyud): sa/ srog la bi ril raM shag rbang / so khyer thum bur thams // des phul bas drims dal yams kyi dad 'bebs par gyur to// de nas gajug pa gsum gyi tshogs kyis/ srog la bo ral r-I sha gzang / zeng bur thams dza/ zhes phral ba pa/ garu
326b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i spu gris lus srog gcod par gyur to/ de nas sde brgyad gzang dang lha srin gyis/ phreM gro/ shar shar/ hril nA ga snying gzer/ rgud yaM thun yi gril shag s+ho// zhes phul bas srog dbug dang lo to gci brdad thams cad bcad de 'pho ba 'o// de nas stobs can rnams
326b5(rnying rgyud): mthu dril te/ srog la rbad thum ril zad / rtsa khrag tseto byung / dri srog hur thums pa/ zhes phul bas/ 6dang srog zungs bcad de 'pho ba'o// dregs pa can thams cad kyi mthu stobs dril te/ snying gzer sbar nan ha la ha la tsam ri phyung / e hur thums //
326b6(rnying rgyud): khams sha garbad/ ces phul bas/ rang gi mthus gzir ba dang / drug dbyung ba dang / srog dbrog pa dang / sbyor ba bcad pa'o// de nas 'khor de dag rab tu 'dus nas/ dgyes pa'i mngangs rnyed par 'gyur ro// de das bcom ldan 'das khrag 'a
326b7(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal po des/ e he he ta e hur thams dza/ zhes sbab sbags pas/ nye bar las la brtson pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi shes pa'i rgyud la 'jus te thim pas/ bdud dang gshed rang gi rgyud las ldang zhing / rang gcod kyi mtshon cha bskul bas/ dang /
327a1(rnying rgyud): zag zungs rang gshed gcod cing // khag dang bag chags 'ang smras te/ thod par snying po dang srog spyad pa'o// dpal tshe bdag drug pa sgrog dum du len gyi rgyud las/ klong gnyiH pa'i leT ste dang ba'o//
327a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// gsang sngags ngo bo de nyid legs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa'i mthu rtsal ldan pa kun// thog snying dbul zhing las la gnyer// bka' bzhi

327a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ldan bye ba la// rigs las gol ba'i khro bo la// nag po 'thom byed bdud kyi gtso// srid pa'i mnga' bdag khrag skyugs gcod// rtsu ba khro srog gcod ging gi gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa gdug khro'i gtso// phud byed nag po che yi bdab// 2

328a1(rnying rgyud): labam bar rnams// gsang thugs gadrug pa'i dngor bton// ma shas ma yi zas mchog sbrul// tshe bdag drug po gshing rje yis// dz+wa la m+b+hi dkyi' du bza'// btab pas ba klu nyid rgyal// rdorje srin pa'i labar brtags
328a2(rnying rgyud): nas// nag po chags pa'i cho lagathogs// spangs rgyas 'phrul rdi bar byas// des ma thal te dgongs pa bzlas// gseng sngags ngo bo ga // dngas mtshan po 'i dngos// pheM gas su nyid de rtogs pa'o// rigs lnga gtso d+ha yi gzugs//

328a4(rnying rgyud): rol gyin phyag ye shes drug/ skye ba rnam bzhi dag pa'i rtags// tshad med zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul dang // sra byed brtan pas thams cad gnon// mnyen byed bkyil zhing spyad pa'i dbang // gsal byed khrag chu bag chags ba sregs// g.yeng byed rkyen med rang shugs
328a5(rnying rgyud): ldan// sna rtsed klo 'khyod khebs 'og rgyad// rgya rkyen thabs la rag ma lus// bdeb chos sku stong bdag med// stong las kun byas pas ma dpag dka'// nag po 'dul cing sna tshogs sbrul// ya ma badz+ra thams khang khrung // de bzhin gnyis ldan seng ge/

331b5(rnying rgyud): badrag po'i las su bshad// 'dzu bani pas kyi rim pa ni// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams byicad lnga// du mthod rgyal byed pab+ha// mu khyung bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte ba gru gsum myur rje// gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram la//
331b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes sprul pa las bdag yum// gsang ba'i snying po 'bru bzhi dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// mtshan la gcod pa'i phru gri dgod// kyi yi rtsibs bcu'i rtse mon// nyi ma gcod pa'i 'bru bcu dgod// mtshon cha bsnol ma'i bar du meng //

344a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing // lan grangs khri chad du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// 'gugs par gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shang ma hA sarba ti la dz+re/ lan grangs
344a2(rnying rgyud): mang du brjod byas na// ci ltar bsams pa thams cad 'gugs// rgya shug bskus pa'i khra ba dang // ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na// 'gugs par 'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung // zhes
344a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par 'dus te/ dper na phyogs thams cad nas mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi
344a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzod de// rang bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsungs so// 'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin
344a5(rnying rgyud): byas la// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi'o// yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs las// thig skud rgyas pa lcags las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bya// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi
344a6(rnying rgyud): khyud bcas// kun du grwa bzhi sgo khyud can// klu chud ldan te dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan na min// sten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro te ka hU~M a/ hUM badz+ra
344a7(rnying rgyud): sait+tA lir zlu ma/ hU~Mts+tsha hU~M/ hU~M hU~Mg tu hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ nga no// b+hu b+hU b+hU b+h+yo zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad gas so// rab tu g.yos so// kun du rab tu g.yos so// 'gul 'bral/ rab tu 'gul/ kun du ba
344b1(rnying rgyud): 'grel lo// ldeg ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg go// chem che ma/ rab tu rna ma/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu lur khung/ kun du rab tu 'ung 'ur ro// dbus mthon mtha' dmang// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ste/ 'jig tu
344b2(rnying rgyud): gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag sgro lags so// 'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la
344b3(rnying rgyud): bdag zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por 'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI ba ra ya \u0f7f
344b4(rnying rgyud): gu ya/ sam ta kr-i badz+ra kA la rU pa ma d+ya na phaT ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten na dbang rtse ba dang / mthu che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang // gastang du med pa'i chos nyid li// ra
344b5(rnying rgyud): sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// de bas nan tan bskyed byas te// drug po'i tsham dam bshad par bya// 'jig rten brgyad kyi gdug pa kun// tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya/
344b6(rnying rgyud): e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya// rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams na// gzugs dang
344b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub par ro// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang // ga'u pad+ma dam pa dang // kham pa rdza yi 'ji ba yis// khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo // de dag phrin las
345a1(rnying rgyud): mchog pan ste// grub par 'gyur ba gangan ma na// tha ma da dbang bas yang dag gsas// phyogs bcu gdu kha zlangs san// 'dus par 'gyur te mas s+ho// 'phags pa las man nagasang ba'i nad pa sa drug pa'i 'a
345a2(rnying rgyud): zla pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang pa lag rdzog she/ la gas sagru bya pa'i ma ma myed par ba du brjod pa brjod do// rang bzhin lags pa dran dugs rab ste// de bzhin sa par ma jug phyin pasas
345a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis chos kyi sgra zhis rab tu bshad// chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas// 'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'bribyung dang // bad dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir// mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni// ma lus car gcod don du 'di gsungs
345a4(rnying rgyud): dalo ma gyi bas brgyang mu khrud rdum por bcas// snrel kyis rgyags dag gi mtha' 'dor la// lte ba podon rgyabs mi bad bya// de yi steng du ka skal gnyis la// gcig la ga shin rje dbajug pa yi gzugs// gcig la yum chen lkog gzugs dris la/ 9
345a5(rnying rgyud): du dgra po gang rjesas dang ni// dri dang de bzhin khrugs gsum// thal chen rgya thug bskus pa'i khra ba dang // brjes la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcid // dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya// oM ya man+taka/ rje badz+ra kro d+ha ya mahA ka
345a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra bo d+ha phaT phaT ma/ skyes brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ yab yum skra mdog mthong nag le// dbus kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// dbu lathod pa rlon pas brgyan// sku la sbrul nag chen po dang // zhabs bzhi brgyad bskum tshul du bzhugs// phyag drug phyag mtshan pa snams
345a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni// g.yas kyi dang po sdigs mdzus pa// mu zhags lcags kyi bar zam// du chen sngo sh+'u le gas pa shing g.yon// de ltar cha lugs gas pa ba dang // dbye sa de nga bar nan tan gyi// rdzi rnam pa'i rgyal po ldog 'dung gshin rje gshed// khams gsum dang rdzun
345b1(rnying rgyud): rtags su zhal gsum po// dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum ldan gyis grub// las ngan 'thab pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gdug pa de dag 'dul byer gshegs su gsol// dam N+Dag ga phyag rgya bcas la/ dzaHhUM ba naH/ sa ma ya ste/ zhes pa lan
345b2(rnying rgyud): grangs mang du brjod/ des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur// khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang rmi la// chen po la sogs gtor ma bsham// de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las// sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas//
345b3(rnying rgyud): oM badro hasta pa ba he ha dA na hU~MSh+TaM che ge mo mA ra ya hu~M hu~M phaT phaT/ che ge mo hasta ba pri ti nir te sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ nyin zhag gcig la lan dbum bzlas// nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang // gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya
345b4(rnying rgyud): ste// bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang // phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya// de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang // yang nas yang du bstab pa bya// de ltar bstab pa byas pas na// dgra bgegs
345b5(rnying rgyud): dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos// de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsungs so// oM da ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par/ bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams// ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs te// mgon
345b6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje nyid kyi pras/ don nams thams cad ma lus pa// de nyid nga ni bslab par bya// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// phrin+da las rdo rje can gyis mang // zhes brjed cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs
345b7(rnying rgyud): so// drimi dang ngas deng zhag grangasan// nyi ma gcig la spyod pa gcig/ nam gyi sring la brgya gcig/ tha rang sa thun gcig bcu rtsa gcig/ grod kyi gung la brgya rtsagacig/ de ltar nyan zhag gsum par du // bkres pa zhag grangs tshang bye dang // phyang tub
346a1(rnying rgyud): zhing gzugs pa bdag/ nyas byas nag don mig/ oM mA na 'da' la man/ tsa tsa~M pre ba dpar napal tra~M laT laT swAH/ rdo rje ci gcag pa'i phyag rngubacas la dam po'i gzugs la bzlog go// oM badz+ra la sbar na b+h+yaH/ b+hU A b+he da rba
346a2(rnying rgyud): paT raT ya/ yang phyag rgya go sa banas pa/ oM badz+ra kron nI la taNA hu~M hu~M/ oMd+b+ha bi tanan/ ha~M skr-i kro tanananan zhes brjod la/ bdag gi lag pas dbang bskur ro// yang b+hag rgyabacas la// sngags 'dis yang lan grangs sang du bya'o//
346a3(rnying rgyud): kha hi hu hu che ge mo dbang du spras shig/ ji la hri la zhes lan grangs mang drang rjod do// rdo rje d+hi grAm gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go// yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM badz+ra kang ka ma ka la ya na hU~M phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum bzlas la rdo rje rtsa lnga pa'i phyag
346a4(rnying rgyud): bdag go// yang phyag rgya bcus la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM badz+ra a gu sha rbe pra sti rA ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya dza hU~M zhes dbang du sbas shing / hu~M hriM phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du bsdu'o// yang
346a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM hu~M hu~M phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang yi yaM raM r-i hrid hring du ba b+h+yo hu~M phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/ kha T+wAM gi phyag rgyas brdeg go// de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la/
346a6(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsung ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan sadas gshin rje
346a7(rnying rgyud): gshed/ bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lnga phung yan lag gzhom pa dang // dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang // 'bras bu rgyal bar bsrub bya'i phyir// nan tur phrin
346b1(rnying rgyud): las bshad par bya// dang po'i las ni rgyas dang gsad// dgug dang gtad dang bcing dang dgrol// sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun// phrin las 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// stag
346b2(rnying rgyud): mo gdal mchod skabs dang // seng ge gangs la 'byung tshul dang // baljang gzan la sdug tshul dang // brani gzhan la 'babs tshul dang // dom chen grol ma tshe rdul dang // kha sgeg zang shing theg tshul gyis// ra mi phung po btsal bar bya/
346b3(rnying rgyud): 'dug na 'gying bas btsal// sribs la 'dug na mtshang pas btsal// gdags la 'dug na 'jug pas btsal// 'or na 'dug na 'babs pas bcul// brag la 'dug na chebs btsal// nags la 'dug na sgeg pas btsal// cal rigs
346b4(rnying rgyud): yin na seng ge stangs// bram ze yin nag ga mo sbyangs// rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod stangs// dmangs rigs yin na dom gyis bya// ma ning yin na spre'u yis bya// dog la yin na khwa srung spangs// de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// brtag
346b5(rnying rgyud): nas 'ongs pa gyur pa dang // gshin rje rgyal po'i rlo ma dam b+ha// khro bo brgya yis ska stabus kyis// ro la kun tu bskor byas la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag/ de skar gzhag pa'i las byas nas// mgo ni lho rub mtshams su bstan// rkang paza
346b6(rnying rgyud): mtshams su bstan// lag pa g.yas po sgo ma phyogs// lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yon pa byung gi phyogs// de ltar gan rgyal bzhag zas la// da ni phrar pa dgod bye ste// mig dang rnab sde dang lce// lag
346b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis dang gnyis lo mtshan dang // zlogs de bzhin snying ga dang // skye babras mo dpung pa gnyis// su mang bzhin long zug nyis// mchog sa de bzhin skyeb dang // dkru nga nga bzhin mtshan khrang gnyis// dpral pa rnams su gang ba byas la// par 'ded
347a1(rnying rgyud): lha yi sbar// rab tu brtags te goms pa dang // rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang // tIng nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang // gzugs brnyan nang bko pag skam// chod pas gdangs pa'i byam lha// mang zhwang bzhin thim pa bzhin// gnyis sa med par
347a2(rnying rgyud): shes bya la// gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni// nam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi// de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni// brgyad po dang du shes par bya// sgom lus la grags pa'o// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i phyir// steng 'og khro bo de las gyur// de dag kun gyi
347a3(rnying rgyud): sgra gsung thugs// ma mo gsum gyis nga nyid de// ya ba ni kun la khyab pa la// yum ni kun la sdud pa ste// bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do// phung po kun la khyab pa la// mnyes pas phul phyin lha yi tshogs// 'gro drug kun lam lus snang // de ltar lus rnams zin
347a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // zhag grangs du bya ngam yang bca'// dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor chen pos ting 'dzin gsal// de ltar byas nas mi la sogs// thams cad dbang du 'dra bar gsungs// dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos// drag po'i phrin las
347a5(rnying rgyud): grub 'dod pas// dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la// bam gyi kha yi nang du gzhug/ rdo rje rgyu gram rgya yis gdab// he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnan// yungs kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg/ rgya shug bkrus pas drag tu grugs// nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg// sngags dang
347a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ldan mi bcad// dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu dgram// rnal 'byor nyid 'dzin drug tu bya// yengs na bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng bar me mdzod khri bas gsangs// dus ni las kyi 'bras bu yang // shidwa hA zad pa med pa de// bral

347b4(rnying rgyud): pa// yab kyi la sa 'jug pa// g.yon phyog saganas pa gong ma bzhin// A~M a mre ta ta sun su ma ta bo ta paH// oM la m+bi ta po hU~M // da g+har yig rgyapa gas pa pa babyed// bd-i gdan la rab bklags / 'khyi sa ma na/

347b6(rnying rgyud): rgyags bcug rgan pa'i 'dzin te// gdug pa na sa ma 'gugs par 'gyur// myo byu po di gtu bsgya// mos pa la bats+tshe shA~M pra~M A ko A yu ba la po hU~M hU~Mn+da e/ sani ci yi dbang thob nas// sangs kyis sru du rmags pa dang // bskal pa bzh-i
347b7(rnying rgyud): bo dzun// lo lnga lon pa mazhin du gnas// de nas bsgral ba'i gnos 'jig sa // rdzogs parda can napa'i dris pa y-i/ ye shes jig sa 'di// gas chen 'ad phreng ba te// rgyu drug thor ba'i sems can rnams//
348a1(rnying rgyud): sman gyis grub pa'i brgyud// thams cad malus tshams cag/ rgyas kyi sku'am chos kyi dbyungs// don du mchog dang mngon sum pa// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las// khyab pa'i mya ngan thugs rjem// bla mo sems kyi rang bzhin ta//
348a2(rnying rgyud): drug mun pa sel ba ste// nyon mongs dri ma kun dang thal// shin tu sad pa mya ngan 'das// thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshe dung ste// rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o// zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dam pa'i
348a3(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// e me'o phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ya nas dben// bder gshegs thams cad ye nas ldan gyis grub// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes sun rdzogs pa'i// rdzogs bcu'i stong la mas 'jig rten can du bcas/
